TEXT: The emotional landscape has changed abruptly, leaving you to wonder about the complexities of relationships. This unexpected shift can mark the start of something new as cracks appear in a brittle shell that once kept you safe. It's time to emerge and face the world on your own terms, so don't get sidetracked by trying to repair the breach. Instead, dream about all the potential ahead for the baby chick once it is free from the nest.

Although you deserve a day of rest, you're buzzing around today as original ideas and beautiful images cascade into consciousness. But you must be careful because your thoughts may not be as brilliant as you believe. Your unconventional desires could even border on craziness now, so listen to what a trusted friend says before doing something outrageous you'll later regret. Everything doesn't have to follow according to your plan; you can improve nearly any activity by loosening the reins and sharing responsibility with those around you.

Your friends may seem unreliable today, disrupting previous plans that required their participation. This unpredictability can be challenging, since you must make choices based upon your ability to deliver on your promises. Unfortunately, you can't depend on the unflagging support of others at this time. Don't expect any extra assistance; if someone comes through for you, take it as a pleasant surprise and graciously accept their support.

Your reputation among your tribe might radically change today. If you experience a minor setback, it's only reality's way of pointing out something that needs your immediate attention. On the other hand, others may think that you're a real genius if your unconventional idea actually works. Either way, the status quo is about to shift beneath your feet, so don't try to hold on to the past. Reassess your direction and put your new plan into action as soon as possible. Fortune favors the bold.

You may shut the door in an attempt to keep out extraneous noise today. Yet everything is moving so fast now that you must deal with the sheer rapidity of the speed of change, even if you're not happy about it. Any misguided attempts to stick to your current position are futile; the more you resist the future, the faster it arrives. Let go and dance with the uncertainty. Allow exhilaration to replace your fear and embrace the unknown.

You typically can be counted on to play it safe, but you're suddenly tempted to step outside the box today and surprise someone with your willingness to take a risk. However, you may end up on an unexpected detour, even if you're acting in a cautious manner. Hidden tensions that express without warning are either initiated by you or else they happen to you. Naturally, a proactive strike is better than waiting for something to happen.

You are fighting the Goldilocks syndrome today. Finding a happy medium may be impossible because your reactions to trivial events seem to be too much or too little. You might even grow annoyed because people assume you want everything while you feel as if you're not asking for enough. Rather than blurting out your needs impulsively, let them sit and simmer a while before sharing them. Thankfully, the extremes will continue to settle down for the next day or two, allowing you to say exactly how you feel without turning your life upside down.

You're mesmerized by rational explanations of complex mysteries today as you seek answers to the unsolvable questions of life. Whether you find yourself studying ancient philosophies or quantum physics, you are quick to grasp complicated concepts now. But don't close your heart as you open your mind. There's no way around it; your emotions must play an integral role in your mental breakthrough now for it to have meaningful value.

You might think you're acting in a more practical manner, but you'll probably end up letting your feelings dictate your activities now. You may be in the throes of a new relationship, consumed with a competitive sport or fascinated by a captivating hobby. Whatever the reason, you are willing to be pulled off course now. But this doesn't need to be all-or-nothing venture as you seek exciting avenues of expression. Play close to the edge and don't be afraid to move the boundaries. Just be careful not to step on anyone's toes in the process.

If circumstances at home seem overly complicated today, you might be ready to try a more diplomatic approach to the dilemma. Nevertheless, everyone's emotions can quickly escalate once you start talking. Ironically, you may secretly enjoy the fireworks, since the unplanned free-for-all could catalyze stagnant issues and provoke radical change. No matter how disruptive the discussion becomes, the air will clear once everyone has a chance to be heard.

Your emotions are at odds with your logic today, especially if you are tempted to behave in a way that conflicts with your core values. It's tricky to embrace a strong desire that pulls you off balance, but suppressing an attraction won't make it go away. You're being gifted now with a unique opportunity to heal a wound that you have carried within your heart for a long time. Soften your hard edges, forgive yourself and move on.

Although you may still be reveling in the holiday spirit, your mind is already thinking about your future career objectives. Thankfully, your current sense of duty holds you in good stead on the job now. But you can't perform the same old tasks in the same old way and expect to feel inspired. Be daring in your communication today, whether it's by email, phone or in person. Don't miss an opportunity to establish new connections because you might meet someone who could open doors to places you've never been.

Listening to the voice of reason isn't easy today as relationship tension tugs at your heartstrings. Unfortunately, your words are more inflammatory than you realize, especially if you impulsively open your mouth before considering anyone else's feelings. Thankfully, you can reduce the negative impact of your rash reaction by simply remembering to be respectful of other people's perspectives. In the final analysis, acting for the good of all brings more emotional satisfaction than only looking out for yourself.

You Bulls are quick to dig in your hoofs and get ready for battle if you feel your stability is being threatened. You might even be provoked to fight back in order to maintain possession of what you assume is yours. Unfortunately, your opinions can magically turn into facts now. You could begin to believe them so intensely that you're unable to hear anyone's contrasting viewpoint. Nevertheless, remaining open to new information strengthens your connections with those around you.

Since you are usually the first one to change your mind, others may be caught off guard if you stick with a specific action plan even when better alternatives become available. You're attracted to complex entanglements now because you want to experience the deep emotions that usually slip through your fingers. Happily, unbridled inspiration accompanies you on your journey today, stimulating your innate curiosity so you can learn even more about yourself and those you love.

You may need to stand up to people who refuse to give you what you want today. You might even feel personally attacked by someone who accuses you of using your vulnerability to get your way. Letting down your guard and sharing your true feelings is challenging when you think it's safer to keep your desires hidden. Nevertheless, you can earn the admiration of others now by revealing your softer side without compromising your integrity. Your strength of character is undeniable when you speak from your heart.

Your peers will either follow your lead today or just step out of your way because your positive attitude is so unflappable. No one can talk you into taking a different path if you already know where you're going and how you're getting there. Thankfully, you can accomplish more than you expect if you remain methodical in your approach now. Nevertheless, being obsessed with the details is counterproductive. Developing a concrete plan is useful only if it has enough  built-in flexibility to respond to the changing circumstances.

You may be preoccupied with wanting to have fun today and will do nearly anything to keep your social plans from falling apart. However, playing the role of a drill sergeant and telling people what to do isn't the most effective management style. Relaxing your grip on the reins of control contributes to a more pleasant and productive day for everyone. Leaving a bit of room for the element of surprise can make all the difference in the world. Spontaneity is your friend.

Although you're not typically emotionally volatile, powerful desires can build until the pressure becomes unbearable today. A dramatic event in a relationship could rattle your cage; however, the stress won't lead to a volcanic meltdown if you stay on top of your feelings throughout the day. Calm your nerves with exercise, meditation or creative expression. Positive change is more likely now if you're willing to leave your familiar routines behind and jump into unknown territory with an open heart.

There's no place in your life for passive behavior today; letting circumstances develop until you lose control is not a viable strategy. In fact, cosmic forces prompt you into action now, whether or not you are ready for the engagement. Clearly express what you want without issuing any ultimatums or placing expectations on anyone else. Say exactly what you mean and then allow the situation to cool down on its own, without being overly attached to the final outcome. Sometimes the greatest magic requires a bit of breathing room to come to life.

You often enjoy the excitement of a little chaos and confusion, but nearly everything seems up for grabs today. You may not feel as if you're in control of your destiny, and you can't yet put your finger on where the current changes are leading you. Paradoxically, it might appear that your choices are narrowing at the very same time. But don't act out of desperation even if you are committed to making magic happen now. Thankfully, your current sense of urgency will fade, giving you plenty of time to make your dreams come true.

You are tired of sitting around waiting for someone else to get the ball rolling. You are running low on patience today and you might choose to handle your frustration by striking out on your own, leaving everyone else to fend for themselves. Be prepared to forge ahead if you want to make progress now, but it's advisable to remember the wisdom of moderated self-restraint. A black-or-white solution might not be the only answer, so consider all options now before resuming your drive to success.

Bringing an unfinished project to its proper conclusion makes room for exciting new opportunities. However, anything that remains incomplete now will likely haunt you for weeks to come. Your next venture demands your full concentration which means that you can't drag your old baggage around much longer. But don't waste time wondering about what the future holds in store for you. Instead, focus all your energy on lightening your load today to prepare for the challenges of tomorrow.

A complex emotional issue that's been quietly brewing within a relationship or a group of friends may need to be brought out into the open today. The expression of hidden emotions is a good first step in a healthy process of honest dialogue, even if the information revealed isn't what's expected. Banish all fears and suspicions before they creep into the mix; rather than withdrawing in denial, focus on the rainbow of possibilities that waits beyond your current trials and tribulations. Set a shining example for everyone else to follow.

You're swept up in a whirlwind of cosmic energy as you naively attempt to untangle your emotional attachments. You might try to take an impartial approach to relationships today, but you still could encounter a block until you make a tough decision. Not surprisingly, the right choice now may alter the trajectory of your life. Luckily, your clear intentions help you to cast the current circumstances in a positive light, empowering you to walk fearlessly into the future.

You're doing everything you can to avoid an unpleasant confrontation today because you cannot see how it will lead to anything constructive. It's a lot less stressful to ambivalently sit on the fence and wait for resolution than to get caught up in the emotional fray. Nevertheless, inaction only works for so long. Everyone will feel better after the various opinions are out in the open, even if there's no apparent common ground to be found yet. Thankfully, it's not necessary to force a group consensus now; compromise is an art that cannot be rushed.

You are driven to defend your recent choices while messenger Mercury is put to the test by warrior Mars. If you proudly stand up to political pressure, your priorities evolve and your most spiritual thoughts will endure. Holding onto your vision helps you conquer a difficult opponent. You may feel that someone is out to defeat you; however, if you are clever enough to steer clear of conflict today, you can continue toward your destination without further interference. Take the high road and see who follows.

Showing your feelings comes more naturally now that action-planet Mars is camped out in your 5th House of Self-Expression. All emotional interactions may seem a tad overwhelming now; there's so much going on in your life, it's nearly impossible to know where to start. Although it's healthy to power through your hesitation, don't share everything at once. Choose your subject matter carefully and then take a creative route to prove your point; your wide-ranging knowledge base and infamous tenacity will help you to reach your goals.

Fortunately, you're processing the waves of change today while standing on a strong foundation. However, you may be recovering from recently going out on a limb and sharing more than was necessary. And you might face an uphill battle, no matter how optimistic you are that everyone can step beyond their parochial thinking to see the bigger picture. Most attempts to demonstrate your intellectual superiority are bound to fail now. Instead of turning this into a game where someone is likely to lose, it's up to you to invent a way in which everyone can win.

Although you quickly acknowledge the power of your convictions, it's tricky when someone close to you works with an entirely different set of assumptions. But it's a waste of energy to engage in a fight just to prove someone else is wrong and you are right. Trying to change another person's mind is a dead-end street today. Thankfully, you will be free to re-focus on your continued self-improvement once you acknowledge that intelligent people can hold opposing views. When in doubt, err on the side of peace.

Fortunately, your creativity is flowing directly from the source now, making it a breeze to be proactive in all your endeavors. Mercury's current visit to your 5th House of Self-Expression inspires eloquent communication and increases your mental agility. Still, you may need to fight for your right to speak your mind. Being considerate of people's feelings is an admirable trait, but don't allow your willingness to compromise stop you from doing what's best for you. Be as kind to yourself as you are to others.

You might sense that someone is attempting to derail your plans behind your back, but it may just be your fears conjuring up these fantasies now. However, combative Mars and the evocative Moon return to your suspicious sign today, raising issues of jealousy or possessiveness in relationships. But don't succumb to your own negativity; the choice is truly yours. Choosing to believe in the best of others over all other options should be enough to keep the day rotating with a positive spin.

Your cheerful attitude can positively impact your immediate future, but self-doubt could wreak havoc on a perfectly good day.  Thankfully, delicious Venus forms a creative alignment with joyous Jupiter, lifting your spirits and raising your hopes. Make time to connect with your close friends because they will be the ones who can help to take your mind off of your troubles with a little laughter and a lot of love. Being mindful of your blessings keeps your heart humble.

You may lock horns with your group of friends and find yourself in a standoff today, especially if you feel threatened by your own sense of insecurity. But other people's clever ideas are no match for your unforgiving persistence and the strength of your convictions. Although someone might provoke your anger now, don't let your emotions distract your focus from your ambitious goals. Your current optimism mixed with your unwavering concentration is an unbeatable combination.

You possess the gift of clear vision today and shouldn't let anyone dismiss your intuitive hunches. But interpersonal dynamics can get dicey if someone questions your authority. Your energy could quickly shift into a more aggressive posture now if you believe you need to defend your intentions. Don't bother justifying your dreams; just keep your eyes on the distant horizon and continue to march in that direction. Listen to your inner voice and your journey will be one of discovery and delight.

Although everyone seems very intense for some strange reason today, you're still able to stay slightly detached from your emotions. Luckily, your optimistic outlook on relationships enables you to sidestep an unnecessary conflict with someone who fundamentally disagrees with your position. Remember that you don't need to be right; you have absolutely nothing to prove now. Instead of stirring up trouble with a loved one, concentrate on manifesting your dreams.

Withholding your thoughts today may be a sensible strategy, even if it's not easy to remain silent. Your key planet Mars is anxiously squaring contentious Mercury, making it exceptionally tough to speak your mind without blowing your cool. Even if you can keep your feelings under wraps for a while, you're likely to let loose later in the day. There's no question about it; the less you say now, the more peaceful your life is. Discretion is the better part of valor.

An unexpected social commitment could get in the way of your production at work today. You might be invited to participate in a group activity that distracts you from something that's less fun yet more important. Unfortunately, you may rush to say yes as a means of escape, even if it turns out to be a bad idea. Nevertheless, don't blame yourself  later if you wish you had chosen differently. All you need to do is make the best choices you can in the moment and take responsibility for the consequences. You reap what you sow.

You're not exactly certain what others expect from you today. However, you're ready to swing into action even if you don't know which direction you're going. Part of the problem is that interactive Mercury has you hyper-focused on the future while its square to impetuous Mars heightens your impatience. Nevertheless, flying by the seat of your pants now is asking for trouble you don't need. Spending extra time studying your maps increases your chances of arriving at the right destination.

You might get up on the wrong side of the bed today. Fortunately, early morning dissatisfaction can transform into afternoon hope, even if you don't have a clue as to how it might happen. It all starts with having faith in your dreams. If you believe in yourself, others will pick up on your optimism. It's like starting a fire from a spark; nurturing a tiny flame can turn it into the fuel of inspiration. Your positivity is contagious; it's your attitude that determines your failure or success.

Normally, you perform well under pressure, but formidable obstacles are not easily dismissed today. You're less certain about a recent decision, but might not want to expose your vulnerability by sharing your fears. Don't waffle now, even if you're unsure of your next move. It's simpler in the long run to take a strong position, even if it leads to conflict. At least others will know exactly where they stand and can make their plans accordingly.

You're eager to show everyone how adaptable you are today, but your patience may be running thin as clever Mercury squares impulsive Mars in your 3rd House of Communication. You wish that people would state their needs more clearly because you don't understand what they want. But rather than wasting energy criticizing others for being indecisive, just move forward by following through with your plans. Putting your own life in order is more constructive now than trying to manage anyone else's.

You're highly sensitive to people's unexpressed feelings today and may try to settle the tense dynamics by boldly walking into the middle of a conflict. You have your own point of view, but still believe in the process of open dialogue. Unfortunately, the more you hear, the more you realize the current stress might not have an immediate resolution. Instead of pretending you know what to do, share your uncertainty. Ironically, your honesty catalyzes a solution that seemed impossible only moments before.

Your unwavering commitment to the truth as you see it may generate some unexpected backlash today. You may struggle to open your mind as you're asked to entertain a variety of possibilities. You truly want to be more flexible, but too many choices can be quite overwhelming now. Nevertheless, it's wise to listen to the needs of everyone involved. The good news is that you can win what you want if you're acting like a team player. Everyone is more willing to compromise once competition turns into cooperation.

Although romance might be in the air, it's difficult to bring it down to earth today. You're so eager to engage your heart in an interaction with someone special that you can't separate your wishes from the true dynamics. Talking about your feelings helps to ground your expectations, but don't expect miracles now since there may be insurmountable differences of opinion between you and another person. Just remember that you can respect an opposing point of view without having to support it. A healthy relationship is built on mutual respect not blind agreement.

No matter how disciplined or determined you are  today, you won't likely accomplish everything on your agenda. You're all too easily distracted because your curiosity is aroused by every new idea that floats your way. Unfortunately, you may grow anxious when you realize these mental diversions aren't leading you to your desired destination. But the information you learn now can be worthwhile later, even if you're not making tangible progress. Be patient, you'll be able to see the big picture soon enough.

You may grow worried if you can't pin down a sensible course of action at work now. Even if you have a viable strategy for getting ahead, you're not sure that your timing is right. It's unsettling if you don't receive the support you expect now that assertive Mars squares interactive Mercury in your 1st House of Personality. But don't jeopardize your long-term plans with feelings of impatience or doubt. Sometimes you just have to wait for the right opportunity to knock at your door.

Visualizing the final outcome of your decisions is nearly impossible today; however, you can have a fine time by spinning a few fantasies within your imagination. Nevertheless, it's still a struggle to keep your behavior consistent with your thoughts while self-directed Mars crosses paths with rational Mercury in your 12th House of Spirituality. Forget about trying to explain your actions to anyone else, since the more you say now, the less sense you make. Eleanor Roosevelt wrote, "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."

You're already busy networking with your friends and associates these days because Mercury has set up shop in your 11th House of Groups. However, as the Trickster turns retrograde, you begin to reconsider your career strategy and want to share your revised goals with your peers. Discussing your future is a prelude to the pragmatic planning that must follow as you imagine the possibilities ahead. What you talk about today is the foundation for all your tomorrows.

Your role in the community is integrally connected with your career now that Mercury turns retrograde in your 10th House of Public Life. Perhaps these last weeks have felt like a whirlwind as you tried to finish a complicated job even with the noisy interference of the holiday season. However, you soon realize there's more work to do when others point out the missing pieces of the puzzle. Thankfully, you budgeted extra time in your schedule for just this sort of contingency. Taking pride in your performance demonstrates your professional touch.

An ongoing project may have expanded way beyond your original intent. Now you begin to realize that you need to scale back your vision and bring your expectations down to size. Mentally agile Mercury's retrograde dance in your 9th House of Big Ideas reveals where your strategy isn't supported by reality. It's one thing to maintain a positive attitude about your aspirations; just make sure to review the steps that are required to successfully reach your destination. Practice makes perfect.

You may be hypersensitive as the winged messenger turns backward in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Intimacy is built on clear communication, yet it's challenging to say what you mean today. Unfortunately, you can't move forward without including others in your plans, even if they seem to have a different agenda. If all the dissonance starts to wear you down, consider a temporary retreat until you regain your emotional balance. Being nervous isn't a bad thing; listen to your intuition when it's telling you to pay attention.

Emotional stress may impact a partnership now until you address important issues through honest communication. Unfortunately, mischievous Mercury has slammed on the brakes and has shifted into reverse gear while visiting your 7th House of Relationships. Starting a conversation isn't easy, but don't miss this opportunity to clean up old business. Interpersonal dynamics can change quickly now, even if they are currently stuck in a difficult place. Take a chance; nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Normally, you're quite adept at managing the complexities of modern living by breaking down big jobs into smaller components. However, you may be preoccupied these days by the practical demands of your everyday routine. It's challenging to know how to improve the quality of your life now that Mercury is turning retrograde in your 6th House of Habits. Without your constant vigilance, the daily grind could quickly unwind. Thankfully, if you keep a watchful eye on the details for the next few weeks, the bigger decisions will likely fall into place on their own.

You may be asked to revisit old issues which makes you feel like you're running in circles these days. The messenger planet is backtracking in your 5th House of Play, possibly bringing more fun and creativity into your life during this planetary period of review. However, you might need to relax your current agenda and go with the flow today, even if it pulls you in the wrong direction. Don't worry about where you are going now; your destination will become clear soon enough.

You are often a champion at overcoming obstacles, especially when they are between you and the object of your intentions. However, Mercury's retrograde in your 4th House of Security makes you question your competence. You could overcompensate by bulldozing your way through anything blocking your path. Unfortunately, impulsive aggression will be counterproductive now. Don't do anything drastic today; just rethink your options from every possible angle and act only when the time is right.

You are your own greatest enemy today as you inadvertently work against your success. Although you feel uncommonly resistant to change, the pressure to reconsider your current path is intensifying all around you. Discussing your alternatives with trusted friends is wise when Mercury the Messenger turns retrograde in your 3rd House of Communication. However, it's foolish to dig in your heels so you can prove to everyone that you know best. Proceed slowly if that adds to your confidence, but remember that exercising flexibility now will make your life less frustrating in the days ahead.

You may discover you have more work to do to shore up your finances, especially if you've been concerned about your fiscal stability recently. But Mercury's retrograde turn in your 2nd House of Money cautions you against making immediate changes because you could act carelessly in a way that negatively affects your bank account. The more obsessive you feel, the more you need to cool your jets. Oddly enough, putting a little distance between you and your current predicament gives you the objectivity you need to decide upon a clear course of action.

Routines that you recently established might start to fall apart now. But avoid the trap of thinking that everything has to be fixed right away. Nevertheless, today's retrograde turn of mischievous Mercury is all about you because the Cosmic Trickster is backpedaling in your sign. You can minimize frustration by buckling down and putting in the necessary work while simultaneously cutting yourself some slack along the way. Practicing patience isn't always easy for you, but it certainly can help now. Maintaining a healthy sense of humor allows you to keep everything in perspective.

Your thoughts may be out of sync with your actions now that cerebral Mercury turns retrograde in your 12th House of Fantasy. Although you might be able to see some progress, the rational part of your mind is working overtime to analyze your current situation and reevaluate your plans for the weeks ahead. But don't make any major decisions yet; the underlying stability will likely outlast your temporary uncertainty. Nevertheless, be prepared to change your mind several times over the next few days as you recover missing information. Clarity will return once the winds of fate start to settle down.

You may be so blinded by your own plans now that you could blur the lines between your true ambitions and your immediate need for some excitement. You might even be attracted to danger as your desire to flush your system with adrenaline overtakes your logical mind. It's okay to push your own boundaries, but be conscious and cautious about intruding into someone else's safe space.

You might secretly try your hand at manipulating others today, or you may be the subject of someone else's underhanded maneuvers. As tempted as you might be to pull the strings that will create the desired effects, try to steer clear of this kind of control, especially if your emotions seem too extreme. It's admirable to know what you want, but not if it takes over the rest of your life. If you see yourself becoming obsessed, back off and chill out until the intensity passes.

You might come on too strong in your attempts to convince someone of your competence today. Even if you think you are making wise use of your communication skills, your quick mind can create more trouble faster than you can imagine. An important piece of information might be missing from your consideration now, and it could be better to postpone your performance until you have the whole picture. Keep gathering data until you know what's real.

If your intuition tells you that something isn't right, remember to trust your inner voice. Intense emotions are motivating you and others now, and you might feel overwhelmed as you attempt to discern what's most important. You're pulling in a wide palette of feelings. If you are afraid of being inundated by too much detail, have faith in the process of transformation instead of withdrawing into denial.

You are riding on a trajectory of inevitability that is changing everything. You can't take total control, even if your intentions are honorable, for others might interpret your actions as power-hungry meddling, rather than just helpful. If something breaks down, this could be a sign that it needs to be eliminated from your life as you clean up your act and get ready for what's next.

Even if you are confident about what you are doing today, your over-expressive zeal could lead others to assume you are insincere. The fact is there may be something you are hiding and the secrets just add to the appearance that you're trying to mislead someone. You may think you can handle this dilemma by ignoring it, but consider the radical alternative of telling the entire truth.

If you feel like you're being forced up against a wall, you might say more than you ever intended. What comes out of your mouth now could even shock you, for it can be highly charged with extreme emotion. But these aren't normal times. You know what you need and now have the power to do whatever it takes to get it. Just remember that your path is easier when you travel with a companion, so soften your words and listen with your heart.

You have plenty riding on how you handle an explosive situation today while the Sun is still joined with your key planet, Pluto. Even if you are normally comfortable with your own strength, you may pack more of a punch than you realize. If you stay fully aware of your actions, you will be able to move closer to your goals. But if you react unconsciously, you may end up being manipulated by your own abuse of power.

You may wrongly believe that you're unstoppable now, unless you know exactly when to call it quits. You're playing at the top of your game now, but you might not have the common sense to hold back now. You could provoke unneeded resistance from others who feel you are attacking them. Even if you are on a roll, you're probably not as important as you would like to believe. Success is more easily attained today by practicing humility.

You're fully aware of your inner strength now as you resolve to do a project your own way. However, problems arise if your extreme behavior motivates you to steamroll over someone who is resistant to your control. Nothing positive will come from intense ego battles. It makes more sense to soften your stance today instead of acting like the tough guy. Gentle persuasion is more effective than relentless pressure.

An overwhelming desire to act in a rebellious manner can create a real mess now. If you take things too far, it won't be easy to recover what you lose in the process of being yourself. What seems like an exciting moment at first turns into a complex web of unspoken passion. Be cautious, since heading down this path also requires you to change in unexpected ways.

You must step up and fully own the magnetic power others see in you today. If you remain in denial, the challenges will continue to grow. However, a strategy based on avoidance could leave you feeling victimized by the unfolding circumstances. However, you can learn a lot about yourself and the changes ahead if you face your fears instead of looking for the easy way through.

You can't contain your excitement today as the obstacles to pursuing your happiness seem to fall away. You may be buzzing with anticipation about an upcoming adventure, but satisfaction isn't as close as you think now. Don't be flippant about the complexities you must manage or you could miss the nuggets of wisdom waiting to be discovered. If you're truly serious about your goals, you just might be able to execute your plans flawlessly. Humility is the ticket to your success.

Keeping up with your social commitments is super-stressful when there are too many demands on your time. Thankfully, you're capable of stretching beyond your usual limits today, but don't overextend too far or you will upset the delicate balance between work and play. Holding onto the spirit of the holiday season long after it has passed is a lovely goal, but don't be afraid to end the party if your common sense warns you that it's time to get back to work. The key to maintaining a healthy balance is knowing when you lost it.

It's tempting to jump on someone's bandwagon today because you're currently more interested in enjoying yourself than with achieving success. Luckily, the Moon's presence in your 7th House of Companions amplifies the strength of another person's strategy, further enticing you to drop your previous plans. Your cooperative spirit empowers you to work seamlessly with others now; the joy of collaboration brings you more emotional satisfaction than doing something on your own.

You're cautiously optimistic about what you can finish at work today, but your expectations might be slightly unrealistic. You don't know what unscheduled crisis might rear its ugly head, so streamline your to-do list as a proactive measure. Rather than wasting time on tasks you can't complete, focus on accomplishing the most important ones; otherwise, you could exhaust your resources before the day is done. Conserving your energy is your ace in the hole.

You are on a creative burn today with the buoyant Sagittarius Moon bouncing around in your 5th House of Self-Expression. However, you're not in the mood to perform the repetitive tasks that may still be required of you now. Be careful about reacting before you make a plan because your frustration could explode into an emotional outbreak that flips your day upside down. Practicing patience might be your greatest challenge now, but it also is the most effective weapon to combat your stress.

You might believe you can achieve anything you focus your intention on now. Unfortunately, your schedule could fall apart at the seams if someone's need for independence clashes with your agenda. You may be required to reinvent your day on the fly or postpone tasks when something requires more time than you expected. Your immediate reaction could upset others, but your reassurances should settle them down. However, it's more important to remain true to your purpose now than to be sidetracked by anyone else.

Stuffing one more activity into your day could be the straw that breaks the camel's back. But you may not realize anything has gone wrong until after the fact. The entire house of cards might need to fall in order to alleviate the tension if you stretch your commitments too far. Even if you're confident that all is well in your world today, it's still smart to lighten your calendar before you find yourself in hot water. Sometimes saying no to one thing is really saying yes to everything else.

Exercising caution is wise today because the adventurous Sagittarius Moon in your 2nd House of Possessions encourages you to spend more than you should. Your discretionary funds may be more limited than you want to admit, so budgeting your resources is a strategic move. It's smarter to acknowledge how easily you can fool yourself before you end up facing an unnecessary cash crisis. Thankfully, a little sensible planning goes a long way to ease your concerns. A penny saved is a penny earned.

You're surfing a wave of self-confidence, but ignoring practical details can lead you astray. Relying on your logic instead of your optimism is a good idea now, but it's not easy to maintain a balanced perspective. Your visionary powers are so strong today that you could easily trick yourself into believing you're invincible. Don't avoid reality just because it's unpleasant. Positive thinking improves the situation as long as you face the truth.

You prefer taking a rational approach to complicated situations, especially while the radiant Sun is shining in your sensible sign. Unfortunately, the current circumstances defy logical analysis. Instead of downplaying your creativity by trying to stay on a straight and narrow path, give yourself permission to be inspired by your imagination. Don't justify your choices to anyone today; simply trust in the process. Your intuition is a gateway to other dimensions.

Your dreams are the source of great inspiration but they may also lead you in a more practical direction today. Three planets lurking in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals lure you out of the present reality and into the world of possibilities. Luckily, your imaginative excursions can have a lasting influence on whatever comes next in your life. But instead of just losing yourself in fantasyland now, consciously paint your future with the colors of your mind.

You're pretty confident about your prospects now, believing you have the ability to advance your career path simply through the power of positive thought. However, your visions might be distorted, causing you to see your future through the rose-colored glasses of your desires. Nevertheless, there's no reason to assume the worst-case scenario, either. Don't avoid difficult facts today; a reality check only heightens your chances for success.

Giving someone the cold shoulder isn't nice, even if you want to send a message of disapproval today. Withdrawing support isn't helpful if your response is actually based on your current fear of the unknown. It's more productive to engage in an honest discussion about the cause of your concerns without throwing any blame around. However, don't expect the tension to dissipate immediately. A river cuts through rock not because of its power but because of its persistence.

It's no fun feeling like you're being left out of all the action today. It's as if there's an emotional chill in the atmosphere now that affectionate Venus is burdened by the weight of karmic Saturn. Although you might push back against the resistance at first, the smartest way to turn an uncomfortable situation into a sweet one is to let go of control. Relinquish some of your independence voluntarily; it's a small price to pay in the big scheme of things and can improve your chances of feeling like you're a part of the pack.

You may be required to make a tough choice today, especially if you're not one to sign on to a commitment easily. You could be quite convincing now as you reveal your desire for greater intimacy in a relationship, but you might still feel the urge to run for the hills if someone gets too close to your heart. Thankfully, you're not doomed to repeat the same old patterns just because you're worried about getting hurt. Mustering up the courage to push past your fears is the secret to your happiness.

Gaining support from a coworker is tricky business today, but you won't know what you might receive unless you ask for it. Even if you can't imagine that anyone will actually go the extra mile on your behalf, taking a calculated risk could turn out in your favor. Don't scare yourself by assuming the current situation demands an all-or-nothing approach. Instead, be cautious and systematically establish common ground as the basis of a solid working relationship. You're not alone; let others nurture you the way you would nurture them.

It could be awkward to engage in a casual conversation today because your feelings might be exposed, and you're worried that you won't get what you want. Ironically, your unspoken concerns could manifest into a self-fulfilling prophesy, especially if you choose to withdraw from social interactions. Luckily, you have the resolve to overcome the negativity of your own fears. Turn things around quickly by changing your attitude and opening your heart.

It may be disheartening if you don't receive the respect you deserve from a loved one as vulnerable Venus bumps into judgmental Saturn in your 4th House of Home and Family. You've done everything right, yet your ego can trick you into believing you should be more appreciated than you are today. Don't waste your time dreaming about receiving accolades and standing ovations. The best reward is the deep satisfaction that comes from within when you know you've done your very best.

Too much resistance from a friend or coworker doesn't give you an excuse to sulk and brood today. Don't isolate yourself from your companions just because you think that everything isn't copacetic between you. It may be tempting to hide your feelings from those closest to you, but this avoidance tactic is not a satisfying solution. Confronting the shortcomings of a relationship might put you back in touch with what you admire about each other the most.

You're not inclined to put too much effort into sharing your feelings today. In fact, you're quite practical when it comes to allocating your time and energy now that resourceful Venus joins forces with austere Saturn in your 2nd House of Resources. You may be very straightforward about cutting back on frivolous pleasures to assure you will have what you need on a rainy day. Naturally, exercising caution makes logical sense at first. However, there's an unlimited supply of love in the universe, so you can always splurge when your heart is involved.

The time has come to make a crucial decision about how to spend or save your money. But this choice goes much deeper than being a simple cash flow problem because the underlying issue is more likely about your self-esteem. When you realize all the skills you have to offer, your earning power could grow beyond your current expectations. Don't fall into the trap of thinking that you're worth any less than you actually are. Real wealth is not about your income potential; it's about appreciating what is already yours.

There's no reason to suffer in silence today if you're willing to face an old fear with a fierce new attitude. Your emotional isolation is probably more voluntary than you care to admit now that the sobering Venus-Saturn conjunction influences your 12th House of Invisibility. It helps to acknowledge that the current situation is not the same as what happened in your past. You can choose to respond defensively, based on an old habit, or you can live in the present. There's no question about it, being an optimist is a much more empowering strategy than being a pessimist.

Don't rush to the conclusion that your friends are putting you down today when your limited perceptions may be contributing to your worries. In fact, you could be so sensitive now that you imagine trouble where there isn't any. Unfortunately, it might be too late to sidestep a dance with discomfort. Nevertheless, it's not necessary to project your previous failures onto others; discuss your concerns without pointing fingers at anyone. A heart-to-heart discussion may be all that's needed to put things right.

Unfortunately, there's no room on your busy schedule to surrender to your desires now. Instead, you must maintain an emotionally cool and competent presence at work while flirty Venus hooks up with responsible Saturn in your 10th House of Career. There's no time to waste energy complaining about what you're missing as you strive to achieve your long-term goals. Seeking personal satisfaction can wait; practicing patience today is your best strategy for realizing your dreams tomorrow.

Assuming you have the right to boss people around won't necessarily demonstrate your ability to lead in the way you wish. Although the Capricorn New Moon intensifies your 10th House of Status, people are more likely to follow you when they see you're walking your truth, not when you run around barking commands at them. Ironically, you can produce the lasting impact you want if you adopt a gentler approach in all your interactions. In fact, all you need to do now is take responsibility for your own actions and hope others will do the same.

You might believe you know how your day will unfold, but an unexpected event may require you to change your plans. The sure-footed Capricorn New Moon grounds your 9th House of Big Ideas, but its square to wily Uranus adds uncertainty to the mix. Unfortunately, overreacting only makes matters worse. Well-considered modifications are your best bet today, even if you don't see results from your actions right away. You still can reach your goals if you remember to take a few deep breaths, step back and broaden your perspective.

You might experience a run-in with self-doubt if your day deviates from your expectations. You could even start to worry that your efforts for the past few weeks have been an exercise in futility. Nevertheless, change is slow and steady as the conservative Capricorn New Moon lingers in your 8th House of Transformation. Your key word now is patience; it's a mistake to act recklessly just because you're frustrated with your apparent lack of progress. Be persistent; you will begin to feel more productive once you see the results from your recent hard work.

You may be emotionally stressed by your relationship with a friend or lover now, especially if you each approach conflicts in radically different ways. It's challenging to put your feelings out on the table because the reserved Capricorn New Moon lands in your 7th House of Partnerships. Thankfully, consistency is rewarded  and your willingness to reveal your vulnerability in spite of a difficult issue could actually bring the two of you closer together. Even if a conversation seems strained today, sticking with the process can result in a welcome sense of relief all the way around.

Your typical weekend routine may be turned upside down today as the Capricorn New Moon triggers your 6th House of Details. You aren't happy about doing things differently now, so a change of pace could be upsetting at first. Nevertheless, shaking up old patterns can reveal habits that might benefit from change. But don't waste too much time looking back; there is little to be gained by replaying your past, except for the taste of regret. Instead, create the future you want by modifying how you respond in the present.

If you are waiting for the best time to share something near and dear to your heart with someone special, this may be your moment. The calculating Capricorn New Moon mobilizes your 5th House of Self-Expression, encouraging you to finally come forward. After much careful deliberation, you're ready to show your cards today. Remember, keeping too many secrets could prevent you from having a shot at success now, so be honest and turn this moment into the chance for happiness you deserve.

Your personal life might not be unfolding as you wish, but you will probably get what you want, anyhow. Although there may be a few unscheduled stops along the way, the ambitious Capricorn New Moon ultimately leads to stability as it energizes your 4th House of Foundations. Keep in mind that satisfaction could still take a while because now you are building the solid base for future operations. Ironically, the longer you wait for something, the more you appreciate it once it's yours.

It's time to initiate an overdue conversation about a sensitive topic, especially if you can feel tension bubbling just beneath the surface. Avoiding an uncomfortable discussion only adds to the strained relationship dynamics. Thankfully, the earthy Capricorn New Moon stabilizes your 3rd House of Communication, enabling you to make real progress toward creating common ground. But it's not wise to push for closure today; allowing time for the current intensity to soften will help you reach a more palatable resolution for everyone involved.

Expressing your feelings is more challenging than it should be today, but you're at a turning point and the resistance is finally ready to dissipate. Luckily, the Capricorn New Moon emphasizes your 2nd House of Self-Esteem and it seems as if your luck is improving. However, this current shift is more likely the result of all your hard work. You will enjoy the fruits of your labor soon enough, but don't expect too much too fast as you continue to build on your accomplishments.

You might believe you have all the answers today, but recent events suggest otherwise. The pragmatic Capricorn New Moon switches on your 1st House of Self, but your blind optimism can backfire if you become too confident of your plan. Avoid extreme reactions; don't waste time getting excited about what's ahead or being sad for what you've left behind. Instead, maintain a positive attitude in this moment of heightened awareness where your thoughts are busy creating your future.

Everything may seem overly important now, as if this current moment in time is more significant than all others. The formidable Capricorn New Moon's visit to your 12th House of Karma could stir up unresolved issues from your past if you think they could foil your ambitious plans. But you might not remember the events as they really occurred since your imagination is bending the facts out of shape. Take the current truth, as you see it, with a grain of salt; your perspective will return to normal in the days ahead.

It's as if you're standing on a mountaintop on a clear day, ready to choose your direction off the summit. You can clearly see the horizon in the distance every way you turn as the shrewd Capricorn New Moon rocks your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. Although you might normally employ your imagination to create the next phase of your life, it's nearly impossible to replace reality with dreams now. Although you're often inspired by fantasy, taking a matter-of-fact approach enhances your current chances for success. As Voltaire wrote, "Common sense is not so common."

You're so sure you must be practical today that you're likely to put your dreams on hold and channel all your energy into producing tangible results. It isn't that you're incapable of acting sensibly; it's just your irrepressible need for independence comes out when the Moon enters unconventional Aquarius this afternoon. But be forewarned this is not a smart time to burn bridges by alienating anyone who supports you. Instead, find ways to speak your truth without instigating a fight. When in doubt of your next move, remember Mr. Spock's Vulcan proverb, "The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few."

You could feel as if you're out of the loop today, especially if others don't bend over backwards to include you in their plans. Thankfully, you are patient enough to wait for your turn, even if you are quietly frustrated with the process. Oddly enough, losing your temper might not be the worst thing you can do now because it releases all your pent-up negativity. Unfortunately, the tension continues to build if you keep your growing annoyance to yourself. However, it's one thing to vent some steam; it's another thing to strike out in anger. Walking that fine line is a delicate dance.

You're intent on getting all your chores done today, even if it seems like you have too much to do. You could reach a point of no return, when you're tempted to throw your hands up in the air and just walk away from your world of never-ending commitments. However, you can't escape from your obligations that easily. Instead of trying to sidestep reality, demonstrate your persistence by sticking with your agenda. Luckily, checking a few things off your list will alleviate the stress more than you think.

You are less likely to play nicely just to get others to like you today. You are clear about your needs and are willing to take personal responsibility to achieve satisfaction. You typically might not be this assertive, but it seems natural now to chase your dreams. Even if you believe you are justified to feel so certain that you'll reach your goals, don't shrug off  the concerns of your friends and colleagues. Nothing will be gained by disenfranchising an ally. Treating others with the same respect you want in return is always a sound plan.

You're taking your promises to heart today and you're committed to delivering on your word. Even if there are too many repetitive tasks on your plate now, concentrate on them one at a time until they are done. However, you're just as likely to jump into something totally new if given the chance. Either way, it's tempting to test to see how far you can push the energy. Curb your enthusiasm just a notch; a touch of sensible self-restraint at the right moment maximizes your progress no matter what projects are in front of you.

You might want to schedule your day backwards by having your fun first and then getting serious about your chores later on. It may be nearly impossible to narrow your focus in the morning while the Moon is still camped out in your 5th House of Play. But you won't have the time to partake in any distracting activities once Luna enters your 6th House of Work this afternoon. Do not wait; grab the opportunity for enjoyment while you can and start your day with ice cream before you eat your vegetables.

Pressing family obligations may require your attention during the morning, but you're eager to shift gears later on so you can let loose and enjoy yourself. Scheming about your escape might be more fun than you expect, especially if you attack it as if it were a competitive game. Don't impulsively rush ahead; wait until you feel the time is right before doing your disappearing act. Make sure you follow the plan you devised so that you honor your commitments first before you embark on your big adventure.

Your extrasensory perceptions are attuned to an unpleasant wave of energy still out on the distant horizon of your awareness. Needless to say, your concern makes it difficult to enjoy the good vibrations around you today, but it isn't wise to push your darker emotions away for the sake of harmony. Ironically, avoiding uncomfortable feelings just gives them more power. Instead, express what's in your heart, even if it isn't what others want to hear. It's kinder for your loved ones to learn your truth now than to receive a watered-down version of it at some later date when they can't offer to help.

You need to get some work done today, even if it's normally your day of rest. Chores that piled up in your absence demand your immediate attention. Ironically, establishing manageable limits grants you additional freedom now. But, if you're not good at setting healthy boundaries, you might have to overcompensate later by admitting to your failure. Don't delay the inevitable; even if you feel uncomfortable, a clearly drawn line in the sand will be enough to hold your position.

The beginning of your day seems to flow smoothly enough, but someone may unexpectedly question your values later on. You're probably resistant to talking about your goals today because you're still developing your strategy. It doesn't feel right to climb out on a limb in order to defend a position that's still unformed. Unfortunately, your silence is easily misinterpreted now. Hiding is not a wise idea, for it encourages others to draw the wrong conclusion. Transparency is your friend.

Sometimes you need a not-so-gentle reminder about the importance of your emotions. You are often satisfied to set them aside for the sake of convenience. However, your life is enriched when you bring your heart into the equation. Fortunately, you don't need to change your behavior today; you only need to adjust your frame of reference. Living life to the fullest brings greater satisfaction when you stop trying to overrule your subjective feelings with your rational thoughts.

You may be overwhelmed with an unrealistic desire to avoid your current responsibilities. Although you might dream of running away to an exotic locale, you could quickly become disappointed once you realize how impractical it would be to drop everything right now. However, you can't ignore your frustration or it will morph into anger and erupt again in a few short days. Instead, find a way to slip away for a while today, even if it's only to escape with an intriguing movie or a good book. A little inspiration will recharge your batteries faster than anything else.

Starting something new is typically your idea of a fun time. However, today you are fixed on finishing a project that's already in progress. Although you may not be panicking because the deadlines aren't looming close enough yet, complacency is not your friend. Something intriguing could easily distract you if you're not paying close attention to your priorities. Consciously narrowing your field of vision enables you to singularly focus on the next critical task. Work now, play later.

Drawing a line in the sand requires very little effort today as you set clear boundaries and make big plans for your future. However, you might have such an inflated idea about your goals that you get carried away with your own enthusiasm now. Even if everything seems to be copacetic, trouble begins to brew once you realize you may be overshooting your mark. Don't let your ego stop you from reassessing your trajectory; there's no shame in downsizing if it improves your chances for success.

It seems as if time is running out, forcing you to scale back any overly ambitious schemes. Nevertheless, sharing your ideas with someone who is opposed to your strategy can be your most brilliant move because it will reveal the weakest links in your plans. Just remember that the feedback you receive might not be what you want to hear. However, there's no point in arguing when everyone else has already moved on. You will be happier in the long run if you demonstrate your intelligence by adapting to the changing dynamics with a positive attitude.

You could convince yourself that it's best to remain silent about your feelings now, but non-communication isn't a viable strategy. Although it may be easier to keep everything to yourself, anything that isn't said will only strengthen in its intensity. You still must deal with your emotions eventually before they inadvertently turn up as a projection. Your smartest defense is to react honestly and deal with the cookie as it crumbles.

Your attempts to be emotionally available could backfire on you in a exasperating manner today, especially if you're being overly optimistic. Perhaps you missed an important fact or simply didn't want to acknowledge someone's pessimism, especially when you are feeling so positive. Balance your desires with a realistic perspective in order to prevent disappointment in the immediate future. Truth may be a bitter pill to swallow, but it's medicine that's better taken sooner than later.

You might want others to believe that you're busy focusing on your work. However, you are likely having trouble preventing your thoughts from being carried away by the crazy schemes of your friends or coworkers today. In fact, your attraction to outrageous ideas and intriguing adventures could actually be a reflection of your current boredom. Don't pretend that everything's fine if it is not. Be proactive; seek constructive ways to shake up your routine before you feel really stuck.

Your overconfidence could make you careless in your actions today. However, you can minimize your chances of making mistakes by remembering to double-check your work as you go along. Your plans won't turn out well if you are absolutely certain that everything you start will be great. But if you maintain a sense of humility now, your creative powers will be free to manifest at a highly productive level. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.

You may believe that it's prudent to let an opportunity for a friendship or a romance pass without any action on your part. But even if you're worried about feeling emotional pain now, it's still worth overcoming your fears, taking a risk and reaching out. Your silence will ultimately be more hurtful than any vulnerability you might feel in the moment. The adage, "No risk, no reward" couldn't be more true when it comes to matters of the heart.

An uncomfortable situation at home begins to settle down today. But just as you assume everything is on the mend, someone might do something so out of character that you don't know how to respond. Honestly, you are tempted to retreat from the drama and take care of some personal errands. But don't fall into the trap of believing you can just walk away and ignore the problem. The same dynamics will be there when you return, so face the music while it's still playing.

You have a strong sense of direction today and you're not willing to let anyone redefine your agenda. Unfortunately, you might upset someone by simply holding your ground. It feels as if everything could be blown out of proportion, leading you to believe you have more at stake than you actually do. Nevertheless, a little calculated risk-taking will be positively rewarded in the days ahead. It's easy to stand with the crowd; it requires courage to stand alone.

Your best ideas could run into trouble today, as if reality is throwing up roadblocks to test your will. You might be tempted to hit the brakes and turn your car around to avoid the trouble. However, you are encountering a setback and not a defeat; this is no time to throw in the towel. Your determination is your secret weapon and overcoming the current obstacles will strengthen your plans and execution. It may take more effort to reach your destination, but it will be well worth it in the end.

You appear a bit less stable than you actually are today. However, your unorthodox behavior may only be superficial because deep down you know that karmic Saturn's rules and regulations need to be acknowledged and obeyed. Nevertheless, you must tread carefully; if you inadvertently step over the line of acceptability, you will have to make amends quickly. Walking a straight and narrow path now is your most direct route to happiness.

You are driven by a powerful desire to experience the thrill of sensual enjoyment today and are drawn toward anything that stimulates an emotional buzz. Your nerves are on edge and you don't want to wait for satisfaction. Thankfully, your irrepressible spontaneity can be expressed creatively. Take a chance and cross to the wild side of the street while sexy Venus aligns with rebellious Uranus in your sign. Sometimes you have to risk going too far in order to discover how far you can go. Poet Robert Frost wrote, "Freedom lies in being bold."

People might believe that you're doing everything by the book but your current desires seem off the wall to you. Although you're not feeling restrained by rules of social etiquette, it appears as if you are more cautious than you actually are now. Fortunately, you have enough freedom of movement today to make it up as you go along. Nevertheless, be careful how you strive to realize your dreams  because you could strangely end up being the very same authority that you're trying to resist.

Your schedule won't likely unfold according to your plan, since you are riding high frequency waves of erratic emotional currents today. Ironically, you won't be destabilized by the unexpected curves and detours in your path if you hang onto your core values. Your behavior may appear shocking to others now, but it's just good clean fun to you so you might as well enjoy yourself. Luckily, people might be more supportive than you expect as long as your actions are aligned with your heart.

You are thankful for the emotional security you can create when you retreat into your protective shell. However, unstable circumstances at work  won't leave you alone today, disrupting your inner sanctuary. It's tempting to avoid the action now, but it's not wise to hide behind a rock or crawl deep into a cave in order to escape. The high level of intensity might make you nervous but you need to push through it; the potential for progress is off the hook if you release your concerns and jump into the fray.

Relationship dynamics can be pretty intense now, even if no one realizes how much you're going through at the moment. Thankfully, an uncomfortable situation improves quickly if you don't burn your bridges today in the throes of the emotional volatility. Somehow, you intuitively know that something wonderful is about to happen, but it's not smart to get too cocky about it. In the meantime, make time to rest and recharge because you will need all your energy for the long journey ahead.

Your physical energy is a mixed bag today, especially once the Moon begins to hang out in your 7th House of Partners. Although your desires may seem almost palatable now, you are wary of letting your imagination dictate current events. You might be itching to shift direction and break free from a boring routine, regardless of what anyone thinks about your unorthodox vision. Ironically, your wildest ideas can lead you down a practical path. Creativity is the secret weapon to your success.

A magical day is within your grasp while your key planet Venus dances in lockstep with out-of-the-box Uranus. Oddly enough, even the wildest fantasies don't seem so crazy to you. This is your chance to step past your fears and grant yourself permission to seek sensations that are different from anything in your past. Luckily, you can excel at whatever game is necessary to obtain your object of desire. Enjoy the excitement today before it fades into yesterday. Your biggest risk now is the one you don't take.

You may find yourself dreaming about doing things that are typically outside of your comfort zone. Oddly enough, even with the highest of spiritual intentions, you might not be able to keep your more primal instincts from stealing the show after the Moon slips into fantasy-prone Pisces to activate your 5th House of Love and Romance. But don't fall into the trap of believing that you must act on every thought today, romantic or lustful. Fortunately, there is no harm in indulging yourself within the privacy of your own mind, but some secrets are not meant to be shared.

Your thoughts are free to soar high above the clouds of illusion today while you sit back and enjoy the fruits of your labor. However, you must keep your exorbitant desires in check to ensure the greatest benefits. People may share crazy ideas with you that aren't as outrageous as they first seem. Even if an inventive plan sounds unrealistic, it still could be viable with the right team in place, making it a fun endeavor to pursue. Take your chances, but don't put all your eggs in one basket.

Be gentle with those close to you because your loving acceptance of others can catalyze an unexpected reward. You may experience an emotional earthquake today, if someone rattles your heart. But don't lash out in return, even if a surprise is shocking to your ears. Keep in mind the messenger only delivers the news and is not responsible for its content. Roll with the punches and offer your unconditional support. Your flexible attitude makes all the difference in the world.

You don't have much time to attend to your agenda today because people keep showing up unexpectedly. Thankfully, your friends and associates recognize your brilliance and seem to be supportive of your plans, even if they require your immediate attention. Take advantage of their interest and involve them in your activities. Fortunately, you can work closely with others without sacrificing your individuality as long as you are clear about your goals. Ironically, setting boundaries not only brings the respect you deserve, it also enables you to feel proud of your accomplishments.

Toss the nets of your dreams as far as you can reach, and be ready to pull in the big fish. You're receiving an electrical buzz from magnetic Venus' presence in your 10th House of Career as she trines brilliant Uranus today. Luckily, the Moon's shift into your compassionate sign enables you to imagine an amazing scenario starring you as the conquering superhero. Your creative efforts will not go to waste; ironically, stepping over the edge to express your individuality now leads to long-term stability later on.

You are poised in anticipation, eager to ride the fluctuating waves of contradictory energy. You believe that maintaining a positive attitude will overcome all challenges, but you may have underestimated the power of the cosmic tides now. A smarter strategy could be to retreat and reevaluate your plans today, instead of futilely pushing against the currents. A steadier pace improves your chances of reaching your destination. By practicing a little patience, you can transform your unbridled optimism into tangible results.

Everything seems to be flowing your way today, but all the positive feedback could have a surprising negative effect. You may become so sure of your actions now that you overlook a potential problem. Luckily, you can rely on your common sense to remind you that it takes less work if you do something right the first time around. Thankfully, your world will continue to spin in your favor as long you don't let the current energy of abundance encourage greed. More isn't necessarily better; if you already set an attainable goal, be prepared to stop when you reach it.

Although it might seem as if every word you say now encounters resistance, sit tight and wait your turn as communication continues to improve over the next couple of days. Your bright idea is close to paying off, but you must remain persistent in your efforts. Unfortunately, too much stress on the job can make you less effective today, so just coast for a while if you run into trouble. Fight the temptation to dig in your heels because a stubborn stance won't work in your favor. Adaptability is your not-so-secret weapon, so don't be afraid to use it to your advantage.

Your moods are brewing up a storm today, yet you won't gain any respect by giving up at the first sign of conflict. Neither do you need to battle against an immovable stone wall. Your most sensible approach is based upon a high level of consistent behavior without any signs of aggression. It may even be helpful to consciously let go of control so you can float with the flow now. Calm your nerves by surrounding yourself with the sounds of nature, soothing music or just good old-fashioned silence.

A flood of brilliant ideas opens many possibilities at work today, yet you may grow agitated because you can't find the hook that could turn this magical moment into something more. If you experience an unexpected setback now, pushing harder won't bring success any faster. Instead, connect with the intellectual buzz but wait for the energy to quiet down before finalizing your career plans. Exploring your options enables you to make the most of the amazing opportunities knocking at your door.

This is a significant day for your relationships and you might end up pleasantly surprised with the outcome. However, you need to demonstrate a modicum of self-restraint or someone could rain on your parade now. There are long-lasting ramifications if unequal power dynamics are left unaddressed today. Even if it feels like you're being bent out of shape, express the love that is already in your heart. The simplest act of kindness may be enough to shift the energy in a brighter direction.

There's plenty of detailed busywork on your agenda today but you really don't want to mess with your schedule to make it all fit in. Unfortunately, your lack of rigidity only stirs up more conflict. You gain the most by meeting others halfway and acting as spontaneously as you can. Paradoxically, a gracious compromise may be the most sensible way to get what you want now. Just make sure you don't go running in the opposite direction and become so enthusiastic about every idea that nothing gets done at all.

Some of the current complexity in your life stems from how you chose to react to recent events. If you pursued an opportunity without overplaying your hand, you won't likely run into any problems at all. But if you overcompensated by listening to your ego and making a hasty decision, today's consequences might be a bit tougher to accept. Nevertheless, relaxing your grip and letting go of your old expectations frees you to achieve your new goals. Embracing your future is easier when you carry less baggage.

Although you are concerned that your secret isn't safe today, you still could enjoy yourself while navigating all the twists and turns of the day. This high level of action is what you asked for so don't waste everyone's time wishing that your life was less hectic now. The Sun's sweet trine to auspicious Jupiter suggests that there really is a pot of gold at rainbow's end for those who believe. However, you must meet your current responsibilities before you can magically transform a tricky moment into an awesome day.

Living up to your end of the bargain and managing all the minute details of a project means that delicious rewards may be just around the next corner. But the dark clouds might not clear until later in the day so it's best to keep your shoulder to the wheel since it's uncool to fall behind in your work. Part of your current lesson is learning to live with more uncertainty now. Dig deep to find spiritual meaning in the present moment while also honoring your dreams for the future.

Keeping your thoughts in line is a fruitless and frustrating endeavor today. You might not have much fun at first, but don't waste energy berating yourself if your agenda isn't working out according to your expectations. Your maps successfully brought you this far but now you must set them aside to explore the uncharted territories ahead. Stay optimistic about the possibilities, even if everything continues to change. Turn any remaining fear into courage and trust your intuition to keep you safe and sound.

Someone may shock you with unexpected criticism today, refocusing your attention back on reality. If your fantasies have hijacked your goals, embrace the unsolicited advice you receive from others now, instead of rejecting it out of hand. Be sure to establish healthy boundaries so you can maintain your emotional sanity. Nurturing your confidence, not your skepticism, will guide you toward fulfillment.

You're quite sure of your ability to perform the impossible today, even if your energy is dispersed over too many projects. Although your current confidence is refreshing, it might very well seem out of place. You understand you should take your commitments more seriously, but you possess an irrepressible certainty that everything is going to play out just the way you planned. Thankfully for you -- and annoyingly to others -- your intuition is probably right on the mark. Allowing events to unfold organically now could magically lead to success.

Your uncharacteristic tendency to exaggerate today may turn every little issue into an unnecessary drama. If people push your buttons, you might just tell them exactly what's on your mind, whether or not it makes sense. Fortunately, the outcome could be better than you expect; at least, everyone will know where you stand even if you were planning on keeping some of your misgivings under wraps. Nevertheless, it's still wise to put your opinions out into the open as gently as you can and then step back to give everyone room to respond.

You are rambling a mile a minute now that loquacious Mercury is receiving loud signals from excessive Jupiter. Although you try to keep the conversation light, you can't shut off the flow of intense information. You may be a bit mentally overstimulated but something keeps drawing you back into the less comfortable emotional realms today. It's tricky business because you don't want to stop talking, but it's wise to know when to hold your tongue. In fact, a silent meditation might be just what the doctor orders to help you  regain your balance.

Keeping your thoughts to yourself is challenging today, even if you know that it's prudent to remain quiet.
