Part of you feels as if it's your personal responsibility to bring the information you have out into the light. Although you may wonder if your disclosure is appropriate, a friend might convince you to talk -- and once you start, you won't hold anything back. When in doubt, erring on the side of caution is your safest bet. The better part of valor is discretion.

Your secret admirer or a spiritual adviser may be the source of good news today. Luckily, you could learn something that opens your mind to an entirely different way of looking at your current circumstances. Even if you believe you should stick to your original agenda, stretch beyond your current point of view and consider what's best for everyone involved. Adopting a less personal and more spiritual perspective paves new paths to success.

You may be known for your critical thinking, but today your thoughts carry you far past your usual limitations. Although your key planet Mercury is retrograde, its harmonious trine to lucky Jupiter sends your mind to greener pastures. Much to your surprise, you could be less practical and more philosophical in your approach now. Keep in mind that it's not necessary to apply your ideas to something tangible at this time. Write down your colorful visions while they last so you can make good use of them when your feet return to earth.

You want to be understood by your friends, especially if emotional distance has developed over the past few days. However, explaining yourself clearly is a challenge; others might not understand why you are so passionate today. Nevertheless, you're eager to share your ideas about a variety of things because discussing conceptual ideas feels safer than revealing your feelings. You may be quite a captivating conversationalist, but be careful not to speak in such vague generalities now that you lose touch with your heart.

Meaningful relationships with friends and colleagues offer you the encouragement you seek these days. You might even receive some wonderful news, which can take the pressure off other stresses in your life. However, opportunities that come to you now will likely increase the complexity of your everyday activities, prompting you to wonder if the potential benefits are really worth the extra effort. There's no need to respond too quickly; run through all the logistics and then rely on your intuition to uncover the best answer.

Your current domestic situation may give you some valid reasons for doubt, but you can rise above the difficulties now. Although you're unsure of your next move, you're lucky enough to receive helpful guidance from someone you can trust. Your key planet Jupiter is blessing your 10th House of Status, bringing you closer to your goals. Instead of worrying about what could go wrong today, acknowledge all that is right in your world; use the power of positive thinking to propel you toward your preferred destination.

It's all too tempting to swing into action today and take charge of the situation, assuming that your plan is the best one. You know everything will fall into place if you can stick to the program without any outside interference. Thankfully, your dogged attention to details adds to your overall productivity. However, your eagerness to demonstrate your competence might just be a way to cover your emotional vulnerability. Choose a trustworthy friend and share a part of yourself you normally don't let others see. Confiding your deepest fears to someone now could be the catalyst you need to open your heart.

Opportunity knocks on a variety of strange doors today, offering you a chance to show off your innovative brilliance. However, if someone presents a winning strategy now, it may not be as incredible as you think. Remember, bountiful Jupiter is increasing the lighting on each cloud's silver lining, so everything appears brighter than it actually is. Nevertheless, saying yes is still your best move, as long as you have a concrete end game in place. Blending reality with the seeds of your imagination is a combination that leads to personal growth.

Unrealized hopes are re-stimulated today when a friend shares his or her idea for success with you. However, what begins as a casual discussion can lead to premature commitments now because it's so easy to get swept up in the excitement and go over the top. Remind yourself throughout the day that your idealism is running on overdrive. Tempering your exhilaration with a dash of down-to-earth practicality gives you the best chance of setting realistic priorities and reaching your goals.

You are known for your willingness to run ahead of the pack, whether or not the Moon is visiting your impetuous sign. Nevertheless, the Aries Moon provokes you to say yes quickly now, without considering alternative paths. Meanwhile, the Moon's harmonious alignment to karmic Saturn in your 9th House of Future Vision requires you to find a more reliable route to success, even if it means you won't get there as soon. Don't jump on the fastest horse today, because learning a meaningful lesson along the way might be more important than reaching your destination.

Handling the demands of your day-to-day affairs can be so exhausting now that you're ready to slip away for some much-needed rest and recuperation. But the more you try to retreat today, the more it seems as if others won't leave you alone. Everyone wants to chime in with their opinions on what you should be doing, so it's up to you to resist outside pressure by clearly establishing boundaries. Everything becomes easier to manage once you create enough space for a quick getaway. The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.

You may be much more interested in your social  life than performing your job today, even if it is a busy workday. You're sorely tempted to take a long lunch or waste time in idle chatter with your coworkers. And even if you try and behave, you might still end up searching for other ways to fulfill your need for interpersonal interaction. Unfortunately, your boss or some other authority figure could step in and prevent you from escaping your duties. Be proactive; finishing your to-do list early in the day will leave you plenty of time to play later on.

People may be genuinely surprised with your actions today because you're uncharacteristically eager to take charge at work. Although others think that you're reticent to be in the spotlight, you are more than willing to assume authority when you know exactly where you want to go. Just be careful not to indiscriminately share your feelings with anyone who might not have your best interests in mind. Finding the right person to confide in can make all the difference in the world.

You're currently dissatisfied with the family dynamics today, tempting you to escape into your dreams. However, withdrawing into fantasyland isn't a viable strategy for achieving long-term happiness. Thankfully, the courageous Aries Moon's presence in your 9th House of Adventure convinces you to make changes to create the excitement you seek. Nevertheless, you  still have to do what others expect of you prior to putting your big plan into motion. To everything there is a time; to everything there is a reason.

Your coworkers might be operating with hidden agendas today. On the surface, they may continue to voice their support for you, even if you retreat in order to delve deeper into your own emotional process. However, you can't help but feel the pressure from their unspoken demands, prompting you to pull away even more now. One way to handle the current tension is to simply let others know that you just need some time alone to regroup and gather your thoughts. You can always reconnect with your teammates once you're ready to return to the game.

A close friend or coworker may seem too pushy for your refined taste today while the impudent Aries Moon visits your 7th House of Others. Unfortunately, you could overreact by emotionally withdrawing from the unpleasant situation. Thankfully, a lunar trine to stern Saturn enables you to clearly set the limits you need to feel comfortable. Just remember, relationships require give and take, so keep the communication channels wide open for the best results.

You can't sit around twiddling your thumbs while the irrepressible Aries Moon is wildly activating your 6th House of Work. But you could be so enthusiastic about plowing through your chores today that you rush ahead with your next task before you map out the smartest approach to managing your resources. Unfortunately, you may expend lots of time and energy without finishing anything you start unless you're willing to slow down, rethink your strategy and begin anew. Haste makes waste; slow and steady wins the race.

You might mistakenly believe that everything would be great now if people just gave you some breathing room and didn't expect so much from you. It's tempting to resent those who rain on your parade by wielding their authority or withholding their approval. Unfortunately, your resistance only reinforces your negativity. You can improve the dynamics in a flash by changing your assumptions. No one wants to ruin your day; they only want to help you realize your potential. Turn your critics into allies and you'll be surprised how quickly attitudes improve, including your own.

Personal issues demand your attention today, especially if you recently have been lost in your work-related responsibilities. Luckily, this is a great time to clean up matters at home while serious Saturn harmoniously trines the Moon in your 4th House of Domestic Affairs. Unfortunately, you might believe you will arrive at your destination faster by taking a few unauthorized shortcuts along the way. Avoid the potential for frustration by giving yourself plenty of time to process your feelings. Keeping it real inspires others to do the same.

You may be running around in circles today, without having much to show for all your efforts. Instead of compulsively continuing to spin in motion, stop for a while so you can reconnect with your center. Of course, adopting a more practical approach will help your cause, but restarting slowly at first is the real key to gaining traction. You'll be able to deliver on your promises as long as you don't rush ahead without any forethought at all. A more linear perspective improves your productivity.

Taking a methodical approach is the best way to tackle a financial problem that's been bothering you lately. Unfortunately, attempting to solve your dilemma by initiating aggressive action gets you nowhere fast while retrograde Mercury is in the picture. Thankfully, the Moon's emphasis on your 2nd House of Money harmonizes with calculating Saturn today. Don't shift the blame for a difficult situation onto anyone else. Claim responsibility for your position and establish a sensible plan to alleviate the current pressure. Highest intention plus hard work equals magical success.

There's an overload of excitement in the air today, yet you have no way of knowing what might happen next. Contrary to your reputation, you actually enjoy a bit of stability but drudgery can weigh you down, prompting you to crave dramatic change. Although you prefer to call the shots, you're definitely not in charge now. Accept reality's challenge by letting go and trusting that someone else will step in and do the right thing. Knowing what you can and can't control is the sign of true wisdom.

People seem to be acting strangely today as if they desire more independence but are too scared to ask for it. You have no reason to prevent anyone from moving forward with his or her life, but your buried insecurities could interfere with your initial reaction. Don't shy away from exploring your own fears now, since there are important lessons to learn about your irrational feelings. Taking time to sort through your emotional biases helps strengthen your relationships more than you realize.

Unconventional visions of your future can be upsetting to the status quo, but you can't just stop thinking about them. You might even discover that you enjoy the uncertainty as you're eagerly plotting your next move. Nevertheless, it isn't wise to choose a path too quickly now. Instead, research a variety of alternatives so you can make a well-educated choice. The more options you entertain, the more fantastic the outcome will be when you finally choose your direction.

A familiar discomfort rises into your awareness now if you respond too impulsively to a sudden change in schedule. Sometimes you miss opportunities because you are overly concerned about making a wrong choice. However, indecisiveness is not your problem today. You're eager to mix things up and follow a different drummer. But immediately initiating action  could lead you down a road better not taken. Proceed with caution; there's not as much of a hurry as you might think. True brilliance lasts.

You're likely to lose your temper today if you believe someone is attempting to prevent you from being the captain of your own ship. Or perhaps, your irresponsible behavior might provoke someone else's anger. Either way, extreme feelings are triggered by a deeper energetic imbalance and you won't help the situation by suppressing your emotions. Instead, review your assumptions and untangle your convoluted logic so you can deal with the source of your negativity in a calm and reasonable manner. It's not what happens to you that matters, it's how you respond that makes  all the difference.

People may appear totally irrational now and their inexpiable behavior can be quite unnerving to your well-organized world. However, you have cosmic permission to express your concerns today, even if your disclosure precipitates emotional conflict. Don't spend too much time second-guessing your feelings and reevaluating your alternatives. Your most reliable strategy is to take the bull by the horns and shake everything up; act first and ask questions later. The truth will find its way to the light.

Taking a much-needed break from your professional responsibilities is prudent today, especially if you have something to show for your recent efforts. Instead of focusing on your long-term goals and ambitions, concentrate on the current dynamics of your personal life. Don't be afraid to express your feelings as directly and succinctly as possible if you're seeking out a new relationship or trying to revitalize an old one. Your emotional honesty and mental clarity can create the fireworks you desire.

You might be in for a big surprise today, even if you're looking to stir up a bit of trouble. But you don't need to seek out any complications, since they will naturally find you. The truth is, problems that erupt into awareness now are simply revealing a significant issue you have been doing your best to avoid. Stop worrying if circumstances get out of hand for a while; people will grow more supportive as they witness your ability to rise to the challenge. Change creates opportunity.

You dislike receiving mixed messages because you feel as if you can't respond properly. You love the thrill of flowing along with a swiftly moving current, especially if it's carrying you toward an unknown destination. But your forward movement can still encounter resistance today, which only provokes you to push harder. Unfortunately, you can't progress any faster without running into a detour, so avoid the temptation to rush the process. Accept the fact that the universe has its own cosmic timing where your future is concerned.

The fevered pace remains steady all day, making it nearly impossible to find respite. Although you're inspired by all the action, you may feel frustrated because you can't resolve an important dilemma now. But don't turn a trivial question into one of ultimate concern just to distract you from the real issues. You don't need any more noise on your plate, so just be quiet and listen to the wisdom of your inner voice. Leave your logic at the door and trust your intuition for a change.

You are too impatient to waste time waiting around for others, but you may also have your own delays to handle today. You know you're on the right track, but you can't seem to push things along the way you wish. Unfortunately, you can drive yourself crazy now if you don't change your perspective. Settling back into your comfort zone for a while isn't as unproductive as you think if you keep reminding yourself that satisfaction is looming on the horizon.

You're on a roll today and it might feel like nothing will get in your way. But your morning's enthusiasm can explode into a barrage of angry words if you believe your feelings aren't being respected by your friends or family. However, you won't find a solution through emotional dialogue now; unfortunately, talking about your concerns may only make matters worse. Instead of attempting to force change in others, adjust your own attitude. Believe it or not, when your outlook improves, so will everything else.

Although the recent cosmic energy keeps spinning you in circles, wonderful experiences and amazing opportunities continue to open your eyes. In fact, you're not ready to let the good times slip away without one last attempt to capture the gold. Luckily, the stars are on your side now, but you could end up offending someone if you don't know when to quit. It's likely that everyone can tell when you're exaggerating, so be honest and stick to the facts. Thankfully, speaking the truth won't impede your success or interfere with your fun if you keep the fuss to a minimum.

Your trusty old senses are receiving data with great reliability today, but you can't seem to concentrate enough to take it all in. Unfortunately, you may easily step beyond your limits if you don't stop to listen to your inner adult. You could relinquish reasonable constraints now, only to realize later that your self-indulgent binge wasn't worth it. Even if you are craving more fun in your daily life, keep track of when it's time to get back to work. Moderation is the key to experiencing the best of both worlds.

It doesn't take much to be swept up in the excitement of a lovely distraction today, but it's wise to keep your feelings in perspective. You might end up wasting a lot of your time and energy if you can't figure out when to say no when your heart is saying yes. Unfortunately, acting responsibly is easier said than done now, for you're not likely to turn down an invitation if you think it offers the potential of pleasure. Make the most of your clever charm to find a way to have your cake and eat it too.

You need every ounce of your concentration to keep your emotions under wraps today. However, it's crucial to create healthy boundaries so you can be more effective in the professional world. However, containing your moods won't make you feel them any less. In fact, you might be more inclined to stay in close touch with the passions of your heart once you realize you don't have to reveal your secrets to anyone. Others can't help but be impressed with your decorum and discretion. Silence is your secret weapon of success.

You could be hiding something significant, yet the pressure to come clean is driving you close to the edge. You are probably ready to unload your burden as long as you find someone you can trust. Remember, the emotional rewards might be worth whatever stress you feel along the way. Instead of getting hung up in the potential discomfort of the present moment, focus your awareness on the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow. Your dreams of the future are your guiding light now as long as you know when to return to reality.

Your legendary ability to focus your thoughts and stay on point is tested today, but you would rather walk on the wild side now than stick to the familiar path. A conscious change of attitude may be required because you can see possibilities for delicious pleasure everywhere you look. You can't help but want to discover where your choices might lead. Nevertheless, folks are counting on you so it's best to put your blinders on if needed; you can always explore the delights of the world another day.

A nagging sense of guilt pulls you out of your reverie today, motivating you to reevaluate your priorities. It requires an enormous amount of strength to walk away from sweet pleasantries while beautiful Venus continues to cycle back into your dreams and fantasies. But it could take days to dig your way out of the hole you create if you let yourself fall into a self-indulgent trap. It's healthier to flirt around the edges and save yourself from the embarrassment of going too far.

You might be a slave to your previous promises now, since you have likely taken on more than you can accomplish. But there's no need to stress out; you're at the beginning of an industrious cycle where you are perfectly capable of performing mighty feats and possess the energy to deliver the goods. However, there may also be an internal whisper running on repeat today, giving you permission to have fun. Go ahead and indulge your inner child; you'll return emotionally refreshed and energetically ready for the next round of work.

The biggest problem with riding waves of unrestrained optimism is that you can land in a pile of trouble without even knowing it. You might see glimpses of a more realistic perspective now, but you're not willing to sacrifice your piece of blue sky just yet. While it's true that denial may put a smile on your face for a while, it won't make you very happy in the long run. Facing the truth is your only viable option, even if you must temporarily temper your carefree ways for a worthwhile cause.

You may mistakenly believe you can sidestep a relationship dilemma today by just burying your head in the sand; however, escapist behavior will only take you so far. You could certainly end up with something to show for your work if you redirect all your attention toward a home-improvement project or an artistic pursuit. But left unattended, the underlying stress will only grow stronger throughout the day. Find the courage to sort out your negative feelings for the sake of closure. Your honesty could raise a few eyebrows now, but your authenticity will improve interpersonal interactions in the future.

There are chores to do that simply can't be delayed any longer. However, you still might try to slip in another round of procrastination if you think you can get away with it. Thankfully, your laissez-faire approach works in your favor now, enabling you to easily convince others that your plan makes sense. Nevertheless, overplaying your hand is a bad idea because you could lose the support of a trusted ally. It may be a bitter pill to swallow, but maintaining your integrity is more valuable than making yourself look good.

Although you are imagining every possible way you could enjoy yourself today, you're torn by a familiar tug-of-war between fun and responsibility. Your current lack of motivation makes the conflict even more annoying because you can think of so many other things you'd rather do before you finally take care of weekend chores still left undone. Instead of struggling with an all-or-nothing approach, strive to balance work with play. Aiming for the middle path makes it easier to squeeze some rest and recreation in without compromising your productivity.

It seems as if everyone is in a tizzy over the storms appearing on the radar. Meanwhile, you're busy rounding up a search party to go out and locate all the potential rainbows. It's not that you are in denial of the danger lurking ahead; it's just that you can see the good in almost anything today -- whether it's there or not. Others may think you're acting recklessly, but you figure that someone has to believe in the silver lining hiding in the dark clouds, even if it doesn't really exist.

You Bulls are counted among the most sensible folks of the zodiac kingdom. There is an integral part of your personality that doesn't like to be confused or misled for any reason. You want to know exactly what's going on all around you. Thankfully, you're attuned to subtle vibrations and open to the spiritual truths revealed to you today. Don't just take the easiest path now. Use your imagination to visualize your perfect future and then follow through without taking your eyes off your goals.

Your fantasies seem so unbelievably real today that you are tempted to enthusiastically agree to every plan you hear. It's as if you aren't paying close  attention to the instructions you're given and can't count on your cleverness to figure out how long a job should take. In fact, it's tricky to determine your limits on several fronts now. Thankfully, you can rely on a trustworthy ally to provide the objectivity you currently lack. Asking for help when you need it is a sign of  intelligence.

Keeping your personal feelings separate from the global tensions that continue to simmer and thicken is quite a struggle today. You're operating on the ideological premise that humanity is an extension of your brothers and sisters. It's as if the world's pain and  suffering is all happening within your own immediate family. Watch your energetic boundaries since your empathy for others can easily morph into a debilitating anger or sadness which won't help anyone now. Shining your light of love and compassion is your only true option.

Your life seems to make more sense today as some of the larger pieces of the puzzle fit into place. However, you can't shake the notion that you're just fooling yourself and there are other issues you should be addressing now. Your unsettled feelings contribute to the uneasiness that nags at your current well-being. Nevertheless, you're resigned to perform your assigned role in the wider scheme of things. Your old confidence will return later in the day if you continue going through the motions. You might not be capable of singlehandedly saving the world, but it's worth doing your part.

Your most proficient rational analysis won't help you solve your current dilemma, but you are caught in the trap of thinking it should.  It's impossible to use logic to break out of the binds of logic. You must experiment with poetry, music, dance or any other creation the imagination conjures up. You might not like it, but you're going to have to trust something beyond words. Taking a leap of faith makes you more anxious than you want to admit; nevertheless, embracing the unknown can be so liberating that it may surprise you.

Your expectations are blown out of proportion today, setting you up for disappointment. Although the day may not unfold according to your plans, you might decide that denying the dissonance is easier than confronting it. Nevertheless, assuming an adaptable attitude allows you to accommodate changes in your schedule by modifying your agenda accordingly. Your easygoing style rubs off on those around you, creating a supportive atmosphere for all involved. Your penchant for harmony serves you well.

Interpersonal dynamics are more complex than they seem now. But your extrasensory antennae are so attuned to invisible mysteries that you won't be fooled by the physical world. Nevertheless, you still may try to step around the scary shadows if you're frightened or confused by what you don't understand. There's no time to waste clinging to the familiar because you're feeling insecure about the future. Let go of anything that robs you of your self-confidence. You need as much faith as you can muster because today's dreams are building the foundation for tomorrow's castles.

The larger the wheels, the easier they seem to spin. The bigger your ideas, the easier it is for you to get totally lost in them today. Be cautious because you're treading on treacherous ground. You may adopt altruistic causes based upon your current beliefs. You might even think that everything is ethical and on point, but you can deceive yourself now, especially when it comes to spiritual matters. It's less important to be right than it is to find peace and enlightenment.

Life presents you with a test today to see how far you can stretch reality without breaking it. How fast can you go without hitting the brakes? Although you might be worried that things will get worse before they get better, you have the power to turn your day around. Concentration and hard work pay off now, especially if you let common sense act as your guide. There's no hurry, so start off slowly to set a sustainable pace. You'll gain steam and speed as your momentum carries you along on the road to success.

You have an ideal vision for the future and it concerns you that everything is so far off from your perfect picture. In fact, you may feel quite  isolated now, because you can't relate to how people are treating your home planet, other animals and even each other. You're dismayed by the state of humanity but you don't have a quick and easy solution. Allowing your attention to wander through the major issues facing the world is healthy as long as you eventually bring your focus back to your immediate environment. Think global but act local.

You're constructing a bridge to your dreams, but you must do it one stone at a time. Unfortunately, the ground beneath your feet isn't very stable. Thankfully, the foundation is strong enough to support you even if the earth shifts. You're expanding your range of possibilities like a child blows up a colorful balloon, but you can't tell where the limits are now. You might not find satisfaction if you always believe the ideal solution is right around the next corner. Happiness is an elusive creature that can only be experienced in the present moment.

It's easy to hope that your dreams will come true if you take a risk and tell people exactly what you want today. But the Moon's  awkward connection to Mars can put so much passion into your words that you might frighten others with your intensity, rather than showing your sincerity. Thankfully, adopting a gentler approach allows you to be more convincing when sharing your true intentions. Make the effort to understand your audience before you jump in too fast and steer the conversation in the wrong direction.

You may seek pleasure from an entirely new spectrum of activities today. However, you need to be careful that you don't neglect your responsibilities in the pursuit of emotional gratification. Just remember that entertaining a variety of options doesn't mean that you must act on every whim. You can still make merry while keeping your feet on the ground and meeting your obligations. In the long run, setting priorities gives you the best chance of experiencing life's little joys while working toward lasting satisfaction.

A friend or coworker might reveal an intriguing scheme today, yet you are fearful of getting swept up in a whirlwind of activity that spins your day out of control. There's no harm in relaxing the reins a bit, but don't let anyone take them out of your hands. Although you may think it would be nice not to be in charge for a while, you will find out quickly that you are happier following your own agenda now instead of someone else's. Nevertheless, you never know what is possible unless you keep an open mind.

Your partner or associate is so persistent today that it's difficult for you to refuse their demands. However, it's still wise to take a few deep breaths and give yourself more time to consider what you want before agreeing to anything you might later regret. Don't acquiesce just to win a popularity contest. Step through the awkward process of establishing clear boundaries now. Pursuing your dreams on your own brings more long-term happiness than setting them aside to appease someone else.

Everyone wants to know your secret today because you seem unusually cheerful and confident as you go about your business. Luckily, you are blessed to be having fun while fulfilling your everyday responsibilities. Unfortunately, you can't reveal your magical method because you don't have a hidden formula in your pocket. Continue to do what you do best by being honest and living your life as transparently as you can. The simplest things bring you great joy now, even if the current challenges you face demand your attention.

You can get ahead of the game today by taking a clever idea and building on it; just be wary of over-inflating your expectations in the process. It's more advantageous to achieve modest success that leaves you feeling good about your accomplishments now, rather than reaching too high and encountering the disappointment of failure. Thankfully, your current choices aren't set in stone; there will be plenty of opportunities to modify your goals as you learn and grow.

You may actually believe that today is your lucky day - and your special fantasy just might come true. Although it's not smart to assume that you'll receive exactly what you wish for now, it's still a good idea to trust your intuition. Your natural flexibility is the key to receiving a surprise that exceeds your expectations. However, stubbornly sticking to your previous agenda could cause you to miss the magic that is knocking loudly at your door.

Your unrelenting faith in yourself makes a tangible difference today, for your thoughts are  creating a clear blueprint of your future. The inquisitive Gemini Moon is traveling through your 8th House of Transformation, initiating a metamorphosis of your goals. You might be eager to swing into action now and go for exactly what you want. But you won't likely make much progress with bold actions that only encounter obstacles. Instead, focus on your most positive thoughts and let them work their magic. No matter how hard you try, you can't rush the process of a caterpillar becoming a butterfly.

You could be feeling uncharacteristically anxious today, but it's not because there is anything specifically wrong. On the contrary, you might worry that you are missing something important in your positive assessment of your current trajectory. Don't let your concerns trick you into impulsively taking corrective action. Just methodically complete as much unfinished business as you can in preparation for the exciting new cycles ahead. Timing is everything.

You can't help but worry that people are impeding your progress by undermining your positive efforts today. Unfortunately, you may not be able to find any concrete evidence to support your current fears. Ironically, the exact opposite might be true; something you decide to keep secret can have a negative effect on a relationship. Reconsider what you are afraid to reveal and then shine the light of your awareness into this shadow. Bringing your unexpressed truth out into the open is the first step to dissolving the apparent gulf between you and others.

Don't hold back your creative flow now, even if your dreams seem unrealistic. Your unrestrained imagination enables you to visualize a myriad of possibilities for the future. The Moon's visit to your 5th House of Self-Expression opens multiple doors that can propel you and your friends into the unknown. Rather than allowing logistics to slow you down today, share your visions as they are revealed to you. You can always refine your plans to make them more concrete when you are in a more pragmatic frame of mind.

Separating your personal issues from what you do in the real world isn't a simple task now that the Moon is moving through your 4th House of Emotional Security. Whether you are concerned with your professional status, your role in the community or your place within your family, it's crucial to understand where you stand so you can reconsider where you are going. There's no reason to blindly rush  ahead; instead, create a new agenda based upon your needs and then make a manageable plan to reach your goals.

Starting new projects can be quite exciting since you can't wait to see what's next. Although your mind is on fire with lots of amazing ideas, you're not interested in jumping into an unstable set of circumstances just for the thrill factor. But you need to know that even the most brilliant plans you initiate now might not produce tangible results for at least another week. Take your time and make sure you're working toward sensible goals before you set out in a new direction.

You might think you are rounding a corner now and are ready to apply everything you know to get ahead at work. But even your most innovative plan will fail unless you can thoroughly ground it by taking the most practical approach. Leaning on your peers is tempting but only carries you so far. Even if you receive unexpected support today, you'll still be disappointed if you expect too much from others. Practicing self-sufficiency is the safest way to ensure your success.

Your efforts may be for naught today, especially if you try to accomplish too much at once. You want to participate in every cool activity on your radar, but it's best to limit your involvement in projects that don't further your agenda. Trusting your initial impulse is dangerous now because you are likely to underestimate the resources needed to complete a task. Just do the best job you can without making promises that are impossible to keep. Say "less is more" until you believe it.

It's tempting to fantasize your way to success because today's vision can grow into tomorrow's reality. However, the Moon's presence in your 12th House of Imagination gives you the wrong impression if you play out a familiar scenario in your mind and assume it will automatically occur. One way to take control is to color your mental pictures in with as much detail as possible. Adding specific pieces of information to your developing ideas facilitates bringing them into existence. Creating a viable plan is the most logical first step as long as it's followed by lots of determination and hard work.

It seems as if your current life path is on a collision course with your dreams once you realize where you're going today. However, learning the truth is only the first step in a longer process that can help you break through blocked energy in a relationship. Free yourself from responsibilities you no longer need to carry by letting go of old habits and unhealthy patterns. Exercise your individuality and set yourself back on a realistic course that will lead you straight to your true goals.

Your natural efficiency often separates you from others because you are less worried about social acceptance than you are about getting the details exactly right. Nevertheless, your pursuit of perfection could become a major obstacle on your way to finding happiness today, especially if you feel the pressure of being short on time. Sometimes it's wiser to be expedient rather than getting stuck struggling with the minutiae. The sense of pride you feel is so much more satisfying if you finish the job on time.

You are certain your future holds the promise of success and you're willing to wait a little while longer if you think it will help you get what you want. Nevertheless, your patience is running thin and your desires are growing strong. Luckily, it's more constructive to be optimistic because you truly believe that your hard-earned rewards are right around the corner. Your positive attitude, in turn, directly impacts your chances for satisfaction.

Although channeling most of your energy into your career may be required these days, you still need to schedule a little downtime for yourself. The Sun's shift into conceptual Aquarius and your 4th House of Home and Family motivates you to downplay professional pressures so you can focus on more personal goals. Thankfully, slipping away from the office early won't raise any eyebrows or make you any less productive now. In fact, your newly found joie de vivre enables you to wrap up your work quicker than before.

You're conflicted about your options today, yet you know the importance of keeping your word. But with serious Saturn settled into your sign for the long haul, you're tired of being the one who rides to the rescue to bail someone out at the last possible moment. You're tempted to just let things fall apart now, but it's not a smart idea to abandon your commitments. Give it your absolute best shot to help those in need and then call it a day without trying to take responsibility for the actions of anyone else.

Making an appointment is easy today, but showing up for one may be a lot tougher. However, your current story is not about irresponsibility or disrespect. It's just that you might choose to avoid making commitments for a while because you believe it's wise to explore all your options now. Unfortunately, your newly found compulsion to keep a flexible schedule is counterproductive to your ambitions. Ironically, honoring a calendar gives your day the structure you need to achieve your goals.

You've been patient long enough; you're pacing the floors, anxious to make your move. The Sun's shift into your heady sign may find you sitting on pins and needles. The road ahead leads into unknown territory, which might surprisingly rattle your nerves. Fortunately, you can reduce the negative effects of your uncertainty by recognizing the pressure comes from within. Take all the time you need to determine your most intelligent course of action before you embark on the next amazing phase of your journey.

You don't want everyone to know your business now that the Sun is camping out in your 12th House of Secrets. Although there's no need to hide your emotional reactions from your friends, it's still prudent to use discretion when revealing your true feelings today. It's really not about the words you speak since people are able to read your intentions through your actions. Thankfully, you can contain your energy by simply monitoring your thoughts and carefully choosing which ones to share. Rely on your instincts to tell you the best time to bring others into your confidence.

Engaging others at work may be a struggle today because the super-sensitive Cancer Moon encourages you to find shelter behind a solid wall. You might find yourself worrying about personal matters, distracting you from your assigned tasks. You could even ask for extra time off to take care of a family matter now. Ultimately, increasing your efficiency on the job helps you create a little magic. Completing tasks quickly is the first step to gracefully balancing your private and public obligations.

Staying within your lane can be tricky today because you believe that anything is possible. Nevertheless, your exuberant approach won't even be apparent to others while the introverted Cancer Moon visits your 3rd House of Communication. Although your judgment is clouded by your desires now, you're more likely to err on the side of generosity rather than stinginess. Even if your day doesn't unfold as expected, maintaining a firm grip and a flexible attitude helps to smooth over the rough spots.

Your intuitive hunches could get in the way of having a good time today, but it's not a sensible strategy to ignore your feelings for the sake of convenience. If you try to cover up your misgivings, you may become disconnected from your closest friends and co-workers. Sharing your emotions might seem awkward at first, but initiating a conversation could be enough to dispel the sense of alienation. Revealing a vulnerable spot requires courage, but it's the magic key to deepening a special relationship.

Opening your heart seems more natural today while the evocative Moon is hanging out in your sign. It's even more likely that you will share your aspirations if you're confident about your current course of action. However, others might hesitant to offer their approval, leaving you to wonder whether or not they support your ideas. It's a strategic mistake to over-personalize the feedback you receive now. Instead of wringing your hands in dismay or doubt, get busy and make your plan so awesome that it can't be ignored.

It's too soon to reveal your honest feelings today, for others may not be as trustworthy as they appear. A coworker might play off your hopes and entice you to change your mind. But your best strategy now is practicing self-containment; keeping to yourself adds the power of conviction to your dreams. Take time for your inner work and include others in your process only after you are ready. As Francis Bacon wrote, "Silence is the sleep that nurtures wisdom."

Staying on track is challenging now because your emotions are at odds with the current circumstances at work. You may not be feeling very practical today, and your perfect strategy might fall apart if it's not based upon real observable cycles. Luckily, cutting back on superfluous activities helps you to concentrate on the most important work at hand. Sticking to your priorities is the most powerful thing you can do when it comes to climbing the ladder of success.

Contacting a few key colleagues and asking them for their support can take up a lot of time and energy today. However, you won't likely get anyone to commit to your plan since everyone seems to be pushing an agenda of their own now. Instead of trying to make a river run uphill, pare back your current ambitions just a notch. Simplifying your goals and limiting your conversations greatly increase your chances for success. Narrowing your focus lets you concentrate on what matters most.

You may be dreaming about an upcoming trip now, but you're not ready to share your plans with the rest of the world yet. You're afraid that people won't understand your needs, so you don't want to waste time justifying your intentions. It's more useful to develop your ideas and take them to the next level before losing steam from responding to any negative judgments. Sometimes remaining silent is the best way to ensure you will have something worthwhile to say later on.

Confronting familiar fears that stem from an old relationship wound may seem quite overwhelming today. Hang tight; thankfully, the energy grows lighter as the day wears on. There are gentle cosmic winds blowing now, untangling the complex dynamics and softening your resolve. Learning how to be more comfortable with your emotions will help everyone relax. Interactions with others can take on a life of their own now, yet practicing the art of compromise is your saving grace.

You need more clarity in your relationship world now, but the security you crave may be nearly impossible to find if others aren't playing by the same rules of the game. You could feel let down when someone doesn't match your high expectations for consistency or productivity. Getting your colleagues to sign on to your deadline seems like a positive step today, but this strategy doesn't mean they will actually deliver on their promises. Unrelenting patience and a healthy sense of humor are essential tools to have on hand during these uncertain times.

You're feeling out of your element today as your unmet desires swirl around, creating complex currents and subtle nuances that are hard to deconstruct. The simplest task requires extra time to complete now, simply because you don't want to do things the same old way. If you can use your enthusiasm for exploring new methods to jump into an emotional discussion, you may be pleasantly surprised with the outcome. Temporarily setting logic aside opens the door to life-changing ways of seeing your world.

Your brilliant thinking fuels your best efforts today, but their execution may be thwarted, anyhow. Nevertheless, your willingness to let go of your original course of action enables you to overcome the current obstacles without much hassle. Paradoxically, you -- and not the circumstances -- create the limitations now. Unfortunately, a can-do attitude and hard work won't be enough to achieve success. Your unwavering persistence is your ticket to the top.

You've been surfing the waves of change with such concentration that you forgot to give much thought to what you will do next. Now that you have a little time to contemplate life, you can begin to see how much has already shifted at the workplace. Nevertheless, tread lightly today; there are still more twists and turns ahead. Don't let any words slip out of your mouth before you consider the effects of your message. Think first, talk later.

Your perceptions are as sharp as a razor today, making it unlikely that anyone will pull the wool over your eyes. Oddly, you may be able to hear words in your brain before they are actually spoken; it's almost like you possess x-ray vision of the mind. Be careful how you wield this temporary superpower, for inappropriate usage will only get you into more trouble than it's worth. To whom much is given, much is required in return.

You might see a power play unfold right before your eyes at your place of work -- and it appears to be aimed at you. Don't worry about your counter-move; just do whatever you can to minimize the pressure today. Avoid direct confrontation at all costs, for it won't lead you to a better situation now. Even if you can just delay the showdown until next week, things will work out better in the long run. Giving yourself time to get your ducks in a row before you come out swinging offers you the best chances for success.

Your partner or lover may raise a sensitive subject today. Your opinions are strong, making it nearly impossible to avoid an intense conversation about an important matter as verbose Mercury runs into passionate Pluto. Your only viable strategy is to stay focused on what's real. No matter what kind of emotional distractions are brought into the equation, bring the discussion back to the topic at hand. And, always remember that love has the power to overcome even your deepest fears.

Although harmony at work might be elusive now, a bit of emotional intensity won't slow you down. Your highest priority is to reestablish the balance of your life so you can improve your overall perspective. A large part of your attention is concentrating on the big picture now. Nevertheless, it's imperative to also focus on the drama in front of you. Don't let go of your high ideals and great visions, no matter what you encounter along the way.

Mischief could be your cup of tea today while chatty Mercury and relentless Pluto scheme in your 5th House of Spontaneity. All interactions take on a greater significance and you can't seem to turn the intensity off. The problem is that what starts out as simple entertainment may quickly turn into a cut-throat competition. Although you might believe that your survival is at stake now, it's not. Changing the rules so that everyone can win makes you the most valuable player in the game.

You are your own greatest distraction now, yet you might choose to keep your thoughts quiet. Your newly formed ideas aren't anyone else's business so there is no need to share them with others. Even if you don't reveal the nature of your inner world today, give yourself permission to explore it on your own. Muster up the courage to go wherever your imagination takes you, for there are surprises in the darkness that can lead you back into the light.

It may be impossible to ignore the difference between what's right and what's wrong today. You're ready to jump on your soapbox and speak your mind, but people still might think you are sitting on the fence now. However, there is nothing uncertain about your beliefs. In fact, it's wise to remember that your decisions are not as simple as you think. Allow the complexity to surface, for there could be a better solution available that's still buried by the noise.

You feel the urge to make a public stand about something that's ubiquitously important to you. But remember, you are treading on unstable ground while trickster Mercury is busy hooking up with shadowy Pluto. Thankfully, your determination won't let up no matter the amount of resistance you run into now. However, you can perpetuate your dreams if you fly under the radar today. Whatever is going on, things can change in unexpected ways. Avoid the excitement of the bright lights and just keep yourself on the right track.

The missing ingredient to your secret sauce of success now is mental intensity. The emotionally potent Mercury-Pluto conjunction falls in your ambitious sign, making you a formidable force to be reckoned with today. But ironically, you might be overly worried that other people's arrows of thoughts will be able to pierce even your toughest armor. Although your impulse may be to attack first, everything will work out better if, above all things, you remember to be gentle and kind.

You can say things with the utmost care today yet your words might have totally unexpected effects. Unfortunately, others may not hear you clearly while mischievous Mercury is still retrograde, blurring the boundaries between you and those in your immediate environment. You might read the situation wrong because you overlooked an important piece of information. Don't go out on a ledge until you are sure that you have all the facts in hand. And once you declare your position, be ready to change your mind if necessary. Flexibility is your secret weapon for success.

Social activities seem to be lingering long past the holiday season. You may have assumed that the rowdiness would gradually settle down, but the flames are fanned back to life each time they do. The intensity of your interactions with others might even surprise you today. Try going along with the group instead of taking on the entire community. Wait until next week when Mercury turns direct before you make a scene you will later regret.

You might believe the strength of your convictions is enough to overcome a challenging relationship issue now. The Leo Full Moon emphasizes your 5th House of Self-Expression, possibly triggering an emotional outburst that can help your cause as long as you remain reasonable. Don't ride roughshod over other people's feelings; if you inadvertently offend anyone, be gracious and apologize as soon as you realize your mistake. Rather than fanning the flames of drama today, let it go. Take the high road and move forward to love.

Your tireless patience with a domestic concern is stretched to the breaking point as the Leo Full Moon activates your 4th House of Family. The dynamics of a minor crisis are complicated by pressures that prompt you to juggle the private aspects of your life with public responsibilities. Just don't let laziness get in the way of what must be done now. Start early in the day and apply yourself steadily until all of your personal and professional obligations are wrapped up to your satisfaction.

Planning for the future is just as necessary as keeping up with your current commitments. However, the fiery Leo Full Moon is shining in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, indicating that your life is incredibly busy now. Consider where you want to go from here and start creating proactive plans to reach your goals. Achieving tangible success may take longer than you think, but don't let frustration hijack your ambitious trajectory. Believing in your dreams is the first step to making them real.

You Crabs are naturally more susceptible to the energy of the lunar cycles than the other signs, and the proud Leo Full Moon highlighting your 2nd House of Values is no exception. You feel a sense of urgency to hold on tightly to your current position. Nevertheless, a project that hasn't reached fruition might begin to lose its appeal today, making you wonder if it is wiser to walk away before it's too late. Pushing your current work ahead as long as it's still relevant is more productive than heading back to the drawing board.

You may seem extremely intense while the extroverted Leo Full Moon illuminates your 1st House of Self. Luna's opposition to the willful Sun in your 7th House of Relationships can trigger contentious arguments now, especially if you just assume communication will solve a difference of opinion today. Actually, you might scare someone away with your brazen confidence. Instead of acting like a know-it-all, just explain your thought process and then listen to everyone else's story with a generous heart. Roar less, purr more.

You must respond to an emotional dilemma as today's demonstrative Leo Full Moon exposes your 12th House of Secrets. You are obsessed with figuring out how you can express yourself while also maintaining your privacy on certain aspects of your life. Partially sharing information can be tricky business because you may find it tough to stop talking once you start. Set clear limits before you open your mouth, so there's no ambiguity as to how far you will go in your disclosure.

You might inadvertently squelch the fun at a social gathering now that the warmth of your key planet Venus is constrained by her arrival in conservative Capricorn. Nevertheless, the playful Leo Full Moon reflects your 11th House of Friends, encouraging you to tell someone what you need. Luckily, others will take you seriously without misunderstanding your demands if your intentions are pure. Fortunately, with a little diplomacy you can be an integral part of the group while also acting in a responsible manner.

It's natural to express yourself passionately in your work today because the Leo Full Moon heats up your 10th House of Career. Paradoxically, you can maintain a sense of objectivity even if your emotions are an integral part of the equation. But don't wait for people to create your reality now; instead of sitting on the sidelines or playing the role of a cheerleader, go out there and make something happen. Visible progress may take longer than you expect, so let your faith and determination lead the way.

Your heart is fixed on setting aside your previous plans so you can pursue a bigger and better goal. The melodramatic Leo Full Moon amps up your 9th House of Adventure today, but keeping your life in balance is a smarter strategy. Unfortunately, you could miss a real opportunity if you aim too high. Follow a practical course of action now, instead of jeopardizing your emotional and fiscal security. Thankfully, you can meet your current obligations while still holding onto your dreams for the future by coloring within the lines.

Although you might be afraid that people will judge you negatively, your authority doesn't need to slip as long as you are honest about your concerns. The lively Leo Full Moon fires up your 8th House of Deep Sharing today, feeding fears if you're feeling emotionally vulnerable. Meanwhile, Venus shifts into your reserved sign, tempting you to overcompensate by hiding your feelings. However, once you start taking risks by sharing what's in your heart, your attitude will lighten. Laughter is the best medicine, especially if the truth is a bitter pill to swallow.

Opening your heart is advisable today as long as you don't go overboard with your true confessions. The childlike Leo Full Moon casts your 7th House of Relationships in the spotlight, provoking you to share your feelings about your romantic attractions. Just remember that what you don't say now might have greater significance than what is spoken aloud. If you come on too strong, people may worry that you expect something in return. Just casually express what's on your mind and then allow the rest of the story to unfold on its own.

Nearly any physical exercise will help calm your nerves, but you'll feel much happier if you accomplish something useful while exerting yourself today. The innocent Leo Full Moon brightens your 6th House of Work, creating a palpable tension between your playful desires and your current obligations. Of course, you can reduce the stress by expending some of your excess energy sweating at the gym. However, you earn karmic bonus points now if you channel your passion into furthering your ambitions.

Instead of complaining about the weekend chores that are still on your plate today, quickly prioritize the tasks and decide which ones can be temporarily set aside with no ill effects. It's healthy to make time for guilt-free fun while the creative Leo Moon is kicking up her heels in your 5th House of Play. Although you're eager to join in social activities, you're not sure how much personal freedom you must sacrifice to be a part of the group. Risk-taking is favored now; the only way to discover your limits is to jump on the bandwagon and embrace the unknown.

If ever there was a day to fly beneath the radar, this would be it. Consider yourself lucky if you don't have to work today, since the reflective Moon's presence in your 4th House of Home and Family turns your energy inward. However, if you can't avoid a trip out into the big wide open, at least keep your private world with you in the form of your daydreams. Hold your favorite visualizations close like a child clutching a favorite security blanket. No one can take your sense of comfort away from you unless you let them.

You are flitting to and fro today, riding the energy of the showy Leo Moon as she activates your 3rd House of Distraction. However, your early warning system is picking up on annoying changes that are looming on the horizon. You sense a storm is on its way and you feel the undercurrent of adrenaline in anticipation of what's ahead. Thankfully, you are more than ready for the action. Timing is everything now so don't make your move too soon; your efficiency will soar if you wait until after Mercury turns direct tomorrow.

A creative approach to managing your finances can greatly improve your situation today. You might suddenly discover a way around an obstacle that's prevented you from buying something you set your heart on. Don't worry if your plan isn't completely in place because there's no rush to iron out every detail yet. Investing in something of value is a smart move now as long as you're not fooling yourself into believing it's something you really need. Discernment is your friend.

People seem to be reading your emotions as if they are written on your forehead today. You're not necessarily one to bury your heart, but now that the moody Moon is making noise in your fiery sign it's as if your feelings are being broadcast on a loud speaker for everyone to hear. There's nothing to be gained by withdrawing from those who love you the most; the give and take of a honest dialogue can help you clarify what you really want.

There are valid reasons for not saying everything that's on your mind today. Someone might assume you're telling the entire story, but there is a great danger in jumping to conclusions for everyone involved. Still, it's smarter now to stay mum on the subject than to lay your internal conflict out on the table where others feel forced to deal with your unresolved feelings. You can always share more once the intensity begins to subside and you have a better handle on the situation.

You might believe that everything will change today, but you are experiencing trouble filling in the details of what's next. You are approaching the close of a chapter in your life, but you can't determine where the plot is heading. Tie up as many emotional loose ends as possible since you won't have time to look back once the pace accelerates next week. Lighten your load now so you will be ready for your big adventure when it calls your name.

You are facing a complex dilemma while trying to resolve a conflict between your head and your heart. Logically, you know what you must do and are prepared to play your hand accordingly. Nevertheless, you might be uncertain about which of your emotions can be trusted today. Keep in mind this is not the best moment to turn your life upside down just because you are unsure of which path to follow. Your patience is your strong suit now; fortunately, time is on your side.

Others will follow your lead if you can be your own boss and set a proper example. Relying on long-winded rationalizations won't work today because your arguments are not very convincing. It's fortuitous that your current actions speak louder than words since you're at the top of your production game. However, you could get a bee in your bonnet and go off on some half-cocked crazy idea. People may respond favorably and offer their support even if your plan is without merit. Be the responsible one and stop yourself before you do something you will soon regret.

You're not content to just paddle around in shallow waters today. You long to dive into the deeper places, where your search for meaning overshadows reality itself. The Moon's visit to your 8th House of Regeneration can stimulate complicated feelings. These aren't simple times as old emotional hurts might come back to haunt you. Thankfully, there are blessings to be found in the current process of discovery. If you are willing to do the inner work and face the issues, profound healing can occur on many levels to change your life for the better.

Nearly everything you say and do creates an immediate reaction today. Oddly enough, the fallout from following your intuition isn't what you expect. You must respond to each situation as it unfolds, even if it steals your time and energy from more enjoyable activities. You can't resist the inevitable; as frustrating as it might be to stick to your agenda, there may not be much you can do to change the overall course of events. Surrendering the reins of control is your sanest strategy.

You could wear yourself out trying to make up for someone else's shortcomings today. Even if you're fully committed to a family gathering or another type of group event, you still want to be recognized for your unique contribution. However, there's no need to be overly concerned if others are receiving all the credit now. The tide will turn soon enough as long as you continue to maintain integrity in your words and deeds. Being true to yourself empowers you to emerge as the hero you are missing in your life.

You might have thought all was sitting pretty within your world, but it becomes apparent today that something was wrong all along. You may not be able to fix it immediately, but that won't stop you from trying now. Keep in mind that your tendency to impulsively respond to a crisis isn't always the most productive solution. Putting things right is going to take some serious time and thought. Proceed with great determination but don't expect miracles overnight.

You can't help but feel frustrated if you haven't made much tangible progress toward your goals this year. Nevertheless, there's no reason to fret because the planets asked you to make some very big plans and then required you to begin very slowly -- so slowly that it may seem as if you've been moving backwards. Actually, no time has been wasted at all. If you remain patient and persistent, you'll see over the next month how your delayed start was just what you needed to be successful.

Although you may be weary of all the little setbacks you've already faced this year, you are rather hopeful that your path is finally clearing now. Even if a series of mix-ups and frayed loose ends are taxing your patience, don't even think about giving up today. There were important lessons to learn over these last few weeks, but it might take additional time to figure out what they mean in regards to your future. In the meantime, try not to judge yourself harshly for what you haven't yet finished. Being a student of life is an integral part of the soul's journey.

Your thoughts have been preoccupied with all kinds of relationship issues over these last weeks and it's not always been easy to face the truth. Conflicting emotional needs, stirred by Mercury's recent retrograde through your 7th House of Others, now seem to need immediate resolution. But current tensions may be a result of simple misunderstandings. The only way to find out is to engage in an open dialogue. Luckily, the tides are turning now, enabling everyone involved to be more forgiving. A strong partnership starts with honest communication.

These past few weeks may have thrown you a few curve balls, making it difficult to follow through with your normal daily routine. This period of testing isn't quite over, but today marks a turning point in the energetic flow. Pay attention to what unresolved issues resurface now, for these specific problem areas hold keys to the solutions of even larger questions. The pace of positive change picks up over the next few days if you're willing to push for progress.

Although you are in the midst of a highly creative phase, your ideas have been unable to gain traction this year. You might even feel as if you are running around in circles or covering old ground. Since Mercury is your key planet, its three-week retrograde cycle affected you more strongly than most. Thankfully, this deja vu phase is coming to its conclusion. You've been treading water long enough; it's finally time to move forward. Keep in mind, this energetic shift can take a few days to find its rhythm, but you should prepare for blastoff at any given moment.

Maybe Nietzsche was right when he suggested that we live in a cycle of eternal recurrence, revisiting the same issues again and again. However, this feeling that you've been here before is actually an opportunity to break out of your old patterns. Strong foundations are crucial for your future success, and you have a chance to firm up your base as Mercury turns direct in your 4th House of Roots. What you start now can develop into something of lasting value if you're committed to do the work.

You're beginning to realize that the future is coming at you faster than ever before. The pace of your everyday life may have slowed down to a crawl while Mercury was retrograde in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Or, even if events were moving at a more rapid pace, you felt lethargic and couldn't catch up. However, the time for you to make changes is today. Look back over the past month and decide if you want to stay in the comfort zone you created or if you're ready to explore unfamiliar ground. Sometimes "later" really means "never." Act now or forever hold your peace.

You have an opportunity to experience some healing around issues of self-esteem now that logical Mercury is turning direct in your 2nd House of Values. This personal challenge is about examining your core beliefs, your sense of self and how you built a philosophical foundation that protects you from your own emotional pain. You might put a lot of energy into making people think you're wide open to new experiences when secretly you're not. Fortunately, the solution is simple today; change the way you think, which in turn opens new paths for the adventure of self-discovery.

You might feel weighted down by your own heavy thoughts, but you don't seem to be able to work your way out of your current predicament. It's as if you're close to understanding something very important, but it keeps vanishing like a dream fading in the morning light. For the past three weeks, cerebral Mercury has trudged backward in your sign requiring you to go over things one more time to make sure you have them right. Now, as it turns direct, review time is over. The future is calling; don't look back.

You are on the verge of your dreams coming true. You replayed your favorite fantasies over and over again while mental Mercury retrograded through your 12th House of Spirituality during the past three weeks. But imagination opens the way for reality as quicksilver Mercury's direct turn motivates you to get real now. You still have plenty of sweat equity to invest but, thankfully, your revitalized determination can give substance to your visions. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

Your friends and associates are simultaneously a great help and a major pain in the neck today. They may remind you of a past hurtful situation without even realizing it. You might choose to push these memories away -- or you can embrace conversations that initiate a deeper healing process. Open your heart and you'll experience interesting changes within the next week or so. As Lao Tzu wrote, "Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished."

You have been trying to manage career-related issues based on old information while Mercury did its retrograde dance in your 10th House of Profession. Although you made valiant efforts to  move forward, your thinking was stuck in the past. However, it's now time to let go of recent events and get serious about executing your plans. Although you may temporarily lack confidence, don't seek security by looking back. It will take a few days until you gain enough objectivity to see that you're truly on the right track.

You are finally ready to share your opinions on a delicate matter. You wisely kept your feelings to yourself as you developed your ideas because you didn't want to rock the boat until you were sure your position could be defended. Although you have the certainty of facts and the power of conviction on your side, the dynamics are trickier than you might think. Your words pack an extra punch now, which can put others off. Toning down your intensity is the key to creating the positive effect you desire.

You can tell that a power shift is in the air now that messenger Mercury has turned direct in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You might feel as if you're a kite at the whim of the changing winds. Although it's always a temptation for you adaptable Twins to pursue the next intriguing curiosity, it makes more sense to anchor yourself to the ground, stick around and dig beneath the surface. Paradoxically, the most profound growth occurs if you can hold your position for a few more days and face your fears.

You could receive a visit from an old friend or acquaintance tied to your past as mischievous Mercury spins around in your 7th House of Companions. Meanwhile, issues at work grow more complicated now as a topic that was discussed weeks ago returns to the forefront. Whatever surfaces today may prove to become more important over the next week or so. Scan the significant events of the last few weeks to ascertain if there is any unfinished business that still needs to be completed. Stepping into the future is easier when your house is in order.

You may not want to say everything you are thinking today, but you know exactly what's going on and you know what you need to do about it. However, you're emotionally sensitive now, but your inner stress isn't apparent to others. You're uncharacteristically cautious because you intuitively understand how significant these days are to your success, and you don't want to blow your chance. Trust your instincts and make your move only once you're truly ready.

Your emotional reactions are strong today while the moody Moon is howling in your sign, yet it may be tricky to express what's going on within your heart. If you reveal your feelings to others, you could inadvertently change the game and things might intensify too quickly. Keeping your thoughts quiet isn't a bad strategy now if you don't want to upset the apple cart. Nevertheless, you can't predict the future, so leave room to share your desires with someone special as circumstances permit.

Your ideas continue to be innovative and bold, but you can scatter your precious energy today instead of using it wisely. Even if your mental game is in top form now, sloppy thinking could prevent you from reaching your final destination. Take a few deep breaths and then get back to work; your current confidence will help you achieve your goals on time. Your mantra for the day is "pushing the river won't make it go faster."

Focusing your fierce intensity on your goals heightens your senses in the present moment. Your fixed purpose allows you to see straight into the eye of the hurricane. Thankfully, you have nothing to fear now and might even gain strength from experiencing the stillness of the center. The time for contemplation is over; fortunately, you can jump back into the winds of change and reclaim your power when you're ready to move boldly into your future.

You might forget about your chores today as you wistfully replay childhood fantasies. Perhaps you are dreaming about possessing super-hero powers, imagining what you would accomplish if you could defy gravity, stop time or eliminate evil. Although your most human characteristics are all too obvious, you still can perform magic in everything you do. Don't fritter away your time. Be fearless and use your creativity to express the passion in your heart.

Although you are quite clear about the road ahead, it feels as if something is wrong with the picture today. You can't put your finger on your uncertainty, but an inner voice is telling you not to trust your desires now. Normally, you're an expert at compartmentalizing your emotions if they interfere with your progress; however, shutting down your feelings is not a smart plan while Venus is casting her spell in your sign. Stay connected with your heart, no matter how inconvenient it may be in the moment.

You might be concerned that something is lurking on the outskirts of your awareness today. Unfortunately, you could waste valuable resources in pursuit of the unknown keys to your life. Sometimes a mature attitude is required to let go of a goal that can't be reached, instead of setting yourself up for further disappointment. Review the past few weeks and make up your mind to push past anything that has been holding you back from following your destiny.

It's as if the entire world has temporarily stopped spinning, just to give you extra time to think through a pesky problem. However, Mercury's direct turn in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals indicates a change of direction. If you recently made a decision that greatly impacts your future, take one more look at the alternatives before heading down the new path. Reconsidering your options one last time is wise now; once you make up your mind there's no going back.

You may be emotionally conflicted today because it's not all that easy to restrain your impulses. You are worried about misplacing your efforts, yet you also enjoy the feeling of inner power. Your concern is sufficient to stop you from wasting your talents by succumbing to your need for immediate gratification. You understand that waiting for the right moment is necessary now to insure you great success. Philosopher Jean-Jacques Rousseau reminds us, "Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet."

You are all about momentum today, making it tricky to change direction on a moment's notice. If you are taking it easy, you want to continue doing nothing until you feel enough pressure to make you uncomfortable. But if you've been on the move since you jumped out of bed, it will be tough to stop. Once you make your mind up, you are reluctant to switch teams mid-stream. Don't let your fixed ways get the best of you since change is necessary whether you are ready for it or not.

You might experience a minor meltdown today as you temporarily perform like a perfectionist. It's not that you're necessarily sloppy by nature; it's just you usually are happy to let go of something once you are done with it. Nevertheless, you're currently motivated to obsess over every little detail, and you don't want to leave any loose ends untied. Your uncharacteristic tenacity may trigger a power struggle with someone who isn't supportive of your idea of precise execution. If necessary, don't be afraid of digging in your heels to honor your truth.

Your feelings are larger than life today, but you still prefer to keep them to yourself. Although people might attempt to manipulate you by pulling on your heartstrings, you possess the strength to hold onto your point of view without budging.
