But it's hard to turn your brain off from all its random wanderings, even if you have a wonderful play day for you and friends on your schedule. Thankfully, you possess an overabundance of creativity that can help you get whatever you want. Be careful what you wish for because you just might get it.

You're right in the thick of things trying to discover a solution to a complicated problem. What makes this challenge even more difficult today is that you're clearly missing an intrinsic part of the puzzle and are hesitant to take sides until you have a clear picture constructed from the facts. Acknowledging that it's hard to come up with useful answers now lessens the pressure. However, continuing your research will lead to success as long as you don't give up on your search for the truth.

The notion of breaking out of a restraining situation is an exhilarating thought these days, but it may be wiser to wait a while longer. If you decide to turn your life inside out now, it could take a while for everything to settle back down. But even if you are committed to finding an effective way to operate within the current limitations of your schedule, you're still free to apply your rational skills and spiritual training to your work. However, the most brilliant plan is of no value until you put it into practice.

Taking a long hard look at your finances is top priority now, but unfortunately, this isn't just about balancing your checkbook. You are being pushed to decide how you will optimize your current gains and move into the future with an attitude of prosperity. However, it's time to be practical about your life. Don't make a problem more important than it is today; just put your energy toward getting your fiscal world in order. It's not a matter of if you should plan for your future, it's when.

Your spirit is restless, prompting you to start a new project today. Even if there are several logical reasons to wait, one thing after another keeps encouraging you to hurry up and harness the power of the moment. You are quick to push against any resistance so you can make something magical happen. But overly assertive behavior isn't necessary now. Your life is about to change; be ready to go along for the ride when you are invited. Proper preparation prevents poor performance.

Achieving your lofty goals might seem like an overwhelming task today, but this is no time to throw in the towel. Even if you are disheartened by difficult circumstances, your ideas are innovative and potentially very valuable. Recognize the recent setbacks as opportunities that enable you to strengthen your plans. Just don't hold onto old expectations; anything is possible if you're willing to shift gears quickly now.

You might wonder why you're spending your free time gazing off into the future while there is so much happening in the present moment. Actually, planning for what comes next is an exercise in futility today, since you can't be certain where the current changes will lead. Navigating your way through a major transition is much easier if you let go of your desire to be distracted by a plethora of possibilities. Focusing singularly  on your immediate goal offers you the best chances for success. Work now, dream later.

You may be expected to step up and care for the very same people who usually help you out when asked. But it can rattle your sense of fair play if your efforts go unappreciated today; nevertheless, you still need to deliver the goods as promised. Although you are flirting with the idea of withdrawing so others notice your absence, a strategy based on passive resistance will likely backfire. Integrity is doing the right thing even when no one is watching.

You have a lot of rational justifications for throwing caution to the wind today, but it's confusing when there are also signs you may be traveling on the wrong path. Although you could run into opposition to your ideas, it's smarter to slow down rather than halting your progress altogether. Believe it or not, there is nothing to be gained by reaching your destination in a hurry. Stop chasing what your mind wants and you'll get what your soul needs.

Listen carefully to the quiet voice of your intuition today, rather than taking your cues from close friends or trusted professionals. They can't see things from the same vantage point as you do and their well-meaning advice may lead you astray. Reaching your personal goals is so important now that you must be willing to disengage from social activities. Focus on your own dreams for a while; standing alone is better than traveling with a group in the wrong direction.

You are often the one everyone turns to when interpersonal dynamics grow complicated. However, it's not easy to get others to settle down today, especially if no one appears to be listening to your words of reconciliation. You might struggle with your role as a negotiator because you aren't patient enough now to figure out everyone's conflicting motives. Just remember it pays to be kind in your delivery, even if you cannot consider each person's possible individual reaction to your message. Speaking from your heart is an example for the rest to follow.

You're usually quite capable of thinking strategically in a cool and collected manner. However, you may reach the end of your rope today and grow very close to tossing out your previous plans. Just remember impulsive actions won't likely benefit anyone in the long run. Acting without forethought puts you on a path of unnecessary resistance. As Confucius said, "It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop."

A weird mixture of positive intentions and negative encounters makes for a rather interesting day. Nevertheless, you can't decide whether to take the obstacles you face at work as a signal that you really need to change your direction. Or, maybe, someone's aloofness has you worrying if you did something wrong. Either way, you have the power to turn the seeds of doubt into the fruits of your labor. You can reach nearly any destination if you put your shoulder to the wheel and push.

Your measured and methodical approach to your goals usually works in your favor. Unfortunately, your current level of elevated enthusiasm is making it difficult to keep a lid on your excitement today. You're eager to let others know exactly how you feel now, but you are acutely aware that they're not going to like what they hear. Trust your inner voice to steer you in the right direction. Author Terry Goodkind wrote, "Your life is yours and yours alone; rise up and live it."

You are itching to share your perspective today, but might not stop to consider the impact of your words. Your unpremeditated revelation could be hurtful to someone you like, even if you intended no harm. Rather than finding yourself in an intense argument over something that ultimately isn't important, walk away and reevaluate your motives. The truth is a beautiful and terrible thing, and therefore should be treated with caution.

Your self-esteem is soaring today, and you're ready to do something that you went out of your way to avoid in the past. Although it's important to stick to your core values, be careful not to try to sell your point of view to others. It's not about convincing anyone that your position is right; act from the center of your own heart by following convictions that are unshakable by someone else's judgment. Let your faith be bigger than your fear.

You may wake up so excited that it's nearly impossible to contain yourself. However, it becomes obvious later in the day that you might have overreacted, which in turn makes the situation even more awkward. Thankfully, smoothing any ruffled feathers is quite simple today if you put your mind to it, plus you get to enjoy the calm after the storm. Take a few deep breaths; after all, you earned the right to relax if you were busy mending fences.

It might seem as if you are given one last chance to get it right, but this time you're certain it's your final opportunity. However, once again your assessment of the situation is wrong. Undoubtedly, you need to tie up as many loose ends as possible before the Moon enters your sign this afternoon; but whatever isn't completed today will still be there tomorrow, like an eager puppy waiting for its human companion to return. In the meantime, counting your blessings allows you to see how truly fortunate you are.

Concentrating on your job seems like an uphill battle today because there are so many interesting diversions that vie for your attention. Your insatiable curiosity often tempts you to explore a variety of avenues whether or not there is enough time. However, your mental inquisitiveness just makes you feel annoyingly scattered now. Thankfully, you can still complete your assignments by remembering to return to the work at hand each time your brain wanders. Focus on being productive instead of being busy.

You're tired of being responsible for everyone else's happiness now because it might feel like your own needs are lost in the process. Although you aren't one to walk out on your commitments, it's time to restore a healthy balance to your life. Begin by acknowledging those things that make your heart sing. Slowly move in the direction of your dreams, even if you must take an emotional risk. There's nothing wrong with occasionally letting others take care of themselves. There's a fine line between loyalty and co-dependence, and someone has to draw it.

You continue to ride the waves of change, but it's wise to be fully prepared today as you head into rough waters. A storm isn't necessarily an indication of a major problem; it might simply be a sign to slow down and review your plans before nonchalantly continuing on your way. Don't worry about resolving every dilemma now. Simply navigate your way around the obstacles until you find a safe place to land. Keep your internal compass handy and everything will be alright.

You recently excavated buried psychological intrigue and drama, but now you are ready to take a simpler approach to life. Your imagination is running wild, tempting you with a wide array of fantasies. Even if satisfaction is elusive at first, you can rest easy knowing that your fair share of fun is on the way. Making the right choices early today sets the stage for an adventure tonight or over the weekend. Don't be afraid to give yourself exactly what you want.

An intense emotional interaction with someone special may have zapped a lot of your energy in the recent past. Thankfully, it's now time to turn this powerful engagement into something more meaningful that truly nurtures your soul. It's as if an overbearing electric guitar riff is bridging into a gentle flute solo right before your eyes. And as the melody wafts, so does your pleasure. No resistance is necessary; accept the current positive changes as a reward for your previous efforts. Lead with your heart and happiness will follow.

You believe you possess a secret weapon today, but mentioning it to anyone is unwise because your power currently stems from remaining silent. Although some people might think your charisma is a byproduct of your sexual energy, your magic goes deeper into more spiritual realms. Your magnetism remains alluring as long as the mystery stays in place. Keep others guessing with your dazzling smile and let your actions speak for themselves.

It's more than likely that you recently devoted your energy to pursuing pleasure instead of getting your work done. It's time to pay the piper by catching up on your chores today, even if that means turning down a leisurely lunch or an evening out with your friends. However, attempting to do everything at once only creates more complications. The most straightforward route to success is traveled by prioritizing your tasks now and then attacking them in order, one after another, until you are finished. A goal without a plan is just a wish.

You may be discouraged this morning because it feels as if you're running on a hamster wheel without getting anywhere. Honestly, even your most dependable rituals don't seem to contribute to your progress today. Paradoxically, your smartest strategy is to loosen your expectations without giving up on your goals. Fortunately, you should be able to find your groove later in the afternoon and quickly make up for lost time. Albert Einstein wrote, "Strive not to be a success, but to be of value."

A wall of exhaustion may hit you unexpectedly today, requiring you to stop and assess how much you have already accomplished this week. Unfortunately, you might still have a distance to go now, even if you've run out of time and energy. Accepting your fatigue is a crucial first step in overcoming it. Step out of the fray to give yourself a chance to recuperate; you'll be much more efficient once you return to your tasks with the benefit of a little rest.

It is a tortoise-and-the-hare kind of day -- and you are now playing the role of both of these characters. You're off to a quick start as the hare and you're excited about getting ahead of the pack. But instead of thinking you can steal a quick nap, you become more tactical through the afternoon as you consider how to sustain your efforts. Slowing down like the tortoise makes perfect sense; the sooner you do it, the longer your energy will last. Endurance is the key to your success.

Pay attention to personal matters today, including issues that affect your overall well-being, and everything else should fall into place. Conflicts that surface now represent opportunities to focus on utilizing your common sense. Forget about lofty ideas of philosophy and metaphysics; instead, work around your home or at your desk, but don't waste your time on anything that's not useful. Concentrating on activities that achieve tangible results brings you more emotional satisfaction than you expect.

You know exactly what you need to do in order to find happiness. Fortunately, the planets are on your side today, enabling you to establish concrete goals and work steadily to achieve them. However, you might have to overcome someone's objections to your plans before you can proceed. Be as clear as possible when stating your intentions and don't waste too much time justifying your position. Ultimately, the simplest way to demonstrate your convictions is to walk your talk.

You could easily spend the entire day lost in daydreams about what you want to do with your life. Meanwhile, your family history -- both the good and the bad -- is flooding into your awareness now. Your imagination is communicating a message to your conscious mind, and it's crucial to keep your rational perspective out of the way. Allow the images to wash over you without seeking logical explanation today. The disconnected memories will fit together like puzzle pieces when the time is right.

A spontaneous healing can be quite unexpected today. Although you may have unintentionally hurt someone in the past, your insecurities about your feelings might stir up the most pain. Talking about your emotional process is the most beneficial thing you can do now. But it still makes sense to take care of your needs first so you're better equipped to nurture others. Nevertheless, your willingness to be vulnerable opens the way to mutual understanding. Be confident yet humble, for pride goes before a fall.

Open up your heart and express yourself today, but avoid creating unnecessary drama in the process of self-disclosure. Although you could be at odds with your own feelings, observing your fluctuating moods as they change can bring much-needed perspective on a practical matter. The truth is you don't have all the answers yet. Make sure to give others a chance to share their opinions on the subject. Nevertheless, being conscious is more important now than being right.

You might want to reconsider a decision now and put it back on the table for open discussion. There's no time like the present to sort through all the possibilities. But it's not enough that your practical experience is growing by leaps and bounds; you must put your skills to use as soon as possible. Obviously, you can't reap the rewards if you don't take initiative and stretch outside of your comfort zone today. Strike while the iron is hot.

Although you may be the one who usually tries to make everyone feel comfortable, you might assume that others are doing better than they actually are today. Unfortunately, someone could take your apparent lack of interest personally, jumping to the conclusion that you're ignoring them when they need you. Luckily, you can minimize potentially hurt feelings now by going the extra mile and keeping communication channels open. Making certain that people know you care is what matters most.

Your emotions are heightened with five planets now drifting through sensitive Pisces. However, you're still able to establish steady rhythms in your life so that your relationships at home and at work stabilize over the days ahead. Unfortunately, you might believe you need to juggle everything all by yourself. Nevertheless, you must collaborate with others as part of your current personal transformation. Giving and receiving support creates a healthy network you can count on to lift you up when times are rough.

You might not be able to stop thinking about all the chores you must do today, especially if you recently made a commitment that you want to keep. Luckily, your energy is externally focused, making it easier to plan your next move. Plotting a strategic course could feel like a game, but it's not; you must be ready for the serious changes that are on the horizon. Prepare for the future by attending to as many details as you can now, rather than later. Clearing your slate gives you the chance to jump at the next opportunity that piques your interest.

Exercising your creative muscles comes naturally today because visionary ideas seem to flow so easily. Luckily, you receive positive encouragement from the Grand Earth Trine that includes the sensual Taurus Moon shining in your 5th House of Self-Expression. But this cosmic energy doesn't just highlight your performance; it's also excellent for exploring how to best work with your current resources. Don't focus on your limitations; find a way to get the job done, no matter what. The personal satisfaction you experience at the end of the day makes the extra effort worth the trouble.

Undeniable feelings push you to make concrete choices today, even if you can't fully resolve the differences between your head and your heart. You might believe you must neglect some part of yourself either way, but this gulf between your wishes and reality is just a temporary illusion. Go ahead and make the best decision by following your instincts. Thankfully, the pressure will likely lift by nightfall and you will realize you did the right thing. Listen to the voice that doesn't use words and everything will work out fine.

Your feet land firmly back on the ground today, empowering you to create a master plan for success and then boldly put it into motion. Although you might experience a bit of confusion early in the day, you should be able to convince everyone that your strategy makes the most sense. But there's no need to waste time engaging in arguments that lead nowhere. Ultimately, your actions will state your case better than anything you can say. Be the shining example others want to follow.

Use your excess energy wisely today while you can. Unfortunately, you could be interrupted by many different activities and end up frittering away your time before you know it. Instead, establish clear priorities so you can take care of the most important tasks first. Long conversations with friends might be fun, but they are just mere distractions when you can't afford to fall behind with your chores. You need to follow through with your commitments early in the day if you want to be taken seriously by those who matter most.

Uncertainty about the future pushes you to make a concrete decision today. You might think you have a solution in place only to discover that you're not as sure as you thought. You may struggle trying to make up your mind once the inconstant Moon slips into changeable Gemini this afternoon. Rather than trying to confirm your choice now, concentrate your efforts on acquiring more information. Remember, sometimes there are several right answers to the same question. Mental flexibility is an invaluable asset; following your curiosity can lead you into some very interesting places.

There could be someone lurking about who is ready to judge every mistake you make now. However, you may become so chatty once the Moon is back in your sign that you need to watch what you say. Choosing the wrong words might negatively impact your credibility. If you must make your view known today, make certain to brush up on your facts so you don't invite unnecessary criticism. A little advanced preparation establishes your competence and maintains your integrity.

You might settle into the rhythm of the morning, only to feel on edge later when your dissatisfaction makes it difficult to sit still. Instead of allowing your frustration to build to an intolerable level, apply your extra energy to assist a friend who may be in need of personal attention today. You can deepen your sense of purpose now by supporting someone who seems lost or confused. Ultimately, lending a helping hand to others is one of the best ways to nurture your soul.

You have more on your plate than just having fun now because people are depending on you to lead the pack. Involving others on your project is wise today because a joint effort gets the job done more quickly than you could alone. The key is to listen to everyone's input, for leadership is as much about understanding and appreciating your teammates as it is about telling them what to do. A creative collaboration improves your chances for achieving success.

You can deconstruct the most complex situations better than almost anyone. But you still need to be vigilant today because you could miss a critical piece of information right in front of your nose if you rush your process. However, your perspective may a bit skewed by your personal desire for adventure now, so make sure the problem truly requires your attention before you get too wrapped up in something that's not ultimately all that important. Reshuffle your priorities so you can pursue the whims of your heart.

Setting long-term goals is an essential key to your success now, but it's not yet time to make any major decisions. Do the research first, discuss your plans with your friends and reevaluate all the possible options. Additional education at this crossroads in your life will be invaluable since it can help you advance further as long as you don't lose track of your original objectives. There is no elevator to success; you must take the stairs one step at a time to reach your destination.

If you are confused by the behavior of a loved one today, speak up and share whatever is  bothering you. Acting in denial by sidestepping a problem causes more trouble down the road than it's worth. Expressing your thoughts without pointing blame improves the relationship dynamics. You are being offered an opportunity to fill in the missing information that helps you appreciate the other person's position as long as you don't allow the dialogue to turn into your own personal rant. Listening with your heart is just as important as talking with your mouth.

You are able to interact with almost anyone about anything today, so set up the meetings that are necessary to talk about your pet ideas. You can effortlessly impress people with all of your knowledge and enthusiasm. Just remember that the devil is in the details. All the charm in the world won't be enough to close a deal unless you have the solid facts to back up your ambitious plans. As Ben Franklin wrote, "By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail."

Ironically, your willingness to change horses midstream may be more valuable now than possessing a solid game plan. Playing the role of a bossy parent or know-it-all friend would be a drastic mistake. It could turn out to be a tough day if you try to maintain tight control over everything and everyone. However, you will find new strategies that can be very effective for you both professionally and personally if you learn to relax your grip a little. Trusting others to take the reins inspires them to rise up to the challenge.

Your intuition is incredibly sharp now, inspiring you to pull metaphysical rabbits out of imaginary hats. Somehow, you can miraculously come up with the right answers as if by sheer magic. Luckily, your spiritual channels open even wider when you simply enjoy the flow of energy and live in the present moment. Utilizing your sense of humor enables you to put on quite an impressive performance, leaving your audience in awe. Shine, baby, shine.

You may feel a bit disoriented today, especially if family matters make it nearly impossible to concentrate on your own life. Don't make any serious decisions or major commitments unless you are feeling confident about your current direction. Although it's tempting to agree to many things just to make someone else happy, reacting immediately isn't a wise move. Giving your ideas time to develop before responding empowers you to accomplish more in the long run.

You may be so quick to react to an awkward situation at work today that your coworkers might conclude you are hiding something from them. But your speedy response is more likely about your impulsive need to be creative than about keeping a secret. Your current emotions are complex, yet grow more transparent later in the day because your desire to live spontaneously brings your feelings out into the open. Don't pretend to be absolutely certain about your plan now, since new truths are discovered when you acknowledge that you don't have all the answers.

You have plenty of promises to keep today, but might be afraid of acknowledging a recent commitment that you just can't fulfill. You're concerned about your inability to meet other people's expectations, but worrying about factors that are beyond your control is counterproductive. Don't judge what's happening now by something that occurred in the past. Keep your life as simple as you can; give each task your unrestrained best effort and then move on to what's next. Your dedication is appreciated more than you know.

It can be demoralizing if you think your dreams are slipping through your fingers today. Unfortunately, your discomfort deepens if you are confronted with the realization that something is amiss with your current strategy. Nevertheless, you can't afford to waste a moment fretting about what could go wrong. Just do whatever is necessary to integrate the new information into your objectives now and modify your plans to allow for the change of direction. Adaptability is an essential key to your happiness.

You might be familiar with sinking deeply into the recesses of your inner world, but today's visit to your subconscious realms may be quite different than in the past. Tension on the job requires you to face a serious issue yet you could make matters worse if you believe you can just manipulate everything to your advantage. Luckily, you are in for a pleasant surprise now if you're strong enough to surrender to your feelings. Being emotionally available clears a path to an unexpected transformation.

You could run straight into an old fear in pursuit of satisfaction today, yet the prognosis for your happiness is still quite positive. Although you might be worried about receiving criticism if you fail to meet your goals, being  honest about your current bout with low self-esteem is wise as long as you express your concerns and then let them go. Success may actually be within reach if you're not in such a hurry to prove your competence; take the scenic route if you encounter a detour along the way.

You want to serve others today as you search for renewed meaning in your life. You might consider stepping outside of your safety zone to help victims of a recent crisis or volunteer for a political cause. Unfortunately, you could fall short of your own idealistic standards now, no matter how hard you work on the behalf of others. However, your new spiritual vision can be revitalizing for your soul if you don't take your altruism too far. Find something to do that will create a positive impact without turning your entire world upside down.

You could slip into familiar fantasies about producing great works of art today, but you may needlessly worry that you lack the talent and resources to pull it off. Nevertheless, imagine what you would do if you didn't need to earn a living and manage your regular responsibilities. There's no place for self-limiting thinking now, so express your creativity any way you can. Make time for playful endeavors, even if only as a practice to connect with your inner child.

Nothing is gained now by idly wondering how your life might have turned out if one thing or another happened differently in the past. Although it may be tempting to dream about time-traveling so you can change a critical event today, this sentimental journey is a pointless waste of time. There's no need to rewrite your personal history; instead, use your active imagination to bring a memory into the here and now to positively impact the present moment. The only limits to your future are the ones you create in your mind.

You might become so excited about doing something in your own unique way today, that you completely forget about fulfilling a previous promise. Make time to quiet your mind so you can actually hear a meaningful message that's coming from your subconscious. Don't be so cavalier that you totally disregard the symbolism of a dream or fantasy. Everything that enters your awareness now contains clues about your life's purpose. Following through on your commitments is the first step in the right direction.

Striving to reach your goals is admirable as long as you don't lose sight of why they are so important. It's useful to recollect a formative childhood experience that motivated you to be serious about making such ambitious plans. But routine obligations also demand your attention now, so don't drop the ball on your daily chores just so you can revise the story of your life. Balance your current necessities with what you see on the horizon before making any hasty life-changing decisions.

You are more spiritually inclined these days and happily reliant on your vivid imagination to add color to your world. However, you're entering a transitional phase and today's realizations may be instrumental in redefining your life. Naturally, you want to understand the mysteries of the cosmos right away, but patience is required now; your transformation will take months to unfold. In the meantime, don't let your fixed nature stand in the way of your success. Free your mind and the rest will follow.

You yearn for a chance to reminisce about your childhood today and indulge your need for nostalgia. Although delving into your personal history can be delightful, it's also a distraction especially if you're trying to escape from your current circumstances. You may wish you could revive a meaningful connection with your past; just don't forget to express your creativity in the present moment or you might miss a wonderful opportunity to show the world your masterpiece.

Someone might need to tell you that you're shouting before you even notice you raised your voice. Your enthusiasm may be over the top today, encouraging you to turn a simple idea into one that is so overblown your credibility suffers. Fortunately, practicing a little sensitivity serves you well now, preventing you from unconsciously making things more important than they actually are. When your excitement rises, take a few deep breaths and tone down your message. As your awareness increases, so does your ability to control your actions.

You could overreact with stubbornness if people try to override your decisions today. It's so easy for a little disagreement to quickly escalate that you find yourself in the middle of a conflict without even realizing there was an issue. Thankfully, you can prevent an exhausting battle if you're willing to go out of your way to compromise. Take the high road and let tempers settle before you resume discussions. If you can master patience now, everything else will fall into place.

You may try to exert more self-restraint than you actually possess today. Thankfully, you're not worried about getting too worked up over something that's important to you. Instead, you're probably overly concerned with honoring someone else's privacy. The Moon's presence in your sign urges you to vent your feelings, but expressing the whole truth might be inappropriate now. Be discreet about what isn't yours to share because it's wise to keep some things quiet. Simply smile and tell others to mind their own business.

You're often someone others confide in because they can usually count on your willingness to listen. But your receptivity may be overshadowed now by your eagerness to talk about your  feelings for a change. It's perfectly natural to harbor your own ambitions and want to share them instead of just reflecting on everyone else's needs. Nevertheless, keep your enthusiasm in check or you might say more than you want. Sometimes it's better to raise your eyebrows instead of your voice. Discretion is your friend.

You may be panic-struck today once you realize how much work there is to do this week. You might even experience a twinge of regret if you recently took off too much time to play. But the illusion that time is running out is exacerbated by the restless Gemini Moon, and worrying won't help you get back on track. Instead, roll up your sleeves and put your nose to the grindstone. You can invent countless reasons to procrastinate, but you only need one good idea to initiate action. The sooner you start, the sooner you will be done.

Your rational mind normally doesn't require external supervision, but the encouragement you are currently receiving could color your deliberations. Your ruling planet Mercury opposes audacious Jupiter today, spinning your mental process out of whack and making you susceptible to inflationary thinking. Nevertheless, don't criticize anyone else for your outrageous conclusions. Blaming others takes time and energy away from improving your game.

You sincerely want to explain your position to your coworkers now, but everything you say seems to be taken out of context. It's more complicated than simply telling your story, since you may feel the need to exaggerate and turn your presentation into a melodrama. Your motives for sharing might not be apparent to others, prompting them to pull back in uncertainty. If people withdraw today, graciously let them go and tell your tale another day.

You wish everyone would recognize your contributions and appreciate the fact that your efforts go beyond the call of duty. Unfortunately, expecting so much from others could make satisfaction even more elusive now. Unrealistic demands won't make anyone feel better today, nor will acquiescing to something that's not in your best interest. No one else can decide what's right for you, so follow your intuition and proceed with confidence.

You could grow overly concerned with how you make decisions today, yet this obsession won't necessarily help you choose the right course of action. Visionary Jupiter's opposition to rational Mercury forces you to seek solutions to the most complicated problems now. Thankfully, there's no reason to prove your analytical superiority to anyone. Just focus the best you can and methodically push ahead toward your goals. Don't spend too much time thinking when you can simply let your heart choose your path.

You mountain-climbing Goats often get ahead in life because of your sure-footedness, but your unflappable persistence could be your secret ingredient to success now. You may be surprised by how quickly everyone else gives up today, especially when they see an easier path to follow. But even as alternative routes appear, keep your eyes focused singularly on your destination and don't deviate from your chosen course. Wake up with determination; go to bed with success.

It's nearly impossible to hide your dissatisfaction with the status quo today, especially in a close relationship. Someone could irritate you now by taking undeserved credit or  simply needing too much attention. You aren't interested in feeding anyone's ego; you just want to create change with the least amount of drama possible. Nevertheless, you may underestimate the resources needed to complete a job and other people might be needed to bail you out. Be lenient with your judgments; the path to success is a long and winding road with many twists and turns along the way.

Unfortunately, once you start explaining your perspective to a friend or associate today, you might not know when to step off your soapbox. You may be extra talkative with mischievous Mercury buzzing about in your sign, opposing exaggerating Jupiter in your 7th House of Relationships. Try and remember that your current thinking is anything but objective. Don't be afraid to keep your involvement in a project to a minimum or, if possible, just say no. Being brutally honest is kinder now than disappointing others later on.

It may feel as if you don't have the time to do those things that could bring you the most spiritual and emotional growth. But your concern is based on a faulty illusion because progress originates from very practical places in your life today -- like fulfilling your responsibilities at work. Don't worry about what you might be missing; everything is where it's supposed to be if you apply yourself to the mundane logistics. Thankfully, exploring the outer galaxies and the inner reaches of your imagination can be done in your sleep.

Your creativity is longing to run wild and free today. Thankfully, the roadblocks that were standing between you and your satisfaction are finally falling to the wayside. Ironically, circumstances are not shifting enough to give you a break from the dramas of ordinary life; it's more likely that you're cleverly surfing on a wave of cosmic power now. The world is your oyster; adventure is calling and it's up to you to answer.

Your inner confidence is on the rise today, especially with your family and friends acting as a source of genuine encouragement. Channel the support you receive to boost your resolve even higher. Everyone goes through periods of doubt, but now it's time to reclaim your inheritance and put your natural talents to good use. In the meantime, don't let the opinions of others consume you when you're following your dreams. Let your faith be bigger than your fear.

You're certain your conclusions are correct and you're all set to tell the world your viewpoint exactly as you see it. Although you're willing to shout your message from the mountaintop today, you're unsure if you are up for the climb. Something may still be holding you back from fulfilling your appointed destiny. There's no need to fight the obvious resistance now since it will only feel like shadowboxing. Instead of trying to convince anyone else of your integrity, find a solution within. Wait to share your story until the time is right.

You can make a lot of progress now by taking stock of your resources and managing them to the best of your ability. The good news is you stand to gain both financially and emotionally if you don't push too hard to be on top. However, you can easily fall victim to unrestrained optimism today, especially related to how you handle your money. Don't get distracted by an immediate payoff or a shortcut to success. Plot a path for long-term security and things will fall into place piece by piece.

Your expectations are lofty, even if reality has been testing your resolve on every level lately. Don't quit when things are finally starting to take a turn for the better; make the most of your positive attitude while your mind can transform hardship into great opportunity. This auspicious energy could be most apparent in your love life where relationship difficulties may finally begin to find resolution. Make your intentions as clear as possible and hope for the best.

Invisible helpers seem to be watching your back today. You may assume that it's just good luck, but you could actually have spirit guides or guardian angels who are looking out for your best interests. Although your analytical mind won't let you entertain the possibility of supernatural friends, your subconscious mind is now the source of guidance that will get you out of a difficult situation. No matter what you believe, trust your instincts and never apologize for honoring your intuition.

You can feel your idealism slowly making its return today. Even if you've been through a crisis of confidence, there is good reason to be more optimistic in your outlook now. However, do your best to avoid manipulating others, even if you think you're being kind to someone else while also helping yourself. You might inadvertently create sticky webs when you are motivated by ulterior motives. Keep it clean and don't attempt to control the actions of anyone else. Have faith in the universe and maintain your integrity at all costs.

This could be the time of your life if you were simply in it for the payoff. However, you know it's not only about fame and fortune because your soul craves meaning and passion. Nevertheless, it is still prudent to reevaluate your current career path if you look at it from a lifetime perspective. Ask the important questions: Are you making the most of your skills and talents? Are you happy or is there something else you would rather be doing? Don't postpone your soul's journey; embrace the future and take a small step in your new direction.

You might not be out of the woods yet, but jolly old Jupiter is flying around you like a hummingbird returning to the feeder. Sure, there still may be some tricky situations to handle, but they need not define your life. The most crucial thing to understand is the effort you exert now will have lasting impact. Reflect over the past few months prior to projecting forward. Don't sit and wait for something magical to happen; moving confidently toward your ideal future plays a large role in creating it.

It might seem as if something precious is being taken from you now, but believe it or not, things will still likely work out for the best. You are being offered an important opportunity, although what the gift is may not become apparent until you've made enough room in your life for it to manifest. Your hard work in the present moment can pay off in the future. Don't waste energy worrying about what isn't working today. Sometimes you must first let go in order for something better to come along. When one door closes, another opens.

It's time to rush to the rescue where your friends are concerned. In addition, help is also on the way to you, even if you don't think you need it. The good news is that you can actually do amazingly well if others appear with just what you need. However, you must first get past your initial resistance to outside interference. There is cosmic magic working on your behalf now. Don't hold back; your current actions determine your future.

It's crucial to nurture your quiet and sometimes even introspective side that often is overridden by your inner warrior. There is more than one way to win a battle and today your training is of the heart and not of the hands. Practice meditation or set some time aside for contemplation. Give yourself the gift of allowing your mind to wander; whatever comes to you during your self-reflection will help to pave the road to your success.

There is an unrelenting pressure on you to take a current solid opportunity and turn it into something better. This auspicious opening may be about money, a natural talent, or it could even involve a relationship. Oddly enough, its focus is not the important part. The critical thing is what you choose to do with your good fortune. There are unseen helpers coming to your aid, so don't be afraid to think big and go long.

You may be concerned now with the impact of your political beliefs in the social sphere of relationships. Sure, your values can affect your closest relationships, especially if your basic views on war, the economy or political candidates differ from your partner's. If you try to avoid stating your position because you don't want to start an argument, you'll probably end up in a squabble anyway. It's better for everyone involved if you lay it on the line and share your convictions. Demonstrating your integrity inspires others to do the same.

Be ready to shift directions as the emotional tides of your immediate environment change. But don't lose sight of your priorities because you'll certainly be washed away in the tides of chaos if you do. Rely on your moral compass to guide you and don't take your concentration off your destination, even if the fog rolls in. You could work magic with your eyes closed now while the cosmos is on your side, but you'll need to trust in yourself first.

In spite of feeling insecure today, you may be successful with whatever you set out to accomplish. However, you will do your best work when you're motivated by interests that extend past your own. You're in a highly creative phase now and can turn the sourest lemons into the sweetest lemon meringue pie ever tasted. Just remember that you'll need to tap into the source of your inspiration by going within before you reach out to help anyone else.

An unexpected detour on your search for meaning can prove to be a wonderful opportunity. You aren't going to solve the unsolvable today, but you might be surprised by what you discover from delving deeper. Your friends and family want you to follow your heart, but any expressed hesitancy is motivated by their concerns for your well-being. Ultimately, you must be responsible for your actions. You may think you should restrain from sharing your real dreams, when in reality they are the key to your happiness.

Your spoken words carry extra weight today, so use them with the utmost care. Your tendency is to say less than what's actually on your mind now, but be careful about trying to manipulate the situation for your own good. The planetary currents are strong and your best use of them is to ride the waves of change for the advancement of all, and not just for yourself. The good of the many outweighs the needs of the one.

Total transformation could be in the picture while you are considering how much your values have changed. You are worth more than you are making at your job and you can't help but think about how you are going to move ahead, even if you have to turn your world on its ear to accomplish your goals. The good news is that you're probably receiving encouraging signals from the universe, letting you know your ambitions are not out of reach. Real success comes from being true to yourself and not surrendering to the expectations of others.

You're the big thinker and grand planner of the zodiac. You might have gone over the top a few times if you're true to your Sagittarian nature. Although you're in one of your inflationary phases, something is very different this time around -- for your innovative idea can really work. You are quite powerful now and able to move mountains if your journey requires it. Challenges make life interesting; overcoming them makes your existence meaningful.

You are extremely persistent today as you evaluate how to make the best use of your time. You're on the edge of a dramatic change that may involve other people's resources and complex interrelationships. Although it's tempting to inflate a large project until it's too big for you to handle, it's best to keep the nonessential elements of your plans to yourself. Nevertheless, if you ask the right people for help, you'll have a much easier time over the weeks ahead. As Helen Keller wrote, "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much."

The greatest journey still begins with a single step. Your visionary mind has trouble focusing on mundane issues. However, methodical progress is the only logical way to reach your destination. For example, the thought of changing your work schedule so you can be more effective may seem overwhelming. But making a minor change in some aspect of your daily routine feels like a manageable start. Don't just dream about success; work for it.

Life's purpose isn't currently about finding yourself; it's about creating yourself. No matter how great the task before you, it still boils down to whether or not you believe in your talent. Unfortunately, you might settle for less, acknowledging unnecessary limits on your capabilities because you fear you're setting yourself up for failure. Nevertheless, hang your sights on something special and make it happen. If you need a hero, put on your cape and become one.

Unexpected changes to your plans may actually prove to be enjoyable today, but only if you are flexible-minded and adapt quickly to current events. Nevertheless, concentrate on each present moment rather than worrying about past behavior that can't be changed. Although other people's motives might not be apparent, there's no reason to assume anything is wrong. Thankfully, expressing your feelings as clearly as possible will keep the energy moving in a positive direction.

Making up your mind seems nearly impossible today because there are two distinct paths to choose from. On one hand, you want to stay home and start a creative project like redecorating a room or working on your latest masterpiece. On the other hand, there are errands to be done that could entail a bit of running around. The sooner you shift into gear, the earlier you will finish. Obviously it's basic common sense, but taking care of your chores as efficiently as possible gives you more personal time later on.

You might not make as much progress at work as you expect today, even with a clear sense of purpose. It seems like you're speaking a foreign language; you believe you're expressing yourself succinctly, yet people still don't understand your ideas. Fortunately, your behavior conveys your message more effectively than rambling on with words that are not authentically connected to your heart. Your actions will tell others everything they need to know.

There is no valid reason to dissipate your positive outlook today, worrying about what anyone else thinks of your plans for self-indulgence. Keep in mind that anything you do that is in complete alignment with your core beliefs -- even if it doesn't move you closer to your goals -- is still better than maintaining the status quo. Being true to yourself is more important than living up to the expectations of others. Follow your heart and don't look back.

You are enthusiastic about showing people your best side today, especially with the reflective Moon lighting up your expressive sign. But somehow your well-meaning intentions seem to get lost in one too many cliches and colorful stories. Instead of talking about your plan for the day, just jump in and do it. Your words may not impress anyone but your behavior will. An honest heart sends a clear message.

You may be quite confused today if someone's behavior doesn't seem to support what is being said. Nevertheless, the difference between people's statements and their actions begins to make sense when you realize that something important has been purposefully left out of the conversation. Instead of struggling to find the missing piece of the puzzle now, wait patiently for the rest of the story to reveal itself when the time is right. Life will be easier once you accept the fact that everyone doesn't necessarily operate as logically as you do. Keep calm and carry on.

Although your colleagues might invite you to join  in their extracurricular activities, you're still aware of the awkward tension that is building in your professional relationships. Luckily, you possess the right words to reduce the interpersonal stress now, but your sweet pleasantries don't really resolve the underlying issues. Let your charm work its magic; applying a lighter touch today paves the way for the real work down the road.

Clever magicians draw your attention to one hand, while the other one is doing something you're not supposed to see. Similarly, you may appear to be walking your talk out in the open now, but with several dreamy planets hanging out in Pisces, you're able to hide the real action from full view. Don't waste too much energy wondering when you should spill your secrets since people won't likely notice that they're missing anything today. Wait until you're in the right company and appropriate place before sharing the complete story.

You may have mixed feelings about a friend's well-meaning gesture. On one hand, you see him or her as generously offering you a ticket to an adventure that's within easy reach. But on the other hand, you're not convinced that the trip is exactly the one you're looking for now. Fortunately, there's no reason to make any long-term decisions yet. Whatever you choose to do today, don't take things too seriously because it could all change tomorrow.

You have specific goals running through your head, but they seem so far away from your current day-to-day affairs. This apparent distance could elicit feelings of ambivalence about what you should be doing to realize your potential. You might even entertain the idea of giving up now and changing your direction drastically. Although you may feel an urgent need to make some quick decisions today, let this wave of intensity pass before you alter your current course. Sometimes inaction is the most effective course of action.

A friend or associate may brighten your day by making you an offer you can't refuse. Although there might be valid reasons to decline a social invitation, saying yes is still a good idea for your emotional well-being. Enjoying yourself now while you can is sensible because the pace will only grow more hectic in the days ahead. As Socrates wrote, "Beware the barrenness of a busy life." Cultivating connections puts your life in balance.

Surprisingly, a case of extreme boredom can set in today, turning a relaxing day into a study in frustration. Your current restlessness prompts you to mix things up and change your plans at the very last minute to save you from feeling trapped. Nevertheless, it still is prudent to stick to your regular routine than to break rank and do something totally off the wall. Happily, your great escape will be more emotionally satisfying if you wait a few days and build the anticipation.

Although you're quite enthusiastic about your future prospects, the energy begins to transform once you make your move. The paradox is that you can't figure out where you want to go until the new path is revealed. Nevertheless, this dilemma doesn't reduce the likelihood of a significant shift when the radiant Sun enters your sign tomorrow. Big changes are in the air, even if you're unable to see around the bend. Don't try to make something happen today; prioritizing your goals will be a piece of cake once your common sense returns next week.

You might be called upon to respond to an unexpected twist of fate today that tests your confidence. But an unscheduled hiccup won't necessarily ruin your day, since you can turn an upsetting situation into one that is quite enjoyable. Unfortunately, you probably won't see where the day is leading, even if you have a perfect plan in place. Don't worry if it feels like everything is falling apart; your life will reorganize into something better in the next few days. Embrace the chaos as a catalyst for creating positive change.

You may be preoccupied about losing your independence because new responsibilities weigh heavily on your shoulders now. Unfortunately, your energy is scattered all over the place, so it's imperative to find a quiet place and reclaim your center. Your meditation eliminates some of the extraneous noise in your atmosphere and can turn your productivity around. Thankfully, you could be pleasantly surprised how quickly things come together once you remove the unnecessary distractions and focus on the work at hand.

Overcoming an unusual set of complications isn't your idea of a fun-filled weekend, especially when others don't seem to be playing according to your rules of the game. Although confusion isn't usually the source of happiness, an unplanned detour could bring additional freedom that empowers you to respond in new ways. Trusting your intuition now can help you stabilize the imbalanced dynamics and save the day.

A healthy dose of chaos now is not as worrisome as it seems at first. You are on a creative roll, yet could miss the most valuable inspirations if you are too swept up in your own performance. It's crucial to keep your eyes peeled so you can recognize the truth when you see it. It doesn't matter whether or not information is coming from totally unexpected quarters. You are being shown an extreme solution to a problem that doesn't have a normal way out. Take a leap of faith and fly toward your dreams.

Your current dilemma is that logic and practicality won't fix anything now, which doesn't make you happy at all, especially if you're itching for a dramatic transformation. Tread carefully since there is irrepressible movement stimulating tension within a relationship. Don't try to suppress your energy today or it will just be expressed awkwardly by someone else. It's healthiest when change originates from your heart; proactive measures are key to your success.

You're often considered the champions of harmony and grace, but you aren't feeling so accommodating today. Roll with the sudden shifts of energy, even if you have trouble putting your finger on the source of the disruptions. If you can't wrap your mind around an idea someone suggests now, don't judge it too quickly. It's essential to your growth to remain open to radical change and a new perspective offers you a chance to build something real and lasting. Let your sense of humor and curious mind run the show.

Your friends and relatives might seem rigid in their thinking today, possibly prompting you to lose your temper at an inopportune moment. You could regrettably end up making a scene, yelling facts and figures to wake others up to the truth. Don't try to force anyone to see things your way, even if you're thinking about the sacrifices you made and the freedom you gave up. Concentrate on improving the emotional dynamics now and don't focus on any one particular outcome. Keeping your options open encourages everyone else to do the same.

You could be chasing rainbows today, only to see them reappear over another distant hill over and over again. You are standing at one more fork in the road, weary of the disappointments and frustrations. You want to make something magical happen now and you're eager to go places you've never gone. Change is in the air; striking out on the path of adventure greatly improves your chances of actually finding the pot of gold.

Escaping the stress is highly unlikely if you continue to insist on your world being so neat and tidy that everything appears to be under control. However, seeking the safety of stable structures isn't an option today. Whatever you have relied on in the past for self-assurance is now shifting beneath your feet. Fortunately, once you move beyond your fear of the unknown, you may find your journey quite exhilarating. Free your mind and enjoy the ride.

Something may happen that helps to facilitate the changes you want, especially if your life seems unsettled somehow. A close friend could request your assistance, even if you can't deliver what's needed now. Instead of stressing over an impossible situation, explain your limited availability as objectively as you can. Although you might have to manage someone's disappointment today, a compassionate approach should soothe over any ruffled feathers you encounter along the way.

You're eager to swim along with the changing tides now, even if the improvements you seek remain elusive from your grasp. Thankfully, you have a wonderful opportunity to alter your direction if you can remain adaptable to the current power shifts. You inspire others with your faith, especially if you aren't afraid of taking radical action at the right time. Remember, it's the most dramatic gestures that will have the greatest impact today.

Your eagerness is bubbling over now that the Sun has returned to re-energize your sign, even if circumstances in your life are less than optimal. Nevertheless, you could become infatuated with your own reflection without realizing what's  going on. Fortunately, you can untangle your dreams from the actual events of the day with a healthy dose of self-awareness. Ultimately, the truth may not be as perfect as your imagination, but checking in with reality should eliminate most of your potential problems before they can even manifest.

You might jump through hoops today, believing that you're assisting others while your ruling planet Venus conjuncts delusional Neptune in your 11th House of Social Networking. However, you may actually have your own self-interests at heart, rather than being motivated by altruism. But don't waste time questioning your motives. The reason you are doing something isn't as important now as whether or not you are kind in your interactions with others. When in doubt, err on the side of love.

A relationship with a friend is complicated now because you are seeing things through rose-colored glasses. Although your subjective view of reality is biased by your unfulfilled desires, you can easily sidestep trouble today by tempering your unrealistic expectations with critical thinking. You really don't have to be afraid of dreaming as long as you stay aware of the difference between fact and fantasy. Walking in both dimensions is essential for your personal satisfaction.

Your personal standards for sharing your feelings are set at a very high level these days because you don't want to fool yourself into believing that everything is safe if it's not. However, it's quite challenging today to create a healthy balance between expressing the truth and bending it to your advantage. Even if you are tempted to evade a potentially unpleasant situation now, you will be happier if you take enough time to address unresolved issues before they grow out of control.

You may run into an emotional wall today, and although you cannot just keep pushing ahead, it's not sensible to retreat, either. Thankfully, you can imagine an ideal picture of your future and your unwavering focus enables you to create a concrete plan to reach satisfaction. Sharing your ideas provides positive feedback, but ultimately the responsibility to make your dreams come true is yours alone. Don't wait for help that might not arrive; you can perform manifestation magic on your own.

You know what you want to do today and could grow angry with anyone who stands in your way. But even without resistance from others, you might grow confused as you inch closer toward your goals since you can't understand why everything is taking so long to finish. Nevertheless, your current impatience is counterproductive because you have more time than you realize, anyway. It's more important now to keep your faith than to reach your destination.

You are unfazed with the knowledge that there's more work to do before you earn your rewards. Your ruling planet Venus is touched by angelic Neptune today, dangling idealistic fantasies just beyond your reach. On another day you might grow frustrated at your progress, but now you see the plan in motion and you're happy to let it continue to unfold organically. Find a sustainable pace and stick with it. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

You can look far ahead today, unencumbered by your recent past. Your character is strong enough to maintain your focus on the present while also dreaming about your future. Use your creative imagination to set the tone during the next phase of your life. Nevertheless, you can't turn your visions into reality by just thinking about them. Success is not a gift; to accomplish great things, you must be willing to earn them.

Intentionally bending reality enables you to imagine all the possibilities that are waiting in the future. You have a clear aim at whatever you want now, assuming you can conjure up a vivid image of your desires. Just remember that daydreaming isn't the only ingredient to your success; perseverance is also required now. Don't give up on your highest hopes, or you'll never know what might have been possible. Shoot for the Moon; even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

People secretly admire your natural ability to be patient when striving toward accomplishing your goals. Thankfully, you don't have to try too hard now because the magic of the planets is already on your side as you dream about your next adventure. Of course, there still may be real-world obstacles to overcome if you give free rein to your vision. No matter what, don't take your eyes off the prize; it will be yours once you've earned it. The things you work hardest for bring the greatest rewards.

You typically approach something you want with an emotional detachment that may seem odd to others, but this logical strategy enables you to maintain a greater sense of freedom. However, you still might swallow the bait if the object of your desire is enticing enough today. Instead of wasting time and energy struggling to work your way free, avoid headaches by steering clear of the hook right from the start.

Magic unfolds so fast now that you're instantly mesmerized by your lovely daydreams and surreal visions. Delicious Venus hooks up with your key planet Neptune today, transforming simple facts into multicolored streams of cascading fantasies. There's no need to deny yourself the sweet pleasures in the real world or in your imagination; you can always make your way back to reality tomorrow. Dance in the land of enchantment while you have the chance.

The workweek ahead appears to be turning into a stew that gets better and better as it simmers. The Sun and Mercury's visit to your sign inspires you to be at the very top of your game over the next several weeks. The energetic buzz is heating up your imagination, even if the weather is still cool. You can visualize the myriad of possibilities that stretch out in front of you. If the current situation isn't exactly your cup of tea, be courageous and take a few bold steps in the direction of your dreams.

A significant project is drawing to an end, yet this isn't necessarily bad news. Perhaps you were working as part of a team on a major initiative that is finally coming to completion. However, you could be tempted to dig in your heels and hold onto the recent past, especially if you have grown to enjoy the sense of camaraderie. No matter what, you can still share common goals and cultivate a support network; but don't be afraid of heading off to a destination that is more aligned with your own individual needs.

Your career objectives are undergoing a metamorphosis and you must change with the times. You were quite involved recently with your profession or your community, but your drive for success is currently being replaced with a stronger emphasis on family matters and personal dreams. Wrap up loose ends on the job so you can have time to reestablish significant friendships that have fallen to the wayside. Share your hopes for the future with those you trust and bask in the loving support showered upon you.

You might be coerced to directly face an old fear of moving into the future, or memories of the past could hold you back for unknown reasons. Either way, dynamics at work are changing quickly now and you can shift gears with ease when the timing is right. You know what you need to do, so summon up enough courage to ride these emotional tides with awareness and intention, instead of being pulled under by self-doubt. Nothing will stop your pursuit of success if only you believe in yourself.

You may assume you're in a very delicate position now because your heightened sense of vulnerability tosses you one way or another. You could subconsciously react to the current pressures by protecting yourself and hiding your softer side. Unfortunately, this classical defense mechanism only isolates you from loved ones and might even push your closest allies away. On the other hand, you can set the stage for real intimacy by opening up your heart, even if it hurts. The choice is all yours, whether you realize it or not.

It's apparent that you're on the edge of something entirely new today, yet it's too early in the game to see how everything is going to fall into place. Instead of being frightened by the intensity of your emotions, you're intrigued by all the possibilities and thrilled to explore new territory now. Although you excel at knowing how to apply your analytical skills, you may also be required to trust your intuition. Logic is a masterful tool, but it might not be sufficient to get you through these illogical times.

Managing relationship dynamics is an ongoing dance for most socially adept Libras. The action-packed visit of the Sun and interactive Mercury to your 7th House of Partners radiates additional warmth onto nearly everyone in your life. Although you may feel as if your emotional ground is shaky, honest communication can help you regain stability. Luckily, you won't be forced to bring up new topics for discussion today; instead, revisit a recent conversation with an open mind and a forgiving heart.

The details of your life are brought into sharp focus today as the radiant Sun and messenger Mercury shift into your 6th House of Daily Routine. Unfortunately, this dance of tiny steps could be problematic if others find your desire to fine tune reality a bit too obsessive. Remember, there are multiple ways to look at nearly every situation, even if you feel sure about your current perspective. There's no harm in listening to different opinions before making up your mind.

It's not that easy to get your plans off the ground today, even if you're on a creative roll. Although mental Mercury and the willful Sun are  traveling through your 5th House of Self-Expression, they encounter a fair share of resistance now, requiring you to review your ideas and edit your words before speaking them out loud. Paradoxically, your confidence is still running strong. Instead of just giving up, rest assured the outcome will be even better if you're not in a hurry. Perseverance is your friend.

You can sense a change in the energetic tide and you want to capitalize on the shift. You're not one to alter your plans on a whim, but you may be quick to head off in a new direction now if you think there's potential to get ahead of the curve. Nevertheless, you aren't interested in temporary distractions or quick fixes; you seek long-term solutions that will stand the test of time. Work methodically to maximize your chances of success.

All kinds of activities in your immediate environment are placing a heavy burden of demands on you now. If you feel pressured to respond to a developing situation at home or work today, remember that you can't force events to conform to your personal preferences. However, you can change your reactions to the evolving circumstances. It won't hurt to try a radical strategy, especially if the old one isn't really working anymore. Fortune favors the bold.

You might think you're ready to make your move today, but you would be wise to wait a few more days before starting anything new. You may know exactly what you want to do, but your plans won't begin to solidify until later in the week. Be prepared to scale back your goals because you'll be more effective if your coworkers applaud your efforts. Adopting a more conservative approach makes it difficult for others to justify withholding their support.

Finishing your work may be impossible today, especially if you underestimated the size of the job. If you hit a wall now, your first impulse is to rev up your engines and plow ahead while you have the energy. But you could be stuck dealing with mundane responsibilities that are more pressing than your long-term goals. Don't work yourself into a state of high anxiety, for the current resistance will eventually dissipate. Accepting your obligations and reshuffling your priorities accomplishes more than you realize.

You're determined to make progress on your goals today, but your attention may be required in different areas of your life. Although you realize there are many paths for growth, you still grow annoyed if you don't have the freedom to choose which one to take. Rather than chasing your professional dreams, concentrate on more personal aspirations for now. To make your heart happy seek spiritual fulfillment, joy and purpose, not material success.

You might feel as if someone has tied your hands, preventing you from following through with the work that's been assigned to you. Sometimes, you're easily distracted but you're not willing to give up now, since you believe that your persistence will pay off. Be careful not to assign blame to the apparent obstacles. Others may play antagonistic roles in your life, but in the long run their presence will only make you stronger. The greater the resistance, the deeper your satisfaction when you reach your goal.

Your nurturing spirit may be met with indifference now, making you reconsider if being nice is really worth the effort. As much as people might not be appreciative of your contributions today, it's still important to take the high road while coming from a place of love. Happiness will become even more distant if you allow anyone's negativity to subdue your heart. Life is better when you're laughing, especially if it inspires others to join in.

Just as you are beginning to understand how self-restraint can effectively increase your creativity, something happens that tempts you to let go of the controls. You might momentarily think that taking a risk and saying what's on your mind will lead to a communication breakthrough today. However, resisting the urge to loosen your grip will actually sustain your relationships for the long haul. If you are on the right trajectory, slow and steady progress is better now than a mad dash for the finish line.

Your smile is big now, fooling others into forgetting how serious you are while you keep them off guard with your easygoing attitude. Still, behind your happy face, you're just as cautious and critical as ever, working to tie up each and every loose end. But there's really nothing to be gained from struggling today, for no matter how hard you try to appear a model of perfection, you simply can't control everything. Choose your battles wisely and preemptively let some of the details go.

Opposition comes from others today, apparently because you're the one pushing the group into new territory. However, just because you can see the big picture better than anyone else, people are not willing to blindly follow your lead. Take your time and share all the information you have at your disposal. It really doesn't pay to keep anything to yourself now; when everyone knows what you know, then they will eagerly go along with your plan.

You're searching for a new wave of illumination in your life. But your attention may need to be temporarily redirected as real world responsibilities get in the way of your metaphysical meanderings. You have recently survived a few years of hard work and character testing where you didn't have much time for contemplation. Although the tables have turned, you still need to respect common sense. Nevertheless, your friends and coworkers can inspire you when you need it. As the mystic poet Rumi wrote, "Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames."

The motivational power of your key planet Jupiter often inspires you to face life with great enthusiasm. However, stern Saturn moving through high-minded Sagittarius is raining on your parade now and confronting you with one reason after another to wave the white flag. Although your optimism can lead you astray, it's not useful if you succumb to the illusions of negativity. Adjust your sights to take reality into consideration and then slip back into gear. Your relentless efforts will bring rewards, even if delayed.

Although your energy level is returning to normal, you may be daunted by the commitments you made. Exuberant Jupiter is taunting your key planet Saturn, encouraging you to take on more work than intended. But don't waste energy worrying if you can deliver the goods. Just narrow your focus and get on with the tasks at hand. Even if you aren't performing up to your own exacting standards, no one can fault you if you give it your best.

You must stand up to an individual powerhouse today as someone tries to block your forward movement. However, confident Jupiter is on your side and you should be able to easily overcome any resistance as long as you don't overstate your position. Your best strategy is to seek a way to stay on your present course without turning an opponent into an enemy. Instead of doing battle with each other, seek common ground so you can ultimately work together for the highest good.

Your vision is vast now and others seem to just expand your perspective even more. Buoyant Jupiter is your traditional ruling planet, yet it doesn't feel so great today when it runs into taskmaster Saturn. On a deeper level, someone in control can block your path, even as you're being lured into the distant future. If you are insisting on yes while your boss is saying no, rethink your plans before continuing on your journey. As Lao Tzu wrote, "Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished."

Describing what you see is challenging while communicator Mercury is swallowed by the Libra Lunar Eclipse in your 7th House of Others. Your confidence is high, but others may not be able to meet you halfway on your plan if you come off too arrogantly today. Although you might prefer everyone to follow your agenda, it's not wise to push to get your way. Don't fret if your message isn't getting across now. Instead, take a deep breath, gather your thoughts, and then try again once the energy settles down. Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.

Making progress on your long-term goals is a walk in the park when all the details fall into place. Nevertheless, something still seems a bit off as the Libra Full Moon Eclipse rattles your 6th House of Minutiae. Although you understand that it may be prudent to keep your discomfort quiet, you also worry that the opportunity for improvement could fade if you don't speak up right away. Nevertheless, it's smarter to smile and save your words for another day when your audience will be more receptive to your feedback.

You're on your best behavior today because you know that your unrestrained shenanigans could interfere with opportunities for pleasure. Nevertheless, the Libra Full Moon Eclipse polarizes your 5th House of Play, encouraging you to get into mischief anyhow.
