You might believe your friends will cut you some slack now, but tiptoeing around the real issues will only annoy them when they see through your charming antics. Instead of simply seeking a good time, balance your lighthearted spirit with a serious approach to your relationships.

You might choose to distract your attention from a vulnerable spot by starting a new project around the house. In fact, you could be so effective with this evasive tactic that you alleviate the tension for a while. The strategic Libra Lunar Eclipse occurring in your 4th House of Home and Family triggers familiar issues regarding childhood insecurities. But you can't escape completely today; the sooner you face your emotions, the sooner everyone will begin to feel better. True healing takes courage and compassion.

You're motivated by your personal need to know everyone's business while the Libra Lunar Eclipse shakes up your 3rd House of Information today. Simultaneously, you may become so preoccupied with an impractical idea that it can turn into an obsession. However, your desire for a bit of adventure leaves you little time to get involved with another person's drama. Distractions are not your friend; concentrate on the most immediate situations and then apply what you learn toward reaching your goals. There are no shortcuts to success.

Balancing your personal desires with your available funds could lead you to the conclusion that you're not in any position to buy something you don't really need. Money issues are emphasized while the Libra Full Moon Eclipse activates your 2nd House of Finances. You might realize that your old values are out of sync with your current aspirations now. There's no hurry, so step slowly into your future. If you move at your own pace, you can reestablish fiscal integrity sooner than you think.

Maintaining a peaceful relationship life is highly unlikely while the pleasure-seeking Libra Full Moon encounters several combative planets in the sign of Aries. The emotional drama might be more meaningful if there was someone special with whom you could share your experience. However, you may not have the patience to cultivate open lines of communication today. Don't lose hope when it comes to love; you could be in for a sweet surprise when you least expect it.

You might be quite certain about the intimacy you're currently seeking, but an enticing opportunity could disappear upon closer analysis. The imbalanced Libra Full Moon Eclipse is like an emotional time bomb in your 12th House of Secrets, preventing you from reaching satisfaction. Don't attempt to resolve any decisions too quickly. If you take the time to talk about what you want, the right person may be eager to follow your lead. Author Brene Brown wrote, "Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen."

You could place such inflated expectations on your friends that you just assume they'll come through for you today, although they might not actually meet your idealistic standards. Meanwhile, you're distracted with interpersonal politics while the Libra Full Moon Eclipse in your 11th House of Groups opposes the Sun and Mercury in your 5th House of Creativity. Concentrate your intentions on expressing yourself now instead of worrying about others. Satisfaction is more readily achieved when you actively pursue your own self-interests.

You know exactly what you must do to come through for the people who depend on you. The Libra Full Moon Eclipse accentuates your 10th House of Public Status, enabling you to focus your mind like a laser light on whatever must be coerced into place to reach your professional objectives. Nevertheless, tread lightly today; if you are overconfident of your position, your current self-promotional scheme could backfire and leave you with a mess on your hands. Your best contribution is your honest commitment to be as present as possible now when interacting with others.

You enjoy visualizing how you will live in years ahead, but your daydreaming could be rather distracting to everyone else today. However, the energy-balancing Libra Lunar Eclipse falls in your 9th House of Adventure, encouraging you to keep a foot in the future while stabilizing the other one in the here and now. Widening your perspective enables you to maintain your unflagging vision for a better tomorrow while avoiding unrealistic idealism in the process.

Your most pressing dilemma today is how to strike a workable balance between simplicity and complexity. You desire all the creature comforts of being in a relationship, but you might not be eager to pay the emotional price while the Libra Lunar Eclipse shakes up your 8th House of Intimacy. Consider the consequences of unrestrained ambitions to avoid complications later on. Let your love light shine brightly by setting aside personal desires now in the name of harmony.

You're eager to take the most direct path to your goals now and consciously try to avoid the emotional distractions that others present along the way. Although concentration may not come naturally, you could benefit from a concerted effort to stay focused today. Exercising self-discipline is much more effective than following someone else's command to obey the rules. Accept your responsibilities as a challenge; you will earn respect if you stick to the program and fulfill your commitments.

Someone at work might disappoint you today, making you feel betrayed at first. Nevertheless, the Moon's presence in your 6th House of Routine urges you to respond in a stabilizing manner, regardless of your initial reaction. Let go of any habitual emotional responses because there is an opportunity to make changes now that ultimately increase your security rather than jeopardizing it. Reassessing what you want from a professional relationship is a good place to start.

Your positive attitude makes all the difference in the world today, especially if your job duties aren't very satisfying. Your rewards will arrive in the future if you tackle the toughest chores now. But it's not in your best interest to go against the grain or to buck the system. Even if you believe you know a superior way to run things, you're better off following the tried-and-true path. Acquiesce to those in authority until you complete your obligations. Put on a happy face and your work will be finished before you know it.

Channeling your excess energy into your work today goes a long way on the road to recognition. However, the ambivalent Libra Moon's presence in your 4th House of Home and Family begs you to step back and take a long-term view of your life. Instead of blindly trying to get ahead in your chosen career, consider the impact of the demands of the job on your domestic life. Chasing your ambitions comes with a cost. Sometimes success and money have nothing in common.

Oddly enough, meeting your obligations could lead to a romantic opportunity today or, at least, an enjoyable encounter. You might be overly cautious about observing social boundaries, but don't entirely rule out the possibility of becoming more personal with an acquaintance. Just remember, flirtatious behavior won't work in your favor now, even if your intentions are honorable. A friendly gesture is sufficient to get your message across. Then, patiently wait to see what develops before making your next move.

Sometimes you need someone to persuade you to join the party, but you usually have fun once you say yes. However, you may do well to pass on the social invitation now that cerebral Mercury is harmonizing with Mars in your 4th House of Emotional Security. Naturally, you still want to enjoy yourself, but a contemplative state of mind suggests that an evening at home alone or with your immediate family would be more in sync with your mood. Carving out a bit of quality time for yourself today gives you the chance to reconnect with your creative self.

You might offer your best ideas to others today, but people may assume you're meddling in their affairs. It doesn't matter if your motives are well-meaning; someone's casual comment could be perceived as serious criticism. Go out of your way to express your admiration; gentle encouragement, along with your suggestions, gives your advice a better chance of being heard now. Your kindness will be appreciated more than you know.

The current emphasis on your financial picture heats up while Mercury trines energetic Mars, now traveling through your 2nd House of Personal Resources. If you are thinking about making a significant purchase, consider the long-term value of your potential acquisition. If it's not a good bargain, let it go or try to negotiate a price that sweetens the deal for you. Remember, there's an important difference between something you want and something you actually need.

It's time to focus your attention on your own needs for a while by setting limits on your social activities and commitments. Practicing moderation makes you more effective in all that you do today and could even simplify your life. You're wildly tempted to start something new, but it's still wiser to wait a few more days before forging ahead. Rather than scattering your energy now, concentrate on the steps needed to reach your personal goals.

You may need to modify your plans today due to circumstances beyond your control. And even if you don't have to change your schedule, it's still possible to lose your cool when something throws you off balance. Naturally, remaining light on your feet helps you maintain your adaptability, for an unexpected turn of events might be a blessing in disguise. Luckily, you could be released from an unwanted obligation and end up having more time to yourself. Stay calm and keep your sense of humor close at hand.

Your friends try to include you in their big plans today, but you're not so quick to follow the crowd. Macho Mars and somber Saturn are in disagreement as to how you should handle their presence in your 11th House of Networking. Nevertheless, a little common sense is required when it comes to socializing now. Don't be so quick to compromise your integrity if you are feeling reclusive. Acknowledge your personal needs by graciously declining the invitation and create an evening just for you. Honor your desires and be gentle with your heart.

Someone's marvelous idea might catch your attention today, but it's wise to think long and hard before committing personal resources and lending a helping hand. It may sound like an amazing project at first, but will likely morph into more of a burden than you want to undertake now. Nevertheless, if you reject a colleague's plan, take extra time to explain your decision so your refusal doesn't generate any hurt feelings. The smallest amount of conscious diplomacy can solve a large problem before it even manifests.

Pursuing pleasure sounds like a good idea, but it can be disconcerting if you're feeling anxious about meeting everyone's expectations today. However, you could simply declare this a welcome day of rest, especially if you have been working hard and responsibly attending to your chores. Give yourself permission to indulge your senses while you have the chance. True happiness comes from appreciating your blessings in the present moment.

You might not be overly interested in doing the right thing today, even if you are sternly reminded to finish your chores. Flirty Venus opposes jovial Jupiter in your playful 5th House of Romance, motivating you to rattle up some fun wherever the opportunity arises. But ignoring your obligations now might lead to unpleasant consequences. Consider the ramifications of your actions before you stir up an avoidable mess. Maximize your creativity by setting yourself up for success.

You're pulled in two distinctly different directions today, but there's no need to resolve this all-too-familiar dilemma right away. On one hand, you feel a growing sense of urgency to express what's on your mind. On the other hand, you want to sidestep any complications now so you can relax in peace. Even if pleasant events distract you from what you originally intended to do, there really isn't any harm in having fun as long as you know how far you can push your limits.

Someone might not come through for you today in the way you expect. You must pay meticulous  attention to every little thing that's happening now because you can easily convince yourself that your life is better than it truly is. You're tempted to overstep boundaries and may even end up regretting your lack of discretion, unless you're wise enough to restrain your blind enthusiasm. Make decisions based on the rules of reality instead of what you wish to be true. The truth will set you free.

A synchronistic confluence of circumstances creates a perfect day for you Lions to purr and play like carefree kittens. Although it's a cat's job to sleep in the afternoon sunshine, your current laziness is not an excuse to escape from your responsibilities. Nevertheless, you still can have a wonderful time as long as you don't overdo it. Balancing work and play may be extra-challenging now, but it's the key to finding personal satisfaction.

Although you may secretly worry that your strategy won't lead to success today, you are likely to go ahead with your plans, anyhow. Your uncharacteristic indecision might have you playing the waiting game at first, but your confidence builds until you're motivated to take a risk in your search for love. It's easier to believe someone who encourages you to follow your heart's desire now than to face the facts. Nevertheless, a quick reality check does more to ensure your emotional gratification than leaping before you look.

Your resistance to participating in a fun adventure today may originate from your natural instinct to nurture others instead of yourself. Although wanting those you love to feel cherished is an admirable trait, you can take your good intentions too far and possibly even discourage yourself in the process. You might end up resenting the very people you are trying to please unless you honor your own needs first. Practicing enlightened self-interest sets a better example for everyone in the long-run.

Unavoidable obligations continue to stack up, making it difficult to kick back and chill today. Nevertheless, your desire for sensual pleasure is quite strong now that jolly Jupiter is activating indulgent Venus -- and you can't fathom any reason to deny your cravings. Just be careful to watch the quantity of food and drink you consume, the money you spend or the love you promise since you can inadvertently overdo anything that makes you feel good. Applying a touch of moderation is a healthy strategy when you attempt to experience the finer things in life.

Following the expected rules of behavior is no simple matter today. Although you can normally stay on track if it's part of a larger plan, you're intrigued by the alternatives now. However, you're more enamored with your own original ideas, rather than the contributions of anyone else. Unfortunately, you might be so gung ho about the big picture that you don't see the problem staring you in the face. Step back to consider what could go wrong before a minor complication becomes a major dilemma. Success favors the prepared.

You may believe you have waited long enough to get what you want. However, voracious Venus forms a tense opposition to permissive Jupiter today, making it temporarily difficult to manage your desires. There's no harm in harboring this perspective as long as you don't go too far defending your self-indulgence. It's okay to enjoy an extra dessert or a lingering flirtation if you're so inclined, but think twice about exhibiting a brazen disregard for sensible limits unless you're willing to suffer the consequences.

You could be nearing a point of exhaustion today, and don't want to spend your entire day trying to meet everyone else's expectations. You're eager to break the mold of responsibility while letting others fend for themselves. It's time to satisfy your own needs by doing something memorable. Your previous commitments can be better fulfilled after you take some quality time for yourself. Pull out your bucket list and choose an item that makes your heart skip a beat.

You possess an uncommon knack for turning a fleeting conversation into a long-winded philosophical debate today. Or, maybe you transform a minor crush into a major romance because everything is taking on bigger-than-life proportions now. Of course, you should delight in this sweet phase while your key planet Jupiter inspires beautiful Venus. Don't worry if you waste the day engaging in pleasant social interactions and have little to show for it, except for fond memories. Follow your bliss and see who follows.

You're fearless today, confident that your pet plan will be successful while the radiant Sun harmonizes with your ruling planet Mars. You are blessed with an abundance of energy and are willing to pace yourself so you don't end up exhausted. Following your regular routine will work in your favor as long as you aren't distracted by something trivial. Consciously utilize the sweet connection between your head and your heart, but don't assume your dreams will come true right away. Sometimes the best things take a while to manifest. Stay humble and press on.

You possess a high level of stamina today and therefore can play at the top of your game. But you might grow restless if you're required to focus on too many details at once. You typically don't mind being practical as long as you can see that you're making progress. However, boredom quickly sets in if obstacles slow you down too much. Nevertheless, stick to your initial plan since impulsive actions will only complicate matters now. Determination and hard work bring a well-deserved victory.

Although listening to someone else's story is more interesting than dealing with your own issues today, it's clear that this harmless diversion is partly an evasive tactic. Actually, another person's dilemma could hit very close to home, leading you back to the very thing you were trying to avoid. If a discussion brings up a subject you would prefer to ignore, push through your fear anyway. Remaining open to a potentially uncomfortable topic now allows you to learn something positive from it.

Minimizing your emotions can be tricky business today, since your feelings appear to be spilling over into your actions. Thankfully, you really don't want to keep secrets any longer and just need the right moment to speak your truth. Nevertheless, anything you do now could have a long-lasting impact on the people closest to you. Err on the side of caution when it comes to declarations of the heart. Although you can blurt out your perspective without much thought, others may treat your words as the ultimate truth.

Sometimes you are so crystal clear about your agenda that everyone knows exactly what's on your mind. Even if your message creates conflict, you're usually courageously open about who you are and what you feel. However, be mindful and remember to keep some things to yourself today. Although it takes extra effort to stay quiet, you will benefit in the long run from exercising thoughtful disclosure now rather than spilling the beans all at once. Discretion is your secret weapon for relationship success.

No matter what complications make your life difficult, the resistance is finally fading and you are standing at the threshold of taking a giant leap forward. Thankfully, today's harmonious alignment between action-hero Mars and the willful Sun in your 8th House of Deep Sharing is a harbinger of good news. If everything is going well, your life should only continue to improve. Let go of the past by turning the power of now into a positive strategy for a successful future.

Always knowing what to do with your emotions isn't as simple as it sounds. In fact, it can be downright discouraging when you must rein in your feelings and connect them to a specific event. You might not be able to fit your actions into a current social context today, even if your plan seems logical. Recognizing that you don't understand all the relationship issues at play helps you to reclaim your objectivity. Continue to methodically work toward your goals rather than wasting energy overreacting to circumstances out of your control.

You're absolutely certain your perceptions are on target today, since your natural ability to keep things real in a relationship is one of your greatest strengths. You'll do whatever it takes to reach your goals as the bright Aries Sun trines brave Mars traveling through your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. This isn't a cosmic permission slip to fly off into fantasyland, but a constructive excursion into your imagination may be exactly what you need now. Visualizing the most amazing possibilities inspires you to stretch beyond life's current limitations.

Your enthusiasm about your future makes you believe that you can do nearly anything now. Convincing you to sign onto an extra project is a piece of cake, and luckily, your unrelenting determination enables you to accomplish things that would be impossible on another day. You might as well aim for the stars today, since your chances for success are as good as they get. Focus on the right target or you will end up reaching the wrong destination.

You're like a well-nurtured seedling today; thankfully, you have the support you need in order to pursue your destiny. Additionally, you possess enough energy to finish your work and still have time left over to relax. Nevertheless, it's still advisable to complete as much as you can in the morning because you could lose focus as the day unfolds. If in doubt, push yourself to accomplish more; you'll be glad later on that you did. Growth is the only evidence of life.

Someone might attempt to coerce you into making a commitment you can't fulfill. However, you may harbor very real concerns that you prefer keeping to yourself now. Although relationships can grow quite complicated today, clear communication goes a long way toward reestablishing manageable boundaries. Let others know your limits; this encounter is your chance to regain stability as long as you don't promise too much. Your word is your wand.

You feel maxed out now and need some time to revitalize your emotional batteries. You know what's good for you and aren't shy about putting the necessary pieces in place to make the day go your way. However, your friends and relatives want to share their unsolicited advice for your growth and prosperity. Their intentions are well-meaning, but you're better off listening to  your heart instead of following someone else's vision. Be grateful for the love and support  offered to you, but remain resolute on your own path.

Maintaining a positive outlook gains the admiration of others today, but even your best efforts will fail if you are avoiding an important issue. There's really no viable alternatives other than being brutally honest now. Pretending that everything is fine just increases the tension. Distorting the facts won't lead you to where you want to go, so take a few deep breaths to center yourself and then simply speak from your heart. Integrity is choosing your words based on the truth rather than potential personal gain.

Your friendly attitude is contagious today. Normally, your personality warms up to others slowly and steadily, although your loyalty is legendary once you establish an emotional bond. However, you're eager to do away with the surface chit-chat, jump in and make something special happen without going through all the proper channels. Thankfully, your spontaneous affection opens the doors to a memorable experience as long as you remain attuned to the present moment.

You may be lost in contemplation, dreaming about your plans with great intensity and concern; nevertheless, people might not even notice your struggle now. However, you could become quite irked if someone doesn't acknowledge your feelings today, especially if you have taken the time to explain them. Don't dwell on what others think; your routine will likely shift back to normal by tomorrow. In the meantime, what's most important is that you have faith in yourself.

When the storm tides of emotions rise, you ocean-friendly Crabs happily go about your business. You're pleased to be back in the sea where you feel safe now that the Moon is visiting watery Scorpio. However, others might not perceive any differences in your behavior because you are adept at hiding your true feelings. Nevertheless, relaxing your boundaries with a friend you trust encourages you to take a significant relationship to the next level. As Rumi wrote, "Love is the bridge between you and everything."

You might appear to be overly moody today, especially if your emotions contradict your intentions. Others can mistakenly believe your current irritability originates from a sticky situation that isn't working out as you expected. Nevertheless, the source of your stress is a familiar contradiction between your head and your heart. It makes sense now to retreat peacefully while you can; fortunately, spending time on your own helps you reclaim your center of balance.

You may be preoccupied with family matters or domestic responsibilities today, but others still see you as more upbeat than you actually feel. Your optimism is readily discernible, even if you're experiencing tugs of self-doubt. You're determined to move away from emotional vulnerability and lean toward the analytical realms where you can gain more control. But instead of trying to circumvent the uncertainty, explore the colorful range of your emotions. You will be richer in wisdom for having the courage to delve into the realms of your heart.

You can quickly skip right over a controversial issue now because you're an expert at transforming uncomfortable situations into pleasant experiences. Nevertheless, there may be mixed messages heading your way, making it more complicated to know which direction to turn. Ultimately, you want to be gracious, but your feelings might be too intense to hide. Don't fake it for the sake of false harmony; covering up your real emotions isn't necessary. In fact, you can free yourself from an old fear if you take a chance and say what's on your mind.

You're prepared to step out on the edge in order to make positive changes in a relationship today. Your current confidence puts others at ease, potentially inspiring them to open their hearts. You might even feel as if you're sitting on top of the world, enabling you to express the intensity of the Scorpio Moon without the negativity that often accompanies emotional self-expression. Watch the signs so you know when your audience reaches its limit. Your extreme reactions are a blessing in disguise as long as you don't take yourself too seriously.

Your intuition won't lead you astray today unless you try to sidestep any controversial subjects. If you're not paying attention to the emotional flow, someone with a less carefree attitude might just have something crucial to teach you. Consider volunteering at a retirement home, hospital or a community event where you have the opportunity to interact with people who are less fortunate than you. Deep satisfaction will be your reward if you simply take time to connect with others who can benefit from your positive outlook on life.

Your day off may be so tightly scheduled that it doesn't leave you much breathing room. This kind of structure might bother many people, but you thrive in the security of knowing what you must do. Nevertheless, everything doesn't necessarily progress according to your preconceived plan today, especially if you discover something more interesting than your original agenda. Cut yourself some slack and pursue your heart's desire now, even if it changes during the day. It's better to bend than to break.

Enjoying yourself may be challenging today, especially if you feel trapped by previous commitments. However, getting annoyed with others is pointless, even if they appear to be preventing you from following your bliss. Shift the energy by finding ways to let off some steam, so your unexpressed anger doesn't transform into resentment. When you stop blaming everyone else, you can finally begin to discover what truly makes you happy.

Strong waves of emotions are building within you, motivating you to accomplish a lot now. All you need to do is figure out a clever way to harness the energy. If you're feeling confused by the uncertainties ahead, don't miss this cosmic opportunity to settle your nerves today. There's no reason to be entangled by what you don't know. Instead, visualize your most idealistic scenario for the future, color in every detail and then behave as if your dreams are real.

Although no one seems to fully understand what you need now, others will ultimately support you on your current journey rather than throwing up  roadblocks. Don't assume that people are resisting your unorthodox ideas because they aren't enthusiastic about your plans; they just might not want to be actively involved. If you believe you're on the right track, demonstrate your courage by moving ahead on your own, no matter what anyone else says. Those who fly solo have the strongest wings.

Knowing what others are thinking is less important to you today. In fact, the best answers might arrive out of the blue when you are alone. Electric sparks of awareness are shooting through the dark as Venus and the Moon activate brilliant Uranus in your 12th House of Solitude. But don't rely on your memory to recall a sudden breakthrough. Instead, write your thoughts down as soon as you can and revisit them later when you have the time to integrate your vision with your reality.

You are feeling an intellectual buzz today, but you still may face a few challenges as you try to keep up with others. Although you are usually curious about someone else's ideas, you could be hopelessly stuck on an ingenious one of your own now. Nevertheless, it's not time to put up unnecessary resistance; if a coworker reveals a plan with potential, quickly jump on board and make the most of the moment. Open your mind before your mouth.

The emotional safety net that offered you reassurance in the past seems to be missing in action today, leaving you no choice but to take control of your destiny. Circumstances are up in the air and you don't want to miss the chance to soar on the strong thermal currents. Although you might get off to a slow start, you can't help but enjoy your newfound freedom even if it means that you need to establish your own limits. Create a new routine gradually; there's no reason to do everything all at once.

You're interested in deepening an existing relationship today or you might choose to throw in the towel and head off into the unknown. Instead of interacting with your friends and coworkers as you have in the past, explore unconventional ways to add more excitement to your life. Although personal obligations continue to demand your attention, you should be able to wrap up loose ends quickly if you make an honest effort. Experimenting is fine as long as you don't cross any lines.

You take your goals quite seriously today as you begin to detach your desires from anything or anyone that ties you down. However, the freedom to express yourself on your own terms is a privilege that might take a while to earn. Don't be discouraged if your progress is uneven; it's better to build momentum gradually when trying to create radical change. Your quest for independence is a personal journey only you can take.

Your relationship world might be confusing today because you are longing to play in the realm of romance but have trouble reading the signs. The conflicting signals may be enough to prevent you from following through with your original intentions. Initiating action too soon can sour a situation that has great potential, tangling the feelings of those involved into a complex web. Be wise and wait until this evening when the cosmic forces conspire with your fantasies about love.

The most skillful sailors are the masters of their ships, and can set a course against the challenging winds. This is your chance to demonstrate your knowledge of navigational techniques. But don't waste your energy doing combat with the emotional tides for no reason. Instead, plan a route that enables you to avoid the tumultuous currents now. Once you have time to relax and catch your breath, it will be much easier to continue on your way with renewed enthusiasm.

Applying what you have already learned this year can seem like an uphill battle, but, luckily, if your first idea doesn't work, you have plenty more up your sleeve. Unfortunately, your mind is moving much faster than reality, and you could become frustrated as you wait for events to catch up to your thoughts. Nevertheless, your patience is about to be rewarded while the Moon visits your uplifting sign. Make as much progress as you can during the next couple of days when the cosmic winds are blowing in your favor.

Your frustration rises to the surface today as the pace of change increases. You don't mind having a lot to do, but readjusting to new circumstances can quickly tire you out. You're not happy if each and every activity opens yet another can of worms. You may reach a point when you realize there is too much happening all at once. But don't crawl under a rock and hide; finding the humor in the situation helps you regain your perspective. Your confidence returns later in the day, empowering you to move forward once again.

A host of exciting activities leaves you little downtime today, and you love the current variety of distractions. However, everything can get a bit crazy as wild Uranus agitates sweet Venus in your 2nd House of Values. Although you're happy to be in your element, you can't keep up the hectic pace forever. Take time to smell the flowers and reconsider your priorities. Once you have a chance to regroup, you'll be eager to jump back into the fray, refreshed and raring to go.

Waiting for the most propitious moment to take action can be irritating because you're ready to execute your plan right away. You really don't see how you gain any sort of tactical advantage by delaying until the Moon connects with impulsive Mars in your 10th House of Career. Fortunately, there is no harm in starting immediately; it's just that your current efforts will have more enduring consequences if you consciously build your momentum gradually. Trust the process; good things take time.

You're itching to rush out of the starting gate, but circumstances delay your progress until you put a concrete plan into place. Thankfully, you can deftly think through the alternative contingencies while under pressure and map out your strategy. But don't let logic limit your options; it's smarter now to combine a rational approach with your visionary ideas. Giving up too soon won't work in your favor; however, your unwavering commitment to reach your goal is currently your ticket to success.

Practicing self-discipline is crucial today because you will struggle unnecessarily if you try to overextend your limits. Nevertheless, opportunities abound to finish whatever you start if you establish attainable goals and then focus only on the most essential tasks. Positive thinking is a definite plus as long as you don't assume that your attitude is the only thing that matters. Intention plus hard work leads to a gratifying sense of accomplishment.

Your ability to rationalize is so amplified now that you could be the victim of your own cleverness. Mischievous Mercury is working overtime today, stimulating conversations to smooth over the rough spots in your life. Be careful not to dance around an unpleasant discussion now because denial can backfire and strain the relationship dynamics later on. Believe it or not, running from the truth is a lot tougher than facing it squarely in the eye.

You excel at communicating your feelings today, but unfortunately, even your closest friends might not fully understand your perspective. The problem is that certain complex emotions don't fit into language; a nuance can be lost in translation unless everyone understands the motivation behind your words. Remember that your behavior also speaks loudly, so make sure your actions are consistent with the message you're trying to get across.

Although your insecurities might not be apparent, you're still concerned with the emotional response of your coworkers today. Unfortunately, your non-disclosure strategy is ineffective if you try to hide your anxiety by being purposefully vague. However, it's healthier to share as much information as possible, even if you must do it in bite-size pieces. Your associates are willing to help you even more if they are fully informed. Thankfully, there's no need to carry your burden alone.

You could probably get away with sloppy thinking today as long as you don't let the situation grow out of hand. Authoritative Saturn is beaming a stabilizing energy to your key planet Mercury, enabling you to improve your game while maintaining a sense of control. Thankfully, your allies will cut you some slack now if your logic momentarily falters. Remain true to your spirit and let your imagination run wild and free.

You are adept at minimizing your needs to make a situation more pleasant for someone else. However, you could go overboard today, trying to remedy an emotional problem that's not your responsibility. Nosing around in other people's business rarely helps anyone, but you can still be a true friend by listening and showing your support. Caring for those you love is a gift as long as you remember to maintain healthy boundaries.

Your emotional and spiritual needs are complex, often prompting you to keep them to yourself. However, your aspirations are wildly vivid and wonderfully specific now, and you may be hesitant to reveal your inner process. But there's no reason to close yourself off completely today; confiding in another person can help you process your feelings and deepen your relationship. Give yourself permission to wait until you're ready to share your colorful fantasies with someone you trust.

You're submerged in a sea of deep thoughts now, but you don't want to go public with your feelings just yet. Nevertheless, you might come across flippantly -- as if your emotions aren't very important -- especially when you talk about them in an offhand manner. Ironically, you may believe that changes are occurring, even if nothing obvious is happening today. Be courageous and seek your voice. Take a risk and reveal your heart.

Although living up to your responsibilities is nothing new for you, taking care of business quickly fills up your schedule today. In spite of your ambitious agenda, you still might believe that you can pack another activity into your day. Unfortunately, even the time you set aside for exercise or relaxation is rapidly disappearing now. Thankfully, you can prevent your plans from falling apart by making smart choices early in the day. Less is more.

You may feel strange if a casual conversation at work suddenly turns personal today. You might overreact, provoking you to say more than you would normally share and inspiring a real heart-to-heart connection. Although it could feel great at first, the mood likely grows awkward as the discussion continues. Don't be afraid to push past your comfort zone or you can undo the potentially positive consequences of breaking down an unspoken and unnecessary boundary.

It's so tempting to slip into an invisible caretaker role today because you are so empathic when it comes to the feelings of those you admire. It may be a real challenge to avoid playing the role of a martyr now, but giving away too much of yourself too quickly and transform compassion into resentment in the blink of an eye. Fortunately, you can truly help those you love in the long run if you remember to maintain healthy boundaries when opening your heart.

You're ecstatic about sharing your ideas today, expecting others to either wholeheartedly agree with you or just keep their opinions to themselves. But even if you are on the right track, your know-it-all approach could upset people who are threatened by your apparent lack of humility. Fortunately, you can quickly smooth out potential bumps in the road before you reach them by simply softening your tone. When you don't take yourself so seriously, others will follow your lead. A healthy dose of self-deprecation is your secret weapon of persuasion.

It seems as if someone is trying to coerce you into accepting more responsibilities than you want now, but you might be unable to say no without causing static. Your resistance may stir up more negativity than just swallowing your pride and doing what's expected of you. But don't be too self-critical if it's a struggle to get motivated today. However, once your head is in the game, keep up the pace and follow through on whatever you start. Satisfaction will be yours for a job well done.

Being open-minded should be easy today, especially if the weight of responsibility is lifted from your shoulders, taking your self-doubt with it. However, reality gets in one last punch that could land you in a challenging situation if you unwittingly start a discussion that pushes people's buttons. You may end up unleashing more emotional drama than you intended. Nevertheless, sticking with the process should lead to a resolution sooner than you think. As coach Vince Lombardi said, "A quitter never wins and a winner never quits."

There are specific activities you would prefer to be doing now and you're not interested in waiting for someone's approval. However, your current impatience might exacerbate a fundamental disagreement between you and a coworker. Thankfully, it can be healing to discuss issues that you have been avoiding for the sake of convenience. There is no reason to shy away from a sensitive topic as long as you don't shift the blame to anyone else and take responsibility for your feelings. An atmosphere of mutual respect cultivates trust.

You are on an energetic roll, but your intensity can land you in trouble today. Even if it seems like the big pieces are falling into place, you still may push harder than is necessary. Unfortunately, your eagerness could provoke others to resist your progress if you're trying to make up for lost time. Someone might even attempt to dull your sparkle just to bring you down a notch. Luckily, a bit of conscious constraint on your part now will ameliorate any bad feelings that surface. The trick is to shine your light without overshadowing the group.

You wish you could keep your feelings quiet today, but someone might lure you into their personal melodrama without warning. Unfortunately, you can lose your temper so quickly that you don't even realize what's happening until the deed is done. It's completely unnecessary to turn a difficult interaction into a major crisis by dwelling on your anger. Take the high road; let it go and move on.

Everyone's attention appears to be directed toward someone else today, but your feelings need to be acknowledged, too. Typically, you thrive on being supportive of your friends and coworkers, but now you realize you must stand up for yourself. Say whatever is required to make your wishes known. Although you might not reach satisfaction by being fully recognized, at least you will feel satisfied that you attempted to reestablish balance in a relationship. Don't be afraid of failing; be afraid of not trying.

You can't help but grow agitated if someone seems to hurry you along today. You might choose to deliberately postpone your forward progress for a while in order to assimilate all the recent changes. Nevertheless, it's not always possible to avoid your current commitments. People are counting on you to do your part, so you may need to wait another day or two before pursuing your own ambitions. Fulfilling your obligations leads to the freedom you seek.

These are exciting times, but you could be so steadfast in your beliefs now that you waste energy defending your position. Instead of worrying about the future, try experiencing the present. Thankfully, you can sidestep an unnecessary conflict today by toning down your rhetoric. A sweeping generalization or an unsubstantiated accusation might do more harm than good. Be persistent in the pursuit of your goals and flexible in your methods.

Although you might be preoccupied with a personal problem today, the actual situation probably isn't as critical as you think. Your current emotional insecurity can unexpectedly overwhelm your rational outlook, tempting you to run home to hide away from everyone's judgmental glances. But the real message now is about holding your ground rather than throwing in the towel. Write your own script instead of playing a part in someone else's movie.

Consider ditching your previous plans and starting from scratch today. Acting in a totally spontaneous manner empowers you to be extremely creative and, ultimately, more productive than following a preconceived agenda. Don't be concerned with what others think about your rebellious behavior now, even if you face emotional objections to your new strategy. The discussion might grow heated in the moment, but you will be happier in the long run if you structure your schedule to reflect your own needs and not acquiesce to anyone else's.

Developing an amazing idea just isn't enough to make your day memorable; you must include others in your planning now or you won't have the resources to reach your goals. Everything could fall apart at the seams if you don't involve your friends or coworkers. Nevertheless, discussing the alternatives with your peers prior to making a final decision improves the odds for your success. Fight against the tide and don't act impulsively today; listen to the feedback you receive before deciding how best to proceed.

Your focus is internally directed today, even if your day is filled with a variety of activities. You might not be able to relax, yet the notion of withdrawing from your commitments and taking it easy is still quite appealing. Whatever happens next originates as a thought, and you are relatively free to conjure up anything you choose within your imagination. Put your fantasies to work by filling your mind with new possibilities that move your life forward in a positive direction.

Unexpected events can shock you out of your sleepy reverie today. Nevertheless, you may attempt to avoid all the commotion by keeping your revelations quiet. Unfortunately, you might just waste a lot of energy suppressing your thoughts. The sooner you acknowledge the fact that you can't escape from the action, the less stress you will carry on your shoulders. Graciously letting go of your previous plans allows you to enjoy yourself more than you expected. A surprise could be fun if you don't resist the change in the air.

Your current annoyance with feeling emotionally restricted is exacerbated now by an irrepressible rebellious streak. Your associates may be concerned about your unpredictable behavior, but you're at the opposite end of the spectrum, excited about all the possibilities. Nearly anything that distracts you from your boredom seems like a fantastic opportunity today. Chase your dreams but don't let your responsibilities go unfulfilled. Nearly anything is possible if you reach for the stars while keeping your feet on the ground.

If you're worried that you haven't been such a great friend recently, you now have the chance to step up to the plate and be awesome in the eyes of others. Don't dwell on past regrets; guilt only blocks your path in the present. Instead, act with confidence and people will appreciate your presence in their lives. No matter what, do the right thing. Imagine your ideal future and take a risk in order to create it. A leap of faith is your ticket to redemption.

Exciting revelations about your choices on the path of life are occurring faster than you can integrate them into your plans. But making rational sense of your brilliant flashes may not be as critical as you think. Even if you are committed to holding steady on your course, at least give yourself permission to entertain a few out-of-the-box possibilities that cross your mind today. There will be plenty of time to prioritize your options over the days ahead but for now color outside of the lines.

You might think reality is testing you today to see if you can be practical even while your erratic thoughts are jumping all over the map. Although you haven't yet agreed to participate in a plan developed by your coworkers, it doesn't make sense to resist too strongly. Other people's inspirations could be the catalyst for your own fantastic ideas as discussions excite you with new schemes that won't fit neatly into your preexisting world. This is a time of substantial growth; the exploration of uncharted territories teaches you vital lessons that you need to learn.

There's no reason to abandon your entire schedule today, even if sticking to it becomes an exercise in futility. Just make the specific changes you must, while keeping the basic structure of your routine intact. The attention you put on the tiniest of matters now may be exactly what brings you the most knowledge. Practicing self-discipline is no easy task, but it can produce the greatest rewards. Paradoxically, an intellectual breakthrough comes from limiting your options rather than exploring them.

Your hopeful plans about an upcoming social escapade could unexpectedly fall apart now. However, this sudden change doesn't need to be cause for disappointment. If one course of action fails, it creates additional room for something better to happen. Unbeknownst to you, your free will is influencing the present moment and your current attitude determines the trajectory that follows. Think outside of the box today because your future is not limited by the conventional. Radical thought can take you to amazing places.

It appears as if you are finally being released from a difficult emotional situation that has been weighing you down. Luckily, there is great potential for a real transformation today. But don't waste energy ruminating over something you could have done differently. Instead, reframe the past in a larger perspective before making plans for what's next. Even if you're not quite ready to swing into action, at least decide where you want to go and when you will start your new journey. Be the change you want to see in the world.

New information is bombarding you on an emotional front now, but it's challenging to remain receptive. Your natural tendency is to resist if people rely on their authority to put you in your place. When your feelings are stirred, you are inspired to rebel against those in charge in order to reassert your position. Don't worry about losing face today by revealing your vulnerability. Nothing is gained by fortifying your ego or pretending you know everything. Your best chance of coming out on top occurs when you simply trust in the truth as you know it.

Your pet project may undergo a surprise attack from a friend today. Or, perhaps, you might be required to consider surprising facts that contradict your previous position. Reexamining your basic assumptions and updating your perspective frees you to embrace your future.

You could react erratically as others push you to your limit today, empowering you to break free from their control. An unrelenting influx of new information from multiple directions entices you to change your mind today. Previous assumptions are quickly shattered today as a friend relates a story that blasts open your mind to reveal a new point of view. Surprising changes in your career path can bring dramatic fluctuations to your finances in the form of an unexpected windfall or an unscheduled expenditure. You're too quick to put up protective boundaries now as coworkers insist that you execute your job in a very specific manner. Unusual thoughts can lure you into unfamiliar waters today, and you must travel alone on this journey of the soul. Clever Mercury and brilliant Uranus send shockwaves to the masterful Capricorn Moon, brightening your dreams and synchronizing your nervous system with the present moment. You could wake up feeling like you can't please everyone now, so why should you bother trying? Anyhow, the Cosmos wants you to be outrageously original today, and as unconventional as possible. Thankfully, your natural sense of balance will keep you safe and centered wherever you roam.

It feels as if your mind is running a repeating loop of movie trailers featuring your possible future paths. Surprisingly, these flashes of light are not matching up to your five-year plan. However, there may be ingenious ideas worth pursuing that could disappear due to the sheer volume of creative thoughts. Your first reaction to new opportunities on the horizon may reflect your need to control anything that's beyond the immediate sphere of your influence. Fortunately, the tension eases once you accept the new direction your life is taking and recognize that you're blessed to be along for the ride. The only difference between fear and excitement is your attitude.

You're one to build your reality on stable foundations, yet trouble can develop if uncertainty or self-doubt turns you overly rigid. You are living in a data-rich environment, so make maximum use of everything you're currently learning by thinking as far outside of the box as you can. You have a galaxy full of magic at your disposal today, but you must take the initiative to start something new. You often exhibit extra amounts of enthusiasm in pursuit of making improvements to your life. Although you may be clear about your career goals now, confusing circumstances at work prevent you from creating an action plan. You can teach people a thing or two about the art of persuasion today, but you need to be careful about using your charming personality to influence others for your personal gain. Your next move might be unclear because you can't predict how people will react to your emotions now, and the potential fallout seems a bit scary. You were waiting for a day like this, yet everything depends on how honest you are about what's transpiring in your heart. You can be easily misunderstood in the realm of romance because your actions might be easily misinterpreted by others. Conflicting messages on this high-energy day can force you to seek harmony in the midst of confusion and chaos. The bad news is your illusions could be shattered, but the good news is the potential positive outcome outweighs the emotional risk. Take a chance; you never know what might happen unless you put your heart on the line.

Although your feelings appear to be riding on a roller coaster these days, you get a welcome taste of stability today. Staying conscious of your motives positively inspires your interactions, making it easier for others to benefit from your newfound grace and compassion.

Relationships are an open playing field for your passions now. In fact, your life is already growing more colorful with sexy Mars stirring up mischief in your sign for the next couple of months. You never know what might happen if your emotions sink into dark places. However, you're more comfortable with the possibilities now because you're better equipped to control your feelings. It's time to let go of your fears, close your eyes and surrender into the uncertainty. A better version of you is waiting on the other side of the door if you're willing to open your heart.

You quickly feel uneasy when situations pull you into places of intense passion. Avoid an unnecessary verbal confrontation by simply moving past the restraints of language. Taking the high road now invites others to follow your lead.

You seem to be spending more time exploring your own private dreamland now, but simultaneously, the most practical issues in your life are currently visible, too. Paradoxically, the deeper you journey inward, the more power you display as your confidence radiates from within. You see exciting possibilities nearly everywhere you look today. However, don't expect to be suddenly struck over the head with answers to all of your pending questions. It's healthy to visualize the desired outcome to a situation now, but there's no need to force resolution to the issue prematurely. Although you wish you could make plans for the future, you're not that eager to peer too far into the distance now. You might experience an uncharacteristic desire for solitude today, but your friends will probably seek you out and ask you to accompany them on their latest adventure, anyway. Never underestimate the importance of having fun.

If you're not comfortable with the interpersonal dynamics in a relationship, you have a perfect opportunity to push beyond your fears and speak up today. An eccentric might arrive on the scene while the non-conformist Aquarius Moon reflects the energy of your 7th House of Others. You may have several unusual tasks on today's to-do list, and you're eager to get started. You're easily enticed into avoiding your long-term responsibilities for a while as you pursue a bit of pleasure today. Your friends will need to put extra effort into convincing you to go out today because the Moon's presence in your 4th House of Security reminds you of how much pleasure you derive from staying home. Your need for independence is so strong these days that you might not be willing to justify your desires to anyone else. The Moon's harmonious connection with stabilizing Saturn in your optimistic sign today lifts your spirit above the mundane events of your daily life. You might want to make a decision about money matters today, but it's tricky to focus on the specifics when you're being pulled in several directions. It's unnecessary to hide your heartfelt needs just because someone else may be uncomfortable with them. Nevertheless, you don't have the right to spew your opinions without doing so in a kind and respectful manner. Being considerate of those you love might change your words, but it really doesn't have to alter your truth.

Your spiritual orientation is currently capable of turning the most boring chore into a sacred act of gratitude. Honor the richness of your imagination and aspire to experience beauty, even if it cannot be put into words. You are all too familiar with overextending your energy and you could fall into this same alluring trap today unless you proceed with caution. Incorporating realistic thinking right from the start keeps you ahead of the curve throughout the day.

You can talk a big game today, but executing your plan isn't as straightforward as you wish. Recognizing that everything seems better than it actually is now could be enough to prevent problems from developing later in the day. It's not wise to shoot the messenger, especially if she is bearing good news. But the planets may stir up trouble if you automatically believe everything you hear. But don't be so negative that you shut off the flow of incoming information. Balancing your skepticism with an open mind leaves an opportunity for your friends to surprise you with a bit of unexpected fun.

Although you may have your share of problems today, they appear to be quite manageable upon closer analysis. Be certain that you're motivated by good intentions when involving people in your personal drama today, rather than just seeking extra attention. Your current business acumen is admirable, but your analytical superpowers could have a detrimental influence if you think you can justify anything you want to do. Rather than wasting time trying to rationalize your choices, pay attention to the feedback you receive and adjust your course of action as necessary. You prefer to keep the peace but you might feel called to speak up anyhow and give someone a piece of your mind today. Spending a lot of money just to impress someone you admire won't be as appreciated as you wish. The fact of the matter is you can't accurately express your emotions by buying anything material. Your message is more powerful today if you simply speak from your heart. A gift of your love is a priceless treasure.

You're like a worker bee high on pollen in a field of spring wildflowers. Every individual thought that crosses your mind seems to be the best one ever and leads to yet another one. Waiting a day or two prior to making any final decisions helps you pick the best flower and cultivate it into a successful plan of action.

An overdose of blind trust turns you practical goats into gullible sheep today. However, once led astray an unexpected event might require you to put your perspective back in balance. Reclaim your power by setting a goal and working toward it, even if you don't see any appreciable progress right away. Live for the journey, not the destination.

You could easily lose focus on your responsibilities today because it's more fun to imagine your future than to deal with reality. Imagining the possibilities of what may come to pass is often a useful endeavor; however, it can also get in the way of the work that's right in front of you. The real challenge now isn't about achieving your long-term goals; it's to remain present in the present moment.

You may feel as if you have another chance to grab the prize, yet your time is running out. However, the sense of urgency you are experiencing today is likely based on a faulty assumption. Although your current actions seem to wield greater influence now, pushing too hard stirs up more resistance than it's worth. Paradoxically, temporarily flying in a holding pattern might actually enable you to reach your destination sooner than if you continue to pursue your goals with all your heart.

You may be so anxious about your future that it's challenging to pay attention to what's occurring in the present moment. Thankfully, this nostalgic detour down Memory Lane can become a significant learning experience once vulnerable Venus enters your passionate sign. Instead of obsessing about unresolved feelings left over from your sentimental journey, trust the intelligence of here and now.

You might be so preoccupied with a single idea that it's nearly impossible for anyone to talk to you about anything else. Nevertheless, following your friends is a clever move now since they will likely steer you in the right direction. Minimizing the overall significance of your own thoughts is a useful tactic today, making you more accessible to others. You currently gain more through cooperation than you possibly can on your own. A burden shared lightens the load for all.

You would like nothing more than to put your feet up and dream your troubles away today, but you're also worried about too many untied loose ends. You may seem less demanding of yourself and others, but your flexibility alone doesn't necessarily help you feel more comfortable. Trust in your dreams now; subtle messages from your subconscious can lead you back to what is meaningful. Ultimately, you are confined only by the walls you build yourself.

Asserting yourself may take more effort today than you're willing to expend, even if you know exactly what you want. But rather than coming right out and expressing what's on your mind, adopting a passive-aggressive approach could temporarily leave you feeling like a victim. Any negativity on your part is simply a wake-up call, reminding you it's time for an attitude adjustment. Going over the facts with someone you admire can help to alleviate your fears once and for all.

You tend to see only the best in everyone now, so resist the urge to make life-changing relationship decisions. Although intellectual Mercury is sending good vibrations your way today, you can easily misinterpret the message. Nevertheless, the discrepancy between your thoughts and your desires triggers stressful memories from the past. Remember only what you need to know and then bring yourself back to the joys of the present moment.

Thinking about your independence is qualitatively different from actually expressing your freedom through action. Talking about your plan is one thing, but your recent behavior has more direct ramifications than a theoretical conversation. You're motivated to explore relationship options today, but scattering your intentions could leave you in a more precarious position than when you started. Be careful what you wish for; you might just get it.

It's best to address an uncomfortable emotional situation with a close friend today, even if you prefer to let it slide. However, you could come across more intense than intended, so temper your approach with an extra dose of compassion. Don't make things more complicated than they are by projecting your unresolved feelings onto the wrong person. Your chances of moving beyond the problem are better if you base your perceptions on objective reality rather than unsubstantiated fears.

You may be sitting on pins and needles as you try to manage a tricky situation today without overreacting. Acknowledging your resistance early in the game is helpful because you must delve deeper into your emotions, even if you don't want to go there. Continue to push against your discomfort now; there are important lessons to learn by sinking into your own hidden world and touching the magic of emotional transformation.

Although you might steer clear of large groups today, you're more comfortable when you're in the company of someone you trust. However, you may be even moodier now that the reflective Moon is back in your sensitive sign. Nevertheless, circumstances continue to draw you out of your shell. Revealing your feelings can strengthen a relationship as long as you don't go overboard. Sometimes knowing when to be quiet is just as important as having the courage to talk.

Old fears that resurface from your subconscious mind can whittle away at your confidence today. But past experiences have a tendency to disappear, only to return to haunt you again, especially when something happens to remind you of a previous hurt. You can push through your current uncertainties, but you will need to operate on blind faith now, as scary as that may sound. Close your eyes, grit your teeth and reach for the stars.

You could spend too much time over-analyzing your feelings as you stress about what move to make  next in a developing relationship. At first, you're sure you're traveling on the right path, but soon you start second-guessing your wisdom. It's all rather confusing, since the closer you get to a final decision, the farther you seem from the solution. Once you recognize that there's no one absolute correct answer, you're freer to listen to your heart and act accordingly.

Although it might appear as if people are pushing your buttons simply to get a reaction today, you prefer to sidestep around a potential conflict. Instead of struggling to escape from an uncomfortable situation, find the courage to directly participate in a constructive dialogue now. Obviously, you don't enjoy engaging in arguments, yet resolving the current tension feels much better than allowing it to continue to fester any longer. Start the conversational ball rolling and see who picks it up.

You're so concerned about the influence you exert on others that you may withhold your emotions today. Although the Moon's visit to your 9th House of Big Ideas encourages you to go overboard as you think about the future, you might not be able to meet other people's expectations if you share all of your dreams. Spend some time on your own now so the noise of the outside world doesn't interfere with your desire to prioritize your goals. Cultivating a healthy sense of independence is your first step to success.

Your key planet Jupiter inspires you to focus your attention where you can be the most successful today. But even with this cosmic exuberance supporting your efforts, you still may feel as if you're traveling through tricky territory. Chances are you're moving too fast and might not even know how to apply the brakes. Simply ease up on the gas and reduce your speed if you want the good times to last. Coming in first doesn't necessarily mean you win the race.

Your progress is uneven today and it's tempting to blame your frustration on others. It might even seem as if people offer you opportunities only to whisk them away before they come to fruition. Thankfully, you are making more headway now than you realize, so avoid judging your success by what you accomplish. Keep your eyes on the future and don't be deterred by anyone else's lack of follow-through. Never doubt that you are the master of your own destiny.

These are tumultuous times and the busy pace seems to reach a frenzied pitch now. Straightforward actions should make your motives clear to others, but people still have a difficult time reading your intentions today, especially if you feel disconnected from what you are doing. Instead of brashly barging ahead, stop long enough to think about where you want to go before you end up in the wrong place.

You're in a long-term planning mode where you are more concerned with next week, next month and next year than you are with today. However, immediate action may be required of you to manage a minor crisis. Fortunately, your current positive attitude can easily disarm obstacles, enabling you to be effective in the present moment while still dreaming about the future. Exploratory fantasies encourage you to consider all options, even in the real world.

Honoring your need for privacy is healthy today, even if you are accustomed to engaging in activities with your friends and associates. You independent Rams can benefit from working alone, especially when your patience grows thin because others can't keep up with you. But your current penchant for solitude might be more about recharging your emotional batteries with some rest and relaxation. A bit of solitude enables you to head back out revitalized, ready to conquer the world.

You're tentative about sharing your feelings today because you don't want to risk your hard-earned security. Unfortunately, keeping secrets is exhausting because you must monitor everything you say. But your unexpressed emotions give you away now, so face your fears and resist the temptation to go quiet. Be proactive in your interactions; participate in a meaningful dialogue by choice. There's no reason to wait for someone else to drag you into a conversation if you go there first.

The pace of your life seems to be slowing down, bringing you more time to integrate a recent change of heart. You may want to rethink your goals or even reevaluate your position on a professional matter. If something is unexpectedly tossed your way, do your best to catch it in stride. The trick is to mind your own business; any extra attention you put toward someone else's problems might only make matters worse. Realigning your priorities makes good sense now because you have plenty to do on your own.

Being certain about your feelings is nearly impossible because your moods quickly shift from moment to moment now that the Moon's back in your sign. You may go from pouring your heart out to a friend to withdrawing to the safety of your hidden cave. Avoid making any long-lasting decisions until your feelings settle back down. In the meantime, let your emotions flow naturally without trying to change them. Be truthful and gentle with everyone today, especially yourself.

Although people seem to be looking directly at you, you still may feel as if you aren't being seen. You don't understand how they can miss the obvious as you hold your head high and carry out your assigned tasks, even when your heart is hurting. Thankfully, a humble disclosure to a trusted colleague might bring the recognition you seek. Take whatever time is necessary to process your feelings before you step back into the spotlight.

You're like a pendulum today, swinging back and forth between accepting the support your colleagues offer and fearfully pushing them away. Although you appreciate the camaraderie, you also need to know you can be self-sufficient. Try to soften your attitude, even if think you're overly dependent on others now. It's a sign of intelligence to openly embrace help when it is offered. There's no need to let pride stand in the way when someone only wants to see you shine.

You might be swimming in rough emotional waters today, unless you can let go of the control you believe you need. Nevertheless, you're not in charge of anyone's feelings other than your own. Don't try to fix the situation by trying to make someone more comfortable; concentrate on your priorities instead. Once you've adjusted your attitude, then others may have the courage to do the same. Turn down the noise all around you and listen to the yearnings of your heart.

You are content to explore your feelings in the privacy of your own space today. Your emotional security is a top priority now and you might not be satisfied until you feel completely safe and sound in your environment. Thankfully, you can journey nearly anywhere you desire within the wilds of your imagination. Just don't forget to demonstrate your colorful creativity while your muse is close at hand. Harriet Tubman said, "Every great dream begins with a dreamer."

An expansion-contraction dilemma is developing now as your normally cavalier attitude assumes a more cautious stance today. But don't succumb to the pressures of social expectations. You can't please others if you don't acknowledge your own desires first. Chill out and give yourself permission to withdraw from the crowd if you really want some time alone. A little peace and quiet might be just what you need to reinvigorate your spirit.

You may think you lack sufficient patience to hold someone's hand while they go through an emotional meltdown; however, it could be exactly what's required today. Alternatively, it might be you that's the needy one at this time -- making you even less tolerant with yourself than with another person. Either way, acknowledge that the expression of feelings doesn't always fit neatly into a schedule. Practicing flexibility enables you to stick with the process without being in such a hurry.

Your lack of clarity makes it hard to confront your needs now and recognize how they differ from those of your peers. Your efforts at improving things might even seem to be a waste of time today. Although ignoring the situation isn't the best answer, gently creating additional space between you and others gives you room to honor your own feelings. Once you reestablish your center of gravity, you will be ready to reengage with a more positive attitude.

You may feel awkward when expressing your feelings at first, but you can work through your resistance as the day unfolds. The shy Cancer Moon might tempt you to run and hide today, but her current stay in your 5th House of Play prevents you from retreating too far. Thankfully, you can channel your energy into a variety of creative expressions, whether for work or for your own amusement. Ultimately, your dreams are the source of your greatest inspiration if you learn how to integrate them into your life.

You may hit an emotional speed bump if you're moving too fast today. Even if your life is running smoothly, pay attention to potential problems before they create unnecessary trouble. Your enthusiasm could get the best of you if you're not careful. Remind yourself several times throughout the day that your high energy is likely to make people uncomfortable. Toning down your exuberance a notch allows you to lead with your heart while still acknowledging the needs of everyone else.

Enjoying the finer side of life without overdoing it isn't as easy as it sounds now. You're tempted to eat or drink more than necessary while mischievous Mercury activates Jupiter in your 5th House of Pleasure. Thankfully, you don't need to let your concerns about overconsumption prevent you from having a wonderful time. Go ahead and joyfully indulge in a bit of sensory pleasure, but just be sure not to push your limits too far. You can dance at the edge without going over it.

You're at the top of your game when it comes to demonstrating your sharp thinking today. Thankfully, you can put your best foot forward and then do a bit of your famous doubletalk to impress others. However, you could be too clever for your own good; the power of positive thinking only works if you don't push the envelope beyond social acceptability. Taking a calculated risk is a solid idea as long as you're ready to let go of your plans if they go awry. Humility is the true key to success.

You're an effective communicator today, even if you would prefer to withhold your emotions. You can manifest your dreams as long as you're willing to follow your intuition. Unfortunately, there's a delicate balance between your ideals and your achievements. Your romantic fantasies may also be realized, but you must give voice to your feelings or you won't get what you want. Fortune favors the bold.

Letting your big feelings out into the open can be rather stressful, since your current needs might appear out of character for you. Still, it's nearly impossible to adjust your aspirations to what others are willing to support. Meeting someone halfway begins with listening rather than just telling people what you want. Finding a way to be emotionally flexible now improves your chances of spending a memorable day with those you love.

Love is in the air today, but relationship dynamics may stress you out, nonetheless. Normally, you are careful about respecting your limits, but you're tempted to overindulge now. Thankfully, everything tends to go your way as long as you aren't concerned with making these pleasures last. Tomorrow may not be as pleasant when you realize what you've done in the name of immediate gratification. A healthy dose of moderation makes more sense and won't detract from your fun.

Going the extra mile to consciously perform random acts of kindness makes your day much more pleasurable. Your optimism encourages those around you even if you're just chatting with your friends today. Your spirit of generosity comes back to you in the form of greater freedom, a wider perspective and heightened creativity. Something special is ready to pop -- but only if you continue to express love and beauty in an altruistic way.

Speak from your heart today while the planets maximize the positive influence of your words. Even if you have felt unforgiving in the past, it's time now to reassess the situation. Relationship issues are best tackled with a sensitive and supportive approach, but behind the serious talk is your desire to bask in the glory of love. Be extra sweet to someone you cherish and the positive repercussions will ripple back to you quickly.

You love to dream big and today your fantasies are over the top, enticing you away from a more practical approach. Your key planet Jupiter is overstimulated by sensual Venus, encouraging you to partake in one too many social activities. There is nothing wrong with indulging in the fun, but you cannot go overboard. Steer clear from jumping to conclusions before you think your vision all the way through to its logical conclusion.

Your management skills are operating at peak efficiency, but you could suddenly become distracted and gloss over a few important details today.
