Although your loyalty is legendary, it's still prudent to reevaluate your plan rather than blindly sticking to it, no matter what. There's no shame in admitting when you're wrong. Don't let an error in judgment stand in the way of your success.

You have plenty of useful data at your fingertips but you might feel as if you need more specific information in order to make an educated decision about your future. Your key planet Mercury is in the spotlight today as it begins its retrograde cycle in your 9th House of Big Ideas. Don't try to put all the pieces into place yet. Pare back your thinking now and focus on one day at a time while you continue to make a plan for the next phase of your life.

You may be forced to pull from hidden emotional reserves today, even if you didn't know they were available. Thankfully, you can find the strength you need, possibly surprising those who didn't think you had what it takes. Just remember, this isn't a one-shot deal; there are several weeks of hard work ahead of you and you won't be able to slack off until the job is actually done. As Drew Barrymore quipped, "In the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths."

Your mental reactions are lightning-quick today, but they can be extremely misleading to others. People might assume your quick thinking on your feet actually reveals that you don't have a long-term plan in place. However, you know your destination now, even if you're unsure exactly how to get there. Don't worry about what to do next; just trust that each step will make sense in the moment as long as you're steadfast in your intention. Energy flows where attention goes.

Your daily routine might fall apart at the seams today as an unexpected opportunity shakes up your schedule at home. Instead of attempting to stubbornly stick to a previous agenda, you're clever enough to recreate your list of priorities for the day. Once you clearly demonstrate your willingness to bend with the changing winds, a stressful path will morph into a trail of accomplishment.

You feel restrained by the mundane events of your life now, especially if you're waiting for something magical to occur. It's as if you expect the invisibility cloak to lift, enabling you to peer into the otherworldly realms of infinite possibilities. Although you can imagine events leaking into your world from other dimensions, there is no quick fix to the current obstacles blocking your way. But don't write off your dreams as a waste of time; they might just take longer to materialize than you wish. Your unrelenting belief is enough to make them real.

You're being pushed up against the edge of your comfort zone and you wonder whether or not it's smart to push back or just surrender. But your dilemma isn't about doing the right thing; it's more about knowing when to call it quits. It may take a few weeks before you possess a clear enough perspective to make a final decision. In the meantime, just give yourself permission to change your mind whenever it's necessary. Explore all the alternatives while you have the chance.

Confusion sets in as you try to sort out your desires from your responsibilities today. Too much conflicting information makes it extremely difficult to choose one single path over all the others. Trusting your intuition could lead you to leaving your options open longer than you originally thought possible. But don't panic while trickster Mercury is turning retrograde. Let the moment pass without making an impulsive decision, for your current sense of urgency might be based more on fear than on reality.

You're quite pleased when you can get along with everyone so easily, but you still must be careful that your self-confidence doesn't turn into arrogance today. You can become so focused on what you are saying that you inadvertently offend someone. People might even believe that you're intentionally pushing their buttons. Hopefully, your best friends understand your motives, but you could anger a coworker if your approach appears too forceful. Honestly, it takes little effort to keep the peace by simply softening your rhetoric.

You have a very specific agenda now and you won't likely waste any time when starting your work. Unfortunately, others might interpret your behavior as theatrical rather than practical today, which can be irritating to you. Even if you are disappointed that people don't appreciate your efforts, it's not in your best interest to try to convince anyone of your good intentions because you have more important things to do. Although it may take a while, your actions will ultimately speak for themselves.

You might run into some unexpected opposition today, no matter how self-assured you feel as you look to the future. However, facing resistance head-on isn't your best strategy now because your determination only piles more pressure onto a delicate situation. Thankfully, there's no need to let someone's negativity precipitate a crisis of self-doubt. Lighten up and do whatever is necessary to avoid confrontation; the sooner you move on, the sooner the disruptive energy settles down.

Behaving in a carefree manner today sounds like the course of least resistance, but you won't likely be flexible enough to make a big enough difference. Acting in an emotionally detached manner is challenging when you can see through someone's facade without even trying. But it isn't helpful to climb onto your soapbox and broadcast the truth as you perceive it because others probably won't hear your message anyhow. Although you may be fed up with the entire charade, it's still wiser to let the awkward moment pass without giving it unnecessary attention.

Expressing your emotions in a forthright manner is tricky today, especially if you grow annoyed with a friend. You're tempted to find a scapegoat standing in your path who doesn't really deserve your wrath. Don't take your feelings out on the wrong person; this kind of unconscious behavior sours an otherwise sweet connection. Instead, gently vent your negativity without blaming anyone else. Engaging in vigorous physical exercise is one way to reduce your stress while removing others from your little drama.

You might get so carried away with your work today that you exhaust yourself before reaching your objectives. If you start a task that grows into a major project, be sure to set well-defined limits so you know when to call it quits. You don't need to prove anything now, even if you think others may judge you in a negative light. Simply give it your unrestrained best effort and then walk away with a clear conscience.

You could unconsciously carry a chip on your shoulder today, especially if you have grown overconfident about your contributions at work. However, your larger-than-life attitude may stir up negativity from a close friend or partner. You might experience more than your fair share of discord if you hold on to the belief that your approach is superior to all others. Remember, there are many ways to view current events and yours is only one of them. Humility is your friend.

You may be so irritated with people who don't respect your boundaries that it becomes necessary to take a stand today. It doesn't matter that you understand on a logical level that being adaptable is the mature response. Your annoyance could still build until it morphs into anger because you're tired of always assuming that things will improve. Don't wait until it's too late and you lose your temper; express your displeasure while you still can communicate in a kind and rational manner. A spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down.

You're weary of doing everything the same old way today and yearn for the excitement of change. It's great to be innovative as long as your restlessness doesn't prompt you to add chaos to your life just because you are currently bored. Proceed with caution or you could manufacture a whole new set of problems before you know it. Although it might be contrary to your natural flair for the dramatic, making small adjustments to your normal routine is smarter than shaking up everything all at once.

You have your own unique way of deciding what's most valuable now, and your unconventional priorities could generate a bit of static. It doesn't matter how serious you are about improving your life; people still might assume you're just acting eccentrically today. However, you probably sound more argumentative than you actually are, so be sure to temper any extreme opinions with a desire to maintain harmony. Thankfully, your common sense nudges you to stop and consider the impact of your words prior to alienating your closest allies.

You might not be in total control of your energy today as your awareness swings back and forth between your head and your heart. It's often easier for you brainy Aquarians to be rational than emotional, but the reflective Moon's visit to your sign brings a variety of desires up to the surface now. Your wide mood swings may confuse others, so try to maintain a pragmatic middle-of-the-road approach by integrating your feelings with your thoughts. Finding your center is the key to restoring balance in your world.

Although you may believe your logical thinking will steer you in the right direction today, it's likely you will make assumptions based upon unconscious desires rather than solely on the facts. Whether you are right or wrong, stubbornly defending your position could escalate a minor disagreement into a larger conflict now. Listen carefully to the advice you receive instead of trying to win an argument. Once you realign your idealism with the truth, everything else will fall into place.

It's critical to act responsibly rather than ignoring your commitments, even if there are other things ranking higher on your wish list. There aren't enough hours in the day to do everything that sounds enticing and fulfill all your obligations, too. Although you're eager to enjoy life this weekend, it's less painful to acknowledge the limitations of your schedule sooner than later. Delaying transient gratification to take care of business brings a deeper satisfaction now than a passing pleasure ever could.

You might not want to play all your marbles today and hope that others won't notice if you hold a few in reserve. Nevertheless, it's wiser to overcome your fear and show your hand, or you could miss out on a big opportunity. Instead of leaning on sheer determination to save you now, it's more useful to graciously adapt to the changing circumstances. Your willingness to compromise reveals more inner strength than digging in your heels and just saying no.

If you're running around in circles without accomplishing much today, you may need to stop and reevaluate your overall strategy. You might be reluctant to take a spoonful of reality as your medicine, especially if you think you already learned your lesson. Although you're probably not ready to change your ways forever, at least you're less inclined to run off and play until you finish your chores. Thankfully, practicing self-discipline enables you to meet your most important obligations, paving the way to guilt-free enjoyment later on.

Complicated family matters require your attention today, even if you prefer to be doing something else. Unfortunately, attempts to avoid a serious situation could make the problem worse. Don't be afraid to share your position with all those involved. You might be the one that needs to play the role of bad cop by taking a firm stand on what you know to be true. Although there is room for negotiation, everyone must know the score before a resolution can be found. Don't back down until you get your point across.

Staying inspired is challenging when your attention is pulled in mundane directions by unavoidable responsibilities. Disappointment could hijack your day, dampening the fires of your creativity. It's nearly impossible to keep your spirits up if you're also constrained by a lack of time, money or energy. Don't cave in to your own insecurities; instead, hold fast to your vision of a best-case scenario and let it light your way. Hope anchors the soul.

A few big ideas about what you want to do may be enough to motivate you, but first you must handle a confusing situation in your immediate environment. Don't waste time fretting about the circumstances that currently restrict your choices. Just accept the fact that taking care of your commitments is a higher priority than running off in pursuit of your passions. There will be plenty of opportunities to chase your dreams, but only if you bite the bullet and do the responsible thing today.

It's time to pay an emotional debt, especially if there are unresolved feelings lingering between you and a loved one. But don't wait until it's too late; you can work wonders and make up for lost time today if you put your mind to it. On the other hand, if your relationships are currently harmonious, you could reap the fruits of your recent hard work. Either way, you still must complete unfinished business before you move on -- and this won't likely happen overnight. Delays are only problematic if you think they will last forever.

It seems unfair that someone else can take the day off while your responsibilities continue to pile up high enough to topple like a house of cards. Although you might be at a critical turning point now, nothing is to be gained by comparing your situation to anyone else's. You're being tested and are given an opportunity to demonstrate your competence under pressure today. This is your chance to shine; banish self-doubt and reestablish your self-esteem once and for all.

You have a general sense of your destination now, yet without a map you lack a plan to get there. The most obvious path seems to be blocked, but the good news is that the barriers are not permanent. It's just that your best ideas seem to run into another obstacle every time you take a step forward. Forget about making any progress  while you consolidate your recent gains. Surprisingly, the resistance will ease up once you stop pushing against the prevailing currents. Surrender to the universe's timetable instead of trying to make your own.

People admire your stellar work ethic and envy your endurance that often enables you to reach your goals. However, your patience is being tried today as Venus is blocked by your key planet Saturn, delaying your efforts to achieve satisfaction. Naturally, you prefer to progress carefully toward your desired destination without stopping or slowing down. Nevertheless, the sooner you set aside an old agenda, the easier it will be to create a new one that is more relevant to your heart's current desires.

It feels as if your friends are being overly critical of you today, and you probably think their judgments are unwarranted. In truth, others may be expecting too much from you, and you might rightly see them as an obstacle to your happiness. However, people are only protecting themselves from getting swept up in your next crazy idea, even if it is business as usual for you. Shake off  your discouragement and follow your bliss. Be bold, brave and brilliant.

Your closest friends and relatives might not understand how much you're struggling to live up to the promises you recently made. However, the pressure can be great enough to tempt you to walk away from your predicament -- but even that won't solve your problems for long. Thankfully, finding the ultimate solution may not even be necessary now. Simply do the best you can while letting everyone know your new schedule. Telling the truth is better than setting yourself up for failure later on.

You can't make sense out of today's events because you fully expect reality to validate your fantasies. But believing in your dreams is challenging now if they're not supported by the most important people in your life. Nevertheless, it's not wise to give up on your best ideas. Although practicing patience is usually tricky for you Rams, suppressing your restlessness currently works in your favor. Continue to strive toward your goals and others will eventually appreciate your intentions when they see the results.

Maintaining your recently established boundaries can be tricky today because the fluidity of your relationships requires you to be adaptable. You might start the day with a straightforward agenda that becomes less relevant by the hour because sticking to it isolates you from others. But don't waste too much time trying to bend your schedule to make it work. Instead, set aside your previous plans and just follow your intuition. Save the rational approach for some other day when you have time to sort through all the options.

Your fantasies seem to be growing out of control today, but you can quickly regain a practical perspective once you understand that this confusing phase won't last forever. Don't be overly concerned about falling for an illusion; following the road to success will be easier than you realize. Rather than struggling to get your bearings now, enjoy the journey of your imagination while it lasts. As Eleanor Roosevelt wrote, "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."

Accurately describing your emotions to others may be nearly impossible today, yet your verbal block allows you to experience your feelings on a deeper level. Don't try so hard to be understood; there's nothing that requires you to justify your position to anyone else right now. However, it's not healthy to isolate yourself from those you love for too long. Even if you are unsure about accepting help from your friends now, being in their company will still lift your spirits.

You may aspire to unlock the mystery of someone who appears to be a total enigma. But reducing everything to the facts won't help you uncover the elusive truth now, no matter how hard you try. Unfortunately, contradictory information rules the day, putting resolution even further out of reach. Instead of over-analyzing the data, step beyond the limits of logic and trust your instincts to guide you through these tricky times. Keep in mind that the truth isn't always obvious to the five senses.

Although you already received instructions for the day, you're still not clear about what to do next. Often, you are quite detail-oriented in your work, but it's a challenge to come up with a plan today that will put you back on track. Unfortunately, requesting assistance is a waste of time now because no one else can tell you what you need to know. Even if you're wrestling with your doubts, just jump on stage and get started; a pleasant surprise is waiting for you in the wings.

An overactive imagination can fill in the silence today and turn your emotional insecurity into self-acceptance. But just following your train of thoughts isn't enough to bring you lasting satisfaction. It's one thing to enjoy pleasant fantasies as they waft through your awareness, but there's nothing to show for your mental meanderings at the end of the day. Narrowing your focus enables you to develop an inspiration into a concrete plan. Stick with one creative idea as long as you can; perseverance is your ticket to success.

Life becomes curiouser and curiouser today as you grow restless with the mundane world. It's frustrating because there doesn't seem to be a logical solution in sight to managing your current schedule. Instead of working harder and putting extra effort into your chores, let go of your rational attempts to juggle all your activities. Magically, your intuition is freed once you acknowledge that there's more than meets the eye. Listen to your inner wisdom when it kicks in; thankfully, it will guide you safely back from your trip down the rabbit hole.

You're capable of seeing more horizon than most anyone, so it's no surprise when you want to widen the scope on someone else's plan and make it your own. Unfortunately, the larger your vision, the less you can rely on your common sense to fill in the details. Paradoxically, believing in the power of your imagination works to your advantage because reality seems to cooperate with your dreams now. Your passion is the secret ingredient to a successful collaboration.

You don't like letting go of control, but you might actually feel a sense of relief today if you stop pretending that you're in charge of the whole show. Thankfully, your dreams are magical enough to distract you for a while, even if they're not based on reality. But you don't have to worry about being practical now, as long as you continue to fulfill your commitments to others. Although you may be resistant at first, give yourself a little vacation from the daily stress and allow your imagination to roam.

A friend may grow confused with your sudden change in attitude, triggering you to feel less sure of yourself. Although you're often comfortable with your emotional detachment, the Moon's shift into compassionate Pisces increases your moodiness and the urgency to resolve a relationship dilemma. Don't bother trying to figure out the dynamics; simply roll with the incoming waves and wait to see where the currents carry you. Choose your next move after your clarity returns and not a moment sooner.

You can surprise your coworkers with your high level of productivity today if you're able to involve your imagination in the process. But frustration could get the best of you if you must perform boring and repetitive tasks that don't leave any room for your creative touch. Happily, there will be plenty of time for more artistic pursuits later. Handle your responsibilities with efficient speed and impress everyone with your competence. Work now, play later.

You might believe anything is possible if you put your mind to it today, but you still could run into resistance if you get your hopes too high. Your confidence is usually an asset, but you're not necessarily working with a clear read on reality now. Although the present circumstances may not be very complicated, you're better off if you handle each issue as it arises or it can create problems in the future. Balancing your fantasies with a healthy dose of common sense allows you to regain control of the day.

If everything seems too good to be true today, it probably is. Nevertheless, you might have to work your way through a significant roadblock before you can proceed. Karmic Saturn is waiting to teach you a lesson if you overextend your reach. Fortunately, you will end up in a much better position for another round of growth that's right around the next corner. Your best bet is to keep it simple; amazing things happen when you put your priorities in order.

Running after satisfaction is a complicated endeavor if your partner's desires differ from yours. You may think it's necessary to set aside your dreams in order to win the affection of a loved one today. However, suppressing your emotions isn't a good idea because resentment could rear its ugly head. Let your partner know what's troubling you and exactly what you need to make things right. Absolute honesty is the only path to successful conflict management.

You're driven by your thoughts today, even if you know that your fantasies are out of reach. Unfortunately, you could quickly work yourself into a state of anxiety if you concentrate on what you lack, rather than utilizing what you currently have. However, you gain control over your future when you temporarily set aside unrealistic goals. Instead of wasting time with pie-in-the-sky dreaming, find happiness in each step along the way. As Gandhi wrote, "Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment. Full effort is full victory."

Projecting your idealistic hopes on a complex relationship today limits how people can respond to you. This emotional dynamic, in turn, distorts your perception of others. Thankfully, you aren't driven to realign each and every one of your fantasies with the true story. Nevertheless, reconnecting with someone special might bring up an uncomfortable issue, but you will emerge richer in spirit if you face it without putting your expectations in the way of reality.

A simple interaction can morph into an extremely complicated one today; however, the process may unfold very differently than you expect. It's not easy to let go of your personal agenda when you feel as if you have a lot at stake. Nevertheless, the spiritual Pisces Moon's visit to your 7th House of Relationships overwhelms you with the power of compassion. Fortunately, empathizing with someone else's position sets the stage for compromise. Opening your mind to others clears the air and enables everyone to move on with a lighter heart.

You are quite hopeful today, raising the bar in love and setting your heart up for disappointment. But you may grow irritated if someone isn't delivering the goods that you desire, especially if you assumed your partner would respond to you in a romantic manner. There is no point in shifting blame to anyone else if your fantasies are not realized; instead, adapt to the new conditions and change your assumptions accordingly. Don't expect to receive anything you're unwilling to give.

Finding emotional satisfaction is an uphill battle today as your idealistic faith in a relationship leads you to expect the impossible. Nevertheless, the Moon's dance in your romantic 5th House of Fun and Games bring your dreams to life. Unfortunately, everything quickly grows murky if you mix up your facts with fiction. If you're confused, remind yourself that your desires are likely different from what's actually happening. Go ahead and follow your heart; just don't stray too far from reality in the process.

You are often restless at work and in love as you imagine greener pastures on the other side of the fence. In fact, you may want to experience some quiet time away from the maddening crowds today. The Moon's presence in your 4th House of Home and Family might not be sufficient to completely take your mind off the greater world of possibilities. Although you like the idea of withdrawing socially now, you are not eager to isolate yourself or alienate others. Happily, acknowledging that your current dilemma may not be immediately resolved enables you to enjoy your day for what it is.

Letting go of your worldly ambitions sounds easy now, while clinging to them too tightly can create more discouragement than happiness. Fortunately, there's no reason to set new goals yet, and putting them on the back burner for a couple of days could be a smarter move than you think. Give yourself a break from the rat race, especially if it allows you to reconnect with someone on a deeper emotional level. Step back to experience more meaningful pleasures; the real purpose of life is to live it.

Discerning your daydreams from reality requires more effort now than it's worth. Although everything appears topsy-turvy, doing nothing seems to confuse you even further. The more you struggle to figure out the truth, the more complicated it gets. Suspending your disbelief -- as you do when you're watching a movie -- enables you to turn frustration into magic. Throw away the self-judgment and enjoy playing in the realms of imagination today. You can put everything back into proper perspective tomorrow when you have the time and energy.

Your misinterpretation of events might convince you that you won't get what you want from a relationship today. But this frustrating message from the cosmos may originate from your attitude rather than the actual situation. Paradoxically, practicing patience can transform your current dissatisfaction into a more meaningful kind of love. Don't be in such a hurry; playing the waiting game works in your favor. When the time is right-- and you'll know when it is -- make your move without further hesitation.

Your recent hard work might be due for a reward with a larger paycheck or a sweet promotion. Fortuitous Jupiter trines the Sun in your 2nd House of Money, hopefully bringing you the recognition you deserve. But you may face disappointment if you expect good news right away. Although your anticipation level is high, retrograde season could still get the best of you. Don't push your luck too far; instead, just show up with your best possible attitude and see what happens. Thankfully, spontaneity is one of your closest allies.

You can turn new ideas into practical plans quite easily today because your common sense is working overtime. You are often satisfied with maintaining the status quo, but you want to step beyond your regular routine and experience life to the fullest. Thankfully, there's no need to set aside your basic philosophical approach to simple living. It's just that you now possess a wonderful opportunity to build on the foundation of what you already know. Feel free to broaden your horizons while still keeping your feet on the beaten path.

It pays to reach a little farther today while the planets are busy working on your behalf. You're already thinking about the future while the Moon is moving through your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. Meanwhile, the sensible Taurus Sun's harmonious trine to auspicious Jupiter enables you to balance optimism with realism. There is enough cosmic magic to empower you to pursue your dreams. Nevertheless, you still must push past whatever stands between you and success. Believe in yourself and the sky is the limit.

Leaning on your friends and associates for companionship today creates special moments to share your hopes and dreams with them. But don't be overly concerned about falling short of your goals, for jolly Jupiter's trine to the Sun in your 11th House of Groups suggests that social networking is as important as career success. Instead, use this time to strengthen your relationships without any sense of guilt. Ultimately, reestablishing your place amongst your peers enables you to be an integral part of your tribe.

Steady growth feels restraining if you want to move at your own pace, which might be faster than everyone else's. However, the Sun's trine to jovial Jupiter in your 2nd House of Income allows you to obtain much-needed resources from your boss and your workmates as you bolt ahead of the pack. There isn't any reason to slow down now; explore new territory without worrying about the usual resistance. Your positive attitude is a little thing that makes a huge difference.

New ideas are flowing into your imagination now, but you must be in the right frame of mind to receive them. You may already be in touch with a variety of alternative plans, but the Sun's trine to philosophical Jupiter in your sign can blast the doors of awareness wide open today. Thankfully, this current growth spurt won't likely feel like hard work or cause you any additional stress. Expanding your thinking is more fun than you might expect.

An emotional breakthrough is possible today if you examine your feelings from a broader perspective before the upcoming changes impact your relationships. Letting go of fixed ideas isn't always easy to do, but today's Sun-Jupiter trine may seem like a free ticket to the destination of your choice. Nevertheless, it's still up to you to use it. Take a risk or you might stay stuck in your current situation, wishing that you didn't let this chance pass you by. Think big and then follow through with confidence and persistence.

Your relationships feed your creativity now, especially if you listen carefully to others as they share their brilliant ideas. However, inspiration doesn't just happen on its own; you must breathe it into life. Put on your thinking cap and be diligent about maximizing your cleverness potential. Once you begin your current masterpiece, stick with it, even if your certainty wavers or your muse slips away. You are closer to success than you realize if only you believe.

You may be pleasantly surprised by all the fantastic support you receive at work today. However, assistance arrives in funny ways and you could miss it if you are looking too hard in a different direction. Nevertheless, you have a wonderful opportunity now to improve the quality of your everyday life if you can get past your own resistance to change. The choice is yours; be courageous and let others nurture your current growth. Everything is easier with a little help from your friends.

The importance of having fun cannot be overstated because you're highly creative today if you're free to play while you work. But there's no reason to impose arbitrary limits on what you can do. Even if you don't reach an unattainable goal now, you will still progress further along your path. Extending yourself as much as you can improves your chances of making the most of the current opportunities. Just be sure to find pleasure in whatever you choose to do. Passion fuels your success.

Your dreams are a significant source of inspiration, yet you need to exercise a bit of caution today. It's easy to get lost within your own mind, but auspicious Jupiter is so radiant now that you might not even realize if something is amiss. Fortunately, you have the power to direct your thoughts away from outrageous fantasies and turn them into profound visualizations that can change your life for the better. Channel your creativity into your work.

Your recent efforts may come to fruition today, but not necessarily in the ways you expect. You are more content with your life now and might stop to bask in the awareness of a job well done. Be careful or your blind optimism will lead to laziness, since this isn't the time to relax yet. Reveling in your current accomplishments could be counterproductive if they are only part of a larger goal. Don't let the next steps in your progress slip further behind schedule just because you're feeling complacent. Continue to strike while the iron is hot.

You may be offered a new deal that emphasizes the extraordinary potential of an unexpected opportunity. You can't rely on previous assumptions since the rules of the game are changing as it's being played. You might think that everything you imagine will unfold according to your plans but overconfidence is not your friend. Nevertheless, acting on your good intentions enables you to learn an important lesson from the obstacles you now face.

You're at another turning point in your life, but everything could seem more significant than it actually is. Although it still may take several months to see real progress on your long-term goals, your current choices are instrumental in setting your new direction. Don't worry if you can't bundle all your desires into one major goal today. Just allow your daydreams to flow without analysis. As Albert Einstein wrote, "The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination."

You're bouncing around from one amazing distraction to another, but you are afraid that others might perceive you as being flighty and unreliable. Unfortunately, your innate restlessness increases if you limit your self-expression by trying to finish every single thing you start. Luckily, you can complete projects soon enough; just enjoy your high spirits now, even if you're secretly worrying that you're just wasting your time and energy. Your passion for life is contagious.

It seems as if someone is pushing you to go faster than your comfort level. Fortunately, you are enthusiastic about the prospects of where your work is leading, even if the current instability triggers a familiar fear of change. Don't let old memories get in the way of new opportunities. Thankfully, you won't need to sacrifice too much security in order to keep up with how quickly your life is progressing. Letting go of the past empowers you to embrace the future.

An authority figure may grant you the freedom of choice today. You are being offered a clean start, but you still must take the initiative in order to follow your dreams. Even if some of the details are not in order yet, you can put the pieces together along the way. Seize the day and don't look back.

You might be uncomfortably aware that something significant is missing from your life. You may feel as if you're caught up in a big wave of uncertainty. However, if you try to plant your feet in the ground and resist, you could end up regretting that you missed an opportunity of a lifetime. Trust the process and let go.

Excessive drama isn't typically your cup of tea. Nevertheless, someone could rock your world by sharing surprising news, an unusual opportunity or an innovative idea today. However, it's not wise to jump too quickly. Instead, exercising cautious optimism is prudent since anything that enters your life now looks better than it really is. Nevertheless, if you don't jeopardize your current stability, you could find yourself embarking on a major journey.

Making minor improvements to your lifestyle by introducing new habits into your daily routine can have lasting positive impact. Fortunately, it's easier than you expect to move past old emotional patterns that previously prevented you from taking the next step on your path. However, there's no room for halfway measures today. You know exactly what you must do now, so for the sake of your health don't delay any longer.

Although incoming waves of nostalgia remind you to gently let go of the past, you have a rather narrow window of time in which to launch yourself into the future. Just don't allow your confidence grow into arrogance because you're still likely to encounter a little turbulence along the way. Enjoy the ride, bumps and all.

This is your chance to reinvent your life by remembering your personal history and then rewriting your story with a new ending. Don't be too hard on yourself if you need more time to put your ducks in order before making your move. It's helpful to revisit the past as long as you remember to focus on the present.

You can't avoid the realization that your life is gradually transforming, although the pace of events in your personal world seems accelerated today. Even if you're not keeping up with everything, there's no immediate need for worry; at least, the new routine looks like it could be a lot of fun. However, if you experience a glimmer of self-doubt, remember that he who hesitates is lost. Say yes to change and the rest of the puzzle will slowly fall into place.

Expressing a sigh of relief is appropriate today as the pressure to get ahead at work temporarily eases. In the meantime, continue to move a project along at your own speed by taking a good idea and developing it further. You might be tempted to start immediately, but impulsive actions won't create lasting results. Confucius says, "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones."

You may not even notice how reckless your behavior is today while the self-directed Aries Moon triggers action before thought. Take the time to play out all the alternatives in your mind before hitching your wagon to the best one.

Opening your heart to your unexpressed desires is the healthiest strategy now, but you may find it difficult to distinguish your fickle attractions from what's absolutely critical to your happiness. Making separate lists for your needs and your wishes helps prioritize the possibilities ahead. Sorting through your choices is the first step toward self-empowerment. Taking responsibility for your future enables you to make better decisions in the long run.

You can't stop the unceasing chatter from reaching your ears, even if the words don't offer any viable solutions. Irrepressible Mars is rattling your 7th House of Others, spurring you to initiate controversial conversations by rapidly firing your thoughts into a stream of consciousness. However, the wild emotional waters morph into a gently meandering river later in the day. Your sense of urgency might fade but your convictions remain. There's no reason to procrastinate; never put off until tomorrow what you can do today.

No one will realize how lost you are feeling if you project your strong and silent side today. Your natural inclination is to keep your insecurities quiet rather than acknowledging any confusion. Although you're correct to believe you should only share business matters on a need-to-know basis, discussing your fears with a trusted friend can help alleviate your stress.

You might go to extreme measures to finish a significant project today, but it appears it will take longer than you first expected. Listen simultaneously to the wise encouragement and the fearful restraint of the universe. Moderate your pace while you still can solve the problems in front of you.

Instead of needlessly worrying about everything you want to accomplish, you are more interested in simply avoiding stress now. Even if you believe that maintaining the status quo makes the most sense, you might just be rationalizing your current resistance to change. Adopting a flexible attitude may lead to a sweet surprise as the day unfolds.

You don't appreciate being put on the spot, especially if you're on your own territory. You might choose to display your annoyance today because you can't help but see matters from multiple points of view. Nevertheless, pursuing the course of least resistance is your smartest response for now. Thankfully, you can turn nearly any performance into a successful one. Keep your personal opinions private until you are sure your audience is on the same page.

You might exhaust your energy today by jumping through the same mental hoops again and again. However, you believe your reaction will work each time you respond in the same manner as before. Unfortunately, you could easily end up wasting limited resources by relying on old linear tactics. You may be happily surprised by the outcome if you adopt a radically different approach now. Taking the road less traveled makes all the difference in the world.

It appears as if you're quickly running out of time, so stop dilly-dallying and start to sort things out with a new plan of action. But don't fret if there are still miscellaneous details to uncover. Unfortunately, you might lose your chance by waiting until you have all your ducks in a row. You can fill in more missing pieces over the weeks ahead. Take full advantage of the enterprising Aries Moon before it settles into placid Taurus this afternoon. Welcome the opportunities with open arms while you can.

You can't rush anything now, even if you want to create something constructive for your future. Luckily, you will intuitively know when the energy is right to make your move. Remember, your mental preparation is a key ingredient in your current enterprise. You're being tested today, so narrow your vision and limit your concentration solely to accomplishing your goals. Monitor your own progress and gently nudge yourself back on track if you're lured off course for any reason. Ambition is your friend.

Reconnecting with people from your past makes for happy memories in the present. However, you might also waste precious energy doing something that is not critical to your long-term goals. It's wise to rein in any loose ends early on today or you could lose control of your schedule before you know it. Fewer distractions now make it easier to find the personal satisfaction and professional success that you seek.

You're enthusiastic about moving ahead with a collaborative project today. But you're so anxious to get started that you might try to invent something special on your own. Thankfully, you may receive kudos for your current efforts and gain enough recognition to make your new venture worthwhile. However, it's still crucial to exercise caution because you could become so enamored with your performance that you forget others can make important contributions, too. The synergy of working together is a winning formula for success.

Rather than impulsively modifying your direction to increase your chances of success, apply the stabilizing potential of today's earthy Taurus New Moon in your 2nd House of Self-Worth. There's no need to change your destination if you believe in yourself, for altering your plans only distracts you from what you need to be doing now. Instead, rethink your strategy and then reallocate your resources so you can gain efficiency on your current journey. As Gandhi said, "Action expresses priorities."

A convergence of unrelated circumstances requires you to decide what comes next in your life. But don't limit your options by focusing on a recent setback; wipe the slate clean so you aren't constricted by yesterday's plans. The Taurus New Moon activates your 1st House of Self, enabling you to express a higher level of self-determination over the weeks ahead if you are willing to make a decision today. However, choosing which road to take at this junction isn't enough; you must also commit to giving one hundred percent until you accomplish your goal.

An apparently trivial choice made today could have profound consequences that are not yet obvious. In fact, every move you make may be more important in the long run than you realize because the Taurus New Moon galvanizes your 12th House of Destiny. Although you're tempted to keep everything light and easy, it's wiser to stop and contemplate the ramifications of your actions before going too far. If you're unsure of your direction, refrain from making any changes until you gain clarity. Doing nothing at all is better than doing something you quickly regret.

Although you might not be able to avoid your responsibilities, you don't need to waste time micromanaging a project at work today. Instead, acknowledge the Taurus New Moon's impact on your 11th House of Long-Term Goals by leaving time in your day to plan for your future. Don't be afraid to be bold in your thinking, for your current ideas are more pragmatic than you realize. As Theodore Roosevelt said, "Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground."

A methodical approach to managing your resources enables you to advance at work rather than getting caught up in idealistic dreams. The Taurus New Moon empowers your 10th House of Career, inspiring you to successfully accomplish a project that you begin today. Even if you don't actually initiate action on a new venture now, at least evaluate your options and devise a strategy that will carry you forward. If you're contemplating enrolling in a program to expand your career horizons, the Taurus New Moon's presence in your 9th House of Higher Education could nudge you further along that line of thinking. However, if your idea of personal growth doesn't involve the classroom, you might consider taking a working vacation that allows you to travel and widen your perspective in other ways. An open mind allows you to explore the world with open eyes.

You derive great meaning from relationships of all types. However, you're currently attracted to interactions that lead you into unexplored interpersonal realms as the Taurus New Moon emphasizes your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Although the cosmos is reminding you that a joint venture might offer more advantages than going off on your own, there are pros and cons to giving up your autonomy. Nevertheless, the right partner could offer the ways and means for you to reach your goal. Making a smart alliance now is certainly in your best interest as long as your intentions are noble.

Letting go of a hurtful memory enables you to see beyond your previously limited point of view. Your emotional IQ is boosted by your common sense as the earthy Taurus New Moon mobilizes your 7th House of Relationships. You're ready to say yes to a new project today but only if it meets your particular conditions. It's not that you lack vision; it's just that you're more concerned now with completing one task before beginning something else. You are entering a highly creative phase where the possibilities are only limited by what you believe. However, it makes sense to push ahead on a project as long as you are harnessing enthusiasm that has been building for some time. Change the plan and not the goal.

It's time to set a stake in the ground that can be used as a cornerstone for the foundation you are busy constructing. Although there will be a fair share of obstacles ahead, creating consistency in your life is crucial now as the Taurus New Moon feeds your 4th House of Security. Ultimately, building on what you have already gained is possible as long as you feel emotionally safe. However, your future will be more uncertain if you are anxious about your present vulnerability. Stability is more important to success than brilliance when push comes to shove.

Although you may be an idealist by nature, it's time to temporarily put your dreams away and face the music in the mundane world. The uncomplicated Taurus New Moon fuels your 3rd House of Communication, encouraging you to stick to the basic facts in all interactions. Oddly enough, you can experience a satisfying peace of mind when you accept reality as it is.

You're invincible now, or so you think, believing that your skills enable you to overcome nearly any obstacle that comes between you and your goals. Nevertheless, you must process a darker energy today as you wrestle with the temptation to place your needs before everyone else's. Selfish actions could backfire on you if you strive excessively for too much personal satisfaction at the expense of others. Using your superpowers for the greater good brings happiness to all.

Moving your energy -- both physically and emotionally -- is just what the doctor ordered. Make a commitment to propel yourself into motion if you feel stuck today. You might be highly motivated, yet still unsure how to find the right path. Although your strategy could be incomplete, don't wait until you figure it out. Shift into first gear; once you're making progress, the details will fall into place without much effort on your part.

Even those people who usually admire your cool and casual style want more depth and intensity from you now. This magnetic attraction to a deeper experience comes at a perfect time, since you're bored with clever one-liners and shallow connections. You're captivated by powerful Pluto and won't be distracted from the real magic that's behind the curtain. Luckily, others come to your aid because their needs match yours. Engaging in a collaborative process today enables you to cultivate an insightful perspective.

Although a major crisis continues to brew beneath the surface, you're certain about the actions you need to take now. High drama reaches a breaking point today as the evocative Moon tensely opposes combative Mars. Even if you decide to keep some of your feelings to yourself, it's still wise to exert your will while you have the chance to create positive change. Thankfully, you don't need to play all your cards in order to have a winning hand.

Reaching a decision today is more complicated than you expect, for one solution doesn't address the wide array of needs that are now being expressed. Someone might request your emotional support, but you're tempted to decline in an effort to handle your own affairs. Just be certain you are acting for the greater good of all involved when establishing your priorities. Although extra effort is necessary on your part, you have the ingenuity and determination to come up with the answers.

You possess an unrelenting desire to make deeply-rooted changes in your life now. However, your current interest has little to do with your regular daily routine. Instead, you are passionate about redirecting your entire trajectory, including transforming your personal needs and those of others in your immediate environment. But don't act unilaterally today. Taking everyone's feelings into consideration will produce the most profound changes.

Something can happen that suddenly alters the direction of the path you're on. Your epiphany may not be a total life-changer, but your newfound awareness opens the possibility to make a serious shift that you've been putting off for too long. However, minimizing your experience invites unwanted surprises. You will run into less resistance if you act authentically with the very same level of intensity that you're feeling now. As Galileo wrote, "Passion is the genesis of genius."

Although you might encounter obstacles created by other people's fears or even your own secretive nature, you can clear the way of negativity now. The radiant Sun harmonizes with your key planet Pluto today, revealing an easier path to express your innermost thoughts and feelings. Be fierce; relentlessly focus on the truth while opening your heart as wide as possible. You may be pleasantly surprised where this emotional journey takes you. Stay patient and trust the process.

You dream of soaring unrestrained through the galaxy at warp speed. However, your more cautious side is still worrying about what you might need to leave behind now. Your current sentimentality isn't your typical reaction, but it's a good idea to give full power to any feelings of uncertainty you may be experiencing. The sooner you acknowledge your fear, the faster you can resume your cosmic adventure. However, believing in yourself is required before the booster rockets fire.

A battle within overflows into the outer world today, whether or not you're ready for the extra drama. You're confronted by other people's feelings and you begin to see how they might alter your direction. Reconsider your plans once again as an homage to Mercury retrograde; this time include the feedback you receive in your new strategy. Not only will you gain the respect of those who matter, you'll also be able to make fundamental changes that move you closer to your goals.

Your current dilemma involves the pull between wanting to be spontaneous and the need to withhold your feelings. You want to say exactly what's on your mind today, but might worry that you could offend someone if you speak the truth. Ultimately, you're driven toward self-expression, but not without first experiencing a fair share of stress. Your best friends want the real you, not a watered-down version that is diluted to maintain social acceptance. Follow your heart and don't look back.

You are swimming in very wild waters now -- waters so deep that sunlight can't reach you. The bright colors have faded into darker shades of gray. But don't get distracted by the otherworldly nature; it comes along with the territory. You have powerful work to do, so face your fears and shine your inner light into the darkness. Slowly return to the surface only when you are ready to reengage. Happily, your friends will be waiting for you with open arms.

Your spontaneity can work against you when you rush off to the next activity before you finish the current one. Fortunately, you understand the advantage of moving methodically today and you're able to see a task through to the end. Nevertheless, your restlessness is still a problem if the pace falls behind your expectations. Demonstrate your maturity by accepting delays as part of the process. Personal satisfaction will be your reward if you stick with the job at hand, even if you would prefer to be doing something new.

You're in touch with the strength of your own convictions today and are positive you can handle anything that might test your resolve. But feeling confident isn't enough to guarantee your success; you must be willing to reconsider your basic assumptions even if it means going back to the drawing board. Restarting a project now allows you to build a more solid foundation that can support whatever comes next. Make your move before this window of opportunity closes or you may regret it later on.

You might believe that it's more efficient to limit interpersonal communication to the safe realms of rational thinking while steering clear of illogical emotions. However, it's difficult to hide your feelings now that the moody Moon is back in your sign. But taking an objective approach won't enable you to cleverly charm your way around the hot spots in your path. Slow down and review a full range of alternative strategies before choosing a course of action. Ask your heart to point you in the right direction.

You are silly one moment yet serious the next as you remember some of the profound emotional transitions you've experienced over the last few years. You're finally ready to move on, but still may be overly sensitive to your past if there are leftover feelings weighing heavily on your heart. Revisiting childhood memories unlocks the key to resolving an old issue. Reframing your own history in a healthier light frees you to do something brilliant in the present moment.

Interpersonal interactions could run into a few unexpected snags today. A recent disappointment might seem like a big deal, but Mercury retrograde in your 10th House of Public Life tells a slightly different story. You are being given time to review the details that led to the present predicament and to examine how the blockages are symbolic of your own feelings now. Awareness is power; once you fully understand your role in creating the current drama you can steadily push on through to the other side.

It seems as if the public spotlight has found you now, but you might prefer to hide from view, anyhow. You're more likely to withdraw socially in order to manage your new responsibilities. If control issues are part of your problem you may try to proceed as a solo act, but your ambitious strategy could backfire today. Acknowledge that you need to be a part of a larger group, tribe or family. You don't have to do everything on your own; a sense of community is integral to your success.

You take your philosophy of life quite seriously now and may need to make choices that put you in an emotionally vulnerable position. Although there are many beautiful people in your life, you might wish that they would join you on your spiritual quest. However, there's nothing wrong with having lots of acquaintances as long as you don't let your fears stand in the way of transforming a casual relationship into something more meaningful. Live by the Golden Rule and be the kind of friend you wish you had.

You don't know whether to tell someone how you feel or let your concerns pass without saying anything at all. It's useful to examine what your past patterns have to do with your current eagerness to help others -- even if they haven't asked for it. Compassion is a lovely gift, but codependency is not a viable path to happiness. Your job isn't to fix anyone else; just work on being the best possible version of you.

Stand up and spread your wings; it's time to claim your power. However, if you find yourself entangled in an unexpected struggle for control now, step back and take responsibility only for what is yours. You don't have to win an argument today because the price can be too great. Turn a challenge into an opportunity to learn something about yourself as you handle the resistance with courage and grace.

The weekend brings relaxation for many people, but not so much for you ambitious Goats. You are buzzing like a worker bee with the Moon's presence in your 6th House of Service. There are just too many separate things that demand your attention around the hive today. It might even feel like a day of judgment and, of course, you want it called in your favor. Apply yourself diligently but avoid self-criticism. Continue to work as hard as possible while remembering that you're in it for the long haul. Rome wasn't built in a day.

It might appear as if your relationship life is improving, but you're still fearful of losing control and crashing into a wall. Try not to doubt your ability to succeed if you must clean up a mess that originated from a simple miscommunication. An unnecessary conflict with a loved one can gobble up valuable time if you take it as a sign of defeat. But you should be able to accomplish whatever is necessary once you realize that the current events are clues about the work you have yet to do when it comes to love.

This weekend is optimal for cooling off your emotions and reevaluating what you want from your closest relationships. You may be more analytical than usual now and less emotionally attached to the outcome. It's not that you are ready to throw in the towel; it's just that you're able to see the futility of trying to change someone else's feelings. The only thing you can control is the honesty of your own response which, hopefully, inspires others to follow your example.

Your feelings are intrinsically connected with the central purpose in your life and you can impact others deeply now as long as you stay true to yourself. However, people won't necessarily agree with your position even if you're willing to discuss your differences. In fact, you could be so in tune with your intentions today that there's no need to talk about it any further once you share your perspective. Your disclosure is like planting a seed that requires time to germinate without additional interference. Water your garden and watch it grow.

You're quite animated today, but people may not fully understand your intensity. In your eagerness to make your point you could oversimplify your presentation, which can create problems if others take your words at face value. Be careful, since a small misunderstanding about a missing fact might turn a simple discussion upside down. Let the conversation flow organically and don't try to push the process. It's much easier to prevent the conflict beforehand than to untangle it once it begins.

In theory, you should be unbeatable today when your words align with your intentions. However, conversations grow complicated if your message is garbled as interactive Mercury disappears into the Sun's intense radiance. You could be thinking clearly, but your thoughts are highly subjective now that the Moon is activating your sign. It's admirable to have faith in your convictions but don't try to use logic to convince anyone else of the validity of your point of view. Focus on your creative pursuits and let others draw their own conclusions when they're ready.

You are swimming in deeper waters these days and possess an opportunity to enrich your relationships if you have the courage to sink into the emotional depths. Paradoxically, your life might feel one dimensional now as the retrograde Mercury-Sun conjunction grinds your thoughts to a temporary standstill. It's futile to rely on your brain to figure out the dynamics of passion. Your friends may want to drag you into their dramas; however, the call is yours. Don't join in unless you think you can make a positive difference.

You're still trying to find a comfortable middle ground before you make a difficult decision, but it's tough if there are important emotional issues at stake. Your brain overflows with sensible ideas while the Sun aligns with cerebral Mercury today, prompting you to initiate action immediately. Trust your logic instead of waiting to receive approval from anyone else. Sometimes your head knows what your heart has yet to learn.

You may be fantasizing about an exotic adventure that will take you far from the mundane world. Pulling out all the stops in your imagination enables you to dream about your future without holding back. Visualize buying an airline ticket and heading off into the great wide open with a carefree heart. It might be challenging to transform your thoughts into reality now, but anything is possible as long as you keep the faith and take your journey one step at a time.

Push past your tendency to keep everything light and easy. Creative juices are flowing in your imagination today, yet you must be willing to embark on a quest to get the rewards. You want to do what's right, but you might be challenged to figure out exactly what that means. Although it's fine to discuss your plans with someone you trust, saying too much now could disperse the energy prematurely. Share your ideas but only on a need to know basis; this time around less turns out to be better than more.

You might catch glimpses of the mysteries that are usually unreachable and unknowable while the doors to other dimensions are unlocked today. However, it's likely that someone will ruffle your feathers by attempting to pull you into the mundane world. Fortunately, you are the captain of your own ship. Stand up for your rights, but don't back yourself into a corner in the process. Start from the assumption that others have your best interests at heart and work for a swift resolution. Don't waste time with trivial pursuits when you hold the keys to the cosmos.

It's back to the daily grind for you today. You may prefer daydreaming about an upcoming trip, escaping into an adventure novel or getting lost in a good movie, but there are important things that you must do, instead. Unfortunately, your work prevents you from broadening your horizons and moving beyond your immediate obligations now. But don't just chain yourself to the desk; as a compromise, step outside and get some fresh air if you need to clear your head first.

Someone may be trying to emotionally manipulate you, but it's nearly impossible to tell who is behind this alleged plot. Thankfully, you might find a reward that you weren't even looking for now if you're willing to let go of control and just paddle along with the flow. The pleasant surprise for everyone is what happens when you become more spontaneous in your behavior. Don't bother looking for instructions today; just listen to your inner voice and do what comes naturally.

You could be called upon to perform some kind of care taking duties for someone close to you. Perhaps a family member or an elderly neighbor is in need of your support. Don't shut anyone out even if you think you are incapable of offering assistance today. Keep the communication channels wide open so everyone still feels connected. Explore both the personal and humanitarian aspects of your life to restore a healthy balance to your world.

Previous uncertainty transforms into a practical vision of how you want your future to play out, and you are ready to make a serious effort to manifest it according to your plan. But the signs of change could pass unnoticed if you're not paying close attention. Unfortunately, your desire to reach your destination may not be enough to guarantee success. Consider relaxing your timetable or revising your itinerary. Flexibility is your secret weapon; don't be afraid to use it.

Standing right on the edge of familiarity with one foot in new territory is oddly reassuring for you pioneering Rams. You are in love with the idea of doing something for the first time and are ready to expand your agenda at work now. An exciting venture captures your attention and you're feeling optimistic about the future. Be as adventurous as you wish. Step outside of your self-created constraints of negativity and reach for the stars.

The simple act of experiencing pleasure takes on magical proportions today and makes you feel like all is well in the world. You might see loveliness everywhere you go while your key planet Venus receives a nod of approval from lucky Jupiter, filling you with a sense of contentment. But be on guard, for the temptation of laziness often lurks nearby when times are sweet. Do whatever it takes to overcome the inertia of inaction because opportunities are knocking loudly at your door and you're the only one who can answer.

Everyone you encounter seems to offer the possibility of a good time today. Thankfully, there is an easy flow of energy between you and your coworkers, but you also want to play a major part in any social activities that are brewing. If nothing exciting is on your calendar, then create an event by inviting a few friends to lunch. Try to start your celebration early before your mood shifts later in the afternoon. By nightfall, your easygoing attitude may transform into a desire for more intense emotional communication. Acknowledging your changeability is key to your happiness.

Your nurturing magic is meant for more than just taking care of everyone else today, even if you're only rewarded for being extra sweet on the job. Take responsibility for your own emotional needs by spending time with a loved one. Going out with a close friend or sharing a romantic meal with a partner might be just what you need to reignite the flame of intimacy in a relationship. If nothing else, at least treat yourself to something special. Being nice to yourself is a signal to the rest of the world to do the same.

You feel as if you're on center stage, ready to give a million-dollar performance. Happily, the combination of your talent and enthusiasm is appreciated by your friends. In fact, they like you enough to applaud and ask for more, whether or not you're up for doing an encore. Although the positive feedback energizes you, it's absolutely critical to know when to stop. If you push the envelope too far, you could ruin a magical moment. Leaving your audience wanting more is the mark of a true entertainer.

Taking care of unfinished business sounds like a necessary task today, but you may grow restless while trying to follow through with your plans. Your intentions are honorable, but distractions abound and it's tempting now to pick a path that leads to fleeting pleasure instead of a sense of accomplishment. Sharing your heart with a friend can spark a delightful dialogue, but you might regret your decision if you don't also meet your obligations at work.

Your trajectory is on the rise now that charming Venus trines propitious Jupiter, triggering the reflective Moon in your 10th House of Career. It's time to receive recognition from your peers -- and maybe even a raise from your boss. No matter what happens, keep your heart open to generous Jupiter's good fortune. Just don't forget about your duties and obligations as you pursue the next alluring experience. If you handle practical matters first, you can continue to work and play with great success.

You might not have to try very hard for recognition, money or romance to beat a path to your door today. Of course, it's helpful if you're enjoying your work because your ongoing attachment to your daily routine is what pays the bills and feeds your heart. If you no longer gain pleasure from your current regimen now, figure out a way to bring the missing magic back into your life. Do what you love and the rewards will follow.

Your fiery charisma attracts professional opportunities today, but could also court pleasure as beautiful Venus harmonizes with buoyant Jupiter. Romance may find you, even if you're not looking now. Consciously give yourself permission to expect more without worrying about possible failure. If a love interest doesn't work out successfully, then seek other ways to express your creativity. But don't let your enthusiasm run amok, for indulgent behavior can land you in a heap of trouble. Moderation is the secret to your sweet success.

Although today is a workday for many, you're more interested in searching for enjoyment now than anything else. You might discover fascinating ideas that motivate you to reconsider your priorities. You are genuinely more affectionate as you express your appreciation to others. It's okay to break the rules and indulge in something outrageous simply for the pleasure it brings. You can put yourself back on the straight and narrow path tomorrow after you've had your share of fun.

You are busy reevaluating your list of the necessary ingredients for personal fulfillment at work. After much contemplation, you're ready to try again now that you're back on top of your game. However wonderful everything seems today, don't fret if you end up having to try one more time. Don't fake confidence if you're unsure of your destination. Expressing your vulnerability increases your lovability while also improving your chances of happiness.

Blue skies and endless horizons tempt you to believe that everything is blissful today; however, your optimistic conclusions might lure you down a dangerous path. Honor your concerns instead of just glossing over them on your search for the next priceless treasure. Be wise and examine the pitfalls of pursuing pleasure over choosing the responsible route. Fortunately, amazing experiences are yours for the asking as long as you maintain your balance in the real world.

You may feel as if you're not getting enough sleep these days but you're probably still raring to go. The Moon's early morning square to electric Uranus wires your nervous system today, but your body might not be so quick to follow your brain. You could push yourself too hard now, so watch your physical energy level for signs of exhaustion before piling more on your busy schedule. Set priorities and focus on one thing at a time so you have something positive to show for your efforts at the end of the day.

You continue to wait for the best moment to express something that's been on your mind. Your current frustration might provoke you to start a difficult conversation now even if the timing isn't ideal. However, people will lose interest if you allow your words to wander aimlessly. Keep your message short and sweet. Reassure everyone that you aren't looking for a fast answer; you simply want to be heard and acknowledged. Sometimes a little appreciation from a coworker is all you need to lift your spirits.

Starting a new project requires laying the groundwork, yet you don't seem able to move beyond the preparation stage. There are so many choices in front of you now that it's nearly impossible to pick just one mission. In fact, you thought your plan was infallible until you began to reconsider all the unexplored options. In order to narrow your field of vision, rein in your ambitions for the next few weeks and then reevaluate your long-term goals. Focusing on your immediate needs positively impacts your future.

Your thoughts may double back on themselves today, making you doubt your recent decisions. The reflective Moon forms several uncomfortable aspects while finishing up her monthly visit to your cautious sign. You prefer to contain your emotions now, and even people close to you might not realize the magnitude of your unsettled moods. Nevertheless, avoiding your truth isn't healthy in the long run. If you decide to keep your feelings private, at least stay conscious of them. Exercising self-awareness is the key to thriving rather than just surviving.

Someone at work might place unspoken demands on you today and you're unsure of the best way to respond. You know that you are clever enough to dance around the edge of the unknown, but you quickly realize that your logic won't help you regain control of your day. Attempting to guess the motives of others only brings frustration now. Practicing the fine art of emotional detachment helps to alleviate the current pressure. Be courageous and initiate an honest dialogue if you want to know the truth.

You aren't sure how to establish new objectives at work today because you're being pulled in two different directions at once. Furthermore, separating the useful information from those facts that only support your position can be a challenging endeavor. Evaluating all your choices is a daunting task if you believe a long-term decision is required now. Thankfully, you have more time than you realize to sort out your next move. Slow down and smell the flowers while you have the chance.

You like the idea of picking up the pace, but reality might be more of an obstacle course than a race track. You're missing the bounce to your step as Saturn pesters your ruling planet Venus, giving you one reason after another why you still must wait for the green light. Nevertheless, it's still beneficial to dream about your ideal future without worrying about whether or not it's actually possible. Today's fantasies can grow into tomorrow's reality with a little luck and a lot of work.

Other people's expectations may conflict with your personal needs today. Unfortunately, you could become disillusioned if you don't see a simple way to get your basic needs met. Denial is not an option; your unconscious desires will only grow in volume if you don't monitor your feelings as they develop. Naturally, digging deep is a significant part of being a passionate Scorpio. Thankfully, stepping into the shadows to explore emotional issues from a logical perspective produces positive results.

Staying serious throughout the day challenges you high-spirited Archers, even if there are important obligations to fulfill. Nevertheless, it seems as if your best of intentions are not enough to keep you on the straight and narrow track. Although stern Saturn is quite demanding as it slowly moves through your sign, pleasure-seeking Venus is currently playing her own game of fortune. Stop fighting the inevitable; instead of limiting your activities to the material world, let go for a while and see where the cosmic detours take you.

People seem extra needy today, amplifying your anxiety and prompting you to protect yourself from unnecessary emotional entanglements. The Moon is finishing up her monthly business in your 7th House of Others today, highlighting how you respond in a relationship rather than what you might do on your own. Unfortunately, everything could quickly grow more complicated if you attempt to take the lead now. Love is more interesting if you're willing to step out of the spotlight for a while and play a supporting role, instead.

You may consider staying home today, even if your real-world responsibilities are calling. Your friends and coworkers might assume that your current desire for solitude is a sign that something's wrong, but they couldn't be further off target. Taking time for personal matters is a powerful way to get in touch with beautiful Venus in your 4th House of Roots. Don't worry about what others think; your emotional security is the foundation of your future growth.

Awkward planetary positions distract you from meeting your commitments today. You are likely to aspire to ambitious goals since Saturn is holding ground for an extended stay in your 10th House of Status; however, opportunities for play outweigh the rewards for hard work as the day progresses. It's smarter now to set aside your previous plans and simply make up new ones as you go along. Spontaneous bursts of creativity and random acts of compassion bring more joy into your life than anything else.

You are motivated to say exactly what's on your mind now. However, you must pick your topics of discussion carefully because your words might stir up more controversy than you wish. You won't be satisfied to tow the party line today, yet you still appear to have ideas that are intelligent and sensible. Be clear and stick to the point; others will listen to you even if they don't agree with your opinion. Keep all communication channels open to maximize positive growth.

Although sometimes you may be accused of avoiding the toughest questions, no such possibility exists now. You're eager to discover more meaning and you want others to follow your lead today. But even if everyone understands what brings you closer to your truth, it could lure them further away from theirs. Don't expect people to endorse your ideas by joining your cause; just make certain that it's valid for you before you act on your beliefs. Seek answers from within.

You are averse to making a major decision today and yet you know what your preference would be if you were forced to share it. Don't let anyone coerce you into talking before you are fully ready or you might end up resenting whoever tries to control the situation. A kind word and a smile are enough to keep the peace for now.
