How much to reveal and when to reveal it is solely your choice alone.

You aren't necessarily feeling as lighthearted as you appear today, but others won't realize it unless they push you to say something you don't actually believe. Fortunately, your support is not up for grabs to the highest bidder. In fact, you might not be willing to acquiesce to someone else's expectations right now; you just want to continue doing the best job you can without making any further promises about the future. Sometimes pulling into your shell is the best defense.

An innocent conversation could take an unexpected turn and lead you into the shadows today, where you can see previously hidden areas of your consciousness. New ideas rise into awareness, inspiring you to do something about them; nevertheless, it might be wiser to simply observe your feelings now while waiting to act until a later time. Keep in mind that your decision to remain silent adds to your current air of mystery, which isn't necessarily a bad thing. Exploring your dreams is more productive on your own.

You sound quite opinionated about many subjects today, yet you might not be all that interested in sharing your most personal feelings. It's not that you are emotionally detached from your words; it's just this is more of an intellectual exercise now than something of integral importance to you. But you still could get caught up in needing to be right while Mercury is occupying your 9th House of Higher Truth. Nevertheless, backing down from an indefensible position is a true sign of wisdom.

There is a sharp edge to your tongue today as incisive Mercury forms a smooth connection with suspicious Pluto. Your words can cut to the bone and your message could inadvertently do damage before you even realize what happened. It's one thing to take a swipe at an opponent intentionally; however, it doesn't feel good if you accidentally hurt a friend. Thankfully, taking a compassionate approach right from the start enables you to spread love and light rather than fear and darkness.

You long for some quality downtime today because you've been running on overdrive for a while. Although the pace has begun to wear on your nerves, you are able to rejuvenate your energy by keeping your emotions private. There's no need to tell all your secrets, even if you are feeling extroverted now. Don't give away too much of your time; you gain more power by taking care of yourself. Clear your schedule to recharge your batteries and regenerate your vitality before it's too late.

It's time to undertake a project that requires a serious amount of mental fortitude since you have the skills to concentrate until the job is done. Luckily, your ability to muster support from friends makes everything run smoother now. Although the potential for fun is always looming near the horizon, don't be distracted until you accomplish something tangible. Dig in your heels and complete as much work as you can today. Determination is your friend.

You feel as if you have been on an emotional roller coaster and it may finally be time to end the ride today. But you must be creative in your approach when you stand up to those who complicate your life with their expectations. Don't blame anyone else for your extreme emotions now; if you do, you'll just go around again and again in the same conversation. Instead, accept responsibility for your part in the recent drama and be ready to move on once and for all.

You may be surprised by the intensity of your own feelings now that relentless Pluto trines Mercury in your 4th House of Roots. You assume that you understand the current situation only to discover that everything isn't as you believed. Fortunately, you can think on your feet and are quite capable of quickly regaining your balance when a surprise comes your way. But don't dwell on the past; once things are stable again, let go of any residual negativity you might be carrying for no reason. Creativity abounds when you stay in the present moment.

Rather than looking for comfort from the members of your tribe, you're more interested in having them infuse more meaning into your life. There's a part of you that won't be satisfied until you've turned your support network on its ear now that Mercury is pushing Pluto's buttons in your 11th House of Friends. But most people might not be proactive enough for you until you do something radical that catches them off balance. Fortunately, once you shine your light, others will be more likely to follow.

A whole new level of reality is available if you tune into the previously unseen world that exists beyond the obvious distractions. Although you may be itching to move on to your next experience, you'll miss the magic if you acquiesce to the latest flashy temptation. Don't let the noise lure you away from your heart. Even if you are fearful of what you may discover, pushing through your uncertainty brings love closer to you now. The only way you can find peace is by facing the truth.

You are not satisfied with a simple solution to your unfulfilled needs. You want more now and are willing to run an obstacle course for your reward. Ironically, your non-negotiable desires, coupled with your unflappable determination, could actually lead you to the goodies you seek if you know when to ease up on the gas. Unfortunately, placing too much pressure on someone might stir up a hornet's nest instead of creating a love nest. Surprisingly, expressing your feelings in a flexible and gentle manner offers the best chance for finding happiness.

You have a rare opportunity to deepen a relationship now by using your wit and charm. But employing humor to sidestep your inconvenient feelings will only add anxiety to the day. The key to your satisfaction is making people more comfortable with the emotional intensity. Nevertheless, it's a tricky balancing act; if you are too easygoing, you might lose the potential potency of the moment. However, holding firmly to your agenda while modifying your approach could be an unbeatable combination.

Bringing your feelings into the discussion at the right time leads to a successful power play at work while earning you a new wave of respect. Nevertheless, you must tread lightly because your friends and allies might resist your plan if you arouse their anger. Unfortunately, you may end up wasting valuable resources dealing with an unnecessary drama if you push your luck. Thankfully, sharing control is not as complicated as it sounds and is a great way to strengthen your support network.

Playful flirting can suddenly turn serious today, so don't send out the invitation unless you are ready to give one hundred percent to your romantic gestures. On the other hand, revitalizing a long-term relationship might be more rewarding than starting up a new one. Just exercise caution; you won't be able to cool the passion down as quickly as you fired it up if the feelings grow hot. It's fantastic if both of you are on the same page, but don't trifle with anyone's heart if you're not.

Unexpressed feelings intensify relationships in unforeseeable ways today. You might try to avoid the uncertainty of emotional conflict, but the outcome could be more fruitful than you expect. A power struggle may come out of nowhere, especially if family memories are triggered by current circumstances. Keep in mind that your fears are more problematic than what's actually occurring now. Taking a risk and sharing your concerns with someone special can result in a memorable experience.

A casual interaction with a coworker can be enough to lift your spirits now. Potent Pluto and your key planet Venus join in a marriage between power and beauty today, emphasizing the best parts of any type of relationship. Unfortunately, lasting pleasure won't come without sincere intentions and hard work; desire is simply not enough. Be brave and reveal your feelings to start the ball rolling in the right direction. Opening your heart inspires others to do the same.

Disclosing your feelings is less of a struggle now if you acquiesce and go along for an emotional ride, no matter where it takes you. Your key planet Pluto is on the receiving end of a delectable kiss from romantic Venus, motivating you to take a nominal risk in love without being overly attached to the outcome. However, everyone seems to be concentrating on a different agenda. Rise to the occasion by shifting your focus from personal satisfaction to global compassion. Choosing the high road expands your heart.

You are graced with a natural ability to shine your love light into the darkness, creating a more meaningful experience without appearing overly serious. Still, there are weighty matters on your mind and you should take them to heart today. Luckily, your thoughtful actions now will begin to resolve the emotional tensions that have plagued the past few weeks. Adopting an I-can-do-it attitude is the first step toward lightening your load.

Although passionate feelings about your relationships intensify today, you might be reluctant to share your likes and dislikes with your friends. Unfortunately, your inner resistance to expressing your needs may reveal that you're not ready to open up to someone special. Even if you prefer to be the strong and silent type, showing your vulnerability can be a sign of courage when you telegraph your availability. Take a chance now and make sure your message comes from your heart.

Confining a professional relationship to strictly business is an understandable tactic, but an unexpected opportunity to share your feelings is intriguing, nonetheless. Of course, it's absolutely crucial to respect appropriate boundaries, but you still can let the other person know what's occurring in your inner world if they seem sincerely interested. Establishing a genuine heart connection reinforces the bonds of friendship and cultivates an atmosphere of teamwork.

Your fascination with a piece of jewelry, furniture, clothing or artwork might tempt you to make a significant purchase today. A burning desire in your heart enchants you with the idea of owning something beautiful, leading you to compulsive behavior now, whether or not you actually acquire anything. Keep in mind that this attraction could simply be a reflection of your growing sense of self-worth. Acknowledging the substantial value you bring to the people you love is worth more than anything money can buy.

There's unfinished projects everywhere you look and you're growing concerned that you're not making sufficient progress on any of them. In fact, you may feel as if you're just running around in circles as long as you try to do everything at once. Instead, choose one single task and stay on it until you are done. Only then will it be time to pick another item on your to-do list. Although you might not work your way through every chore today, at least you'll be satisfied with your accomplishments.

Your creative genie has escaped from its bottle, yet you still may encounter unexpected resistance as you begin a new project. Generally speaking, taking decisive action is tricky business when so many planets are in retrograde motion, but you might not be able to delay your choice. Being well-informed is your secret weapon. Your new direction can prove to be fruitful, as long as your head isn't in the clouds. The more practical you are in your approach now, the more you will have to show for your talent.

Buried feelings, though invisible to others, may follow you around today and color your attitude, making it more difficult to focus on your endeavors. Fortunately, you can consciously choose to dig into thoughts that aren't specifically related to your current responsibilities, even if you choose not to tell anyone about your inner dialogue now. Monitoring your own psychological process helps you successfully cope with nearly any stress you experience. Knowing the difference between what you can and cannot control gives you peace of mind.

It might seem as if someone is picking on you today, or perhaps, somehow having fun at your expense. On one hand, it's possible that you're being overly sensitive. On the other hand, there's no reason to simply remain quiet if you feel like a victim. Express any hurt you may be harboring so that your voice is heard, but then let go of any lingering resentment and move on. There's nothing to be gained now by clinging to the past when the future is so bright.

A recent decision involving your career plans comes under reconsideration one more time today. But reassessing your situation isn't enough; you need to take concrete action to solidify your position. It's not that your current choices are set in stone. It's just that you can't afford to expend too much energy retracing your footsteps by going over the same ground again and again. Standing up for what's most important to you now prevents trouble down the road.

You think you know exactly what you want one minute and then question your feelings just a few moments later. The inconsistency of your desires can be like a thorn in your side while the evocative Moon is back in your sign. Avoid growing frustrated if you can't make up your mind. Postponing your final answer a few more days is actually the best choice for now. Play through the possibilities in your imagination one more time, instead.

Recent financial issues are returning for another round of analysis before you can launch a new venture. Complex partnerships are a lucrative playing field now for investing in your future, but you need time to tie up the loose ends from the past. You want to retreat to a quiet place so you have space to think, but a reflective break is a luxury you might have to forgo today. Even if you are being pushed to declare your position, don't compromise your core values for the sake of expediency.

If your true intention is to help your friends, then resist the temptation to criticize them now. People might not be amenable to your unsolicited advice no matter how gently you deliver your message, even if you just want to offer some constructive comments. Setting the stage for a showdown is a dangerous move. If you sense any tension in the air today, keep your thoughts to yourself for a few days until the energy settles down. Show your support by simply listening to the dreams of others with an open mind and a closed mouth.

You're destined to become a hero today if you stay focused on fulfilling your commitments. Although you're not seeking the spotlight, you're receiving more attention than you prefer now, prompting you to resist any additional obligations tossed your way. Instead of automatically rejecting new responsibilities, find a middle path so you can still save the day and tend to your personal needs at the very same time.

Your social life seems to be building in momentum now, but having fun isn't enough; you're also interested in using your personal connections to get ahead professionally. The good news is that you are able to combine work with play more readily these days. Don't turn down an invitation just because it sounds boring; you never know who you could meet or what might happen. Synchronicity is the language of the stars.

You may receive unsolicited support from someone in power today, but your uncertainty could prompt you to politely decline the assistance. You might be so unsure of someone's intentions now that they appear insincere even when they are well-intended. However, it's possible that the only negativity is your own. Limitations appear to fall away when you believe in your dreams. Trusting in yourself is the first step to trusting anyone else. The universe will show up with magic if you're open to it.

Your interactions with friends can be the source of great clarity today. However, you might prefer to cling to your diaphanous dreams instead of narrowing your vision in order to make it real. It could very well be to your advantage to take the advice that's given and concentrate on the details necessary to reach your goals. The cues you receive from others now are crucial factors in the decisions you make over the next few days. Remaining open to an unbiased opinion is never a bad idea as long as you don't surrender control.

You may underestimate the time required to finish your chores today, but your poor judgment won't necessarily ruin your day. In fact, everything could magically fall into place if you just keep pushing ahead, even if you overlook some of the details. Nevertheless, there's no free lunch; you won't feel the satisfaction of a job well done unless you do the work. It's up to you to find a sustainable balance between concentrating on every minute task and visualizing the overall scope of your day.

You're exceedingly thorough when managing your calendar today because you don't want to miss out on any of the good times ahead. However, participating in recreational activities may require more planning than you think. But there's no reason to tie up your schedule worrying about trivia. If you can't see the forest for the trees, you won't be able to respond to the unexpected changes that crop up along the way. A judicial mix of preparation and flexibility allows you to make the most of your day.

It's advisable to take the high road when responding to a stressful situation today, especially if you encounter unexpected resistance from your friends or family. It may be necessary to justify your actions, even if you prefer to let them speak for you now. However, if you want the support of others, be clear about your intentions and avoid succumbing to self-doubt. Visualizing your destination improves your chances for success. Thankfully, the people who know you best will come around in time.

You wish you were planning a quick little getaway but chores are tugging at you with a sense of urgency. Throwing a temper tantrum won't help you obtain what you want, but neither will a passive-aggressive response. Luckily, showing up with a positive attitude and a willingness to go the extra mile works in your favor now. You'll be surprised at how easily you can fulfill your commitment if you concentrate only on your most pressing obligations, one at a time. Focus on the present and the future will take care of itself.

Although you could be worried about financial difficulties that limit your spending, the pressure might suddenly lighten today. You may receive an unexpected cash windfall or discover there's one less bill to pay. Just don't ignore the bottom line if you are swept up in a wave of optimism. Take all variables into consideration now and make your fiscal decisions based on rational choices rather than emotional preferences.

As much as you want to be able to count on others, you may need to rely on your own survival skills today. It's not that people won't be around to help; it's just that your closest friends seem a bit unpredictable now -- and they could actually disappear without giving much warning. Fortunately, you won't be frustrated if you simply recognize the work in front of you and get on with your day. Assume that you're on your own; it's all the better if someone else jumps in. Find a way to get your chores done with or without assistance. Real progress waits for no one.

You may feel as if you're on edge these days because satisfaction seems close enough to grasp, but it stays just out of reach. It's like a storm is building on the horizon but the rain doesn't come. Ironically, it's your desire for resolution that creates the tension. Instead of concocting a better plan or battening down the hatches, enjoy the smooth sailing today while it lasts. You will be better prepared for the week ahead with a day of rest and relaxation under your belt.

Making plans is tricky because people might not follow through on their promises. For example, your day might turn chaotic if someone lets you down at the last minute. However, all is not lost; in fact, a sudden change of direction could be the best thing that ever happened. No matter how you react, don't infuse your negative emotions into external dynamics. Once you're freed from an uncertain agenda, you can restructure your day anyway you choose. The best part of today's story is that satisfaction is yours when you rely on yourself.

You don't want to take responsibility for anyone else because you believe you've earned a day off. However, the tables are turned when you realize that being in charge enables you to steer events to your liking. Much to your surprise, assuming a leadership role now requires very little extra effort on your part. Happily, when you make decisions based on your personal preferences today, they work out in everyone's favor. Don't hold back; step up to the plate while the planets are smiling in your direction.

Participating in social events is challenging today because you feel like there's too much going on in your life. You want to be an integral part of your extended family or community, but you could take yourself so seriously now that you become wrapped up in your own personal story. Nevertheless, don't isolate yourself from those who love you; the support you offer to others returns to benefit you in the long run.

Discussing your feelings isn't all that comfortable for you heady Aquarians. But your practical concerns outweigh your personal preferences today, encouraging you to address a long-overdue issue. Thankfully, you can perform a balancing act with one foot on the ground while the other one explores the uncertain realm of emotions. Unfortunately, a productive discussion becomes unlikely the longer you delay. Do it now; sometimes later becomes never.

A relationship dilemma that has been dangling from a giant pendulum swings in your favor today. Although it's normal for your emotions to change over time, it seems as if they are finally about to settle down. However, it's a mistake to think everything is as good as it appears now. Nevertheless, there's no reason to go looking for trouble. Enjoying the pleasantries is healing for your heart. Happiness can be yours if you live in acceptance rather than expectation.

You see yourself in a mirror no matter where you look today. Once the Moon enters relationship-oriented Libra, every interaction with someone seems to point you back to your own thoughts and feelings that you know all too well. However, you can't help but wonder if you are missing information that could help you break out of your current rut. Thankfully, you're likely on the right track now, so allow time for your ideas to develop without acting too soon. As Willie Nelson says, "The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese."

There's a lot to do at work and you can't wait to get started. Unfortunately, there may be pesky unresolved issues about a recent event, preventing you from moving on to more enjoyable tasks. Think of today as a transitional phase; there's no need to jump into your current obligations all at once. You'll do better in the long run if you take the time to process your feelings first. Mastering patience empowers you to master everything else.

It's wonderful how quickly your interpersonal landscape can shift when you accept that which you cannot change. It might seem as if you were recently trying to outrun an oncoming storm and now the sky is finally free of clouds. Although some conflicts may not disappear overnight, your laid-back attitude makes it easier to enjoy what the present moment has in store. Even if you don't have time to do something just for the fun of it, take a few minutes to meditate and visualize a pleasurable experience. Your fantasy could come true when you least expect it.

Although the intensity of a conflict at work may diminish today, it doesn't disappear completely. Your tried-and-true tactic of withdrawing from an unpleasant situation goes a long way to minimize the emotional pressure. Unfortunately, your retreat doesn't fix the underlying issue. Naturally, if you're only on the periphery of someone else's argument, disengaging is the most sensible thing to do. However, abandoning a conversation isn't advisable if you're one of the active participants. Follow your moral compass and persist with the process until resolution is in sight.

Unavoidable work commitments complicate your pursuit of pleasure today. Although the current obstacles may be real, it helps to recognize that your attitude can have a profoundly positive impact on the course of events. Unfortunately, widening your perspective is not as simple as it sounds, even if you try to maintain objectivity. Persevering in the face of your own resistance is necessary so taking consistent baby steps is your best strategy. Confucius said, "It doesn't matter how slowly you go as long as you don't give up."

You continue to face delays and must still overcome more challenges while so many planets are stuck languishing in retrograde. And although your trials may not be quite over, at least you see opportunities on the horizon to make progress again. You can hear the future calling, but it's still necessary to achieve stability in the present moment before initiating the next phase of your personal development. Don't hurry; success doesn't happen overnight.

You probably feel much more optimistic today, even if you're weary from relationship struggles. But you don't want your hope for good times ahead to distract you from the work that needs to be done now. You may be concerned that your emotional vulnerability will lead to further disappointment, but you're also happily anticipating the potential of major breakthroughs. Get ready to make your move when the time is right, since you can't count on anyone else to know what's in your heart.

It may seem as if an ongoing interpersonal conflict is finally subsiding now, but minor trouble spots continue to flare up for a while. Fortunately, you can rely on flights of fancy to weave fragments of fantasies into a new vision for the next chapter of your life. Don't worry if your current dreams aren't very realistic; there is still plenty of time to come up with a more concrete action plan after your creativity runs its course. As Albert Einstein said, "Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere."

You are anchored to reality today through your professional relationships and your social connections. Normally, your natural ability to envision the future can pull you away from the practical aspects of the here and now. However, common sense prevails now because your friends won't let you drift too far away. Allow time to dream, but don't forget to return to Earth. Remember, the mighty oak was once a little nut who held its ground.

You're quite clear about your objectives today, but you might not be sure how to reach them. Part of your problem is that people may appear to be working against you if you are too ambitious in the pursuit of your success. Avoid confrontation; open conflict won't help you in the present moment. Instead, keep your eyes on your destination and continue to aim in that direction, even if your progress is limited. Your perseverance will carry you a long way if you can minimize distractions and maximize your focus.

Your life continues to feel like a roller coaster ride, yet you're aware that the potential for positive change is increasing day by day. Your anticipation grows as the future approaches, but you're not sure what will happen next. Ironically, if you try to fill in too many details too soon, you could end up delaying your progress. Rather than obsessing about what's around the bend, concentrate on the here and now where your immediate efforts produce the most lasting impact. Anything is possible when your priorities are in order.

It warms your heart if someone you admire is advising you to reach for your dreams. The support of a friend or coworker might be the tipping point if you're sitting on the fence, waiting for a sign. Unfortunately, rash actions won't likely take you where you want to go today. It makes more sense to use other people's encouragement to improve your plans without executing them just yet. Give yourself a few more days and then reevaluate your goals. Time has a wonderful way of revealing what really matters.

Maintaining a cool and calm attitude can be a challenge today, especially if you already know what you want. Regardless, your feelings continue to intensify throughout the day, making cooperation with others at work less likely. Although the graceful Libra Moon urges you to establish equilibrium in all your relationships, it's doubtful that you will be able to hold onto a dispassionate point of view. Letting go of your previous expectations creates room for something new and exciting to enter your life.

Although you foresee big changes unfolding at work, your smartest strategy is to simply do your job today without getting caught up in uncertain possibilities. The Moon's monthly visit to your 6th House of Daily Routine signals a return to normalcy, but you might be worried that the current peace and quiet won't last. It's impossible to know how everything will play out in the long run, so concentrate on keeping your life as stable as you can for now and forget about the rest. The future will arrive soon enough on its own.

Conflicting emotions may tug at you until you begin to feel a knot in the pit of your stomach today. On one hand, you can clearly see the positive benefits of pursuing a friendship or a romantic connection with someone you admire. But on the other hand, it's much less complicated to keep your feelings quiet to avoid the possibility of rejection. Instead of getting lost in endless analysis and worrying about your next relationship move, listen to your instincts now. Ultimately, following your heart is your best choice as long as you remember to bring your common sense with you.

It seems like someone is trying to convince you to do something that benefits others more than you. However, your resistance to making concrete plans now might appear selfish to your peers, even if you believe you're pursuing an honorable course of action. Don't be afraid to stand up for your convictions. Even if your choice is an unpopular one, you will gain respect for being honest instead of just trying to please everyone. One of the truest tests of integrity is its blunt refusal to be compromised.

Your creative prowess is readily apparent at work today, emboldening you to share your plans. Although your coworkers might make unreasonable demands on your schedule, your personal ambitions require a fair amount of time and effort. However, you aren't required to put on a show for anyone else just to demonstrate that you're capable of doing your job. Instead of setting your agenda aside, make a commitment to prioritize your goals. Determination and follow-through are the not-so-secret ingredients in your current recipe for success.

You might think your practical approach to financial matters is a well-balanced one, but you could be easily misled by your own ideals now. Even if clouds are gathering to obscure your vision, you can still visualize a bright blue sky in your mind's eye. Normally, positive thinking works in your favor, but it's crucial to acknowledge reality as it is today and not as you wish it to be. Facing the truth places you in a position of power.

Although you're fully capable of understanding both sides of a complex disagreement, people might see you as more ambivalent today than you are in reality. You may have an accurate perspective of other people's motives, yet you recognize the practical wisdom in keeping your opinions to yourself until everyone has a chance to speak. An honest dialogue is necessary to clear the air before you tell others exactly what you think. Conversation is food for the soul.

Your imagination is running wild today, but you seem so pragmatic that no one would ever guess what's going behind your smile. Thankfully, you can hide your fantasies without much effort but keeping your secrets grows more challenging later in the day. Ultimately, your actions reveal your true feelings, especially if you are tired of pretending everything is fine. Telling the truth, little by little, is wiser now than blurting it out all at once. Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.

Share your plans with your closest supporters before it becomes too complicated to say anything at all. You know exactly where you want the conversation to go and might manipulate the circumstances at work to push your agenda forward. It's relatively easy to just convey an abstract idea to a friend. However, conflicting intentions become entangled if you are overly attached to your goal. Remaining open to whatever happens today offers you more options; but don't be so eager to compromise that you sacrifice your self-esteem in the process.

You are highly strategic in your planning because your professional objectives are well-defined and you are prepared to do whatever it takes now to fulfill your destiny. Unfortunately, nothing is as simple as it seems at first glance; you must balance your own needs with the wishes of those you love. Don't just assume that your unspoken dreams are identical to anyone else's. Continue to clarify your ambitions and work steadily toward success. Clear communication keeps you on the same page.

You clearly comprehend the measurable benefits of your current plan and the possible pitfalls of a faulty execution. Unfortunately, positive thinking grows elusive as the plot thickens and people realize how important your goals are to you now. Nothing is gained by backing down just because you're worried about what others think. Your unrelenting persistence is the best guarantee of your success. Don't stop believing in your dreams just because someone else lacks imagination.

Your stellar presentation enables everyone to witness your determination today, yet you have more simmering beneath the surface than meets the eye. Even if a powerful friend accuses you of trying to impress others, the truth is that you're just pushing to accomplish as much as you can while you feel so inspired. Although everything seems quite intense now, you actually have enough time to put your life in order before the current window of opportunity closes.

There's no need to any work harder today than is necessary or you could overdo it and exhaust yourself in the process. The gentle Libra Moon suggests that relying on grace is more effective now than brute force. No matter what, forget about your ambitions for a while and let your senses be your guide. Flow with the emotional tides, instead of struggling against them. Creativity, rather than productivity, is the business of the day.

Your nerves wear thin today as every little event highlights how far you have to travel before reaching your goal. Unfortunately, anyone who seems impractical just adds to your annoyance. Thankfully, the socially astute Libra Moon's presence in your 6th House of Employment enables you to detach from your emotions by practicing diplomacy at work. Ultimately, you must be as flexible as possible, for there are many approaches to accomplishing the same task. Give others the same benefit of the doubt that you want for yourself.

You are juggling contradictory desires today and may find it difficult to settle on any one particular avenue of expression. You can be quite adept when it comes to skillfully managing conflicting emotions. However, interactions with others might still be confusing if you try to hide your feelings. There's no justification for keeping secrets now; surprisingly, your inner angst will fade once your true intentions are out in the open. Honesty really is the best policy when it comes to matters of the heart.

Staying home sounds like a great idea today, especially while the Libra Moon unwinds in your inner-directed 4th House of Roots. But even if you can't take the day off, find ways to make your work environment feel a bit cozier. Little things like wearing comfortable clothes, packing your favorite lunch and adding personal touches around your office can make a big difference. Increasing the emotional security factor wherever you are now empowers you to take necessary risks and move toward your goals with greater confidence.

You have colorful stories to tell today and are eager to listen to the tales that others want to share, too. The sociable Libra Moon is visiting your 3rd House of Communication, amplifying the simple joy you feel while conversing with a chatty friend. However, the current key to your happiness is sharing the spotlight. Playing the game of life is a team sport now in which everyone wins together or no one wins at all.

Spend a little money to improve your self-image because showing your best side enables you to take on the world. Purchasing something that makes you feel attractive is sensible while the lovely Libra Moon is traveling through your 2nd House of Self-Worth. Although attention to your looks might seem like a superficial indulgence, you're likely to be more confident on every level when you see yourself in a flattering light. Just remember that appearances make first impressions, but it's your actions that matter most in the long run.

Your natural ability to put people at ease works best when you take the time to understand their concerns. Happily, the kind Libra Moon reflects her gracious light on your relationships today, increasing your sensitivity to those you love. Nevertheless, be careful of becoming so sympathetic to everyone else's emotions that you lose sight of your own needs. Balance your compassion for others with a healthy dose of respect for yourself.

An issue of trust may be unnecessarily highlighted today, especially if you're concerned that someone is withholding information from you. There are those who have complete and total faith in you and are more than willing to share their deepest secrets. But others might talk about you behind your back and there's nothing you can do about it. Nevertheless, you still have a choice; consider the source of what you learn now and only spend your time with those who deserve your loyalty. Never waste your feelings on people who don't value your heart.

You are often content to hang out and listen to your friends when they share their dreams with you. However, so many people may vie for your attention now that it's nearly impossible to attend to your obligations. Although you might hear lots of ideas and promises today that aren't grounded in reality, it's not your job to shatter anyone's illusions. Instead, help others focus on the most practical elements that will benefit their career. Ironically, rather than wasting time in endless chatter, you can set the best example by excusing yourself to get back to work.

Collaborating on a project isn't easy if others don't work hard enough to live up to your high standards. Further complicating matters, everyone seems overly sensitive and might require more reassurance now than you're willing to give. Interacting as politely as possible enables you to navigate your way through these tricky dynamics without creating collateral damage. Thankfully, you can earn admiration for your patience if you put kindness first.

You may be in your visionary mode these days because you have more ideas about the future now than information about the present. The Libra Moon's presence in your 9th House of Distant Horizons encourages you to connect with other big thinkers and share thoughts about how to create a better world. Your current dreams might not support your practical needs, but they empower you to imagine the magical possibilities that inspire you and everyone else.

Being overly concerned about other people's reactions can prevent you from saying what's on your mind today. But don't be afraid to consciously shake up a cautious companion with the truth about your feelings now. Your disclosure won't end a conversation; in fact, it might actually be an entry point for a deeper and more productive discussion. The first step is the hardest one, but you can't go wrong if you speak from your heart.

You might not be able to say no today because you are strongly motivated by your dreams. You're convinced that it's fair to give everyone the same chances that you want for yourself. But your desire to inspire others isn't limited to the value of any single idea; rather, you want your friends and acquaintances to succeed on their own merits. Err on the side of generosity and you can't go wrong.

It's natural to think in rational terms about your life now because there are five planets transiting sensible earth signs. However, it helps to consider philosophical arguments while mental Mercury receives metaphysical messages from Jupiter. Your reasoning is probably quite sound, but there's no need to be combative if others are pushing your buttons. Take everything in stride, even if your plans encounter resistance from someone who thinks they know what's best for you. Luckily, you don't have to prove anything to anyone but yourself.

You may seem to be somewhat ambivalent today about the potential of a particular romance. Although you could easily pursue a fantastic opportunity that would deepen a current connection, you must be honest when making decisions about the direction of your relationship. While weighing the pros and cons, make sure to listen to your heart. However, don't compromise your integrity for the sake of a passing pleasure.

You're already anticipating some quiet time over the weekend because you're so busy today. Pressing tasks that are still left over from last week require your unwavering commitment now. Luckily, you can avoid being overwhelmed by methodically prioritizing your chores. Don't try to accomplish everything in a single day or you could feel discouraged when you fall short of your expectations. Create reachable goals to measure your progress along the way. Success breeds success.

Your perceptions are sharper today and your emotions are more intense. Your reactions are so obvious that attempting to hide your feelings is an exercise in futility. Nevertheless, what you say now is less important than how you say it. Go ahead and share what is in your heart, but stay calm, cool and collected in the process. The stakes in a significant relationship are still rising, so don't get so caught up in any one moment that you lose sight of the larger picture.

You might not seem like your regular cautious self these days because you're so eager to share your thoughts without filtering them first. You prefer to get your ideas all out on the table even if you know there could be negative consequences. Unfortunately; a torrent of unedited words can be disruptive to your progress. The simple winds of fate are blowing strong, so you may as well wait and see where they are going to take you before you invest too much energy into one dream.

You don't appear to have much control over your schedule today because unplanned disruptions continue to catch you off guard. Questioning your ability to do a good job may be unavoidable, but there's no time to waste wallowing in negativity or self-doubt. Accepting what you can't change frees up time to focus your intentions where they can do the most to further your goals. Energy flows where attention goes.

You are confronted with endings and beginnings today, as the reflective Moon returns for her monthly visit to your transformational sign. Once started, the magical process of metamorphosis is powerful enough to overcome most natural resistance. There is no need for discouragement now. The next cycle may still require a few days to take shape, so don't expect too much change too soon. Everything will unfold on time if you let the universe do its job and you keep believing in your dreams.

There are several areas of your life undergoing transitions these days, making it nearly impossible to pick just one specific topic to talk about. However, you must dig into your past and look deep into your soul as you search for the map that will guide you into the future. There's no urgency to tell anyone about your inner journey today; it's yours alone and you get to choose how much you want to share. Those who don't understand your silence will never understand your words.

Although the weekend is just around the corner, your focus is still on your role in the outer world. Unfortunately, you might wish that you didn't have to deal with so many responsibilities because you are craving some personal space where you can decompress. Your desire for solitude grows into more of an issue today, making it prudent to get your work done as soon as possible. Once you satisfy your obligations, you are free to do as you wish.

You can tell that something has changed, yet you can't quite put your finger on what it is. You may sound like a detective as you search for the missing facts today, but your questioning could turn into an obsession that distracts you from other activities. There's nothing wrong with feeling your way through the unfamiliar realms of the new emotional landscape. You don't need to have all the answers right now as long as you continue your pursuit of the truth.

You imagine doing something adventurous today, but you still may be preoccupied with your immediate responsibilities. Nevertheless, you're tempted to walk away from your chores because there are so many other things that sound better than what you're currently doing. Remember, the weekend is still far away, so get back to work. Fulfilling your promises before the day is over frees you to play with a clear conscience.

You are transmitting more energy than a quasar today, but it may be impossible to sustain the power for more than a short burst each time. The breezy Gemini Sun is flying through your 3rd House of Communication, fueling your words with irrepressible excitement. Although you might be handed an unexpected opportunity to launch off in a new direction, it's nearly impossible to make progress while retrograde Mars thwarts your forward movement. Your life is full of possibilities now, yet pursuing too many goals diminishes your chances of succeeding at any of them.

Catching glimpses of your future leaves you feeling more annoyed that your plans are moving so slowly. Nevertheless, you must attend to more practical matters now that the Sun is lighting up your 2nd House of Money. Spend time organizing your finances and making your immediate surroundings more pleasant. Don't be lazy and slip back into your old habits when you should be working to perfect your game, instead. A methodical approach to self-improvement leads to the growth you desire.

Your personal radiance is undeniable throughout your astrological birthday month. Make optimum use of the intellectual Gemini Sun as its rays warm your 1st House of Self, filling you with confidence about your future. Your heightened curiosity is an asset now, so don't hesitate to ask others for their opinions. But remember that seeking advice is only half of the equation. You must listen with an open mind to gain something valuable from this exercise. Your best friends make the hard times easier and the good times even better.

You need to complete projects you began over the winter rather than starting new ones as the Gemini Sun marches through your 12th House of Endings this month. Forget about the regular calendar; your astrological year is coming to a close and you must do everything possible to prepare for your next steps as summer approaches. But don't let a sudden burst of energy today lure you into believing that you can just make a mad dash to the finish line. Determination, not destiny, will make the difference between failure and success.

Your crazy social calendar is strong evidence that your presence is in high demand this time of year. The Sun's presence in your 11th House of Social Networking encourages you to take on a more prominent role within a group. Rather than working on your own now, it's more fun to collaborate with like-minded folks. Put your personal issues in order quickly so that you can be the best team player possible. Individually you are but one drop; joining in a cause with others creates an ocean.

You are becoming painfully aware of the strict self-discipline needed to keep the lights shining on your career path. The clever Gemini Sun is busy in your 10th House of Vocation this month and although you may be in the spotlight, something about all the attention might feel awkward. Rethink your goals and your limitations; decide what you're willing to forego in turn for financial security and professional success. The important thing is to be ready at any moment to sacrifice who you are for who you could become.

You are given a chance now to explore worlds that lure you beyond your current hopes and dreams. The Sun naturally harmonizes with your sign as it travels through airy Gemini and your 9th House of Journeys. Entertain new ideas that expand your mind, even if you don't actually pack your bags and take a trip. Studying metaphysics, philosophy or religion enriches your personal wealth of knowledge. The day you stop learning is the day you grow old.

You are fascinated by investigating whatever lies beneath the surface and uncovering the mysteries of the dark side of the Moon. However, the Sun is wending its way through your 8th House of Deep Sharing now, triggering your basic issues of intimacy. Self-discovery is encouraged by self-inquiry. Using language enables you to start the process, but you must access your feelings to get to the real stuff. Vulnerability is the key to opening the door of your heart.

You may be overly sensitive to the cosmic tides these days; progress is too slow for your taste now that Mars and Saturn are backpedaling in your sign. However, the emphasis could be on someone else while the Gemini Sun sheds light on your 7th House of Partnerships, setting up a dilemma between your internal and external worlds. Consider ways to express your own needs while still honoring the most significant relationships in your life. Being true to yourself doesn't mean that you must ignore everyone else.

This is not a time to travel alone even if you're a rugged individualist. The four-week journey of the Sun through your 6th House of Logistics emphasizes the regular routine of your daily life. Face the light of awareness, even if it forces you to blink twice and rethink your assumptions. Whether you're currently in a happy relationship or motivated to start a new one, just make sure that you don't lose track of your own dreams in the process.

Depending upon the intensity of your struggle for self-expression, you will likely notice your load lightening during the weeks ahead. Although you must apply your thinking to earthly matters, the cerebral Gemini Sun's dance through your 5th House of Creativity does most of the work now. Keep in mind the month will also bring its share of serious issues into the light, so enjoy the current sparks of playful interaction as the opportunities arise.

A distracting stream of noise prevents you from attending to more personal issues while the chatty Gemini Sun visits your 4th House of Family. Unfortunately, all that verbal interaction can be exhausting now, since you Fish prefer swimming in the watery realm of emotions. Suddenly, you have more information than you need or want. If you are overwhelmed by too much data, heed the signs and retreat into the quiet stillness of nature or the safety of your own nest. Sometimes it takes courage to know when enough is enough.

It's wonderful to be so positive about your current activities but you must be careful today so you don't blow through your resources. Often, your waves of excitement can come and go quickly, tempting you to spontaneously expend your energy while it lasts. However, the expansive Sagittarius Full Moon brightens your 9th House of Future Vision, inviting you into new territory and requiring you to sustain a higher level of intensity for an extended period of time. Don't burn all your fuel just because your stamina seems endless; practicing patience and persistence increases your chances for success.

Responding to changes in interpersonal dynamics is especially exhausting when the enthusiastic Sagittarius Full Moon overwhelms your 8th House of Intimacy and Transformation. Typically, you prefer a more methodical approach to navigating through your life. Unfortunately, there's no time to waste now, so muster up your courage and find a way to flow with the current energy. Don't take your fear out on someone else; resistance truly is futile. You may be in for a great surprise when you realize how quickly you can adapt once you completely let go.

No extra coffee for you this morning; your life is already popping and you have a better chance of enjoying the high-frequency buzz if you remember to set healthy limits. Nevertheless, you're sorely tempted to say yes to the next invitation because everything sounds fantastic while the Sagittarius Full Moon expands the energy of your 7th House of Others. Unfortunately, each avenue of exploration leads to a world full of possible distractions. Be selective or you'll end up facing the music at the end of the day when you realize all the things you didn't accomplish.

Avoiding your normal routine enables you to take a risk today when impulsive Mars ignites the Sagittarius Full Moon in your 6th House of Work. Thankfully, your common sense will most likely prevail before you climb too far out on a limb. If you go after your heart's desire, don't be afraid of falling short of your professional goals. And don't be hard on yourself if you must let an opportunity slip by now, because more chances are already on the way. The current situation is a practice run for amazing possibilities just ahead.

You know what you must do now and you're okay about doing it, even if it means you must put your creative self on the line. Still, you may be left with a tight feeling in the pit of your stomach because something is out of balance. Although the extroverted Sagittarius Full Moon emboldens your 5th House of Self-Expression, you might not be able to initiate action. Even if you are extremely busy, make time for contemplation so you don't lose touch with whatever is most important to you. Your current bout with self-doubt ends when you listen to your heart.

Absorbing so much new information in a short amount of time can be quite the dilemma. You prefer incoming data to arrive at a regulated pace, allowing you to efficiently process each bit of news and then manage what's next. Unfortunately, you could be deprived of this luxury now if you can't slow the energy down. Fortunately, the philosophical Sagittarius Full Moon illuminates your 4th House of Roots, helping you get back to the basics. Set priorities and focus on your work today while leaving the logical analysis for the future.

You may wish to minimize the unpredictability and chaos people bring into your life while the boisterous Sagittarius Full Moon lights up your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Although others might seem too high-strung now for your easygoing style, you will still likely miss the exhilaration once you retreat. Thankfully, recognizing your ambiguity helps to relieve your current frustration. Ultimately, you start enjoying life more when you stop trying to control all the variables and concentrate on counting your blessings.

You don't feel threatened by an emotionally intense interaction that's lurking in the shadows. The Sagittarius Full Moon joins warrior Mars to strengthen your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, helping you understand the connection between communication and intimacy. But someone else's avoidance of an issue is enough to make you want to scream now. The more you try to bring up the subject, the worse it gets. Rise above your current personal agenda and save the talk for another day when others are more willing to meet you halfway.

Kicking back to relax seems nearly impossible today because you don't want to miss anything while you're taking a break. Combative Mars joins the Full Moon in your sign, heightening your concerns that someone could gain a competitive edge if you retreat to rest. On the other hand, you don't have enough energy to do battle with anyone over a minor difference. Stop trying to second-guess what you should or shouldn't do. Nothing is so urgent that it can't wait until tomorrow.

You have a compelling story to tell today, but finding the right person to listen is a real challenge while the Sagittarius Full Moon activates your 12th House of Privacy. You are understandably resistant to opening up your heart to just anyone; it needs to be someone who supports your dreams. But your current words may elicit an unexpected reaction that derails your original agenda. Nevertheless, you might be happily surprised by your discovery if you're insistent enough to follow a conversation wherever it leads.

Your progressive plans require the participation of others, but it could get messy trying to convince them to join your cause. It's hard to understand why anyone would resist the possibility of creating a memorable event, but your idea of a good time isn't necessarily the same as everyone else's now. Ironically, the Sagittarius Full Moon shines in your 11th House of Social Networking, indicating you could find more emotional fulfillment if you spend less time trying to be the ringleader and more time supporting the dreams of your friends.

You may seem like a mother hen today as you try to protect your friends and family by gathering them under your wings. The idealistic Sagittarius Full Moon impassions your 10th House of Public Responsibility, enticing you to let your own responsibilities slide while you help another person who needs your assistance. Remember, even performing compassionate deeds has its limits. Creating healthy boundaries is necessary when you care so much.

There's plenty on your plate this week, yet you already see that everything could take longer than planned. Fortunately, it's possible to make your life easier by setting priorities today so you can utilize your time more efficiently. You're in a feisty mood while your ruling planet Mars opposes the Sun, but you might not have anywhere to direct your energy. You want to have your way and aren't interested in waiting any longer. Steering clear of petty ego disputes is your most reliable path to success.

Everyone seems to have precise ideas of where you should focus your attention. Normally, you would be happy to do what's expected of you to keep things copacetic, but not today. You're less interested in other people's goals than you are in your own. However, you'll have more fun now if you let yourself be swept up in someone else's agenda. And there will be enough time later on to attend to your personal needs. A little bit of compromise at the right moment eases the tension. Meet others halfway and anything can happen.

You have been operating on overdrive ever since Mercury went into retrograde motion three weeks ago. Now, as the trickster finally turns direct, you're ready to take some time off before you run out of steam. Although there may be signs that you can slow down ahead, you can't call it quits just yet. Don't take your frustration out on anyone else; getting into an argument will only waste your precious energy. If you're feeling depleted today, sneak away to recuperate for a while before jumping back into the race.

People are pushing you to do more than you can today, but you're resigned to give them what they request because you don't want to let anyone down. Nevertheless, it's crucial to defend your right to say no if you're feeling overextended. You may have to express your anger in order to hold your ground, but there's no reason to get drawn into conflicts that aren't directly concerned with establishing your boundaries. Taking care of your needs is just as important as nurturing anyone else. When you respect your limits, others will do the same.

Recent discussions with a loved one have brought you back down to earth, but they haven't squelched your dreams. Regardless of what anyone says, there's no harm in entertaining fantasies as long as you're not trying to escape from the real world. If you find yourself embroiled in an argument over the practicality of your ideas, don't try to justify them. No one can control your thoughts unless you let them. Exploring the far reaches of your imagination is your own little secret. Don't say a word; smile and leave everyone guessing.

You might think you must make a decision right away, but an impulsive choice now leads to nothing but trouble. However, Mercury's direct turn excites your nervous system and fires up your adrenals, giving you an irrepressible feeling of urgency. Luckily, there is more time to consider all your options before you must act; believe it or not, everything is happening right on schedule. Nevertheless, ambitious goals make for outstanding achievements.

Someone may not be totally honest with you now and could even be secretly working against your honorable intentions. But don't lash out if you think a friend isn't being loyal; just take whatever you learn in stride. Making people feel guilty only wastes your time and complicates your relationships. Be grateful you discovered the truth today, for what you don't know can cause more damage than you think. Although watching your back is prudent considering the current circumstances, giving others the benefit of the doubt is an admirable exercise of compassion.

Unexpressed negativity is stressful to manage today, especially if your anger or fear has nowhere to go. You might not know what's motivating you now or how deep your emotions run. Jumping into a little disagreement can escalate it into a major argument. Although you could justify taking a stand, your pride is seducing you into believing full engagement will resolve your differences. However, a current conflict is more likely to abate when you focus on your inner work rather than trying to fix someone else.

Keeping your feet on the ground is crucial today while confronting disharmony in a relationship dynamic. You want to stay true to your ideals while also honoring someone else's path. You may be reluctant to set aside your dreams, even if prior commitments restrain you on a short leash. Let your moral compass be your guide but don't get discouraged; sometimes it's challenging to balance the vagaries of your heart with other people's realities. Your gentle persistence is your ticket to success.

You are so impatient today that it's crucial to stay in touch with your inner parent to minimize the chance of doing something foolish. However, you could complicate things by scattering your energy or losing your temper with someone who seems to be blocking your freedom. If you find yourself itching to be somewhere else, remember that there will be time later to navigate into new territory. For now, be consistent and stay on your path without making any sudden changes in direction.

Your problem-solving skills may be tested today because you can't just think your way through the current obstacle course. Trust what you feel in your heart now instead of relying on your conceptual prowess to solve a current dilemma. Nevertheless, you won't be satisfied until you get to the truth of the matter, so you need to do some in-depth research and ask some tough questions. Don't worry if others don't understand your actions; if something seems important to you, then check it out. Ultimately, you're the director of your own movie and the star of the show.

You need to make a choice that restricts your progress at home or at work because you just can't do everything. Thankfully, there is a simple solution to your predicament, but it requires you to reframe your assumptions. Mercury turns direct today, reminding you to fix every little problem that popped up over the past few weeks. But don't buy into this illusion of urgency. You can do it all once you realize your deadlines are more fluid than you thought. In the final analysis, it's not about having more time; it's about making time for things that matter.

It's hard to understand how quickly a complex situation can resolve into a much simpler one. You might conclude that you're out of the woods today, but don't trick yourself into believing you're home free just because you want to ignore your current obligations. Temporary relief may partially result from an improvement of circumstances, but denial could also contribute to your positive state of mind. Keep in mind that avoiding an awkward emotional roadblock feels good for a while, but it's surely not the same thing as finding a lasting solution.

You typically are in touch with your world because you naturally trust your senses. Although you can convince yourself to stay where you are by rationalizing your decision with facts, you still secretly believe your intuition will reveal a path to your future. Ultimately, centering your awareness in your heart empowers you with additional information as long as you don't waste energy talking about it. Opening your mind increases the odds of making your dreams come true.

You're afraid that your feelings will trigger a negative response so you might attempt to hide them from someone close to you. However, this reserved behavior doesn't mean you are antisocial today. Paradoxically, your witty banter and funny stories distract others from the messy truth. Even if you're smart enough to fool everyone else, be careful about going so far that you also fool yourself. What you choose to disclose is up to you; just make sure to draw the line of integrity before it's too late.

Your vision is panoramic today, but you run into trouble when trying to create a step-by-step map for executing your plan. Your work associates are eager to place their trust in you because you seem as if your feet are planted solidly in the ground. Unfortunately, you might not be as confident now as you appear; nevertheless, be honest and let others know that the details are still missing from your strategy. It's more rewarding to be real than to sound as if you have all the answers when you don't. Collaborating with your peers enhances your chances for success.

Although you are set on following the guidance of your moral compass now, you're still itching to speak bluntly about something that bothers you. Luckily, you can ward off negativity by concentrating on spiritual beliefs, rather than falling victim to your own passions. But the power of positive thinking alone isn't enough to permanently put things back in order. Follow up with decisive actions or your good intentions will be for naught.

You are committed to resolving a conflict now, but the specifics of the situation are not as important as you may think. However, an information overload could send you into a mental tailspin because you want to focus on the larger picture, instead. In fact, these dynamics are familiar because you often feel challenged to let go of the details. Thankfully, taking the time to relax or meditate allows you to put your worries into a healthier perspective.

You wake up with unrealistic hopes about accomplishing your goals today; unfortunately, you may be overly optimistic in your expectations. Your current obsession with completing your chores is complicated by a louder-than-usual creative buzz that you don't want to lose. Naturally, you prefer the notion of an artsy-crafty kind of day, but you might just have to fulfill your responsibilities now before you follow your muse.

It's essential to adhere to the highest level of integrity today or you won't be able to persuade others to go along with your plans. It's as if every person has a slightly different idea about the best way for you to reach your goals. However, no one seems to listen to your thoughts now. Although their disinterest can be a cause for your concern, staying focused on your final destination enables your peers to join in with their support once they see that you're making measurable progress. Your true allies will reveal themselves when you need them most.

Your willingness to adapt to the changing circumstances is an asset today, yet your flexibility is not a weakness. In fact, you may become quite stubborn in the defense of your performance if someone at work pushes you too hard. Don't let your pride tempt you to tell others what to do. Instead, inspire everyone to find his or her own unique path. Live by a variation of the Golden Rule and give people the same freedom of choice that you expect in return.

Overcoming a fear that can be traced back to your childhood is hard work; but reality is now offering you a special opportunity to learn how to deepen your trust in those mysteries that are beyond your five senses. The diaphanous veil that hangs between the metaphysical worlds of thought and the physical world of things has grown thinner. You may even see visions when your eyes are closed. Usually you do best when relying strictly on the facts. However, you will give an amazing performance if you embrace your imagination, too.

Strange ideas may pop into your awareness today, but they arrive in symbolic form rather than in words. Unfortunately, you might be required to step outside of your comfort zone to decipher the messages. Pay attention to your friends and associates for clues to help you crack the code, even if they seem to have nothing relevant to say. You must listen with every cell of your body to hear what's going on beneath the surface. Recognizing the restrictions of language enables you to see unrealized potential no matter where you look.

You're cruising along on automatic pilot today as you express a simple desire to take care of others. But your revelation is not limited to a verbal disclosure on your part; it's more about how you live your life as a human. You aren't motivated by discussing your altruistic intentions now. Stop analyzing every doubt that floats through your brain. Initiate action before you talk yourself out of a perfectly fine strategy. Shine your light while you still have a chance.

Communication grows more significant now and the best way to deal with the extra pressure is to manage your time wisely. Your friends take center stage and you want to bond with them by exploring a variety of interests. There are phone calls to return, places to go and people to see. Plus, there's that screenplay you've been dreaming about writing for years. The truth is your goals need a serious realignment. Set clear boundaries and make room for quiet self-reflection or you will get lost in all the noise.

Your self-confidence is on the rise and your enthusiasm is contagious. Although it's good news when your key planet Venus moves into your 2nd House of Values -- where she stays for the next three weeks -- trouble can arise if you ignore a lingering problem. Thankfully, shifting your focus to a wider perspective enables you to circumvent a difficult situation. Rather than worrying about your personal security, considering other people's wishes brings more emotional fulfillment. You are an integral part of a community and everyone's needs are interrelated.

You can be disarmingly charming and even an outrageous flirt when the mood strikes you. Now that cosmic-vixen Venus is visiting your sign for the next three weeks social interactions are in the spotlight, making this a time of great fun and games. Unfortunately, a Venus-Mars opposition will continue to expose buried issues even if you're living in a state of denial. There is no free lunch; emotional vulnerability accompanies the relationship dance. Happily, the benefits are satisfying if you're willing to engage with your heart and soul.

You like to rely on the absolute certainty of emotional support, and sometimes find yourself nostalgically craving the security you lost somewhere along the way. However, your subconscious drives are pulling you off the main roads now, making everything appear more magical even if you're not sure of what comes next. Enjoy the current side trip without fighting the inevitable. This little detour could turn into a journey of self-discovery if you let the universe take the wheel.

Love can come knocking at your door now, yet it could be unrecognizable if you are too rigid in your expectations. Whether it's a romance or a friendship, there's no need to waste any energy wishing it to be something that it's not. Soak in whatever appreciation or admiration is offered, but don't get too caught up in thinking about what you deserve. If you can't honor the gifts that others bring to the table, they will likely lose interest and leave. Accept what is, let go of what was, and have faith in what will be.

You might suddenly feel a resurgence of your desire for success at work. You are more interested in how others view you in the outer world now that Venus is performing her magic in your 10th House of Public Status. However, you may have trouble meeting the expectations of others as your good intentions stir up more resistance than cooperation. Nevertheless, victory is yours if you're willing to do what you Virgos do best: pay attention to the day-to-day details regardless of the interference that comes from anyone else.

You're painting a very rosy picture about your personal life while the Moon plays in your 5th House of Love and Children. But it's all too easy to turn an insignificant event into an overblown affair now that your key planet Venus is traveling through your 9th House of Big Ideas. Although you are easily distracted these days, keep bringing your feelings back to the immediate situation and deal with the reality of what's on your plate. Acting on your desires with confidence improves your chances to turn a romantic fantasy into something real.

When you get close to someone you love, you yearn to merge your worlds without restraint. But today's dilemma involves the irrepressible tension between your desire to dig deep and a current penchant for lighthearted fun. It's easy to be distracted by one person after another while Venus is in flirtatious Gemini, yet it's challenging to discern if anyone is worthy of your undivided attention. Thankfully, there is no pressing need to make a decision immediately. It may be best to experiment with ambivalence now by letting your feelings ride with the wind.

The focus is shifting from desiring complex emotional entanglements to needing simplicity. All types of relationships are emphasized now that cosmic-butterfly Venus is flitting around in your 7th House of Partnerships. But even if you have a lot of responsibilities piling up, you're ready to let some of them slide to hang out with a friend. However, you can't just run out on your promises or your spontaneity will come back to haunt you. There is no elevator to success; you must take the stairs.

You are uncharacteristically ready to let go of ambitions that don't inspire your soul, but you're not quite prepared to take the next step yet. Unfortunately, your natural resistance to the complications of diversity can limit your options now before you even consider them. Remember, external factors contain crucial information, so don't shut out the influx of data even if it seems overwhelming. Friendly Venus in scattered Gemini might be more annoying than attractive as she pulls your attention in too many directions. Starve your distractions and feed your dreams.

Your friends may tempt you to act irresponsibly today, but irrational behavior isn't your friend. Your feelings are tickled into awareness yet you don't want to share them while the Moon is venturing through your 12th House of Privacy. Thankfully, Vivacious Venus helps you commandeer your fair share of fun while she sparkles in your 5th House of Spontaneity. Tom Robbins was speaking to you when he wrote, "It's never too late to have a happy childhood."

You can't help but be frustrated if familial duties require you to readjust your schedule today, for this requirement can remind you of a previous time when you were not in control. Responsibilities may prevent you from doing those things you prefer to do. But loving Venus is just beginning a three-week visit to your 4th House of Domesticity, drawing your attention away from the public eye. Luckily, you can strengthen your emotional foundation by attending to your current relationships without holding onto negativity from the past.

Although everything at work appears to start out innocently enough today, trouble arises when you become so confident that you stop listening to the advice of anyone else. Thankfully, you can improve the direction of your day by taking everything you hear into consideration. Instead of brushing aside others who don't agree with your strategy, incorporate their ideas into your own even if it means questioning your original plan. As George Bernard Shaw wrote, "Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything."

A powerful wind is blowing at your back now, filling the sails of your intentions and driving you into the future. Fortunately, your pragmatic approach to life prevents you from getting lost in idle fantasies and unrealistic dreams. But you may run into resistance from someone who thinks you are glossing over potential problems. It might seem less stressful to drop your plan in the name of compromise. However, sticking to your ideas is your best strategy even if you must navigate through troubled waters to reach your destination.

You're a champion at stepping around emotional sinkholes because you would rather keep things friendly and lighthearted. However, the Moon's conjunction with intense Pluto occurs in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, making it difficult to postpone a serious conversation with someone close to you. Don't worry if the process makes you feel uncomfortable; it's not all fun and games when a caterpillar evolves into a butterfly. Nevertheless, the wonderful outcome justifies the challenging transformation.

You're not afraid to maintain your fixed position today, even if someone tries to exert their authority to change your mind. Normally, you might choose to retreat in order to avoid a power struggle. However, you could surprise others with the fierceness of your reaction now. In fact, people may get more than they bargained for if they attempt to manipulate your feelings. Standing up for yourself can be hard work, but the results are worth the battles you encounter along the way.

It's futile for your coworkers to argue with you today because you're determined to stick to your original plan no matter what they say. You are inspired by the simplicity of your strategy and, thankfully, have the words at your disposal to make your point. However, an associate may startle you by taking you to task about something you missed. Instead of covering up your mistake, embrace what you learn and modify your course of action accordingly. Your willingness to change for a good reason is a sign of strength, not a weakness.

The muse is with you today while the evocative Moon cozies up to evolutionary Pluto in your 5th House of Self-Expression. You feel as if nothing can hold you back or pull you off course. However, a curveball later in the day may shock you into realizing that everything isn't as transparent as you originally thought. Don't just throw your hands up in the air in despair.
