All your previous work will eventually make sense if you stick with your process and see where it takes you. Never second-guess the magic of creativity.

Issues from the past might come back to haunt you today, but they're only problematic if you're unwilling to face them. In fact, dancing with the ghosts of your personal history can be surprisingly empowering and oddly liberating. Retelling an old story in a new light enables you to capitalize on the very same things that once restrained you. Dig into the origins of your current feelings, even if they make you feel vulnerable. As the psychologist Carl Jung wrote, "I am not what happened to me. I am what I choose to become."

Your words have a profound impact today on those who hear them. The perceptive Moon-Pluto conjunction Pluto occurs in your 3rd House of Communication, influencing your interactions with others. However, people could be overwhelmed by your current intensity, causing them to withdraw suddenly without notice. Or, they might respond with a verbal attack that seems to come out of nowhere. In either case, the message is to tone down your rhetoric. What you say is as valid as ever; how you say it determines whether or not you make your point.

Working with your peers should be a piece of cake today because they genuinely appreciate your good ideas. However, your uneven progress makes it difficult for people to match your rhythm. Your coworkers are uncertain of your next move because your bursts of energy are mixed with periods of inactivity. Fortunately, you still can accomplish a lot because everyone wants to reach the same goal. If you want to benefit from the collaboration available to you now, slow down and try to maintain a constant pace that others can follow.

Your certainty is unflappable today. You know what you're doing and where you are going; your coworkers must either support you or get out of your way. Your non-negotiable attitude sounds like a good idea in theory, but in practice leaves only a small margin of opportunity for others to volunteer their talents. Soften your approach if you want others to share in your success; your gentleness shows your strength now more than anything else.

You are so strongly opinionated now that you might believe it's wise to keep your feelings to yourself, especially when your changing moods are so extreme. The Moon's powerful conjunction with passionate Pluto in your 12th House of Secrets enables you to hide your reaction to potentially explosive words. Unfolding your truth gradually is the most reliable path to simplifying complicated dynamics. As Sigmund Freud wrote, "Unexpressed emotions will never die."

Your intuition is on fire today and you are driven to make sure that everyone around you shares in your vision. However, explaining yourself in great detail won't muster the support you seek. In fact, even your most dependable allies may grow weary of your long and rambling monologue. Don't wait for someone's eyes to glaze over before you stop talking because by then it will be too late. Be concise; say what you mean and move on.

You are eager to bolt fearlessly into the future without waiting for the red light to turn green. However, the Moon's presence in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals isn't enough to make everything work in your favor now. The real challenge is to maintain your high level of passion without impetuously disregarding the rules of the road. Although Ralph Waldo Emerson wrote, "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm," the trick is to channel your excitement into something productive.

You may seize an opportunity to earn some extra cash, achieve recognition for your work or simply make progress on a continuing project. However, it won't be a straightforward path today, even with sound logic and a solid plan on your side. Thankfully, there are no surprises now; any obstacles you encounter only remind you of what you already know. Keep one eye on your wallet and the other on your watch. Cleverly managing your resources is the key to your success.

Although your brain is busy generating big ideas these days, someone is likely to rain on your parade. Naturally, you prefer receiving encouragement from your friends and coworkers rather than criticism. However, taking the time to understand the constructive feedback means the difference between failure and success now. Don't let your pride get in the way of recognizing the truth. Most people can hear, but only a few truly listen.

Interpersonal dynamics are more complicated today, leading you to wonder whether this is the right time to sprint to the finish line. But it's unlikely that you can reach your destination on your own once the Moon settles into your 8th House of Shared Resources. You just want to call it a day, close up shop and head home. However, this is a critical moment that is testing your determination. Instead of bailing when times get tough, make a commitment to deepen those relationships which you know are part of your current journey.

People seem a bit weirder than normal today, making it difficult to know who to trust with your future. Although you can see great potential in the creative visions of others, you're not ready to set aside your own needs and desires for the sake of someone else's. The more narrowly you focus now, the better your chances are to manifest your dreams. As Buddha said, "The mind is everything; what you think you become."

You might approach your regular tasks in a unique manner today, but you may not succeed even if your ideas are quite innovative. Resistance to your course of action isn't necessarily obvious now; it could come from hidden pockets of old family dynamics or current interpersonal tension. Thankfully, your positive attitude is sufficient to keep your plans afloat, even in the face of negativity. As cartoonist Matthew Inman writes, "It's okay to color outside of the lines as long as it's beautiful."

It's disarmingly easy to stand on your soapbox and declare your intentions today because you assume that others will rush to join your cause. Unfortunately, even your closest friends may take some convincing to see your point of view. But there is no excuse for wasting your time or anyone else's. Fortunately, proper preparation enables you to deliver your message as succinctly as possible. Plenty of people dream of success, but others work hard to achieve it.

Not only do your friends encourage you to pursue your brilliant ideas, but they are sensible enough to step out of your way if they can't be of immediate help. Nevertheless, it could be frustrating if there isn't the time or money needed to complete the tasks that are on your agenda now. There's no reason to be overly secretive about the obstacles you face while trying to reach your goals. As fairy-tale author Aesop wrote, "Do not attempt to hide things which cannot be hidden."

The light at the end of the tunnel appears bigger and brighter now as you approach it. However, there is a paradox at play; it seems the closer you get to your career goal, the longer it takes to get there. Optimistic Jupiter is beaming energy into your 10th House of Status, empowering you to spread your wings. But meanwhile, sobering Saturn in your 1st House of Self is setting up roadblocks in your path. Thankfully, you can make steady progress if you're willing to claim your power by remaining true to your values.

Your appearance is misleading today, especially if you consciously go out of your way to camouflage your ambitious nature. Everyone thinks you are being uncharacteristically nonchalant about your future, but they couldn't be further from the truth. Nevertheless, stern Saturn's current posturing in your 12th House of Invisibility allows you to charm everyone by neatly burying your inner authority in your imagination where others can't see it. As author Aldous Huxley wrote, "Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored."

You possess a storehouse of personal power today. Unfortunately, your peers seem to be overly harsh in their judgment of your work. You can spend so much energy responding to the current criticism that you exhaust yourself before completing all the items on your agenda. Fortunately, the Moon's current visit to your conceptual sign enables you to remain emotionally detached. Engaging with others by sharing what's in your heart only becomes a problem when you become so attached to the outcome that you can't let go.

You are quite serious about getting ahead in your career now as you plot your way up the proverbial ladder of success. However, you can't deny that it's more enjoyable to hang out with a friend or lover who encourages you to consider other avenues of satisfaction, too. Just as you settle into a productive groove, you might feel as if you're being distracted from your work by your own drive for pleasure. But this isn't about choosing one path over the other; find a way to integrate Jupiter's expansive nature with Saturn's need for achievement. Do what makes you happy and be with those who make you smile.

It's like you walked through a revolving door and have stepped out into a parallel universe. Relationship dynamics feel very familiar, as if you were here once before. Paradoxically, an emotional transformation that occurred in the beginning of the year is resurfacing and demanding your attention now. Fortunately, you have a chance to revisit these changes and solidify those that serve you best. Reflect only long enough to get your bearings before proceeding onto your next adventure. As Tom Petty sings, "It's okay to look back, but it's best not to stare."

A partnership that endures the tests of time is worth its weight in gold to you Bulls who crave consistency. As the pace of change began to speed up in the last couple of months, you may have nostalgically longed for a return to a simpler life. Although familiar interpersonal patterns are drawing you back into the past, you might need to navigate your way through a period of heightened complexity prior to finding the serenity you seek. Avoid making any impulsive moves out of frustration; it will take time to get what you want.

You don't mind playing games at work in order to stay in touch with your support network. However, sometimes office politics grow so complicated that even you can't figure out which strategy makes the most sense. You might have thought you were out of the deep water and riding a trajectory that will carry you to the heights of success. Instead, you may need to jump back in the fray now even if you're unsure you are up for the job. Push past your uncertainty; be determined about your goals and flexible about your methods.

Perhaps you started a creative path early in the year, only to put it on the back burner when your attention was required elsewhere. No doubt you're busy trying to keep up with your current responsibilities. You are being handed a chance to revisit the project you left behind as a reward for your hard work. Don't waste energy trying to figure out how a simple twist of fate brought you to this moment. Make a daily habit of following your dream until you see where it leads.

You enjoyed a certain amount of freedom from domestic responsibilities over the past couple of months. However, family matters are once again calling and you must respond accordingly. Don't begrudge anyone else just because you would rather be pursuing your own goals rather than serving others. Nevertheless, the depth of feeling that can arise from taking care of the ones you love is enough to bring joy to your heart. There's no need to obsess about your long-term success when the real magic is very close to home.

Everything seems to be more urgent today and you might not be able to sustain the faster pace. In fact, you could be running from one small crisis to the next without making progress on your list of things to do. Oddly enough, you're still optimistic about catching up and getting ahead of the game. Thankfully, you possess the ability to create emotional distance in order to be analytical without bias. However, there's no reason to change your approach; good intentions plus hard work will lead to success soon enough.

A new perspective on your finances enables you to revisit decisions you made earlier this year. Although parts of your strategy may have unfolded exactly according to your plan, you couldn't possibly anticipate every challenge that would need to be overcome. Fortunately, you are blessed with a second chance now to incorporate what you learned over the past few months. But don't wait; this kind of opportunity comes rarely and will pass quickly whether or not you take advantage of it.

It may have seem as if last year's challenges were behind you but recent events suggest that there are still a few remaining ghosts to put to rest. Don't worry; this is not a permanent return to the past. You have made more headway than you realize on your path to achieve your long-term goals. It's just that you won't be free to manifest your dreams until you tie up as many loose ends as you can. Thankfully, you are receiving an energetic boost from the cosmos; act now while the force is with you.

You might feel as if circumstances are out of control and your attempts to manage them are restraining your forward progress. Naturally, you don't like covering old ground again; your imperative is to move full speed ahead. However, something very special awaits your discovery if you have enough courage to investigate the shadows that trail along behind you. Exploring buried emotions may temporarily derail your momentum but ignoring them could be catastrophic. The greatest treasures are those invisible to the eye but felt by the heart.

Sometimes you think that social engagements are merely distractions that deter you from accomplishing your goals. However, the story is more complicated now as you find yourself spending more time with people who can actually increase your efficiency along the way. Nevertheless, it's a fine line that must be monitored on an ongoing basis. Don't be afraid to establish clear limits if you are pulled too far off track. Navigating that movable boundary between self-interest and group participation is tricky, but worth the extra effort in the long run.

Although a recent conflict with an authority figure might be resolved on the surface, a deeper battle continues out of sight. Your position on the matter is quite clear to you, but others may not share your perspective. Instead of wasting time trying to prove you're right, look within yourself to discover your role in perpetuating this struggle. Avoid your natural tendency to intellectualize the dilemma or analyze the dynamics. As Johnny Depp said, "People cry, but not because they are weak. It's because they've been strong for too long."

It's time to resurrect a discarded dream that inspired you back in the beginning of this year. But perhaps you were subsequently required to redirect your focus to more mundane matters. Upon reconsideration, it turns out that your previous plans might not be as unrealistic as you once thought. There is no need for action today, but it is crucial to start the process of refining your vision. An adventure awaits; the sooner you commit to making it happen, the sooner your journey will begin.

You love the idea of socializing with your friends yet you may discover that their interests are vastly different from yours today. At first, you're ready to head out on your own instead of modifying your plans for the sake of harmony. Nevertheless, it's smarter to soften your stance and consider acquiescing to the needs of others. However, your peace of mind is temporary, even if you enjoy the buzz of the crowd. Sufi mystic Omar Khayyam wrote, "The thoughtful soul to solitude retires."

Although the process of realization takes a while, it begins to dawn on you that you don't have to handle your regular load of responsibilities today. You still may spend time thinking about moneymaking opportunities, but you grow less concerned with material success throughout the day. Instead of trying to get ahead of the pack, your focus shifts to simply expressing yourself as freely as possible. Although you could get off to a false start, your attitude improves when you accept that it's more important to be true to your heart than to continue old habits that no longer serve you well.

You can talk your way around nearly anything as long as you aren't swept up in a rising tide of emotions. But once you become attached to a certain outcome, you can't see the myriad of possibilities that are right in front of your face. Don't settle for the path of least resistance now; you need to stand up and fight for what's rightfully yours. On one hand, you must be resolute when it comes to getting what you need. On the other hand, compromising with others makes your path easier to walk. The challenge is to find the sweet spot between honoring your heart and meeting the expectations of everyone else.

You may feel like a Crab out of water until the Moon floats into fishy Pisces later in the day. However, you're not interested in being limited by the synchronized swimming of all the other fish in the school. You're craving something entirely new and different without really caring if you're out of step with everyone else. Ultimately, following your own rhythm is exhilarating and brings you more pleasure now than you might imagine.

Friends and relatives seem to be pushing your buttons today, and it's almost as if they're doing it on purpose. However, upon closer examination it becomes readily apparent that the real issue lies within you and not anyone else. Stop fighting against the prevailing winds; your life grows simpler when you are wise enough to discern the difference between those things that can and cannot be changed. Taking the high road shows your strength of character.

Everyone seems to think that you will continue marching to your own drummer and they assume you aren't interested in conforming to the consensus of the group. Although you might ruffle some feathers with your eclectic behavior today, there is an admirable precision to your actions. Your tendency is to explain your strategy in great detail, but all that talk won't help your case now. Instead, proceed with your original plans; your success is your best publicity.

Sometimes saying no to a social invitation is essential for your emotional well-being, especially if there are specific things you wish to accomplish. Instead of falling into the trap of getting lost in someone else's agenda today, decide early in the day what you want to achieve and commit to making it happen. The feeling of deep satisfaction you will derive from following through with your plan will leave you smiling for days.

A flurry of events shifts the spotlight to your relationship with your outer world. Although you may be content running errands and crossing things off your list now, you secretly long for a break in all the action. Thankfully, you'll get your chance later today if you're willing to prioritize your tasks so you can spend some time in quiet contemplation. Reconnecting with your inner world will bring you peace of mind and the wisdom to overcome any challenge.

Relationship tension is slowly building as you try to balance your needs with the desires of others. It's frustrating when your personal goals conflict with the wishes of someone you love. Rather than trying to smooth over the rough spots today, speak from the heart about the things that matter most to you. However, you must also take the time to listen to someone else's story, too. Although you may end up at a stalemate, compassion overcomes the emotional distance created by fear or ignorance. Agreeing to disagree is a viable option.

You might feel as if you're being pulled in several different directions at once. Unfortunately, you don't do well when there is no concrete plan in place. Even if someone is annoyed at your need for a detailed schedule, map out your day the best you can. Nevertheless, circumstances could change and your evening may still take you down an unexpected path. Finding that middle road between rigidity and chaos leads to a memorable experience.

Making up your mind is not the easiest thing to do today. In fact, you might surprise everyone with how quickly you can change your stripes. However, any uncertainty you experience during the day could vanish in an instant when the lightning strikes and you see the ultimate truth. This kind of "aha" experience can be a profound moment, but avoid trying to explain your epiphany to everyone else. Mere words can't convey the magic of serendipity.

It may seem as if your weekend is being hijacked because you have so much work to do this morning. Thankfully, your busyness will pay off sooner than you expect if you are strategic with your schedule. However, you need to take charge in order to make something special happen. Although you might not feel ready to relax until nighttime, the high level of mental and social stimulation acts as a tonic for your soul.

Your imagination may be running unchecked today, enabling you to express yourself creatively in ways that are usually beyond your grasp. Others are duly impressed with your silver-tongued soliloquies and charismatic charm while you secretly struggle over every word you say. Don't spend too much energy in your current search for perfection or you might lose your connection with the muse that's inspiring your efforts. Channeling the messages of the cosmos is only possible when you get out of your own way.

You might spend some of the day lost in a utopian dream of social harmony. However, the confusing Moon-Neptune conjunction colors your perspective now, leading you to believe that everything is in order when it is not. You could inadvertently be the catalyst that tips the scales and sets change into motion today. Don't worry if you feel as if you're in limbo since it will likely take over a week to get your feet back on the ground. In the meantime, embracing the unknown keeps you in the game.

An awkward cloud of disillusionment may follow you today, preventing you from seeing the love that's all around you. Although the tension in the air is palpable, your clever wit and social finesse can cover any negativity so thoroughly that others don't even know it's there. The problem is that everything will come out in the open sooner or later, and it grows more troublesome the longer you wait. Share what's on your mind, even if you don't know where the conversation will lead. Standing in your truth is better than living a lie.

There are so many thoughts flowing through your mind today that it's nearly impossible to jump into the rushing stream of consciousness and reveal your inner process. Instead of setting yourself up for frustration, take a bit of quiet time away from the pressure of interaction. Contemplating the unanswerable questions of the day need not be a struggle unless you mistakenly believe that you must come up with the right answers. Paradoxically, it is your search for truth that creates reality.

You could easily misjudge someone's intentions today if you jump to erroneous conclusions based upon your wishes. Rather than assuming you know what other people are feeling now, employ the radical strategy of actually asking them. Pay close attention to what you hear because the most important stuff is happening in the spaces between the words -- and will be all too easy to miss. Nevertheless, you can hear the music in the silence if you simply take the time to listen.

You want real solutions to the uncertainties you face in relationships now. Unfortunately, people won't be pinned down by your need to know; they will remain elusive no matter how hard you push for a commitment. Ironically, you have a better chance of finding emotional satisfaction if you allow others to drift in and out of their fantasies without making anyone feel guilty. Focus on your own dreams and let sleeping dogs lie.

You may have plenty of chores lined up for today, but it's impossible to get much done if you don't know where to start. Creating a list of things to do is easy but trying to set priorities is enough to drive you crazy, especially if you feel overwhelmed by all the details. Nevertheless, there is much to gain if you can figure out a way to express your imagination without having it disrupt your day. Integrating your visions into your everyday life offers you a workable path toward manifest your dream.

Relationship dynamics feel like tight ropes today as you precariously balance in the middle. On one hand, opportunities seem to exist but only if you focus on one specific outcome. On the other hand, your fantasies of love could lure you into a world of pipe dreams. Where you go from here is your choice, but you may not have to go anywhere at all just yet. Decisions must be made eventually but the less you struggle in the meantime, the better.

It sounds like a broken record these days, but a bit of self-discipline goes a long way to keep you on track. There are so many interesting people in your life that it would be all too easy to forget about your responsibilities while you pursue pleasurable activities. Nevertheless, as attractive as someone's offer might seem, the transient satisfaction will dissipate so quickly it will make your head spin. Hold out for the real deal; your dance with destiny is well worth the wait.

It is the best of times and it is the worst of times. Never before have there been such amazing technological tools at your disposal. However, the human experiment seems to be failing in so many places. Although you feel a deep connection to these extremes, you can't fix everything. The same is true in your personal life; rather than looking back with a critical eye, look ahead and focus on something tangible you can do that will produce an immediate positive impact.

You're a futurist at heart, but you can't seem to find your way out of the past. Your values are being tested as long as you're in a relationship that appears to contradict one of your core beliefs. Instead of berating yourself for falling short of your own expectations or blaming anyone else, set new goals and concentrate on achieving them. But don't expect success overnight; real change cannot be rushed.

People seeking your wise counsel may see you in a very different light than you see yourself. They might even put you on a pedestal in the role of a spiritual teacher or guru. In contrast, you secretly worry that you've lost your way and have little to offer others. You could grow frustrated if you attempt to eliminate your current confusion. Fortunately, you don't have to do anything today to resolve these two different perspectives. Just continue to show up as honestly as you can without trying to prove anything to anyone. Your faith shines through your sincerity.

Although you need the rest, you might find it challenging to step away from your regular grind today. Unfinished business takes precedence over anything else because deadlines are drawing near. Nevertheless, carving out some time for friends and family is a good idea, whether or not there are more chores still to be done. Balancing work with play requires astute time management. Luckily, it will be easy to play catch-up after the Moon shifts into enthusiastic Aries, giving you a much-needed jolt of energy.

Your day unfolds on a dual track, prompting you to straddle the boundary between two worlds. On one hand, you thrive on conversing with anyone who is willing to explore difficult topics that shake the foundations of your thinking. On the other hand, your patience is wearing thin and you want to steer clear of heavy discussions so you can kick back and relax. Don't try to sacrifice one path for the other. Do your best to play at both ends of the spectrum until the dilemma resolves on its own.

You might see yourself as the leader of the pack, but you're more than willing to relinquish the responsibility to nearly anyone who will take it today. The notion of being the boss is quite different than the practical side of acting in a leadership position. Nevertheless, you can intuitively figure out the dynamics of a situation very quickly and create a game plan almost instantaneously. But thankfully, you know that your strategy is only one of many now, and you're just as happy if you are free to pursue your own dreams.

You're able to soar in your imagination when you feel emotionally secure amongst friends and family. You truly believe that you can be anything you wish and go anywhere your heart desires. It's especially satisfying to open your heart now and reveal some of the items on your secret bucket list. You don't even need to justify your choices, because you already know who is on your team. Thankfully, you can count on your loved ones to lift your spirits and support your dreams.

A day of socializing sounds just about perfect to you playful Lions. However, you're so excited that you could try to squeeze too much fun into your schedule. Allowing yourself time to linger at an event improves your chances of meeting someone special today. You might even begin a new friendship that eventually turns into a business relationship or romantic interest. You can't lose if you surround yourself with good people and partake in the give and take of a friendly conversation.

No one seems to want to assume responsibility for making any decisions today. Unfortunately, a social event may come dangerously close to falling apart because everyone expects someone else to take charge. Normally, this kind of evasive behavior would make your skin crawl; but you just look at the situation now and shrug your shoulders. It's not that you don't care; it's just that you have faith in the group process and believe that everything will work out in due time.

Your generous spirit is inspirational to all those you encounter today. Although you might not be as detail-oriented as others prefer, you're wholeheartedly committed to creating a memorable experience for your audience. Additionally, you may believe that it's your duty to do whatever you can in order to keep everyone in your world working and playing in harmony. Others appreciate how you go the extra mile now as long as you know when to stop.

You see the need for significant adjustments to your daily schedule and you're confident you can make the necessary changes once you put your mind to it. Unfortunately, advanced planning isn't an antidote when the twists and turns of the day defy logic. Just make sure to choose your company carefully because connecting with people who appreciate your ideas makes you feel more optimistic about your future. Ultimately, the only limits that stand in your way are the ones that exist in your mind.

You may be unsure of your recent decisions but don't want everyone to know about your loss of confidence today. You're concerned that your current bout with self-doubt might unnecessarily worry others or damage your reputation. It could be helpful to retreat to a safe place and rethink your options. But don't exclude those you love; overcome your fear of vulnerability by confiding in a trustworthy companion. Discussing your feelings with the right person might be all you need to put things back in proper perspective.

It's surprisingly easy for you to shift into a more social mode today, especially if there are festivities on your calendar. But even in the midst of hanging out with your best friends, your thoughts keep returning to unfinished business. Thankfully, you don't need to dwell on your responsibilities now; your right to relax is well-earned and there's no reason to harbor guilt about enjoying the present moment. You are in charge of your feelings, so choose happiness while you can.

You're up for nearly anything today and are quick to abandon your agenda to join in on the fun. Happily, floating through a day of social activities takes your mind off your mundane problems. However, you grow bored of talking about subjects that don't touch your soul or stimulate your creativity. Rather than shutting down so you don't rock the boat, bring up a topic that excites you to the core. Use your fantasies to fuel the group dynamic; your spark can become a flame that ignites the world.

Your soulful approach to the day enables you to find transcendent beauty in everyone and spiritual meaning in everything. An activity as simple as catching up on family matters deepens emotional bonds between you and those you love. There's no need to pursue intense metaphysical conversations at the edge of the universe now when you have everything you need in your immediate environment. The more you celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.

A well-thought-out plan could advance your agenda when it comes to scheduling your time for the next few days. However, your natural tendency to act before you think is heightened now that the Moon is camped out in your spontaneous sign. Thankfully, your conscious intentions can override an unproductive habit. Be careful about jumping to erroneous conclusions; do your necessary homework so you don't overlook any important information. Unseen details are the difference between failure and success.

A peaceful easy feeling is nothing to complain about unless you're so mellow today that you miss an opportunity to share a moneymaking idea with your peers. In fact, your complacency could tempt you to relax rather than applying yourself to achieve a real goal. Taking a little time off can be quite invigorating in the long run, but might send the wrong message to a watchful audience. Thankfully, it's not an all-or-nothing proposition, making this a perfect time to practice the fine art of balancing work with play.

You are ready to launch into the future right now, and there isn't much that can stand in your way. The pioneering Aries Moon energizes your 11th House of Friends and Wishes, encouraging you to think about where you are going and how to get there. Unfortunately, life is more complicated than ever, making it tricky to get all your ducks in a row prior to moving ahead. Luckily, once the major pieces are in order, everything else should fall into place.

You're capable of giving a special kind of nurturing love and you're ready to take it public today. You wish you had the power to protect everyone at work and shield them from the stresses of the day. But your desire to safeguard others is only useful if your assistance is requested. Don't go meddling in people's affairs, especially if there are messy emotional dynamics to clean up in your own life. Be caring but not overbearing.

Sometimes your inner child won't be denied when it wants to come out and play. In fact, you're dying to stir up a bit of mischief today in search of adventure, but a little voice in the back of your head prevents you from swinging into action. Thankfully, Saturn is protecting you by offering a sensible perspective now and, hopefully, you're wise enough to listen. The most obvious sign of maturity is being able to defer gratification until the time is right.

The communication gods are working on your behalf now, facilitating conversations with interesting people. Your words are like arrows to the hearts of others; your ideas are compelling and your delivery is true to aim. Nevertheless, you're afraid of saying too much which leads you to silence rather than talk. Extreme all-or-nothing reactions might upset those closest to you and leave you exhausted in the process. There is a middle-of-the-road path to follow if you can find it. But don't wait; he who hesitates is lost.

Someone might be annoying today because they won't stop pestering you. You want options; they want results. Meanwhile, you would prefer sitting back and contemplating all the possibilities without committing to one course of action. Your frustration grows as external demands increase, prompting you to make a choice before you're ready. Unfortunately, your good intentions could backfire unless you honor your process. Don't rush anything; trust yourself before anyone else.

You may be less concerned with doing the right thing today than you are with getting your work done prior to a set deadline. You're usually not one to take any shortcuts because your integrity is your prime directive. You think you're willing to pay the price and sacrifice quality for convenience now, but it still might not be such a smart idea. Don't downplay your high standards; enduring self-esteem is worth much more than a fleeting moment of satisfaction or approval.

You can count on your own efforts with a higher degree of reliability than assuming someone else will come through for you today. In fact, your coworkers might seem too busy to lend you a hand. And, even if others agree to help you now, they are easily distracted by their personal agendas. Meanwhile, your creative instincts are strong, inspiring you to strike out on your own. Dream up a solution, make a plan, and stick with it until you reach your desired destination.

Oddly enough, your enterprising instincts may not be apparent to everyone else yet. However, there's plenty of creative ideas germinating within the privacy of your mind. But there's no need to share your newest inspiration with anyone until you are ready. In the meantime, focus on your most innovative thoughts and continue to polish them until they shine. There is no way to predict the  reactions of others, so wait until you feel you're standing on stable ground before taking the next step.

Moving into the future is exciting when you see potential for positive growth everywhere you look. You hold a tiny seed in your hand yet it appears to you as a beautiful flower. However, manifesting your dreams takes blood, sweat and tears. Don't be impatient; amazing things can happen when you allow a tree to bear fruit on its schedule and not yours.

Going the extra mile today does more than demonstrate your commitment to success -- it actually sets the tone for the rest of the week. Rather than drifting through the day and responding to events as they happen, set clear objectives and make an ambitious action plan. Following a preset agenda enables you to accomplish more than you ever thought possible. According to Oprah Winfrey, "Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity."

You're not worried about facing a little opposition today; in fact, you're looking forward to it. There's nothing like the heat of battle to get the adrenaline flowing for a combative Aries. Exercising self-restraint on your part is highly unlikely when the Moon collides with explosive Uranus in your sign. However, you may be fighting imaginary windmills in the absence of a real enemy. It's best to sit this round out and see how you feel tomorrow before stirring up a hornet's nest for no reason at all.

You may question your own values today, especially if you encounter someone who shocks you with an entirely new perspective on your life. At first, you might be quite resistant to such a different approach, but the more you hear, the more intriguing it becomes. Since you're not one to change your mind easily, it's rather disquieting to entertain the notion that your faulty assumptions are obstacles to your success. Thankfully, there's no need for finality yet. Keep an open mind and see where this line of thinking leads.

It's disconcerting when the winds of fate shift directions without notice. Although you're aware of the abrupt change, you're not willing to trust your senses just yet. Additionally, you wonder if your situation is stabilizing or if this is just another cosmic whim. Instead of panicking because you don't know what to do, stay conscious of the present moment without trying to solidify your plans. As Eckhart Tolle writes, "When you become comfortable with uncertainty, infinite possibilities open up in your life."

Your sudden reversal on a previous decision could surprise others at work today, but your behavior isn't nearly as shocking as it seems. It is becoming increasingly obvious that your path is not leading you into the future you desired. It's as if old dreams found new life, causing you to obsess about them. But bluntly announcing your plans may be unnecessarily dramatic and counterproductive. Letting others in on your process along the way is more inclusive than simply issuing a final decree. Sharing is caring.

You're quite sure that you're on the road to success no matter how many times you alter your course today. However, there may be a touch of denial that fuels your brash confidence. Instead of waiting until circumstances wear you down, demonstrate your strength by revealing your uncertainty to your allies. There is a fine line between inspiration and delusion; entertain all possibilities while you dance at this edge of reality.

You take pride in your ability to analyze the facts and astutely discern which information is most useful. However, you can't rely on your favorite tools today if you open your toolbox and they're nowhere to be found. It's alleged that Albert Einstein once wrote on a blackboard, "Not everything that counts can be counted, and not everything that can be counted counts." As the Sun squares surreal Neptune now, it's your turn to step beyond the measurable world and find meaning in that which exists only in the realms of imagination.

Relationships may be the source of angst today because people seem to care more about their own agendas than the good of all. Sometimes it's necessary to reestablish your priorities and put your needs at the top of the list. However, you just want others to stop and consider the impact of their behavior before it's too late. Unfortunately, assuming a holier-than-thou position fosters anger rather than cooperation. Share your frustration without blaming anyone else; taking the moral high ground now requires an extra dose of finesse.

Mixed signals from coworkers cast long shadows, making it difficult to see the truth in a clear light. You might not be able to keep up with all the changes on the job while the Moon conspires with unpredictable Uranus in your 6th House of Work. You may even feel as if the whole world's gone mad. You're willing to let go of your preconceived agenda today, but you can't figure out what to replace it with. Your current mission is to practice patience, for a new level of stability will emerge out of the chaos if you surrender control.

You are genuinely surprised when you realize that you read the current situation incorrectly. Abe Lincoln said, "If you look for the bad in people expecting to find it, you surely will." But your desire to see the best in others could prompt you to make assumptions that turn out to be false. Your coworkers might envy your ability to convert your positive thoughts into something concrete. However, blind optimism will only land you into hot water. An overdue reality check may be just what you need to put your feet back on the ground.

Unlike some of your peers, you grow uneasy when everything starts coming up roses. It's not that you're a pessimist; you prefer being called a realist. Nevertheless, it seems as if you're walking a tightrope now as you balance the pros and cons of your current trajectory with an abyss of uncertainty on either side. The stress is created by your fear of the fall; however, the danger exists only within your imagination. Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, focus on what will go right.

You might capitalize on unexpected changes today because your razor-sharp mind appears to have a direct connection with your lightning-fast tongue. But just because you can out talk nearly anyone doesn't mean that you're speaking the truth. Unfortunately, you are so convincing now that you'll believe whatever you say right along with everyone else. Monitor your words before they create more problems than they solve. Promise less and deliver more.

People find you nearly impossible to read today because your words and your actions don't seem to match. It's not that you're being duplicitous; it's just that your inner life is richer and more complex now than anyone can imagine, and they can't solve the enigma of you. Fortunately, you don't need to explain yourself. Dwelling in the realms of paradoxical mysteries seems like home to you, even if others don't understand. The less you reveal, the more they will wonder.

You can be extremely persuasive when you tell someone that you are ready to change your ways. In fact, you are so convincing that you might even believe it yourself. But no matter how good your intentions are today, your follow through will be lacking unless you are willing to be honest when talking about what you want. Although Oscar Wilde wrote, "The truth is rarely pure and simple," denying it does not change the facts. Transparency is a show of strength.

It's one thing when love is in the air yet quite another when it precipitates down to earth. There is a practical side to your unfulfilled dreams now that motivates you to make them come true. Although achieving satisfaction may be more challenging than you prefer, don't trivialize the power of your romantic fantasies. The act of reaching for what you want is the first step toward manifestation. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

You're not interested in revealing too much about your personal needs today. You might think it's easier to get exactly what you want by winning someone over with your silver tongue and twinkling eyes than sharing what's in your heart. However, you can create a situation that will lead to disappointment unless you're truthful about your feelings from the start. Demonstrate your emotional maturity by discussing the inconsistencies in your desires, even if it's not what others expect to hear. Build your relationships on solid ground rather than shifting sands if you want them to last.

Obviously, you expect your friends to be reliable, offering you sensible feedback and advice you can trust. But it's nearly impossible to know who really has your back because too many people respond by smiling and nodding yes, without really understanding your dilemma. Unfortunately, you might just have to take a risk today because there's no way to tell in advance who will step up to the plate and engage in a real heart-to-heart interaction. If your conversation hits a dead end, retreat and try again. One day you will look back and be glad you didn't give up.

You think your goals are within reach today, but you encounter more complications than you expect. Your mind wanders easily now, challenging you to finish anything you start. Additionally, everyone else's activities seem more interesting, tempting you to explore everything except what's on your own plate. You're not going to squelch your imagination; the more you try, the stronger it grows. Instead, encouraging your creativity by scheduling short breaks is revitalizing, enabling you to return to work focused and ready to take on the world.

You might waste precious time today trying to clean up a recent misunderstanding. Unfortunately, there is no guarantee that you'll untangle the mess simply by giving it your undivided attention. Your desires are coloring your perceptions now, making it difficult to find the truth. Don't be quick to put the blame on someone else since you probably share the responsibility for the current confusion. Take a few steps back from any troubling situation. Giving yourself a little breathing room enables you to reengage with a fresh perspective.

The relationship dance you must do today is challenging because the music seems to change without warning. Just as your communication settles into a natural rhythm, the tempo switches and leaves you feeling awkward. However, you can maintain your grace and navigate your way through this tricky territory if you follow rather than lead. You can still accomplish your goals as long as you don't fall into the trap of trying to take total control.

Whatever you believe could actually manifest today. Although this sounds like good news, you may not be happy with the results. For example, if you think that someone is being too stubborn, they might just live up to your expectations -- and it won't be easy to pinpoint your role in creating this reality. Fortunately, you can prevent your day from spinning out of control by remaining adaptable to the needs of others. A sign of intelligence is the ability to respond to change without missing a step.

You may need to play the role of a heavyweight today because people don't seem to be holding up their end of the deal. You prefer encouraging others to follow their bliss rather than authoritatively telling them what they can't do. Nevertheless, it's crucial to realize that pie-in-the-sky thinking won't accomplish much unless it's backed up with a practical plan and hard work. Don't forget that it's more effective to lead from the front of the pack than from behind.

Your fantasies are like hot air balloons now, each one lifting you far above reality and into the colorful realms of your imagination. No matter how much you want to lose yourself in your daydreams, you have an ambitious agenda and will not be swayed from your course. Thankfully, you can let most of the distractions float away without you; you won't miss them once they are gone. Remember, today's determination leads to tomorrow's success.

You can imagine all the best parts of being in love today. In fact, your brain has become a fantasy generator that doesn't have an off switch. Although this creative outlet can be a lot of fun, it may lead you into trouble if you cross the line. Thankfully, you understand that some thoughts are better kept to yourself. Nevertheless, there are appropriate times and places to share your dreams with someone special. Real vulnerability builds bridges to stronger relationships.

Relationships grow overwhelming when powerful emotions bend reality out of shape. Sometimes there is a fine line between flights of fancy and the messy truth of love. Fortunately, you have experience at finding your way around the mists of illusion; however, it can be both wonderful and confusing if your romantic fantasies are mirrored back to you by another person. Life holds special magic for those who dare to dream.

You can amaze people with your never-ending stream of good ideas, but sometimes your execution is less than impressive. You are now faced with a daunting task as unforgiving Saturn requires you to solidify your long-term plans or walk away from them. If you know in your heart that you should proceed today, concentrate all of your energy on making your dreams come true. This is not a decision to be made lightly; the consequences of your current actions will resound for a long time to come.

Working as part of a team is complicated enough, even when everyone is on the same page. The complexity of group interactions is more challenging when people have different goals in mind. You can't just continue pretending that there is true collaboration until you review and refine your mutual objectives. Disagreement is not a problem unless it's ignored. Keep in mind that strength comes from diversity, so find common ground and push on from there.

It's nearly impossible to pin you down because you like to keep your options open. Although you may see amazing possibilities everywhere you look today, others might need more structure in order to continue working with you. Don't overreact by running off to pursue your own interests, since you will accomplish much more through the process of collaboration. Narrow your focus, make a commitment and be thankful that your support network is in place.

It might seem as if your life is opening up like a flower and your vision of the future holds more promise than ever. Unfortunately, your best ideas could fade into oblivion if you're unwilling to adhere to a tight schedule. Your fantasies have inspired you long enough and you must give them form now or let them go. As Napoleon Hill wrote, "A goal is a dream with a deadline."

As much as you enjoy participating in a group effort, you still need to set consistent boundaries in order to be successful. Ironically, you'll be able to contribute more in the long run if you know when to say no. Spreading yourself too thin won't help anyone, especially yourself. Finishing one task before starting another garners respect from your peers and is beneficial for all involved. Even the most generous people have their limits.

It takes less effort to shine in the workplace now than it does to look good at home. But no matter how challenging personal relationships are at this time, they offer more potential for your development than anything else. Don't try to escape from a discussion about a sensitive topic even if you're unsure of its purpose. Oddly enough, when you have the courage to confront your fears with someone you love, you will also experience positive changes in the rest of your life.

There are many times when sitting on the fence serves you well, but ambiguity has no place in your world at this time. Although you might be uncertain about where your current path will lead, you must make a decision, nonetheless. Visualize an ideal future and imagine that you are already on your way. Choosing one direction now starts the ball rolling even if you change your mind later on. Modifications will be easier once you're in motion. As Albert Einstein quipped, "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving."

You might go along with the group consensus today in order to maintain the peace. However, you could do more harm than good if you agree with others without regard to your own needs. Although an argument is not fun in the moment, it clears the air of unspoken emotional tension. It's crucial to stay true to your values now, even if they differ from everyone else's. Thankfully, it's not hard to make a choice when you know where you stand.

You may be the biggest obstacle in your path these days, yet overcoming your own shortcomings is probably easier than you think. Instead of focusing on your ultimate destination, pull back into the present moment and handle each crisis as it arises. Harboring big hopes for the future can be quite inspiring, yet inflated dreams are a recipe for disappointment now. There's nothing wrong with expecting miracles as long as you remember to balance them with a healthy dose of pragmatism.

Although you're the champion of making plans that lead to success, it's tricky to give structure to an unformed vision. Nevertheless, you're driven to crystallize your dreams because you're afraid they will vanish if you don't make them real now. Unfortunately, too much organization can kill the organic process of creativity. Rein in your fantasies enough to work with them, but not so much that they die in the process.

You think you're pretty clever now as you expound one brilliant idea after another. Unfortunately, your coworkers don't necessarily share in your enthusiasm. Much to your surprise they are judgmental of your idealism, demanding that you be more practical in your thinking. Don't just throw your hands up in despair and relinquish your dreams. Instead, temper your creativity enough to satisfy your critics, for they could be your most loyal supporters in the end.

Plato wrote, "The harder you work, the luckier you get." In fact, your current blood, sweat and tears create profound positive influence on your career objectives. Your hopes and dreams were necessary to bring you to this moment, but now you must take the bull by its horns and wrestle your best ideas into existence. Although the going may be tough, it's just reality's way to push you past the limitations and onto the road of success.

The truth seems so self-limiting that you could change your mind in an instant for a chance to escape. The airy Gemini New Moon falls in your 3rd House of Communication, allowing your thoughts to fly on nearly any breeze that comes along. Unfortunately, your basic perceptions of reality may be compromised now, especially if you see a way to make life easier for yourself. Nevertheless, shortcuts are not advised; ultimately choosing one path and staying on it until you reach your destination is the most reliable route to success.

Releasing old ideas about generating income creates room for newer and better ones. The multitasking Gemini New Moon occurs in your 2nd House of Finances, encouraging innovative thinking that allows moneymaking strategies to take root. However, the presence of idealistic Neptune and realistic Saturn requires you to weed impractical dreams and schemes from your garden of prosperity. Keeping it simple and following through with responsible behavior is rewarded by the fruits of your labor.

Although your life may be settling into a steady rhythm, be prepared to revise your plans on a moment's notice. Thankfully, you know better than to hold onto your past while the restless Gemini New Moon pushes the restart button in your 1st House of Self. But patience is not your strong suit and you could grow anxious if change doesn't happen right away. Don't allow frustration to get the best of you. Letting go of excess baggage leaves room for happiness in the future.

Your dreams are luring you away from your social time today. You're tempted to seek out quiet places where you can contemplate the meaning of life. Although the inquisitive Gemini New Moon disappears into your 12th House of Escapism, you won't be able to ignore your daily activities. Figuring out where you fit into the larger scheme of things should be at the top of your list. Eliminate distractions and focus on your ideal future instead of allowing yourself to be pulled in several directions.

Just when you thought you had a clear view of the future the restless Gemini New Moon shakes up your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, motivating you to create new friendships that reflect your current interests. Don't hesitate to let go of old expectations that seem to have lost their relevance. Look beyond the current moment to see the boundless potential. Wipe your slate clean so you can make up a new story. Put your faith in your dreams rather than in the limitations of reality.

Office politics might seem more complicated these days, motivating you to think about creating new relationship patterns on the job. However, it's nearly impossible to make up your mind while the whimsical Gemini New Moon activates your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Although you want to manifest long-term career changes, your thoughts may be racing too fast for your own good. Nevertheless, reevaluating your professional goals should be a top priority now. Slow down so the elusive resolution you're chasing can catch up to you.

Your brain is buzzing with so many outrageous ideas today, you wonder if any of them are actually worthy of your exploration. Nevertheless, the adaptable Gemini New Moon soars through your 9th House of Distant Horizons, instilling you with fresh hope for your future. You can't decide whether to take a risk and share your plans now or to keep them to yourself. Don't get lost in endless analysis when the choice is simple. If your current strategy is realistic, it will have lasting value in your personal life.

You're known for your decisive nature, but forcing a resolution to an emotional matter won't provide the relief you need today. You may experience uncharacteristic confusion about a significant relationship as the changeable Gemini New Moon seeks expression in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. This New Moon's tense square with otherworldly Neptune tempts you with fantasies that fly in the face of facts. Fortunately, this alignment also encourages compassion that salves old wounds. As Mother Theresa said, "If we really want to love, we must learn how to forgive."

Relationships seem unstable while the dualistic Gemini New Moon directs its focus on your 7th House of Others. But tough aspects to this New Moon might weaken your connection with a partner if you can't discern fantasies from reality. Take your time before choosing a new direction because most ideas will sound better now than they actually are. Employing cautious optimism is wiser than letting your blind faith run amok.

The pleasure you receive from your personal life now can distract you from your current obligations. Nevertheless, the scattered Gemini New Moon rocks your 6th House of Daily Routine, motivating you to analyze a variety of potential courses of action available to you. Unfortunately, a never-ending flow of daydreams could exhaust you mentally while a long list of chores remains untouched. Too much thinking creates problems today; get out of your head and into your life.

All the pieces are in place for you to make a clean break from your past. The adaptable Gemini New Moon rattles your 5th House of Spontaneity, illuminating the difference between your future ambitions and how you want to enjoy the present moment. As long as you stay aware of the opposite forces during this exciting yet disruptive time, everything just might turn out copacetic. As the Grateful Dead sang, "When life looks like Easy Street, there is danger at your door."

Focusing on the here and now is complicated when you can see so far into the future. Nevertheless, the logical Gemini New Moon digs into your 4th House of Roots, empowering you to carefully plant the seeds of your intentions. Meanwhile, spacey Neptune blurs your boundaries, inspires your dreams and also sows confusion on the home front. Solid ground shakes like tectonic plates if you commit to more than you can handle. Taking small steps is the fastest way to get to your destination without getting lost.

Although Sundays may be a day of rest for some, you might have a difficult time finding the off switch today. Nevertheless, you believe that you have earned a quick escape as a reward for all that you've been through recently. Unfortunately, the universe isn't giving out free passes just because you think you deserve one. Accepting your busy schedule isn't as bad as it sounds at first; your productivity will soar once you get into the flow.

You are tired of juggling so many separate parts of your life. You long for quieter days when there was sufficient time to relax. A short coffee break, a quick run to the store or even a walk in the park is not enough now to satisfy your needs. You crave a longer period of time to fully restore your energy. But don't give up; a dream vacation might still be in the picture sooner than you think. In the meantime, steal a few moments for revitalization whenever you get the chance and don't skimp on your sleep.

Your feelings are all over the map today, challenging others to keep up with your mood changes. However, you're busy trying to maintain balance while your inner world is bending you out of shape. You might not have a lot of sympathy for those whose emotional stability seems to require more reassurance than you can muster. You can't fix anyone else's problems, especially when yours need attention. You may not be prepared to be a therapist for your friend, but a hug could be enough to do the trick.

Your mind may be racing as you worry about all you must do today while you're still operating on weekend time. You wish you could spend the day doing as little as possible since you need the rest. It seems unfair that you can't just let everything slide for a bit longer. Unfortunately, instant karma is lurking nearby, ready to teach you a lesson if you don't hunker down and deliver on your promises. Channeling your angst into your work earns you a break without guilt.

Although your list of new things to do may be shorter today, you could be overwhelmed with cleaning up from yesterday's change of direction. Accept the fact that a recent event is like water under a bridge. There's no going back to redo a critical interaction; instead you must take this moment as a starting point and move toward the future. Fortunately, you don't have to let someone's negativity rain on your parade of creativity. It may be slower going than you prefer, but your persistence will lead to measurable progress.

You want to be in charge of the action today but you could be short on confidence even if you're long on ideas. In fact, you might envision so many wonderful things to do that you can't pick just one. Ironically, your inability to commit to a single path is likely the source of your self-doubt. Fortunately, rectifying the situation is pretty straightforward; make a choice and live with it. Once you're on track, you'll be surprised at how quickly others follow.

Your struggles are finally winding down and you can see the proverbial light at the end of the tunnel today. Your recent uncertainty might vanish so quickly that you don't even notice it's departure. It's as if someone flipped the switch and now you know the truth. Oddly enough, your little epiphany might pull you in a totally unexpected direction. But don't worry about what others think; what's important is that you're finally off and running.

Your desires run deeper than most people realize, and bringing them up to the surface requires a significant amount of energy today. Thankfully, your closest friends appreciate your willingness to share your inner process with them. However, it's nearly impossible to make sense out of your own feelings when they defy your ability to express them verbally. The more words you use now, the less true they are to your heart. Your eyes are the windows to your soul; meaningful silence is better than meaningless chatter.

You might not accomplish your goals today because you're so easily distracted by everyone's dramas. Naturally, your friends are appreciative of your undivided attention as they unfold their stories. But your avid curiosity is not just about your concern for others. As long as you're listening to someone else's narrative, you don't have to face your own dilemmas. Actually, balancing your social participation with your personal agenda creates the satisfaction you seek.

You are done with always being the responsible one. In fact, you might turn your day upside down now by suddenly changing your plans and leaving others in the lurch. It's not that your new agenda is more awesome than your old one; it's just that you feel the need to shake up your Sunday routine so you can take control of your own destiny. Unfortunately, you may end up cutting off your nose to spite your face. Check your motives; what you do today is ultimately less important than why you're doing it.

Gonzo journalist, Hunter S. Thompson must have been thinking about you when he wrote, "When the going gets weird, the weird turn pro." You may naturally excel at eccentricity, but today you might even surprise yourself with your outlandish fantasies. You're obsessed with escaping from the status quo and the more radical your plan now, the better it sounds. Unfortunately, it's possible to take a brilliant idea so far out that it loses its value. Nevertheless, real genius consciously acknowledges the limits before stepping beyond them.

Everybody else's ideas sound so creative today that you might think yours are not worth mentioning at all. But comparing your thoughts to someone else's is not an all-or-nothing situation; you can follow your own bliss while still being enamored with someone else's scheme. However, you'll never know what's possible unless you take a chance and put your plan into motion. For now, life is not an either/or choice, for you can have it both ways if you're willing to keep an open mind.

Returning to work has its pros and cons today because people are so pleasant that all you want to do is chat with them. It seems too good to be true, but the promise of love is everywhere you look. Although your imagination is a powerful part of the equation now, there is no reason your fantasies must remain unrealized. Instead of setting someone on a pedestal, acknowledge the magic of connection as it occurs between equals. Relationships cannot grow without honest communication and mutual respect.

You could emerge a champion in nearly any type of financial negotiation today. Closing a deal that's in your favor seems easier when everyone is so amenable to your perspective. However, you still must be cautious when it comes to your expenditures. Your optimism is not a permission slip to buy anything that strikes your fancy. As Will Rogers quipped, 
The quickest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it back in your pocket.

You can do nothing wrong today, or so it seems. You are a people magnet that attracts one lovely social interaction after another. In fact, you could while away the hours in endless conversation, without having anything to show for all your fun at the end of the day. Unfortunately, there is more to life than just engaging in friendly chitchat. There's no need to curtail pleasurable activities as long as you leave enough time to pursue something of substance.

You are an unsolvable puzzle today because others can't read your emotions, even if you're wearing them close to the surface. However, it's apparent from your behavior that you're not saying what's really on your mind. Fortunately, it's not your responsibility to communicate everything you feel all the time. In fact, sometimes words just dissipate the energy prematurely. Your current job is to maximize your experience by staying aware of your changing moods whether or not you choose to share them with anyone else.

It's not like you to withdraw from social interactions, but you may want privacy in order to lick your wounds today. People can easily misunderstand you because they think your positive nature means you have rhino skin. However, you're more sensitive now that the moody Cancer Moon has slipped into your 12th House of Invisibility. Nevertheless, you're unhappy when you're feeling emotionally isolated. Give others a chance to see the real you; honesty is a critical key to creating meaningful relationships.

You may be experiencing an approach-avoidance conflict about whether or not you want to participate in a group activity. You seek out pleasant distractions with people you like but you wonder if this is the best use of your time, even if you can fit a social outing into your busy schedule. It's important to acknowledge the part of you that would rather steal some quiet time to dream about your future rather than acting frivolously in the present. Do what you must, but remember that happiness is always here and now.

Your people-pleasing skills are more apparent now than ever as charming Venus dances with the Sun in your 9th House of Philosophy. Your objectivity is your greatest strength and inspires you to help others see their current situation from a more logical perspective. However, it's still tempting to steer a conversation toward your preferred outcome today. Unfortunately, your bias detracts from your neutrality and weakens your effectiveness. Acknowledge your feelings, but maintain your balance by always reestablishing your center.

You want to get away from it all today, but you're not willing to sacrifice your emotional security in the process. It may be safer to talk about your fantasies of taking a life-changing journey than to go anywhere at all. Nevertheless, you can't deny your deep craving for adventure now and the sooner you acknowledge your current restlessness, the sooner you can integrate it into your life. The biggest risk is letting your dreams fade away without doing anything at all.

It might feel as if you're running through an obstacle course today with intriguing people placed strategically, whose only goal is to distract you from your tasks. It's all too easy to fall into another fascinating discussion about an interesting subject. However, the hidden cost is revealed when you realize you're not progressing toward your goals. Fortunately, you can create an invisible shield around you to ward off energy that could lead you astray. It's simple; when you focus on your destination with unwavering intention, no one will get in your way.

Naturally, you don't want to hurt anyone's feelings. But everyone seems so sensitive today that you are afraid of generating unnecessary static by just saying what's on your mind. Ironically, the more careful you are in your delivery, the less effective you now are in making your point. In fact, you could use so many words in your attempt to be diplomatic that the impact of your message is lost. Being kind is admirable, but not if you sacrifice the truth in the process.

Creating clear boundaries can be tricky business today because you seem to have the right words to say in any situation. Your easygoing nature attracts others to interact with you. However, you have work to do on your own and want enough time to do your job well. Nevertheless, cutting off a pleasant conversation isn't as easy as it might sound. This dilemma is an opportunity to demonstrate your unwavering willpower. Step up to the plate and let others know what's on your mind before it's too late.

The tides have shifted and refreshing waters are flowing into your world, stimulating your creativity and awakening your heart. Although you might be inclined to keep your thoughts to yourself, it's more productive to share your exhilaration with those you love. There's no reason to ramble endlessly about the subtle nuances of your feelings; just speak your truth succinctly and let your message settle in gradually. Sometimes silence is louder than words.

Sometimes people depend on you to take care of business because they know that you will quickly assess a situation and figure out what needs to be done. But you might not be willing to drop your immediate plans today in order to make someone else's dreams come true. With a little finesse you can minimize your involvement without creating a conflict in the process. Don't turn this dilemma into a power struggle when a little diplomacy will serve you well.

Your heart is set on following its own course today, yet it seems as if one thing after another impedes your progress. No doubt, people truly want to help you achieve your goals, but their good intentions might create trouble when you realize how different your work styles are. Instead of placating others by going along with their wishes, stick to your original agenda. In order to say yes to your own priorities, you must be willing to say no to someone else.

Although your careful analysis of the current situation leads you to one conclusion, your instincts tell you something else. Facts and figures can be misleading because they don't take your feelings into consideration. Those closest to you might be shocked at first when they realize you're playing by your own rules. Don't be too distracted by the resistance your actions seem to precipitate if others question your decision. Ultimately, your conduct is the best proof of your character.

Everyone seems overly concerned about your well-being today. Normally, all this fuss would make you feel loved, but now you wish that others would practice a bit of self-restraint because it seems as if they are interfering in your life rather than helping. Don't feed into anyone's negativity now or you'll only make matters worse. Instead, thank people for their concern without acting in a defensive manner. Conflict can only occur if you choose to participate in it.

You don't appreciate people who poke and prod at you until you respond, especially when you wish they would just leave you alone. Your calendar is already overbooked and there's no time to waste fending off unnecessary distractions. However, that which you resist will only grow stronger and more irritating today. Being clear from the start prevents a gulf of misunderstanding from widening between you and others. There's nothing wrong with putting a "Do Not Disturb" sign on your door if you need some peace and quiet.

You may be overly self-protective today if someone's behavior make you second-guess a recent choice. In fact, you could withdraw so suddenly that your actions seem out of place to those close to you. However, your heightened sensitivity can become your greatest strength if you don't overreact out of fear. There's no sensible reason to make a permanent decision based on a temporary emotion. Sitting quietly with your uncertainty allows it to morph into a concrete plan for the future.

Recent events seem to be out of alignment with your long-term goals, making you wonder whether or not you're traveling on the right track. Although you might be overly cautious today, your logic is sound and your conclusions are valid. Nevertheless, it's not wise to shake everything up just yet. Continue to weigh the pros and cons of taking a new path until you explore all your options. In the meantime, remember that fear is your enemy and change is your friend.

There's nothing casual in the way you engage with reality. However, sometimes it's necessary to set your intense passions aside so you can come up for air and catch your breath. Fortunately, you have an opportunity to retreat and cultivate a healthier perspective on a complicated relationship. But don't step back too far or you could send the wrong message to someone you love. Extreme emotional reactions may be the course of least resistance while striving for balance is a more difficult path that leads to success.

Although it appears as if external circumstances are pulling you off course today, your biggest problem can be seen in a mirror. You might not realize how your attitude of superiority is slowing you down, but emotional baggage becomes heavier the longer you carry it. If your values are in conflict with someone else's, stop trying to persuade them that your position is the right one. Instead, let go of your attachment to people who drain your enthusiasm. Look to yourself for inspiration now; when you believe in what you're doing, your faith will be reflected by those around you.

You may want to make a run for it today, but your sense of duty prevents you from doing something you might soon regret. Nevertheless, settling into a familiar old routine is not advisable, since your frustration will grow until it erupts. Fortunately, sharing your concerns with a friend eases your mind. But don't make the mistake of thinking that you need a final answer; simply talking about your dilemma helps you find your way while you continue to grapple with a long-term solution. In the words of Ralph Waldo Emmerson, "Life is a journey, not a destination."

Your creativity demands expression today, but you are unsure of the best way to do it. It may be as simple as relying on a talent, whether it be drawing, writing, or making music. However, sharing your love is also a meaningful path to self-realization. Thankfully, you don't need to surrender your identity now to reveal your feelings. Your spirit soars if you have the courage to follow your heart.

Spending quiet time at home might sound like a perfect way to unwind, but responsibilities in the real world prevent you from escaping today. Rather than being discouraged because you have to work, put all your effort into meeting your obligations. The satisfaction you gain from doing what's right makes it all worthwhile. Luckily, the frosting on the cake is the peace you find later in the evening when you finally experience the solitude you wanted all along.
