Although you may be a bit disconnected from your feelings this morning, the flame of enthusiasm is burning brightly in your heart. Your spirit quickly gains altitude and soars over the mundane annoyances that could bring you down if you let them. But you're so eager to get started that you might initiate action before you have everything in order. You will still arrive at your destination even if you delay your first step. Just don't take your eye off the prize until you achieve your goal.

Someone's criticism could raise issues of self-doubt today, but you're determined to overcome them. Rather than speaking up right away, you might withdraw into your own internal world at the first blush of insecurity. Looking within for spiritual strength is a great idea as long as you express your feelings once your feet are back on solid ground. Nearly anything is possible now if you're willing to believe in its existence with every fiber of your being.

You're acutely aware of the strong emotional bonds between you and your friends today, challenging you to remain objective in your interactions. Unfortunately, basing your decisions on your attractions and desires is not nearly as stable as sticking to logic. No matter what you choose, observe how your perspective shifts throughout the day. Your feelings continue to change, but the facts do not.

Your personal possessions give you a sense of security today and you relish in the certainty of their accessibility. But holding on to an abundance of mementos is like carrying extra weight and only slows your growth. Hoarding tools you no longer use makes it more difficult to find the ones necessary to complete a task. But don't get rid of anything just to please someone else now. When you act from the core of your beliefs, others are more likely to stick with you through thick and thin.

Nearly everything you say and do becomes a scene in your movie today with you shining in the leading role. Your impassioned receptivity enables you to  intuitively connect with your audience. But you can be so focused on others now that the generous Leo Moon allows your inner voice to be drowned out by everyone else's. Nevertheless, you still crave your time in the spotlight. In the final analysis, you agree with Shakespeare when he wrote, "All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players."

You believe you're open to changing your plans today as long as you remain in control of the agenda. But you might not see what's coming around the bend because you're concentrating on completing a current task. Rather than practicing flexibility, your immediate reaction is to contract so you're not pulled off center. Unfortunately, this defensive tactic won't work. Instead of responding like a boxer by blocking and parrying, think like an aikido master who receives an incoming attack as an opportunity to work with the energy. Don't deflect the unknown; engage it.

Your natural ability to gracefully interact with others serves you well today as you work to strengthen your network of supporters. Thankfully, your friends and associates are quite receptive to your overtures now and are more than willing to work or play with you. But don't take anyone's participation for granted, for you might not be the main attraction in everyone else's life. Nevertheless, you can make a real difference in the world if you step beyond your regular limits and try.

You respond quite favorably to people who are nurturing toward you today. Rather than putting up walls and acting in a defensive manner, you're reminded of how nice it is when you feel loved and cherished. However, you might be so eager to show your appreciation that you shift your priorities to meet someone else's expectations. Nevertheless, you will be more successful in the long run if you stay true to your nature. Opening your heart is the best gift you can give in return.

Your world view is strongly colored by your emotions today. You'll jump on someone's bandwagon if your passion is stirred by their opinions, whether they are based upon fact or not. Your attitude is of the utmost importance as you look  ahead to your future. There is no time to entertain doubts when your destiny is calling; think big and do whatever it takes to reach your goals. If you believe in your dreams, others will do the same.

You need to be able to compartmentalize your personal preferences today when making decisions that can affect someone else. In fact, you may be called upon to manage shared assets or even take responsibility for other people at home or in the community now. In any case, your behavior sets the tone as you lead by example. Rehearsal is over; your show is about to begin and everyone is anticipating your impressive performance with baited breath.

Although you're often uncomfortable with the messiness of human emotion, you're oddly drawn to those who openly express their needs to you today. Perhaps, your uncharacteristic magnetism with demonstrative people fills the gap left by your intellectual approach. You're eager to improve your understanding of your own subjective reactions, so observing the likes and dislikes of someone else becomes part of your research. But don't use your current curiosity to avoid your true feelings. Life without passion is like peanut butter without jelly.

Sticking to a rigid schedule is nearly impossible today. You're more likely to change your behavior based upon what you're feeling in the moment. Once minute, you could be so excited about a current project that you're ready to tackle any obstacle. But your productivity falters if you feel sad or dejected. Honestly, your life is too unpredictable now to live and die by the clock. Accordingly, it's more important than ever to do what you love and keep looking up.

You may feel as if you're personally under attack when someone criticizes your beliefs. But verbally aggressive behavior doesn't sit right with you and you could be quick to strike back. Unfortunately, it's possible that your entire premise is wrong now; others might actually be more supportive than you think. They are likely motivated by the desire to help you rather than bring you down, but you must let them. Build bridges instead of walls if you want to cultivate harmony.

You are quite direct when sharing what's on your mind today. Your thoughts are grounded in the truth but your unrelenting insistence could put others off. You may be surprised when your words run into a roadblock rather than an open highway if you rub someone the wrong way. Bring it down a notch before you are accused of overselling your agenda. Just remember the old adage about catching more flies with honey than with vinegar and you'll be fine.

There are differing schools of thought at work today and they all sound overly complicated in their various approaches. Although you truly believe your way is the most straightforward, you might still need to acquiesce in the name of cooperation now. You will be your own worst enemy as long as you remain self-righteous about your path. Act wisely and compromise for the best results.

Your friends appreciate your ability to express your thoughts today, but you may get lost in your own ideas if they're not built on a solid foundation. Nevertheless, you could put on such a dramatic show that everyone thinks you did a great job. However, you know where you fell short of your well-rehearsed presentation. Don't cry over spilt milk; just clean it up as quickly as you can and jump back into the fray while the odds are in your favor.

The bigger your soapbox is today, the less people will pay attention to your words. The taller the mountaintop from which you are preaching, the more your declaration will fall onto deaf ears. Don't overestimate the importance of communication now, even if it's one of the most important tools in your toolbox. Nevertheless, without decisive action to reinforce your message, your ideas won't materialize into anything tangible. The proof is in the pudding.

People aren't sure what you're really trying to say today, even if you think you're being crystal clear. Part of the problem is that your priorities are changing and you're already moving far into the future in your mind. It's frustrating because finding the right words to bring someone into your new frame of reference seems nearly impossible. Don't waste your energy stressing about the gulf between you and others. Your focus on the present moment will return in a few days, allowing for a reunion with those you temporarily left behind.

You are defying everyone's primary assumption about the ambiguous nature of your sign by stepping up to the plate today and making brave decisions regarding your future. Your mind is like a virtual reality generator now; whatever you think actually manifests right before your eyes. But acting too impulsively will come back to haunt you, so avoid any spur of-the-moment choices that could jeopardize your previous achievements. Focus on creating the most positive impact and your success will be inevitable.

Feeling as if you're being pulled into someone's tractor beam is disturbing, especially if you have an agenda of your own. However, you might be sucked into a conversation that doesn't even concern you - and your lack of boundaries could prevent you from reaching your own goals. You may be so emotional today that you cry for absolutely no obvious reason at all. Don't hold back your tears since they can wash away the cares of your soul.

You're operating with a hidden agenda today and you don't want others to know what you're up to yet. But once you start talking, you become so excited with your work that you might forget your secret is worth defending. In fact, you could blurt out your theory before you can support your conclusion. Remember, you only get to make a first impression once, so keep things under wraps until you're ready to take center stage.

You want to approach a job in a very creative manner today, but others don't know what to make of your unusual behavior. They might even attempt to prevent you from carrying out your tasks in such a radical style. But moderating your position now won't help you in the long run. It's been said that a compromise is an agreement where both parties get what neither of them wanted. Instead, dig in your heels and ward off all those who would dampen your enthusiasm. Defend your right to color outside of the lines.

You're not making as much progress at work as you expected and this realization could hit you hard today. You had big plans and high hopes, yet you must face the facts now and consider adjusting your overall trajectory. But reacting too quickly can make matters worse. Don't change direction; just accept that the cosmos is operating on its own time schedule and not yours. There are many detours on the road to success.

You can talk about your plans for the day in such a manner that it sounds like you're fully informed about all the contingencies. However, upon closer analysis, it's apparent that there are viable possibilities that you have not considered at all. Luckily, time is on your side because a final decision isn't necessary for a while yet. In the meantime, don't let your emotions run amok just because everything you want is on the other side of fear.

You know exactly how to skillfully employ your charm to get what you want. But you're playing with fire today that's more powerful than you realize. You could inadvertently stir up someone's emotions in a way you aren't prepared to handle. Going out of your way to be extra sensitive to the needs of others may seem unnecessary, but it might make the difference between wasting energy in endless conversation and accomplishing exactly what you intended.

Your plans may be solid, but someone could shake your confidence by calling your underlying values into question. Defending your beliefs is probably a thankless task today because your words won't be able to win a clash of perspectives. In fact, talk is cheap and only disperses your limited energy. Instead, stay focused on reaching your destination now. If you want to reexamine your principles, do it on your own terms when you are good and ready.

You have one foot firmly planted on terra firma today, while the other one has slipped into another dimension. Accordingly, you might feel as if you're precariously dancing on the edge. Nevertheless, you can dazzle your friends and associates with your ability to juggle multiple realities without actually being in two places at once. But don't push your luck; you're not invincible. Acknowledging your human limitations is a wise place to start. Vulnerability is the secret to your success.

Your metaphysical beliefs could create awkward tension with others today. Either they don't understand your ideas or they just want to convert you to their way of thinking. But you're not interested in debating the mysteries of the universe since you're feeling rather protective about your spiritual pursuits now. You're under no obligation to talk to anyone about your private affairs unless you feel so inclined. Claim your power by setting your boundaries and sticking to them.

It seems as if the pressure to make decisions is beginning to ease. People are less demanding now or, perhaps, your mental clarity has returned. Either way, your emotions are more manageable, allowing you to get along better with your co-workers today. But there are still complicated dynamics that make long-term collaboration unlikely. Don't push to resolve that which remains elusive. You will be happily surprised if you simply let the unspoken conflicts dissipate on their own. Time has a funny way of working things out.

You want everyone to know how intelligent you are and how much value you can bring to the table. But your ideas may be moving so fast that you can't catch a single one of them, sending you into a tailspin of self-doubt. However, if you visualize the act of throwing your distracting thoughts into the trash, they will begin to leave you alone. The answer to your dilemma isn't about impressing anyone else; it's simply about filtering out the unnecessary noise so you can think with a clear head.

The cosmic weather has shifted without warning; decisions that seemed so easy to make yesterday are as daunting today as scaling Mount Everest. Nevertheless, your internal guidance system is functioning better than you realize. Don't worry if your logic isn't operating on full power now. There's no need to force your answer since choices are being made for you by the winds of fate. Thankfully, the universe has its benevolent hand in influencing your future if you remain open to change.

You possess an uncanny ability to attract wealth, power and love now. However, you seem to have a magical, non-stick coating that shields you from the emotional dramas that can accompany intense relationships. Be sure you know what you're asking for today, since you could very well have your wish fulfilled. Nevertheless, there is no success unless you're willing to keep a smile in your heart and commit to the hard work necessary to ensure transformation.

Your recent contributions on the job might garner you some special attention now. In turn, this appreciation spurs you on to achieve even more. You feel as if your sincere efforts demonstrate your desire to be a valuable team player. However, you also might find it challenging to trust the positive feedback. But this is an opportunity to openly engage with others on an equal playing field. Living by the Golden Rule sets a fine example for everyone else to follow.

You could be trying to do one-too-many things at work today. In fact, you might be spinning in so many directions now that you don't know which way is up. Simplicity is your friend while logic reminds you to take one step at a time. Pare back the items on your itinerary as you exercise your right to say no. Imagine how happy you will be when you actually have the time to complete those tasks which must be done. Eliminating the extraneous enables you to reclaim control of your life.

You see beauty everywhere you look today and are intuitively aware of the wonderful potential in all those you meet. One might say you are a Pollyanna now, but the truth is you're a pragmatist with a visionary imagination. Possibilities abound because you perceive them as real, and you can create a path toward manifestation. Don't let anyone talk you out of your dreams; follow your creative spirit until you find yourself at the end of the rainbow.

You are much more comfortable today when you're surrounded by your family and friends. In fact, you might shy away from crowds now, favoring one-on-one encounters and unstructured time in small groups. You're particularly sensitive to criticism because negative thinking brings you down hard and fast. Managing your immediate environment is the most efficient way to ensure your peace of mind and the safety of your heart.

It might seem as if you're out of step with the rest of the world today. However, you're not really sure if you want to put in the effort required to reestablish a rhythm that is in sync with those around you. Even if you attempt to meet reality halfway, there still could be awkward moments when you feel that you just don't fit in. Thankfully, you can shift the energy by accepting the dynamics as a passing phase. Remember, your current situation is not your final destination and how you rise to the challenge is part of the course.

Expressing your opinion again and again in an attempt to get others to support you just doesn't make sense. You are aware that you're repeating yourself, and can't comprehend why your message isn't sinking in. It's quite likely that people simply need time to assimilate your words and there's no way for you to speed up the process. Being more obstinate won't help your cause but a calculated retreat gives everyone a little room to breathe.

Although you thought you knew where a conversation was going, you might find yourself in the midst of an uncomfortable debate with no clue how you got there. There's nothing wrong with holding a position different from someone else; however, it becomes problematic when you believe that your point of view is the only correct one. Instead of trying to untangle the cause of a current predicament, acknowledge the richness of diversity. There are many ways to look at the same thing and accepting multiple perspectives demonstrates your strength of character.

There's so much going on in your mind now that it's difficult to express the various streams of thought coherently. In fact, your logic could be running on multiple levels simultaneously, challenging you to put your ideas into words. You may be familiar with feeling isolated at times, but it's relatively easy to bridge the communication gap now. Instead of trying to reveal everything all at once, just pick one simple concept and say something about it. Your personal disclosure will naturally get the ball rolling, prompting the conversation that previously seemed impossible.

It's tempting to tell your friends exactly what you think today, especially if you believe they are trying to control your life. In fact, you have little patience for anyone's coercive behavior. However, you could react so quickly that you speak your mind before you even know your own thoughts. Don't be a victim of your impatience now; impulsive actions lead to big trouble. Considering the consequences of your words before they are spoken saves the day.

Although you could be unequivocal about your own feelings today, others have a much harder time reading your energy now. You appear to be sitting on the fence, holding multiple positions and unwilling to make a choice. Paradoxically, it might be their confusion that prevents them from appreciating your single-mindedness. Don't try to convince anyone of the power of your laser-like focus; let people change their minds once they see the proof in real life.

There are several different ways to reach your goal today and you hope to take the easiest route to your destination. Unfortunately, your emotional life may be more complicated than the actual logistics. Your feelings for close friends and family might not match up with your high expectations. Thankfully, responding to events as they happen prevents a messy situation from getting worse. Living in the moment can be challenging now but is well worth the effort.

You are in your element today as mystery and intrigue take center stage. However, your insatiable curiosity might require more mental bandwidth than you have available. Nevertheless, it's those things you work the hardest for that will reward you the most now. But there doesn't seem to be a lot of middle ground for you to stand on; either you don't care about a subject or you want to know everything. Both extremes are problematic. If you stop looking at life through a black and white lens, you will be able to see all the colors of the rainbow.

People in your life seem so lovely today that you're tempted to place them up on a pedestal. You might not even notice their true identity if you are working with a preconceived notion of who they are. Unfortunately, you could admire someone so much that he or she ends up disappointing you by falling short of your vision. Thankfully, the solution is as easy as changing your mind. Although high expectations feed frustration, you can hope for the best while planning for the worst.

You are quite optimistic about completing everything that's on your to-do list today. You may be so enthusiastic that you write down each task without regard for how long it will take to execute. Don't wait until you run into major snafus later in the day; instead, fill in your schedule and assign a realistic block of time for each chore. If you don't finish one item within the allotted time, move on to the next. You might be left with cleanup work to do later tonight or tomorrow, but this disciplined strategy will enable you to get more done than you ever imagined.

Your creativity sizzles today as you tackle one exciting enterprise after another. You love the variety of activity as you finish one project and then gleefully start the next. However, people may try to co-opt your efforts by requesting your assistance on something completely unrelated to your goals. Don't set aside your original plans in order to participate in someone else's pet project. You will be in a better place to help others once you see your own progress take flight.

You can't decide whether to keep your feelings to yourself or to give others a piece of your mind. Although you have a lot to say today, you're not sure that your message will be received in the spirit it is intended. The problem is your runaway optimism can overpower your critical thinking and awkwardly lead you into a labyrinth of emotional dynamics. All you need now is a hand to hold and a heart to understand your dreams.

You can visualize a straight path in front of you when it comes to reaching your goals today. However, forks in the road begin to appear as the day progresses until there are so many choices you don't know which direction to turn. Somewhere along the line you'll need to let go of your original itinerary. Thankfully, you enjoy the multitude of distractions and don't really care where you end up as long as you're not bored along the way. Happiness is a journey, not a destination.

You are a bit disoriented today as your decisiveness fades and is replaced with a question mark. It's as if every road you travel suddenly comes to an end in the middle of nowhere. Although this uncertainty stimulates the flow of adrenaline, you nostalgically long for familiar ground. Instead of trying to firm up reality, accept the fact that there are times when you simply cannot see around the bend. Rather than fixating on a particular goal now, enjoy the moment by dancing with the unknown.

Although the pace of your life has already picked up in the past couple of weeks, you better hang onto your hat since you haven't seen anything yet. Interactive Mercury's shift into your sign now creates a quickening that will last all month. It's as if you are white-water canoeing and there is no way to avoid the rapids. Clinging to the shoreline is not a viable strategy, so paddle into the middle and go with the flow. There's no substitute for the exhilaration you feel when you are in touch with the intensity of the present moment.

It appears as if the last vestiges of social stability are being peeled away today, freeing you to create new dreams that will lead you into the future. Whether or not your relationship dynamics change with the shifting tide, there is little to prevent you from pursuing fantasies that are a departure from your current reality. Although the mind can go anywhere, it remains to be seen what direction your life will take in the days ahead. Keep your options wide open until you know what your heart wants.

You may feel overly restricted by social commitments today, prompting you to hatch an escape plan. There's no time to develop a strategy; you need to act right away if you're going to reclaim your schedule. Thankfully, you're capable of thinking outside of the box, inspiring you to reinvent your day. Instead of limiting your focus to the present moment, extend your planning to include the next few weeks. Just remember your choices have wider ramifications than your current activities because you are also setting the stage for the next act in your play.

There are conflicting paths to follow now as your personal needs lead you one way and other people's expectations pull another. Normally, you would analyze the current situation until you were able to make a choice as to which direction makes the most sense. However, you're quite content to pursue a dual track today without feeling any conflict at all. Relish the luxury of operating in two realities simultaneously until you are stretched too thin. But don't rush the flow of events; trust your instincts to know when the time is right to make your move.

You are coming to the end of an emotional cycle and are eagerly anticipating moving into new territory now. However, there may be plenty of work to finish before you are freed from the past. In the meantime, savor the fleeting glimpses of your destiny as it appears in bits and pieces. There's not much time left to wrap up loose ends, so get busy while you still have the chance. The future awaits your arrival with open arms.

The gift of gab is yours today, allowing you to talk about your feelings in ways that are normally uncomfortable. Instead of being consumed by your passions now, you can stand back far enough to gain a wider perspective. Your current emotional detachment is a refreshing change of pace for you and your immediate circle of friends and family. Take a risk and share what's on your mind, even if it's not what others might expect from you. The response you receive from those who really matter touches your heart.

Although you feel particularly nurturing toward friends and relatives today, your actions might not support your desires. In fact, you could come across as cool and detached rather than warm and fuzzy. However, your affection isn't necessarily expressed by sheltering others from the world. Instead, you prefer to encourage people to engage the potential of life as an exhilarating adventure. Don't just push those you love out of the nest; explaining your intentions helps them understand how much you care.

You are the most confident about your future when you have a concrete plan in hand. You like to work with well-established priorities and an ambitious strategy to reach your goals. However, previous commitments limit your choices now and you're ready to do something about it in order to free yourself from the restraints. Nevertheless, an impulsive reaction to frustration won't further your cause. Take your time in the course of preparation so you're ready to fly once all your ducks are in order.

You are enthusiastic about your ability to alter your life's direction, even if there's not much you can do about it today. It may feel as if your mind is free but your hands are tied. Instead of fighting against the limitations imposed by your current schedule, accept whatever challenges you encounter in stride. Use this time to visualize the changes around the next corner. Employing your imagination to create an environment more aligned with your heart improves your chances for manifesting your dreams.

Relationship dynamics can be a conundrum today because you long for security while simultaneously needing your independence. Happily, it's possible to have the best of both worlds. But you might be better off following the course of least resistance until there's a solid foundation in place. Starting a conversation from an emotionally neutral position minimizes the likelihood of conflict. Talking about your desires objectively enables others to do the same. Establishing common ground is the first step toward harmony.

Romantic fantasies offer magical worlds of escape today, but it may be impossible to make these dreams come true. There's nothing wrong with letting your imagination run wild as long as it is not cause for disappointment when someone falls short of your expectations. It's tempting to assume that others are willing to play their parts in fulfilling your needs before you even ask what they want. Nevertheless, real love is possible only when you move beyond a selfish perspective to give rather than receive.

Something is amiss today as if people can't hear you when you tell them what you need. You might remain flexible to a point but someone's resistance to meeting you halfway causes you to emotionally withdraw. However, you're able to still find satisfaction if you don't over-personalize the reactions of others. Process your hurt feelings and then reengage in the relationship dance without presuming anyone else is responsible for your emotions. You can't necessarily control your thoughts but you can choose how you respond to them.

You are a regular chatterbox today, yet your words may act as a smokescreen to hide your feelings. Unfortunately, your close friend or partner might be less expressive than you prefer, provoking you to doubt their love. However, your fear of abandonment has more to do with you than anyone else now. Stop talking long enough to experience your state of mind beneath the silence. Confronting your own shortcomings is the first step to reestablishing the intimacy you are afraid of losing. Lead with an open heart and see who follows.

Your heart connection with someone else may be more spiritual than physical today. Instead of imagining what you might receive from a relationship in the future, consider how your current actions create the potential for growth. Exploring what you can learn from your partner is more important now than achieving emotional satisfaction. Although your physical needs shouldn't be ignored, it helps to put them in proper perspective. Feed your soul and everything else will fall into place.

Sometimes it's difficult to maintain personal boundaries in social relationships, yet they are the glue that keeps the community -- at home and at work -- together. Your feelings are flowing through new territory now and it's challenging to know how much to share and how much to keep to yourself. Unfortunately, you can't use logic to analyze the current dynamics when everything is in flux. The truth is you won't go wrong if you listen to your intuition.

Love is particularly confusing when you can't get a clear read on others. However, you could be projecting an aspect of yourself that you think you're seeing in a close friend, workmate or partner. Don't trust your senses now, for they will lead you down a garden path. Instead, create an emotional roadmap by sharing your feelings and listening to the feedback you receive. Even the most complicated relationship will surrender its uncertainty if you engage in sincere communication with an open mind.

You're wearing your emotions on your sleeve today but others still might not know your true feelings. Thankfully, you are able to project an accurate representation of your current internal process. However, the otherworldly nature of your desires makes it difficult for anyone else to understand what you want. Nevertheless, one thing is for sure: the real magic begins when you set aside the obvious differences and step beyond the apparent limitations between other people and yourself.

You may feel as if you're all dressed up with nowhere to go, or perhaps your emotions are extra volatile now and there is no safe place where they can be expressed. Although a trustworthy friend is willing to hear the latest version of your story, you're afraid of creating problems for someone else if you say too much. Thankfully, you're capable of monitoring your words even if it requires extra vigilance today. Silence isn't always a sign of avoidance; sometimes it's a sign of exemplary self-control.

You want to bridge the gulf between you and someone you love, but interpersonal dynamics are tangled up with the past. You often suffer the negative consequences of spilling more beans than actually fit in the can. But the opposite may be true today if you don't say enough for others to fully grasp your feelings. A solid relationship is built on good communication, but just using words to fill up the empty space won't do the trick. Your disclosure must connect with your emotions to convey what's in your heart.

You could be surprised at how much positive feedback you receive at work today. It's not that you don't deserve the accolades; it's just that they are unexpected. However, your need for recognition may be insatiable because of insecurities from the past that you carry into the present situation. Don't let your self-esteem depend on what others say. Instead, measure your worth by the quality of your work. As Eleanor Roosevelt said, "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent."

Although you are highly motivated to achieve extraordinary results at work today, your follow-through may be sorely lacking. Part of the problem is finding a healthy balance between seeking personal pleasure and pursuing success in your chosen profession. Unfortunately, you can't do it all. There aren't enough hours in the day; something has to give. Since emotional satisfaction is transitory now, it's wise to concentrate on building your career. Computer scientist Alan Kay said, "The best way to predict the future is to create it."

Sometimes you push people away when you really want to be closer to them. But you are so protective of your feelings today that you might go out of your way to talk about everything else, instead. You hope that no one will notice the boundaries placed around your heart. However, a casual question from the right person could be enough to trigger your emotions and cause your walls to tumble down. Ironically, you may be relieved once the truth is out in the open because intimacy can develop when you're no longer hiding behind a mask.

Second-guessing reality is rather pointless today; although you know that change is in the air, you have no idea what will happen in advance. A casual discussion could unexpectedly turn into an intense power struggle as someone tries to manipulate your thinking. But even the most surprising detour won't rattle your cage now. Thankfully, it isn't that hard to hold your own as long as you continue to stand on moral high ground.

Unfortunately, interpersonal relationship dynamics can destabilize your work environment now. Your objective approach enables you to see both sides of a conflict, prompting you to avoid a confrontation while someone else continues to annoy you. But sooner or later you are pushed too far, driving you to lose your temper over an issue that is trivial in the long run. It's nearly impossible to glean a clear perspective when you are in the middle of the mess.

It's easier to talk to a friend about a delicate issue today because a current disagreement won't negatively impact the loyalty you possess for one another. In fact, gaining awareness of your mutual diversity can strengthen a relationship and create the glue that holds it together. Nevertheless, you can't get your work done if you're spending too much time involved in unnecessary conflict. A strong friendship needs an argument every now and then to clear the air and test its stability.

You are at a pivotal point in your life and today's decisions set your path into the future. Cosmic forces are encouraging you to initiate significant changes so you can incorporate more free time into your daily routine. However, you're so impatient now that you can't wait for the big shift. But hiding your head in the sand isn't a viable course of action either. The good news is that once you make up your mind the universe conspires to grant your wish.

It's nearly impossible to ignore your peers while their antics entice you to temporarily skip out on your obligations in search of fun. But no decisions are made lightly today, even if you choose to run off and join the circus. Weigh all your options carefully before picking one path. Don't be afraid of making a wrong choice. Good decisions come from experience, and experience comes from bad decisions. Failure is success in progress.

Your fair-minded approach to making fiscal decisions is prudent because it prevents your emotions from muddying the waters. However, you must decide how to invest your time and money so you don't squander your resources. As Ben Franklin wrote, "A penny saved is a penny earned." Whatever you do, stay on top of your finances now. Leaving something so important up to anyone else is never a wise strategy. Common sense counts.

It's one of those days when you could live up to your zodiacal reputation; you can see different paths stretching from this moment into the future but you can't figure out which one is most advantageous. Obviously, delaying your choice can be detrimental if it leads you to miss a special opportunity. Nevertheless, this tactic allows you to continue to review all the alternatives until one of them stands out as the obvious winner. As Wayne Dyer wrote, "You are not stuck where you are unless you decide to be."

You're not afraid to bring up sensitive issues because you know that talking about them leads to more informed choices. However, your willingness to engage in a discussion may actually be a diversionary tactic that enables you to let the moment pass without doing anything at all. Remember, the decisions you make now determine your destiny. But talk is cheap; this magical moment is maximized only when you take immediate action.

It appears that your friends are not supportive of your new plan today, yet they eventually turn out to be quite encouraging of nearly any crazy idea you can conceive. Thankfully, they do not want to see you settle back into a boring routine that leads nowhere. Although the road may be rocky at first, it will smooth out once you get rolling. You must make a choice to take a chance for your life to ever change.

You're not one to switch horses midstream unless you see no other way to get across. This may be one of those rare times when radically altering your plans while you're in the middle of the river is easier than sticking to your original course. Don't worry about your slow progress; it will take a bit of time to regain your previous speed. A brave soul recognizes the error of his ways.

You're up for nearly anything today and the most unconventional ideas sound the best. You aren't interested in choosing the safest route when the sky is the limit, since you might feel as if you're protected by a benevolent universe at this time. In fact, you're eager to trade in your current stability for a healthy dose of exhilaration. Nevertheless, the adrenaline rush will not last long. Thankfully, the changes you make now will.

Emotional instability and spiritual uncertainty do not inspire you to feel safe. In fact, your anxiety could escalate today when the rug is pulled out from beneath your feet. Nevertheless, you are not in any danger of falling. Your imagination is working overtime to create colorful fantasies and you've temporarily lost your capacity to separate the truth from your illusions. This emotional rollercoaster is a wild and wonderful ride. Hop on now before it's too late.

Revealing a deep dark secret from your past to someone you love seems like a wonderful idea today until you open your mouth to speak. Your intention is to create a deeper level of trust, but your words might have the opposite effect now. Although you are not responsible for anyone else's reaction to your disclosure, some things may be better left unsaid. Consider your motives before you start to talk. If your actions are truly for the good of the relationship, then it's probably wise to proceed. If not, pick a topic that is healing rather than hurtful.

You may feel as if you're bumping up against a wall when someone opposes your plans today. What bothers you most is that the objections seem more emotional than logical, and you don't know how to respond. Stop and take a few breaths before going any further. Paradoxically, your best offense might be a temporary retreat, giving the other person time to reconsider their position. If your idea makes sense, you will be able to move ahead once the resistance begins to fade. In the final analysis, this delay is actually an opportunity in the making.

A recent setback might have slowed you down, but now you have a possible solution in mind. You're eager to change direction on your project today, only to lose steam later in the day and wonder if you're even on the right track. Don't let self-doubt prevent you from testing your strategy in the real world even if someone's lingering negativity is still problematic. Strength comes from overcoming the things you once thought to be insurmountable.

You might want to pack your bags and head home, but your persistence at work could pay off sooner than you expect. The strength of your convictions is not in question; however, you prefer to defy authority through passive aggression rather than open conflict. Thankfully, life is not an either/or proposition. You may not have to do battle at all if you firmly hold your goal in sight without faltering. The shortest path to success is not talking about your plans. As Amelia Earhart said, "The most effective way to do it, is to do it."

Although you might not know how your plans will come together today, you sense that miraculously somehow they will. Your firm belief in your own ability to save the day is your greatest strength now, yet it can be wasted unless you do something about it. Unfortunately, there may be additional people involved in your dreams, but you can't rely on them at this time. Continue striving to achieve your goals; others will join your cause once they see you mean business.

People are thrilled to work with you today because you appear to be so flexible in your approach to getting things accomplished. However, they may be in for a surprise when they realize how set in your ways you actually are now. Adapting to someone else's style makes sense sometimes, but obstinately sticking to your plan is currently essential to reach your goals. Don't compromise for the sake of political expediency. Determination trumps destiny now.

Interactions with others test your core beliefs today as you attempt to find common ground and establish mutual long-term goals. Unfortunately, you may be persuaded to give in too quickly so you can maintain peace and harmony. However, you might not be able to control your anger later if you don't speak up for your values now. Succinctly state your non-negotiable standards and go from there. Do what is right, not what is easy.

You are standing in your power today which could make others quite uncomfortable. Most people do not want to experience your emotional intensity, especially if it interferes with their progress at work. Nevertheless, it's not in your best interest to hide your feelings so someone else can avoid a sensitive issue. Naturally, it pays to be kind in your delivery, but honesty is still the best policy. Tell it like it is and let the chips fall as they may.

Your coworkers might be so sweet to you today that you don't trust anything they say. However, they may be speaking the truth, even if you are clinging to failures that belong in the past. Although a certain amount of skepticism is healthy, it doesn't have to be the main focus of your current strategy. If someone with a joyful attitude waltzes into your life, dance with him or her until the music stops. Beautiful things happen now when you distance yourself from the shadows of negativity.

It's easy to be annoyed with someone whose scattered approach at work distracts you from your regular routine. You like to jump in and help if people need it, but not when they are wasting time while expecting you to bail them out. The political dynamics on the job are quite delicate now and need to be sorted with care. Taking the time to talk with a colleague who isn't carrying their weight could be a catalyst that turns a difficult moment into a positive one. Two-way communication is the key to personal and career success.

It doesn't matter how charming you seem to everyone else today, you might be unsure of your own self-worth. You could accomplish great things yet still feel empty if you suffer from low self-esteem. Rather than expecting others to provide you with the missing ingredient in your life, search for it within your own heart. You may be quite surprised when you realize lingering emotions tied to a past failure are blocking you from experiencing satisfaction in the present. Sometimes a moment of introspection can drastically change your life.

You may be quite chatty today even if you have little of substance to say. Fortunately, you don't want to engage just anyone; you need to feel emotionally safe while interacting with another person, whether or not you're discussing something important. But filling the silence with your endless rambling is not fulfilling for anyone, including you. Don't wait until you tire of your own voice. Everything in your life is a reflection of your little decisions in each moment. Making different choices produces different results.

You're not happy if someone doubts your integrity today because you have better things to do than to defend your reputation. However, the Moon and Mars are empowering your 8th House of Deep Sharing, allowing you to strengthen a business or personal relationship if you're willing to lay all your cards on the table. You dislike feeling vulnerable, but growth does not occur if you're busy building walls. Take a risk and dismantle the barriers between you and others. Once you reestablish mutual respect, there is no limit to what teamwork can accomplish.

Relationships built on strong foundations can weather the emotional shifts that come with time. However, it may be tempting to skirt around the edges of honest communication in order to avoid conflict. Unfortunately, choosing the easy way out today is an invitation to more fundamental problems down the road. Bringing unresolved issues out into the open requires courage but it also gives you a chance to seek solutions. There's no getting around it; you must do the hard work if you want partnerships to last.

You might believe that time is running out and you will miss an awesome opportunity if you don't share your ideas with your colleagues or your boss today. In fact, this line of thinking contains a seed of truth as Venus and the Sun are both near the end of their respective journeys through your communicative sign. As awkward as it seems now, it will be even more difficult to start a conversation in a few days. Strike while the iron is hot or live with a tinge of regret.

Conflict arises when the gulf between fulfilling your current responsibilities and pursuing your fantasies about the future grows so wide that resolution seems impossible. Fortunately, you're able to live in two worlds today, with one foot on the path to success and the other one on a stairway to heaven. Luckily, the urgency to make your dreams come true today is in your head; time is on your side when your imagination aligns with reality.

Although you may still lack a concrete master plan to get ahead at work, you're growing weary of flying by the seat of your pants. Take some time today to write down your goals, and then add a few sentences about accomplishing each of your various objectives. Don't worry if all the disparate ideas are not flowing into one overarching proposal. Focusing on the minute particulars will eventually lead you to your destination. Even a journey of a thousand miles is accomplished step by step.

You can talk a good game today, but execution might be more of a challenge. Three planets in chatty Gemini are busy wheeling and dealing in your 10th House of Career, enabling you to dazzle your coworkers with lots of words that fit together into a cohesive strategy. Unfortunately, there is a great difference between theory and practice, and you may be long on theory now and short on practice. Nevertheless, you need to navigate your way through tricky terrain with the confidence of a professional. There is no instruction manual; you must learn as you go.

An unexpected bout of jealousy could hijack your day if you're not getting what you want, especially when someone around you seems to have everything. You might be more attached to the material world while the Moon and Mars in obsessive Scorpio are running the show in your 2nd House of Personal Resources. Unfortunately, the acquisition of more possessions is a dead-end path. Happiness is attainable when you realize that lasting riches are only found through spiritual pursuit.

You're not interested in talking about how you can improve your life today; you prefer taking direct action now and then evaluating the consequences in real time. Although sometimes it's tempting to be sidetracked by lighthearted interactions, you want the fastest route to the jugular vein of meaning while the evocative Moon and speedy Mars are conspiring in your passionate sign. Life is very short and there is no time for meaningless distractions.

People seem to be unrealistically demanding of your time today, prompting you to seek solace away from the public eye. You may be quite frustrated with everyone tugging at you in different directions because you know that you can't fulfill all of their expectations and still honor your own needs. Although going off to be a hermit is not your typical response, a mini-retreat will do you good now. Honestly, it's not the worst thing for others to learn that they don't always have to depend on you to raise their spirits.

Performing a solo act is not your first choice today. Although sharing the camaraderie of working toward a common goal with others is critical to your happiness now, it's not the only reason you want to be part of a successful team. You fully understand the power of collaboration and the strength that comes with numbers. Since you are so ambitious, it's smarter to bring colleagues in to support your efforts. The lifting power of many wings can achieve twice the distance of any bird flying alone.

Your creative spirit fuels your ability to express yourself authentically today. However, you're not willing to walk out on a previous commitment or leave a promise unfulfilled if others are counting on you. Accordingly, you might need to save the spontaneity for another time when there is more flexibility in your schedule. In the meantime, consciously let your inner child out to play for short bursts of time throughout the day. Ultimately, success is a triumph of imagination.

Just when you thought you knew what was going on, reality gets slippery. A relationship that was going through a stressful phase suddenly appears better. Stress on the home front dissipates; however, if everything suddenly seems perfect, rest assured it's not. Nevertheless, don't go digging for trouble because you'll surely find it. Instead, accept the improvements for what they are and save your energy for when you will need it in the future. As the Buddhist master Thich Nhat Hanh said, "The present moment is the only moment available to us, and it is the door to all moments."

You are impatiently waiting for the starting gate to open, yet continue to stand there once the race begins. You cherish the idea of rushing out ahead of the pack but, ironically, make no move to turn your dream into reality. Needless to say, you could work yourself into a state of frustration unless you snap out of your dazed-and-confused mindset. This is not the time to harbor grandiose schemes of world domination. Just take one step forward and then another; you will be crossing the finish line before you know it.

You may find out who your real friends are today as their actions allow you to see them in a new light. You might even discover that people have taken advantage of your trust. However, you have an opportunity to transform your disappointment into a realistic foundation for relationships built on truth rather than illusion. Keep in mind that you don't need allies who support your delusions. A true friendship is built on love and honesty even when it hurts.

As strange as it sounds, a crisis in self-confidence might be the best thing that could happen to you today. If you're concerned that your life path isn't taking you where you want to go, stop blindly barreling forward just because the momentum is on your side. Instead of identifying with your current job, think about what might bring additional meaning to your existence. You don't need to do anything yet that would dramatically impact your daily routine; just re-visioning your trajectory is enough for now. The road to enlightenment is always under construction.

You are confronted by a situation at work today that makes you realize your day-to-day responsibilities are preventing you from manifesting your dreams. Performing your job well brings a certain level of satisfaction, along with the stability of a regular paycheck. Unfortunately, it's not enough. Don't make the mistake of trying to finalize a course of action now; instead, seek what Zen Buddhists call "Beginner's Mind." Your path will become more obvious when you accept the fact that you don't have all the answers -- and never will.

Clouds of uncertainty appear on your horizon and you might feel as if you're lost in a fog. If an intimate relationship is adding to the confusion, you may need to step back far enough to regain a healthy perspective. It's easy to misread someone's intentions when you're overly attached to the outcome. Take your emotional cues from others now rather than pushing your own agenda. Wait and see where the energy leads before making any long-term decisions. Patience is your friend.

Family responsibilities could take all the fun out of a relationship now, but balancing your fantasies with reality is advantageous in the long run. Avoid shifting blame onto a close friend or partner just because you don't possess the freedom you want. However, burying your feelings isn't a viable option today because unexpressed concerns will likely turn into resentment. Although you're traveling through unfamiliar emotional territory, there is great potential for growth if you're willing to peel away the illusions until the truth is revealed.

You may feel as if you're floundering at work and you're not sure how to proceed today. It might even seem as if your boss doesn't understand you or that someone is actually resisting your contribution. The problem isn't in what's being said; to the contrary, it's the hidden agenda that's the sticking point now. Unfortunately, you can't take decisive action until you have all the facts. It's time to play the role of a detective and start asking questions that can lead you to the answers you need.

Disillusionment can act as an unexpected wake-up call that offers you the potential to get real. Your imagination has inspired you to paint beautiful fantasies about people and places in your life. These dreams motivated you to make changes, pursue relationships and follow your heart. Now it's time to shed the illusions and work with whatever is left. Instead of mourning the loss, celebrate living in the truth. To paraphrase Lao Tzu, "When you let go of what you were, you become what you might be."

Knowing who to trust is challenging these days because it seems as if someone very close to you is subtly working against your best interests. Ironically, their resistance may be a reflection of your uncertainty about your own inner changes. Don't fall into the trap of pushing people away just because they no longer understand you. Instead of defending your integrity, seek mutual understanding by listening with an open mind to the concerns of others. As George Bernard Shaw wrote, "The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place."

It's unsettling to discover that you made choices in your life based upon an incorrect assumption. On one hand, you may be angry if someone inadvertently misled you or purposefully deceived you. On the other hand, you have a fresh set of facts now that empower you to make new choices in the present moment. Move on with hope instead of looking back with regret. The future is yours to create.

Your relationship with the material world is undergoing transformation and holding onto your old values will slow your spiritual growth. However, a lack of attention to managing the practical side of your finances leads to complications. Don't take any unnecessary risks with money now because hidden facts that could change everything have yet to come out into the open. Stay on your current course until your new goals become clear. As the Dalai Lama has said, "No material object, however beautiful, can make us feel loved."

It's all too easy to be so compassionate these days that you let down your walls, only to be overwhelmed with someone else's pain. Obviously, helping others in need is a worthy cause and motivates you to live your life in a loving manner. However, someone may take advantage of your kindness now in a way that could harden your softheartedness if you let it. Just remember, it has been said that every charitable act moves you one step closer to heaven.

Your reactions may be so strong and swift today that your behavior is rather shocking. Of course, those who know you best realize that your bark is worse than your bite. However, most people won't know what to think if you disregard accepted social protocols and bluntly speak your truth. Thankfully, you can save yourself from having to clean up a mess later if you simply step outside of your limited point of view now. Walking a mile in someone else's shoes will change your perspective forever.

People like to rely on your consistency because they trust that you will show up day in and day out without much variance in your moods. Unfortunately, they may be in for a rude awakening today as you choose to flex your metaphysical muscles in your current quest for independence. You're not interested in altering your game plan now just to placate someone else. Nevertheless, a strategy based on shock and awe is not the smartest way to win friends and influence people. A touch of kindness works wonders.

You are like a Chatty Cathy that has no off switch today. Once you start talking, no one will be able to get you to stop. Fortunately, you are driven to communicate some very subtle laws of nature; your thinking is innovative now, but you're trying to squeeze too much information through a narrow verbal filter. Instead of hearing the sound of your own voice, practice listening to the stillness. Meaningful silence communicates more than meaningless words.

You're highly perceptive today, but you don't necessarily want to share your thoughts with anyone else. Although you have a lot to say, you're more intrigued by the potential pleasures and benefits of meditation. But there's a fine line now between walking a contemplative path and revealing your secrets. However, you are the only one who can decide how much is enough. Although you may be free to choose, you're not necessarily free from the consequences of your choices.

Your opinions may be controversial but that won't stop you from talking about them today. However, you might fervently believe your position is fixed, only to change your mind just a few minutes later. Don't be so sure that you know exactly what's going down now in the arena of interpersonal relationships. The more certain you are in your presentation, the less you likely know. Stop worrying about other people's business; channel your passion into your art.

You may strut around today as if you are in total control of your surroundings. Nevertheless, unexpected events continue to catch you off guard throughout the day. Seemingly random occurrences are like the many-headed Hydra conquered by Hercules. Every time you step up and solve a problem, two more appear in its place. Eventually, you realize that a change in strategy is required. Instead of reacting to each crisis after it manifests, consider the underlying causes and deal with them proactively. It pays to work smarter not harder if you want to maintain your sanity.

It seems as if the whole world has gone mad and you can't even depend on those people who normally come through for you with flying colors. Something is different now but you don't know what has changed. Perhaps your heightened sense of urgency is worrisome to others, prompting them to withdraw. Talking about your frustration won't help your cause today; sometimes communication is not the answer. Don't say anything unless it improves upon the existing silence. In the meantime, if you want to achieve success go out and get it on your own.

The poet Edna St. Vincent Millay wrote, "It's not true that life is one damn thing after another; it's one damn thing over and over." You believe that your current message is simple and your words are clear; however, there is still an unexpected break in the chain of communication. You might even feel like you're talking to a wall today. Unfortunately, you have been at this juncture before. But the ways of the universe are mysterious and you can't always see immediate results from your actions. Success might be just around the corner if you're willing to wait.

Everyone has a different idea about what you could accomplish today, but your notion is the one that counts in the end. However, you don't live in a vacuum and must take other people's ideas into consideration before you selfishly follow your heart. But the world does not solely consist of black and white; there are many shades of gray in between the extremes. Solicit feedback from those you trust, but remember that a decision about your future must ultimately come from within.

You might believe that your current problems would simply vanish into thin air if only you had a concrete plan for the weekend. Although you have amazing organizational skills, it's tricky to put them to use today because there are multiple paths in front of you and you can't decide which one is yours. Keeping all possibilities alive as long as possible could seem counterproductive, but it improves your chances to achieve satisfaction. Spontaneity is key to your happiness.

You're like a wide-eyed kid with a Rubik's cube today. You know there is a solution to the puzzle and you're confident in your ability to figure it out. However, you don't have a clue where to begin. Unfortunately, things will only get worse if you jump in and just randomly move pieces around. Instead, let your brain do the work. When you recognize a pattern, test it out in reality. Starting small and building from there is your best strategy for ultimately deciphering the great secrets of the universe.

You may be wrapped up in your own world today, searching for ways to break out of habitual patterns. Logic suggests that you should begin with small steps but incremental modifications don't excite you now; you long to experience everything all at once. However, you can't fix external dynamics until you start changing your mind. Einstein wrote, "No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it."

You have little patience for anyone who can't keep up with you today. It's not that you mean to be rude, but you can appear as if you don't care what others are going through. After all, your directness is legendary; you're already off to the next thing once you're done in your mind. However, your timing may be off now, along with your assessment of how much energy to apply toward reaching your goals. Sometimes, the quality of your relationships takes precedence over anything you achieve in the name of success.

People may push you too hard today as they try to convince you to join forces with them. However, like your cousin the Ox, you will not respond positively to someone's brand of persuasion. In fact, others will realize the futility of their ways once you dig your hooves into the ground. Nevertheless, demonstrating your power of persistence can be quite convincing as long as you don't let your resistance for change get the best of you.

You're not known for your desire to retreat from social interactions but there's been so much noise in your life recently that you're longing for a well-deserved break. There's nothing wrong with just saying no and staying home for a change. Expending extra energy to justify your motives won't accomplish anything at all. Simply let people know that you need some time to recharge your emotional batteries so you can take on the world again next week.

Ambition is admirable but you have so many things on your schedule today that you can't do it all. However, too many commitments on your calendar block your creativity and prevent you from making the best use of your time. Open up your schedule by canceling non-essential appointments. Remaining flexible today is your key to success. A willow tree gains strengths from being able to bend; imagine what adapting to change can do for you.

You expect to be in charge of your own space today, but your authority may be challenged on the home front. Unfortunately, you could jeopardize your chance to run the show if you let arrogance overshadow practicality. Establishing clear boundaries helps you navigate the uncertainties of interpersonal dynamics. Nevertheless, setting pride aside enables you to share power without acquiescing on those things that matter.

Minor conflicts with people who are close to you won't create lasting rifts, but they could be irritating enough to sour your day. Oddly enough, others don't seem to be as worked up about your disagreements as you are today. In fact, your aggressive stance now might be the primary factor in the arguments that appear to be started by everyone else. When you realize that competition is unnecessary, people around you suddenly become more cooperative.

You are willing to work very hard today in order to achieve your goals, but your efforts may not be very consistent. Unfortunately, running hot and cold now is not nearly as effective as maintaining a constant temperature. Nevertheless, once you make up your mind, you can move mountains, change the course of rivers or even modify your work habits. According to an old Chinese proverb, it's wise to "be not afraid of going slowly; be afraid only of standing still."

You don't like losing your temper because it requires so much energy to reclaim your center. However, you may create conflict where there is none today in order to assert your power. Unfortunately, aggressive behavior will not garner any support; in fact, people might distance themselves from you if your actions are of questionable intent. Thankfully, you can earn respect and even admiration by curbing your current urge to escalate a minor drama into a major crisis.

You may be hesitant to show all your cards today, especially if you're grappling with a sudden loss of confidence. You might even choose to work alone now to hide your current struggle from others. However, your brilliance shines for brief moments like a flash of lightning that is gone as quickly as it appears. Nevertheless, total isolation isn't the healthiest strategy for rebuilding your self-esteem. Instead, seek out a friend who will stand by you through thick and thin. Remember, self-doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

Accepting your peers as they are can be an uphill battle today, especially if they promise one thing and do something else. People might assume that you are rigid in your thinking, but you can adapt to change as well as anyone. But you don't appreciate it when someone tells you a story just because they think it's what you want to hear. You don't demand perfection from your friends, but you do require loyalty and honesty. The truth may sting for a little while, but a lie leaves a scar.

You want to be king of the hill today and will work extra hard to demonstrate your dominance. However, those who know you well might see through the bravado that you are using to cover a deeper insecurity. Thankfully, an unplanned conversation can sink beneath all the superficiality and bring a hidden truth into the light. Psychologist Dr. Brene Brown wrote, "Vulnerability is the birthplace of innovation, creativity and change."

The strength of your convictions is so compelling now that you can't separate yourself from your conclusions. You are all fired up today and ready to turn your passionate beliefs into decisive action. This lack of perspective can create sudden discord and it's nearly impossible to discern your role in encouraging a clash of ideas. Just because you're given an opportunity to get angry, doesn't mean you have to take it.

There are plenty of amazing ideas floating around in your head today, yet selecting one and sticking with it is a real challenge. The visionary Sagittarius Full Moon lights up your 9th House of Adventure, inspiring scintillating thoughts of exotic travel. Unfortunately, you can't just pick up and go wherever you please now. The reality of this situation finally sinks in, requiring you to leave your idealistic fantasies behind. Nevertheless, dreams can come true and it can happen to you when you're wild at heart.

You might hope that a casual relationship deepens today as the Sagittarius Full Moon shines in your 8th House of Intimacy. However, as much as you attempt to change the topic of discussion, it continues to cycle back around to clever banter that avoids emotional intensity. There are strong cosmic forces at play now that lift your spirits and infuse your heart with optimism, whether or not it's warranted. Nothing good will come from forcing a conversation that grows further and further out of reach. Paradoxically, you still might achieve better results at catching someone's eye once you stop trying so hard.

A recent change in relationship dynamics continues to impact your life in unexpected ways. Although you're free to explore the meaning of life with a philosophical companion, the Sagittarius Full Moon's presence in your 7th House of Others can bring another partnership into sharper focus. However, the real breakthroughs won't come from focusing on the light; hidden treasures are buried in the darkness, and it's up to you to uncover them.

You may be clinging to old patterns at work, yet the planets are calling you to break out of your shell and move boldly into your future. The creative energy of the Sagittarius Full Moon infuses your 6th House of Self-Improvement, making this an ideal time to organize the tools in your toolbox while brushing up on your technique. Instead of stressing about where your current path leads, simply do your best in every moment to improve your chances of finding satisfaction.

You are thrilled at the prospect of performing for your home team today. However, you may experience trouble as you arrange all the pieces and discover that they don't fit together so perfectly. Nevertheless, the philosophical Sagittarius Full Moon is reflecting energy in your 5th House of Self-Expression, reminding you to remain authentic in all of your words and deeds. Wisdom is knowing which road is the right one; integrity is taking it.

Your mind is soaring high into the atmosphere today, but the trick is to bring it back down with a graceful landing. You might prefer to leave some of your loftier ideas in the abstract realms of thought. Nevertheless, you can't resist the chance to manifest your dreams while the inspirational Sagittarius Full Moon stirs the energy in your 4th House of Foundations. Your branches can reach the stars only if your roots sink deeply into the earth.

You're not very happy when you're sent back to the drawing board to re-create your plan for the future. Your previous draft contained many excellent ideas, but they were not woven into a cohesive tapestry. In order to move forward you must assimilate the wisdom of the Sagittarius Full Moon as it stimulates your 3rd House of Learning. There are snippets of information that you lost along the way; don't miss this opportunity to expand your perspective by carefully thinking things through once again from the start.

You may doubt your ability to perform your job up to acceptable standards today. However, it turns out that your critical eye is sharper than anyone else's. Others think you are doing an amazing job, while all you see are your mistakes. Fortunately, you can use the uplifting Sagittarius Full Moon to boost the energy of your 2nd House of Self-Worth. Focusing on your accomplishments rather than your failures elevates your self-esteem and improves your future chances for success.

Maintaining objectivity is no small feat as you try to untangle sticky relationship dynamics. Although the reflective Sagittarius Full Moon illuminates your 1st House of Self, you still must balance your emotional needs with those of others. Unfortunately, you're not happy about the restrictions someone is placing on you. You may be tempted to rebel but that isn't the most practical course. Instead, radically changing your attitude enables you to grow within the confines of the status quo.

In theory, you know how important it is to get along with others. However, in practice, you may want to act like an ostrich and bury your head in the sand, letting the noise of the world go by. The inspirational Sagittarius Full Moon sinks into your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery, empowering you to think great thoughts within the privacy of your mind. Others might miss the significance of your current mental meanderings, and you don't have to reveal your secrets unless there's a good reason. Thankfully, your imagination is your wonderland.

You have high hopes about participating in a group effort today. You understand that the whole is greater than the sum of its parts, and you prefer to experience this dynamic directly. Although the Sagittarius Full Moon rocks your 11th House of Social Networking, you mustn't lose sight of your individual needs and your unique contribution to the cause. In a perfect world, teamwork divides the tasks while multiplying the success.

You are quite responsive to the needs of others now and want to do everything within your reach to help those you love and respect. The Sagittarius Full Moon is pulling the strings in your 10th House of Authority, leaving little room for anyone else to take control. But even your best-laid plans can fall apart if you spread yourself too thin. The real secret to success is in deciding what is most important and leaving the rest for another day.

You wish you could recapture your lost innocence, but yesterday's lofty ideas have transformed into today's heavy workload. It's not that you're overwhelmed with all the logistics; in fact, you're eager to get started. It's just that you grow increasingly pragmatic about the limitations of your time as the day wears on. Instead of adhering to your I-can-do-everything attitude, set yourself up for success by adjusting your goals to align with reality.

You're riding a wave of productive energy now, yet it's up to you to make the most of the momentum. You might be able to breeze through the day without breaking a sweat, but kicking back is not a wise use of the current cosmic conditions. Instead of waiting until a crisis motivates you to take action, set ambitious goals and make a sincere commitment to reach them. Going the extra mile today determines your future success.

You lighthearted Twins are known to be champions at avoiding discussions about difficult issues. You can make it look like you're diving into the topic, only to smoothly waltz around the edge of an emotional abyss. However, you're driven to dig deeper today in order to process intense feelings that are impeding your progress. Sometimes you need to head directly into the center of the storm in order to reach your destination.

People won't be able to push you around today just because they have good intentions. Friends might claim that they are trying to help you, even if you believe they're overstepping your boundaries. You may need to be very firm when you tell others to back off. There's no need to be afraid of an intense encounter now, especially since it's your right to make decisions for yourself. As author Anne Lamott wrote, "No. is a complete sentence."

There is little room for negotiation today when it comes to managing your schedule. You know what you need to do at work to finish your assignments and you're not in the mood to waste time with anyone who stands in your way now. Use every potential distraction as fuel to hone your concentration. Remember the words of Winston Churchill who said, "You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks."

You possess the power to create great change today, yet it's up to you to decide where to focus your energy. Your actions impact others in a profound manner, especially if you are actively involved in a social cause. You seem to be a magnet for positive transformation, even in the realm of personal relationships. However, you will be more effective now if you widen your perspective and work for the good of many rather than your own individual interests. John F. Kennedy said, "To whom much is given, much is required."

Your sense of loyalty to your parents or siblings can create stress if your social life pulls you in a different direction. The proverb, "blood is thicker than water" holds special meaning for you today. Even in the midst of disagreement, family relationships have more weight than those with friends and coworkers. Although you might be pushed to make a decision, in the final analysis there's really no conflict. When you are guided by your moral compass all the little things fall into place.

Your unwavering integrity is like a bright light that shines on those who know you well. Your closest friends appreciate how seriously you listen to their problems and the wisdom you share with them. Although you may often be a rock of stability in someone else's life, sometimes you're the one who needs a shoulder to lean on.
