Psychologist Bren Brown says, "What makes you vulnerable makes you beautiful." Don't hold back from those you love; show your strength by revealing your truth, even if you're not perfect.

You may be unusually cautious around others today, revealing your feelings only on a need-to-know basis. However, your personal values give you a stronger sense of purpose now that can be inspirational to your peers. Rather than carefully skirting around a discussion of your core beliefs, bring them out into the open for everyone to examine. Whether or not someone shares your perspective, they will respect your actions even more once they see that they are aligned with your heart.

You're not a pushover just because your actions can appear so magnanimous now. You are willing to go the extra mile to help someone in need until your motives are brought into question. But it's unlikely that anyone would pick a fight with you today because your body language is clearly saying, "Don't mess with me." Nevertheless, refrain from overreacting because your need to protect your heart could inadvertently precipitate the very same conflict you wish to avoid. There are no winners when egos engage in battle.

You're not interested in meaningless social encounters today; you would prefer to withdraw from the crowd and focus on your goals. In fact, you might see other people as potential distractions now rather than possible partners. You have plenty to accomplish and believe you're better off doing it alone, whether it's true or not. As long as you don't hurt anyone's feelings, a bit of solitude is good for your soul.

Your friends have your back today and may bail you out in ways that you don't expect. Thankfully, it's unlikely you will even need to ask for help now; it just seems to magically arrive out of the blue in the nick of time. Nevertheless, it's not a good idea to idly stand around waiting for assistance from the universe. You are much more likely to get lucky if you work hard and answer the door when opportunity knocks.

A good idea will turn into an unworkable plan unless you exercise a healthy dose of  self-restraint along the way. You might be able to justify expanding the size and scope of your vision by ignoring the feedback you receive from your colleagues. However, a rude awakening is no fun at all when you realize you overstepped the practical limitations of your time. Thankfully, you can avoid trouble later in the day by scaling down everyone's expectations before things get out of hand. Put unrealistic goals on the backburner for now. Promise less, deliver more.

You grow anxious when circumstances shift too quickly. You prefer to move through change at your own pace and only after you are ready. Unfortunately, you might find yourself in over your head when a simple thought that you share with someone in the morning evolves into a major initiative by the afternoon. Naturally, you can't take your words back, so you must figure out a way to rise to the occasion. You'll never know what is possible unless you try.

You can talk circles around everyone today without actually saying anything of substance. It's just that your mind is zipping along so fast now that you don't consider the consequences of your words before you move on to the next great idea. Fortunately, the calculating Capricorn Moon is standing in the wings to help you follow through on an innovative breakthrough if you're willing to slow down. It's easy to impress others with your erratic brilliance now, but it's essential that you consciously choose to focus on one concept long enough to make it last.

It might feel as if people are encouraging you one moment and then just a few minutes later telling you that your dreams are unrealistic. You're not sure whether to run with a current idea or shift your attention to something entirely different. Try not to lose your optimism in the face of criticism. Working methodically to cultivate a plan will bring more rewards than scattering your energy over a wide range of possibilities. When you stick to your original thoughts, they have an opportunity to take root and grow.

You possess a keen ability to connect the dots as you mix and mingle with people in your network today. Coworkers bring a variety of agendas, but you're able to synthesize them in a way that motivates everyone to work together. In a more social environment, your friends may have conflicting preferences about an upcoming activity, yet your sharp perceptions can see through the differences and bring the group back to center. In either case, there's no room for sloppy thinking on your part. It has been said that if you chase two rabbits, both will escape.

Self-discipline is your friend; without it you are likely to flounder about today. But circumstances test your resolve as rational Mercury is distracted by exorbitant Jupiter. The big question is whether or not you can maintain your focus in spite of your desire to fit as much as possible into your day. It may be helpful to rely on a system and to establish ground rules early in the game. If you set limits and work within them, there's no end to what you can accomplish.

Your plans for an upcoming vacation may not be solidified yet, but that won't stop you from sharing them with anyone who will listen. Unfortunately, your next great adventure might seem more tangible to you than it does to everyone else. There is no reason to involve others in your process yet. Not only do you avoid negative feedback by keeping your thoughts quiet, your silence enables you to develop your vision further before bringing anything out into the open. Instead of setting yourself up for disappointment today, minimize your stress by saying less.

Your penchant for delving into the mysteries of the universe can hijack your schedule today. You are intrigued by what you cannot see; you want to explore everyone's motives and may initiate discussions in order to satisfy your curiosity. However, it's crucial to be aware of the boundaries that others establish for their own emotional safety. Too many questions on your part could make someone feel insecure enough that they suddenly shut down. Employing a dash of diplomacy allows the conversation to continue in a non-threatening way.

You're cruising for an argument today, but not because you like the idea of conflict. You are attracted to the dance of dialogue as you exercise your wit and charm. But interactions with intelligent people are not meant to be limited to clever superficiality. The trick is to go deep and engage others in meaningful conversations about your favorite subjects. But choosing the right person for this metaphysical tango is essential. As Winnie the Pooh said, "As soon as I saw you, I knew an adventure was going to happen."

Although your brain is processing information as fast as everyone else, you have an uncanny ability to structure your thoughts in an orderly manner. You can walk into nearly any situation and quickly discern the facts--spoken and unspoken. Just make sure you use your intellectual skills to improve upon the current dynamics rather than being critical or dismissive. Intuitively, you know how to put the pieces together and are willing to assume a leadership position. When the going gets tough, the tough get going.

Your mind is seeking puzzles to solve today and the more complex the scenario, the more determined you are to figure it all out. Unfortunately, there may be responsibilities on your shoulders that prevent you from pursuing the satisfaction of intellectual distraction. However, you will excel at whatever you must do for work if you find a way to enjoy yourself in the process. Impossible only means that you haven't yet found the solution.

Your ambitious attitude seems to be reflected by friends today as they encourage you to take your ideas to the next level. But their positive feedback has a shadow side that could prompt you to overlook an obvious problem and plow ahead without regard for the facts. Unfortunately, making decisions based upon your fantasies alone will only lead to disillusionment. Don't fall victim to blind optimism; remember, you are seeing reality through a magnifying lens now. Too many disappointments are usually a sign of too many expectations.

Too much spontaneity might not work in your favor when explaining complex ideas today. You could trip over your own words in your eagerness to present your perspective to others. Fortunately, a small amount of preparation puts your thoughts in order, giving you the structure you need to make your point. Don't be afraid of committing to a specific plan; ironically, working within a rigid framework will free you to be more creative than you can imagine.

You may be pushed to follow through with your commitment today if you recently promised to help someone reach his or her dreams. Unfortunately, the situation at work has changed and you must be more practical now than you had hoped. Normally, you're a paragon of simplicity; you say what you're going to do and then you do it in a straightforward manner. However, progress appears to be a crooked path. Don't give up, even if everything takes much longer than you expect. In the final analysis, your unwavering determination is your greatest asset.

Your thoughts are wandering all over the place today and your coworkers might think that you've lost your bearings. However, nothing could be further from the truth. You know where you're going; you're just not sure how to get there. Fortunately, you're willing and able to navigate on the fly. There's no need to wait until you have a plan in place before you start to talk. Take anyone along who is willing to travel with you but don't try to recruit those who have a different agenda.

Your perceptions are very sharp today but you don't necessarily want to express your point of view. You may attempt to hold out by guarding your secrets with a stony silence. Meanwhile, powerful people continue to request, even demand, that you reveal what you know. Eventually, your resistance begins to fade, leaving you with a good feeling about participating in the group process. The idea of helping others outweighs your need to fly beneath the radar.

Interpersonal dynamics on the job seem to grow more convoluted day by day. Just when you think you've figured everything out, another problem pops up like a carnival game of Whack-a-Mole. Try as you might, you can't keep up with all the changes. Nevertheless, walking away is not an option. Continue to react to each crisis as calmly as possible, but take this as a gentle reminder that you are human and do not possess super-hero powers. Successful people make mistakes but they never quit.

You may be sending mixed messages at work today without being aware of it. Perhaps you are trying to keep your options open while others are looking to you for a succinct answer. But you're being pulled simultaneously in two different directions now, and it is driving you crazy. Although your powers of rational analysis often function effortlessly, logic fails you if it can't resolve your dilemma. Trust your intuition not your intellect for the best results.

You believe that adopting a philosophical approach to life will help you shake up your old routine and empower you to embark on a new course. However, people around you are less interested in your conceptual thinking now than they are in seeing solutions in real time. But it's not realistic to think you can completely avoid communication today. Instead of talking about the unrealized potential of the future, concentrate on small actions in the present moment that will positively impact the world around you.

Your thinking process is quite circuitous and could even be devious now as you strive to reach your goals. You're intrigued by people's reactions to your ideas, but they won't always share their private thoughts with you. The harder you push others to reveal what's on their minds today, the thicker they will build their walls of armor. Don't force your potential supporters further underground; take a few steps back and give everyone plenty of room to breathe.

People around you are so chatty today that it begins to grate on your nerves. Ironically, you're often the one who can be so talkative that others request your silence. Nevertheless, the tables are turned now and you might not be very diplomatic in your search for peace and quiet. It doesn't cost anything to be nice; a little kindness on your part soothes everyone's ruffled feathers. A taste of your own medicine is good for you every once in a while.

You are apt to use your persuasive communication skills at work today in order to move closer to achieving your long-term goals. Unfortunately, your interactions with others are stressful now because your current objectives could run into a conflict of interest with theirs. Cut yourself some slack and seek ways to nurture your spirit, rather than relentlessly aiming at the summit. Sometimes you need to let down your guard and let the good times roll. Adapting to change leads to success.

You express your creativity so subtly today that people in your immediate environment could easily misread your energy. Others may see you as  self-protective now and slightly withdrawn. But you are actually eager to demonstrate your emotional availability to someone you trust, even if this type of vulnerability normally makes your skin crawl. Finding safe ways to share your feelings is a win-win endeavor for everyone involved.

You might not be in the mood to be the star of the show now. Fortunately, you can use this time constructively to quietly work behind the scenes and build up the confidence of those around you. People will respect your dedication even more if you are unwavering in your drive to do your best while remaining out of the spotlight. There's no need to shout your feelings from the rooftop; you'll receive the recognition you deserve when you least expect it.

Somehow you intuitively know what your friends and associates are thinking today and you want to use your newfound awareness to nurture them. However, you could get ahead of yourself by jumping to an incorrect conclusion, only to realize that you're alienating the very same people you want to help. Fortunately, you can easily avoid complications by taking the time to check out your assumptions before acting on them. Your intentions are only as good as your actions.

People seem to have fixed opinions about what you should be doing at work today, but you are unable to please everyone at this time. The problem is exacerbated by conflicts of interest since whatever you choose to do will be at odds with someone's expectations. Instead of hiding your dilemma, share it whenever possible. Others won't judge you as harshly if they understand how your attention is being drawn in several different directions now. As is often the case, clear communication is the secret to your success.

You may be suffering from an acute case of wanderlust today, and it seems as if nothing short of an airplane ticket will soothe your soul. However, upon further analysis it becomes obvious that your real goal is not to explore someplace new; it's to find a cure for your overwhelming boredom. Instead of heading out of town, add excitement into your regular routine. Go out of your way to meet new people or do something you've never done before. Remember, your life won't improve by chance now; it gets better by change.

Concealing your feelings is a coping mechanism that often works for you in uncomfortable situations. Sometimes, you might do nearly anything to avoid the possibility of rejection or embarrassment. However, your reactions are so strong today that there is little chance of hiding them. Thankfully, your emotions exert less power over you once they are out on the table. When you open the door to your heart, you broaden your horizons and strengthen your relationships.

It's a mixed blessing when your closest relationships are infused with an extra shot of passion. It's all too easy to escalate a minor disagreement into a major battle. Unfortunately, a bitter conflict now will produce two losers. The only way to win an argument today is to avoid it. There are better tactics than fighting to resolve your differences. Demonstrate your generosity of spirit by turning the other cheek. Shift your frame of reference by transforming a confrontation into a collaboration.

Reconciling your thoughts with your feelings can be tricky today, especially if your workload is heavy. Your response to the pressures of the day is to reveal as little as possible in an attempt to prevent your unstable emotions from hijacking your plans for the day. Fortunately, holding your cards close to the chest not only prevents others from seeing your weakness; it also increases your concentration and improves the quality of your game.

You wish you could take your coworkers under your wings today, but your overprotective reflexes might hinder rather than promote progress. You may believe that it's best to keep your emotions out of the picture so they don't interfere with your objectivity when it comes to your job. However, you're less effective when you're worrying about which secrets to hide. Let your heart act as your compass, but give everyone else the room they need to grow on their own.

Although you're normally quite content to keep your own company, you may not want to be alone today. In fact, if you're not careful you could even become overly possessive when it comes to someone else's time. However, your social network grows less stable when you lean on others to define your emotional security. Your unrelenting intensity might even push those away that you wish to draw closer. You have the best chance of being supported by a friend if you're straightforward about your needs from the start.

Of course, you think you're being fair-minded in your assessment of others, but your perceptions are colored by your desires today. There's nothing wrong with knowing what you want, but it's necessary to develop enough self-awareness so you can separate your emotional needs from objective reality. Fortunately, interpersonal interactions are quite compelling now because you're not interested in keeping things shallow. Be like Gandhi who said, "I crave a love so deep the ocean would be jealous."

You want to be surrounded by your favorite things today, but creature comforts won't bring you the satisfaction you crave. There is more to life than simply fulfilling your material needs. Your true value as a human being is not measured by the amount of your possessions or the size of your bank account. In the final analysis, your relationships bring you more joy than anything else. Take a risk and open your heart. You can't reach great heights unless you're willing to experience great depths.

You are quite demanding of others today, but that's only because you hold yourself to such high standards. Your focus on the logistics makes it difficult to relax now because there's always another detail begging for your attention. Nevertheless, your productivity could surpass your expectations as long as you set clear priorities and stick to them. Leading by example carries more weight than any ultimatum ever could.

You may be on a spiritual quest now, but you have no inclination to share your metaphysical discoveries with anyone else. In fact, your inner world remains totally invisible to others today; they are not even aware of your personal search for meaning. But your current journey is not a pursuit built on intellectual curiosity. You can feel your hunger for something deeper in every cell of your body. As Sufi poet Rumi wrote, "It's your road, and yours alone. Others may walk it with you but no one can walk it for you."

You may surprise those closest to you by expressing your desire to disappear into the shadows now. You don't feel very ambitious and you prefer spending more time daydreaming than interacting with others. The lack of wind in your sails might be disconcerting at first, but you finally get the cosmic message and realize that it's okay to just drift in your imagination for a while. Thankfully, today's dreams can become tomorrow's reality.

You're highly sensitized to the needs of others today, but you still might put your agenda ahead of everyone else's. You may be clinging to an unrealistic fantasy and refuse to let it go even when you're confronted by the facts. However, playing the avoidance game in the face of the truth is not a sensible strategy. If you have chosen your friends wisely, there's no reason to deny what they say now. Your willingness to change makes you a hero in someone else's eyes.

You don't mind performing on center stage today, especially if your act reveals another side of your personality. You can often juggle words effortlessly to misdirect someone's attention while your mischievous antics distract others from the not-so-obvious truth. However, you have an opportunity to give people a rare glimpse into a part of yourself that you normally keep hidden. No one else is holding you back; the resistance you must overcome now is your own.

Your philosophical approach can be rather detached from your feelings today. It's all too easy to base your opinions on unsubstantiated beliefs rather than a solid foundation of facts. If you find yourself doggedly arguing against someone else's point of view, step back and check the validity of your information. Conversations will likely go in a positive direction if you remember to verify your assumptions. Listening as much as you talk offers you a better chance of finding common ground.

You may be misleading yourself today, without even realizing that you're the source of your own confusion. Normally, exploring the margins of reality can reveal the truth. However, moving out of the three-dimensional world is not advised since there's no straightforward way to integrate extrasensory experiences now. Although you might hit a few speedbumps, you'll be able to continue on your journey without too much delay. Instead of searching for meaning in every distraction, follow the map directly to your destination.

Trusting people can be quite a challenge, especially if a close friend is behaving in an unusual manner today. It's not that folks are unreliable now; it's just that they seem more emotionally distant because their attention is on other matters. But trying to rein others in is a mistake; they will only resist by showing you their stubborn sides, instead. A smarter strategy is to concentrate on your own path rather than anyone else's. Remember, unwavering determination is one of the essential ingredients of success.

There is plenty to do today, but you could easily blow off your regular responsibilities in order to pursue more pleasurable activities. Unfortunately, you might declare a premature ending to a friendly encounter because you know you should get back to work. Acknowledge the breath-like process of inhalation and exhalation in your daily routine. Expand and contract as the situation changes instead of making any sudden moves. Thankfully, balance is not something you find, it's something you create.

You are driven by your imagination today and see no obstacles on your path to making your dreams come true. However, the harsh reality of a lack of time or money can change your trajectory rather unexpectedly. Fortunately, even a cash shortage won't prevent you from reaching your goals if you budget your resources carefully before you start. The sooner you eliminate extraneous activities and expenses, the quicker you will be able to get your bearings and plot a new course.

You might not be able to control what's happening on the home front today. Part of the problem is you're likely to misinterpret the facts. Ironically, you can observe the exact same circumstances as someone else, yet tell an entirely different story. Rather than assuming everyone should be on the same page now, celebrate the diversity of the human spirit. Addressing family matters is easier when you approach them with an open mind and a loving heart.

People seem so nice today that you have trouble believing your own perceptions. However, you can read between the lines and hear between the words if you try. Fortunately, learning to trust your intuition helps you to navigate the murky waters of emotional dynamics. If you make sure to start off with the truth, you will arrive at your desired destination on time. Honesty is the key to integrity in relationships.

Seeing yourself clearly is nearly impossible today and your self-esteem could suffer unless you stop to acknowledge your conflicting emotions. You might feel as if you don't fit in with your social group now, whether it's family or friends. This sense of isolation may be the catalyst that sends you down a spiral of self-doubt. However, focusing on what you can do for others quickly restores your confidence. When your attention is directed outward, rather than inward, there's no limit to what you can accomplish.

Somehow you intuitively know what your friends and associates are thinking today and you want to use your newfound awareness to nurture them. However, you could get ahead of yourself by jumping to an incorrect conclusion, only to realize that you're alienating the very same people you want to help. Fortunately, you can easily avoid complications by taking the time to check out your assumptions before acting on them. Your intentions are only as good as your actions.

You know that realizing your long-term dreams is possible if you consistently work toward manifesting them. However, putting your beliefs into action isn't always a simple task. Your key planet Mars is nearing the end of its retrograde cycle, prompting you to focus on recent setbacks rather than successes. If you want to improve your life now, there is no room for self-doubt. Keep your ambitious goals in sight and relentlessly push ahead without looking back. If you don't allow for the possibility of failure, you're more likely to succeed.

It might seem as if your friends aren't interested in your pet project or favorite social cause. But don't write them off too quickly, because they could turn out to be your most ardent supporters over time. People may agree with your underlying objective, while differing with your methods. Unfortunately, you probably won't have much luck convincing anyone to join your parade. Instead, strike up the band and start marching on your own. Others will fall into step once they see you're on the move.

Containing your erratic energy requires a superhuman effort today. Fortunately, you can do nearly anything you put your mind to now as long as the end result is supported by your core beliefs. However, once you decide whether you are in or out, you still need to apply yourself diligently to your goals. A lackadaisical attitude won't work in your favor; your commitment must be one hundred percent. Success comes when you release your fears and embrace the future.

A molehill can suddenly transform into a mountain if you don't get what you want today. Although you might only experience a short delay, your growing concerns could be the source of your defeat. Thankfully, the cosmos will align on your behalf if you're willing to accept its help. However, a positive attitude alone is not a guarantee for happiness. Your goals must take the needs of others into consideration, too. You are more likely to feel like a winner now if everyone benefits from your success.

You are not afraid of turning everything upside down now in order to break out of the status quo. However, you realize that you're not in this predicament alone and your ability to improve your life is entwined with the lives of others who share your values. Nevertheless, there will still be points of contention between you and your loved ones. Don't let petty differences stand in the way of progress. The glue that holds you together is stronger than the fears that could tear you apart.

You can't deliver a new message in the same old way. In fact, you must step outside the realms of predictability in order to shock your audience awake. However, there is a fine line between being unconventional enough to grab everyone's attention and so outrageous that no one listens to your speech. Fortunately, you possess the power of persuasion now and can convince others to see the world from your unique point of view. Keep your directive short and sweet if you want others to rally to your cause.

It's scary to tell others what you want if you're not sure that they share your desires. You might be afraid of being judged or rejected for your personal preferences when you actually need the support of your friends and family now. It's never fun to worry about whether or not you will be loved unconditionally. Luckily, people will likely accept you along with your proclivities, even if they don't share similar tastes. The power of positive change is on your side; but you must take an emotional risk even if it increases your vulnerability in the process.

Intense waves of change are flowing in your direction now, empowering you to influence the future. Even the tiniest actions can generate very significant consequences, yet suspicious Pluto doesn't take kindly to the selfish use of its powerful energy. Thankfully, auspicious Jupiter is in the mix, reminding you that there will be rewards waiting for you if you include everyone in your plans. However, cooperating with others is only half the story; you must actively work for their best interests in order to make the most of this cosmic momentum.

Sometimes your magnanimous approach to life can seem too idealistic for others to support. However, your same big ideas are currently grounded in very practical ways that lead to concrete improvements at home or at work. But this level of profound change doesn't occur overnight, even as evolutionary Pluto trines your key planet Jupiter today. You can't judge the success of your efforts by the progress you make now. Set your goals and stick with them; life is a journey, not a race.

You are normally driven by your ambitions, but your desire for emotional security becomes more important than anything else today. Unfortunately, stability might be lacking in your relationship world now. Nevertheless, you have all the tools you need in order to transform your life. Establishing priorities, organizing your resources and creating specific goals will set the stage for the work ahead. Instead of focusing on a current failure, concentrate on your future success.

There's a tremendous amount of change occurring deep within your subconscious now. You might notice your dreams are more intense but probably haven't given it much thought. Nevertheless, tectonic plates are shifting within your imagination, creating metaphysical earthquakes and releasing a tremendous amount of energy. You stand to benefit from this inner turmoil, especially if you can quiet your mind enough to get in touch with your own power. Don't be greedy and save it for your personal gain. As Anne Frank wrote, "No one has ever become poor by giving."

It takes quite a bit of contemplation today to choose which of your friends and relatives are worthy of your trust. Everyone seems to have a bright idea now, but you can't say yes to every opportunity that shows up at your door. You must limit your choices or you will just scatter your energy without accomplishing anything. However, developing a working relationship with the right person can take your life in an entirely new direction. Don't rush your decision; you will live with its consequences for a long time to come.

The speed at which you react today creates a thrill a minute. Even if you already are living life at full throttle, you believe you can somehow fit more into it. Nevertheless, others might not be aware of the emotional intensity behind your eyes. Whether you're soaring on the wings of fantasy or plotting to take over the world, everyone else just thinks it's business as usual. But bringing others along on your adventure is probably a waste of your precious time now. Seize the moment or live with regret.

Turning a romantic vision into reality might seem like too much work today. Instead, you are content to experience potential love as a sweet fantasy without trying to make it real. However, the extra effort it takes to give substance to your feelings is more than worthwhile when magical Neptune trines sensual Venus. Some things are better left in metaphysical realms but, thankfully, the cosmos is conspiring to manifest your sweetest dreams now if you don't offer any resistance. All you have to do is open your heart.

Wearing rose-colored glasses today enables you to look beyond the current circumstances and see an amazing array of possibilities. Although you must be careful about confusing your professional aspirations with improbable fantasies, it is your unfettered vision that reveals the true potential of the present moment. Instead of focusing on all the sensible reasons to maintain the status quo, concentrate on seeing your future in the rainbow light of perfection. Whatever you can imagine in your mind's eye becomes the fuel to achieve your dreams.

You are standing at the confluence of two mighty rivers today. Beautiful Venus inspires the waters of your imagination to flow freely now, while the proactive Aries Moon delivers the energy you need to make your dreams come true. Although you might be hesitant to push away from the security of the shore, you can't manifest your destiny if you are afraid of a little turbulence. The currents are strong and will carry you steadily into the future if you have the courage to trust the process of change.

You are making your way through a field of illusions today as your desires prompt you to react before thinking through all of your options. Unfortunately, you are seeing the world as you would like it to be, rather than how it actually is now. Nevertheless, there may be rich treasures buried in your imagination, but be careful not to confuse them with reality. Take the necessary time to create a concrete plan that gets you from point A to point B on a map. The universe is more than ready to show you miracles if you practice patience and put your faith into action.

Regardless of recent setbacks, you believe that anything is possible now. Fortunately, this positive thinking is not just based on blind optimism. Whatever you begin today has the potential to turn out even better than your expectations. As you know, you can't just assume that your future will be rosy; you must also be willing to work hard to make it happen. Nevertheless, your unshakeable belief in your dreams is a necessary key to manifesting your success as you envision it within your imagination.

It's no fun to feel as if others are pushing you to take action when you aren't ready yet. Nevertheless, you know more than anyone that a moment of patience is a small price to pay for making the right decision. Don't be afraid to establish clear boundaries with someone whose insistence makes you uncomfortable. Your inner guidance will not steer you wrong if you create the space to contemplate the quiet wisdom behind the external noise. Silence is your friend.

Although you're willing to jump in and do your part at work, you might prefer to spend time pursuing pleasure more than anything else today. A dreamy Venus-Neptune trine lures you away from your mundane responsibilities and into the misty realms of fantasy. Thankfully, slipping off into your imagination fuels your real-world activities with a burst of creative energy. Fulfilling your earthly obligations is a piece of cake now if you balance them with your mental meanderings.

Your metaphysical interests take you on a trip down a rabbit hole, even if others are depending on you in more practical ways. Nevertheless, you are driven to explore your visions rather than crossing things off your list of unfinished chores. Luckily, your spiritual pursuits won't prevent you from delivering on your promises now. In fact, you are an inspiration to everyone when you stay in touch with your inner world. Acting with integrity and humility is a sign of a true leader.

It's wonderful if a special person in your life is extra affectionate toward you today. Even if you are facing relationship challenges, you have a rare opportunity to set a conflict aside in order to heal a rift. Although your intentions are loving, you could overreact so dramatically that your intensity is too much for others to handle. Nevertheless, the potential for emotional connection is strong if you can rein in your excitement. Enjoy the magic but just remember that making permanent decisions on temporary feelings is unwise.

Your willingness to express your desires is the secret to a memorable day. But you must remember to temper your tone to match the situation or you could inadvertently offend others. In fact, a gentle approach now can overcome the resistance you might encounter at another time. However, over-intellectualizing your feelings takes the magic out of a special moment. You don't have to share everything that's in your heart; at some point in a conversation, your silence may say more than words.

You can experience a deeper level of beauty everywhere you look today, even if there's nothing new in your world. Somehow, the same old things are infused with a special glow that inspires you to be a better person. However, it's not that anything in your environment has changed; it's you that is different now. It might come as a surprise when you realize the love that's all around you is emanating from your heart. Life is a reflection of what you allow yourself to see.

You're not afraid to let others know exactly what you think today. However, you could come on so strong that you don't even allow someone else to speak. But the energy imbalance won't last long if the other person's annoyance turns to anger. You might find yourself engaged in a battle that has less to do with what you said than how you delivered the message. Fortunately, you can sidestep conflict now by giving others the same common courtesy you would expect from them.

What begins as a casual conversation can quickly turn into a heated debate today. Although you know exactly what needs to be said to make your point, you might become so upset that nothing comes out of your mouth at all. Ironically, this argument could be won by what you don't say. The only sensible response may be to declare the conversation over and let it go. Rather than agreeing to disagree, sometimes it's better to just smile and be quiet.

A difference in fundamental values could create an awkward rift between you and others at work today. Unfortunately, it's difficult to tell in advance whether honest communication will bridge the gulf or only make matters worse. One thing is for certain: impulsive responses based upon emotions rather than facts will not lead anywhere productive. Instead of trying so hard to make your point, put your effort toward attempting to understand why someone could reach a different conclusion. In the words of Gandhi, "Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress."

Although confrontation is rarely your cup of tea, your immediate reaction is to stand up for the underdog if someone tries to railroad their opinion over everyone else's today. Throwing caution to the wind is admirable if your cause is worthwhile. Nevertheless, you will be more effective if you reflect on what you want to say before your emotions hijack your logic. A few seconds of patience during a moment of anger can save you from unnecessary regret.

You can be so confident your plan is the best one that you don't even listen to what anyone else has to offer today. Unfortunately, this level of certainty will only stir up bad feelings in your coworkers. It's not prudent to provoke dissension within the ranks of your associates now. Acknowledging the wide variety of solutions to a problem creates an environment that fosters teamwork. The synergy of many minds cooperating harmoniously is more effective than individuals working in isolation.

You may feel conflicted about working closely with someone who constantly pushes your emotional buttons today. On one hand, you recognize that you actually accomplish more when experiencing this high level of intensity. But on the other hand, you grow anxious when you're pulled outside of your normal comfort zone. Don't be complacent and settle for mediocrity when you have the opportunity to conquer your fears. The person who is a thorn in your side now can be your greatest teacher.

An interaction with a close friend or coworker might grow too emotional for your liking today. However tempting, retreating into your shell does not work to your advantage because others could take your silence as a vote of confidence. Running away from confrontation only increases the distance from the solution. If you're not happy with someone else's behavior now, do the responsible thing and let them know.

You are at the end of your rope and could feel as if you have nowhere to go. You might even consider putting a risky plan into motion if you feel there is nothing to lose. Nevertheless, exercising caution is advised because your current sense of desperation will soon fade into the past. President John Quincy Adams wrote, "Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish."

You want to express whatever is in your heart today without worrying about the reactions of anyone else. In theory, you should be able to preserve your childlike innocence and do as you please. However, in practice life just doesn't work that way. You are likely to experience remorse if your actions inadvertently hurt someone's feelings. It seems as if you are caught between the proverbial rock and a hard place. Instead of behaving like no one else matters, talk with those people who matter the most before doing something you can't undo.

You prefer to keep your emotions under wraps but circumstances continue to poke and prod your most vulnerable spots. Your nerves may be on edge today because you feel like you could lose your temper if pushed too hard. Ironically, the more you try to maintain control, the closer you get to an emotional meltdown. Thankfully, you can easily prevent an unpleasant scene by taking proactive measures early in the day. Sharing your concerns with someone you trust acts as a safety valve and reduces the pressure. Good friends make hard times easier.

You need to get something off your chest today and are ready to speak your truth even if others don't want to hear it. Although you might be itching for some verbal fireworks, it's not necessarily in your best interest to disregard everyone else's feelings just so you can express your own. Exercising discretion is part of a winning strategy if you're willing to take the high road and keep your mouth shut. Reevaluating your motives before you say a word turns out to be the smartest move now for everyone involved.

In the heat of the moment, it's impossible to remain objective when discussing your feelings. If anyone challenges your beliefs today, you're likely to take it so personally that you feel as if you're under attack. Unfortunately, your insecurities could get in the way of a constructive conversation. Your current discomfort is a chance for you to grow emotionally and recognize that intelligent people can hold different positions and remain friends. In a mature relationship, disagreement is possible without disrespect.

Lately it's been easier to dance around the idea of intensifying a relationship than to actually do anything about it. However, your key planet Mars turns direct in your 8th House of Intimacy, motivating you to deepen a partnership now. Instead of distracting yourself with someone or something new, work through this metamorphosis, even if you don't know where the transformation will lead. Impatience can be your downfall, but it's wise to exhaust all your options before admitting defeat. Your tenacity will overcome all obstacles if your connection is meant to last.

You might be quite contemplative today as you try to gain perspective on a key relationship. If retrograde Mars has stymied positive developments over the past couple of months, his direct turn in your 7th House of Companions indicates that forward movement is imminent. Unfortunately, it's challenging to keep your annoyance from growing into anger when progress doesn't occur according to your plan. Thankfully, reaching out to those you love plants seeds of hope for the future.

Sometimes you quickly lose interest and place your attention elsewhere when you don't see immediate results from your efforts. Your recent laissez-faire attitude at work might have contributed to a lack of observable progress. However, action-planet Mars turns direct in your 6th House of Daily Routine today, motivating you to overcome sluggishness on the job. You have fiddled with your plans long enough; it's time to swing into action and hope for the best.

You are intent on revitalizing an existing relationship or finding new outlets for your emotional expression now. You're looking forward to experiencing more joy in your life and want to replace delays with successes. Thankfully, you can summon your natural patience as superhero Mars turns direct in your 5th House of Love and Creativity. You have pulled the bowstring back as far as possible; steady your aim and release your arrow of pent-up intention. Choose your target wisely and never stop believing in yourself.

Your spirit of risk-taking is encouraged today as impulsive Mars turns direct in your 4th House of Roots. The gears of change begin to engage at a very fundamental level, prompting you to get new projects up and running. Although you might prefer more immediate gratification from your bold initiative, you can draw from a very deep well of determination as you strive to advance in your chosen career. Doors will open if you're bold enough to knock.

You have grown weary of paddling as hard as you can, only to find you're still drifting in the same circles. However, plans that were postponed start to take shape once superhero Mars turns direct in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Although there are powerful forces to overcome, it's time to restate your goals and put a solid plan into play. It may take a couple of weeks yet to see real progress, but it's today's actions that will determine tomorrow's success.

Adapting your vision for the future to the three-dimensional world is top priority now. You have an opportunity to connect the ideal and the real when physical Mars turns direct in your 2nd House of Resources. The action planet's forward shift in powerful Scorpio energizes you with the motivation and materials required to fuel your ambitions. Investing in your education will enhance your competence and increase your ability to make a positive difference in people's lives.

Your waiting period is finally over and perhaps you already see the signs of a cosmic green light up ahead. Recent frustrations will begin to fade in the rear-view mirror as your ruling planet Mars turns direct in your 1st House of Self, starting a work party that lasts until it leaves your sign on August 2. But there's no time to waste; the winds of change are blowing in your direction. Nevertheless, make the most of this propitious moment by pursuing your passion with all of your might.

Releasing the past automatically frees up your creative resources. Your recent progress may fall short of your expectations, but development has been occurring behind the scenes. Dynamic Mars turns direct in your 12th House of Destiny to mark the beginning of a new wave of forward momentum. Ironically, you are also at the end of a larger cycle of self-expression between now and August, when Mars enters your sign. In the meantime, continue to chase your dreams with the confidence that today's persistence will bring the results you seek.

Your hard work is likely to pay off as long as you involve others in your endeavors. Thankfully, persuasive Mars turns direct in your 11th House of Social Networking, inspiring you to deliver a convincing argument as you gather support for your cause. Although working within a group may be most effective, be prepared to push on alone if necessary. Don't judge anyone too swiftly; leave the invitation open-ended for someone to join you on your adventures later on.

It's time to channel your frustration into intention if your success at work has been thwarted recently. Energetic Mars turns direct in your 10th House of Career, making it easier to get new projects off the ground. The rising force of Mars feeds your enthusiasm; take the bull by the horns and make significant changes in order to modify the direction of your professional life.

Although you may have experienced more than your fair share of setbacks in recent months, the tide is about to turn and worldly success will be within your grasp. Fortunately, Mars turns direct in your 9th House of Big Ideas, placing unfulfilled dreams back on the front burner. Keep the faith, even if you feel a bit discouraged by the snail's pace at which things are moving. Don't let your impressive amount of hard work go to waste just because you're impatient for results now. Regardless of the temptation, shortcuts won't save you time. Slow and steady wins the race.

Returning to the basics is a significant theme today, yet the art of simplification can be quite complex. You may be motivated by dreams of success only to find yourself engaged in a very real power struggle at work. You might need to argue your case if you believe your future is worth fighting for now. But don't be scared away by the possibility of hurting someone you love. Acting with integrity and kindness allows you to be honest in a way that helps rather than harms.

Sometimes you must hold your ground, yet other times it makes more sense to yield. It's tempting to avoid conflict today by acquiescing to someone else. Unfortunately, a strategy of propitiation is like putting a bandage over a deep wound. Thankfully, calmly addressing your powerful feelings makes it possible to regain the trust and joy that you once thought were gone for good. Believe it or not, vulnerability is your friend.

Slipping into denial might sound like a viable option, but suppressing emotional tension creates ripples that eventually overwhelm you. Living in the moment is a sound strategy, unless you also insist on exerting control over others for no reason now other than ego gratification. Practicing non-attachment empowers you to smoothly glide through the day, learning and sharing as you go without causing any drama. Sometimes you just need to relax and have faith that everything will be alright.

Finding satisfaction can be an uphill battle when you're dealing with an unhappy partner or when you recognize the pain of your unfulfilled needs. Relationship issues confront you with your own drive to be in control now as nurturing Venus opposes domineering Pluto in your 7th House of Partnerships. It's all too easy to play the blame game, but there are no winners if anyone ends up feeling like a loser. Be truthful about your desires; expressing them in a loving manner turns a potential breakdown into a powerful breakthrough.

There is no time to lose now when encountering unpleasant power politics at work. You may feel discouraged once you realize how little leverage you actually have in the situation today. Nevertheless, an emotional eruption won't bring anyone closer to satisfaction. Thankfully, you can make a plan and execute it effectively if you pull back from your creative pursuits now and take on more responsibility on the job. A true professional keeps her priorities in order.

It really doesn't take much to arouse your feelings today. You may experience alternating waves of emotional highs and lows that stimulate buried feelings of resentment or regret as an intense opposition between magnetic Venus and manipulative Pluto rocks your 5th House of Romance. Nevertheless, getting to the core of your desires can revitalize your heart. Initiating profound changes in how you pursue relationships ultimately attracts the love you desire.

You prefer change when it's slow and steady now, motivating you to choose a more conservative route while exploring your feelings. Nevertheless, maintaining a casual attitude about your desires is nearly impossible while sexy Venus opposes fierce Pluto. You might even run into resistance at work where others underestimate your commitment. Nevertheless, you're determined to overcome all obstacles in your current struggle to balance your emotions with your career objectives. Love doesn't pay the bills, but it's a poor life without it.

Unresolved relationship turmoil bubbles to the surface today, stimulating questions about your future. You might think it's best to ignore your gut reaction so you can avoid upsetting yourself or someone else. However, the hidden cost of burying your feelings now will only become more apparent over time. Dealing with your emotions as they arise could reveal practical resolutions to your problems. Fortunately, you have more support than you realize, making the present moment the best time to face the music and change your tune.

Although you may be lucky enough to be secure in your job, unspoken feelings can negatively impact a professional relationship. Control issues about money might even impede your progress on a current project at work. Thankfully, the outcome will probably open the door to new opportunities if you share your concerns now. But being honest about your assessment of the current situation could go against the grain of your peers. Nevertheless, your full disclosure will clear the air and allow you to get back to work with a guilt-free conscience.

Both of your feet are firmly planted on the ground today, and a minor crisis will not likely upset your balance. However, you still might struggle to compromise in a relationship because people tend to arouse your extreme attraction or total repulsion now. Although it's tricky to find the right connection, you must rise above your emotions of the moment and think about long-term consequences. Revealing your personal likes or dislikes is healthy as long as you listen to the needs of others as well.

You might feel as if you're in the midst of a tug-of-war with your desire for security pulling one way and your obsession with personal transformation pulling the other. Pluto's power can be emotionally overwhelming while its opposition to vulnerable Venus in your 6th House of Habits motivates you to revert to familiar routines that increase your comfort. Nevertheless, change is inevitable and the sooner you relinquish your hold on the past, the smoother your transition will be into the future. Take the road less traveled and carry no regret.

Emotional satisfaction may seem out of reach as control issues with those near and dear shake your faith in relationships. Maintaining a healthy perspective is challenging while sensual Venus in your 5th House of Love and Romance opposes insatiable Pluto. Fortunately, defining your desires more clearly is a necessary step toward getting what you want, both personally and professionally. While declaring what you expect from someone doesn't guarantee that you'll receive it, it certainly improves your chances. The squeaky wheel gets the grease.

No one could blame you for focusing only on the positive when blinders are already preventing you from seeing the truth. Paradoxically, you have an innocent air of invincibility about you today that makes others trust your judgment. You can get away with pursuing your ambitious goals now because your drive is softened by gentle Venus as she assists enthusiastic Jupiter in your 6th House of Employment. Fortunately, the support of your coworkers enables you to accomplish more than you would alone, as long as you don't scatter your energy by trying to do everything at once.

Your imagination is inspired these days when your heart is stirred by optimistic daydreams of love and pleasure. Beautiful Venus supports beneficial Jupiter in your 5th House of Romance, allowing satisfaction to come easily if only you stop struggling now. The key to your happiness is to graciously receive what is offered. You don't need to keep score when you're with someone you trust. Drop your defenses and there's no limit to the joy you can experience.

Emotional satisfaction might be much closer than you realize now so don't even think about giving up. Although you are reassessing your priorities, it's more important than ever to remain singularly focused on your career objectives. Persistence is the secret to your success. Don't pretend to be shocked if you receive that long-overdue raise or promotion. Nevertheless, you still could be surprised because rewards don't necessarily arrive in the form you expect. Keeping an open mind allows you to be happy, no matter what.

Discretion is critical today as you handle the awkward cleanup from a recent disclosure. Spilling too many secrets in a giddy moment of optimism could actually cause damage to a relationship. Strong emotional bonds and a sense of compassion help you let go of conflicts and enjoy pleasurable experiences. But don't agree with others just because it's the easier thing to do; you'll earn more respect by establishing clear boundaries now than compromising to maintain the peace.

Hard work produces tangible results today, thanks to the activity of propitious Jupiter in your 2nd House of Finances. A sobering Venus-Saturn connection may cool your desires, but it also grants you the patience you need to wait for gratification. Although you might confuse your fantasies with reality, the blessings of the enriching Venus-Jupiter sextile indicate that Lady Luck is on your side. The only failure now comes from quitting too soon.

Sometimes the grass really is greener on the other side of the hill. Luckily, reaching for new experiences now actually pays off as long as you don't raise the bar too high. If you seek the impossible, your hope can dissolve into despair. Think twice before taking on another project because even a simple one can end up testing your patience. But if your goal is based on sound logic, you will be more than pleased with the results.

Your charm is your not-so-secret weapon as auspicious Jupiter flatters attractive Venus in your 10th House of Public Life today. You can be especially persuasive if you employ a gentle touch in your approach. Don't worry if you need to lower your expectations in one situation, because bigger emotional or material rewards will likely appear somewhere else. Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.

You may find resolution today to a recent struggle between you and someone who seems to oppose your every move. Although it might be difficult to get your way at first, uncovering hidden resources coaxes your adversary to step out of your way, enabling you to take definitive action. But problems happen even when everything is looking bright. Adopting a healthy sense of perspective allows you to handle nearly any situation that pops up with grace and humor.

Your dedication and sweat equity don't seem to offer the immediate return you expect for the amount of effort you invest. Fortunately, your persistence has the magical power to turn lemons into lemonade while sweet Venus cooperates with lucky Jupiter in your 10th House of Worldly Success. Happily, you could see a lovely outcome if you just slow down and focus on what needs to be done next. It helps to accept the fact that you can't control everything; nevertheless, you will be compensated one way or another as long as you demonstrate your willingness to be patient.

The lingering effects of yesterday's stress might still be stirring up anger or mistrust. However, it becomes easier to release any negativity as the love planet Venus forms a cooperative sextile with generous Jupiter in your 9th House of Future Vision today. Although you prefer to focus on the big picture now, managing the littlest details of your life is a necessary step toward reaching your goals. Sometimes the most trivial matters are actually the most important.

Declaring your needs may seem selfish but you're determined to get what you want today. However, pushing too far could put everyone on edge. Thankfully, a friendly sextile between sociable Venus and broad-minded Jupiter keeps the windows of hope and the doors of opportunity open wide. Additionally, a dash of good humor at the right moment could transform a volatile situation into one that ultimately generates satisfaction.

Staying cool under pressure today earns you positive recognition within a partnership. In fact, others offer a safe haven for joyful experiences now that delicious Venus sextiles buoyant Jupiter in your 7th House of Relationships. Fortunately, you know how to bring out the best in people. Your entire life is enhanced by your optimism, expanding your capacity to appreciate your current blessings and attract even more.

Keeping your focus can be rather tricky today as you jump from one project to the next. You might believe you're in complete control of every detail and look forward to surprising everyone with your amazing multitasking skills. However, everything you try to do is complicated if you can't find your groove. Instead of negatively judging yourself for your inconsistencies now, just vow to do your best each moment without concentrating on your shortcomings. Positive thinking leads to positive outcomes.

You might wish you could spend the entire day puttering around the house without being distracted by anyone else. Unfortunately, you can't easily escape from the well-meaning interruptions by people who want to include you in their fun. Thankfully, you don't need to make an all-or-nothing decision about your current plans. It might seem awkward at first, but you can participate in social activities and still leave enough time to pursue your personal interests.

You are exhibiting your infamous split personality today as forks in the road appear and you want to take both options. Your indecision is obvious now that the Moon is back in your changeable sign. However, people may be harsh critics if you continue to flip-flop when explaining your intentions. Nevertheless, keeping your options alive as long as possible is a useful strategy for you Gemini Twins who like to live in duality. Worry less about what others think of you than about making the most of every single choice.

Your feelings are flying through your mind at the speed of light today, making it nearly impossible to grab on to any one of them. Verbal communication is unsatisfying because your words cannot capture the subtleties of your emotions. Nevertheless, you must overcome a defeatist attitude and do your best to convey your thoughts to your audience now. Maintaining healthy relationships starts with recognizing the importance of clear communication.

Although you may need to deal with complicated logistics today, you're itching to relax in the company of your friends. The loquacious Gemini Moon is visiting your 11th House of Social Networking now, yet you're having trouble shaking your conflicting wish for peace and quiet. Unfortunately, you'll be bored before you know it if you stay home alone. It seems as if you can't win until you realize that the only real difference between a good and bad day is your attitude.

You would like to be seen as a compassionate leader, at home or in your community. However, your thoughts are jumping from one innovative idea to another today, inspiring you to talk quickly before you forget what you were going to say. Unfortunately, your need to verbalize everything now makes it difficult for others to connect with your softer side. Thankfully, you can take control of the situation by choosing to share less and care more. In the long run, nothing will be lost if love leads the way.

You might be living in the present moment, but your thoughts are carrying you off into the future. Fortunately, your fantasies are quite entertaining now and bring a smile to your face whether or not you share them with anyone else. There's no reason to waste energy trying to avoid current responsibilities, since you can fulfill them while still exploring your imagination. Dancing in two worlds enables you to cultivate your dreams no matter where you roam.

You long for that rare conversation with a special person that elevates your spirit while touching your soul. You're not interested in chatting about the news or the weather; you want to get directly to the core of the matter. You might feel as if time is running out and you're fearful of missing the opportunity to make a real connection. Your willingness to bring your heart into the equation can change the lives of those involved.

Although you're certain about your destination today, everyone else seems to be buzzing around in circles without a purpose. However, you might be more easily pulled off course now that the interactive Gemini Moon is cavorting through your 7th House of Others. There is no need to push anyone away in order to eliminate the excess noise from your life now. Instead of wasting time getting rid of the distractions, focus more intently on your goal. When you concentrate on manifesting your dreams, everything else will fall into place.

Deeply ingrained moral issues can be irritating if they create inner conflict today. You're not as forthcoming with your feelings as it seems because you don't want others to get involved in your process of contemplation. You may project your more talkative side, but it's probably just a way to cover concerns you don't care to discuss. Your smartest strategy now is to just go about your day as normal until your mental unrest settles on its own. Be patient; the calm after the storm is on the way if you don't rock the boat in the meantime.

The fireworks in your brain are putting on quite a show with ingenious thoughts lighting your inner sky. However, your attempts to record the magic are futile and could even ruin the brilliant performance. Granted, sometimes it's tough to stay present when you fear the moment will quickly pass. Instead of trying to savor your current experience, immerse yourself in it. Every breath you take is a precious gift as long as you're willing to give it back without trying to possess it.

People seem to show up at your door today simply to bring you good news or to demonstrate their appreciation for what you do. However, you can't capitalize on their support if other circumstances are blocking your progress. Don't allow frustration to hijack your positive mood, or you'll end up souring your entire day. You might not be able to directly alter your fate now, but changing your attitude changes everything.

Relying on your physical senses is not an effective way of navigating through an obstacle course today. You might do better by closing your eyes and letting the Force be with you. Nevertheless, you probably won't relinquish your old ways until you make a significant judgment error that complicates your life. The more you try to talk your way out of the mess you created, the worse it gets. Thankfully, things start looking up once you stop resisting change and commit to going with the flow.

You may hold your friends in such high regard now that they can't help but let you down. It's not that anyone does anything that's so bad; it's just that your optimism is so high today that no one could possibly fulfill your dreams. Nevertheless, your standards of excellence inspire people to strive for better results. Your job is to find the sweet spot that entices others to reach farther, but not so far that they end up discouraged. As Tony Robbins says, "Trade your expectation for appreciation and the world changes instantly."

It's one thing to imagine a future filled with abundance, but your dreams of personal wealth can seem so real now that you may make an important decision based upon sheer fantasy. However, the true purpose of your vision is not to leave you lost chasing your illusions, but to motivate you to greater heights. Entertaining possibilities is wiser than accepting limitations, but knowing the difference between fact and fancy is critical to your success.

You are more transparent today than you think. In fact, you might want to run and hide when you realize that you're wearing your dreams on your sleeve for all to see. However, there's really no sound reason to be overly protective of your plans now. Thankfully, people close to you are more likely to support your current decisions when they understand the underlying motivation behind your actions. Ultimately, the real risk is in doing nothing at all.

It's not like you to conceal so much of your fantasy world, but you're not interested in letting others see your most private thoughts now. You are certainly enjoying the fruits of your imagination and might be fearful that your vision will disappear in a puff of smoke if you talk about it. Some things are better left unspoken. Don't succumb to anyone's pressure to share those dreams that are yours alone. Thankfully, if you build it, they will come -- whether or not you tell anyone about it.

It doesn't matter much what other people say now, since you only hear what's already in your head. The line between illusion and delusion is elusive, especially if you don't go the extra mile to discern the truth. Although you can be easily misled by your own assumptions today, you can untangle your dreams from reality if you're willing to devote some energy to it. Don't be afraid to ask questions; however, taking the time to listen improves the quality of your relationships more than anything else.

You can let down your guard today and just be who you are. There's really nothing to gain by obscuring your truth, even if you don't think you can verbally communicate your deepest beliefs. Nevertheless, reconsidering your overall life trajectory is a healthy exercise now if you temporarily allow your imagination to run supreme. You don't have to pursue every goal that appears in your mind's eye, nor do you need to speak about those things which should remain private. All things are possible if you believe in yourself.

Your dreams hold the key to your future if you're willing to share them with a select few. However, it's still scary to reveal your most personal truths when you don't know how they will be received. Although opening your heart can temporarily intensify your discomfort, it's also the key to developing deeper intimacy in your relationships. Don't settle for less when you're so close to obtaining more.

You are more likely to see the bright side of life today, especially when examining family dynamics. You might easily miss the most important issues if you already assume they don't exist. But living in a bubble of dreamy perfection will only last until it's popped by the sharp edges of the truth. Rather than waiting for a rude awakening, consciously dismantle your fantasies as you explore them. You can still experience the magic of your inner world without confusing it with reality.

Although a close friend or relative might go out of the way to show how much they care for you, their good intentions could backfire today. At first, you luxuriate in the protective energy but it grows overly restrictive as the day unfolds. However, it's hard to admit that you like the fact that someone is watching out for you. You may need to establish new boundaries that give you more latitude to move now, but don't overreact or you might end up throwing the baby out with the bathwater.

You don't want to follow a schedule today because you prefer to rely on your intuition when it comes to deciding what to do. Unfortunately, there is a price to pay for this level of spontaneity and self-determination. You may end up spending more time alone than you originally imagined to counteract the structure others try to put into the day. People won't necessarily wait for you to make up your mind. Living in your dream world works amazingly well until reality interferes with it.

You are in your own element today as you happily swim through the magical waters of your vivid imagination. But be careful what you fancy because your powers of manifestation are exceptionally strong now. Anything you visualize, however extraordinary it might be, has the potential to leak through the veil that separates this world from others and become real. In the words of the late great Wayne Dyer, "Believing is seeing." Discernment is your friend.

Being in close contact with your family and friends ranks as a top priority today. Although the heat of summer lures you out into the sunshine, the Cancer New Moon draws you into your inner world as it waters your 4th House of Roots. Renew links to your past and rejuvenate relationships with your kin to reaffirm your connection with your soul. Never forget, the love of your tribe is one of life's greatest blessings.

You may feel isolated even in the midst of your loved ones if they disagree with your thinking on a sensitive subject. Your fear of being vulnerable is triggered by the timidity of the thin-skinned Cancer New Moon that accentuates your 3rd House of Communication. Meanwhile, pensive Mercury bumps into naysaying Saturn, reminding you that putting your feelings out in the open isn't always the best idea. The quieter you are, the more you can hear.

You might be so concerned about your finances that you seek ways to limit your expenditures now. You're even more eager for change in money matters when the security-conscious Cancer New Moon lands in your 2nd House of Personal Resources. Unforgiving Pluto's opposition to this lunation could mean that you're hitting a financial wall, so don't be afraid to put all your marbles on the table. You may need to reorganize debt or renegotiate a partnership before you can cash in on this potentially lucrative transit. Anything is possible when you take ownership of your life.

Complex emotions and shifting circumstances require you to take a stand as you try to restore order in your personal life. Your dreams may seem endearing to others today, prompting you to say what you want, even if it's more than you previously intended to share. Thankfully, the cautious Cancer New Moon falls in your 1st House of Personality, encouraging you to withdraw into the security of your emotional shell. Use this time for constructive self-reflection instead of worrying about what others think.

An emotional interaction grows stressful if someone criticizes your disclosure without really listening to the meaning behind the words. In your current vulnerable state, you don't necessarily want to share more details about your inner process. Fortunately, you can make excellent use of the hypersensitive Cancer New Moon in your 12th House of Endings by letting go of your past. Even if you don't feel the support from others now, stand by your decisions, knowing that transformation will soon follow.

Your friends are intrigued by the mysterious quality of your plans because they can't tell whether or not you are actually being serious. Although the Cancer New Moon harmonizes with nebulous Neptune, it's imperative to let others know where they stand by stating your intentions as clearly as possible. This lunation plants a seed of intention in your 11th House of Dreams, but it's up to you to nurture the seedling to fruition over the weeks ahead.

You can't decide whether to fully immerse yourself in the social activities of the day or to run from them. Naturally, being around friends and family can be revitalizing to your spirit, but conflict in communication makes the interpersonal dynamics tense. Fortunately, the caring Cancer New Moon falls in your 10th House of Public Life, allowing you to mend hurt feelings and set positive intentions for the future. Love conquers all.

Sometimes it's wiser to carefully step around a patch of stinging nettles instead of plowing directly through them. The needy Cancer New Moon emphasizes your 9th House of Big Ideas, but its opposition to powerful Pluto is a reminder to rein in your emotions while you still can. Applying self-discipline gets you further now than allowing irrational feelings to dictate your behavior. A moment of consciousness saves days of regret.

You are at your best when you're able to communicate exactly how you feel. However, it's more problematic when your emotions are buried so deeply that they can't make it to the surface. Fortunately, the protective Cancer New Moon directs your attention to your 8th House of Shared Experiences, which makes listening just as important as speaking today. But this is a time to heal wounds and talking about your relationship issues only takes you so far. Thankfully, you also can benefit from giving and receiving the kind of love that needs no words.

Your ambitions might conflict with the aspirations of someone close to you and the resistance you face could impede your progress today. You may choose to withhold your feelings while the cautious Cancer New Moon highlights your 7th House of Others. However, disclosing your thoughts won't complicate your road to success as much as keeping them to yourself. Ultimately, it's the things left unsaid now that create heartaches later on.

Your plans for the future may seem a bit removed from reality today, but integrating your dreams into every little action sets the stage for your success. Ultimately, you may fail unless your objectives are aligned with your highest ideals as the meticulous Cancer New Moon in your 6th House of Self-Improvement aligns with spiritual Neptune. Many trivial issues demand your attention now, but it's crucial to leave time for reassessing your long-term goals. As author Washington Irving wrote, "Great minds have purpose, others have wishes."

Your big heart and tender spirit shine brightly now, eliciting warm encouragement from everyone you meet. Activities involving children should go well since you know how to act like a kid, provided it's within safe and reasonable limits. Happily, the emotional Cancer New Moon stirs your 5th House of Love and Play, making this a great opportunity to express your creativity and get noticed without looking needy. But in your haste for personal satisfaction, don't avoid the challenges of the day; your commitment to overcoming obstacles inspires others at the same time.

Put those technical manuals and financial spreadsheets away for another day since you aren't likely to make much progress on them today. You are better suited now to write poetry, explore your fantasies or chant spiritual mantras while cerebral Mercury is harmonizing with ethereal Neptune. The more you try to fit your thoughts into rational containers, the less sense they will make. Listen to the cosmic music of the spheres and be the dreamer of dreams.

You may grow irritated at your inability to communicate your feelings today, especially if there are practical issues that need to be discussed. Nevertheless, it's prudent to postpone conversations about mundane subjects such as schedules and logistics. Don't waste energy attempting to discipline your mind when it wants to trip the light fantastic. Make the time and space to share your dreams with your friends, instead.
