You will return from your little mental excursions refreshed and ready for another round of reality.

It never hurts to reevaluate the things in your life you value the most while clever Mercury occupies your 2nd House of Core Beliefs. Although you want to express these fundamental concerns through a professional outlet, it's challenging to put your ideas into a sustainable plan today. Don't get caught up in trying to squeeze your life's purpose into a step-by-step recipe. Instead, nurture your visions by immersing yourself in them. Chase dreams, not people.

Your thoughts are colored by your emotions and you find it nearly impossible to maintain objectivity today. Your fantasies superimpose your notion of beauty on to the world around you, enabling you to imagine amazing potential ahead. Your idealism serves you well if it motivates you to make your wishes come true. However, living in a bubble of illusions can isolate you from the real world. Ultimately, success belongs to those who see their dreams as a blueprint for their future.

You can retreat into your fantasies today so gracefully that no one realizes you disappeared. However, your imagination reigns supreme as otherworldly Neptune harmonizes with mischievous Mercury in your 12th House of Spiritual Mysteries. Falling down the rabbit hole could be quite entertaining, but might create problems unless you swiftly respond to real-world communications, too. Your greatest success comes from dreaming with your head in the clouds while still walking on earth.

You want nothing more than to be in the company of your friends today because they will listen to your dreams without judgment. You prefer to bask in the light of sharing ideas in an emotionally safe environment without having to justify every word you say. Today's Mercury-Neptune trine stimulates your creativity, but doesn't guarantee practicality. Nevertheless, if you maintain a healthy perspective on the real world you can experience your fair share of magic in the realm of imagination.

You are quite tenacious when it comes to executing a plan at work today. However, you may drift aimlessly if you can't break your project down into bite-sized pieces. Paradoxically, your loss of direction might not have any negative long-term consequences now. Exploring the edges of your imagination seems unproductive, but somehow you return to the real world exactly in the place you need to be. As Martin Luther King Jr. wrote, "Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase."

It's as if a fog has settled over your world, making it difficult to discern the horizon, no matter which way you turn. It's hard to know where you are going if you can't see a landmark to set your bearings. Although today's fuzzy Mercury-Neptune connection makes navigation with a map challenging, it's still a magical time to travel as long as you don't mind being lost. What you lose in logical analysis now you regain in following your intuition. Don't worry about reaching your destination; nature is always on time.

You are at ease with your emotions today, even if you're traversing unfamiliar waters. You might even feel nurtured by the gentle waves as they wash over you. However, everything could change in an instant if you allow fear to stir up a storm. Your attempts to regain control by using logic now meet defeat, leaving you temporarily exhausted. Forget about thinking your way back to safety; instead, step beyond the limits of your rational intellect and let your instincts be your guide.

Disappointment could set in when you realize your assumptions about a friend or partner are not true. However, you have a rare opportunity to perceive things exactly as they are now, rather than as you wish them to be. Harboring fantasies empowers the mind to see possibilities that are not present in reality. Nevertheless, you can make a workable plan to manifest your dreams only after you know the truth. The philosopher George Santayana wrote, "Wisdom comes by disillusionment."

Your notions of material wealth aren't likely based on reality today. Dreaming about getting rich is no substitute for a concrete plan. Caution is advised because you can mislead yourself while trickster Mercury conspires with delusional Neptune in your 2nd House of Finances. Nevertheless, consciously establishing a new work routine can improve your relationship to money and even attract prosperity. Success is not a skill, it's a habit.

Sometimes your best thoughts appear to have very little use; they are just fun to think and even more enjoyable to cultivate. Nevertheless, it's these same ideas that contribute to your reputation as a creative visionary. There are times when others depend on you to be practical; thankfully, this is not one of them. Fortunately, your rational mind is able to successfully team up with your intuition now to make an unbeatable combination that can inspire others. As J.R.R Tolkien wrote, "A single dream is more powerful than one thousand realities."

Although you might be feeling tender today, you can work through your fear of rejection and put your heart on the line. Ironically, it's easier to express your emotions now than it is to keep them to yourself. Fortunately, an honest disclosure will be received with open arms as long as you don't pressure anyone to respond. Too many expectations lead to disappointment. Instead of focusing on a specific destination, just stay in the present moment. As Rumi wrote, "Only from the heart can you touch the sky."

You don't like it when your feelings complicate your life, but sometimes they just won't go away until you acknowledge them. You might be overly worried about people close to you, motivating you to protect them from any emotional hurt or ill will. Although your intentions may be honorable, you could inadvertently smother someone with your love and attention. Fortunately, practicing a little self-awareness now enables you to care for others without creating any additional drama.

Your message is right on target today and could elicit a much stronger response than you thought possible. Nevertheless, don't hold your tongue when expressing your point of view. Instead of strictly relying on the facts now, allow your subjectivity to shine through by sharing your personal likes and dislikes without justification. Rather than being vilified for any particular position, everyone seems to applaud your willingness to be honest, even in the face of possible rejection. Revealing your heart is an act of courage.

Welcome to the paradox of being you! On one hand, you crave support from those you admire, but on the other hand, you wish to remain invisible today. Feeling connected to your friends and family will only happen if they can see through your mask. Rather than waiting for someone to find the secret key to your inner sanctum, reach out to others and share your feelings now. There are times to stay hidden, but this is not one of them. Love is everywhere around you; all you need to do is ask.

Your game is on point today and you can't help but make one smooth move after another. Others may not notice it at first, but you're purposely keeping a piece of yourself in reserve with no desire to reveal it to anyone now. In fact, your amazing performance might turn out to be a red herring that distracts everyone from the real you. Unfortunately, you become more transparent as your voice grows louder in protest. Relax and be yourself; it takes less effort and people will end up liking you even more.

You might want to shelter everyone you know under your protective wing today. Your heart is full of love and there's no end to the ways in which it can be expressed. However, you may be extra cautious now because you don't want to cross socially defined boundaries, especially if your behavior could make someone uncomfortable. Step back and take a few breaths to let the energy settle down. Dream without fear; love without limits.

You may be scared to tell others about your ambitious agenda. You prefer to work toward your objectives alone than have your ideas shot down before they even get off the ground. Nevertheless, the potential for receiving positive feedback is greater today than you realize. In fact, the potential resistance you face now might actually be of your own making. Ultimately, there's only one way to discover what is real versus what is imagined; share your plans and see who is on your side.

Finally, the ice has broken up, the water is flowing and you're experiencing smooth sailing once again. Rather than obsessing about what might happen if everything refreezes, concentrate on making as much progress as you can while the warmer conditions last. Whether you are pursuing the adventure of love or the satisfaction of career success, there's no time for self-doubt. The object of your dreams may be within reach, but you'll never know it if you give up too soon.

You secretly want to sneak into an ancient temple, partake in a sacred ritual and steal a glimpse of the hidden mysteries. But you might feel like touching the magic isn't enough to bring you emotional satisfaction now; you must tell someone about it. Unfortunately, your language skills seem to be lagging behind your ability to be in the right place at the right time. Communication is only a struggle when you force the conversation. Revel in this spiritual experience that is meant for you alone.

Sometimes, your practicality is a real blessing; other times, your common sense just gets in the way of your happiness. Unfortunately, you could miss out on an amazing experience today if you think that all of the puzzle pieces need to be in place before you tell anyone about your secrets. Luckily, emotions flow easily between you and your friends if you simply lower your defenses and relinquish control. The beauty of heartfelt interaction is felt by all once the energy begins to flow naturally. Letting go is the best way to hold onto what matters most.

Other people are operating with fixed agendas today while you're content buzzing around like a bee from one flower to another. Although you seem much more flexible on the surface than everyone else now, you're actually quite rigid in your determination to serve the common good. Your behavior in each moment is dictated by the nature of the circumstances; however, your overreaching philosophy doesn't change. Fortunately, your work -- however trivial in appearance -- will eventually be recognized as a positive contribution to your community.

You could project a current relationship into the future with such passion today that your fantasies can spin you around the world and even transport you through time. A Muse seems to accompany you everywhere you go now, encouraging you to artistically express something, anything, as long as you convey what's in your heart. Don't worry about how your work might be received. To paraphrase poet William Blake, your job is not to reason or compare; your job is to create.

Choices to make between home and career can be quite perplexing now, but you become more decisive when push comes to shove. Nevertheless, it's all too easy to be so distracted by your immediate needs that you lose the game plan in the process. There's no reason to involve others in your melodrama; just do what you must to take care of your heart and move on. As Tori Amos said, "Some of the most wonderful people are the ones who don't fit into boxes."

You're not interested in speaking your mind now if you think it's going to stir up a hornet's nest. But you don't want to blindly follow the crowd just because it's the path of least resistance. Although you might try to keep your feelings to yourself and pursue your heart's desires anyway, postponing a confrontation will only intensify everyone's emotions in the long run. Don't put off until tomorrow what needs to be said today.

Although you prefer to dance your way around a sensitive subject, you can't sidestep a conversation that should have already occurred. It's one thing to compromise for the good of everyone involved, but sacrificing your values is never a smart move. Nevertheless, there's no reason to issue an ultimatum; find a way to create common ground where you can still adhere to your core beliefs while entertaining opposing viewpoints.

You might wish that people didn't love you so much today -- or that they would express their affection in a less passionate manner. But the tables may be turned if someone feels like your attention is excessive. No one wants to be smothered by another person's emotions, no matter how honorable the intentions. Find a happy medium where you can exert a positive influence on those closest to you without overwhelming them with your insecurities. Keep in mind that nurturing others is not an all-or-nothing proposition.

You want people to listen between your words today and connect with your soul rather than your performance. However, your bold behavior can be more intimidating than you realize. But toning down your delivery doesn't mean you need to dilute your message. In fact, the gentler your approach, the easier it is for you to stick with your position, even if it goes against someone else's grain. A little bit of sugar helps the medicine go down.

Love doesn't have to be as hard as it seems today, especially if you're locked in a power struggle that eludes resolution. The stress of an unsolvable difference of opinion can wear you down to the point of wanting to walk away from the whole thing. But disengaging doesn't fix anything; it only delays the inevitable. Forget about determining who is wrong and who is right. Instead, assume everyone has a viable perspective and seek ways to integrate the best points from each person's experience. Blessed are the peacemakers.

You may not appear to be in control today, but you're probably holding onto your position tighter than anyone realizes. Your diplomatic approach seems so natural to everyone else, but you work at it in ways that are not obvious. Sometimes you are genuinely ambivalent, but your current indecision could be part of a calculated ploy to sway people to your position. The beauty of your plan is that others will feel as if they are in charge while you gently pull the strings. Perhaps the meek really will inherit the Earth.

You're not afraid to rattle a few cages in your fight for independence today. But you don't necessarily have a specific plan; you just want the freedom to dance to your own drummer and you believe a breakdown of structure will offer you the personal space you need. Unfortunately, everything may unravel too quickly and your strategy can backfire if you make more of a mess than you intend. You don't need to create a diversion if you have the courage of your convictions. Do what you must and let others respond as they will.

You are stepping into a power zone today, but need to move cautiously so you don't waste this cosmic opportunity. Although you're tempted to react without stopping to think about your feelings, it doesn't take too much self-control now to shift the balance in your favor. A little energy applied at the right moment can change the course of the day, but you must be willing to wait. As the Persian poet Saadi wrote, "Have patience. Everything is difficult before it is easy."

It seems as if someone is trying to manipulate your feelings today, but they won't confront you directly. Unfortunately, it may fall on you to expose the unspoken tension. However, you might try to avoid the discussion because the negativity isn't even yours. Upon deeper examination, you could realize that your personal resistance to the ideas of others created the problem in the first place. Take a risk and share your concerns now, but do it in a manner that invites give and take. Keeping the communication channels wide open ultimately works in everyone's favor.

You're content to remain behind the scenes today while others are shining in the spotlight. But it's not because you want to avoid recognition; of course, you prefer to be acknowledged for your contributions. It's just that you're more interested in getting things done and you're more efficient when you're not wasting time interacting with people beyond the scope of your immediate work. Thankfully, you can win both ways now; focus on the task at hand, but be ready to step onto center stage at a moment's notice.

You're not necessarily very expressive today, but your feelings are still strong enough to shake your world. However, you might be worried that someone you're attracted to now doesn't feel the same way about you. But choosing to keep your desires quiet from the one you admire does a disservice to you both. You have the potential to break out of a rut, but you must make the first move. The answer to your question will always be no if you never ask.

People are impressed when you show up with your I-can-do-it attitude, but they're not as happy if you don't deliver the goods. You could sweep others off their feet with your positive assessment of a situation because they want to believe you have all the answers. Unfortunately, hyperbole is not your friend today. Being honest from the start keeps things on an even keel, instead of pretending you know more than everyone else. Facing the truth is messy but worth the inconvenience now, nonetheless, if you want to build solid relationships.

In your haste to keep things simple, you assume that what you see is actually what you get. But you can set yourself up for a fall by believing everyone is telling you the truth today. It's not that anyone is purposefully misleading you; in fact, they're probably just trying to help now. Nevertheless, you'll be happier in the long run if you counter everyone else's positivity with a touch of moderation. Do your research before signing on the dotted line.

You have a special knack for delivering bad news today in such a way that it seems better than worse. Although you can see a silver lining in even the darkest of storm clouds now, you are walking a fine line between hope and fantasy. There's no doubt that your power of positive thinking influences people's lives in a profound manner. But inspiring others only works if you keep it real. However, sometimes it's unclear where to draw the line. As science fiction writer Robert Heinlein wrote, "Everything is theoretically impossible until it is done."

People are encouraging you to speak up today, but you're not eager to share your thoughts until you explore all of your alternatives. Although your first reaction might be quite enthusiastic, your idealism is more of a reflection of your state of mind now than the actual circumstances. You're not interested in being a leader who rallies the troops at the expense of your own emotional security. Don't overstep your limits of comfort just to impact someone else's behavior. Listening to your intuition enables you to know when enough is enough.

You might believe you already missed the chance of a lifetime to pursue your dreams. However, you're probably misinterpreting the current conditions. The cosmic energy is not denying your success; circumstances only delay you to create additional time for you to get your act together. Rather than fretting about what's not ready for prime time now, sharpen your tools and start working. Your future is calling so don't hesitate to answer with a resounding yes.

You are doing your absolute best now to prevent your work relationships from changing dramatically, but your singular focus may not be enough to stop the dynamics from shifting. You could exhaust yourself by attempting to force your agenda on others. Nevertheless, it will take more than a minor setback to halt your progress. Don't let a bout of pessimism keep you from manifesting your dreams. Nelson Mandala said, "I am the master of my fate and the captain of my destiny."

Although your friendly nature usually puts others at ease, much to your surprise it could have the opposite effect now. Don't try to convince anyone that you're on their side, especially if people seem to bristle at your good-natured attitude today. But a personality conflict is not a good reason to raise a white flag and go home. Pay attention where you meet resistance and confront it head on. Even the smallest struggle can help clarify the route to your new destination.

Your words brighten someone's day today, but only if you're willing to talk about your feelings. Sometimes you steer clear of personal disclosure because it places you in a highly vulnerable position. However, sharing your full spectrum of emotions strengthens your position now because it demonstrates how solid your thinking has grown. Don't be afraid to reveal both sides of your current conundrum; your honesty fosters a sense of trust in others.

You're hard-pressed to keep up appearances today, even if you begin the day with a hopeful heart. But an existential encounter with self-doubt is not nearly as bad as it sounds, especially if it acts as a wake-up call. A reality check can be quite invigorating -- like a cold shower -- and motivates you to get serious enough to overcome a disappointing setback. Thankfully, your irrepressible spirit is able to rebound quickly if you draw upon your support network and get down to work. Positive results create lasting confidence.

You're no stranger to mapping out an agenda and then doing whatever it takes to achieve your goal. Unfortunately, you might feel as if you're in over your head when you realize your master plan got a little out of hand. But don't wait until there are others depending upon your success. The sooner you pare back your expectations, the happier everyone will be. Make something happen now; every accomplishment starts with a decision to try.

You're tired of somehow being at the bottom rung of the ladder and always looking up. Nevertheless, you can gain real traction now, as long as you're willing to respect the limitations imposed by your superiors. However, this does not mean you must blindly accept the rules. Question authority if you want to overcome the obstacles in your path. And remember, the key to successful leadership today is influence, not authority.

Your hope blossoms today, only to be shut down once again by someone close to you. But you don't need to internalize anyone else's negativity, unless it's already your own. If it is yours, process it the quickest way possible and then move on. There's no use crying over spilled milk; pull your overcommitted promises back within the confines of reality and don't take no for an answer. A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.

A tightly packed schedule isn't as restrictive as it appears today. Although your activities can certainly keep you busy on the outside, you're traveling far and wide within the unrestrained realms of your imagination. Others might not realize what you're up to now, allowing you to explore the edges of the cosmos in your fantasies. Thankfully, your inner journeys are spiritually rejuvenating and everyone will benefit from your mental excursions, even if they don't understand the twinkle in your eye. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.

Although you see extraordinary possibilities in ordinary experiences today, manifesting your visions isn't as simple as you might think. It's misleading when beauty seems within your grasp, yet it vanishes when you tighten your grip. Surprisingly, the solution to many a problem is contained within this paradox. Trying too hard has a reverse effect and satisfaction remains elusive as long as you struggle for it. But relaxing your need to control the outcome allows your dreams to flourish. Happiness isn't out there; it's within you.

You wish you could let the world go by without your participation today. In fact, you might cherish the idea of just putting your feet up and giving your body a chance to recuperate from the recent stress. However, your overactive mind still seeks something to do. Peace and quiet may need to wait if you get caught up in running errands or finishing projects around the house. Nevertheless, you'll feel more energized if you balance your activities with a bit of well-deserved rest. All work and no play is rarely a good idea on the weekend.

It seems as if there's never enough time to catch up on all your networking and today is no exception. But devoting your day to phone calls, texts, email and social media doesn't leave you any time to connect with your soul. Do something special for yourself now and unplug from technology. Play some music, read a book or take a hike; going offline for a while creates space for your inner wisdom to shine through. Journalist Sydney J. Harris wrote, "The best time to relax is when you don't have time for it."

It's ironic that you have a fixed idea of what you want today, yet you encounter trouble putting it into words. Of course, people can't read your mind, making it unlikely they will assist you on your quest. Nevertheless, you're ready to go off on your own in search of your dream. But try not to alienate others just because they're not joining you. Maintaining solid connections with those you love enables you to travel even further while on your spiritual pursuit. Sharing your experience with your friends after the fact is still cause for celebration.

Your powerful mood changes are both a strength and a weakness today. Your gut reaction to each situation is clear enough to reveal your inner truth, but you know your current thinking is not permanent. You also have an antenna tuned toward the distant horizon that makes you recognize the limitations of your immediate feelings. Nevertheless, you can't live in one world without also being acutely aware of the other. Sometimes it's the unsolvable dilemmas that fuel the most creative solutions.

Your dreams have broken free from the restraints of reality and it sounds like fun to follow them wherever they lead. However, those closest to you have other ideas in mind and you're unable to ignore their wishes today. Thankfully, with a little cosmic magic you can do it all with very little effort on your part. Enjoy your time with friends and family but don't give up on your dreams since they have the power to transform your world.

Your social life is suddenly taking off in unexpected ways and you don't know whether to celebrate or mourn. Although you may need to sacrifice some personal freedom to participate in group activities, it will be well worth the detour. It's healthy to open your heart to new experiences now. Don't worry about being distracted from more important tasks since they will still be there upon your return. Putting your priorities in order allows people to come first.

Unexpected opportunities offer you the chance to connect with an entirely new cast of characters now. It's quite exciting when your dreams come true and you can't tell the difference between them and your real life. But there's also danger in the air when your power of discernment is malfunctioning. Making long-term decisions is tricky because today's treasure can turn into tomorrow's prison. Accept invitations to play, but make sure you have an escape plan and a way home for when you need it.

You're not limited to your regular choices today. It's as if your blinders were removed and there's a variety of roads leading from the present moment into the rest of your life. Although this jolt of awareness is thrilling, it's also daunting. You don't necessarily enjoy being overwhelmed with so many alternatives. Nevertheless, you can still apply your methodical analysis to the situation and weed out the most unrealistic options before picking your path. Your potential is unlimited now; the only thing that restricts your future is your mind.

You're likely to encounter a few surprises today no matter how meticulous you are in your planning. But you're not willing to put up with anyone's restrictive ideas because people's plans that are built on fear seem ignorant to your progressive thinking now. It's as if a strike of lightning has lit up your entire brain and you can see everything from a more cosmic perspective. Where others want to erect walls, you see opportunities to build bridges. Living in your fantasy world is easy; the hard work begins when you commit to taking action in the real world.

It's nothing new if people accuse you of being a dreamer, but the dynamics change if you're not motivated to defend your practicality today. Instead of arguing with anyone, you probably just see their criticism as a distraction from your magical thinking. You don't want to waste time engaging doubt, no matter where it originates. Instead, you are obsessed with creating your own version of Utopia, even if it's temporarily contained within your imagination. Sowing the seeds of the future begins in your mind.

Your message is as upbeat as you are today and you feel like you're as good as gold. For once, there's no need to monitor your words before speaking them since your positive attitude won't likely offend anyone. Don't waste energy defending your behavior. There's no reason to curb your enthusiasm now; accelerate confidently in the direction of your drive while it lasts.

You're eager for a play day and, fortunately, reality seems to be conspiring with you to make it happen. However, you might be so confident that everything will fall into place today that you don't put any effort toward manifesting your vision. It doesn't matter how smoothly events unfold; you need to take the first step by voicing your intention. Circumstances will follow a different trajectory unless you share your ideal scenario. Your words are very convincing now, but only if you speak them out loud.

The sparkle in your eyes tells it all today; you're looking to create some mischief and you should be able to do so without too much delay. But flying by the seat of your pants won't work now because thoughtful Mercury trines Mars in your 6th House of Logistics, requiring you to think through your day in advance. You are better equipped to take advantage of a sudden turn of events if you have a rough schedule sketched out. Ironically, spontaneity is especially kind to you if you already have a plan in mind.

You're quite content in your own little corner of the universe today. Although your friends might encourage you to join them in a variety of activities, you're more inclined to spend some quiet time with your family or partner. You're not interesting in changing the world when you can carve out a piece of paradise to be your very own. Emotional rewards are yours now if you go deep instead of wide.

You're more flexible when it comes to making plans today than others expect. You're often the one with the inspiring agenda, but you're not usually willing to negotiate. However, the diplomatic Libra Moon is visiting your 3rd House of Communication, blessing you with an extra helping of people skills. Even if your friends have conflicting preferences, you're capable of facilitating easy conversation that leads to a common goal. But don't wait for a better time to initiate a sensitive discussion; your chance to find a resolution now is as good as it gets.

You may be reconsidering your position on a complex issue because of a recent mind-altering experience. You might have learned something important that catalyzed your thinking and is now rippling inward to impact your core beliefs. But don't let anyone push you one way or another just yet. Continue to gather information with an open mind and draw your own conclusions in a natural and organic process. It's been said that you're not using your mind if you can't change it.

Your notorious ambivalence is a bigger problem for others than it is for you. However, the ever-changing Moon's return to your sign is annoying if you thought you already made up your mind about your feelings. You might wish you took decisive action early in the day because your certainty seems to fade as the hours tick by. But things happen (or don't happen) for a reason. It's better to wait until you're sure than to regret an overly passionate but premature reaction. Silence can be a source of great strength.

Although you have a silver tongue today, you don't want to waste it on meaningless chatter. In fact, you want to investigate unspoken motives while talkative Mercury harmonizes with energetic Mars, now moving direct in your penetrating sign. It's not as much fun splashing in the shallows when you can be fully immersed in the deep end of the pool. Luckily, there seem to be others willing to join you on your mystery mission. It's unnecessary to hesitate while the cosmic waters are calling your name.

People are attracted to your big ideas today. Everything you talk about seems like a grand adventure while still sounding feasible. But you're probably not telling the whole story; if you did explain everything, others might be scared away. Some exploits are better experienced in the mind than in the real world. Don't hide any perilous details when stirring up interest for your undertaking. Arm everyone with all the facts so they are empowered to make the best decisions for themselves.

You have a rare opportunity to forge a new path in a current relationship today if you're willing to open your heart. Powerful communication is facilitated by a Mercury-Mars alignment that energizes your 7th House of Relationships. But you won't be able to hide behind safe formalities or intellectual analysis as emotional water signs are prominent. It may feel awkward, or even scary, to express what you are feeling in the moment. Allow your words to flow directly from your soul and your fears will dissipate as the conversation deepens.

You would like to follow your regular Sunday routine but it's impossible if your schedule is disrupted by events that are beyond your control. Luckily, you are blessed with the ability to adapt to the unexpected changes today, even if this is not your normal modus operandi. The most important tool in your toolbox now is your skill of putting your perceptions into words. Helping others see things in a new light initiates conversations that inspire you to greater heights.

The most complex relationship dynamics are temporarily simplified today by some unknown cosmic intervention. For some reason, you're suddenly able to talk about a subject that was previously taboo. Thankfully, an honest discussion now reduces conflict to the point of non-existence, even if it would have started a war just a few days ago. But you must take the initiative or you'll lose the chance to finally clear the air. Don't let an opportunity that could change your life pass you by.

You normally like being in the thick of it all, but today you have mixed feelings about being the center of attention. Although there's a lot going on behind your eyes, you don't necessarily want everyone involved with your inner process. However, those closest to you can tell you're on edge, even if you pretend that all is well. It makes sense to maintain boundaries and keep your private life away from the public. Nevertheless, confiding in someone you trust helps to settle your nerves while you continue to work through your current dilemma.

Thoughts are flying through your mind so fast that it's hard for you to keep up with them. You want to tell others what you're thinking, but you're afraid they won't understand you. Acknowledging your own self-doubt is an important step in overcoming your resistance to talk with your friends. Nevertheless, you could be happily surprised with your healing if you take a risk by lowering your defenses enough to let someone special in. You'll never know what might have happened unless you try.

Current circumstances at work require you to focus on practical issues today, but you may find it impossible to concentrate on mundane matters. Nevertheless, some things can't wait even if your curiosity pulls you in other directions. You can work yourself into an anxious state by trying to shut off your thoughts. Instead, choose your battles wisely. Pick a few tasks that demand your attention and get them out of the way. Allowing time for more creative pursuits will settle your mind and have you back to earth soon enough for another round.

Instead of nurturing those you care for by comforting them with tender words, you want to empower them to take control of their own lives. Your message might sound harsh at first, but it's tough love that enables a mother bird to push her fledglings out of the nest so they may learn to fly. Someone might resist your efforts today and accuse you of withholding support. Do not waver if your actions are misunderstood. You will receive kudos later on once others see the results of your radical behavior.

You are in a bit of a predicament today because you want everyone to know your plans yet you don't feel like talking. Obviously, you must give in on one side or the other. Unfortunately, if you don't say what's on your mind, you have little chance of getting along with others. Additionally, what's left unspoken can be used against you later on. Thankfully, you're the master of your own fate; all you need to do is overcome your inertia and start the conversation. Everything will fall into place once your thoughts are out in the open.

Your long-term goals don't necessarily mesh with the expectations of your friends and associates, prompting you to withdraw socially and keep your thoughts to yourself. However, you're likely to receive flak from those who think you're ignoring them. It might take a while for you to run though all your options, but sharing your thoughts is really your only viable option. Don't worry if you alienate others at first; they'll come around when they see how serious you are. Even if your peers don't agree with your choices, they will respect you for having the courage of your convictions.

You're ready to throw in the towel today because it seems as if you don't have a clear path to follow. You're faced with making a choice between logic and emotions, yet each has its pros and cons. You can't serve two masters now and must choose sooner or later. Although it may be easier to justify a rational decision, you'll be happier in the long run if you listen to your heart. You can always rely on your head to work out the details after the fact.

You're overwhelmed with all the options now and need some time to retreat into a safe space where you can figure out your next move. Establishing boundaries helps you limit your interactions to a few special people. Thankfully, meaningful conversations are possible once you filter out the extraneous noise. But don't be afraid of someone's point of view that conflicts with yours. A difference of opinions is the grist for your intellectual mill. Once you grind all the thoughts into their basic essence, you'll be ready to create a new plan.

You are wearing your detective hat today as you uncover missing bits of information needed to make an important decision at work. You might be tempted to go with whatever your gut tells you, but the wiser approach is to gather useful data before regretting an impulsive choice. Contrary to your instincts, this is not the best time to get creative. A healthy dose of common sense is worth more than a sprinkling of brilliance. There is a Filipino proverb that rightly claims, "Caution minimizes loss."

Although you might seek out lively conversations today, don't just provoke arguments to satisfy your need for mental stimulation. View each interaction as an opportunity to clarify your relationship dynamics with that person. But communication is more than expressing your point of view, so take the time to ask questions and then listen closely to what others say. Thankfully, maintaining objectivity prevents a heated debate from escalating into a major conflict.

You may believe that time is running out at work and you must finish a project so you can move on. But your heightened anxiety could cause you to make errors, which further delays your completion. Fortunately, you're experienced with working under pressure. Furthermore, you're not a stranger to job-related tension. You have the skills to skillfully dance in the territory between the electric edge of brilliance and the safety of stable ground. Don't worry so much about what others may think; trust your own inner compass for the most accurate guidance.

You can easily slip into the role of a merry prankster today. You want to have fun with your self-expression and you might not stop to consider the impact of your behavior on those around you. What's fun and games to you could be a waste of time and energy to someone else. Nevertheless, your playful activities that have no socially redeeming value today might develop into something useful in the days ahead. As William Blake wrote, "If the fool would persist in his folly he would become wise."

Your playful spirit and warmhearted generosity make you and whatever you bring to the table a joy to behold. Your love life heats up when stylish Venus sashays into charismatic Leo and your 5th House of Romance to magnify your charm and increase your popularity. Nevertheless, you can push your luck too hard if you forget to honor the needs of others. Thankfully, recognizing people's limits helps you to avoid stress today and during the weeks ahead. All the world's your stage but it's more fun when shared with someone you love.

Uncertainty about your emotions and the unreliability of other people should dissipate as you step forward to take charge of your life. Sweet Venus waltzes into showy Leo, encouraging you to be more open when sharing your feelings with those close to you. Fortunately, you may feel more secure as Venus drifts through your 4th House of Home and Family for the next three weeks. But remember the words of John Lennon: "And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make."

Romantic urges may overrule your logic today and you won't be able to think your way out of trouble. Venus marches into dramatic Leo and your 3rd House of Communication, bringing your desires into the open now. Don't bother trying to rationalize your needs; just express what you want without any crazy expectations. Those who care about you will not only listen to what you say but could also surprise you with their support.

Buying things that pump up your prestige may be worth the money now if gaining a higher status stimulates your creativity. You grow increasingly extravagant as vivacious Venus moves through luxury-loving Leo and your 2nd House of Resources. But be careful not to go too far on your quest for pleasure. Stretching yourself to reach the stars is admirable as long as you are realistic when you calculate the cost of fulfilling your dreams.

The revival of your creativity makes you feel especially attractive these days. Luckily, your admirers can't help but notice and are more than ready to reward you with the attention and affection you crave now. Effervescent Venus enters bighearted Leo and your 1st House of Personality to enhance your self-image and increase your charisma, enchanting others with your every move. It's exhilarating to go with the flow when the pendulum finally swings in a more positive direction.

You might be tapped on the shoulder now and asked to perform selfless acts of love and compassion. But there's no need to play the role of a martyr if you must set your personal needs aside for a while. Although you may not experience the pleasure that affectionate Venus in Leo often brings, her visit to your 12th House of Spirituality all but assures a deeper level of emotional satisfaction later on. To have an open heart is to be truly alive.

You're in the mood to party but you might be tempted to overindulge tonight. Nevertheless, you want to spend more time with your friends when your key planet, Venus, prances into playful Leo and your 11th House of Dreams. But don't pretend that everything is okay when it's not. If you have deadlines you can't meet or commitments you can't keep, just admit it; accept the consequences and move on. Being honest can make life difficult for a while, but hiding the truth creates a deeper layer of problems.

If you have your sights set on getting ahead in your career, encountering supportive people and favorable circumstances make your progress easier than ever. As friendly Venus in lovable Leo wends her way through your 10th House of Status, people in authority will come to your aid because they are attracted to your magnetic energy. Remember, there is no better way to thank the universe for your good fortune now than by offering a helping hand to someone down on their luck.

You are dreaming of faraway places and distant romances now that vivacious Venus is traveling through dramatic Leo and your 9th House of Adventure. But paying attention to more immediate obligations obviously takes priority today whether you like it or not. You may be held accountable for unfinished tasks or shoddy work. Don't let resentment waste your precious time. Buckle down and meet your responsibilities while you still can turn things around.

Gifts of love or money may start to flow when affluent Venus enters generous Leo and your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You could hear news about someone's ambitious plans that stretch your credibility. You don't want to rain on their parade today since you have more to gain by engaging your heart and raising your hopes than by stewing in skepticism or hanging back in fear. There's no question about it; prosperity begins with your state of mind.

An abundance of pleasure is undeniably sweeter than a handful of empty promises. But watch out for a tendency to overspend and overindulge, for you might expect too much from others when Venus shifts into extravagant Leo and your 7th House of Companions. It's all too easy to allow your fantasies to overpower reason but this strategy only works for short bursts of time. If you must set reality aside in the pursuit of romance, remember not to lose touch with your common sense.

Overblown pride and outrageous revelations could set you up for disappointment at work when Venus struts into theatrical Leo and your 6th House of Employment. Grand gestures may attract the spotlight now, but demanding too much or offering more than you can deliver is a risky strategy. Pushing the intellectual envelope eventually assists your career if you do the research before filling in the details of your agenda. As Ben Franklin wrote, "If you fail to plan, you are planning to fail!"

You might believe that revealing your emotional secrets today will put everything on the right track for your relationship goals. However, your desires may not hold much interest for others as they wrestle with their own set of issues. Instead of just putting on a show to express your feelings, step back and reassess the big picture first. Everyone has a story to tell and yours is just one of them. Although it seems as if you know the truth; you actually only know one version.

You spend much of the day in a dreamy reverie until someone or something shocks you back into reality. But you might not be ready to return to your mundane chores; after all, your fantasies contain much more intrigue and fascination. The enchantment with inner realms is very compelling now but your work continues to pile up. There's no easy resolution to your two voices. Continue to hold space for both worlds without choosing sides. As John Lennon wrote, "Reality leaves a lot to the imagination."

Your workmates may opt to keep a safe distance from you today because of your uncharacteristic single-mindedness. Your current obsession is both a blessing and a curse now. Once you find your groove, you will be able to stay in it for a while, adding to your overall efficiency. But don't get lost in the details since they can distract you from the main event. Relaxing your rigidity empowers you to take advantage of the changing dynamics. Flexibility is your friend.

You're not a fan of instability, especially when it impacts your career path. You are traveling on one trajectory at work, only to discover it isn't as smooth as you anticipated. Unfortunately, you might be uncertain as to where your life is heading now. You can wait until something happens and then try to make the best of it. Or, you can instigate change today by sharing your frustrations with your boss or colleagues. Be patient; something has to give -- and it will.

You are trying to fly beneath the radar today, but grow increasingly motivated to come out of hiding. Ironically, as challenging as it is to dream out loud, you might not be able to stop once your imagination starts rolling. Thankfully, your closest allies rally around your cause, encouraging you to develop your best ideas even further. However, you'll lose precious ground if you reveal too much too fast. Your process of gaining visibility will be successful now as long as you take it at a steady pace.

Your fixed position on a controversial subject can land you in hot water with your friends today. Nevertheless, you're so emotionally charged now that you're not likely to revise your thinking, even if the facts support a different conclusion. However, you can start to overcome your fear of change by becoming more aware of it. Ultimately, it's more painful to stay stuck with no way to escape the status quo. Admitting when you are wrong is a a sign of humility and strength.

You like the idea of hanging out with people who are free spirits. But the uninhibited actions of a friend could frustrate you to no end today. You are not comfortable when others won't play by the rules because you can't trust them to stay on script. There's a time and place for personal expression, but it only adds to your anxiety now. Sometimes, even the simplest problems evade resolution until you are focusing on something else.

You could find yourself in the middle of an intense but illuminating debate about your future and what's ahead for humanity in general. But perhaps your discussion is taking place entirely within your own head today. Unfortunately, you won't get a fresh perspective until you engage with others in an open-ended debate. Obviously, there's a gamble involved because you can't predict how someone else will react. Nevertheless, if you don't risk anything, you will end up risking everything.

Too many job-related constraints prevent you from exploring more radical expressions of your wanderlust. Unfortunately, you've been withholding your feelings long enough to fuel an impulsive emotional outburst. Although clearing the air can help to move the energy along, it's wiser to bring your ideas out into the open in a less abrasive manner. Moderation will help you accomplish what extremism cannot.

You prefer to sidestep passionate discussions, but people still seem driven to take conversations into sensitive territories today. You're not eager to discover and disarm emotional landmines because this process distracts you from more mundane priorities. But don't be so resistant to explore your feelings now. Sigmund Freud, the father of depth psychology taught, "Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways." Heartfelt expression fuels healthy relationships.

Complex political maneuverings at work add stress to your life now. You're unsure how to position yourself in the fluctuating dynamics because there are pieces of the current situation you simply don't understand. Unfortunately, as long as you focus on untangling the external circumstances today, you won't find a solution. Radically change your frame of reference by concentrating on doing the right thing, no matter the consequences. Integrity is timeless.

People don't necessarily see your compassionate side today because they are distracted by your exemplary performance at work. You possess all the right moves now and can dazzle others with your fancy footwork. But you know better than anyone that there are more important things than putting on a good show. You want to make a positive impact that has an enduring effect after your song and dance routine is over. As Pisces Albert Einstein wrote, "Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value."

You appear emotionally tougher than you actually are today, even if you're scared by your own shadow. But it's more likely that you're frightened by unexpressed feelings. Nevertheless, you always retain the option of confronting your suppressed fears instead of running from them. Although this courageous strategy requires a healthy amount of self-esteem, you can draw upon the memory of previous successes to bolster your confidence. The way out is the way through.

You don't like wasting time with anyone's emotional drama, but you might not be able to avoid it now. Unfortunately, logically talking your way around the intensity only makes the situation worse today. It is said that you must fight fire with fire; accordingly, you need to drop all the rational strategies and come from a subjective heart-centered place when fighting water with water. Surrendering to your feelings is the only way to swim.

You're ready to engage in a battle to defend your way of doing things today. However, your new approach may not be any more efficient than the old method. Nevertheless, sticking to one over-arching philosophy enables you to judge your progress with an objective eye. Don't worry if you're not moving along as quickly as you prefer. Give yourself plenty of time to establish a sustainable rhythm. As Ralph Waldo Emerson wrote, "Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience."

You are struck by the lightning of inspiration today, but could have a tough time integrating your cosmic creations with your job duties. In fact, the more outrageous your behavior, the less expressive you are. Don't withdraw emotionally and alienate yourself from everyone else when you really need the human connection now. Before you initiate your great escape, remember the Beatles who sang, "I get by with a little help from my friends."

Your opinions are so strong today that you can't keep quiet. However, you're concerned about coming on too strong because your current intensity has the potential to spiral out of control. But rather than worrying about how others might react, just let the loving energy of Mercury and Venus shine through your affectionate sign. Sometimes, heartfelt words need to carry extra weight. Fortunately, people expect you proud Lions to roar when you express your truth.

You're a champ at setting your needs off to the side in order to maintain intellectual clarity. However, it's not so easy to deny your emotions today, especially if anger bubbles into awareness. It's unhealthy to ignore your feelings or try to bury them because they'll only grow in strength and resurface at a less convenient time. You can't delete a thought in the same way you delete a message. Acknowledging your passions is the first step to transforming them into something positive.

You can't separate your feelings from your material possessions today. Everything you own has a story attached to it that adds to its unique value. But some things are associated with difficult experiences and bring up fear or regret. Obviously, you can get rid of these offending items by giving them away or selling them. However, it takes extra work to fully process your emotions instead of just eliminating the objects. Embracing the associated memories starts the healing process of letting go.

You are recycling an old feeling one more time, even if you thought you were already done with it. You have experienced some change in the past few weeks, but not enough; your frustration could reach a critical level today when you recognize your limited progress. But don't let your concerns run away with your entire day. Step back from anything that feels overwhelming now. It's as if you are putting a wide-angle lens on your camera. Once you see things from a larger perspective, it's easier to release the past and proceed into the future.

Although you might create a little ruckus to let everyone know you're serious, you don't want to be in the spotlight today. Ironically, taking a stand could end up attracting the same attention you were trying to avoid. In the final analysis, your need for privacy will likely outweigh your desire to be understood. It really doesn't matter if people see the real you or not. Concentrate on finishing your tasks on time, rather than worrying about what others think. Quietly working behind the scenes may ultimately bring the deeper satisfaction you seek.

Engaging with others feeds your ambitions and brings your passions to the surface today. Competing on a team or participating in a group effort is a perfect way to express your commitment to your extended family or community. But watch out for extreme feelings upsetting the delicate balance of interpersonal dynamics. Obviously, pulling someone down won't ever help you reach the top. Honor your feelings as you honor your friends, but don't fuel either with irrational expectations.

Your career objectives are quite fixed now and you have very little desire to negotiate those things that are important to you. Although there's no doubt about your goals, you're still working on your plans to reach them. Trying to get anyone to join you on your next venture is not a wise strategy because it will only distract you from your quest. You don't need to be carrying others who will only slow you down. If people aren't actively supporting you, politely ask them to have the courtesy to get out of your way. Fortune smiles on those who create their own opportunities.

You are excited about expanding your world view by taking up a new course of study or embarking on your own exploratory travels. However, you must be willing to open your mind to unknown experiences. If you try to cling to your current perspective, the opportunity for spiritual and emotional growth could be lost. Don't sit around for days fine-tuning your plans; get rolling as quickly as possible. The cosmic energy is conducive for creating positive change.

It's as if you lost the ability to tell the difference between enough and too much. You may be reflecting on your own personal version of the global meltdown where all signs are blindly pointing down the Road of Excess. Nevertheless, you might want to limit your indulgent proclivities before finding yourself in an awkward predicament. But don't worry about losing face; as a human, you are full of shortcomings and inconsistencies like everyone else. Before you judge anyone else, just remember compassion works both ways.

It makes you nervous when your adrenaline heats up your blood. You normally seek freedom by creating practical plans, but now they only bore you. You might surprise your friends with your new outlook as you strive to squeeze more into your weekend. Although others see you in a different light, you're not as comfortable with all the fanfare as you seem. You don't need to impress anyone else; slow down and enjoy where you are without striving to be something you're not.

You have slipped into a cosmic grace period when people seem to enter your life just to make it better. Naturally, there's no resistance on your part; you like the idea of participating in activities just for the fun of it. But you might need to make some tough choices because you can't say yes to everything. Take cues from your environment; the flow of events will lead you in the right direction today. Luckily, answers come easily now as long as you observe the signs and pay them heed.

Your big plans for the weekend might sound like a dream come true, but first you must make it through today's list of chores. Unfortunately, piles of work prevent you from jumping into play mode too soon. Nevertheless, you can't stop your brain from planning for the good times to come while the Moon influences your 6th House of Logistics. Don't get too far ahead of yourself; counting chickens before they hatch is never a smart idea. One foot in front of the other will get you to your destination on time.

You're eager to finish up your chores because the Moon's shift into your 5th House of Fun and Games is inviting you out to play. Although you might not be free to call your own shots until you finish your work, nothing can stop you from imagining all the fun that's just around the corner. But don't make your move too soon or you'll mess things up before they even get off the ground. A magical time awaits you if you have the good sense to stay focused on the present moment until your obligations are fulfilled.

Fighting the temptation of inflated thinking is one of your recognized skills, but today it will require a consistent high level of concentration. Thankfully, you're up for the task while your key planet Mercury challenges bombastic Jupiter in your sign. You are walking a fine line between optimism and realism now. Keep in mind that "practical" is not a dirty word. It just takes a little more creativity to imagine castles in the air while your feet are on the ground.

A sweetness of spirit permeates your day but it can quickly turn sour if you are too greedy. Indulging your senses is a well-earned luxury now as long as you know when to stop. Although Mae West said, "Too much of a good thing can be wonderful," it's just not true for you today. Basking in a lovely experience is fabulous, but pushing your limits too far leads to disaster. Get ahead of the curve by practicing moderation before it's too late.

You're anticipating some overdue downtime, yet still may need to juggle work and play today. Performance art takes on an entirely new meaning now as you share your ideas about the future. But knowing your audience is absolutely crucial or you could ramble on endlessly about something that isn't even of interest. Your steady vigilance and your acute sense of timing enable you to decide when to stop talking and when to swing into action.

Although the weekend is quickly approaching, you might be required to reverse your priorities by indulging yourself early in the day and settling down to work later in the evening. Nevertheless, you're restless and on the lookout for your next adventure while the Moon is visiting your expansive sign. Additionally, prosperous Jupiter is in the spotlight, inspiring you to reinvest in an idea or a person. Give yourself plenty of time; you could grow disappointed when you realize you can't arrive at a destination the very same moment you leave.

Your external success is dependent upon your internal housekeeping today. For someone who likes to keep your world orderly, it might be more constructive if you let some corner of your domain remain completely chaotic now. This uncharacteristic behavior is a metaphor that gives you permission to leave your imagination raw and wild. An unrestrained fantasy life leads to new ideas and the potential of an ingenious breakthrough if you're willing to take a risk.

You're enjoying the company of your friends and colleagues so much today that it's difficult to get back to unfinished business. But it's absolutely imperative that you live up to your professional commitments now because your forward progress will be inhibited until you do. Nevertheless, your enthusiasm can work in your favor if you imagine the fun times ahead as a reward for a job well done. As Mahatma Gandhi wrote, "The future depends on what we do in the present."

Everything at work is flowing so smoothly today that you might begin to wonder if you're missing something. The truth is you could easily overlook an important piece of information that will be crucial later on. Don't assume you have all the answers. Asking a friend or colleague for advice gives you the perspective you need to you can turn a pretty good day into one that rocks your world.

Changes on the home front create tension, challenging you to keep up your normal routine. But maintaining a cheerful attitude is tough if you feel stuck with nowhere to go. On one hand, you've had enough; your impatience is reaching a crescendo. On the other hand, the Sun's smooth trine with action-hero Mars in your 8th House of Transformation empowers you to pull rabbits out of hats in a way that eases the stress. Regardless of the situation, a playful approach improves the prospects for a better future.

You are torn between your urge to hold on tight and your impulse to break free today. The Sun's dynamic square with radical Uranus can make you feel queasy with uncertainty. A simple statement might trigger strong reactions and trusting others is difficult when you're not sure where you stand yourself. Taking a risk and inventing new ways to express yourself is more rewarding than trying to change someone else's behavior. Tearing down barriers instead of reinforcing walls enables you to reclaim your balance and find stable ground.

Successfully maneuvering your way through recently troubled waters brings greater freedom of expression and potential financial rewards. Complex issues around money and its influence on personal relationships may be overwhelming today. But rather than seeking quick solutions, make changes in your daily routine that can continue to have significant impact well into the future. If you want something new, you must do something you've never done before.

Your self-esteem will grow today if you fight for what you think is yours. But win or lose, a shocking Sun-Uranus square opens your eyes, radically alters your perspective and could even turn your life in an entirely different direction. You might find yourself in a conflict with people in power over you, or if you're the one in authority, with those below you. Either way, your flexibility to negotiate around delicate issues is a moot point unless you actually make the attempt.

The magnitude of recent changes becomes readily apparent today as shifting circumstances require you to let go of a feeling that ties you to the past. Respond with a touch of caution because your nerves are stretched tight as the Sun squares uncontainable Uranus in your 9th House of Beliefs. Luckily, you can trust your initial reactions while the radiant Sun harmonizes with impulsive Mars. Strike while the fire is hot as long as no one gets hurt.

Your rebellious attitude puts others on notice that you're no longer willing to play by their arbitrary rules. Reactionary Uranus dynamically squares the Sun in your 11th House of Social Networking, prompting you to take action today, even if your behavior could disrupt your plans with your friends. However, the winds of change are blowing in your direction, ensuring a smooth transition as long as you're honest about your feelings from the start.

Unpredictable transits can turn your life upside down now, yet they also embolden you to make impressive positive changes. Although a personal relationship may be the designated battlefield today, the real issue is your growing need for independence and your reluctance to reveal what you truly want. Even if you're not sure about the consequences of your words, others will respect you for having the courage to speak up. Remember, there's no going back once the metamorphosis has begun.

Your life seems like a multiple-choice exam that has many correct answers. However, you must choose one response now even if you wish you had more time to make up your mind. The Sun's dynamic square to spontaneous Uranus in your 6th House of Logistics tempts you to overreact when a smaller modification in your routine will have a greater impact in the long run. As Abraham Lincoln said, "Commitment is what transforms a promise into reality."

It's easy to be grumpy today because an early morning Moon-Saturn conjunction in your sign frowns upon pleasure. But an electrifying Sun-Uranus square provokes your spontaneous reactions or acts like a lightning rod to attract the same. Nevertheless, this dynamic aspect indicates that your tenacity could pay off with an unexpected breakthrough at the last minute. If you're considering throwing in the towel now, remembering why you held on for so long can inspire you to give it one more try.

Conflict and confusion lurk at the edges of your perceptions today as unconventional Uranus squares the Sun in your 7th House of Partnerships. If someone pressures you to change, your smartest strategy is to stay calm while the insecurities and odd behaviors of others intensify. Luckily, reclaiming your peaceful center allows you to demonstrate your value as a caring and competent friend or colleague in a time of crisis. Reliability is your trademark of success.

You may need to fight in order to advance your interests, especially if your agenda clashes with someone else's plans. But exciting events provoke you to rebel against rules and break with tradition. Innumerable trivial issues require your attention; however, saving a chunk of time to reassess major long-term goals is more important today. Liberian President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf said, "If your dreams don't scare you, they are not big enough."

Relationships might take an unexpected twist today as an irrepressible Sun-Uranus square hits your 5th House of Love and Romance. A thrilling surprise or a sudden disappointment can catch you off guard either way. Fortunately, you possess the tools to come out on top in both scenarios as long as you're adaptable and prepared to change your plans at a moment's notice. Like a willow tree, it's better to bend than break.

You may feel quite comfortable with your emotions today, but you're hypersensitive to other people's reactions. You often know exactly what you need to say and don't really care about the consequences of speaking your mind. However ambitious your plans are for sharing your feelings with someone special, you might end up just keeping them to yourself now. But don't be too self-critical if you choose to say nothing at all. Silence speaks when words can't.

Although there might be an undertow of unspoken issues in a relationship today, you're capable of keeping your balance without opening an emotional can of worms. Even if someone pressures you to talk about your feelings, let them know that you're not ready to have the discussion yet. However, it's important to explain that you're not looking to bury the topic; you only want to delay the conversation for a while. The right timing can make all the difference in the world.

Slowing down isn't always the easiest task for you restless Twins, but a day of contemplation may be exactly what the doctor ordered. Although your thoughts could drift into the distant future, for the most part you are able to stay focused on the here and now. However, your spiritual quest will be more meaningful if you set everything else aside today and schedule a specific time for your meditation. Consciously postponing social commitments enables you to create the space you need to pursue serenity for your soul.

Unfulfilled promises may temporarily interfere with your desire to relax today but, thankfully, you can rise to the occasion and do it all. The magic of water is that it seeks its own level before it comes to a standstill. Today's Grand Trine activates the emotional water signs, inspiring you to find peace of mind by giving your feelings the freedom to flow. Nevertheless, like a river running to the sea, you might experience resistance along the way. Instead of trying to overcome an obstacle, just sink into a state of easy acceptance and let the cosmic forces work their magic.

A seemingly perfect day stretches out before you and you're eager to jump feet first into the scheduled activities. However, you may quickly change your mind, deciding that running around in pursuit of pleasure sounds more exhausting than it is worth today. Consider excusing yourself from your social commitments and taking the day to relax at home, alone or with your family. Creating sacred space now is the essential ingredient to finding real happiness.

Although you might have a very particular notion about how you want your day to unfold, you could run into resistance as you execute your plan. In fact, sticking to your original idea might leave you feeling discouraged and dejected. Fortunately, reality has a few happy surprises up its cosmic sleeve that actually improve upon your original expectations. However, you must relinquish the reins of control in order for the universe to play its hand. Trust is the key that opens the door to your success.

You may feel like quitting today, but giving up before you even start is a terrible idea. Luckily, everything seems to slowly fall into place if you set reasonable goals and continue to strive toward achieving them. But assuming that everything will work out perfectly now is an open invitation for disappointment. Instead, forgive yourself for your flaws; accepting your humanness is the trick to turning an ordinary day into an extraordinary experience.

You are owning your power today and have no reason to apologize to anyone for your intensity. You are the beneficiary of a stabilizing Grand Water Trine; all you need to do is to shine the light of your awareness, regardless of what you see. Some people might not appreciate the brutal truth, but it's not your place to co-dependently support their denial. To paraphrase President Harry S. Truman, if people can't stand your heat, they should get out of your kitchen.

Living in two separate worlds is tricky today as your head pulls one way and your heart another. The Moon's current visit to your adventurous sign inspires you to plan your future. However, an emotional Grand Water Trine lures you deep into the Sea of Imagination where the Land of Logic is left far behind. Rather than trying to choose one location, observe how you move from one realm to the other throughout the day. Dancing in multiple dimensions is easier than you think if you're not tied to any specific outcome.

You know you need to finish up old business today in preparation for the week ahead. However, you really don't feel like doing much of anything now. You might wonder what has become of your ambition if you can't motivate yourself. Thankfully, there's no reason to panic because your drive will return later in the day when the Moon shifts into your industrious sign. In the meantime, kick back and enjoy a bit of time off. The best investment you can make is in your own wellbeing.

Your friends struggle to understand you today, especially if you decline their invitation to a social event. Unfortunately, they may take your action as a personal rejection, when that's the furthest thing from your mind. You're not purposely trying to avoid anyone now; it's just that you can't be sidetracked from your agenda. Happily, it doesn't take much effort on your part to explain your intentions. Nevertheless, when you care about someone's feelings, it's worth going the extra mile.

You might feel pressured today to make decisions about upcoming events in your life. However, you're not interested in finalizing plans in the real world while you're happily distracted exploring your emotions. An energetic Grand Water Trine focuses on the healing power of your feelings. Maximize the potential of mind over matter by actively envisioning your ideal future while saving the execution for another day. The mystic poet Rumi wrote, "Let the water settle and you will see the Moon and Stars mirrored in your being."

You believe you can accomplish anything once you set your mind to it today. Although your imagination may run amok, you're able to harness the power of your ideas as the clarity of your thoughts increases throughout the day. If you feel hyperactive, consciously slowing down your thinking process adds to your productivity. There is work to be done now, and if you focus your mental energy you'll surely achieve more than you once thought possible. Every success story starts with the decision to try.

You are inspired to work hard today in order to reach your dreams. In fact, you may become singularly focused on proving how serious you can be when it comes to achieving your goals. Mercury's easy trine to steadfast Saturn encourages you to communicate in a very matter-of-fact manner, helping you to regain any credibility that you recently lost. Just remember that you can't build a solid reputation on your promises, so get busy before it's too late. Actions speak louder than words.

You can discuss delicate matters skillfully today thanks to a winning combination of compassion and tact. An emotionally sensitive Sun-Neptune alignment softens your heart, enabling you to empathize with others. Mental Mercury forms a favorable trine to steady Saturn, helping you bring a vague hope or dream down to earth with a perfect balance between inspiration and practicality. Hold the vision; trust the process.

Channeling your artistic creativity into something tangible isn't easy as the moody Cancer Sun conspires with imaginative Neptune. Fortunately, you can rely on strategic thinking and your well-honed skills to capitalize on even your most whimsical thoughts. But don't expect your visions to materialize on their own. Sharing your best ideas with someone you trust is a good first step toward manifesting your dreams. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

It's confusing when facts and fiction become so entangled that you can't tell which is which. Your dreams are powerfully vivid now as the Sun shines upon otherworldly Neptune. But it's easier to face the truth while interactive Mercury in your sign trines no-nonsense Saturn. Fortunately, you have a solid grasp on both reality and fantasy that you can use to your advantage. Utilizing your imagination empowers you to take your knowledge to the next level.

You are more confident of your decisions when you're able to trust your senses. However, you also receive excellent information today directly from your intuition. Don't discard the wisdom that comes through images and symbols, even if there's no logic to it. It doesn't matter if you can't easily explain how you arrive at your conclusion; ultimately, savvy Mercury's supportive trine with solid Saturn roots you in reality.

You must act with full honesty and integrity today, or you could become lost in your own dreams. Fortunately, a smoothly flowing trine between clever Mercury and karmic Saturn enables you to navigate the uncertain realms between your imagination and reality. Stretch your perspective to understand how your friends think, but don't lose sight of your own core values. As the Dalai Lama teaches, "Compassion and tolerance are not a sign of weakness, but a sign of strength."

Call on your persistence and ingenuity today to turn an elusive dream into reality. Your psychic powers are operating at high volume, but it's difficult to know how much your intuitive voice should be trusted. Fortunately, a solid trine between cerebral Mercury and systematic Saturn motivates you to unpack the complexity of an issue and drill down to the source. Imagination and common sense work hand-in-hand now. Your unflappable determination will all but ensure your success.

Your logic won't steer you wrong today as long as you start out with valid assumptions. Unfortunately, you could jump to an erroneous conclusion if you let your current desires influence your long-term thinking. Fortunately, clever Mercury's favorable aspect with reliable Saturn strengthens your organizational skills and inspires you to create an ambitious plan that can lead you boldly into the future.
