Proper preparation prevents poor performance.

You don't need the recognition for your work today; completing your tasks on time is its own sweet reward. However, you won't be as effective if you try to remain a solo act. You could receive additional support and useful ideas from your friends and coworkers when intelligent Mercury trines constructive Saturn. Thankfully, the combination of solid thinking and clear communication helps you manage the complexity of a project so too many cooks don't spoil the broth.

If you're stuck in a jam today, it makes sense to pursue all forms of communication as a ticket to your escape. But don't let the potential of a Mercury-Saturn trine go to waste when you could be reinforcing your plans for the stressful days ahead. Thankfully, others will hear your message loud and clear if you take the risk and share what's on your mind. Open your heart; you never know who you are inspiring with your random acts of vulnerability.

Although you might be placed in a leadership position today, you could run the emotional gamut from conflict to contentment. You can state your needs and prove your worth convincingly because others believe what you say while stable Saturn harmoniously trines messenger Mercury. It may be difficult at times to focus on the necessary details, but you're capable of overcoming your tendency to scatter your attention by consciously listening and speaking clearly to avoid wasting time and energy. Communication is a two-way street.

Although you know what you want and have a simple plan to get it, your energy is drawn toward strengthening family relationships now, delaying your professional success. The aspiring Capricorn Full Moon in your 10th House of Career could trigger a work-related crisis that pushes you to recognize the need for self-discipline. Although you might be confused by conflicting demands on your time, your persistence will pay off in the long run. Ironically, attending to your personal needs makes everything in the outer world more manageable.

You are proud of your realistic goals and are more driven now than ever to achieve them. The calculating Capricorn Full Moon spotlights your 9th House of Big Ideas, revealing sensible ways to reach your destination. Nevertheless, your overly practical nature can fill you with doubts about the feasibility of your grand plans. The contrast between the real and the ideal is palpable today. Cultivate your dreams by doing the hard work necessary to make them come true.

You're ready to risk your comfort by confronting a deep emotional issue now. Clarifying what you want from others enables you to advance your personal and professional interests as the Capricorn Full Moon illuminates your 8th House of Shared Resources. Although your imagination is a powerful tool that helps you achieve success, it can also color your communication with misleading emotions. Concentrate your energy where it counts most in order to enhance your self-worth and increase your net worth at the same time.

You may be painfully aware of the feelings you normally suppress to maintain the harmony of personal and business relationships. The goal-oriented Capricorn Full Moon falls in your 7th House of Partnerships, reflecting your desire for emotional stability. Unfortunately, you might feel as if you have reached an impasse. Something needs to give, for you can't sustain old illusions any longer. You have seen the truth;  respond to the situation by taking decisive action now before the opportunity slips through your fingers.

It's time to come back down to earth and take concrete steps to upgrade your life. You don't have to conquer the world; just add some constructive order to it as the responsible Capricorn Full Moon lands in your 6th House of Daily Routine. Practicing self-discipline on a small scale allows the larger pieces to fall into place. Methodically focusing on one thing at a time is the most efficient way to complete your tasks. Remember, it's the tiniest details that add up to the biggest picture.

Uncertainty is hanging in the air while the crafty Capricorn Moon overwhelms your 5th House of Love and Play. Emotions are revealed that test the boundaries separating a romance from a friendship. Unfortunately, your rational faculties might not be up to your exacting standards today, creating a short lapse of sound judgment. Don't take any unnecessary risks unless you have carefully weighed the consequences. Better safe than sorry when it comes to matters of the heart.

You may be pulled between the pleasure of being with others and the need for quiet time by yourself. The ambitious Capricorn Full Moon lights up your 4th House of Roots, stirring an urge to take on new challenges. Vivid memories of parental advice can propel you along with their high expectations or hold you back with their fears. However, self-doubt is not a signal to curtail your aspirations; instead, your insecurities show you where you need to apply more effort to get ahead.

A trivial thought can grow to grandiose proportions today, so be watchful for a loss of perspective as you turn molehills into mountains. Although your passions are stretched to extremes by the rational Capricorn Moon opposite the emotional Cancer Sun, an all-or-nothing approach to relationships might not serve your best interests now. It's much more advantageous to try to find a middle ground. The Full Moon brightens your 3rd House of Communication, making enlightened compromise a sign of inner strength and not outer weakness.

Navigating murky emotional waters isn't your favorite activity, yet the vulnerability it can trigger now improves strategic alliances. A power struggle over fiscal control could create unexpected stress in a relationship; money matters may erupt when the responsible Capricorn Full Moon emphasizes your 2nd House of Resources. Wishing things were better is not a financial plan. Commit to stabilizing your cash flow and patiently cultivate your talents to set yourself on a firmer foundation.

You are driven to establish a healthier balance between your outer professional life and your inner emotional world now. The Capricorn Full Moon occurs in your 1st House of Personality, urging you to get in better shape and consider updating your appearance. Although your relationship life may be complex, you can still set your heart on a destination and, with a little help from the cosmos, figure out the best way to get there. Even if a lucky break doesn't turn out to be all you want, pursuing it with gusto could teach you a valuable lesson for the next opportunity.

You can cling to your vision of a better future while still fulfilling your promises. The reliable Capricorn Full Moon is a reminder that you must honor your commitments prior to indulging your fantasies. This Full Moon energizes your 12th House of Secrets and can put you in touch with a practical side of your spirituality that you may have set aside. As Sufi poet Rumi wrote, "The door is wide and open; do not go back to sleep!"

You are driven to stabilize your relationship with your local tribe or community today. The sobering Capricorn Full Moon casts its light in your 11th House of Groups and Friends, making it clear how much is expected of you as a member of the team. Open your eyes to see where you truly stand with your peers. Notice people who take more than they give and then start to change the equation in order to make it more balanced. However, don't forget to offer plenty of words of appreciation for those who support you behind the scenes.

There is no question about it -- you are a force to be reckoned with in the department of love today. Venus gives you the gift of heightened charm while her proud trine to taskmaster Saturn tempers your behavior with deliberate actions. However, your lack of motivation could be a problem as your present comfort zone creates a temporary bubble of safety around you. Nevertheless, initiating a discussion on a sensitive topic strengthens a relationship. It's smarter to build stability in calm seas than to wait for the next storm to hit.

Your interactions with others are so smooth today that you can charm your way into someone's heart. Luckily, your ability to approach new relationships with both vitality and responsibility enhances your personal life. Your impulse to create art, establish a new enterprise or organize a social event can infuse you with an enduring passion. Whatever attracts you now becomes part of you, bringing lasting pleasure and well-earned respect.

You may feel as lucky as a four-leaf clover today, and you won't even have to kiss a leprechaun to make your dreams come true. However, you must move the energy out of your head and into your body. Treat yourself to a therapeutic massage, go out for an evening of dancing or tell that special person how much you care. But don't just drift through the day; make well-defined plans and commit to them. Ultimately, you will be judged by your actions, not your intentions.

You may not set the world on fire with the heat of your passion today, but you can reliably keep the love light burning on a very low flame. Although romantic Venus is traveling though playful Leo, somber Saturn places a more serious spin on things. Relying on common sense works effectively now as you establish the authority needed to further your personal or professional goals. But don't waste time looking for immediate gratification; passing pleasures can't hold a candle to the enduring connection that comes from mutually earned respect and admiration.

Deepening a current relationship makes much more sense now than running off to initiate a new one. Loyalty becomes more important than frivolity when friendly Venus in your flirtatious sign is subdued by stern Saturn. It's best to work closely with someone else to establish priorities and then focus on one subject at a time. Avoid leading anyone on with your good intentions. People's expectations could become burdensome when your need for freedom grows. As Abraham Lincoln said, "Commitment is what transforms a promise into reality."

You wish you could perform your everyday tasks differently today because the old ways seem tiresome and inefficient. Although the quirky Aquarius Moon may steer you away from emotional intensity, attractive Venus harmonizes with realistic Saturn to bring you a reasonable attitude about love. Impulsive behavior can create problems so you really must lay the groundwork before rushing into a major project. Move slowly and surely toward that which makes you happy.

Normally, your high tolerance for ambiguity enables you to maintain your composure when the universe sends you mixed signals. However, you have no time for indecision while a Venus-Saturn trine offers you the opportunity to strengthen an existing relationship. Breathe deeply and consider your options, for conscious action will bring better results now than recklessness. Remember, there's no need to hurry; change will continue to happen at just the right speed if you let it.

You are super-productive and extra-efficient today, especially when it comes to making money. However, you may be so self-sufficient that working with others is not on your radar now. Establishing trust is essential while loving Venus harmonizes with accountable Saturn. Supportive relationships should flow easily now if you share a common goal. But throwing in the towel is not a wise strategy, even if the going gets tough. Don't lose a diamond while chasing glitter.

You are free to create new goals now as long as they are on the practical side of the fence. Fortunately, a methodical approach enables you to turn your big ideas into reality. Don't be afraid to ruthlessly narrow your focus today, because eliminating extraneous activities is a key to your success. Be wary of getting bogged down in the minutiae; details and distractions will only disrupt the inevitable learning that ultimately is meant to expand your world.

Climbing the ladder of success leaves you feeling empty today. You are intent on finding personal enjoyment, but even a wonderful experience must be part of a larger package that also includes a heart connection. Unfortunately, your unflappable sense of determination puts your emotional desires in direct conflict with your goals. Ultimately, you can find the money and love you seek as long as you avoid getting swept up in the urgency of the moment. Never underestimate the power of persistence.

You can turn your creativity and charm into professional assets today as resourceful Venus forms a superconductive trine with productive Saturn. Luckily, you could use your charisma to graciously guide people where you want them to go without stirring up any resistance. You might be pleasantly surprised at how simple the process is and how well it all turns out. Nevertheless, it's also tempting to take the easy way out and do nothing at all. As Pablo Picasso said, "Action is the fundamental key to success."

You may be overly protective of someone at work today. Unfortunately, distinguishing your feelings from those of others around you can be tricky until you draw clear boundaries. You are receiving support from the cosmos that gives you inner resolve now when you need it. Your strength of purpose empowers you to secure a safe haven for you and your friends. Remember, you won't be swept away by any drama that isn't yours if you firmly hold onto your center.

Sometimes you're unable to just power your way through a difficult situation, even though you might try anyway. However, knowing when to hold and when to fold could turn your day around. Prematurely walking away reduces the immediate pressure, but doesn't resolve the underlying cause. Stay where you are, even if it's uncomfortable. You can find brilliant solutions beneath the current stress -- but only if you're willing to engage in the magical process of transformation.

You might wish you could become a hermit for the day -- but you can't. Although you may be confused about your role in a group activity, you don't really want to push your friends away; you just hope the emotional drama will disappear without your involvement. However, interacting with others is also a major source of inspiration now and you count on your social network to support you when you need it. Fortunately, a solution isn't required yet. Surprisingly, the tension begins to dissipate once you accept the temporary uncertainty and go with the flow.

You can talk your way in and out of problems today, but it's no fun to be in a nearly constant state of stress. Steer clear of heavy fog instead of swinging into motion after you're already in trouble. In other worlds, don't drive if you can't see the road in front of you. It's better to slow down or even stop than to create a dangerous situation. There's nothing to prove to anyone now. Nevertheless, once your clarity returns, be ready to hit the gas and make up for lost time.

You know you are at a turning point yet you can't imagine what might be around the next corner. The nurturing Cancer Sun has encouraged you to reconnect with those you love. But soon everything is about to change and you cannot stay in the nest just because it feels safe and cozy. The problem is you may not have a clue as to where you're going next. Nevertheless, you must spread your wings and fly. Thankfully, the notion of leaving home is worse than the actual deed. Fear looks, faith jumps.

There is no time to waste since your show is about to start when the radiant Sun enters your expressive sign tomorrow. However, you were more certain about your relationship status last week than you are today. Don't make any sudden moves yet because, most likely, very little has changed in the basic interpersonal dynamics. You will be happily surprised when the sky clears and you wake up with the sunshine on your face.

You're ready to shake up the status quo, but you're worried about making changes that actually set you back. The truth is that your judgment may be slightly off today and your less-than-critical thinking could prompt you to make a bad decision. Don't assume that your new method is an improvement just because you can see the results you want in your mind's eye. Continue to explore the possibilities now without committing to any one path.

You crave more freedom in a relationship now and are considering bringing the subject up in a conversation. Unfortunately, a discussion may not follow your ideal script today; the more you talk, the more elusive the truth. However, avoiding the subject won't further your cause. Rather than announcing to your partner what doesn't work for you, focus on what does. Any forward movement is healthy as long as you allow nature to follow her own course. Planting a seed is more effective than trying to prematurely harvest the entire crop.

You might be stuck between a rock and a hard place today with no apparent way out. But your current dilemma is likely of your own making, especially if you're holding onto the past too tightly. There's a wave of new energy heading your way, but you must be ready to receive it. Letting go of old feelings makes room for new ones. Joseph Campbell wrote, "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure that you seek."

Your friends are willing to put up with your idiosyncrasies because they know how brilliant you are when you're on a roll. But you can't get away with pretending to be so certain of the future if you've come untethered in the present. Instead of pushing your relationships further and further off the deep end, bring your feelings back to the here and now. You can travel anywhere in your imagination once your feet are solidly on the ground.

You sound like you're expressing yourself on a profoundly deep level today, but your words may stir up more confusion than resolution. It's not necessarily your intention to mislead anyone, but language is more like a smokescreen now that obscures reality rather than exposing it. Unfortunately, you might believe you're getting your message across when nothing could be further from the truth. As Confucius said, "Silence is a true friend that never betrays."

Although people may be exceptionally nice to you now, their current motives are not fully transparent. On one hand, you can just accept someone's good deed without asking any questions. Or you might fearfully reject an individual's honorable behavior without waiting to learn your assumptions were wrong. Jumping to conclusions is dangerous today. Your mind is powerful, yet it will steer you wrong unless you take the time to exercise your brain.

Your anger could bubble to the surface now, creating a little mess you will need to clean up. One simple emotional outburst won't fix anything; in fact, it could send you in a wrong direction, especially if you're looking for love, truth and beauty in all the wrong places. Observe your inner processes while you can still see them. So many things are about to change and what was easily visible today could vanish by tomorrow. As Lao Tzu wrote, "He who knows himself is enlightened."

Contradictions abound as you're torn between hiding your feelings now and throwing caution to the wind. On one hand, the Moon's visit to your 12th House of Invisibility reflects your need to retreat into the unseen reaches of your imagination. On the other hand, the Sun's shift into lively Leo and your 5th House of Spontaneity motivates you to open your heart as wide as you can. Don't worry if you choose to bury your head in the sand today. There will be plenty of time to come out and play in the days ahead.

You're quite intuitive when it comes to social interactions today and you are willing to meet people more than halfway. You can postpone your agenda, tune into the needs of others and work toward the common good. However, your connection with your inner sense of purpose remains strong, even if it conflicts with your outer behavior. Holding both perspectives is a challenge but is well worth the effort. The best way to multiply your happiness is to share it.

Communication is almost always a top priority for you chatty Twins but getting your message across is not enough today. You want everyone to see you in motion so you can be recognized for what you do. You may even go out of your way to put on such a memorable performance that you transform yourself into a caricature. Don't focus on how others might perceive you; just show up as the best version of you that you can muster up. An original is worth more than a copy.

You need to work behind the scenes today so your insecurities can dissipate before they mess up a relationship of interest. Although you may be living in your fantasies, the real world seems too far away from your ideal situation. Don't lose faith; a pinch of hope is the cosmic superglue that holds the future together. Remember when Cinderella sang, "A dream is a wish your heart makes when you're fast asleep."

Voices of ancestors are whispering in your ear today and your subconscious mind is activated by unseen forces. Unfortunately, all this psychic activity can be quite distracting as you try to go about your day in the mundane world. Luckily, the Sun's return to animated Leo and your 1st House of Self boosts your energy and motivates you to complete whatever you start. Keep your eyes on the finish line until you reach your destination.

The more answers you seek today, the more questions you have. People around you seem to harbor bigger dreams than ever once the surreal Pisces Moon enters your 7th House of Others. However, you are clinging to a few fantasies of your own and might be unwilling to let them go. Don't hide your desires; the sooner you share them with those you trust, the more help you will receive. Teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.

An increasing number of social commitments begins to infringe on your personal time. Nevertheless, you're a champion at balancing your needs with others and happily enter the complicated dance by taking everyone's interests into consideration now. Establish your work pattern early in the day and stick to it. Your performance may require extra energy today, but finding your mojo and expressing it is the ticket to your current happiness.

You might not be able to separate your work from your creative pursuits today. Everything you do has the potential to be thoroughly enjoyable but you are driven to reach for a higher goal. If promotions or salary increases are not likely, it may be time to widen your choices and think about other options. But contemplating the possibilities is not the same as pursuing them. For now, don't make any choices you cannot undo. The wheels are still in spin and your world is still in motion.

You're not sure how to proceed on the home front, especially if you're running into walls every which way you turn. Although you might use techniques of creative visualization to break through the restraints, you have trouble knowing when to stop. Don't wait until you've gone too far. Pare back your plans and make time to put up your feet. As Carolyn Myss writes, "The soul always knows what to do to heal itself; the challenge is to silence the mind."

Your intentions are not as straightforward once the Moon enters the murky waters of Pisces today. You might even feel as if you've lost your way, but this is just a temporary state of affairs because you gain momentum from the Sun's shift into bold Leo and your 8th House of Transformation. You can't keep things as they are; something needs to change. Once you release your hold on the status quo, the skies will begin to clear and the path ahead will be easier to follow.

It's not much fun when the Moon drifts through spacey Pisces today, unless you relinquish power and stop trying to figure everything out. You don't possess all the answers now, yet the potential for growth is greater than ever while the willful Sun transits through your 7th House of Partners this month. You might not have the clarity you need to make an important decision, but solutions begin to show up when other people get involved. Many hands make light work.

Your current bout with indecision might hit too close to home as the emotional Moon returns to your changeable sign today. Your moods are swinging so fast that it's nearly impossible to keep up with them now. Don't even try; give yourself permission to let your feelings run with the wolves. In the meanwhile, focus all your attention on specific projects at work. Balance these two approaches for your best chance at finding answers that make sense.

You can get carried away with your desire to retreat from the world today. Perhaps you thought you could just slip away and no one would notice, but it's not going to be that easy. Nevertheless, a little advanced planning goes a long way to making your wish come true. Dividing your time between living in the real world and attending to your creative or spiritual needs is a small price to pay. Thankfully, if you're not totally unrealistic about how long you can avoid reality, you might successfully pull off your disappearing act without any dire consequences.

A long-overdue home improvement project may take you on a surprising journey today. You might think that a few hours will be sufficient to spruce up a room or tend to the garden but one thing leads to another and you're in over your head before you know it. Instead of losing confidence in your ability to plan ahead, just do what you can now without trying to finish everything in one day. A new burst of creative energy tomorrow will carry you through completion. If you feel like quitting, just remind yourself why you started in the first place.

Plans for taking charge of your life sound good on paper, but could run into trouble in the real world. Thankfully, you're not receiving much resistance from others now; instead, you might be struggling to direct your energy toward your goals when there are so many other pleasurable distractions. Don't get caught up in trying to measure your progress today. As Einstein said, "Not everything that counts can be counted."

Your dreams seem more important than your real life today, but getting lost in a fantasy can lead to a plethora of problems. Nevertheless, it's a delicate balance that could have a positive influence on your life if your imagination also motivates you to take action. There's nothing wrong with thinking about taking a fantastic vacation if it inspires you to work harder to make the money to pay for it. Using your vision to fuel your drive for success is admirable but falling victim to a delusion is not.

You are the epitome of the roaring Lion today as you face your day with indefatigable optimism. You are proudly in your element and believe you can overcome any obstacle that comes your way. But you might overdo your positive thinking with buoyant Jupiter in the picture. Don't spread yourself so thin that you fall short on those tasks that should be a piece of cake. Maintaining a healthy perspective now makes the difference between failure and success.

You might be quite attached to your idea of perfection today, especially when romantic fantasies are involved. However, you're not likely to share your secret dreams with anyone else, so they won't have much of a chance of becoming real. Opening your heart is tricky business since a rejection could send you into an emotional tailspin now. Nevertheless, you may be pleasantly surprised when someone you like responds with a positive reaction. Displaying your vulnerability is a gamble, but well worth it if it brings you closer to your goals. You're always going to miss your chance if you never take a risk.

You head into the day expecting one thing and then before you know it, find yourself on the road to somewhere else. You might not have the peace and quiet you want now, but the enjoyment you glean from your social connections is compelling. Don't fight against the currents that pull you out into the world today. Although they are a temporary distraction, your life will be enriched by the people you encounter. Balancing expectations with reality is an ongoing dance, but one that serves you well in the long run.

Your theme song today could be the Beatles' "Good Day Sunshine." You can barely contain your enthusiasm for an upcoming special event. Or, you might be happily anticipating fun activities involving friends or family. Just remember that the unobscured Sun casts shadows and the brightness makes it hard to see what lurks in the darkness. Nevertheless, there's no need to fear the shade; it just means that you are standing in the light.

You may be looking forward to a wonderful adventure today that places you in the public eye. Or, perhaps people will see you in a new light as the spiritual Pisces Moon reflects the optimism of joyful Jupiter in your 10th House of Status. Either way, you can satisfy a long-standing fantasy if you don't get carried away by the potential of your own dreams. Keeping facts separate from fantasy enables you to fully enjoy your current experience without being disappointed if it falls short of your expectations.

You are a bit lighter on your feet today and a little happier in your heart. It's as if you have traveled a bumpy road and are now ready for a brand new path. But even if the current trials are not quite over, you're already planning your next move forward. Don't let recent history hold you back. There may be a few more days of transition, but it's time to look away from the past and keep your eyes fully focused on the future. Hope anchors the soul.

You might feel as if reality cannot stand between you and success now. You're not in denial about your current financial or relationship circumstances. It's just that you believe in yourself so thoroughly that you're eager to show the world what you can do. The power of positive thought is an amazing tool, but don't let your blind optimism lead you into a trap. Continue to weigh the pros and cons, even when everything is coming up roses. Keeping it real is your ticket to success.

Dreams overflow the sleep barrier now, challenging you to remain objective in the light of day. Fortunately, you may be able to happily dance on the edge between reality and illusion without anyone taking you to task. You might not need to fully wake up yet while your imagination joyfully colors your world with rainbows. There's no reason for concern; you can hold onto today's happy memories when the mundane world reasserts its dominance tomorrow.

It may be a day of rest for some folks, but not likely for you. You probably have one too many items already on your list of things to do and you can't wait to get started. Hopefully, you will find time to express your creativity because there's so much on your mind and you want others to share your experience. Fortunately, the timing is perfect for telling a secret or two, even if your disclosure creates waves. You never know who you might inspire when you reveal what's in your heart.

Lights are changing to green and you're itching to stomp down on the gas pedal wherever you are going. However, it's hard to know whether you're driven to succeed or simply motivated to enjoy yourself. Usually, there's a clear difference but now the two divergent paths travel along side by side. Luckily, you can race ahead for a little while without needing to choose your destination just yet. The trouble is you think you have plenty of time until it runs out; he who hesitates is lost.

There might not be much downtime on your schedule today, but that's exactly how you like it. The pace of life is quickening and the Moon's shift into the 11th House of Friends opens the door to a variety of social activities. Losing yourself in the crowd brings relief because you don't have to figure everything out for everyone. However, you grow restless throughout the day and long for some quality one-on-one time with a close friend. As educator Stephen Covey says, "Don't prioritize your schedule, schedule your priorities."

You're expected to take over a floundering project today, even if it's grown in complexity in recent days. In fact, your future was quiet and manageable until someone started to play the what-if game in real life, expanding all the possibilities in your mind. You may be uncharacteristically intrigued by so many choices and wish you could choose them all. Thankfully, you can quickly pick the best direction when the time is right if you're willing to listen to your intuition.

Chalk up another day of unstoppable summer Sun and Games. Although you might believe it's as good as it gets while bright Sol blasts the Earth with his warm rays, it's all too easy to let the day go by without actively converting your dreams into reality. Your feelings grow more complicated as time wears on, leaving you less certain about the direction you are actually heading. Fortunately, as novelist Margaret Atwood wrote, "When nothing is sure, everything is possible."

Although you have energy to spare as the astrological element of fire burns brighter, you may not be very motivated to do much of anything now. In fact, you might even need to seek solace as the emotional Moon in your 8th House of Deep Sharing harmonizes with the Sun in your 12th House of Secrets. You have your feelings tucked away and locked up under surveillance. Contrary to your first inclination, take the time to talk about your needs and your fears with someone you trust. Remember, discomfort is not your final destination, even if it's a stop along the way.

Your perfect day includes plenty of time to relax with friends while sharing your thoughts about life, love and the pursuit of happiness. Luckily, reality will likely grant your wish while the Moon trines the playful Leo Sun in your 11th House of Social Networks. However, you can upset some of your peers when you talk about your feelings today without regard for theirs. No matter what you think, say what is right and not what is easy.

The atmosphere continues to lighten and your heart forges ahead inch by inch in its attempts to connect with others. Ram Dass said that living on Earth requires us to keep our hearts open in Hell. Most often, love is followed by the pain of separation, disappointment or disillusionment. Nevertheless, the alternative is to close down and alienate yourself from everyone. Given this deeper understanding, your choice is a simple one that only you can make.

Your mind is like the sea that has washed over the tide wall and your thoughts are breaking the molds of containment. Although it feels as if nothing can stop you now, your confidence borders on denial. It's a bad idea to disregard the laws of the road or the rules of engagement today. But you might feel even freer once you agree to color within the lines. Ironically, sometimes the right constraints grant you the independence you seek.

Your newly found optimism might run into a roadblock today as charming Venus is overwhelmed by the power of ruthless Pluto in your sign. You are acutely aware of the fact that your serious style of love doesn't always play well to your audience. You might try a more lighthearted approach now, but others see right through your feeble attempts at camouflage. Throw in the towel of resistance; just be real and let the chips fall where they may.

Your objective perspective enables you to remain enthusiastic about the future. But, you also carry the weight of responsibility on your shoulders, and know enough to restrain your expression now if it borders on anything controversial. Meanwhile, a close friend or partner turns the tables on you by revealing his or her feelings today. You might want to run for the hills, but avoidance is not a wise strategy. The only way to escape from your current problem is to solve it once and for all.

You aren't sure that your personal contribution adds much to the grand scheme of things today. But magic isn't always obvious, even to those who practice it. Don't let your intentions waver, for they set the stage for your future. Your individual actions are part of a larger plan that might not come together until midweek. There's no need to rush anything now; even in fairy tales, the happily-ever-after occurs on the last page.

Excess and self-indulgence entice you to risk stability in search of pleasure today. Three planets, including sensual Venus, are camped out in your 5th House of Love, urging you to express your romantic needs. Unfortunately, you might fall victim to your own excitement and share more than you intend. Your enthusiasm prompts others to expect even more from you, which could eventually lead to disappointment, unless you follow through with your promises. Be safe and stick to the script.

You face complicated issues with a playful sense of humor that makes it easy to turn a loss into a gain. However, you can still see the dark side of things -- perhaps even imagining the worst -- yet a Grand Fire Trine reveals a great potential for happiness. But don't get bogged down in doubt; let go of someone or something important if you must. Doing so makes room for even better experiences to fill in the gap. A head full of fears has no space for dreams.

Your nerves are on edge now and you're ready to seize the moment as it arrives. However, anxiety and frustration can catalyze a sudden shift of energy. Nevertheless, today's Grand Trine activates your social life, motivating you to go out of your way to interact with others at work and play. Developing new communication skills is easy once you recognize its importance in bringing happiness back into your life. A caring heart that listens is more valuable than an intelligent mind that talks.

Ironically, you can push others to their limits without appearing pushy today. Adopting a gentler approach increases your sensitivity and enables you to address difficult issues with compassion. Collaborating with your colleagues makes it easier to pursue mutual dreams. But communication needs to flow both ways for everyone to benefit. Although you're ready for change now, even the most brilliant strategy will require time to manifest the results you seek.

You can charm your way into nearly anyone's heart today, but you may overstep your bounds without even realizing it. Although the Moon's presence in your 9th House of Big Ideas is inflationary all by itself, trines to Venus and Mercury enable you to sweet talk your way out of trouble. Nevertheless, you might try to shatter the social conventions that normally restrain you. Tread lightly now; your unconventional ideas could create a mess you'll be busy cleaning up over the days ahead.

Analysis comes easy to you Virgos, empowering you to make a particularly smart decision today. However, brainy Mercury can lead you down a confusing path if you're under pressure to make an immediate choice, especially if others are depending on your powers of discernment. Eliminate unrealistic alternatives when trying to make up your mind. Nevertheless, entertain every sensible possibility on its own merit as it appears. In all likelihood, you already know the truth.

Cultivating close connections is complicated today because you're following your feelings down two entirely different tracks. On one hand, you can get along with others better than ever. On the other hand, you're itching to surprise everyone with your independent thinking and bold actions. Unfortunately, you might be so far ahead of your time that you must slow down, step back and rethink your strategy to bring your ideas to life. Focus on collaboration instead of competition for the best results.

You can feel the cosmic equilibrium today, even if there are disturbances to the force. The Moon's square to tough-guy Pluto agitates a conflict between you and someone who may oppose your plan. Later in the evening, the Moon runs into reckless Uranus, encouraging you to push everyone out of their comfort zone. Battles for control and a desire for freedom can undermine cooperation. If you find a compromise is impossible now, walk away from the disagreement before it escalates into a fight. A moment of silence saves you from a lifetime of regret.

You are hungry for new experiences and find yourself taking chances in pursuit of a good time. You are compelled to express your feelings in more dramatic ways now thanks to an alignment of the Moon in your 5th House of Play to affectionate Venus and curious Mercury in your 9th House of Getaways. Romantic feelings may be aroused when you push past personal limits and explore unfamiliar territory. Proceed on the side of caution when someone's heart is on the line.

You're convinced you have to take charge today or you'll completely lose control when a Grand Fire Trine zaps three planets in your 8th House of Transformation. Fortunately, you should have no difficulty sharing power and cooperating on a profound level as long as there's time to gradually let down your guard. Once you notice the little improvements that are occurring around you, making a giant leap forward will seem as simple as taking another small step.

Your thinking could be so far out on the ledge today that people believe you might be losing touch with reality. It's entirely possible that your ideas are too radical to be understood. Nervous energy and intellectual restlessness is high as cerebral Mercury forms a creative aspect with evolutionary Pluto. Concentration is difficult when the flow of information is constantly interrupted. Nevertheless, exciting discoveries offer unexpected answers and foster surprising new connections if you can relax enough to stay flexible.

Your playful mood and creative approach to relationships make you a skillful collaborator today. You're feeling quite popular now as the spontaneous Aries Moon trines flirty Venus in expressive Leo. This yummy cosmic combination magnifies your desirability, making you more successful at getting what you want from others. Passion expressed with patience is a winning formula; know what you want and pursue it at your own pace.

Although you normally enjoy the excitement of the adrenaline rush, you're thankful when the energy settles down a notch today. But the stress isn't quite over yet, even if you're dealing with more mundane issues now. You could tighten up with fear because you probably don't want to accept impractical solutions. Nevertheless, your obstinacy may not be enough to stop radical ideas from crashing through into your awareness. Resist less; move more.

It's not wise to become overly comfortable with any one emotional posture today, since a process of change will take you through your paces. The Moon's shift into sensible Taurus amplifies your feelings that conflict with your recently established goals. Something must give, and fortunately, a late night rush of inspiration could bring the answers you seek. As author Paulo Coelho writes, "If you think adventure is dangerous, you should try routine."

You're not thrilled when the electrical storm that's been stimulating your brain begins to dissipate. However, you're eager to take the intellectual buzz of these past few days and use it to imagine how your future could turn out. But you're not as interested in the practical logistics that lurk close by in the shadows. Try not to fight against your current destiny, even if it contains an overload of calendars and appointments. A late night Mercury-Uranus connection could bring brilliant insights while also keeping you up past your bedtime. True genius never sleeps.

You might finally get the respite you crave as the demands of work begin to settle down today. However, you can't assume that this less hectic pace will last for long. Thankfully, an illuminating Mercury-Uranus trine clears away your uncertainty with one momentary lightning-like flash of awareness. Even after the darkness returns, you'll know exactly what to do. Your epiphany sticks with you once you see the situation in a bright new light.

A renewed interest in getting ahead at work grabs your attention today but you're not driven to see results right away. Instead, your strategy is based upon gradual progress as the plodding Taurus Moon enters your 10th House of Career. Nevertheless, a wave of urgency emboldens you to ride high on new ideas as they begin sparking connections in your brain later in the day. Just make sure that your enthusiasm doesn't leave your resources depleted. Let go of the things you can't change while focusing on those you can.

You may spend a fair amount of time today mulling over recent events and trying to determine your next move. However, initiating action is not as high on your priority list as making a concrete plan for the future. Paradoxically, your practicality relaxes your mind, helping you to see the problem from a totally new point of view. A slow and steady approach ends up saving the day with an unexpected solution. A break from your routine offers you the fresh perspective you need.

If you've been running at the speed of light, it feels great to be able to slow down and take a few deep breaths. You might even get a bit lazy and try to avoid interacting with others. Although you may downplay your social involvement today, events will continue to vie for your attention until you acquiesce and participate more fully. The good news is that intelligent Mercury's fortunate trine to brilliant Uranus indicates that stepping beyond your comfort zone now will likely bring surprising rewards.

Following your bliss would be the natural and easy thing to do today if it wasn't for other people's expectations. The demands of a partner or coworker might seem excessive, especially if they hijack your personal agenda. Although you are tempted to lay everything on the line and choose one path over the other, it's wiser to take a less extreme approach until later in the day. Clever thoughts and witty repartee enable you to talk about your dilemma without necessarily upsetting anyone along the way.

Although the idea of less involvement with others sounds great today, you might find it challenging to retreat into your private world. Nevertheless, you have a specific list of chores to finish and you don't want to be distracted by everyone else. Thankfully, you can accomplish an amazing amount of work in a very short time if you concentrate on your goals. Mental Mercury's trine to ingenious Uranus in your 5th House of Creativity triggers so much innovative thinking that you will emerge the hero with time left over for rest and relaxation.

Your ability to filter out extraneous noise makes you an excellent problem solver today. However, you could be pulled into someone else's drama if your boundaries are undefined. Your smartest strategy now is to withdraw from conflict as soon as you see it coming. Signing on the dotted line is best postponed until others are more willing to negotiate. Wait until your intuition grows stronger later in the day and new insights reveal surprisingly simple ways to resolve an existing issue. It is the journey, not the destination, that matters.

Think clearly, speak slowly and remain patient in order to calmly get your message across today. However, your certainty could be problematic if you're unwilling to listen to the feedback you receive. Fortunately, an inventive Mercury-Uranus trine helps you leap over any obstacles created by your own stubbornness. If you can remain open-minded, effective communication becomes the key to your personal success story.

You could easily overstep your bounds today, defending an indefensible position. Luckily, a crafty Mercury-Uranus trine enables you to smooth ruffled feathers by providing solutions that seem to come out of the blue. Although it might be exhilarating to stretch the limits by provoking others with your unconventional ideas, it's wiser to step back when you get close to the edge of a cliff. Remember, you're most convincing when you calmly address one subject at a time instead of overloading others with too much information. How you deliver your message makes all the difference in the world.

You're passionate about helping your friends any way you can today. You might go out of your way to nurse someone who isn't feeling well or attempt to solve a problem for a colleague. However, you must be careful about asserting yourself so vehemently that your behavior seems aggressive without you realizing it. Nevertheless, you can play the role of the Good Samaritan as long as you are sensitive to the needs of others. Be sure that your assistance is wanted before you choose to get involved. Poet T.S. Eliot wrote, "Most of the evil in this world is done by people with good intentions."

You could set yourself up for disappointment today by expecting your friends to come to your rescue. It may seem obvious, but your chances of receiving the support you seek are negligible unless you actually ask for help. However, you might make the mistake of assuming that others know you so well that you don't have to say a word; they should just intuitively sense what you need. It's a shame when the things that are on your mind and in your heart never reach your lips. Psychic connections can be real, but it's unfair to blame anyone else if you don't try to bridge the gulf yourself.

Your words have the power to heal today, but they also have the power to hurt as communicator Mercury forms a stressful aspect to vulnerable Chiron. The difference between a positive message and a negative one has less to do with the words you use than it does with your attitude. Although your thoughts are often restless, you can be as steady as a rock now when it comes to setting the agenda for the day. Others rely on you more than you realize when roads are rough and the journey uncertain.

Your listening skills are legendary; it's as if you can find meaning from the momentary silences between the words. The more attentive you are now, the more information you derive from what's not being said. Thankfully, your psychic powers are especially strong today as long as you know when to be quiet and simply observe the energy of others. Remember, you don't have to fill up all the empty spaces with noisy chatter. All you need to do is show up with an open heart; your emotional receptivity allows the universe to do the rest.

You might choose to make a big deal about how much you support someone's great idea. However, you're likely to be more judgmental now that the Moon and Venus are locked into an uncomfortable square. Rather than trying to undo a pattern in another person's life, observe your reactions without doing anything drastic yet. Fortunately, you gain strength as the day progresses and you will outgrow your need to fix anyone's problems. Instead, shift your focus back to your own life by finding the determination and energy to make your dreams come true.

You're not completely upfront with your feelings today. You know that there is more going on behind your polite smile than you care to share with anyone. Paradoxically, the less you say, the more people understand you. Some thoughts don't fit into the regular flow of conversation and forcing the subject can do more harm than good. Pick your discussion topics carefully and save the others for a rainy day. In the meantime, keeping the emotional drama to a minimum makes everyone happier now.

You may feel a bit confused at work today, making it difficult to set goals and put a long-term plan into action. Even if you are clear about which direction you're heading now, you might wonder if you'll ever achieve success when it comes to your worldly ambitions. Fortunately, as you work on resolving your own issues of self-esteem, you can positively impact others with your willingness to grow and change. Surprisingly, healing yourself turns out to be contagious if you set an example for others to follow.

Sometimes your creativity flows naturally, but you may experience a mental block when trying to express yourself today. One way to get the energy moving again is to shake up your routine. Approaching your work from an entirely different angle could be the catalyst you need in order to get back in a groove of productivity. Nevertheless, your desire for consistency grows throughout the day and you might choose to return to an earlier method once you've recaptured your sense of spontaneity. Exploring all your options opens your eyes to possibilities you never imagined.

Childhood memories could seem so real today that they strangely influence the present moment. You may remember a time when you felt misunderstood or rejected by your family. Although you can't go back and change the past, you can use these recollections to fuel your relationship dynamics now. Instead of approaching an emotional confrontation with a sense of dread, access your compassion to help others resolve their personal pain. It is said that all healing is essentially a release from fear. The light of love conquers the darkness.

You might have suffered as a youngster because of communication struggles within your family. Even as an adult, you may still contend with issues around cultivating emotional connections with those you love. Although a current misunderstanding could stimulate a cascade of memories, you have a chance to elevate your self-esteem and let go of any old patterns that continue to hold you back. You can't change what has already happened, so focus on the future instead of replaying your past. Author Robert Green Ingersoll said, "Hope is the only bee that makes honey without flowers."

Although you appear quite animated in your interactions with others today, your spirited style might actually be camouflaging a painful issue. Emotional wounds from your childhood may still do a number on your sense of self-worth. Paradoxically, acknowledging your insecurities is a strength rather than a weakness. Sharing your process of self-discovery and healing can inspire others more than you realize. Poet Khalil Gibran wrote, "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls."

Your drive to become a healer in your own right may be motivated by remembering experiences of rejection. Learning how to assimilate your personal history into your current circumstances is a continuing source of emotional growth. Taking a risk within a relationship now might seem like a daunting task, but you possess a strength of conviction that enables you to tell the story about your wound in a way that helps others. Remember, past failures are often the openings into your best and most beautiful parts if you're willing to explore your vulnerability.

A slow start to your work today could lead to never-ending frustration, especially if you have a long list of things to do. Nevertheless, you're spinning your wheels without making much headway and it might even seem as if the harder you try to get traction now, the slower your progress. Fortunately, patience pays off and production that was stalled earlier begins to roll along later in the day. However, your expectations may rise just as fast as your confidence. You can avoid setting yourself up for failure by establishing realistic goals and relying on your sense of humor to provide comic relief along the way.

An emotional conflict early in the day might leave you with unresolved anger later on. You are annoyed with your performance if you freeze in the heat of an argument, leaving important things unsaid. Nevertheless, your perspective on the interaction changes once the Moon shifts from your sign to the adaptable realms of airy Gemini. Although you may nurse hurt feelings for a little while, a fresh breeze blows through your life, enabling you to move on without harboring any ill will. There's no reason to hang onto the past when the future looks so good; there are no regrets in life, just lessons.

You've been hiding in the shadows for too long and are now ready to come out of your shell. Thankfully, your world lightens up once the reflective Moon enters your sign this afternoon. It's as if the storm clouds suddenly disappear, leaving blue sky in every direction. However, dwelling on your feelings today only slows you down. Sometimes you need to stop and listen to your heart, but now it's time for bold action. Adventure awaits and the sooner you step into your future, the shorter your journey will be.

You're slightly uncertain about your next move, even if there appears to be a reward -- monetary or emotional -- heading your way. You are not in such a rush now and may prefer to slow your pace for the sake of simplicity. You assume the good news will still be there when you arrive, even if it takes a few more days to collect on the cosmic goodies. Thankfully, your logic is sound and it might make sense to postpone any major push forward until the Moon reaches your sign on Saturday. According to a Welsh proverb, "More the hurry, more the obstacles."

It's as if you are in a sailboat trying to reach your destination but the breeze isn't blowing in your direction. Thankfully, a change in the cosmic weather fills your sails today and propels you along your way. But don't assume the winds will remain steady, for the flighty Gemini Moon is capricious in nature. Just as you get accustomed to one feeling, there's another unexpected shift. Fortunately, being prepared for the instability in the air enables you to be more adaptable when plotting your course. Be stubborn about your goals, but flexible about your methods.

Just as you are ready to settle into a wave of stability in your life, another round of changing dynamics requires your undivided attention on the job front. You rather enjoyed the temporary peace and quiet, but now you must respond to the noise as the Moon flies into interactive Gemini and your 10th House of Public Life. It's nearly impossible to retreat to a space where you can simply focus on your work. Treat the distractions as a harmless test of your patience and willpower. Thankfully, annoyance transforms to optimism as the evening approaches and you can see how much you managed to accomplish in spite of everything.

After a morning of inner stress or outer disagreements, you're quite happy when the resistance fades and you're back in a groove. It takes quite a bit to push you to the point of fueling a conflict, but you might not be satisfied with the way things are going now. Don't slip into denial; the adage, "no pain, no gain" could be your mantra while the Moon is still camped out in obstinate Taurus. Thankfully, your awareness of the current dynamics catalyzes changes later in the day that enable you to regroup and reestablish your center of gravity.

It might feel as if people are pushing back at your every move. Even your casual comments seem to elicit negative responses from those close to you. Naturally, you prefer support rather than opposition, but it's best if you don't stir the pot needlessly. Happily, the emotional climate changes when the stubborn Taurus Moon enters curious Gemini and your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Paradoxically, your conversations flow easier even as the emotional intensity increases. As George Bernard Shaw wrote, "The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place."

Your optimism soars on its own wings today, even if there's nothing in your world that changes other than your perspective. Fortunately, your attitude is within your control and when you shift your thinking in a positive direction, everything in the outer world shifts with it. But this is not about ignoring the truth; it's about using your imagination to create a path to a better future. If every thought you think is actively altering your destiny, it's wise to mainly focus on manifesting your dreams.

Although you may encounter a few stumbling blocks today, your pragmatic outlook and sheer determination empower you to accomplish your goals. But rather than resting on your laurels, you aren't content with your achievements as expansive Jupiter tempts you to set even higher standards. You might not be able to turn off your restless mind when it's seeking new lands to conquer, but you can moderate your ambition with emotional awareness. Reaching for higher ground is admirable, but don't forget to give yourself time to enjoy the fruits of your labor along the way.

You might realize that you can't avoid confronting a lingering issue head-on today. Your impatience reaches a boiling point as the Moon shifts into fickle Gemini and your 5th House of Self-Expression, compelling you to make your move. It seems as if the main obstacles are now gone. In fact, there's no resistance at all when you speak directly from your heart. But talk is cheap; you must follow up your message with decisive action. As the saying goes, "Do it today or regret it tomorrow."

The luxury of reveling in a past accomplishment is over. You must demonstrate to everyone that a recent success was not a fluke or a flash in the pan. But you have more options now than you did before and your next victory or failure will be a result of the path you pick today. Unfortunately, you never know for sure where the road of life will lead. Nevertheless, it's wise to make decisions based upon facts rather than fantasies. You might be free to make certain choices, but you're not free from the consequences of your choice.

You might feel like your world has grown larger than life, and significant portions of your creativity are out of your control. However, a period of intense upheaval is already slipping into the past and you need to follow through by initiating changes at work. Extending your spheres of influence could affect your relationships, especially with those in your immediate environment. Ultimately, you may have to play your cards sooner than later and reveal your intentions. If you want something, don't wish for it; life is too short to wait.

You're picking up some very strange signals today that could easily distract you from your goals. You might even think you've become slightly unhinged if you can't make heads or tails out of your current experience, but there's really nothing to worry about at all. Nevertheless, sharing your inner conflicts without expecting anything in exchange is enough to the get the balling rolling in your direction. "Dream big, start small" is your motto for success.

It's best to unfold your story gradually today but you're too anxious to share your best-kept secrets. Unfortunately, your spontaneous disclosure won't make you feel any better, and might emotionally agitate others in your circle of friends. Nevertheless, initiating a conversation about a subject dear to your heart brings a smile to your face. But it's not enough to steal a moment or two of happiness; you long for a much more meaningful exchange. Don't be afraid to reach back into the recesses of your mind and talk about something that truly matters with someone who truly cares.

The very things that have been blocking your path seem to quickly fade into the past today. Although you might not be ready to swing into action yet, circumstances can force your hand. If someone does something that annoys you now, you won't be able to just sit quietly because you feel the need to even the score immediately. There's nothing wrong with standing up for yourself as long as you take a few minutes to fine-tune your message. Julian Assange writes, "Every time we witness an injustice and do not act, we train our character to be passive."

A social cause might have you so fired up today that you can't help but jump up on your soapbox and speak out. Sometimes it takes a lot to grab your attention, but you're hooked now and won't be able to move on until you respond to this important issue. However, your straightforward reaction opens a portal into a parallel universe; nothing goes according to your plan. It's understandable if everything gets strange for a while; thankfully, it won't last long. There's no reason to resist the weird energies that are coming to the surface. Live life to express, not impress.

You want to take care of business today, but responsibilities on the home front could interfere with your busy schedule. Rather than sharing your predicament with anyone, you prefer to keep your worries to yourself until you fulfill your commitments. Only after you honor your promises will you feel comfortable discussing your difficulties about your job performance. Nevertheless, you don't have to wait; the sooner you reveal your vulnerability, the faster you'll receive much-needed advice. Share your burden and lighten your load.

Relationships with your friends and associates are complicated today because sparks may fly over agendas that are not really in conflict. However, it might seem as if the disagreement is irresolvable until you start to delve deeper. Magnetic Venus receives an intensity booster from potent Pluto that could send you spiraling into the darkness, but this is an unexpected blessing since you could discover a misplaced rainbow. Whatever happens, don't relinquish your power; ultimately, nothing can stand in the way of your truth.

You may have so much work on your plate now that you just want to escape through the nearest exit. But you're not usually one to run out on something that's unfinished. Nevertheless, you can stir up a hornet's nest if your unexpressed anger gets the best of you. Instead of waiting until it's too late, lay your feelings out on the table. That which is seen is much easier to work with than that which you marginalize or pretend is not there. Although total denial isn't a sensible strategy, be cautious as you open the door to the unknown.

You're pushing into new territory these days and you won't be able to continue looking in your rear view mirror for long. Even if you're feeling nostalgic today, you can't just slip into your time machine and dial up powerful experiences from the past. Nevertheless, you can bring old memories forward into the present moment. In the final analysis, you have a chance to rewrite your personal story in a way that positively impacts your future. Thankfully, once you're aware of your own history, you're blessed with the opportunity to change it.

You have many little tasks to do today and you're not sure how you will get them all done. However, you can accomplish a lot in a very small amount of time if you put your heart and soul into your work. You grow motivated to find answers to larger questions about your life as you watch your friends sink deeper into Pluto's mysterious realms. There's no logical reason to fear the unknown, but then again, you're required to leave your rational thoughts behind. As Albert Einstein said, "Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere."

A relationship at work grows messy today as someone stops walking their talk. You don't know whether or not to trust the words you hear, or to only pay attention to their actions. Unfortunately, cerebral Mercury dynamically squares warrior Mars, bending you out of shape and reminding you to be prepared for anything you might face. You're primed to do something you will regret unless you move through the day with great intention. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of care.

You may have plenty to do at home today, but your job duties must come first. Thankfully, you are particularly adept at juggling all the components of your life now. Although you might want to do everything at once, the only way you'll get through the day with flying colors is to make a detailed list of exactly what you want to accomplish. Narrowing your attention is an absolute must. The more you focus on your priorities, the greater your chances of finishing everything in a timely manner.

Sticking with your original intention might be tricky today as rationality overpowers your feelings. Flying by the seat of your pants usually gives you the ability to make the most of the changing circumstances because you can modify your plans on a moment's notice. But you can't get away with cavalier behavior now and must commit to a specific schedule. Stop resisting the inevitable; practicing self-discipline is for your own good.

You may feel the weight of responsibility lift from your shoulders today, especially if you stop and take a few deep breaths of relief. You are back in your element as mental Mercury shifts into earthy Virgo, emphasizing your natural tendency to be stable and sensible. Although your unexpressed feelings linger, you no longer need to say everything that's on your mind. Those who don't understand your self-restraint will never understand what motivates you to speak.

It seems as if someone has grabbed the controls and is playing with the volume knob in your imagination. You Twins are exceptionally attuned to your key planet Mercury and its entry into Virgo creates a power surge in your brain. Your dilemma is that just because your thinking is louder today, doesn't mean that it's better. You must carefully consider what you say and what you keep to yourself. Sometimes, consciously choosing a little solitude is enough to calm your soul.

You are returning to a familiar place today as Luna cycles back into your sign. Since you Crabs are so attuned to the pull of the Moon, you might be moodier than others now. Although you're quite comfortable with your temporary emotional withdrawal, people may misinterpret your retreat and ask you what's wrong. Let them know that you just need some space to sit with your own feelings, without having to verbalize them to anyone else. As Ram Dass says, "The quieter you become, the more you can hear."

You may observe that one of your inner voices is muted today as verbose Mercury leaves your sign. Although this exit from lively Leo and entry into timid Virgo won't necessarily have a huge impact on your life, you might not be as quick to express your thoughts. You can derive great benefit now from your newly found ability to filter out the excess noise, both within your own head and what comes out of your mouth. The Dalai Lama reminds us, "Silence is sometimes the best answer."

It's time to step out of the shadow and into the light. Consider sharing your thoughts with those close to you, especially if you recently danced around the edges of the truth. Pensive Mercury is busy in your sign until October 7, bringing you a heightened sense of your own analytical process. Use these days wisely to strengthen your logic and research your area of expertise. Learn to politely say no to anything that doesn't fit in with your current trajectory. Setting boundaries is an essential element to self-care.

You're inclined to demonstrate your ability to nurture others by performing random acts of kindness. However, your actions may not be fully aligned with your heart today. This gulf between your thoughts and your emotions prompts you to remain unresponsive. Unfortunately, this dilemma can result in unexpressed anger, pouting or even passive-aggressive behavior. As difficult as it sounds, try to keep your true feelings close to the surface, especially around those you trust. Authenticity is your friend.

It's as if you are awakening from a deep sleep today; your mental clarity seems sharper than it has been in a while. Suddenly, you are thinking more about the future than the present. This is especially true at work, where you can refocus your intentions on longer-range goals, rather than just putting in the hours. Make use of the analytical powers that you now have at your disposal and apply this logic to all walks of your life. As Wayne Dyer wrote, "Our intention creates our reality."

You are being pulled in two opposing directions now. Your mind is quickly becoming more discriminating and detail oriented, but you still prefer to be thinking about the entire universe. You might grow anxious when you realize that you must concentrate on the minute particulars instead of the global picture. However, if you can focus on your specific role in the community, there will be real payoffs just around the corner. Think cosmically, act locally.

A major change is occurring in your outlook on life that could positively impact the next couple of months. Since Capricorn is an earth sign, Mercury's current shift into earthy Virgo means you Mountain Goats are receiving an intellectual zap that you can put to good use. You're thinking in a more pragmatic manner, but you may encounter unexpected challenges today. You must continue to widen your perspective or you might end up feeling mentally blocked. It has been said that the mind is like a parachute in that it works best when it is open.

You can't get away with your typical quirkiness now. However, it's not likely you're going to change overnight. It's just that circumstances are going to keep calling you back to the details you would rather forget. There's no escape; swallow your annoyance with reality and try to get the unpleasant tasks out of the way so you can put your attention toward things of greater interest. Determination and discipline lead to success.

It's a mixed bag for you soft-hearted Fish today. The Moon's shift into watery Cancer enables you to be nourished by the emotional richness that is reentering your life. The problem is there are deep feelings that you are afraid to share now. Fortunately, if you are willing to face your fears straight on, you may just discover that you will accelerate into the future. Your life is an adventure that's waiting to begin, so open your heart and see what happens.

You may be hesitant to share your feelings with anyone outside of your family today. Simultaneously, you begin to think about trying something completely different, and this might require you to talk openly about your newfound interests. Unfortunately, you could draw the anger of someone who is intimidated by your defiant behavior. Nevertheless, your radical approach to romance now opens the way for new forms of love. Sometimes you need to rock your world when it comes to matters of the heart.

A high-frequency energy can make you jumpy today and uncertain about the choices ahead. However, you're mostly concerned with the unreliability of other people now. Nevertheless, your key planet Venus harmonizes with wild Uranus, pumping up your potential for pleasure. Don't just act on every crazy feeling; instead cut through all the hype and apply your adrenaline where it will be most productive. Channel your enthusiasm into your art.

You're ready for an out-of-the-box experience today. But rather than knowing what you want to do, you might be open to the unexpected as long as it brings you a thrilling sense of adventure. Nevertheless, you are probably holding onto something or someone from the past while the Moon travels through tenacious Cancer. It's a tricky dance when you're being pulled in two completely different directions, but the rewards are great if you can keep your balance while staying in motion.

You are not restrained by your usual concerns today as adorable Venus aligns with antsy Uranus. Your eccentric tastes seem endearing to others now, allowing you to say whatever you want -- even if it's more than you initially intended to share. Paradoxically, the Moon's current visit to your self-protective sign prompts you to withdraw into the security of your emotional shell. Instead of worrying about what others think, use this time for constructive self-reflection. In Aristotle's words, "Contemplation is the highest form of activity."

Your nerves are stretched taut today, but feeling on edge can be quite thrilling if a pleasant surprise comes out of the blue. Sassy Venus in your playful sign forms a thrilling trine to experimental Uranus, rapidly replacing yesterday's peace and quiet with new forms of pleasure and unexpectedly delightful connections. The only difference between fear and excitement is your attitude. Free your mind and the fun will follow.

Your uncharacteristic rebellious behavior puts everyone on notice today that you're not willing to play by their arbitrary rules. You're attracted to the unusual as sexy Venus conspires with quirky Uranus in your 8th House of Intimacy. Instead of clinging to past memories, find the exhilaration in recognizing that you are emotionally free to express your true desires in the present moment. You only live once.

You want more freedom now than you previously experienced in a relationship. Enchanting Venus trines unorthodox Uranus in your 7th House of Others, suggesting that you can smile through the resistance you encounter in your pursuit of pleasure. Even if you try to minimize your needs, you won't be able to contain yourself for long now. Tell others about your desires while your charisma is charming and disarming. Sometimes you need to rock the boat in order to get what you want.

You may be able to successfully persuade someone to join your exploration of the unusual today. Your unconventional tastes are blown out of proportion when seductive Venus trines irrepressible Uranus. Although the passive Cancer Moon tempts you to withdraw emotionally, this is a chance to express what you want because your anticipation of breakthrough is greater than your fear of rejection. No risk, no reward.

It's tempting to set logic aside while you pursue the fun and frivolous today. Flirty Venus in theatrical Leo prompts you to tell everyone the wishes of your heart. The Planet of Love's smooth trine with rowdy Uranus stirs up irrepressible desires. Your provocative behavior makes you even more intriguing to others now. Luckily, you can have a blast breaking a few social rules without getting into too much trouble. Play safe and there will be no regrets tomorrow.

Anything is possible in love now, but there may be some stormy weather along the way. Your confidence might suffer but your hard work will bring you the results you desire as shocking Uranus harmoniously trines romantic Venus in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Don't be discouraged; the resistance you face is really a gift that reveals your current weaknesses. Trust your intuition because your momentary flashes of creative insight will open a portal to the future.

You are eager to display your affection for a loved one today. However, your attractions are quite unpredictable as vivacious Venus harmonizes with weird Uranus. Potential pleasure tempts you to step beyond your normal limits, offering you an exhilarating and liberating experience. Sensuality and sexuality can be intoxicating, so be sure to treat your feelings and those of your partner with the respect they deserve.

You might try to convince everyone that everything is normal today, but clearly it is not. Although you are usually sensitive when sharing your feelings, you may forget to check in with others now in your haste to make your point. Seeking new ways to express your creativity could lead you to completely shake up your schedule while electric Uranus zaps lovable Venus in your 6th House of Daily Routine. Chaos is your secret key to happiness.

There's so much going on in your life now that it's difficult to know where to even begin. The paradox is that you really should be completing unfinished business before you launch any new projects. But if you shirk your commitments, reality will grab your attention fast and you'll be back in the starting gate before you know it. Nevertheless, give yourself permission to be a beginner when you try something for the first time. Your fear of making mistakes is not a valid reason to give up if you're learning along the way. Martial artist Bruce Lee said, "In great attempts it is glorious even to fail."
