Someone attractive could lure you off your path today, but you can avoid complications with a simple "No thank you." Nevertheless, you still might regret something you did yesterday as a result of taking your feelings too far. Actually, everything you do now could have significant ramifications in your life, even if you think it's trivial in the moment. But there's still room for trouble when things are going your way. Stay cool, calm and collected, because your perseverance won't let you down.

You're hesitant to do anything out of the ordinary today while strict Saturn is watching your every move. Normally, you're happy to make new connections and get projects started on your own. Thankfully, the Sun's trine to Saturn in your 7th House of Others also helps you build stability in relationships. Taking a calculated risk makes a great deal of sense since you can open your heart, hopes, and even your wallet without fear of serious loss now. When fears are grounded, dreams take flight.

You're looking to stabilize your routine now and hope to make good progress toward your goals. Your mind is exceptionally well organized and you can accomplish a lot today, even when emotional drama returns in the form of a power struggle. Fortunately, the Sun's smooth trine to ethical Saturn means that your emotional honesty is more important than anything else now. Even if you're tempted to take the easy way out, succumbing to indulgent behavior will only distract you from the work of being yourself. As C.S. Louis wrote, "Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching."

Recent decisions that may be shaking your life awake now are reaffirmed by a series of highly positive aspects. Controlling Saturn trines the Sun in your dramatic sign today, enabling you to exhibit restraint, patience and self-discipline. Scattering your forces is fun for a while, but it won't produce the lasting results you desire. Save your best shot for the target you really want to hit.

It feels as if party time is here and you want to pack the most pleasure you can into a short period of time. Romance and fantasy trump reality in a friendly atmosphere where work feels like play. Join others in a collective effort to spruce up a common area or experiment with expressing your creativity on the job. Measurable results will come eventually, but the keyword is fun for now.

Your ambivalence doesn't mean that you don't care; it means that you are preoccupied with considering multiple options. You may be coming down from an amazing experience where your mind was operating free of social restraints. But the Sun conspires with restrictive Saturn today, preventing you from acting on your newfound wisdom. This constraint creates a split where your head pulls one way and your heart another. Don't force the issue now, even if you are questioning the status quo. Patience is your greatest teacher if you're willing to listen.

Don't let anyone talk you out of your perceptions today just because stern Saturn is giving you a sobering view of reality. There's no need to waste time worrying about little uncertainties while you're standing on such solid ground. Act on the strength of your convictions now. But remember that power is a double-edged sword and you could inadvertently hurt someone by brandishing it unconsciously. Play for keeps, but do it with awareness and humility.

Your appetite for pleasure is strong today and following the road of excess is a very real possibility. But it's prudent to restrain your indulgences if you want to avoid expensive surprises. An object of your desire (whether a person, activity or thing) may not be worth as much as you think. It's hard to turn off your attraction to excitement, so a bit of adult supervision and moderation is recommended to keep you within reasonable bounds.

It's not about the clothing you wear or how you do your hair; it's more about what attitude you decide to put on for the day. If you choose to show a confident but humble demeanor, real progress will be yours. Your organizational skills are functioning at peak performance and you won't waste any energy as long as you act with great authority and determination. You will be recognized for your hard work if you persevere with prudence and consistency. Shine your light so brightly that others can see their way out of the dark.

A coherent presentation of your goals offers the likelihood for success. The Sun in your 10th House of Career creates an easy trine with ambitious Saturn, allowing you to capitalize on your previous experience. Work toward building things that will endure, for Saturn's law suggests that you will get what you earn. The climb to the top of the mountain is long, yet the best way to ensure that you reach your destination is to initiate strategic action right now.

You are the master of your own universe today with a strong sense of your personal identity. Fortunately, you possess an unshakeable willingness to do what's necessary to achieve your goals. You have the resolve to cut through social chatter, establish clear priorities and take care of your business. Following a concrete plan and eliminating distractions empower your position of authority and can earn you respect and admiration from others. Don't just look at the stars, be one.

Your plans may need to be changed at the last-minute if unfulfilled commitments still require your undivided attention. Be as generous as possible when responding to the expectations of others, regardless of how inconvenient it is for you. Luckily, the playful Leo New Moon occurs in your 5th House of Spontaneity, giving you a chance to catch your breath from dealing with the larger issue of restoring balance to your life. Instead of seeking alternate solutions, focus your energy on making the present moment meaningful for everyone involved.

You enjoy an ideal balance of enthusiasm and skill when the generous Leo New Moon triggers your 4th House of Domestic Conditions to bring joy, drama, and inspiration to your personal life. A smooth trine to reliable Saturn provides you with the tools you need to give substance to your new ideas. Brightening up your home and focusing on your family life motivate you to also act more creatively outside the house. From small beginnings come great things.

Self-restraint may be a challenge when your restlessness provokes rash behavior, but there's too much at stake to prematurely risk your current position while pursuing castles in the air. The fixed Leo New Moon rattles your 3rd House of Communication, but plans can fall apart as grandiose declarations fail to live up to your expectations. New ideas that excite your mind also require careful consideration before you launch into a full-fledged campaign. Your ability to rally people to your cause is strong, but make sure the emotional cost is worth it.

Make sure the foundation is solid before you commit to anyone's brilliant plan; otherwise, you might wind up cleaning up someone else's mess. The creative Leo New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Finances to help you cook up moneymaking ideas. Luckily, you can combine the Lion's bold behavior with your strong organizational skills today. Your inner dedication and discipline ultimately reward you with greater income and a healthy sense of pride.

There are no easy answers to life's complex questions now, yet, simply knowing this secret can alleviate much of your pressure. The courageous Leo New Moon may be the cosmic turning point you need. Many previously unrelated events appear to reach a confluence as the separate strands of reality are woven together to change the course of your life. Even if recent distractions were exciting at times, you haven't progress toward your goals as much as you intended. Seize the moment because some opportunities don't knock twice.

Connecting with your inner guidance and having faith in your vision of a brighter future are two keys to your personal growth. The expressive Leo New Moon energizes your 12th House of Privacy, where its flames of creativity may be hidden from view. Nourish your hopes quietly, instead of advertising them too soon. Nevertheless, realizing the need to delve into your own imagination enables you to discover how past experiences are still affecting your current choices. Your spiritual journey isn't an easy one, but the possible ramifications of your metaphysical quest can be life-altering if you're willing to do the work.

You are more eager than ever to engage in clever conversations or flirtatious behavior today. But you might find yourself lost in a crowd as the dramatic Leo New Moon activates your 11th House of Social Networking. You may be quite rigid in your thinking today because Leo is a fixed sign. You don't want to just go with the flow. You have an agenda in mind and are determined to stick to it, even if progress is temporarily slow. As journalist Jim Watkins wrote, "A river cuts through a rock not because of its power, but its persistence."

Your professional life receives a boost of energy when the expressive Leo New Moon highlights your 10th House of Career, perhaps earning you greater public recognition. You are willing to go the extra mile and can ensure the viability of your dream with careful research and planning. Setting your own standards of excellence, along with a sustainable pace, improves your chances of reaching the top of almost any mountain.

You are inspired to take more risks now -- perhaps seeking a more prestigious job or even starting a business on your own. The demonstrative Leo New Moon fuels your expansive 9th House of Future Vision, widening your horizons and revealing new opportunities to distinguish yourself in your chosen profession. You are not interested in mediocrity; you are motivated to succeed even when you face difficulties or setbacks. When it comes to your career, don't take no for an answer.

Instead of seeking someone who always agrees with you, find a trustworthy partner who cares enough to tell you the unvarnished truth. You will need the honest feedback because the brassy Leo New Moon in your 8th House of Transformation pushes you to take bold steps forward in both your personal and professional relationships. A steady trine to workhorse Saturn supplies the initiative and dogged determination to build something that lasts. Success can't be hurried; Rome wasn't built in a day.

A reliable colleague shows you how to keep your passion flowing now without burning out. Fortunately, the audacious Leo New Moon blesses your 7th House of Partners, bringing a wave of self-confidence, reinforced by the support of friends and coworkers. The extravagant ideas of your allies and the originality of your own proposals gain credibility from a solid trine to realistic Saturn that provides the follow-through to turn your plans into reality. Thankfully, hard work is child's play when you do it for a cause or project you fully believe in.

There is a rare opportunity to share your idealism with your colleagues today, but without a solid plan your hopes are likely to go up in smoke. The Leo New Moon lands in your 6th House of Work and Service, sparking your enthusiasm for learning new skills or encouraging you to seek more fulfilling employment. A growing desire to express more creativity on the job can inspire you to take up a new hobby. Don't be afraid of the power of your dreams; observe what magically floats into your awareness so you can integrate it into your everyday life.

Your heart is focusing on such a big prize now that people may ridicule you and accuse you of wasting your energy. Nevertheless, you could have the last laugh when you make your fantasy come true. Although you might be operating with an optimistic outlook on life now, holding a vision in your mind's eye reinforces the image in your brain. Your path to success is not a straight one. Dream it and then do everything in your power to make it happen.

You typically prefer to keep your feelings to yourself, but are inexplicably compelled to express them now. You realize that your desires may lose their power once you share them with someone else. Nevertheless, your logic isn't strong enough today to overcome your irrational need to receive approval from others. Tread carefully as you traverse this tricky ground. You're likely to court a rejection if you reveal too much, which ends up being a self-fulfilling prophecy. There's no need to perform a song and dance when the only person you must prove anything to is yourself.

Everything seems to be slightly out of focus today as you explore a variety of approaches to rein in the energy. However, the more you try to regain control, the more daunting the task appears. Instead of looking at your world and seeing it as an obstacle course to be conquered, imagine that it's a dance to music you've never heard before. You must let go of your need to make intellectual sense of the events and just operate directly from the longing in your heart.

You have big ideas about what you want to accomplish today and are not interested in reconsidering your goals. Unfortunately, your self-esteem could suffer if you just assume that everything will work out as you imagine. Coworkers might resist your plans, thinking theirs are better. Nevertheless, you have an excellent chance of reaching your goals if you set your sights with accuracy and are tenacious in your pursuit of success.

Giving up is tricky business, especially if you're so close to tasting success. Nevertheless, you might feel as if your choices are limited if you're not making any apparent progress. However, what you see is not what you get; there's a whole wide world of action that is sitting behind the veils of illusion. There's no urgency to sort it all out today; just keep one foot moving in front of the other. Taking little steps is better than taking none at all.

You appear to be an armchair general today, issuing commands from the safety of your own castle. Nevertheless, your goal might be nothing short of world domination. However, mysterious forces are working behind the scenes to ensure a positive outcome, even to your misdirected intentions. Rather than trying to control everything in order to hide how little you understand the cosmic forces at work, open yourself to the spiritual lessons at hand.  Remember, the power of now contains the consequences of the future. Love is stronger than fear.

You might feel as if you're bumping up against walls, but every time you lean against a structure, it disappears into thin air. Your key planet Venus forms an otherworldly aspect with the keeper of the three-dimensional world, Saturn, informing you that this is not another typical day at the office. You must choose your battles wisely because you do not possess the energy to fight them all. Play a game of elimination until your priorities become clear. Focus on your goal; don't look in any direction but ahead.

You have your mind set on a fixed goal today and will not rest easy until your work is done. You intuitively realize that you have run out of discretionary time. Your clocks have suddenly been reset and are now ticking in a parallel universe where time can flow in many different directions simultaneously. Fortunately, this means you still have the opportunity to get your work done. Paradoxically, there is not a moment to spare. Get out of the rat race by stepping off the hamster wheel; give your body a chance to recuperate and then fearlessly try again.

You are willing to take on anyone or anything that stands in your way. Mars and Saturn, the bad boys of astrology, are camped out in your 1st House of Personality now, giving you an irrepressible drive that is fueled by unrelenting determination. However, it's a smart idea to check your bearings one more time before you head off in the wrong direction. You can manifest real magic today as long as there's a sensible method behind your madness.

Sharing your feelings isn't enough today; you need to be overly dramatic to keep everyone's interest. Unfortunately, this conversation is less about a colorful presentation than it is about a heartfelt interaction. One-way communication feels empty; you might as well be talking to a wall. It's all about the feedback you receive that helps you clarify the fuzzy edges of your perceptions. The more you talk now, the more you need to listen.

You might surround yourself with people who are very enthusiastic today, but this doesn't give you permission to take the day off. In fact, you have an important role to play by assuming a responsible place within your community. You can keep your opinions cool, calm and collected for now, but will forfeit your objectivity over the next few days. Swinging into action too soon disperses your creative energy. Instead, observe it, sit with it and watch it transform.

You're either working extra hard today or you might just be putting on a show to impress everyone with your current role of authority. However, it can be lonely at the top and you could isolate yourself from those you love while establishing your position. It's challenging for you to see how other people perceive your energy; nevertheless, considering another person's perspective is a useful exercise to help you gain self-awareness. As Buddhist teacher Thich Nhat Hanh says, "Don't just do something, sit there!"

You could feel resentful if someone railroads you into doing something against your will. Nevertheless, you're ready to fight for what feels like your survival. In fact, it's hard to bury your anger any longer while combative Mars packs a punch today. But be careful not to overreact; the stakes are considerable and you will likely emerge the winner as long as you take the high road. Acting for the good of all is more soul-satisfying than selfishly attempting to garner more power or wealth for yourself.

You may be a bit thin-skinned today, even if everyone else seem tough as nails. Aggressive Mars creates a contentious connection with uncompromising Pluto that can turn a small disagreement into a serious quarrel. Nevertheless, your key planet Venus aligns with wounded Chiron, sensitizing you to the emotional vulnerability of others. Ideally, your delicate feelings give you the finesse to frame conflict in a loving light by establishing common ground as the basis of cooperation.

You can see that something's wrong with a relationship today and are ready to jump in and fix it. Although action-hero Mars is teaming up with penetrating Pluto, they have vastly different approaches to problem-solving. On one hand, you want to go for the quick solution. On the other hand, you're driven to get to the underlying source of the conflict and handle it once and for all. Whichever route you choose, be cautious since you could stir up resistance from others. As with all Pluto aspects, acting for the common good brings more emotional satisfaction than just striving for personal success.

A simple difference of opinion at work could grow into a major conflict today as militant Mars crosses swords with ruthless Pluto. Although you might think someone is bullying you, you could simply be caught in the crossfire between coworkers. If it's not your personal battle, establish clear boundaries and get out of the way. Even with good intentions, your high ideals may not be appreciated when belief systems collide. Every time you subtract negative from your life you make room for more positive.

You're the recipient of an extra boost of energy as boisterous Mars drives you to accomplish more at work today. Thankfully, a stressful situation can remind you to handle a delicate issue that you previously dodged. But expecting too much change all at once may be unrealistic, so look at making minor adjustments that have lasting impact. As Confucius said, "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones."

Maintaining a cool and calm approach helps you to manage an emotionally volatile situation today. Although you might not want to make compromises while being pressured by others, being rational is key to avoiding conflict. Practicing self-discipline and adopting a clear set of priorities empower you to promote your interests rather than getting sidetracked by someone else's agenda. Thinking about your actions in advance helps you decide where to hang on and where to let go.

You are a pro at finding your way back to center when the storms of change are swirling around you. Nevertheless, it's challenging to stand back from the intensity as different points of view clash around you now. An anxious aspect between aggressive Mars and relentless Pluto can tempt you to engage in an unnecessary power struggle before reaching your goal. Paying close attention to the interpersonal dynamics and your own emotional well-being enables you to moderate your energy so you don't exhaust yourself in the process.

Rather than getting caught up in an unwinnable struggle, focus on what you can do to positively influence long-term events. An internal conflict between your need for cash and your core values is unlikely to be resolved right away, yet your options should become clearer over time. Your key planets, warrior Mars and unyielding Pluto, are duking it out as opinions boil over with extreme points of view and little tolerance for dissent. Remember, managing your emotions is not about denial; it's about being honest in the way you express them.

You are riding a growing wave of enthusiasm now that fiery Mars is heating up your sign. His alignment with potent Pluto today dramatizes your desire to make measurable progress toward your goals. However, your sense of urgency can also destabilize interpersonal dynamics. Be careful about riding roughshod over someone else's wishes or you might accomplish your mission, only to find that you disenfranchised your best supporters along the way. You will be alright if you remember that compassion is passion with heart.

Sharing power can be tricky for you calculating Mountain goats, especially when a trusted ally seems to be harboring secrets. Tough-guy Mars is pushing against non-negotiable Pluto in your sign, triggering extreme reactions that make compromise a real challenge. Neutrality is elusive if unexpressed desires and hidden agendas are at work. Whatever happens, don't waste the potency of this cosmic force on trivial matters; instead, be a fierce warrior for a worthy cause that's close to your heart.

You're all set to challenge someone who uses self-righteousness as a justification to hold their beliefs over yours. In fact, the strength of your convictions can be inspirational if you don't promise too much or not enough. Unfortunately, the Goldilocks syndrome makes it difficult to get it just right. You may be motivated by irrational fears of failure today, so try not to overcompensate for your insecurities. Rather than getting lost in philosophical justifications for your actions, approach each situation in a practical manner. But most importantly, only make commitments you intend to keep.

Your career trajectory is blazing a direct path into your future now that superhero Mars is traveling through your 10th House of Status. However, the heavy hand of relentless Pluto can motivate you to take risks that may not ultimately work out in your favor. You must take stock of your resources, including your time and energy, and maintain control of your emotions if your current actions are to succeed. Don't get distracted by disagreements over principles or politics; instead, focus on the forces that are within your control to fuel your ambition.

Office politics can impede your progress today. Although you are prepared to do whatever it takes to fulfill your professional obligations, it's still a struggle to overcome the resistance of your coworkers. It might seem as if an authority figure is working against you now, but it's your choice as to whether or not to buy into anyone else's negativity. Sweet success is your best revenge.

You have a green thumb and make beauty bloom on many forms. Beautiful Venus enters earthy Virgo and your 5th House of Self-Expression today, helping you create a garden of joy. You give off the air of being able to manifest flowers in the desert and bring happiness to those you love. However, Venus also forms a tricky aspect to resourceful Pluto, requiring you to transform awkward moments into pleasant ones. Connections with others are difficult only if you try to control your feelings. Let emotions flow and then let them go.

You are living life boldly these days yet anticipate a change as you step back from the hectic pace. Nevertheless, your creativity is enhanced as artistic Venus dances into your 4th House of Roots today. But her difficult aspect with unforgiving Pluto can impede your self-expression until you deal with unfinished business on the home front. Blood makes you related; loyalty makes you family.

While it's challenging to see a situation from someone else's point of view, it's crucial to do so if you want the relationship to grow. Processing your emotions will bring you the confidence to express your own opinions more effectively while still remaining open to those of others. You're appreciated for your willingness to discuss complex issues now that friendly Venus is visiting refined Virgo in your 3rd House of Communication. You can't judge people's choices without understanding their reasons. Treat others with the same respect you wish to receive.

You may desperately try to maintain a practical perspective on your finances today, but difficulties arise from your tendency to indulge your extravagant tastes. Even if you intend to limit your desires to those things that are the most valuable, your practical perspective might not last. Although loving Venus enters efficient Virgo in your 2nd House of Self-Worth, her stressful aspect to passionate Pluto has you chasing rainbows instead of real satisfaction. Balancing your open heart with common sense helps you avoid unnecessary disappointment.

You are facing important decisions now, especially in financial matters. If you've been wavering, this is the right time to tune into your gut feelings and take decisive action. It helps if your choices are rooted in self-confidence, which, thankfully, receives a boost when attractive Venus enters your sign today. Your charming personality and sense of style turns heads in your direction during this alluring transit. But don't expect an easy victory since ruthless Pluto is testing your resolve. It has been said that if the road is straight and smooth, you're likely going the wrong way.

Set aside your pursuit of passing pleasures today so you can be clear about which desires matter the most. You are in a serious frame of mind and want to narrow your options as sensual Venus enters discriminating Virgo. It makes sense to simplify your relationships and eliminate distractions in preparation for the changes ahead. Given a choice, forgo immediate gratification in the name of long-term emotional balance.

You are eager to solidify a relationship now, but might not know how to reach your goal. However, old issues come to the surface and show you where you might have made mistakes. But go easy on the self-criticism, since the point is to improve your capacity for love and pleasure, rather than dishing out punishment. Although you might feel jealousy or resentment, motivate yourself to take positive action rather than dwelling upon the past.

You're more concerned with your career path than anything else now. Diplomatic Venus camps out in your 10th House of Career through the end of the month, enhancing your reputation and attracting lucrative opportunities. Nevertheless, your familiar struggle between freedom and responsibility may come back to haunt you. Nevertheless, find ways to meet your obligations while still allocating enough free time for play. As Albert Einstein said, "Creativity is contagious; pass it on."

Communicating your intentions about the next phase of your life is essential today. Magnetic Venus attracts you to exotic people in faraway places when she joins the planetary pack in your 9th House of Travel. However, her presence in earthy Virgo keeps your feet on the ground. Your pragmatic approach to living provides a strong foundation for facing the rising tide of feelings that can wash reason away now. Follow your dreams but be sure to pack your integrity along for the ride.

A never-ending string of little issues require your attention now, but it's wise to save some of your time to think about your long-term goals. Caution is stressed as modest Venus steps into meticulous Virgo and your 8th House of Intimacy, but the presence of mental Mercury, the evocative Moon and bombastic Jupiter already have you focusing on the more complex emotional dynamics. Nevertheless, as Lao Tzu wrote, "He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself if enlightened."

It may be time to repair a damaged partnership, but it's nearly impossible to bring passion into a conversation without experiencing some loss of control. Fortunately, you're more alluring now as captivating Venus visits your 7th House of Relationships. Being clear about what you want is a good idea that becomes more difficult in the days ahead. A magical connection can stir romantic feelings, but you'll need to see where it goes over time to see if it's real.

You might feel it's your duty to share what's on your mind today, but speaking the truth can bring an undesirable response. Talkative Mercury's hard square to no-nonsense Saturn complicates conversations by undermining trust if you say too much. Granted, you aren't often the long-suffering type, yet you could possess even less self-control at this time. Others may not be willing to reveal their feelings, making you regret your disclosure. Patience is critical now, since pushing for answers only raises more questions.

The lure of pleasure could distract you from delivering on a promise today. However, there's a price to pay for irresponsibility when active Mars and hardworking Saturn in your 8th House of Shared Resources are stressed by four planets in your 5th House of Fun and Games. Fortunately, your tenacity can help you overcome your own resistance to work. Although it's possible to be pulled into an argument with a friend or colleague about your priorities, speaking carefully enables you to skirt unnecessary conflict. Diplomacy is the art of letting someone else have your way.

You want to initiate a conversation about a delicate subject to clear the air of invisible tension. Unfortunately, too many details create a roadblock that forces you to think twice before you speak your piece. Your key planet Mercury runs into scrupulous Saturn, requiring you to back up every statement you make with facts and figures. Thankfully, sufficient preparation works wonders; you'll be showered with trust and respect if you can satisfy your audience. Setting your ego aside and putting the truth first is the quickest route to your destination.

You may be quite upset with someone's actions today, yet your tendency is to withdraw rather than push outside of your comfort zone and share your concerns. Communicator Mercury in your 3rd House of Distractions crosses paths with authoritative Saturn, making it even harder to get your point across if you lose your temper. Gently express your hurt as clearly and patiently as possible and hope for the best. Kindness works magic where anger never could.

Financial matters continue to be in the spotlight, especially if you must limit your activities or purchases because of fiscal restraints. Unfortunately, there might not be an easy solution to your current dilemma because valuable Venus and intellectual Mercury are feeling the pressure while visiting your 2nd House of Resources. Even if you seek advice from someone you trust today, communication bogs down and everything seems to require more effort than expected. Pay attention to the signs and simplify your life. Sticking to the basics now prevents messy complications later on.

You wish to involve others in your decision-making process, but could have a difficult time finding the advice you need. There's a lot on your mind now that romantic Venus, mental Mercury and opportunistic Jupiter are all hanging out in your analytical sign. Meanwhile, Mercury slams into a square with stern Saturn, stopping you in your intellectual tracks and forcing you to realize that a few well-considered words create more impact than a rambling speech. Remember, it's not enough to say the right thing; you must also deliver your message in a way that others are able to receive it.

There's an emotional uneasiness in the air that comes from a lack of communication. It's obvious that there are things that must be shared, yet still remain buried while so many planets hide out in your 12th House of Secrets. You may feel as if you've stumbled onto a battlefield as your key planet Venus dynamically squares warrior Mars, but you're in no mood to fight now. You wish you could just mind your own business and ignore the source of irritation. Nevertheless, this is your chance to kindly yet firmly break the news. As Buddha said, "The trouble is you think you have time."

Although you probably won't go out of your way to look for a fight, it still might seem as if you're cruising for trouble today. It's just that your key planet, contentious Mars, is angry and under duress in your 2nd House of Core Beliefs. Although you're ready to defend your basic values, your arguments may run into an immovable wall of authority. You are hot for action and tempers can flare. Nevertheless, you can't just walk away from the issues once they're on the table. The way through is the only way out.

You could doubt your own wisdom if your ambitious plans run off the rails. You are operating with a deep well of energetic reserve while superhero Mars and taskmaster Saturn are in the picture. However, reality conspires against you today, demanding that you reconsider your long-range goals. You must have all your ducks in order now, since any flaws in your argument will be revealed, whether you like it or not. Your mood quickly sours if unrealistic expectations set you up for failure. Nevertheless, success is yours if you work hard and keep your indulgences to a minimum.

Your confidence may be shaken today if your optimism suddenly crashes into reality. Fast-talking Mercury squares nay-saying Saturn in your 12th House of Endings, requiring you to confront your inner saboteur. Once and for all, you must face the fear that the notion of failure arouses. Although you might want to withdraw from conflict, it's more productive to rethink your strategy and then respond directly to any valid criticism. Obstacles do not obstruct the path; they are the path.

You may grow restless today, tempted to trade measurable gains for an unrealistic pie-in-the-sky dream. However, sobering Saturn puts a damper on your wanderlust. Unfortunately, garnering support is challenging now, especially if others want proof that you're speaking the truth. It might be wise to exercise self-restraint and perform your due diligence in order to build a rock-solid case for your position. Don't get discouraged if it feels like you missed the boat; you just need more time before you can proceed according to your plan. Patience is your friend.

You might be unsure of your life path today when thoughtful Mercury and physical Mars create a bit of an interplanetary struggle. Forcing resolution now at the height of your uncertainty is like slamming on the brakes during a skid. Thankfully, you can maintain control if you clear your head and acknowledge your fears. Mastering your mind is your most important assignment now. Knowing exactly what you want to say empowers your message, but confusion and frustration return if you don't rehearse your lines prior to delivering them.

Unforeseen changes can force you to loosen your grip on your schedule. Go ahead and seek solace in your imagination, but if you choose to postpone fulfilling a promise, don't confuse your impractical fantasies with your mundane obligations. Logical Mercury in your 6th House of Logistics is influenced by otherworldly Neptune today, so manage your time as effectively as possible. Keeping one foot on the ground allows you to accomplish your goals and still manage to indulge your dreams.

What you lose in mental clarity today is made up in artistic potential. Your rationality is diffused while cerebral Mercury opposes nebulous Neptune, so writing technical manuals or detailed emails is challenging. Make time to enrich your soul by listening to music or relaxing in nature. Keeping your options open can be a viable strategy, but narrowing your field of vision gives you much-needed peace and quiet. Lao Tzu wrote, "To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders."

It seems like a perfect day to kick back and let your mind wander wherever it wants to go. Mischievous Mercury's opposition to surreal Neptune sets the stage for storytelling, daydreaming and other forms of mental escape. Avoid concrete planning or initiating conversations if logic is required. Minor irritations at home can surface now, but practicing compassion and forgiveness is a better use of your time than trying to take corrective action for something that's gone wrong. Take the high road; it's far less crowded.

Although you can see a domestic issue from all angles today, a sticky dispute conflict could still sidetrack your day. After putting in quite a bit of effort to sort it all out, you might discover that most of the disagreement originated from a simple misunderstanding. But an in-depth discussion only makes the situation worse if everyone is operating off of different assumptions. Frequently, the biggest snag in communication is that people don't listen to understand, they listen to reply. Open your mind before you open your mouth.

You're finally ready to tackle a longstanding financial issue today, only to realize the problem isn't as bad as you thought. Unfortunately, trickster Mercury's opposition to fuzzy Neptune can delude you into believing nearly anything that resonates with your fantasies. You could even mislead yourself into imagining an improved fiscal situation. Don't turn your cash flow upside down by making a decision about a major purchase; instead, list the pros and cons about each option while postponing your final choice until tomorrow when you can hear yourself think.

Ironically, facts range from fuzzy to fantastic now, which can lead you to erroneous conclusions. Paradoxically, analytical Mercury empowers you to focus your logic like a laser beam. However, the Winged Messenger is in a tug-of-war with delusional Neptune today, making it impossible to discern useful data from an incoming deluge of unverifiable information. Rather than making yourself crazy with frustration, grab this opportunity to explore your imagination and indulge your fantasies. Your regularly scheduled program of reality will return tomorrow.

You may be confused by your lack of priorities today as thoughtful Mercury opposes ephemeral Neptune in your 6th House of Daily Routine. Retreating from the public spotlight seems like your most sensible option while several planets congregate in your 12th House of Privacy. Nevertheless, the future is pulling at you from several different directions now, obscuring your final destination. Thankfully, you can probably get away with declaring a one-day amnesty from responsibility as long as you promise to finish your work upon your return. One step backward, two steps forward.

Your dreams must be placed on the back burner today so you can direct your energy toward the outside world. Pressure to renew a commitment or change direction is likely as the illuminating Sun's presence in your 10th House of Career is intensified by powerful Pluto. However, your current hypersensitivity can overrule common sense as you try to meet other people's expectations now. No matter what anyone says, listen to your inner voice for the advice you need. As Sufi poet Rumi wrote, "Look for the answer inside your question."

You long to take spiritual refuge from the demands of life today. Messenger Mercury's opposition to metaphysical Neptune in your 4th House of Roots tempts you to escape into your imagination. However, it's nearly impossible to remain objective when every word is so loaded with illusions and emotions. While this planetary combination is wonderful for creative expression and compassionate conversation, it tends to dissipate facts in the presence of dreams. Remember the success of Walt Disney who said, "Fantasy and reality often overlap."

You want everyone to see your fair and balanced approach to resolving interpersonal differences. Unfortunately, the power of your beliefs distorts your objectivity now as relentless Pluto in your 1st House of Self is bent out of shape by the dramatic Leo Sun. But it's easier to bury your agenda than to acknowledge it. Nevertheless, what's left unsaid can tilt a conversation in the wrong direction. Although coming clean might feel uncomfortable at first, pushing through your resistance and being honest from the start brings you the respect you seek.

Your defenses soften in the presence of other people's weaknesses because you have compassion for their plight today. Wanting to help someone in need is admirable, but the sharp analytical lens of cerebral Mercury in precise Virgo is diffused by its opposition to surreal Neptune. This confusing yet imaginative aspect challenges you to discern the truth from fiction. Make sure you understand the underlying message by repeating key components of any discussion and asking for verification along the way. No question is too dumb when there's so much at stake.

Delving into the details of relationships can be a tedious process, yet it's essential work for cultivating your compassion. While it's true that love sometimes flows along with the magic of silent understanding, words are ultimately the best means for establishing deep connections. Pillow talk is the upside of chatty Mercury's opposition to dreamy Neptune today. But confusion is also possible if you don't double-check your impressions to make sure that everyone is on the same page. Don't naively assume that your interpretation matches anyone else's until you validate your instincts.

You might believe that you are going out of your way to be nice to others, but their view of your behavior could be quite different. No matter how honorable your intentions are now, your brusque manner can make you appear uncaring or even offensive. But what you say is likely less important than how you say it. Rather than shocking someone with your sudden declaration, build up to it with a conversation based on give and take. A little diplomacy is all you need to create harmony in your world.

Although people may be dependent on your job performance today, it's still crucial to balance work with play. The pleasure-seeking Libra Moon brightens your 6th House of Self-Improvement, reminding you that moderation is essential -- not only to your growth, but also to your physical well-being. Instead of trying to power your way through your responsibilities like a Bull, taking regular breaks is revitalizing and enables you to be more productive in the long run. Don't rush anything; when the time is right, magic will happen.

You are thinking of all the ways -- realistic or not -- you could escape from work today. There are so many things that excite your imagination now. Nevertheless, it's unlikely that you can avoid your mundane obligations, so you might as well start your chores early in the day. Unfortunately, you won't be able to concentrate on the tasks at hand for too long, since every flight of fancy seems like an intriguing distraction. Gently bring your focus back to your assignment as often as necessary until your responsibilities are fulfilled.

An unexpected change of plans could send you into a temporary tailspin, making it tricky to regain your composure. But your response to the pressures of the day is admirable, even as the Moon encourages you to reconnect with your past. Oddly enough, stirring up your old fears doesn't necessarily mean you must take any specific actions yet. Just continue to rebuild the present moment on the foundation of old experiences. Your future depends on what you do today.

You're inspired to share your love, but you might not get very far on your path to fulfillment today. People may be emotionally shut down for one reason or another, unable or unwilling to accept your gift of affection. Additionally, you aren't willing to change your attitude for the sake of winning someone's favor. Nevertheless, you can still take the high road and shine your light as brightly as possible. Instead of waiting for others to meet you halfway, express the magic of your heart without any expectations. As Nathanial Hawthorne wrote, "Generosity is the flower of justice."

You may need to risk more than you prefer in order to let others know exactly where you stand. Unfortunately, you face the possibility of rejection or even ridicule if you put your feelings out into the open. But something amazing is about to happen, even if it takes a while to realize the significance of the moment. You are in your element now and people are listening to every word you say. Choose your message carefully for the window of opportunity is already starting to close.

Although your friends and coworkers can see through your veneer, they still might not realize the passionate emotions you're holding quietly behind your personal version of the Great Wall. On the other hand, the gracious Libra Moon enables you to show your feelings within the bounds of social etiquette. Honoring the customs from another time or culture expands your horizons, enabling you to perceive your environment from a wider perspective. What others think is none of your business at this time, but what you think makes all the difference in the world.

You're driven to make the most out of the social media buzz today, but finding the time can be a bit of a struggle. Your intention is to be more connected with like-minded people while messenger Mercury claims the spotlight in your 11th House of Networking. However, you like your anonymity and aren't eager to take a more public stance now. Push through your fear of exposure because you can't have it both ways. The satisfaction of accomplishment will outweigh your concerns once you finally decide to take your rightful place in the community.

Rediscovering your life purpose takes precedence today, whether it's more of the same or an entirely different ballgame. In either case, your legendary visionary outlook inspires others to tell you their dreams. The good news is you have a clear sense of who you are, a viable plan in place and feel as if nothing can stand in your way now. Just remember to take it slowly or you will expend so much energy that you won't have any later on when you need it for a second wind. As President Theodore Roosevelt wrote, "With self-discipline, most anything is possible."

Although you are working with a clear agenda for getting further on your journey up the mountain, you begin to realize that you might have bitten off more than you can chew. Instead of exhausting yourself as you strive toward the summit, be wise and scale back your plans before circumstances do it for you. If you grow discouraged because you haven't reached your goal yet, remember that it's not too late to reevaluate your progress and adjust your course as needed.

You can't take your mind off the wonderful possibilities that lay ahead. But neither can you pick one single path because there are so many things you want to accomplish now that the ambivalent Libra Moon is visiting your 9th House of Future Vision. Nevertheless, you are just as concerned about uncovering the meaning of life, which may be counterproductive to producing anything in the real world. Balancing the spiritual with the material gives you reason to refocus on your work. Ultimately, it's your dogged persistence that will turn a potential failure into an extraordinary achievement.

All is well in your world if your relationships are in order. But if unspoken feelings hang thick in the air, you won't be able to concentrate on your work. Everyone will know that something is out of balance and it's up to you to rectify the situation. Thankfully, awareness is the first step on the road back to health and harmony. Use your current connection with the fair-minded Libra Moon to help you weigh your various options and choose the best one.

Your lack of patience motivates you to move away from the centrist position you were previously holding. But you are more compulsive than impulsive about executing your plan today because you are fearful about making a careless mistake. It's one thing to acknowledge you're at a point of no return, but it's something else to be cool enough to make your current actions count. Be as practical as you can without walking away from your dreams. In Muhammad Ali's words, "The man who has no imagination has no wings."

Your expectations can lead to trouble today if you are relying on someone else for advice. A close friend or partner will likely step up to the plate to present an alternative perspective on a current situation. Although you may be appreciative of the additional point of view, it's not wise to accept it as equal to your own perceptions because other people have their personal biases. Take any feedback you receive now as simply more data upon which to base your decision. Ultimately, the best answers come from within and not from anyone else.

You believe you know the best way to go about your business today and are reluctant to listen to anyone else's criticism. Nevertheless, your air of self-sufficiency won't prevent someone from answering your questions before you even ask them. Although your gut reaction is to be dismissive, you could learn something important if you get past your resistance and maintain an open mind. It's your option to go back to your original idea if you so desire. Nevertheless, your receptivity might just lead to a breakthrough strategy you never considered before. Inspiration springs from the most unlikeliest of places.

You're motivated to express what's on your mind today, even if the thought of revealing your truth makes you recoil in fear. But don't let the limitations of your logic stand between you and effective communication because your disclosure carries the potential to positively impact your life. You have the power of integrity on your side; don't be afraid to use it for the good of all. Just remember that right thinking leads to stagnation without right action.

You have stories that you want to keep to yourself today and no amount of prying will encourage you to loosen your lips. Your current charm enables you to keep things to yourself without alienating anyone in the process. In fact, you make it look easy when you matter-of-factly declare your boundaries in such a friendly manner that people can't help but smile and agree with your right to personal space. No one will hold a grudge if you combine your honesty with kindness.

You're unwilling to gamble on shaking up your schedule today, even if your calculated odds look promising. Oddly enough, you are not intrigued in the slightest by endless stacks of data that could be used to justify your position. Instead of your regular penchant for facts, you're eager to unwrap a few magical tidbits now. Although you're fascinated by the alluring music of your imagination, there's little room for error when it comes to your world of efficiency.

It's all about your self-esteem -- or your lack of it -- today. Typically, you shine when you're surrounded by like-minded people who know and love you. But maintaining your confidence isn't easy, especially if you long for time by yourself away from the crowd. Whatever course of action you choose, you must juggle your attraction to the spotlight and your current fear of being on the big stage. As Irish novelist Laurence Sterne wrote, "In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself."

You're unsure how to handle your intense mood changes now that the emotional Moon is kicking up a storm in your sign. As soon as you acknowledge your feelings, they morph into a new configuration that makes it difficult to keep track of them. Unfortunately, you can exhaust yourself, and others, by making a big deal of every passing thought. It's all about cultivating a healthy perspective; if you find yourself wandering off course, slow down and reestablish your center of gravity.

You might not want to come out of hiding today, although this reclusive behavior contradicts your normal outgoing nature. Of course, you are not responsible for everyone else's feelings, but there's no reason to alienate your allies by ignoring them. It won't take much extra energy to simply inform them of your motives so they won't over-personalize your introspective attitude now. As Mahatma Gandhi said, "It's easy to stand with the crowd; it takes courage to stand alone."

You are extremely discerning about who you associate with and you aren't willing to change your selection criteria just to appease someone else today. However, establishing your standards might not be as logical of a process as you claim; instead of adhering to rules, you arbitrarily pick and choose your friends by the feeling in the pit of stomach. There's nothing wrong with trusting your instincts as long as you don't hide behind the illusion of sound judgment. Ultimately, your erroneous assumptions can be your worst enemies.

Nearly everything you do today is aimed at climbing the ladder of success. But you're not satisfied now with making progress and then resting on your laurels. You're gazing further into the future and are willing to make short-term sacrifices to achieve long-term objectives. Although you might be tempted to set out on your own, there is much to gain from the resources others could bring to the table. Decide what you're willing to give up for the luxury of someone else's participation. Small acts when multiplied by many people can transform the world.

You have your heart set on doing something out of the ordinary and you don't want to wait forever to make it happen. However, there may be someone else involved who has a slightly different idea of what an adventure might look like. Don't get discouraged if a resolution seems elusive now; you will have plenty of time to put it all together once you reach a mutual agreement on the overall plan. Steer clear of impulsive decisions today. In the words of Ben Franklin, "Take time for all things. Great haste makes great waste."

You have the proper words at your disposal today to describe those feelings that are typically not easy to talk about. Fortunately, you won't be deterred from speaking your piece while persuasive Mercury teams up with relentless Pluto, empowering you to press your point until you convince others that your position is a wise one. Nevertheless, there's still room for improvement which means it's crucial to listen to the critical feedback you receive. The Buddha said, "Three things cannot be long hidden: The Sun, the Moon, and the Truth."

Someone's response to your actions might feel like an attack on your judgment. However, it may be that your thin-skinned reaction turns constructive criticism into a personal affront. Thankfully, clear thinking and strategic planning smooth out ruffled feathers with stabilizing aspects from Mercury to Pluto. Instead of escalating an unnecessary conflict by over-personalizing everything you hear today, sink beneath the surface and connect with the deeper message.

Mixed signals at work could prompt you to think you lost your way today, yet wallowing in self-doubt won't accomplish anything. However, you are motivated to clear the air in order to improve the current communication dynamics. Thankfully, you can quickly develop a diplomatic strategy to resolve the tension while interactive Mercury trines evolutionary Pluto. Trust earned by hard work and accountability invites deeper discussions and important insights, which in turn can produce a sensible solution to an existing problem.

Your sensitivity to the plights of others is one of your greatest gifts, but it could be the source of deeply rooted angst today. You might be slightly overwhelmed because of the magnitude of trouble you see in the world or in the suffering of those around you. But instead of withdrawing to nurse your pain, you have a chance to help people by participating in meaningful dialogue. Rather than creating an emotional gulf between you and your loved ones, a supportive Mercury-Pluto trine opens communication channels so you don't feel so alone. Reaching out places peace of mind within reach.

You seem to be at odds with the world today, but in your heart of hearts you know you're right. Unfortunately, everyone is so entrenched in their own positions that there's no resolution to be found. Tempers might flare at first, but Mercury's trine to Pluto allows you to bring the conversation back to the real issues. Discussing what motivated the argument in the first place is your key to resolving the differences, no matter how deep they run. Author Dorothy Thomas wrote, "Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it."

There are many voices in your head fighting for your attention, and it is a challenge to choose which one to listen to now. You may struggle at first if you pretend to have a plan in place, yet admitting you don't have an answer for every question reveals your vulnerable side. Mercury's creative trine with surgical Pluto helps you cut through the clutter, dig down to the heart of the matter and communicate with conviction. Don't let anything or anyone stop you from achieving your goal, especially yourself.

Your values might clash with those of your friends while the Moon in your 2nd House of Core Beliefs dynamically squares the Sun in your 11th House of Community, bringing you to the edge of verbal combat. You know what you want, you express it and you're willing to show that you mean it. Fortunately, Mercury creates an agreeable trine with evolutionary Pluto, allowing you to magically transform a potential conflict into an intimate moment if you're willing to join someone in unknown emotional territory. Author Gail Sheehy wrote, "The delights of self-discovery are always available."

Your emotional reaction is swift and strong today yet you must fight for recognition every step of the way. It's as if everything feels more complicated than it is. People aren't confident in your ability to keep your love light shining now. Mercury's favorable trine to penetrating Pluto is ideal for addressing a delicate issue requiring careful communication. Thankfully, your perceptions empower your words and supply you with the information needed to prove your point. Your intuition is an endless resource if you are wise enough to use it.

You prefer to conceal your emotions today because you don't want them to interfere with your professional activities. Your thinking is clear and deep now; your communication is concise and compelling. But working to bring your hidden feelings out into the open is only the first step to connecting with others. Ultimately, directing your attention to where it will do the greatest good is your smartest strategy. Your character's strength is measured less by your words and more by your actions.

You may feel underappreciated by someone close to you today. Nevertheless, you have a clear understanding of your desires, so concentrated efforts can produce dramatic results in a short amount of time. Cerebral Mercury's creative trine with incisive Pluto deepens your insights and sharpens your words to help you encourage coworkers and friends. In the final analysis, your positivity motivates others and then cycles around to lift your spirits. The best way to multiply your happiness is to share it.

You can't help but bring your emotions to work with you now, even if you wish you could conveniently leave them at home. Fortunately, you can create some distance between you and your desires without denying your feelings. But you must be brave and push past your resistance to establish a deeper connection with your colleagues while Mercury forms a harmonious trine with secretive Pluto. A meaningful conversation with the right person is priceless, no matter where it takes place.

Everyone seems so practical today that it appears like you have nowhere to fit in and call home. Your emotions are so strong that you might feel a sense of alienation from those closest to you. Nevertheless, you possess plenty of perfect answers, if only you could figure out a way to get your message across. But be careful what you say when Mercury receives a passionate blast from potent Pluto, giving your words tremendous power. Your intensity can scare others away now if you put it on full blast. Ultimately, communication works best when it flows both ways.

Sometimes you think you can postpone the inevitable, but today you're champing at the bit, eager for action. You don't want to acknowledge the amount of work you have ahead of you. Instead, you think that heading into it at full speed will enable you to magically accomplish everything on schedule. Nevertheless, you might be in for a rude surprise unless you reconsider your expectations. Don't wait for a better time to reclaim control of your life; do it now while you can still save face.

You might believe that the pressure will finally lighten up today, but your emotions intensify, possibly kicking up another dust storm in your relationship world. Your focus is on the future and the Moon's shift into your 8th House of Deep Sharing suggests that you should talk with someone you trust if you don't know which way to turn. It doesn't take much; even a short conversation can bring a sense of peace if you restrain your expression of any deeper anger until it morphs into something more positive.

Personal relationships are requiring you to carry a heavy load this month while dutiful Saturn continues plodding through your 7th House of Partners. The optimistic Sagittarius Moon connects with warrior Mars tonight, inspiring you with the courageous behavior of others. There's no reason to compete to see who is more outrageous in their pursuit of the truth. As soon as you understand that you're all in this together, it becomes obvious that cooperation and love trump isolation and fear.

You are making big plans for what you will accomplish at work today, yet you might easily bite off more than you can chew. Gauging the amount of time needed to complete a project is tough because your sunny outlook leads you to believe that your resources are inexhaustible. Something will likely snap if you stretch yourself too thin now, causing a house of cards to tumble. The sooner you take action to get your schedule back under control, the better for everyone involved. "Less is more" is your motto for the day.

Yesterday's conflicts morph into today's mutual agreements. Making plans to explore your self-expression is so much easier when everyone is reading from the same page and supporting one another's creative pursuits. But don't assume that everything will continue to flow smoothly since there are still a few bumps in the road ahead. You will likely finish more than you expect when you do your best to take everything in stride. A healthy sense of humor serves you well.

Trivial secrets get blown out of proportion today and you could quickly lose track of your priorities. Although you might put great intention into concentrating on your work, your thoughts are running on overdrive, making it nearly impossible to complete even the simplest task. Nevertheless, you can still turn the day into an amazing memory by cutting yourself some slack. Being totally unproductive for a little while revitalizes your system and clears your brain. Ralph Waldo Emerson said, "It is a happy talent to know how to play."

You're trying to walk your talk and contain your growing anger at the same time. But don't worry if your negativity slips out into the atmosphere today, since others are likely to be swimming in similar waters. However, the Moon's shift into your 3rd House of Information motivates you to act on what you learn. Maintain a flexible attitude; the most interesting life hacks arrive in unexpected packages at unsuspecting times. But try them out while the planetary energy is still in your favor; it will only be harder for your changes to gain traction if you keep waiting for a better moment.

You can breathe a sigh of relief when the Moon leaves your extreme sign this afternoon. But it's no secret that you enjoy the emotional intensity, so you might also feel let down when Luna heads into the greener pastures of Sagittarius. Nevertheless, the future looks brighter now, but it's unwise to buy into the fantasy of a perfect relationship. If you do become entangled in someone's personal melodrama, take the time to separate out your pieces from theirs. There's always something distracting knocking at your door; however, today's a great day to let it in.

Your gut instincts overrule your rational thoughts today, inspiring your passionate judgment about a political or personal injustice. Thankfully, you possess the gift of charisma, making even the most difficult topic approachable now. Quietly observe any negative emotions that arise in the pit of your stomach. Rather than overreacting at the drop of a hat, hold your feelings close until they develop into something more constructive. Do what is right, not what is easy.

A strategy of secrecy isn't working now, even if you thought it would be wise to sidestep a confrontation by keeping your feelings private. The Moon's move into your 12th House of Escapism tempts you to pretend that everything is copacetic. However, some disagreements should not be avoided for the sake of maintaining the peace. Express your outrage over someone's inappropriate words or actions after you let off a little steam first. Keep in mind that denying the truth doesn't change the facts, but the delivery of your message matters more than you think.

The storm clouds of your emotional world are clearing today, opening your mind to the multitude of possibilities that were previously hidden. But seeing further into the future comes with its own paradox and you could be struck with uncharacteristic indecisiveness if there are too many forks in the road. The sooner you can eliminate some options, the easier it will be to make the hard choices in front of you. Follow your dreams, not your fears.

You are being pressed to make a decision about your job or your career, but you might not feel as if you're ready to declare your final choice just yet. You may be tempted to push back, but nothing useful is likely to come from a disagreement between two people arguing over a minor issue that doesn't matter in the long run. Confucius said, "When anger rises, think of the consequences." Wisdom is knowing when being right is not worth the trouble.

Paradoxically, there are so many options available now you can't seem to decide which one to pursue. A thrilling connection between unpredictable Uranus and jubilant Jupiter has hope springing forth from the farthest reaches of your imagination, teasing you with endless possibilities. Although you're itching to start a new venture, you may be temporarily thwarted in your efforts. Relax into the flow of the universe; your need for unfettered freedom will not wane anytime soon.

Reality imposes itself on you with a vengeance today, requiring accountability for any recent lack of discipline in financial matters. Fortunately, the need for clarification with others fosters a sense of trust and encourages sincere communication. Meanwhile, brilliant ideas flow through your mind like seeds in the wind. It's up to you to catch the best ones and nurture them until they grow into tangible alternatives. Shifting from talk to action creates something lasting out of this deluge of information.

Metaphysical earthquakes can shake your life, upsetting the status quo and inspiring radical change. However, the Moon's conjunction with nay-saying Saturn in your 7th House of Partnerships also brings a person into your life that appears to stand in the way of your progress. Nevertheless, the real obstacles are internal and it's up to you to process your own resistance. If you avoid the temptation to promise more than you can deliver, you'll soon see where the current transformation might lead.

Fully appreciating your current circumstances can be tricky now as boredom motivates you to initiate impulsive action. Although you may be eager to make big changes in your life, it will take time for the long-term effects of today's intentions to manifest. It feels as if you're listening to a different drummer, yet it's wise to save your wildest dancing until you see how everything unfolds. Be patient; once you alter the direction of your new path, it will take on a brilliant life of its own.

Your creativity may be blocked by a temporary lack of confidence today, but an unexpected encounter could flip your perspective upside down before you know it. Irrepressible Uranus zaps boisterous Jupiter in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, suddenly opening the floodgates to self-expression. A person or an idea that seems too outrageous at first can trigger a stroke of genius that elevates your game to the next level. The only limits that exist now are the worn-out constraints of your own mind.

You can turn the sourest of grapes into the sweetest of wine if you're willing to focus on the potential gain instead of the frustration of the present moment. Logically, you realize that a current setback might be in your best interest, even if it doesn't feel so good now. Avoid the temptation to withdraw today; instead, make a commitment to engage in the process of metamorphosis as you free the butterfly from the restraints of the cocoon.

You must swallow an unpleasant dose of reality today, but this harsh medicine can help you to stabilize your closest relationships. The Moon's conjunction with pragmatic Saturn in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment requires you to approach your plans in a down-to-earth manner now. The chances for success are excellent if you clearly state your goals to everyone involved. The first step to reaching the mountain's summit is deciding to make the climb. Sharing your aspirations with your supporters makes chasing your dreams more fun.

It's never too late to manifest positive growth in your career and achieve greater financial stability. The Moon's conjunction with crystallizing Saturn in your 2nd House of Personal Resources is a quiet reminder to conserve your energy while working toward your goals. However, an electric Jupiter-Uranus misalignment is a loud wake-up call that opens your eyes and reveals how much ground you still have to cover. Stay open to changes that can increase your freedom, even if you need to take a calculated risk with money or in love to make the most of this propitious planetary energy.

You might consciously decide to maintain a serious attitude today while the Moon is constrained by somber Saturn in your sign. However, you can't seem to make the ripples of excitement disappear as bountiful Jupiter connects with electrifying Uranus. Unfortunately, you may already be overloaded with work and it's not a good idea to voluntarily add anything else to the pile. Nevertheless, you're driven to capture the elusive thrill before the lightning show ends. Staying calm in the midst of a creative storm is your key to receiving the gift of cosmic awareness.

Someone might throw a monkey wrench of unexpected information into your world today, requiring fast thinking and emotional flexibility on your part. Meanwhile, you're more serious than ever about embracing the power of now and simultaneously creating a positive impact on your future. This alternating pattern of expansion and contraction can feel contradictory, but it blesses you with spiritual insights that are well worth the stress. Ultimately, an unexpected awakening delivered by the shock of Uranus can bring you an enlightened sense of freedom if you're willing to be open to change.

It's annoying if you can see the amazing alternatives all around you, yet still feel restricted in a way that prevents you from having too much fun. Thankfully, your self-restraint is rewarded if you work hard to fulfill your social and professional obligations. Nevertheless, the weight of heavy responsibility is counterbalanced by buoyant Jupiter's connection to wild Uranus, tantalizing you with mind-blowing possibilities when you look out toward the distant horizon. Logic tells you to avoid the more exciting path, yet your heart won't settle for anything less.

Overcoming criticism may feel like an impossible task, especially since the harder you try today, the farther you seem to wander off course. Ironically, a flexible attitude allows you to find useful solutions within the information explosion generated by the brilliant Jupiter-Uranus alignment. Although your inner voice is warning you to abandon your foolish expectations, rebellious Uranus has little respect for the laws of reality. Spontaneous actions can work against your best interests now, so walk carefully -- don't run -- toward your dreams.

You could feel as if you're undergoing an emotional stress test today. Romantic expectations may suddenly deflate as they run into cold, hard truths. But this sobering lesson is only meant to start a process; if love is to last, it must weather the rough patches as well as rejoice when the road is smooth. Nevertheless, the realization that everything is imperfect can create undue ripples of discontent. Face disappointment with an open heart, for any relationship that overcomes difficulties has a greater chance of success in the long run.

You are reluctantly re-evaluating your relationship goals and making necessary adjustments. Forbidding Saturn stresses vulnerable Venus in your 5th House of Play today, leaving you to wonder why you work so hard for emotional satisfaction. You are ready to draw a line because you can't continue to give up ground at home or work, for love or money. Stand up for yourself to gain respect, but do it calmly. Remember your birthright as a Taurus: You don't have to hurry to prove your point. Commit to the long haul; happiness is yours if you make a sincere effort to do your very best.

Your romantic fantasies fall short of reality today, temporarily isolating you from loved ones. Loneliness and self-doubt are possible consequences when your friends don't understand what you need. Thankfully, feelings of rejection won't prevent you from trying to bridge the gulf of misunderstanding. You can't stay sad for long while the uplifting Sagittarius Moon trines uncontainable Uranus and squares jovial Jupiter. Remember Nelson Mandela who said, "Do not judge me by my successes; judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again." Resiliency is your middle name.

No one can soothe your angst today, until you examine your own buried feelings. Lovable Venus in your 3rd House of Communication squares austere Saturn, tempting you to erect walls to protect your heart from rejection. Unfortunately, people might put so much emotional pressure on you that it seems as if you can't do anything right. But retreating into the safety of your shell won't solve anything. There may be such a great sense of urgency that you could make matters worse if you try to suppress your discontent. Author Alice Walker wrote, "Hard times require furious dancing."

No matter how clever you think you are today, something may prevent you from getting the acknowledgment you deserve. Earning approval requires diligence now as well as talent. Social awkwardness is one possible outcome of the dynamic square between affectionate Venus and demanding Saturn. Dealing with intimacy in relationships can be challenging, but nothing is gained if you pull away from someone you love. Lean into your fear of rejection, for that's where you will find the sweetest rewards. Cherish the treasures of the heart.

It's wise not to make any drastic decisions for a few days, because even the most amazing relationship can ebb and flow now. Family dynamics may be the source of tension when unyielding Saturn squares accountable Venus in your 4th House of Domestic Conditions. Disagreements about your self-expression could arise today, especially if you've neglected your fiscal responsibilities. The underlying stress won't disappear until you give it your undivided attention. Carl Jung wrote, "What you resists, persists."

Your entire world seems to be grinding to a halt, like reality is trying to teach you a valuable lesson. Meanwhile, your impatience grows; you have no interest in taking the time to negotiate in relationships or balance your bank accounts. Unfortunately, you must do exactly what you wish to avoid today. The stress continues to intensify only because the more pressure you feel now, the more stubborn you become. The paradox is that in showing some of your natural grace and flexibility by yielding to the needs of others, you can better demonstrate your strength and competence.

Stress levels regarding money and love may be uncomfortably high today as valuable Venus dynamically squares immovable Saturn in your 2nd House of Money and Resources. Unfortunately, you can't easily hide your displeasure now and a simple path to your heart's desire is nowhere to be found. Don't push for resolution; just drag the issues out into the light of day and see what happens. Instead of worrying about everything that could go wrong, keep one eye on the past, one eye on the future, and your feet grounded in the present circumstances.

Patiently weighing the costs and benefits of any partnership leads to more responsible decisions today. It's easy to be grumpy while ominous Saturn inhibits pleasure by dynamically squaring off with sensual Venus in your 10th House of Public Status. But recent self-doubt or moodiness isn't sufficient to explain away your nagging dissatisfaction. Nevertheless, irrepressible desires for a new adventure conflict directly with your pressing obligations. Keeping everyone informed of your plans increases your independence without losing your integrity.

A powerful exchange may leave you feeling shocked and emotionally unsafe today. Thankfully, you can discover a stable place to stand while exacting Saturn and resourceful Venus battle for control. Saturn limits the approval you receive from others, possibly giving you more than one reason to doubt yourself. Running away or pretending you don't care is an easy solution, but courageously digging in and dealing directly with relationship issues will produce more satisfying results.

A trivial event might remind you of what you lack in your life today. Sweet Venus squares stern Saturn, eliciting feelings of loneliness, even if you're happily involved in an intimate relationship. Additionally, you might not have sufficient funds or time to take a pleasurable vacation you believe you deserve. Whatever obstacles Venus runs into now, don't be too discouraged by the shortcomings of your life.
