Instead, use this time to clarify what you really need and what you're willing to pay, emotionally and fiscally, in exchange. Counting your blessings cultivates a grateful heart.

You're inspired to push past your usual limits of what you say and do today. You may expose an inconvenient truth or challenge yourself by trying something new. Nevertheless, you can ramble on too long or go too far if you don't temper your enthusiasm with a healthy dose of self-restraint. Stirring conflict or promising to carry a heavier load than you can handle is more foolish than brave unless you stop to consider the consequences of your actions. Stay out of trouble by channeling your passion into your art.

Although you strive to make decisions based upon the facts, even the clearest picture is blurred today. Forgive yourself for not being able to discern the truth now, especially when trying to explain your feelings to others. Venus, the planet of personal love, opposes Neptune, the planet of spiritual love, catching you in a fantasy web of your own making. Thankfully, the stable Capricorn Moon in your 10th House of Public Responsibility empowers you to address emotional issues in a logical manner. Check out any assumptions you make about your partner before you act on faulty conclusions. Oscar Wilde wrote, "Illusion is the first of all pleasures."

Knowing what you want from others is the key to opening love's door today, yet you must be willing to make reasonable compromises regarding your expectations to find satisfaction. The practical Capricorn Moon fosters stability, but fantasy rules when magnetic Venus opposes enchanting Neptune, making a fairy-tale romance too alluring to resist. Use your imagination to create the future, but don't drift off into dreamland and lose touch with your common sense. To move freely one must be deeply rooted.

Your sharp perceptions are tingling as they help you make sense of recent events. However, separate ideas and images start to weave together in a logical way, revealing the big patterns that show you how to be more efficient in the future. This entangling of thoughts can result in disoriented feelings when needy Venus opposes foggy Neptune in your 10th House of Status, making it difficult to find direction in your search for meaning. Let your imagination and heart guide your next steps.Remember the words of the Dalai Lama who said, "The purpose of our lives is to be happy."

It's reasonable to make a sacrifice for love or approval, as long as the other side is willing to meet you halfway. Unfortunately, giving everything with the unrealistic hope that you'll get your fair share in return is not a sustainable strategy. Dreaming and scheming with someone can be a lot of fun now as long as you remain in the world of fantasy without making any serious commitments. Because your emotional sensitivity is even higher today, unsupportive comments could sound harsher to you than intended. Remember, no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

You might be feeling quite hopeful one moment and somewhat doubtful the next. A rational Capricorn Moon is pitted against an irrational Venus-Neptune opposition today, making for a volatile mix of calculated ambition and unavoidable hypersensitivity. One person may seem like a bully while the other plays the role of a victim. Fortunately, you can experience the magic of delight when tenderness toward others is blended with a desire to follow your heart's wishes.

Relationships aren't necessarily all that they appear to be today. You may be quite sweet on someone while romantic Venus in your 1st House of Self opposes spiritual Neptune in your 7th House of Relationships. However, the biggest danger is setting yourself up for future heartache, since fantasies can seem so authentic that they feel palatable. Thankfully, a simple reality check now can minimize the emotional letdown later on. Normal is an illusion; what is normal for the spider is chaos for the fly.

You're in a rather somber mood while the Moon is visiting serious Capricorn. You plan on narrowing your options now that Venus is in discriminating Virgo, but her opposition to blurry Neptune makes it nearly impossible to focus on what you want. In your fantasies you can have it all. Nevertheless, there are important matters to consider; although your imagination is extraordinarily vivid today, it's obvious you can't escape the material world. Thankfully, you can choose to worry less about what is currently missing from your life and concentrate on creating a positive future.

It may be challenging to distinguish between your dreams and reality today, so be careful about believing that all is well if it isn't. Sexy Venus opposes illusory Neptune in your 5th House of Romance, creating a heightened sense of fantasy. You want to experience the ideal union and won't be satisfied with physical pleasure unless the elusive spiritual component is also present. As Bucky Fuller wrote, "Love is metaphysical gravity."

The spotlight of recognition and appreciation shines on you now that three planets are activating your 10th House of Status. However, Neptune can leave you wildly dejected if your expectations are too high and an opposition from delectable Venus is too idealistic. Nevertheless, exercising a little self-restraint at the right time restores your faith in dreams while simultaneously keeping you realistic about what you can accomplish. Author Thomas Carlyle wrote, "The greatest of faults is to be conscious of none."

Although you might drift into fantasy realms today, you're unlikely to get completely lost in the mists of illusion because the reflective Moon is firmly anchored in your sensible sign. Nevertheless, your heart and soul are gently opening due to an inspiring opposition of delightful Venus to magical Neptune. Don't be afraid to dream; instead of gazing at the distant horizon with no idea how to reach it, trust your imagination's inner map to show you the way.

You may spend money unwisely today or feel a bit disillusioned by people when receptive Venus opposes deceptive Neptune in your 2nd House of Personal Resources. Fortunately, you are realistic enough to adopt a more practical outlook on life. Nevertheless, there is tension between your desires and your social obligations. Baby doctor, Benjamin Spock, told us all, "Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do."

Compassion is admirable, yet quite difficult to maintain if it's not reciprocated in some way. A partner may lack credibility today when vulnerable Venus in your 7th House of Associates opposes slippery Neptune. Knowing what you want and holding people accountable for their actions are essential pieces of the puzzle while the Moon is visiting earthy Capricorn. Remember, you can't afford to have untrustworthy allies when there's so much at stake. Respect is a two-way street.

The energy seems to be settling back into place and you're eager to re-establish your daily routine. Although you must work extra hard today, at least you're keeping up with your responsibilities. The more specific you are in your communication with your coworkers, the more you can expect to accomplish. But don't be concerned if your schedule falls apart later in the day; sometimes it's best to just laugh when things don't go the way you planned. Paradoxically, your cheerful flexibility allows changes to occur that make your day turn out even better than you thought possible.

You have a solid idea of how you want your day to unfold and you're not willing to negotiate with anyone. The ability to stand strong with determination is one of your greatest assets. However, today's strength of character is best demonstrated by your ability to adapt to changes as they unfold rather than resisting them. As self-help author Tony Robbins says, "Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach."

Although you are known for your talent of keeping things light and breezy, the Moon's conjunction with potent Pluto in your 8th House of Deep Sharing motivates you to dive into an emotional issue today without reserve. Thankfully, words come easily now, enabling you to ask probing questions in a disarming manner. However, you could discover something so shocking that you might wish you didn't dig so deep. Give it time for the new information to sink in; you will be richer in spirit for possessing the truth.

Normally you can handle emotionally intense conversations, even if you hold your own feelings close to the chest. However, you may grow upset today if you are goaded into discussing delicate matters by someone who doesn't know when to stop pushing. You could surprise others -- you might even surprise yourself -- by the intensity of your reaction when you share your discomfort. Never be afraid to express the truth, but always do it with the utmost of respect and kindness.

Your coworkers might be quite annoying now, especially if your agenda is different from theirs. Although you prefer it when everyone follows your lead, you're willing to go off on your own in order to stay true to your highest calling. Thankfully, you are working with just the right cosmic balance today that makes you crazy enough to do anything, but sane enough to stick with the tried-and-true. Instead of running to the edge of the cliff, walking there slowly gives you sufficient time to rethink your options. Let your faith be bigger than your fear.

You're still living under the illusion that more information is better than just a little bit. However, several planets in picky Virgo reinforce your desire to hold on to only the most useful data. Don't jump to any conclusions because your perspective will likely change and develop throughout the day. As Atticus said in To Kill a Mockingbird, "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view, until you climb into is skin and walk around in it."

You're not interested in revealing too much about your feelings or your plans today as the strategic Moon-Pluto conjunction falls in your 4th House of Roots. In fact, others could see you as a stoic optimist who will not succumb to negative thinking. Although your logic is sound now, you may not reach the best decision unless you open your heart to the love and support that's all around you. Ultimately, you might not even need advice; you just need somebody to listen.

You have something significant to say about many different subjects today. Although you might prefer to remain quiet in a crowd, you're motivated to share what's on your mind with a receptive audience. You are viewing your world with a very practical lens now and are afraid that others could steer things in a different direction. Think through your message before speaking and be as concise as possible. Don't be dissuaded if you seem to be losing ground. Concentrate on your goal, speak your truth, and others will come around to your position in time.

An investment opportunity may come your way today and you would be wise to pursue it with gusto. However, this is not a get-rich-quick scheme; you can't sit by idly and expect money to grow on trees. This is a hands-on chance to turn sweat equity into something of intrinsic value. Once you make a commitment to participate in the project, don't throw in the towel until you reach your goal. The future belongs to those who create it.

You are prepared to take a strong position on nearly any matter that comes to you for consideration today. In fact, you may react in such an extreme manner that your behavior is upsetting to others. Nevertheless, you're not likely to temper your words; everyone must simply deal with the truth as you see it. Unfortunately, the ruthless Moon-Pluto conjunction in your 1st House of Personality can make you less effective unless you're willing to soften your stance. As Chinese physician and novelist Han Suyin wrote, "There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness."

You are working with specific goals in mind today, but you're more comfortable keeping them to yourself. The steady Capricorn Moon joins shadowy Pluto in your 12th House of Privacy, amplifying your power as long as you can surround yourself with an air of mystery. Additionally, you don't want to waste energy defending your plan until it has already gained enough momentum that it can't be stopped by someone else's criticism. Wait until the Moon returns to your sign tomorrow before you share any trade secrets.

It actually takes a village to do anything of consequence today. The Moon's conjunction with ruthless Pluto in your 11th House of Community symbolizes the extraordinary power that is generated by a group. Buckminster Fuller coined the word "synergy" to mean "the behavior of whole systems is greater than the sum of its parts." Nevertheless, things could get out of control for a while, making you wish you had gone solo. Don't deviate from your mission; lead by example and the group will come through to support you in your work.

Sometimes you gung-ho Rams can't tell the difference between assertion and aggression. However, your steady persistence is rewarded today because it counterbalances the progressive Sun-Uranus trine which blasts you clear into the future. An odd mixture of strategic planning and impulsive reactions can positively influence your work and help you reach your professional goals. Success doesn't just come and find you; you must go out and get it.

Innovation and common sense work in tandem today. The Sun's harmonious trine to independent Uranus in your 12th House of Fantasy sets your imagination free. Out-of-the-box solutions to stubborn problems empower you to untangle knots in your progress or raise your awareness to new levels of understanding. Unfortunately, all your brilliant concepts are useless now if you don't have the means to make them real. Nevertheless, if you want to achieve your dreams bad enough, you'll find a way rather than an excuse.

It requires courage to reveal your vulnerability instead of just showing off the clever side of your personality. The bighearted Leo Sun, shining in your 3rd House of Communication, motivates you to take chances and talk about your feelings, especially now that it's forming a liberating trine to spontaneous Uranus. Honesty can sometimes be a double-edged sword, but it's easier to build a solid foundation when you come straight from your heart. It takes time to build trust, but it's an essential ingredient in any type of relationship.

You can straddle the divide between caution and risk today by discovering and applying previously untapped talents and abilities. However, the creative Sun in your 2nd House of Self-Worth forms a supportive trine with Uranus, encouraging you to take chances in your professional life. This is your moment to shine; the cosmos is empowering you to be boldly innovative and break out of your familiar shell. As Robert Kennedy said, "Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly."

Allow yourself as much freedom to dream as you can today. Temporarily letting go of responsibilities gives you the space you need to see your life in a fresh new light. The unconventional Sun-Uranus trine opens your mind, creating an ideal time to release your old self-image, making way for a more amazing version of you with a more adventurous future. Learning to fly looks harder from the ground. Jump and your wings will appear.

Although your thoughts are truly brilliant now, people may not be able to understand what you're saying unless you simplify your concepts. Instead of rushing ahead in a flurry of words, slow down and explain everything methodically. Although a thrilling Sun-Uranus trine opens doors that were previously locked, it's still up to you to be careful so you can make the most of this more permissive environment. Today is an opportunity that vanishes tomorrow; don't waste one moment second-guessing yourself.

You're hesitant to come out and say what's on your mind today because you're worried about people misunderstanding your intentions. Although you might send subtle signals of interest to someone so you won't be noticed by others, your actions may be more obvious than you think. Luckily, a stroke of genius suddenly reveals a way for you to break free of an unpleasant situation as the Sun trines rebellious Uranus in your 7th House of Others. For once, it's better to say too much now than nothing at all.

It's as if a lightning rod is attracting unexpected events and encouraging radical behavior at work. Although this cosmic interference might normally be disturbing, the Sun's superconductive trine to electrifying Uranus is thrilling as it lights up your mind with original answers to existing questions. But don't waste this energy on attention-seeking antics; keep your ego in check and just do your job to the best of your ability. Success can be yours if you don't become arrogant or expect everything to fall your way. Humility is your friend.

Don't wait for someone else to rush in and save the day today. The dramatic Leo Sun's trine to radical Uranus calls for bold action that produces both emotional and financial rewards. Although you may be inspired by the vibrant Leo Sun's presence in your 9th House of Big Ideas, its awkward aspect to wounded Chiron leaves you uncertain about the value of your actions. Fortunately, your amazing ideas are the proof of the pudding if you trust in yourself. Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

There is chemistry at work today if you're open to the spontaneity of the moment. Collaborating closely with a creative partner sparks contagious excitement and fascinating ideas while the willful Sun in your 8th House of Shared Resources trines brilliant Uranus. Make sure to record your conversations for future use or the genius of the moment could be lost into space forever. As Dante wrote, "He listens well who takes notes."

You can take giant leaps over huge hurdles while the confident Sun in creative Leo forms a mind-opening trine with revolutionary Uranus. When you devote your heart and head to a cause, the obstacles you encounter are no match for the strength of your convictions. You're ready to carve out a unique path into the future that fully expresses your originality. This cosmic wake-up call releases you from doubt and drudgery today, clearing the way for others to follow in your pioneering footsteps.

It's as if you struggled up a mountain, arrived at the summit, and now finally enjoy an unobstructed view of the future. Your illusions are shattered by lightning bolts of awareness that awaken you from a foggy sleep. You can suddenly see the truth and are eager to apply your newfound passion to making something wonderful happen. Although you feel the exhilaration of the radiant Sun's trine to wild Uranus, you also realize how much work still lies ahead. Seek out new experiences, but proceed with caution, so you don't do anything you'll soon regret.

Prepare to journey to the bottom of the Sea of Mysteries today. You probably won't be very comfortable during this excursion, but you know it's something you must do to clear the air of hidden feelings. More emotions are brought to the surface than you prefer when compelling Venus trines dark Pluto, but you could return smiling from an unforgettable experience. As author Jack Canfield writes, "Everything you want is on the other side of fear."

Although you are usually willing to wait for what you want, you may lose your cool as the energy builds prior to tomorrow's Full Moon. A perceptive Venus-Pluto trine enables you to see through the apparent niceties in a romantic relationship, urging you to say what's left unsaid. Thankfully, your ability to cut past superficial issues and get to the heart of the matter offers closure that has been out of reach. Wake up with determination and go to bed with satisfaction.

Surprisingly, you're not in the mood for casual flirtations today. You need to make deeper connections as sensual Venus in laser-like Virgo dances into the shadows of unfathomable Pluto, intensifying your desires. Your eagerness to sink into heavier feelings without analyzing them allows you to overcome your fear of emotional vulnerability. Don't try to escape the complexity of the moment or you could miss the treasure that's waiting for your discovery. Stay fully engaged until the darkness transforms into the light of awareness.

Listening to a piece of friendly advice may help you become aware of resources you didn't realize you possessed. Hopefully you are ready to repair a relationship while diplomatic Venus forms a creative trine with regenerative Pluto. Thankfully, you are capable of processing deep feelings now without upsetting the status quo. Relationship problems are more easily resolved and you can address difficult issues with the power and self-control required to produce the desired outcome. Compassion is the key to your success.

A friend or partner might not respond as expected, raising uncharacteristic feelings of insecurity. This wave of self-doubt comes at an inconvenient time because an intense Venus-Pluto connection adds undeniable passion to everything you touch today. You don't want to show your feelings because it only puts you in a more vulnerable position. However, maintaining integrity is more important than anything else now that Venus is visiting your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Telling the truth may be awkward at first, but the emotional dynamics will quickly improve once everything is out in the open.

You are not afraid to step into the darker realms of your suppressed desires today. The love planet, Venus, creates an easy trine with intense Pluto to help you overcome complacency and make your needs known. Thankfully, the Aquarius Moon expands your perspective, allowing you to express yourself with sufficient detachment so others won't be overwhelmed by your disclosure. Deep emotional transformation is just around the corner if you possess the clarity of mind to choose growth over stagnation.

You may experience intense desires today, yet you must settle your thoughts in order to enjoy the richness of the experience. Although you're likely to be extra passionate about your cause now, you're also aware that there's a fine line between making your case and sounding like a fanatic. Fortunately, you're able to take care of emotional business productively when Venus in analytical Virgo forms a charming trine with shrewd Pluto. This favorable alignment can also make you highly persuasive without seeming the least bit pushy to anyone around you.

You're able to convey your strong passions to others today, yet you're not so overwhelmed by your own feelings that you sacrifice your good judgment in the process. Sharp perception shows you the potential in people that others can't see, while a profound awareness of what you need makes it simple to screen out distractions to get what you want. It's almost as if you can't go wrong as desirous Venus aligns in a harmonious trine with fierce Pluto, allowing you to apply your emotions intelligently. Repair a damaged relationship or strengthen a healthy one to take intimacy to a deeper level.

You excel at the art of persuasion today, and can easily convince others to give you the additional support you need. Stating your professional goals clearly entices the doubters to fall in line as they join your parade. The synergistic trine between magnetic Venus and passionate Pluto rewards you by revitalizing a valuable business relationship or setting a new one into place. Your talent for creating success through connections with others is solidified if you allow the energy to flow without restriction. It takes two sides to make a bridge.

You need to stop and make a decision before proceeding any further if your path to the future is still uncertain. Powerful Pluto in your sign is busy networking with resourceful Venus in your 9th House of Distant Horizons, reminding you to trust your feelings when it comes to setting long-term goals. As the Roman philosopher Seneca wrote, "If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable." Sink into your feelings; create a vibrant vision of your desired destination in your mind and make a promise to yourself to see your dream come to life.

You might feel quite vulnerable today, and your drive for intensity could arouse issues that connect love with power. Addressing your fears can be highly therapeutic, especially if you are able to bring your most secret desires out into the light while the soulful Moon is visiting your sign. Stop thinking about all of the alternatives; you already know what you need to do. Expressing your hidden feelings deepens a relationship as Venus forms a restorative trine to resurrecting Pluto. Don't build unnecessary walls between you and those you love.

Strong emotional undercurrents take you on a transformational journey today. You're not willing to accept "no" for an answer when sensual Venus forms a smooth trine to demanding Pluto, strengthening your desires. Unfortunately, it could be difficult to handle these intense feelings while the Moon is visiting emotionally detached Aquarius. But you may be pleasantly surprised with the results if you express your current dissatisfaction instead of suppressing the darker side of your attractions. It's lack of communication, not distance, that keeps people apart.

You might think you have not done enough work, but there is only one more hurdle to jump before you are given the green light on the road to your destination. The Aquarius Full Moon activates your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, urging you to envision the future and the steps you will need to take to make your dreams come true. However, you may feel stifled as forceful Mars inches closer to tough-guy Saturn. Nevertheless, hard work and brutal honesty are the tools necessary for your success. Stand up to the pressure and you will be granted a hard-earned victory sooner than you expect.

It appears as if someone is pushing you to take on additional responsibilities. Don't promise more than you can deliver now, even if you are willing to sacrifice some playtime to fulfill your obligations. Social demands may trigger your desire to retreat from the crowd. But it's nearly impossible to remain isolated when the Aquarius Full Moon draws your energy from the subjective personal realms into your 10th House of Public Life, where you are more concerned with the objective issues of community and career. As George Eliot wrote, "It is never too late to be what you might have been."

Old fantasies are being washed away to make room for new dreams. The detached Aquarius Full Moon shakes up your 9th House of Higher Truth, reminding you that enthusiasm doesn't necessarily alter reality. Your patterns of perception are changing; being more skeptical now isn't a turn toward cynicism, but breaking with outdated ideas makes way for a fresh view of the world. Thankfully, responsibilities that previously held you back are now relaxing their grip. Don't rush your first steps on your journey or you will be required to repeat them in the days ahead.

You're capable of setting your pride aside today so you can talk about your needs. Fortunately, the Aquarius Full Moon lands in your 8th House of Intimacy, encouraging you to reveal your heart as you strive to express your individuality. Although this is likely the beginning of a more outgoing cycle for you Crabs, emotional tension boils over if you try to ignore your true feelings. Fear of change might be prompting you to overreact, but burying your head in the sand is not helpful. Adaptability in the face of adversity is your greatest ally.

Don't try to overcome a sudden cooling of interest from a person you admire by being too aggressive in your approach. The Aquarius Full Moon falls in your 7th House of Partnerships, triggering unexpected behavior from a lover or a close friend. Or maybe you need to step back and look at things from a different angle to add more excitement to the relationship. Unfortunately, digging in your heels is not the answer; letting go of control is a must. Persistence, one of your greatest strengths, might actually be a weakness now. Pride is the longest distance between two people.

You understand the consequences of a recent decision and realize that you cannot turn back from the choices you already made. The Aquarius Full Moon in your 6th House of Health can overwhelm you with a wide variety of different options about your daily routines. In fact, your emotions may be so strong now that any lingering doubt about the intensity of these times quickly vanishes. Although you might be tempted to do something crazy for fast results, self-restraint and self-respect are the greatest gifts you can give yourself at this time.

You have run out of patience when it comes to people breaking promises, yet you might be ready to break a few of your own. The unconventional Aquarius Full Moon falls in your 5th House of Self-Expression, bringing out the quirky and playful side of your personality. Your craving for fun and attention is hard to ignore, possibly creating tension with your desire for privacy. But you have the right to take center stage, and then retreat when you so choose. It's fine to shine in the spotlight on occasion as long as you have an exit strategy in place.

You might not fully understand what's unfolding on the home front now. However, once you accept that the emotional dynamics are beyond rational analysis, you'll be able to glean important lessons from your experience. The quirky Aquarius Full Moon sinks into your 4th House of Foundations, surrounding you with a complicated array of alternatives. You intuitively know everything will work out fine, but frustration may take a few more days to play out as Mars moves toward its conjunction with uncompromising Saturn. Don't give up; it is often the last key on the ring that opens the door.

It's gratifying to be right, but avoid getting caught up in the philosophical disputes where one side has to be the winner and the other side the loser. Nevertheless, the Aquarius Full Moon inspires your 3rd House of Information, encouraging you to ask tough questions and seek honest answers. Just remember: opinions are just ideas attached to a belief. Sharing your thoughts without taking yourself too seriously produces the best results. Buddha said, "The root of suffering is attachment."

You may discover discrepancies with joint finances when the independent Aquarius Full Moon rattles your 2nd House of Money. Your problem might be as simple as feeling annoyed if someone is too careless with cash for your taste. Nevertheless, it's important to keep your reaction in check since an irritating Moon-Jupiter aspect possibly tricks you into believing you discovered a quick fix to the monetary crisis. Deviating from a budget can drain your resources, leaving you overspent in more ways than one. Saving money saves energy.

Melodrama runs rampant while the partial Lunar Eclipse in Aquarius polarizes your sign. This overstimulating Full Moon occurs in your 1st House of Personality, drawing your emotions very close to the surface. Others can see past your apparent detachment now. Your discomfort in dealing with your feelings could turn your frustration into anger as hot Mars moves to conjunct cold Saturn next week. As Tom Petty sings, "The waiting is the hardest part." Make sure to utilize your wicked sense of humor as often as possible.

You want to break free from the past and apply your vision to a higher cause when you are coaxed to express your feelings more openly. Your lifelong pursuit of spiritual meaning is reinvigorated as the cosmos delivers you an inspirational message. However, you might be tempted to run away from the monotony of your daily tasks now. Although the rebellious Aquarius Full Moon rattles your 12th House of Secrets, escaping is not a viable long-term solution. A head full of fears has no space for dreams.

You're desperately aiming to finish up your work before the weekend, but it's no easy matter to maintain your focus today. Your emotions are being dragged all over the place as people seem to come out of the woodwork just to create trouble. You might be unable to fit all the pieces of the puzzle back into place at first. However, you'll surely learn an important lesson about single-mindedness if you simply set your priorities early in the day. You can't win unless you're willing to be in the game.

Although you might try to be rational, there's no straight path to success today. Normally, your steady-as-she-goes demeanor is enough to keep you on track and everything in your world moving forward. But this strategic method only seems to land you further behind now. Nevertheless, there is hope -- assuming you're ready to surrender control. Paradoxically, you will soar through the day with flying colors if you can stay open to the idea of change.

A pile of responsibilities at work leaves little time for any other activities today. You're probably not very happy about needing to postpone personal pleasure while the spacey Pisces Moon reminds you how much fun it is to just hang out with friends. But don't get overly attached to everyone else's expectations; in the final analysis, there's only one person to whom you are beholden. When you feel a sense of proud accomplishment, your satisfaction will rub off on others.

So many thoughts are running around inside your head that you don't know where to start. Each time you begin a conversation today, it feels as if you should have said something else. It's like you're trying to sing karaoke yet the music keeps changing every time you sing a few notes. Nevertheless, don't quit when you are so close to expressing your creativity; your unwavering perseverance will pay off in the long run. Failure is not the opposite of success; it's a stepping stone to success.

You are on a mission and will not be lured off track by anyone's insistence or attempts at persuasion. However, a morning of fuzzy thinking gets you off to such a slow start that you're unsure if you will make any progress today. Luckily, this is a great opportunity to put your thoughts in order once and for all. But keep in mind there won't be any overnight miracles now; the work isn't glamorous and you must reach your goals the good old-fashioned way. Sweat plus sacrifice equals success.

Household responsibilities are multiplying faster than you can keep up with them. Thankfully, you don't need to finish every last chore today, just make sure you get a good start on them. Meanwhile, a close friend or partner may serve up an outrageous idea that's out of the question in its original form. Relentlessly bring every new option back down to the ground by assessing the pros and cons. Pursue only the ones that make practical sense after running it past your critical eye. Your standards are high for a reason.

You want to work on your own today because you believe you will stay focused if you don't encounter a lot of distractions. However, you still may require some support along the way to recharge your spirits when you're feeling depleted. Instead of just declining all invitations now, do what you Libras do best. Put yourself in the middle of the extremes by carefully balancing your social obligations with your personal desires. If you play your cards right, you can have your cake and eat it too.

You're connecting the dots with your peers today -- at work or in the neighborhood. Either way, you're a part of a larger cause that reinforces your personal identity. However, you still must leave fringe facets of your personality out of your interactions because others might not approve. But there's no reason to compromise your fundamental core values, for that's where you derive your strength. You can't understand the power of a community until you become a proud member of one.

It seems as if you are nearing the finish line on a marathon at work, but you can't slow down yet. There are a few more hurdles to overcome before you can take a rest and catch your breath. You're in tune with your emotional roots now, whether they stem from family or business. But either way, you may be slightly out of your element. Face it, you can't fit a round peg in a square hole, and the sooner you realize this, the happier you will be. Embracing what makes you unique gives everyone else the chance to do the same.

Making plans can be a real challenge if you're unsure of your destination; nevertheless, you might go ahead and try to create a road map anyhow. Unfortunately, putting the cart before the horse is not the most effective method of transportation. Take a few steps back and consider all the possibilities for your next adventure. There's no reason to obsess over the details until the larger pieces of the puzzle all fit together.

It's safer to delve into the emotional realms if you narrow your vision and concentrate on one aspect of your feelings at a time. But even if you're certain that your new conversational topic isn't controversial, the discussion still takes a weird turn and you find yourself in a dangerous metaphysical neighborhood. Keep aiming your thoughts upward toward the sky; dismiss any negativity or doubt from your mind. Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.

You can't trust others today because their plans seem out of touch with reality. But once you thoroughly vet someone's idea, you might actually discover they are on to something brilliant. Naturally, you don't want to waste energy on a wild goose chase that leads you nowhere in particular, but neither do you want to miss out on an unexpected opportunity. Exercising caution at the beginning of a conversation can save you endless hours of not getting anywhere at all. Performing your due diligence pays off.

You can tell that your world is in flux because there are more positive possibilities ahead now than negative ones. What seemed nearly impossible just yesterday is more than likely today. You don't feel like you're just glossing over the bad news; something is really shifting and you want to be a part of it. This is no time to idly stand by and wait for opportunity to knock on your door. President Abraham Lincoln said, "The best way to predict the future is to create it."

You are often content to follow the letter of the law. In fact, sometimes the social restraints add to your productivity because you accomplish more when you're feeling safe and secure than when you're uncertain about your role. Nevertheless, you might attempt to bend the rules today, especially if you're ready to try something entirely new. Your out-of-the-box behavior could surprise others, but people will stop criticizing you once they see your genius at work. Maintain your integrity and you will win over even your loudest detractors.

Although your thinking is a bit more cautious now, you still realize you will need to take a risk to get what you want. You might be tempted to run with your first idea when deciding what to do today. However, you can take a simple thought and inflate it into one that is so unrealistic that there is little chance of it manifesting. Thankfully, the potential for success grows throughout the day. Keep refining your best plans and then swing into action, but not until your heart says yes.

It's refreshing when your social and domestic commitments don't stand in the way of your active inner life. Fantasies continue to spin a web of enchantment today, even if you keep snapping your thoughts back to reality. Luckily, you are quite discerning now and can easily separate facts from fancy; nevertheless, you're still eager to slip off into your daydreams whenever you get the chance. Give yourself permission to come and go between both worlds as needed. But don't let this propitious moment pass without taking action that moves you closer to your goals.

There's a palpable uneasiness in the air; your heart is open and ready to reveal its truth but you just don't know how to put your feelings into words. It might be frustrating at first because you want others to see the real you rather than how you outwardly appear. Instead of spiraling into uncertainty, continue to explore your emotions as they deepen and change. If you are patient with yourself, you might just discover that your behavior is expressing everything you wanted to say. Sometimes actions really do speak louder than words.

You take great comfort in knowing the facts and sticking to them in all that you do. However, you might be challenged to determine where reality ends and your dreams begin while bombastic Jupiter blows details out of proportion. Fortunately, you can stretch the truth in creative ways today, enabling you to find ingenious solutions to the same problems that stumped you yesterday. Let your faith be bigger than your fear.

There's no urgency to share all your fantasies today; in fact, one of the most thrilling parts of your private explorations is knowing that you can keep them entirely to yourself. Nevertheless, it certainly could be more fun if you tell your dreams to someone you trust. However, you don't really know what might happen if you open the door to your inner world. Although you might be judged or even rejected, you also could be embraced for your courage. The risk of saying nothing is the greatest risk of all.

You're ready to fly today, even if you have multiple destinations in mind. In fact, you're so eager to launch into your future that your lack of wings might not even be enough to stop you. Paradoxically, you're not interested in making it up as you go. Although optimistic Jupiter encourages impatient Mars to make a move, you can feel the weight of consequences lurking around the corner. You know that irresponsible behavior won't serve you well. Continue to consider all the options until one stands out so far above the rest that you know it's yours.

Although all signals appear to be giving you the green light today, you feel the looming conjunction of hot Mars and cold Saturn close on your tail. You want to join a party already in progress or head off on a little adventure of your own, but common sense prevails when it comes to your calendar. Nevertheless, you can still enjoy the evening, with or without others, as long as you maintain control over your schedule. Don't rush anything now; everything will fall into place when the time is right.

The more grandiose the adventure, the more eager you are to embark. You're typically the realistic one who needs to keep your feet on the ground. However, you're tired of always coloring within the lines. You like the idea of loosening up and wandering off the beaten path now. Sometimes it feels good to relax and have faith that everything will turn out for the best. Just make sure to keep the end game in mind. If you need to reclaim control for any reason, you can be back in the driver's seat in a moment's notice.

Surprising others with your eclectic beliefs or your open-minded approach to life never gets old. Thankfully, you have a chance to test the limits today when sharing your feelings with a family member or close friend. You're particularly aware that rules of etiquette can make it easier to mask complicated emotions. However, your curiosity allows you to play with the edges as you explore the deeper side of relationships. Nevertheless, remember that pushing your boundaries doesn't mean it's okay to push anyone else's.

You're intrigued by someone's invitation today because it sounds like so much fun. The timing might be perfect because you're looking forward to doing something special now. However, there could be more going on than meets the eye. Be certain that everyone's agenda is on the table from the beginning since it may be awkward to change your mind once you say yes. Thankfully, your actions have more immediate consequences as the day progresses, so don't hesitate to speak your truth and act accordingly.

Your plans begin to take shape as your impulsive reactions gain momentum throughout the day. Stabilizing Saturn enters the picture today, enabling you to construct a solid foundation on which to build your future. Although you are feeling your oats now that the Moon has returned to your incorrigible sign, her meeting with shadowy Pluto can hijack your efforts and significantly alter your priorities. Continue to keep your eyes on the final destination. Eliminating distractions as they arise improves your chances for success.

You don't like to be pushed into anything against your will, even if it's for your own good. Although you possess the good sense not to resist earlier in the day, you might grow resentful later when you wish you were doing anything else. But rather than obsessing about your current uncertainty, shift your attention to someone or something you can count on. There's no need to create a drama where there isn't one.

You're excited about the prospects of doing something special with a close friend or relative today. However, there's no need to use your current plans to escape from previous promises. In fact, fulfilling your obligations early in the day frees you up to travel the outer edges of your mental explorations later on. But don't try to convince anyone that your philosophy is the only one that matters. Although you might not see how all the separate pieces of your life are interrelated in this moment, you will understand soon enough. Patience is the companion of wisdom.

You're ready to spread your wings and fly today, yet run into complex dynamics that force you to change your plans. You could encounter delays that turn out to be the result of someone covertly working against your efforts. However, you can't face an unseen enemy; it's like shadow boxing with an invisible opponent. Instead of looking outside yourself for answers, explore your own resistance to success. When you understand your fears, the external obstacles will likely fade away. As Carl Jung wrote, "We always see our own unavowed mistakes in our opponent."

You're eager to go the extra mile today because you see the potential for beauty everywhere you look. Fortunately, you can rely on your solid thinking as long as you don't let the current spontaneity of the Aries Moon run off with your day. But Luna harmonizes with feisty Mars and authoritarian Saturn in your 5th House of Self-Expression, urging you to bust out of your self-imposed restraints. It's challenging to find the Goldilocks point where everything is exactly just right. Perfection is in the eyes of the beholder.

You're in an odd state of mind now because you want to mingle with interesting people yet have no patience for any opinions that conflict with your own. You could end up planning to attend a social event, only to back out at the last moment when you realize the same old people will be in attendance. You currently crave the excitement that goes along with rubbing elbows with new and different people, and you won't even have a chance to do so if you're at home sitting on the sofa. Forget about all the logical reasons to turn down an invitation today; just smile and say yes.

You don't usually mind redirecting love and admiration away from yourself and onto your friend or partner. However, you grow annoyed now when someone else consistently tries to commandeer the center of attention. The spontaneous Aries Moon shines in your 7th House of Others, drawing the crowd's attention elsewhere and you don't like feeling as if you're invisible. There's no need to fight against the natural flow of energy since you will attract your fair share of recognition soon enough. A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle.

Your mental bandwidth is narrowly focused on all the things you must finish today. Separately, each item sounds manageable, but all together they seem so daunting that you might not know where to begin. A little forethought is a good idea, but too much thinking now sets major delays into motion and places you even further behind the eight ball. Don't worry about the problems you encounter; you can successfully handle them one at a time. Author Saul Bellow wrote, "Whoever wants to reach a distant goal must take small steps."

You're flying off into the wild blue yonder today, but you only have a small amount of gas in your tank. The planetary emphasis on Fire signs ensures you won't be lacking for wonderful activities to capture your imagination. However, building pressure from the mid-week Mars-Saturn conjunction is already slowing your progress and forcing you to be hyperaware of every move you make. Easy does it for the next couple of days if you want the magic to last.

Ingenious ideas are buzzing around inside your head now, but you may be insecure about sharing them with anyone else. The pioneering Aries Moon is traveling through your 4th House of Foundations, empowering you to explore creative options at home. Although this might sound contradictory, there is so much you can do without venturing far into the world. Unfortunately, refusing is tricky if someone insists that you participate in his or her adventure. As Paulo Coelho writes, "When you say yes to others, make sure you are not saying no to yourself."

Everything seems to be fine today until you open your mouth. The bossy Aries Moon in your 3rd House of Communication squares unrelenting Pluto, bringing hidden issues out into the blinding light of day. You might be surprised when you run into negativity from someone you thought was a friend. Nevertheless, it's impossible to overcome a problem unless you identify it. Better the devil you know than the devil you don't.

You might try to power your way through a tricky situation today, but somehow keep stalling at the same point in your process. It doesn't even seem to help when others cheer you on from the sidelines. In fact, the support you receive encourages you to keep pushing in the same ineffective manner, setting you up for a fall. Fortunately, there's a lesser known way to reach your goals; working smarter, not harder all but guarantees your success.

You are so focused on doing a good job today that you can get lost in even the smallest task. Learning how to adjust your methods at work is especially important once the Sun moves into modest Virgo to join an ongoing planetary party in your 6th House of Service. This is an excellent time to sharpen old skills and develop new ones. But getting attention is not the same as getting results. When you make a good impression, follow up with hard work to maximize the return on your efforts.

While it's smart to have the right data at your fingertips, too much information can weigh you down and prevent you from reacting spontaneously. The way in which you see your world determines how you live in it. Naturally, you want to take responsibility and do what's expected of you. However, it's also beneficial to make time for fun when the Sun dances into virtuous Virgo and your 5th House of Fun and Games. Never get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life.

Redefining your relationship with your home and family entails a complex mix of thinking and feeling. However, you receive a convincing invitation to reality when the Sun moves into pragmatic Virgo and your 4th House of Security. Thankfully, observing how your subconscious mind operates can help you turn anxiety into opportunity. Recognizing and respecting the line between enthusiasm and hyperactivity actually makes it possible to enjoy the thrills of discovery without losing your perspective or scattering your energy.

No matter how busy you think you are now, the cosmos is raising the ante and you will soon be even busier. There's no time to rest once the Sun rushes into your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, making it nearly impossible to keep up with everything that's happening. Be prepared to pass up a chance for career advancement if the trade-off is to keep your life in balance. Every lucrative possibility that comes along isn't necessarily the right one for you. Making informed choices today means no regrets tomorrow.

The best way to collaborate with individuals who are working with ideas contrary to your position is to balance your joyful creativity with objectivity and common sense. The Sun's shift into prudent Virgo and your 2nd House of Resources reminds you to attend to pressing financial matters while they are still manageable. Of course, being thrifty today helps, but upgrading your present arsenal of skills or learning an entirely new trade is even more financially beneficial in the long run. Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others.

Easy Street might appear to be around the next corner, motivating you to take a shortcut and make a mad dash for the finish line. Unfortunately, this impatient move is not wise -- opposing forces may be stronger than you realize. Proceed with caution, instead of trying to force progress today. Sometimes you can make a sensible decision by lining up all the alternatives and rationally eliminating them one by one. However, you're better off now entertaining each possibility on its own merits as it appears. Carl Jung wrote, "Synchronicity is an ever present reality for those who have eyes to see it."

Take some time away from the maddening crowds for a hefty dose of self-reflection now. Engaging in a spiritual practice counterbalances the high levels of personal and professional activity that are bound to keep you hopping throughout this month. Nevertheless, serious matters demand your attention with the Sun's presence in methodical Virgo and your 12th House of Privacy. Make adjustments if you're helping others without getting anything in return. Healthy relationships depend on mutual support and respect.

Your future is brighter than you realize even if your plans are up in the air. Your fears about the direction of your life may be exacerbated now; thankfully, you can rely on your inner voice to come through with sound advice. Listening to your intuition helps you resist the temptation to overstep your current boundaries and enables you to proceed with sensible caution. Nevertheless, you will go places you never dreamed if you can stay open to change.

Brilliant insights pop out of thin air while your nerves are stretched tight by practical issues. Taking center stage seems natural now that the hardworking Virgo Sun is shining in your 10th House of Career. Concentrating on immediate tasks while polishing your skills raises your status on the job, but a lack of focus could reduce your effectiveness. If you aspire to turn your life in a radical new direction, lay down a solid foundation with disciplined competence to create a future that aligns with your dreams.

The future is now and you're ready to apply the principles that you hold most dear. Thankfully, practical intelligence is a gift of the Sun's entry into technically astute Virgo and your 9th House of Higher Mind. Mapping out the details of a complex journey comes easily today; you're primed to learn from the best and can be an effective teacher for those who lack your skills and experience. Step up to the plate; it's your turn to manifest positive change in your life and in the world around you.

Being flexible enough to shift from making plans for the future to addressing the nuts and bolts of present logistics is essential for creating more effective alliances now. But general principles give way to concrete pragmatism as the Sun shifts into earthy Virgo and your 8th House of Shared Resources. Blaming others isn't helpful if reality doesn't match up to your expectations. The "Lazy Man's Guide to Enlightenment" reminds us, "What happens is not as important as how you react to what happens."

All types of relationships find their way into the spotlight now. The Sun's entry into ethical Virgo and your 7th House of Companions starkly illuminates the complex dynamics of your partnerships, while encouraging you to work through unresolved issues with others. Discovering a new truth can be a powerful source of inspiration, but testing it diligently will reveal whether it's actually useful or just a passing thought. Your priorities might change even if you don't.

It's easy to forget your real worth now if you're confused by a spiral of self-doubt. Although you may be the target of someone's negativity, other people's actions might actually be a reminder to examine your own role in the current conflict. Don't succumb to the temptation of escaping into indulgences or denial. Instead, buckle down and overcome the resistance by tackling your obligations one at a time in an orderly manner. Work hard in silence; let your success be your noise.

Your inner work is preparing you to make external changes that involve others in your life. Although this emotional process should be relatively straightforward while the Moon is visiting your determined sign, you could meet one challenge after another now. Don't even consider quitting, no matter how weary you are of confronting adversity. The looming Mars-Saturn conjunction is one of the best transits for concentration and productivity, even if you're annoyed about how the current circumstances are unfolding. Put your suppressed anger to good use and you will be blessed with something lasting to show for it.

A sudden realization reveals a radical solution to an existing problem today. But you must consistently follow through on your intentions or people will lose faith in you. A hard-core conjunction between expressive Mars and repressive Saturn imposes limits that separate truth from fiction now. Relationships can be tested by a lack of trust or by mounting stress; if you value the connection, focus on fixing the situation instead of adding more emotional fuel to the fire. St. Thomas Aquinas wrote, "A man has free choice to the extent that he is rational."

An out-of-the-box breakthrough at work drives home the idea that you can do anything you set your mind to now. However, hot-to-trot Mars pushes against the cooling authority of Saturn, causing frustration to build to a breaking point. Resolving your dilemma seems impossible today, for there's no easy way to express your feelings without creating an unwanted negative response in return. Take a walk, engage in strenuous exercise, or do some yoga -- anything that burns off excess energy. Ultimately, the solutions based on meticulous planning combined with hard work are the ones that will accomplish the most.

You might believe your new plan will solve all that ails you. However, a tough Mars-Saturn hookup in your 5th House of Self-Expression puts an end to any pie-in-the-sky thinking. Forget about making grand gestures and fulfilling your desire to be king of the jungle. Instead, just take the practical route and focus all your energy now on overcoming the obstacles in front of you. This is your time to squash the lingering resistance that prevents you from experiencing happiness. As Gandhi said, "Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment. Full effort is full victory."

Escaping to an exotic location might sound like the spiritual antidote you need now, but the practical realities of your life won't allow such irresponsible behavior. Assertive Mars joins up with make-it-real Saturn in your 4th House of Foundations, requiring you to take a small but solid step toward upgrading your domestic life. Strengthen family bonds by working for a common cause. Choose your actions carefully, for anything put into motion now will produce positive results, as long as you don't expect it to be an overnight success.

You may experience a heightened sense of frustration now as energetically expressive Mars slams into the confines of Saturn's walls. This is not the best time to push your opinions on others. Easing up in your approach helps to create the enduring impact you hope to achieve. Don't wag your tongue or scatter your energies; instead, focus your intentions and act with conviction. Handling issues with serious determination can finally free you from the constraints that have limited your success in the past.

You prefer to keep your vulnerabilities hidden under lock and key, but they can still find a way to surface. Although you may be managing a crisis in the material world, there are other issues to consider now. While you could be short of cash or feel restrained by someone who isn't acknowledging your true worth, the real dilemma is your inability to just be yourself. Remember, you might be bringing leftover feelings of rejection into this new situation. Forgiving the past empowers you to face the present with compassion for everyone you encounter. Loving others starts with loving yourself.

Choices made now are likely to have long-term consequences, especially regarding your career. Sobering Saturn anchors impulsive Mars in your inspirational sign, so don't expect a success story to develop if you act out of haste. The bigger the commitment, the more cautious you should be about making it. If you feel competitive juices flowing or your adrenaline rising, contain the excitement so you can direct it with clear purpose and maximum control. Channel your passion into your work.

A complex combination of overreaction and self-restraint makes for an emotionally trying day. The planetary pressure builds and you could feel either confined or ignored as assertive Mars meets up with oppressive Saturn. Use these conflicting energies in a constructive manner by hatching a plan that is consistent with your destiny as you see it. This moment in time is just the start of a long process, so don't worry if everything seems to move in slow motion for a while. The art of discipline is just choosing between what you want now and what you want most.

Hang on to your hat, for an instant replay of the past few months is possible today. You are caught in the middle of a cosmic game of chance, reminding you of other times in your life when you didn't get what you wanted, or when you fell short of your target. One minute you're not sure of your next move, and the next moment you're impulsively jumping into a new venture or relationship without considering the ramifications. But don't try to make anything permanent now. Letting the energy play on through allows you to find a unique solution to this familiar predicament.

Power struggles are spawned by your bright ideas and the subsequent resistance you encounter. However, self-restraint is the key ingredient for moving through this dynamic phase when impetuous Mars slams into cautious Saturn in your 10th House of Career. What began as a whimsical inspiration now requires planning and management. Push ahead with determination, even when pleasure tempts you to relax. Skipping a party or missing a concert won't feel like a sacrifice when keeping your commitment to yourself can be so much more satisfying in the long run.

It might seem as if you're fighting an uphill battle when it comes to making plans for the future. Every time you decide on a course of action, circumstances throw you another curve ball. Thankfully, your luck is about to change in a significant manner as your key planet Mars pushes past constrictive Saturn. Reconsider your priorities one more time since your current trajectory will determine your progress in the weeks ahead. As Professor Irwin Corey said, "If we don't change direction soon, we'll end up where we're going."

Salmon fight against the river's currents and demonstrate great intention by swimming upstream to spawn. Your unflappable determination has brought you this far on your quest to deepen a relationship, even if the waters seem too shallow for passage. But the tide is shifting now and it will soon be obvious that you are not at the end of the journey. Continue to work for whatever is most important to you without taking the easy way out. Napoleon Hill wrote, "Effort will release its reward only after you refuse to quit."

Someone close to you may still be sending mixed messages by flashing a red light and green light at the same time. Unfortunately, you don't know whether to speed up or slow down; whatever strategy you try, the opposite seems to be a wiser approach. It's nearly impossible to blast ahead and screech to a halt all at once, but that's exactly what you must do. This cosmic dilemma requires you to hold two different positions simultaneously. Although it might sound corny, it's just another chance for your brilliant thinking to work its magic.

You wish you could deviate from your predetermined action plan today. Thankfully, you are given a chance to shed heavy-handed Saturn's weight and head out on a course of your own choosing. But don't wait until it's too late. Take small steps at first until you establish a steady pace. Once you start moving, it really doesn't matter that you're still figuring out your final destination. Nevertheless, changing dynamics require you to modify your game. You might not be able to control your reactions, but you can control your response.

Spontaneously connecting with your inner child invites your mini-me to come out to create mischief. But something still continues to hold you back from freely expressing the innocence of your heartfelt desires. Sadly, you can grow up too quickly by accepting a more mature set of duties and responsibilities. Or, you could respond to the situation by revisiting your childhood. George Bernard Shaw wrote, "We do not stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing."

There is so much happening in your life now that you're uncertain about how to dig your way out of the overloaded present moment. However, everything is about to change and you will be surprised by how much time you have on your hands. Nevertheless, waiting to make your move is a mistake, since the sooner you start on your new path, the better. Nobody is ever too busy; it's just a matter of reshuffling your priorities and improving your attitude.

It doesn't matter how long you've been trying to bring up a sticky subject at work without any success. The very same topic is somehow approachable now, and the resistance seems to have vanished into thin air. Nevertheless, your discussions may not fulfill your expectations because of their lack of intensity. But don't make lasting judgments based upon an arbitrary classification. Friendships and work relationships elude categorization. Embrace each person according to his or her characteristics, not position or title. Everyone you encounter is your teacher.

Although you appreciate certain aspects of your personality more than others, it's discouraging when people criticize you for those very same traits. You may be clear about your long-term goals, but can still be reticent when it comes to standing up for your rights. You are a child of the universe and have as much right to be your authentic self as anyone else does. Remember, you were born to be real, not perfect. An original is worth more than a copy.

One minute you're waxing eloquently about the need to strike when the iron is hot; the next minute, you may be lost in a cloud of self-doubt. However, you are at a tipping point and are ready to leave uncertainty behind as a new wave of confidence ripples through your life. Don't spend a lot of time today trying to figure out what has changed. Just set your sites on your next goal and do whatever is necessary to reach your desired destination. Winners are not people who never fail, but people who never quit.

You excel at mapping out your plan and then executing it step by step. Although this methodical approach is likely behind your current achievements, it won't carry you to your next milestone. Oddly enough, your own ideas can be your greatest limitations now. In fact, you might need to throw away your previous blueprint for success and just make it up as you go. The exhilaration you feel from playing without a game plan can fuel your efforts for a long-term conquest. Taoist philosopher Wei Wu Wei wrote, "Spontaneity is being present in the present."

Acknowledging your need for structure is imperative today, especially as you look forward to the future. You're eager to move your life in a more meaningful direction, but you might temporarily be wary of the unknown. Thankfully, you can have it both ways now if you are sufficiently ready for this major undertaking. Prepare by going over your plan one last time. However, keep in mind that you can't navigate into the future by replaying history. There's no time to gaze back in the rearview mirror when you must keep your eyes peeled on the road ahead.

Everyone seems to have their own idea about what you should be doing to make the most of your natural talents. But you might balk at listening to any advice now because it all sounds so critical to your ears. Remember that others judge you based upon their limited perceptions of your capabilities. Nevertheless, you possess a rare opportunity to set a career goal and then work toward making it real. No matter who gives up on you, don't ever give up on yourself.

Don't ask questions today unless you want to hear the unvarnished truth. The answers you receive may not be what you expect, but you must listen to the response even if it triggers a difficult conversation. Although you might be surprised or even shocked by what you learn, assimilating the new information will open your eyes. Slipping into denial can appear to be the easier route but, unfortunately, won't lead you to your desired destination. Knowledge is power.

You're on the lookout for something radically different today, whether it's an idea that frees you from your regular thinking patterns or an unconventional person who stretches your sense of normalcy. However, your outrageous behavior comes with a cost; if you take your rebellion too far, you will be stopped in your tracks when the Moon opposes karmic Saturn. Moderating your response before you're in over your head is wiser than dealing with the fallout after the fact.

You could feel like you're a ship without a rudder today as the currents pull you one way and then another. You don't seem to be able to control your direction even if you know which way you want to go. But instead of exhausting yourself by fighting against the prevailing winds, it's smarter to save your energy until it can serve your purpose. In the meantime, enjoy the ride. You won't know where you might land until the tides begin to shift. Thankfully, they will ultimately carry you back home.

People may question your current choices, but you're not likely to reveal your motives now. You have your reasons for pursuing the road less traveled while quietly working on your own agenda. However, your decisions are yours alone and you don't want to talk about them until you are more confident about your new direction. Nevertheless, pushing against your discomfort by sharing your unfinished plans with a potential supporter can be the catalyst you need to jolt you into action.

No matter how much money you make these days, you have your eye on additional sources of income now. However, putting your plan into motion may be more complicated than it seems in your fantasies. Although you might run into an obstacle or even a setback, meeting the current challenges demonstrates your strength of purpose. Don't settle for less than you're capable of as you take the external resistance in stride. Continue to show up with your irrepressible light and shine it to the best of your ability.

It feels as if you have only one chance to get it right today when it comes to a career decision. Opportunities abound, but there is a personal price to pay for avoiding a domestic responsibility. Take your time and reconsider your priorities; there's nothing wrong with choosing work over home and family as long as it's a conscious choice. Discuss your options with your most trusted companions. However, answers will not arrive in the form of good advice; they will only be revealed now as inner truths.

Your hidden desires can leak out into the open as the whimsical Gemini Moon prompts you to talk first and think later. You might say something in a totally casual or even sarcastic manner today, but it doesn't matter once the cat is out of the bag. Your comments may be problematic at first if others overreact to your disclosure. But don't back down or try to minimize your truth. Although a heartfelt discussion is necessary before emotions settle down again, you will ultimately feel relieved once your secret is told. Sometimes honesty is the best gift you can give.

Your financial decisions may raise someone's eyebrows today, but probably not because you're spending too much. In fact, others might see you as stingier than you actually are. If cash is tight, make sure you're not overreacting by being penny wise and pound foolish. Fortunately, modifying your budget now can produce lasting positive effects while the Moon is reflecting on Saturn and Mars in your 2nd House of Personal Resources. Nevertheless, remember Bob Marley's last words, "Money can't buy life."

The same people who normally give you the best advice seem to be talking out of both sides of their mouths today. You can't get a simple answer to a straightforward question from anyone now that the loquacious Gemini Moon is hijacking your 7th House of Relationships. However, it's not everyone else who is unclear now; it's most likely your indecision that creates the ambiguity. Listen to your own internal discussion; if you want to achieve greatness, stop asking others for permission.

There are so many tasks to complete today that you just want to walk away from it all. Ironically, you can finish everything in a timely fashion, but the more you think about all there is to do, the more your frustration impedes your productivity. The only way to break this vicious cycle is to consciously shift your frame of reference. Look at your chores as a challenge and turn your work into a game. Change your attitude, change your life.

Your friends are inconsistent today, encouraging you one minute and then criticizing you the next. You're particularly sensitive to their words and might be confused by their mixed messages. Nevertheless, you're ready to reach beyond the status quo now and shake up any stagnant energy. However, expressing your feelings is a bit risky because it can add to the instability of the moment. Let go of your assumptions and adapt to the circumstances as they continue to twist and turn. Deepak Chopra wrote, "All great changes are preceded by chaos."

Professional obligations weigh heavily on your shoulders today, but you have a bit of magic up your sleeve that enables you to dream your way through the rough patches. You can accept your fate at face value and work extra hard to meet everyone's expectations. Or you could use your creativity to invent new solutions that change the rules of the game. Your imagination is the source of great inspiration if you're willing to tap into the power of lateral thinking now. As Harry Houdini said, "My brain is the key that sets me free."

A realistic approach to your unfulfilled dreams prevents you from quitting your job and sailing off into the sunset. However, action-hero Mars is stepping away from Saturn's stern grasp in your 9th House of Big Ideas and your mind churns with every imaginable possibility. Your fantasies are like a runaway train now, and mystical Neptune's presence tempts you to throw caution to the wind. Give yourself permission to dream the impossible dream, but don't try to turn every passing whim into reality or you'll exhaust yourself in the process.

Your boundaries are being stretched beyond the regular limits today, yet it's better to take a calculated risk of your own choosing than to react to a challenge thrust upon you. But it's difficult to fully comprehend the bigger picture now as nebulous Neptune squares Mars in your 8th House of Transformation, distorting your perception of change. Nevertheless, if your overactive imagination prompts you to expect more from your relationships, get busy and make your wishes come true.

You have something to say to nearly everyone today, but not everyone has something to say to you. Although you're normally quick to interact with others, the Moon in your curious sign causes you to think so fast you misread people's signals. Unfortunately, a deceptive Mars-Neptune square indicates that your incorrect interpretation sets you up to chase an illusion. A small but conscious modification to your fantasy may be all that's needed to put it within reach.

You might be grappling with the fine line between fact and fantasy as your serious nature snaps you back from the realms of imagination today. But just as you accept the limitation of your daily work duties, a surreal Mars-Neptune square urges you all over again to believe in the possibility of your wildest dreams. Red-hot Mars fuels your enthusiasm, which feeds your professional ambitions. Nevertheless, you could lead yourself astray if your actions are not grounded in reality. Finding the sweet spot between the rational and irrational is your ticket to success.

Confusing messages about love make it tricky to know how to react now. While expressive Mars energizes your 5th House of Romance, its dynamic square to magical Neptune stimulates your imagination. Thrill-seeking is a wonderful distraction unless your impulsive actions are slightly off target. Fortunately, a practical plan saves the day because stabilizing Saturn grounds your fanciful flights with reality and gives you a chance to actually find the elusive pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.

You want to be appreciated for your authenticity, but your actions don't seem to communicate your real intentions. Avoiding negative thinking is a real challenge today, especially if you feel like others aren't seeing you in your true light. Unfortunately, you might overcompensate for your apparent invisibility by telling stories or exaggerating the facts while delusional Neptune squares defensive Mars in inspirational Sagittarius. Ultimately, you must set your own limits; no one will do it for you.

You can be quite decisive about your goals today, but uncertainty at work makes it difficult to execute your plan. Clinging to your original agenda brings frustration as your destination grows further and further away. Thankfully, freeing yourself from an impossible situation is as simple as altering your approach. Instead of waiting for clarification from your coworkers, just proceed confidently until you receive feedback that you need to reset your bearings. Remaining unattached to the outcome prevents emotional distress. Maintaining a sense of humor helps you roll with the punches.

Although you may have already drawn a line in the sand, your solid grasp of the facts seems to be slowly slipping away. Optimism is a positive motivating factor, but when blind it can prompt you to overstep sensible limits in your quest for emotional satisfaction. Exercising extra caution is advisable now so you don't act on a foolish impulse. Thankfully, responsible Saturn empowers you with the persistence and patience you need to gain the self-mastery you seek.

It might seem like you stood up tall to one challenge after another and are now, finally, ready to fly. Warrior Mars in your sign is enthusiastically wired to push ahead on all fronts. However, Mars forms a debilitating square to fantasy-prone Neptune, muddying the waters and making it more complicated to take on an adversary or just go for the gold.
