Ultimately, you may find your toughest competition is staring right back at you in the mirror.

You are not enthused about sharing your ideas with your colleagues now because you're afraid they won't approve of your radical methods. After all, you're more ambitious than others; sometimes you even need to cool your jets if you get too far ahead of the pack. Underestimating the size of a job can mean big trouble down the road while a blurry Mars-Neptune square distorts your 3rd House of Information. Preemptively slow down and ask others for their feedback. Resist less; listen more.

You're eager to wage battle for a cause today, but you could flounder if you don't have all your facts in order and your ducks in a row. Thankfully, you can be very successful if you're willing to accept the assistance of your allies now that action-packed Mars is visiting your 11th House of Networking. Nevertheless, as noble as it is to fight for something important, stop and re-evaluate your plan before foggy Neptune sends you on a wild good chase. Moderating your efforts prevents you from wasting a lot of time and energy before it's too late.

Words flow off your tongue today, enabling you to charm your way into someone's heart or mind. Thankfully, you possess the gift of gab while the Moon is visiting witty Gemini. Nevertheless, you might be fighting with ghosts while courageous Mars squares phantasmagorical Neptune in your sign. Focusing your energy on practical goals may be an uphill battle now if you're too busy talking up a storm. When you need something concrete to believe in, start with yourself.

What starts as an irresolvable conflict between what you want and what you must do magically transforms into a best-case scenario today. Taking steps to manifest your dreams could paint a rosy picture, but the truth will be revealed because your feelings are running deeper than usual. You will not be satisfied until you fulfill your desires in a sustainable manner. Thankfully, sweet Venus canoodles with magnanimous Jupiter, indulging you with love and happiness if you give generously from your heart.

Your reluctance to compromise could be a mistake that alienates people today. Fortunately, philosophical Jupiter's conjunction with mental Mercury and diplomatic Venus arms you with information that helps resolve a sticky situation. However, consciously choosing to be flexible restores intellectual and emotional connections. Keep in mind there's no need to withdraw to protect your heart since lucky Jupiter's presence indicates a promising outcome to your recent drama. The most important trip you may take in life is meeting people halfway.

Your brain is running at warp speed with your mouth running just as fast. Luckily, your key planet Mercury is buzzing around a delicious Venus-Jupiter conjunction, revealing a treasure trove of wonderful ideas. Your genuine optimism plays a significant role in creating abundance when it comes to love and recognition. Use your positive thinking selectively, instead of believing that everything is for your personal gain. As Oprah Winfrey said, "What we dwell on is who we become."

You seem to have plenty of information to share today but, thankfully, you don't come across like a know-it-all. Charming Venus kisses generous Jupiter to continue a positive-people trend in your life. Happily, you're able to gain admiration from others and draw them into your world. Although the compliments you hear now may be flattering, they could be lacking in sincerity. Flirting and teasing are sweet pastimes, but rarely have lasting value. In the end, kindness and compassion are the keys to your heart.

You can feel the good vibrations now, offering you a break from a recent financial struggle. But even if money matters remain unchanged, you might be self-indulgent anyhow. A sweet conjunction between beautiful Venus and opulent Jupiter floods your 2nd House of Material Possessions with good news, tempting you to forget your current fiscal condition. Just remember that serious underlying issues still lurk behind the bright lights of optimism. An old Filipino proverb teaches, "Caution minimizes loss."

Any lingering self-doubt quickly dissipates today as witty Mercury and friendly Venus hang out with buoyant Jupiter. You are truly inspired now as new ideas increase your options and bolster your self-esteem. Be willing to take a risk, but bring along some of your famous common sense for backup. As Mae West said, "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough."

Although illusory visions may already be dancing in your head, it's still worthwhile to let your imagination run wild today. Paradoxically, daydreaming is likely to produce positive results, even if your facts are wrong while mental Mercury and valuable Venus collaborate with auspicious Jupiter. Create your own fantasies rather than falling for someone else's tall tales, since good fortune rewards following your instincts now. Instead of making decisions based on logic alone, factor in your dreams and emotions to add magic to your life.

Your network of friends is your primary support system now as you attract people who admire your goals and appreciate the passion you bring to a cause. Your current powers of persuasion allow you to make your points more effectively than ever. Thankfully, you can restore the confidence of an old friend or appear more desirable to a new one today. Nevertheless, a relationship without trust is like a car without gas; you can stay in it as long as you want, but it won't go anywhere. Actions, not words, reveal the true intentions of your heart.

All the pieces seem to fit into place today when captivating Venus connects with prosperous Jupiter in your 10th House of Public Status. It's hard to avoid falling in love with your career as you chase every opportunity that appears now, convinced that fame and fortune will be yours. However, gaining recognition for your work can be an empty achievement if you don't pursue personal relationships, too. As Mother Theresa said, "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other."

Cooking up plans for an inspiring trip or engaging in stimulating conversations connects your head and your heart in delightful ways. Good news is all but guaranteed while a generous conjunction of delectable Venus and cheerful Jupiter lights up your 9th House of Future Vision. This is a perfect time to pitch your ideas to others because they are likely to be receptive. Just don't go overboard with superfluous information. For the best results, tailor your pitch for your intended audience. Short and sweet does the trick when it comes to selling your dreams.

Your cash flow may be stretched to the max, but that won't stop you from trying to squeeze more out of every penny these days. A valuable triple conjunction of clever Mercury, magnetic Venus, and promising Jupiter in skillful Virgo falls in your 8th House of Shared Resources, giving you the edge in financial negotiations. A positive outcome is likely for nearly any investment or project you start now, as long as you don't expect too much too soon in return for little effort on your part. Prosperity begins with a state of mind.

It's as if you just won the relationship lottery and people seem to be going out of their way to be extra nice to you. A delightful union of delicious Venus and buoyant Jupiter in your 7th House of Companions brings you gifts from good friends or openhearted individuals. Seek support, including funding, for your latest cause. You will never know who might come through for you unless you ask. Nevertheless, remember the words of Lao Tzu who said, "The heart that gives, gathers."

Although everything seems to slow down a bit on the outside, you're still running through a maze on the inside. You long for less drama today, but could end up internalizing the conflicts rather than preventing them. Thankfully, there are no boundaries to what you may contemplate if you keep everything to yourself. But don't expect your silence to go unnoticed. Unfortunately, what you don't say encourages others to make up their own version of your reality, which might wildly deviate from the truth. As Deepak Chopra writes, "Awareness brings freedom."

A straightforward approach to communicating your feelings can reduce the pressure in a relationship. You might be so sensitive about your point of view today that you talk as if you're walking on eggshells. Unfortunately, your caution causes others to think you're hiding something significant. It's not that your message should be altered to change the meaning, only that your delivery could make a big difference in what people hear. Don't beat around the bush; say exactly what you mean and let the conversation take flight from there.

Your deeply ingrained values come to light today if you witness a social injustice or misuse of power. Although you typically can see both sides of an argument, you're likely to favor the underdog in most cases. However, be aware there is an arbitrariness to your opinion now, whatever position you choose. You might be better off being the champion of communication, rather than supporting any single point of view. The truth is out there, but it's not as simple to find as it seems at first. Let your moral compass be your guide.

You're not interested in shaking up the world with your radical ideas today. You prefer to explore all the unlikely possibilities and impossible futures within the safety of your own mind. But this secrecy isn't about uncertainty or low self-esteem; it's about your pragmatic approach to making a lasting impact instead of a short-lived blip on someone's radar screen. There's no need to waste your energy defending your thoughts on social or personal issues. As Robert Louis Stevenson wrote, "Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant."

You are operating in stealth mode as you go about your business of creating something special. You intuitively know it's more important now for you to get it right than it is to be seen on the world stage. Thankfully, your current intentions exude the authority of Saturn and they will ultimately earn you the recognition you seek. Respect is for those who deserve it, not for those who demand it. Speak softly and carry a big stick.

You can be so discerning in your quest for perfection that others criticize your pickiness. But you could surprise your friends today with the inconsistency of your actions. One moment, they think you are withholding your negative judgment, ready to list the reasons why you refuse their invitation to collaborate on a project. However, you could shock them when you say yes, especially if you take their idea and then expand on it. Albert Einstein said, "Creativity is intelligence having fun."

You may appear disengaged and disinterested today, but you're really exerting more control than anyone realizes. One of your greatest skills is being able to listen to what others want and then motivate them to realize their dreams. However, you have your own agenda now and won't let someone else's plans take precedence. Nevertheless, it doesn't look like you're pulling the strings because you know when to remain quiet and divert the attention elsewhere. Hiding in plain sight can be oddly satisfying, especially when everything just seems to fall your way.

Your friends are your lifeline to the future now as they reflect your dreams back to you with their love and encouragement. Naturally, spending time in such a supportive community does your soul good, especially when you share values at such a fundamental level. Fortunately, there's nothing you must do in this immediate moment, other than showing up with an open mind. Today is meant for contemplation, not action. A grateful heart is a magnet for miracles.

The secret to your success is setting your specific goals down on paper now. Although energetic Mars is empowering your exuberant sign, taskmaster Saturn is not ready to let you off the hook. Don't take your eyes off the distant horizon, but you must simultaneously reassess your plans for the next few weeks. The more you can accomplish now, the easier it will be later on. Literary giant Samuel Johnson wrote, "The future is purchased by the present."

Sunday is a day of rest for many, but you might see it an opportunity to fine-tune your plans so you can gain a strategic advantage. Unfortunately, everything will take longer than you think, so don't set yourself up for failure or disappointment with exorbitant expectations. Nevertheless, you're capable of seeing the future possibilities through a very practical lens, enabling you to simplify the steps needed to accomplish your goals. As Zig Ziglar said, "There is no elevator to success; you must take the stairs."

You seek a deeper level of compassion in your relationships, but you prefer to make this connection via intellectual analysis rather than emotional involvement. It's not that you are detached from your feelings; it's just you can dig deeper if you approach interpersonal dynamics objectively. Nevertheless, you're still treading on volatile ground where a cool discussion can quickly grow heated. Keep in mind, a healthy relationship will inspire both parties to be their best selves. Trust your heart today, not your head.

You might resist if someone is trying to pin down your feelings today. You want to answer their concerns in an honest and caring manner, but find it impossible to squeeze your emotions into words now. Your first inclination is to say nothing at all, but your evasiveness can be even more misleading than any attempt to communicate your truth. Ironically, your self-criticism may be harsher than necessary, so don't talk yourself into silence. Remember, your initial response is just the opening reply to a volley that will create its own meaning as the conversation continues. Love is a game that everyone wants to win.

You may be so impatient that you could do something today you quickly regret. Although your intentions are honorable, superhero Mars squares the karmic Moon's nodes, placing your behavior in conflict with your higher purpose. Whatever urgency you sense now is probably based more on your internal fears than on the external situation. Ironically, your belief that you must act right away is a sure signal to slow down. Aristotle wrote, "Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet."

You put such a smooth spin on your words today that others are convinced by your stellar performance. People are likely to agree with you just because you sound agreeable to them. However, they might not support you in a pinch if they don't have the strength of their convictions. It's sweet to have people in your corner, but this kind of encouragement may be more dangerous than helpful if you expect anyone to come through at a vital moment. You can weed out the fair-weather friends by being authentic right from the start.

You're at the end of your rope and don't know what you will do next. You know that big changes are in the air and you're ready to leap into the unknown. But instead of fretting about the logistics today, you are enjoying the excitement of the moment and the anticipation of the future. Follow your intuition but remember that your destination is not as close as it appears. Reassess the current circumstances and prepare for a longer journey. Your chances of reaching your goal improve greatly if you don't give up. Fear looks; faith jumps.

You know the solution to a lingering problem, but you don't want to appear cocky to your friends or teachers. Nevertheless, your confidence builds now as everyone else's lags. It's not that you're feeding off other people's failures; it's just that you can see how your plan is an improvement over their more conservative approaches. Nevertheless, it's essential to share your ideas without assuming your way is the only way. Your open-mindedness is the key to success.

Keeping your feet on the ground isn't a very complicated order, yet it seems far from easy today. You're in a naturally optimistic state of mind, making it tricky to prevent your thoughts from inflating every project or idea. The lively Leo Moon reflects the power of your positive thinking while several planets in earthy Virgo are more practical in nature. Paradoxically, you can walk down two paths if you put your mind to it. Being realistic in your approach while holding on to the hope of something better combines the best of both worlds.

You are standing at a fork in the road with three planets hovering around the last degrees of your sign. New challenges are just around the corner, but time is already slowing down. Mischievous Mercury turns retrograde tomorrow and you will soon discover there is unfinished business that must be completed before you're free to step into the future. Don't fight against the current delays; resistance is futile. Instead, resign yourself to getting as much accomplished as possible in anticipation of your launch next month. Busy hands are happy hands.

Your communication skills are so on point today that people will approve of your message even if you deliver the worst news possible. Clever Mercury kisses romantic Venus, casting a beautiful glow on your love life and heightening your senses. However, you're a bit shy now and might choose to keep some things private -- even the best news. Nevertheless, your key planet Venus moves into your sign this evening, increasing your popularity and garnering the adoration you crave. There's no reason to push your luck; all good things will be yours in time.

You might feel as if you're a spinning top today; all is well as long as you stay in motion. However, your security becomes precarious when you start to slow down. Instead of clinging to the illusion of stability, embrace the uncertainty of the future because it contains the fruition of the seeds you're now planting. Your fear of change stands between your current dissatisfaction and your unrealized potential. Sometimes you need to lose your balance in order to recreate a solid foundation on which to build your amazing new life.

A sinking feeling in the pit of your stomach is a reminder that you only have a limited amount of time to finish up old business before it's too late. It's as if one foot is on the dock and the other in the boat; you can't hold on to the past for much longer. Unfortunately, there's nothing to be gained by nostalgically pining for the good old days when everything seemed more certain. Thankfully, you're in luck if you want life to be an adventure. Just remember, you can't start writing the next chapter of your book if you're still reading the last one.

Putting a solid support network in place can make the difference between failure and success. But you must have a sustainable plan in mind for others to know where they fit into your big picture. Luckily, the cosmic energy is conspiring on your behalf now, giving you a perfect combination of visionary ambition, mental clarity, and friendly charm. There's no time to waste; secure your resources, sound the trumpets, and gather the troops. Asking for assistance doesn't mean you're weak; it means you're a wise leader.

You're anticipating a fabulous adventure that's about to unfold. Although the potential is great, you realize you're not quite ready to embark to points unknown. The conflict between your enthusiasm and your hesitation can shade your excitement with doubt. But there's no reason to worry now, because you have more time than you realize to put everything in order before you start the next journey. Dream big but don't lose focus of the details. Modifying your plans in the days ahead improves your chances for satisfaction.

You may create a dramatic scene to make sure others notice what you are doing now. Ironically, it might take more time than you wish to reach your goals, but rest assured your current efforts are not wasted. Fortunately, you are able to clearly communicate your intentions at work today, enabling you to solidify the relationships that help you succeed. It's amazing how much you can accomplish when you don't care who gets the credit in the final analysis. Focus on collaboration instead of competition for the best results.

Although you're in a playful mood today, you're secretly concerned your current joy won't last. The lively Leo Moon buzzes with excitement in your 5th House of Fun and Games, but you can't avoid your obligations while Mercury retrogrades through your 6th House of Employment. You know the power of the present moment and can make the most of your positive attitude, but the pressure of work-related commitments is never far away. Unfortunately, Abraham Lincoln was right when he said, "You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today."

You enjoy the consistency of your everyday routine. But one annoying distraction after another prevents you from settling into a regular daily schedule while mischievous Mercury backtracks through your 5th House of Spontaneity. Instead of adding to the frustration by denying your creative self-expression, have fun whenever the circumstances allow. Of course, your chores will still be there when you return. Remember, you're the only person accountable for the quality of your life. Work hard; play harder.

You wish you were free to pursue your creative dreams, but you're not quite ready to sacrifice your current stability. Trickster Mercury has started a 3-week remedial project in your 4th House of Family, burdening you with the task of managing household logistics. You might be overwhelmed with scheduling details and juggling your commitments in order to keep everyone and everything on track. Thankfully, taking care of personal business now leads to profound emotional satisfaction. Be patient; you'll have plenty of time for your own fun and games down the road.

You might feel as if you're caught in a time loop, revisiting the same conversation again and again. Each time around, there are slightly different nuances that bring new issues to light. Mental Mercury's retrograde in your 3rd House of Communication is like your own personal Groundhog Day, requiring you to go around and around until you finally get it right. Believe it or not, there's no reason to be in a hurry now; the deeper you sink, the more you discover about yourself and those you love. A lesson will repeat itself until learned.

You're eager to present a show-and-tell today, but you won't be satisfied with a simple presentation. Although the dramatic Leo Moon fuels your enthusiasm, it's challenging to sustain it unless you know you're having a positive impact on your audience. You want to initiate a process that encourages people to do something meaningful with their lives as Mercury retrogrades through your 2nd House of Core Values. As Thoreau wrote, "Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around."

You don't want everyone to know your business now; in fact, you might be happiest doing your thing behind the scenes instead of under the bright spotlight. Ironically, you would like recognition for your contribution to a project, but not while Mercury is retrograde in your perfectionist sign. If you use these days to work out the kinks in your routine, you'll be more confident when others can finally see you in your full glory. In the final analysis, your work ethic should have nothing to do with the acknowledgment you could receive. The only person you need to impress is yourself.

Your social life is on the move, but you're not quite ready to roll with all the activity. You like the idea of mingling among friends, experiencing the bright lights and creating a memorable time. But Mercury's retrograde through your 12th House of Privacy pulls you away from large crowds and unnecessary chatter. You might feel conflicted because you need silence now to hear your own inner voice and are afraid of losing touch with the source of your inspiration. Life is so much better when you focus on what really matters.

You hold your friends in high regards, but you also hold yourself to higher standards than anyone else. In fact, you might harbor regrets about your shortcomings in the public arena while analytical Mercury backtracks through your 11th House of Social Networking. Don't cry over spilled milk; just clean it up the best you can and move on. Although you may think too much time has passed, it's never too late to do the right thing.

You are finally free to explore a wide variety of options for your future on your own terms. The fact of the matter is you were carrying a heap of responsibilities that had to be fulfilled before you could move on. However, you might be reconsidering a recent career decision, wondering if you acted in haste. Mercury's retrograde dance in your 10th House of Profession isn't meant to send you into a tailspin of self-doubt. The truth is that you're being given a few extra weeks to re-evaluate your new plans before etching them in stone. Examining every alternative from every angle sets you up for success.

You may see your career as a game of skill and chance now. You're eager to play the next round as you establish new goals. But you might be wondering if your current trajectory is still the best one for you. Don't worry if answers are not forthcoming while intellectual Mercury backtracks through your 9th House of Higher Truth. Keep your eyes on the horizon; the details will gradually come into focus over the next few weeks. Tennis champion Arthur Ashe said, "Success is a journey not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome."

Someone special may be putting on an unexpected show for you and you like what you see. But you don't necessarily have an agenda for any relationship now, whether it's business or personal. You prefer to gather information while interactive Mercury retrogrades through your 8th House of Deep Sharing for the next few weeks. Don't eliminate any possibilities yet, because there's magic stewing in the cosmic slow cooker and it's impossible to tell how it will manifest. Blessed are the flexible for they shall not be bent out of shape.

You want to make your mark at work now by performing your duties in an exemplary manner. But it's not just about your actions, because talkative Mercury's retrograde in your 7th House of Partnerships emphasizes the give and take of conversation. Ironically, your productivity is less important than your words today, assuming you're also willing to listen. It's so compelling to be understood that sometimes it's easy to forget to be understanding. Seek respect, not attention; it lasts longer.

You can dream up many ways to combat your boredom today, but finally come to the realization that escape is not an option. Your promises are catching up with you and there's really nothing you can do but put your shoulder to the wheel and push, even if it's an uphill journey. Succumbing to a distraction is not a wise move now; it will only be gratifying for a fleeting moment and just put you further behind schedule. You only fail when you stop trying.

There's no reason to restrain your colorful streak of creative energy today. In fact, the more chances you take now, the greater your odds for success. Naturally, analyzing your options before you begin a project is prudent, but don't think about them so much that your mojo begins to fade. Get out of your head and into your heart. Don't minimize your potential. It's better to gamble on your vision than settle for mediocrity. Norman Vincent Peale wrote, "Shoot for the Moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars."

Although you might know where you're going, there seems to be too many speed bumps on the road to success. You don't want to slow down for the purpose of safety. You want to gain momentum and fly right over any obstacles, but that only works in your dreams. The key to reaching your destination is to be aware enough to actually interact with any resistance that's between you and your personal satisfaction. Philosopher Soren Kierkegaard wrote, "Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced."

Finding the right words to let someone know how you feel can be exhausting, but you're not interested in giving up before you bridge the gulf, even if you're struggling with what to say. Although you might make a false start or two, your powerful intentions combined with persistence win others over. Don't assume you know where the conversation will lead. Summon up your courage, get the ball rolling and let reality surprise you with the outcome.

You are resistant to conforming to other people's expectations today. In fact, your rebellious urge won't settle down, even if you know it will only stir up a storm. You can't suppress your true nature now because denial only makes it grow stronger. Instead, find a creative channel for expressing your unconventional position. People will be more supportive than you think as long as your message is consistent with your conscience. Intelligence is knowing which path to take; wisdom is taking it.

You are in your element as the Moon joins the planetary party already in progress in your rational sign. You can isolate important facts, analyze the data and choose the most sensible direction. However, timing is a problem as tomorrow's Virgo Solar Eclipse draws near. You might believe that anything you do today will be washed away in the cosmic tides over the next few days. However, nothing is further from the truth. Big shifts are on the horizon, but your current behavior is more important than ever. Picasso said, "Action is the foundational key to all success."

You might feel like a monk in search of a monastery today. Unfortunately, even if you find a place for spiritual retreat, you may not have a lot of time for metaphysical pursuits. Nevertheless, the emphasis on your 12th House of Soul Consciousness is as strong as your real-world responsibilities, making your search for inner peace inescapable. Acknowledge the limitations placed on your current actions by circumstance and accept what can't be changed. However, it's crucial to keep your dreams alive no matter the cost.

You are resigned to fight an uphill battle today as long as your core beliefs are connected to your cause. In fact, you're a sight to behold when you're so charged up and ready to take on the world. But you might find yourself worn out by the end of the day, without a lot to show for your efforts, especially if you're not following a specific plan. Take a few steps back and reevaluate your strategy. Work smarter, not harder and success can be yours.

Although you are highly driven in your pursuit of your professional ambitions these days, your progress is still annoyingly sluggish. Your plans seem to be taking longer to manifest than you imagined. Nevertheless, the clouds are clearing and you can see blue sky today, raising your optimism and increasing your levity. Hope is replacing doubt, even if you're not yet sure how everything is going to work out, but don't worry about the big picture now; just attend to each little detail as it arises. Van Gogh said, "Great things are done by a series of small things brought together."

You're drifting in dreamland today and could float off into the inner dimensions of space. Thankfully, the pragmatic Virgo Moon is a counterbalance that keeps you grounded. If you are championing a cause now, shout your message from the mountaintops. Nevertheless, your social concerns might conflict with your personal interests. Sigmund Freud counseled, "In the small matters trust the mind, in the large ones the heart."

Although your day begins normally, interpersonal dynamics quickly grow complicated. Your initial reaction is to jump in with your rational approach and do whatever is necessary to handle the tension. Unfortunately, your intervention only amplifies the problem today; the more you try to fix things, the worse they get. Paradoxically, the shortest path to resolution is to do nothing at all. Let the energetic imbalances tilt reality until it unwinds. The calm will return after the storm releases the blocked energy. Sometimes, nature takes care of things better than humans.

You may be criticized for being lost in your dreams today, but your inner world is where you do your best work. People might not take the time to listen to your process; they only judge you from their limited perspective. Nevertheless, there's a grain of truth in the unsolicited advice you receive now. It never hurts to check back with the facts when you're cruising the outer limits of your imagination. However, author Lloyd Alexander had a point when he wrote, "Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it."

You can gauge how well you're currently doing by how much unexpected changes at work or in your health throw you off balance. The Virgo New Moon Eclipse rocks your 6th House of Daily Routine, requiring you to relinquish old habits that no longer support your goals. For example, a sudden health concern may be your body's way of telling you to improve your lifestyle. Issues that arise should not be ignored or suppressed or they will only return later to cause more serious problems. Act now; sometimes later becomes never.

You are currently engaged in a process of transmuting your inner joy into reality. In order to make your dreams come true, you must take the recent lessons you've learned and begin to put them into practice. A dramatic Virgo New Moon Eclipse falls in your 5th House of Love and Creativity, loosening up old patterns of playing it safe. Taking risks in self-expression can be very rewarding as long as you calculate the pros and cons before shaking up the energy. Don't hold back when it comes to showing your feelings. Upsets are possible but a profound emotional breakthrough is well worth the effort.

Domestic pressures bring you face-to-face with your dreams and your disappointments. The Virgo Solar Eclipse lands in your 4th House of Home and Family, revealing cracks in the foundation of your world. It might be scary to realize how far your beliefs have strayed from reality, but you can turn them around through deliberate action rather than panicking and trying to set everything right overnight. Change is inevitable; be honest with yourself and you'll find the courage to transform a potential loss into a major gain. Letting go is safer than holding on.

Although you might be dreaming of an exotic vacation, the only traveling you'll likely be doing now will be a visit to the neighbors or a quick trip to a local market. The efficient Virgo New Moon Eclipse activates your 3rd House of Distractions, indicating a lot of movement without really going anywhere significant. Your greatest challenge comes from wasting time as you try to weed out the extraneous noise in your life. Don't be afraid to say no to a good idea, for it's more productive to concentrate your actions instead of scattering them. Energy flows where attention goes.

Watch your wallet and change your online passwords while the Virgo Solar Eclipse rattles your 2nd House of Money and Resources. You might even find yourself involved in a dispute over a bill or some other financial matter. It's worth digging to the bottom of the issue even if it raises unpleasant feelings, since a resolvable misunderstanding may be the cause of the current conflict. With nebulous Neptune and realistic Saturn lurking in the picture, the more clarity you can bring to the matter now, the better.

Burying your head in the sand is tempting but there is no way to deny the truth today. A Solar Eclipse in your sign opposes surreal Neptune in your 7th House of Relationships, luring you into sharing a believable fantasy. But the Sun and Moon square Saturn, confronting you with an unavoidable reality check. Great things can develop from a failure or delay if you're willing to step up your game and strive for excellence. Your disillusionment can be momentarily painful, but saying goodbye to old habits makes room for something or someone special to enter your life.

You are reminded of everything in your life that remains incomplete and all those things you do not understand, but you're driven to explore the invisible metaphysical realms now to broaden your perspective and inspire your creativity. Although the Virgo Solar Eclipse stimulates your 12th House of Mystery, its connection to irrepressible Uranus encourages you to reveal your spiritual journey with your closest friends. In fact, you can't rest until you make others aware of your recent experiences. True power is gained by sharing knowledge not hoarding it.

Being sidetracked by your desires and illusions gobbles up valuable time and money. Although the Virgo New Moon Eclipse makes a racket in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, its opposition to fantasy-prone Neptune in your 5th House of Love can invite a dreamy romance. Refocusing your attention on practical matters makes sense in a rational world. Harder work may bring greater success, but your efforts might be best applied toward personal, rather than material, rewards. Sufi Mystic Rumi wrote, "What you seek is seeking you."

Unforeseen changes in your career path may catch you off guard today. You might not see the shift coming yet the concentrated energy of the Virgo New Moon Eclipse electrifies your 10th House of Public Status. This cosmic wake-up call puts you on notice to clean up your act and bring any uncertainties out into the open. It's tempting to avoid a power struggle if you're dealing with someone who isn't treating you fairly. Nevertheless, reasserting your authority allows you to reclaim control over your professional life. Be a voice, not an echo.

Unexpected challenges to your belief system, sudden detours in travel plans, or an overload of new information can be quite upsetting to the status quo. The Virgo Solar Eclipse destabilizes your 9th House of Adventure with rapidly changing circumstances, flipping your normally rational thinking into indecision. On the positive side, unanticipated news will thrill you if you keep an open mind. Thankfully, establishing priorities and eliminating extraneous activities reduce the excess of sensory input you're likely to receive. Clear out the cobwebs and jump into new experiences to accelerate your growth.

You think you know what is right, but now your knowledge could stand between you and happiness. The Virgo New Moon Eclipse polarizes your 8th House of Deep Sharing, insisting that you surrender your absolute certainty in order to get what you want. Imaginative Neptune's opposition to the Sun and Moon asks you to leave your logic behind. True intimacy may be within your reach, but first you must open your heart. Admitting that you don't have all the answers is a perfect place to start.

The urgency for change can be especially intense these days. There's a tremendous amount of planetary activity focusing on the Virgo New Moon Eclipse that hurls lightning bolts in your 7th House of Significant Others. Issues of fear and loss of control lead to further reevaluation of your relationships. Something may be ending, but it's human to try to avoid difficult choices that intensify emotions. Nevertheless, it's essential to get to the truth at the bottom of your soul. When you stand in a place of self-awareness, you are the master of your destiny.

Overconfidence or over-commitment, whether yours or someone else's, is a warning sign that you're reading a situation at work incorrectly. You may believe someone else isn't doing his or her part. But don't overcompensate today and sacrifice your integrity in the process, since the planetary focus on nebulous Neptune and inflationary Jupiter can produce promises without substance. It's tempting to exaggerate when making your point, but being concise in communication with a specific goal in mind will be more fruitful. Say what you mean and mean what you say.

There are fuzzy boundaries between a casual friendship and a more intimate connection today. Unfortunately, your brain may be going on vacation while retrograde Mercury stumbles into excessive Jupiter, distorting reality by magnifying the importance of a spontaneous conversation. In fact, a tense alliance between illusory Neptune and the Sun in your 5th House of Spontaneity creates an air of fantasy everywhere you turn. Be careful what you put in motion when offering someone your hand or your heart. Wait until your clarity returns before making your move.

You may feel like you're lost in a Hall of Mirrors as you see a distorted version of the world reflected back at you today. It's nearly impossible to know what's real when the Sun forms a disquieting opposition with surreal Neptune. Disillusionment can follow if you allow yourself to be distracted by fantasies of sensual enjoyment rather than utilizing your imagination for more practical purposes. Author John Maxwell wrote, "Dreams don't work unless you do."

Whether you are pursuing a passionate interest or promoting a creative project, ask specific questions to make sure your words are completely understood. The Sun opposes spiritual Neptune in your 9th House of Future Vision, infusing you with hope for a better tomorrow. Meanwhile, an abundant Mercury-Jupiter connection spews more creative ideas than you can use, enticing you with fantasies just beyond your reach. Honor your lofty aspirations with commitment and hard work, because fulfilling your dream is a gift to yourself that also inspires others.

The people you work with might struggle to see your special gifts now, perhaps in part due to your own lack of clarity. Whatever the cause, you're likely to be misunderstood when the Sun in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem opposes deceptive Neptune. Fortunately, you can still express your dreams effectively if you limit your vision and reveal the big picture step by step. Precision in communication can be yours if you simply stay on topic without any deviation. Once you make your point, stop talking long enough to let your words sink in.

You are the go-to person that everyone seems to rely on today, and your communication skills are on point. A highly intelligent conjunction of messenger Mercury with optimistic Jupiter empowers you to share what's on your mind. However, your logic and reason are tested now that the Sun opposes delusional Neptune in your 7th House of Others. Compassion for someone who seems lost or simple gullibility might cloud your judgment. Nevertheless, relationship wounds may be healed if you can overlook petty differences and see the best in everyone.

Although you might try to narrow your thinking and filter out excess noise with so many planets in critical Virgo, mental Mercury's alignment with expansive Jupiter widens your intellectual horizons. Additionally, the Sun's opposition to nebulous Neptune can fuel your dreams or lull you with a false sense of security. Don't stress trying to fine-tune the fuzzy spectrum of reality now. Instead of concentrating on any single event, pay attention to the entire mix. As Mark Twain said, "You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus."

Your vivid imagination adds an extra sparkle to your world today. A dynamic opposition between the brilliant Sun and elusive Neptune can attract people who are all flash and little substance. Diaphanous Neptune's presence in your 5th House of Romance is a perfect condition for falling for a fairy tale, but risky for making lasting commitments. As long as you don't engage in serious business, you can have a great time now without facing negative consequences. As Anais Nin wrote, "We do not see things as they are, we see things as we are."

Finishing your work should be a piece of cake today as long as you don't promise too much. Mercury's retrograde dance with overconfident Jupiter occurs in your 10th House of Public Responsibility, encouraging you to underestimate the complexity of a project. However, you might end up spreading your energy so thin to fulfill your commitments in a timely manner that you fall short on all fronts. Even if you think you can stay on track, every little thing that happens lures you away from being practical now. Idealism loses to pragmatism when it comes to taking care of business.

Your enthusiasm is on the rise, yet you may lose focus today if your goals fade into the shrouded mists of uncertainty. Although the Sun's opposition to nebulous Neptune opens your heart to the unlimited potential of the future, it can also set you up for failure if your expectations are not grounded in reality. However, even impractical dreams fill your soul with the promise of a better tomorrow. Instead of planning too far ahead, concentrate on doing the best you can in the present moment. Once you've successfully navigated the current challenges, your life will blossom in ways you can't imagine.

Protecting your material resources makes sense today because even a short lapse of attention to your finances could create trouble fast. In fact, a major purchase may be a bad idea now that the Sun in your 8th House of Shared Resources opposes flaky Neptune in your 2nd House of Money. Investing in someone else's fantasy can be a costly experience, emotionally and economically. Cultivating self-respect helps prevent another person's neediness from draining your bank account or damaging your confidence.

You're motivated to look past the limits of reality today, even though you don't know what you might find. However, your judgment may not be very sound when the Sun opposes metaphysical Neptune in your intuitive sign. Nevertheless, the most outlandish dreams are worthy of consideration now. Keep the doors to your imagination open as wide as possible because you have the magic touch to manifest miracles if you believe in yourself.

You have charm to spare today and can be a magnet for creative folks who turn work into play. People bring more joy into your life as a sweet lunar conjunction to sexy Venus spices up your social life. This is a great time to make amends with someone if a relationship has recently cooled off. Even an old enemy may reconsider their allegiance if you take the initiative now to resolve your issues with an open mind and heart. Jimi Hendrix said, "When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace."

You might be tempted to cast aside your sensible plans today as your desire to engage in pleasurable activities takes center stage. Your key planet Venus colors your perceptions as she aligns with the evocative Moon, emphasizing sweet emotions. However, a fateful aspect between mischievous Mercury and high-strung Uranus adds a sense of urgency to your needs. The danger of overindulgence is present, as is your ability to express yourself with more confidence than you actually feel. A little caution comes in handy when following your heart.

A soothing conversation with a friend comforts you with pleasant thoughts today. Nevertheless, retrograde Mercury's otherworldly alignment with electric Uranus stirs a restless breeze that makes it difficult to feel completely settled now. On the upside, you may experience a breakthrough in awareness about your responsibilities and professional goals. An unexpected sequence of events could spur a change in your work duties in the days ahead. Remember, reviewing your past can leave you stuck on Memory Lane; envisioning the future opens the door to opportunity.

Your heart is alternatively attracted and repulsed to someone as love and fear take turns guiding you through the tricky realm of relationships today. While a sweet Moon-Venus conjunction calms your 4th House of Security, an erratic Mercury-Uranus aspect arouses your inner rebel. Keep an open mind and be ready for surprises. Paradoxically, the road ahead clears once you adjust your thinking and embrace the unknown.

Someone may have recently offered you a lucrative opportunity. However, it's not turning out to be what you expected and you're now anxious to learn the rest of the story. Communicator Mercury connects with revolutionary Uranus and authoritative Saturn, giving you the clout to use your words effectively. Tell it like it is today, for others will respect you as long as you keep your integrity and don't lose your cool. Adopting a balanced approach creates a healthy atmosphere for all involved. Lao Tzu wrote, "If you correct your mind, the rest of your life will fall into place."

Staying conscious of other people's feelings can be a tough task now. Fortunately, the Moon's conjunction with beautiful Venus helps you get away with otherwise unacceptable behavior and you are stubbornly sticking to your agenda. Nevertheless, current circumstances could provide you with a rude awakening today. Even if you are uncomfortable with an unexpected change of rules, just accept it and move forward. And above all, be kind in your words and deeds; everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about.

Pleasure prevails today, but you may toss good judgment out the window to play with friends or to pursue a questionable romance. The longing to satisfy your desires can prompt you to lose sight of your basic values and, perhaps, even spend more than you should. It might be appropriate to broaden your palate and feed your senses, but keeping this indulgence within reasonable bounds now can save you from regret later on. The Greek philosopher Epicurius wrote, "Be moderate in order to taste the joys of life in abundance."

Finding balance isn't always easy for you Scorpio extremists. You may be so eager to help anyone in need today that you say yes before considering the cost of such a sacrifice. However, you can lean on the objective Libra Moon to establish equilibrium between your personal goals and your commitments to others. Mercury's creative quintile to responsible Saturn indicates that discipline and restraint are your current keys to success. Good fortune is indicated as long as you don't go overboard or overlook any significant details. Nevertheless, making generosity part of your growth strategy is medicine for your heart.

A gentle nudge from a friend might feel like an unexpected shove today. Normally, you would just push back, but you won't likely be in the mood to fight as the reflective Moon hugs gentle Venus in gracious Libra. Although you may be blindsided by someone you trust, your overconfidence in the situation probably wasn't warranted. Fortunately, clever Mercury offers you a new way to react that isn't angry or aggressive, enabling you to put a relationship back on harmonious ground. As Elvis Costello sings, "What's so funny about peace, love and understanding?"

You can temper your high hopes with your down-to-earth common sense in a way that allows you to bring about positive long-term changes. A magical Mercury-Saturn alignment empowers you to narrow your focus and harness the energy you're feeling now, so you can channel it more judiciously in the days ahead. A socially skillful Moon-Venus conjunction in your 10th House of Career inspires you to turn on the charm and express your creative ideas in an approachable manner. Eleanor Roosevelt said, "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."

You may be overexcited today as new ideas continue to explode into awareness. Fortunately, your judgment improves when retrograde Mercury connects with stabilizing Saturn. However, it's challenging to ground the energy because it feels as if there is a lot on the line. You might be willing to risk more now that you believe the consequences of your current actions will turn out for the best. Samuel Johnson wrote, "The natural flights of the human mind are not from pleasure to pleasure, but from hope to hope."

You are being given a golden opportunity to clear the air of unresolved feelings which are weighing heavy on your heart. Retrograde Mercury aligned with far-reaching Jupiter yesterday, and is still widening your horizons today. Nevertheless, it's the conjunction between the Moon and vulnerable Venus that offers compassion in communication, motivating you to mend fences. There's no reason to look back when you have so much to look forward to now.

Cut yourself some slack today if you fall short of your own expectations. You may feel responsible for someone's well-being and go out of your way to assist them. Selfless service is wonderful, but not if you become a martyr in the process. Although placing yourself in a victim role is not your typical style, you might not see other options clearly now. Nevertheless, when you are called upon to set aside your own plans to come to the aid of a friend, don't forget that saving something for yourself is important, too.

Pursuing pleasure can be a healthy indulgence today. However, you must be as flexible as possible if you want to enjoy the excitement of love. Something you previously overlooked might suddenly become the center of conversation. Nevertheless, reaching satisfaction could take a while, so make positive changes without expecting immediate results. Race-car driver Mario Andretti said, "Circumstances may cause interruptions and delays, but never lose sight of your goal."

You must feel emotionally safe before you engage in sweet talk today. Although you may crave a lighthearted encounter, you might not have the time for such fun and games. Listen to the messages of several planets in virtuous Virgo as they cluster in your 4th House of Roots now, while increasing responsibilities on the home front bring your mind back to the fundamentals. News anchor David Brinkley quipped, "A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him."

You are busier than usual now yet may seek even more distractions to add to the noise of the day. Although you might try to conjure up a variety of interesting activities today, you won't likely want to leave the neighborhood while the Sun brightens the soulful North Node in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Make good use of this cosmic energy by redirecting your attention to catching up on correspondence and tackling numerous chores. A task finished is better than an unfinished one that could be perfect.

Unconventional ideas trigger uncharacteristic doubts about your self-worth today. However, income and self-esteem can rise from a low point with objective analysis and hard work. The fair-minded Libra Moon gives you a fulcrum point on which to balance your life. But Luna's high-powered opposition to unpredictable Uranus prompts you to make surprising choices. Nevertheless, enjoy the creative possibilities available when you're no longer bound by tradition or self-restraint. On the other side of fear lies freedom.

Your drive for quality is overwhelming at times, but now you have a chance to change your story. Instead of expecting perfection in the present moment, think of your life as a process where gradual improvement is the goal. Gratefully acknowledge each advancement as a step in the right direction, no matter how much further there is to go. Your time is precious, so weed out the hopes and concerns you can't do anything about today. Focus on where you can create positive change in the weeks ahead. From the tiniest acorn grows the mighty oak.

Although you intuitively know there are great opportunities on the horizon, you still may be frustrated by the current speed of progress. You might be unaware that your fear of failure is now a major impediment to your success. But your worries are probably unwarranted, based on past occurrences that have nothing to do with current events. You can reminisce about your personal history all you want, but you can't change it. If you continue to look back, you'll miss what's right in front of you.

You may find yourself at the center of attention in your social network today. Rather than avoiding the spotlight, you enjoy the adoration enough now to figure out how to sustain your few minutes of fame. However, you might be shocked when someone does something that's socially unacceptable or counterproductive to your cause. Nevertheless, motivating others is more effective when you encourage them to be the best version of themselves. The world already has plenty of critics; try being a cheerleader instead.

Taking slow and deliberate steps is your surest path to success now that the radiant Sun is aligned with the North Lunar Node in your 10th House of Career. Nevertheless, you are capable of raising your professional profile by increasing your responsibilities and assuming more authority. Master a new skill and you will gain the confidence and competence to upgrade your status at work. Treat your ideas with respect because they can produce impressive results if you're willing to commit to them.

Finding the right balance between humility and grandiosity is tricky today. Ironically, three planets are now traveling through detail-oriented Virgo and your 9th House of Big Ideas, revealing the tension between the very small and the very large. You may tend toward over-exuberance now, even in your daydreams, but you could also suddenly manifest the trip of a lifetime. Buddhist teacher Thich Nhat Hanh says, "Because you are alive, everything is possible."

The current lessons could be tough ones that may challenge your faith. However, you will emerge with a stronger understanding of where you are headed -- not necessarily in your career, but on your spiritual journey. The Sun is shining in your 8th House of Shared Resources, enabling you to thrive as the storms of change blow into your life. It's more important to pay attention to the present moment than to worry about positioning yourself for the future. Trust the universe and believe you're exactly where you need to be now.

You are willing to jump through hoops to live up to other people's expectations today. You may think you're on an equal footing with everyone else, but you still feel an inexplicable need to impress them with your actions. Three planets residing in meticulous Virgo help you focus on the details, but you could quickly become hypercritical of someone else's ideas. Once your intentions are clear, smaller issues can be ironed out. As Dr. Seuss wrote, "Step with care and great tact; and remember that life's a great balancing act."

Don't worry if your current choices seem irrational since it still may take time to get a clear perspective on events at work. Nevertheless, the extreme Scorpio Moon pushes you to react one way or another, even if Mercury's retrograde means that a final decision isn't as final as you think. This might be one of those times when you need to trust your intuition until your rational mind catches up with your emotional experience. Listen to your inner voice that doesn't use words. Silence isn't empty; it's full of answers.

It's easier to meet people now, both personally and professionally, even while you're also developing a deeper level of connection in your current relationships. The passionate Scorpio Moon's visit to your 7th House of Partnerships intensifies all interactions, especially while red-hot Mars is in the equation. You can package your feelings with enthusiasm to make your case, but might come on so strong that others back away before you deliver your message. Ultimately, it's your willingness to listen and learn that enhances an exchange of ideas beneficial to all involved.

You must revisit the lesson of self-restraint today or suffer the consequences of an ill-fated impulsive decision. It's more advantageous to improve what you already have going now, rather than rushing off to start something new. The Moon's shift into your 6th House of Daily Routine reaffirms your need to eliminate emotional distractions and concentrate on the basic necessities of life. Leave the grand gestures and earth-shattering epiphanies for another time. Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

Opportunities for personal satisfaction rise from the ashes of a recent defeat, enabling you to turn losses into gains. The Moon's move into regenerative Scorpio and your 5th House of Self-Expression inspires you with passion and imagination to bring new life to a fading romance or to reinvigorate a stagnant project. Your methodical approach pushes you past your fears and straight toward what you want most in life now. Persistence in the pursuit of your own interests is a critical ingredient in your current success story.

Although you may be in touch with complex feelings that are lurking in the shadows today, it's time to change your attitude and lighten up your life. The transformative power of the Scorpio Moon brightens your 4th House of Security, motivating you to confront an unresolved hurt from the past, process it and move on. Fortunately, impulsive Mars in adventurous Sagittarius, a fellow fire sign, empowers you to do what makes you feel great in the moment. As poet Guillaume Appollinaire wrote, "Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy."

Finding the right balance between unbridled hope and unexpected disillusionment makes for a complex and powerfully intense transition. Opportunistic Jupiter is in the last few days of its year-long stay in your sign, turning your optimism into panic as you realize that your current growth phase may be swiftly coming to a close. Although wild leaps will likely miss the mark, your enthusiasm can still be broken down into small increments that will enable you to reach your goals. Inch by inch it's a cinch; yard by yard it's hard.

Your ambivalence falls away when changing circumstances motivate you to make choices with more certainty. The Moon's entry into your 2nd House of Money focuses your attention on practical matters that affect your material wealth. However, you may need to be a financial detective and gather information before signing on the dotted line. Acquiring the right data allows you to effectively follow through on your intentions. However, you must be careful not to jump to an erroneous conclusion in your haste to seize the moment. As Frank Lloyd Wright said, "The truth is more important than the facts."

You're driven to push your agenda forward today if you fervently believe in your mission. You can put up quite a fight if others at work are moving in a different direction. Thankfully, your self-confidence is high and you possess a greater awareness of how to manage your own energy now that the Moon is stirring the pot in your sign. You may reach a point where you decide to break away from the group and head off on a solo adventure. Shrewdly acknowledging the limitations of your coworkers tells you when to bring them with you, and when to advance on your own.

Your friends might think that all is wonderful in your world, but there's more going on within your brain than is apparent on the surface. You're reluctant to reveal everything you know until people demonstrate that they are ready to handle the entire truth as you see it. However, misunderstandings are likely and you must exercise caution before asserting yourself while Mercury is still retrograde. Be patient; although the tides are changing, it will still take time for the new currents to carry you to your destination.

A team effort can create something special now, bringing you positive recognition in the near future. The Moon's shift into secretive Scorpio and your 11th House of Social Networks reveals hidden talents that make you a vital contributor to the community. Your skill at assessing the strengths and weaknesses of your associates is a key factor to increasing group productivity. Nevertheless, you must remember to balance the intensity of the energy you expend with others by seeking quiet places where you can recharge your batteries alone.

Although you might be convinced your goals are slipping through your fingers, developing a plan for your professional growth can ensure greater success in the days ahead. Nevertheless, you're willing to convey your doubts to your associates while the emotional Moon camps out in your 10th House of Career. Although your progress may not be obvious, channeling your energy empowers you to achieve your aspirations. It might appear as if you're not advancing as much as you want, but you're improving your life in more ways now than you think.

Learning is not an abstract process now, but one that must engage your heart as well as your mind. The resourceful Scorpio Moon's current emphasis on your 9th House of Future Vision intensifies your desire to broaden your frame of reference. You welcome new ideas and experiences that inspire you to set more ambitious goals. Fortunately, if you manage all the pesky details first, a magic carpet ride of opportunity will take your life to new heights.

Solutions to problems at work that recently eluded you are now ripe for the harvest. The transformative nature of cryptic Pluto in your 10th House of Career can reveal your assumptions about people who previously held power over you. Your old ways of relating to authority are no longer relevant. You can't go back to the safety of the past; commit to what's ahead, rather than clinging to what you once had. George Bernard Shaw wrote, "Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything."

Your creativity is cooking up a storm today while powerful Pluto harmonizes with the illuminating Sun in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Refining the skills required to manifest your desires demands unwavering concentration, yet your complacency makes it easy for social distractions to derail your best-laid plans. Fortunately, your determination allows you to cut through the clutter and aim your will where it can have maximum positive impact. Saying no to others may be the smartest way to say yes to yourself.

Your coworkers might fall into the trap of underestimating your power now. However, you can shock others with the depth of your understanding and your unrelenting persistence. But there is no reason to be concerned about anyone else's judgments; you are working with a deep emotional reserve and can accomplish more than anyone thinks. In fact, the old motto of the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers is your rallying cry today: "The difficult we do immediately. The impossible takes a little longer."

You're feeling your oats now that the radiant Sun is reinforced by its regenerative trine to ruthless Pluto. But rather than putting your physical resources to the test, the methodical Virgo Sun advises you to conserve your strength for the long haul. Luckily, unrelenting Pluto in your 7th House of Companions indicates that collaborating with others fuels your passion to work even harder. Be smart by using your brains and not your muscles, so you will still have the energy you need tomorrow to finish what you started today.

It seems as if everyone is suddenly eager to drop their previous positions and cooperate with you today. But you may overestimate someone's abilities or underestimate the resources needed to finish a project. A little discernment prevents you from wasting your time chasing rainbows across rugged terrain. Nevertheless, a resolute Sun-Pluto trine foretells that you will succeed in navigating the dangerous curves ahead if you decide to put your heart fully into reaching your destination.

You're longing to color outside of the lines today. In fact, your creativity can have a profound impact on others when you simply show up and be yourself. Although you might not have a specific goal in mind now, the willful Sun in your sign forms a smooth trine with passionate Pluto in your 5th House of Romance, enabling you to make a lasting impression on someone you admire. Nevertheless, an overly rigid plan could be your downfall; instead, prepare to make as many minor modifications as necessary as you push forward to your dreams.

You might not want to follow the well-meaning advice of others who encourage you to risk more than you're willing now. Thankfully, your keen intuition will successfully guide you with a mix of faith and focus. This is a time for a spiritual renewal as the discerning Virgo Sun in your 12th House of Destiny trines evolutionary Pluto. You are approaching the end of a larger cycle but you must allow the past to fade away if you truly want to move into the future. Find your new dream and then do whatever it takes to transform it into reality.

A strong dose of purpose and perseverance today enables you to have your way without being pushy to achieve your aims. A superconductive Sun-Pluto trine blesses you with the power of precision rather than brute force. Although you may have recently tried yet failed to make an impression, express your desires once more before moving on. If resources for a creative project are lacking or if you lost in a personal quest for love, you can travel within to find the resilience you need to recover gracefully. Ultimately, it's not necessary to convince anyone of anything if you just speak the truth.

You are capable of accomplishing more than you ever dreamed possible today. The dedication of the hard-working Virgo Sun in your 10th House of Public Responsibility is supported by a trine from powerful Pluto, blessing you with an apparently infinite reserve of vitality and the commitment to deliver on your promises. But tread carefully, since poorly managed energy will not last forever. Fortunately, a well-conceived plan combined with sustainable action leads to surprising results.

It's tempting to seek security in what you know, rather than facing the unknown. But the greatest potential for positive change does not always come from taking the safest route. Furthermore, waiting to initiate action is not a smart idea. Luckily, you may feel invincible while the Sun in your 9th House of Adventure trines fierce Pluto. But uncertainty will soon creep back into the picture, so make your move now while the cosmic forces are working in your favor. Today is your lucky day only if you strike while the iron is hot.

There is more potential packed into the present moment than you realize. Thankfully, you can work behind the scenes quite effectively while the industrious Virgo Sun in your 8th House of Shared Resources conspires with obsessive Pluto. Completing a job is more crucial than gaining attention today. Be as specific as possible when you focus your intention, for the power of precision can help make your dreams come true. C.S. Lewis wrote, "Aim at Heaven and you will get Earth thrown in. Aim at Earth and you get neither."

Compassion, sentimentality and a vivid imagination are your trademarks. However, giving people too much leeway today can weaken your position. While your softheartedness is admirable, you risk wasting resources if you scatter your gifts indiscriminately. Fortunately, a confident Sun-Pluto trine activates your 7th House of Relationships and empowers you to be a more effective leader. As psychologist Brene Brown writes, "Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves even when we risk disappointing others."

You have an air of invincibility about you and won't stand for anything blocking your path to success. Fortunately, you possess an uncharacteristic patience today, enabling you to give others the room to breathe. Nevertheless, you're wise to make the most of the current cosmic momentum while the Sun energizes uncompromising Pluto in your 10th House of Career. Thankfully, your drive is softened just a touch, allowing you to get away with announcing to the world that you are an unstoppable force to be acknowledged. A gentle hand wins you more admiration than you might expect.

Your imagination soars today and your heart is stirred by divine daydreams of love and pleasure. However, complications arise while your key planet Venus connects with pragmatic Saturn and whimsical Neptune, blurring the boundaries between reality and fantasy. Although you could misread someone's signals, don't withdraw in fear. It's healthier now to move forward with the assurance that a stabilizing Venus-Saturn sextile can bring. Don't  overestimate your weakness or underestimate your strength.

You're ready to roll your sleeves up and get your hands dirty today -- and thankfully, your hard work will likely be rewarded. You have an ambitious goal in mind and are willing to be patient in order to achieve the desired results. Nevertheless, you might secretly believe that you possess superpowers and can get whatever you want now. Be careful about pushing your agenda too hard or you could undo your recent gains. Gentle persistence is more productive than overt aggression.

Discretion is essential today while penetrating Pluto stimulates deep conversations. Spilling a secret opens a can of worms, prompting you to rethink your ability to make decisions in the throes of passion. Nevertheless, you can cut through the clutter of confusion and score some powerful points if you're well-prepared and singularly focused. Sneaking away from your usual surroundings is your ticket to a magical moment that could awaken your heart and inspire your dreams.

Your fierce intentions produce concrete results when combined with hard work. Your odds improve if you're willing to stick with a project even when it seems like you're not making any progress. Thankfully, a stabilizing Venus-Saturn sextile cools your sense of urgency so you can wait for gratification. Although you may mix up your fantasies with reality when Venus misaligns with ephemeral Neptune, your current actions benefit from a creative twist. Don't just look at the stars; be one.

You are doing your best to balance your dreams with the current limitations of your life. Fortunately, a formidable Sun-Pluto trine empowers you to find effective solutions to problems that might otherwise prevent you from tackling big tasks. You may be aware of information that gives you a distinct edge, yet abusing the power it delivers could undermine trust. Let your light shine so brightly that others can see their way out of the dark.

You are blessed with an abundance of positive energy today that inspires you to realize your goals. However, you may blur the lines between the current circumstances and your romantic illusions while Venus in your sign stirs up mischief with delusional Neptune. Thankfully, your key planet Venus is also collaborating with sensible Saturn, instructing you to balance your idealistic dreams with reality. Dr. Seuss wrote, "Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living. It's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope."

You are wrestling with your angels and demons today. You may be super productive now, motivating others with your efficiency. However, planetary crosscurrents heighten your emotional sensitivity while the Moon is still in your perceptive sign. A starry-eyed Venus-Neptune connection skews your judgment, possibly triggering paranoid thinking that allows you to misinterpret someone's intentions. On the plus side, meaningful conversations could overflow with incredible kindness and compassion. An Amish proverb reminds us, "Instead of putting others in their place, put yourself in their place."

You might believe you're unstoppable now that your life is moving forward again. Ironically, an illusory Venus-Neptune alignment infuses you with dreams of a fairy tale romance, while a steadfast Venus-Saturn connection simultaneously encourages common sense. Think before acting on your feelings or you will find yourself untangling the emotions of a messy situation. Nevertheless, success in your current endeavors is likely as long as you don't have outrageous expectations. A moment of thought prevents many moments of regret.

You can express your plans today with such clarity that you're able to forge ahead without ruffling anyone's feathers. An odd mixture of cosmic signals helps you peel away any illusions you have about what you want in life, possibly leaving you feeling emotionally unsatisfied. Seek a more compassionate approach to self-assessment and a more tactful way to tell others your needs. As Buddha taught, "If you truly love yourself, you could never hurt another."

People may mistakenly assume that you're a pushover today because your quiet manner is not revealing your whole story. Nevertheless, you might believe you will have more freedom if no one is paying attention to you. It's not that you are operating without an agenda now; it's just that you are keeping it to yourself. Luckily, the cooperation between charming Venus and persistent Saturn gives you the endurance you need to finish what you start. However, bending the truth can create trouble down the road; honesty is the best policy.

Images of love and beauty swirl around in your imagination, possibly exceeding the limits of the material world. Amorous and artistic Venus forms a complicated aspect with enchanting Neptune in your 1st House of Self, washing away inhibitions and stimulating your colorful fantasies. Thankfully, pragmatic Saturn is also in the equation, inspiring you to bring the mists of illusion down to earth. Although this isn't the time to make important decisions about practical matters, you will certainly enjoy the dance between these two worlds while it lasts.

You have a plan to inject a shot of adrenaline into your life today. You're eager to initiate direct action as you step closer toward making your move. However, you might realize that previous commitments are still keeping you from making the important changes you're visualizing  in your dreams. You may wish to do something right away to rock the boat, but the consequences of your current behavior are still to be determined. Act if you are certain; if you are wavering in doubt, it's best to wait.

You're ready for a major shake-up of relationship energy to thrust you forward into an exciting new direction. Interpersonal dynamics appear complicated when the Moon runs into karmic Saturn in your 8th House of Intimacy and Transformation. However, it's hard to take anything too seriously when the Moon squares starry-eyed Neptune. Being temporarily stripped of your illusions may sound healthy, but this means you must face your fears of the unknown. Even the most reliable things seem up in the air now. Don't try to fake confidence or a reality check will call your bluff when you least expect it.

Stable foundations are beginning to dissolve and it's hard to know where to stand. You can sense that your world is growing more expansive, simultaneously enchanting and confusing you with fantastic scenarios of the future that may be totally unrealistic. Still, you must claim your favorite visions to be the guiding lights for the positive changes you hope to make now. As Aldous Huxley wrote, "Dream in a pragmatic way."

Recent actions may resurface today for further consideration. Keep an open mind and postpone making serious commitments because cosmic factors add ambiguity to what people say. In fact, what you hear might not be the whole story, so filter information with the extra caution that's always recommended during Mercury's retrograde phase. On the positive side, faith could wash away unnecessary doubt or cynicism, giving you more hope that you can make a real difference in the world.

Reaching too far could cause you to lose your balance today. Your perceptions may not be accurate as you stand on unfamiliar ground. Even if everything seems equally important now, financial stress can provoke a lack of confidence.
