Taking steps to improve your self-esteem might also be an effective way to ultimately increase your income. As the legendary Wayne Dyer wrote, "Self-worth comes from one thing -- thinking that you are worthy."

Your irrepressible desire to express your creativity is ready to blossom. However, the evocative Moon bumps into resistant Saturn today, teaching you a valuable lesson. Meanwhile, Neptune's presence in your 7th House of Partners brings someone into your life to play the role of a muse. Nevertheless, be wary of overindulging yourself, overestimating another person's abilities or spending more than your budget allows. Albert Einstein wrote, "The difference between genius and stupidity is genius has its limits."

Hopefully, you remember to respect people's boundaries, even when you're feeling ecstatic about your future. Although pleasure has been abundant, the pressure kicks back in today as strict Saturn reminds you that avoidance isn't a viable long-term strategy. Meanwhile, imaginative Neptune counsels you on the importance of your dreams. After your work is done, take time to reevaluate the place responsibility holds in your life. The conflict between clinging to your past and stepping into your future is complex enough that it might need additional time to resolve.

You may misjudge the amount of energy that's required to keep up your participation in a group activity now. But opportunistic Jupiter's yearlong visit to your 11th House of Social Networks is coming to an end, giving you one last chance to redefine your relationship with your community. Nevertheless, beautiful Venus is waiting in your 12th House of Privacy, reminding you that taking time to create a spiritual sanctuary now is not a retreat from reality; it's a return to dancing with the delight and divinity that exists in your heart.

Second thoughts about a recent professional decision make you wonder if you're on the right track, especially if your job is no longer supporting your dreams. Unfortunately, your ambitions may be clouded by fantasies as a motivational Moon-Saturn conjunction in your optimistic sign squares otherworldly Neptune, obscuring your current path. A disappointment or setback can morph into disorientation, leaving you to feel a sense of alienation. But don't blame your frustration on anyone else; focusing on the positive potential brings more clarity to the picture. You are what you think.

You are typically quite eager to obey the rules and respect the limits, but lately it's been tough to rein in your extravagant desires. Thankfully, the Moon's conjunction with dutiful Saturn reminds you when to call it quits today. Paradoxically, letting go of control could be exactly what you need while fanciful Neptune cheers you on from the sidelines. But your current choices are intertwined with enticing dreams that have little possibility of manifestation. Although you find it challenging to separate your fantasies from reality now, the power of discernment is your greatest ally.

Your instinct to maintain an alliance that isn't working is reflected by a responsible Moon-Saturn conjunction. Stern Saturn can restrict the ways in which you respond to your friends as it meets up with the inspirational Sagittarius Moon in your 11th House of Groups. Nevertheless, control can easily slip from your grasp as the Moon squares diaphanous Neptune. Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.

Setting career goals is a growing priority when the Moon lines up with hardworking Saturn in your 10th House of Status. Staying alert by keeping your eyes open and your ears to the ground enables you to raise your standard of living now. However, it may take a while to establish solid footing with slippery Neptune in the mix. The bigger your expectations, the more important it is to take your time and put every little detail into its proper and exact place. Dream big; start small.

Clues may appear today that give you an inkling of what you can expect as Jupiter enters your 7th House of Partnerships. Instead of pursuing success as a solo act, consider the potential rewards that could develop from your relationships with others. The possibilities might even include committing to love and marriage. But also be on the lookout for encounters in business that lead to learning about new subjects or traveling to places you've never been. Greet everyone you meet with the same respect you wish to receive in return.

You don't want to make any mistakes when taking the next step along your path to success. You could feel somewhat limited in your ability to respond to opportunities today, but rest assured you can turn a small seed into a mighty tree. However, your growth won't come from scattering your energies and taking on lots of new projects while Jupiter moves through your 6th House of Work for the next year. The daily habits that you establish now will set the stage for rewards down the road.

You're eager for more spontaneity and romance in your life once jovial Jupiter shifts into your 5th House of Fun and Games. Nevertheless, you're still carrying residual emotional weight and it might take a few weeks to lighten your load. Someone could be trying to control you in ways that you don't appreciate. The discord isn't quite out in the open which makes it even more difficult to address. Pick an appropriate time to bring up your feelings of anger or resentment, but do so with kindness. Luckily, it takes very little effort to be patient now because you intuitively know that your life is about to change for the better.

The cosmos is offering you a chance to cultivate peace and harmony in your personal life. This lovely news is made possible by a resurgence of self-confidence and a re-connection to your roots. You can derive great satisfaction from your private world when joyous Jupiter takes up residence in your 4th House of Home and Family. Emotional security is an ongoing concern for you Crustaceans, and sometimes it's a struggle to let down your guard. Bob Marley said, "Being vulnerable is the only way to allow your heart to feel true pleasure."

Hang onto your hat, for the busyness of your everyday life is about to intensify before you know it. Although you may want to deepen a meaningful relationship, expansive Jupiter's visit to your 3rd House of Immediate Environment suggests that larger social issues will pull you away from the focus on any one single person. The energetic pace is picking up and people will enter your world with good news if are willing to listen. Don't just stand there when opportunity knocks, open the door and invite it in.

Your personal development has been on the fast track while Jupiter, the magnifying lens of the cosmos, was in your sign last year. You have grown in many aspects; perhaps you even stretched beyond your normal comfort zone. However, Jupiter now moves on to objective Libra and your 2nd House of Self-Worth, offering you strategies to solidify your recent gains. Although things may settle down on a psychological level, the action will continue in more practical ways, positively impacting your ability to acquire material wealth and greater self-esteem.

It's time to stretch your wings so you can fly higher than you ever dared to dream. A wave of optimism begins to mount, carrying your hopes to new heights as auspicious Jupiter returns to your sign for a yearlong visit. However, everything looks better than it actually is, so remember to return to the ground for an occasional reality check. This is the beginning of an exciting twelve-year growth cycle, so get ready to embark on a journey to reach for the stars.

Although your immediate needs may be quite pragmatic, imagination is your salvation now. If you can visualize it, you can manifest it while propitious Jupiter blesses your 12th House of Destiny. Magically, your aspirations are freed from the constraints of your real-world obligations. It's most beneficial to use this time to dissolve your boundaries through spiritual study than to lose your identity in unattainable fantasies. Quiet the mind and the soul will speak.

You are ready to forge a new relationship with your network of friends and associates. Your key planet Jupiter is beginning its yearlong visit to your 11th House of Groups, expanding your community involvement and encouraging your participation in social causes. This shift is a background note that not only feels good; it can bring important people into your life as your dreams for the future are magnified and reflected back to you. Your natural idealism motivates you to help others for the simple sake of doing what's right. You don't need a big wallet to have a big heart.

You Mountain Goats are an ambitious lot as you are driven to climb to the highest summits. Now you stand to reap the harvest from the seeds you've sown and tended over the years as opportunistic Jupiter enters your 10th House of Career. But this time of fruition is not without its stress. Even if you receive professional recognition, you must strike a healthy balance between your long-term goals and your immediate emotional needs. Don't ignore the softer and more artistic side of life. As John Cleese said, "If you want creative workers, give them enough time to play."

The future is calling to you in a voice that sounds much like your own. Oddly enough, Jupiter's visit to your 9th House of Big Ideas is not about any one concrete objective. You're willing to let the promotion pass you by if the additional responsibilities might inhibit your potential explorations of new ideas or new lands. Fortunately, you're on the edge of a great adventure. If you were consistent in your recent efforts, now is the time to collect your rewards and set your sights on the next horizon.

You can see far into the future as changes clear away old blockages. Jupiter's shift into your 8th House of Deep Connections reveals a whole new landscape from which to explore all relationships. You are intrigued with the complexity of the entanglements that lurk beneath the surface and can learn much about the magic of shared vulnerability this year. Sometimes, dependency on another person slows your growth; however, financial and emotional interdependence now leads you down a very different road than you expected. Life is full of wonderful surprises if you keep your heart and mind wide open.

Frustration mounts if you aren't measurably progressing toward your goals. Surprisingly, you may end up doing better than you expect as long as you respect other people's boundaries. Karmic Saturn seeks stability, yet its stressful square to nebulous Neptune could bring discouragement if control of your own destiny slips away today, leaving you uncertain about your next move. A temporary retreat seems to be a smart idea now but if you want a lasting resolution, take responsibility for your own emotions instead of attempting to change anyone else's.

You're currently walking a fine line between the real and the ideal while limit-setting Saturn crosses paths with visionary Neptune. Steady growth is more likely if you stay on top of your obligations, but following through with your promises may not be all that easy now. The secret to success is graciously adapting to the shift from dreams to necessities. Be prepared to radically alter your approach as conditions continue to fluctuate. Sometimes you need to hold your ground and other times it's best to go with the flow.

It's nearly impossible to deny an underlying sense that something isn't quite right, for you can feel the resistance every which way you turn. Nevertheless, you're eager to assert your opinion if someone challenges your perspective. What begins as a bout of free-floating anxiety can morph into an unavoidable situation that requires you to make a tough decision. Remember, cosmic forces are always pulling you in two different directions. Maintaining your balance is easier if you work with the external influences instead of against them.

Your responsibilities are in the process of change and it takes a lot of focus to keep up with them. It's exhausting to fight against pressure from others, yet an uncomfortable Saturn-Neptune square reveals a significant difference of agendas. Conserve your energy for tasks you do well, rather than wasting time engaging in losing battles. Even if you're not prepared to take a risk professionally today, at least let your imagination cultivate visions of a more rewarding career. According to Oprah Winfrey, "The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams."

You may be dazed and confused today, but thankfully, clarity chases the clouds away later to give you a new purpose in life. A stressful square between accountable Saturn and hazy Neptune has you wondering if you are in a state of denial. Having the courage to question your direction is healthy, but don't be surprised if your malaise grows the deeper you dig. You might find it an impossible task to get to the origin of your low spirits now. Keep calm and remember the words of Deepak Chopra, "Every great change is preceded by chaos."

People seem to be misleading you today, even if they're not doing it intentionally. Meanwhile, you're so sure of your own position that you have little interest in negotiating or compromising with others. Nevertheless, the key to your success is blending authoritative Saturn's certainty with intuitive Neptune's vision. Let your imagination wander, even if you don't see any pragmatic value to this daydreaming process. The distance between your most magical dreams and your future is called action.

Following your dreams may seem completely out of the question today. You struggle to strike a workable balance between spiritual pursuits and daily responsibilities, especially when taskmaster Saturn forms a conflicting square with escapist Neptune. Be careful how you express your annoyance or you may reveal more about your feelings than you ever intended. Using your smile to change the world is wiser now than letting the world change your smile.

A leak of confidential information might damage trust today, yet an overreactive Moon-Jupiter square makes it tough to keep secrets. Being honest is essential, but you may want to err on the side of discretion. A square between austere Saturn and delusional Neptune can put an end to a relationship built on illusions. There is an inevitable sadness in bursting bubbles, but it will allow you to move ahead with greater clarity. Psychologist Carl Jung wrote, "Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes."

There is a lot at stake today, yet you might not be able to get past your uncertainty about your career choices and how they impact your finances. You may discourage easily when fuzzy Neptune forms a discomforting aspect to ambitious Saturn in your sign. It's exasperating when you can't shake off lingering self-doubt. Although social activities act as a lovely distraction, they can't replace your need for a meaningful existence. Change is everywhere, but you won't get everything you want overnight. The seeds you plant now need time to grow and bear fruit.

Making careful choices leaves you with enough time and energy to jump on the right opportunity when it comes along. Your ruling planet Saturn squares spacey Neptune, complicating your efforts to turn your dreams into reality now. Nevertheless, the outcome of a current situation may not be apparent until after Mercury turns direct on September 22. What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

Reshaping your vision of the future to fit into your current reality can turn confusion into productivity. But even if you're clear about your new destination, you still might have trouble paying for your journey. Materialistic Saturn is like an anchor that tethers you to your long-term plans, and its dynamic square to ephemeral Neptune can wear you out if you don't handle your workload carefully. Don't dream about your success; work for it.

Your sensitive nature can sometimes leave you struggling to speak your mind because you don't want to hurt anyone's feelings. It's even more complicated now that strict Saturn squares gentle Neptune, making it difficult to tune into other people's emotions without feeling their pain. No matter how hard you work to balance necessity with compassion, remember, you can still take care of business while listening to your heart. When you cultivate empathy, you are in a position to take the lemons that life hands you and make lemonade.

A person very close to you might have the best of intentions today, but he or she may require so much from you that you consider walking away from it all. Alternatively, someone's actions stimulate buried feelings and motivate you to demand more of life. In either case, primal emotions work their way to the surface, destabilizing relationships in the process. However, you can't judge your success by external events. If you want to feel rich, just count all the things you have that money can't buy.

Your serious mood is not about denying pleasure today; it's about clarifying what you want and quantifying what you're willing to do to get it. But don't complain if you feel undervalued. Just commit to developing your talents to their full potential by demonstrating grace in all that you do now. Nevertheless, you still must reexamine your heart to uncover your basic needs. Growing resentment in a relationship is possible, but it's only a problem if you refuse to make any changes. Distance between two people is often created by an unwillingness to compromise.

The line between pleasure and pain may be quite thin while your senses are in a state of heightened awareness today. If you feel stymied by someone who is supposed to be your ally, an angry response isn't your smartest counter-move. Instead, surprise others with your emotional depth while charismatic Venus squares powerhouse Pluto. But don't go overboard and turn a good thing into a major drama. If you're not getting anywhere fast, back up to catch your breath, reassess your approach and try again.

Your emotions may be tied up in knots due to fear of a potential loss, yet romantic Venus could send you on an intense trip down the rabbit hole today. The highs and lows of passion give you little time to rest as moments of delight are sandwiched between incidents of doubt and dissatisfaction. Developing self-discipline and taking a stand in a relationship now can be hard work, but the long-term rewards of recognition and self-respect are well worth the effort.

Although you are more organized in your thinking and capable of executing a well-constructed plan now, success may not be immediately forthcoming. Making your feelings known seems to clear the air, but sweet Venus' square to formidable Pluto can raise the resistance you encounter more than you expect. Luckily, Venus in diplomatic Libra empowers you to handle tricky interpersonal tensions if you're willing to meet others halfway. Bertrand Russell wrote, "The only thing that will redeem mankind is cooperation."

An innocent romance may be cast in a darker light while vulnerable Venus squares controlling Pluto today. Unfortunately, mistrust can be fed by lingering confusion, so don't take it personally if the current situation triggers an old issue. Additionally, finances might take a sudden turn south as hidden costs of an economic or romantic adventure come into play. The trouble is if you don't risk anything, you risk more. Keep your eyes wide open and jump.

Practicing self-discipline greatly improves your chances of success today. Be wise and forgo immediate gratification in exchange for long-term potential. Nevertheless, there are still tough issues to face that could generate negative feelings like suspicion or resentment. Bringing thoughts out of the shadows and into the light enables you to gracefully manage the complex energy. Avoid covert manipulation; act with integrity in all that you do.

Your hypersensitivity to the behavior of those closest to you can put a relationship on edge today. Old emotional wounds may feel raw, invoking unproductive jealousy or unreasonable expectations. The range of possibilities in love is being stretched now, but going too far in either direction could damage an existing partnership. Keep in mind that your most important work happens behind the scenes these days. Nourishing your soul and inspiring your imagination put your priorities back in proper perspective.

Although you're tempted to say yes to every invitation you receive while social Venus sparkles in your 11th House of Networking, you may be asking for more trouble than you realize. Emotional discomfort might threaten your peace of mind today, but the heightened tension also brings buried truths to light. Discontent is likely brewing, making it impossible to ignore the differences between you and those closest to you. Thankfully, you can figure out the best way to proceed in the long-run once you fully commit to the process in the present moment. Never underestimate the power of now.

Unstable relationships and uncertainty about your own feelings can leave you feeling depleted now. You may be standing at a fork in the road that requires you to make a decision to go one way or another. Fortunately, you'll likely find resolution when loving Venus squares evolutionary Pluto, marking an end to your recent emotional roller coaster ride, or deepening your commitment to reach satisfaction at any cost. Don't allow envy or differences in style keep you from aligning yourself with those who inspire you to dream big.

Personal issues intensify, possibly reaching the boiling point today. Extreme behavior precipitates powerful emotional reactions when vulnerable Venus squares potent Pluto. You can't escape the consequences of your actions, especially if you think you're entitled to something you are not. Be sure that you're willing to deal with the heat before adding more fuel to the fire. If you're not pushing the envelope of possibility now, you're probably not trying hard enough. Mistakes caused by going too far are more useful than benefits reaped by playing it safe.

You may feel more comfortable going solo today than depending on anyone else to show up with the goods. Innocent Venus in your 8th House of Intimacy is challenged by mysterious Pluto, stirring feelings of fear or self-doubt. You're in a serious frame of mind now and prefer to avoid casual conversations. Although your passions are intense and your desires deep, the potential rewards of engaging in meaningful exchanges are great enough for you to take a chance. Finding the right co-conspirator is the trick.

You might not be able to slow things down today, even if you think it would be a wise move. Superhero Mars is all fired up by mental Mercury and you can't stop your thoughts from running around in frantic circles. If you're feeling an extra zest for life, it's time to convert your enviable enthusiasm into a plan of action. But creating a strategy in your mind is not enough. As Walt Disney said, "If you can dream it, you can do it."

Emotional veneers have been stripped away, putting you face to face with your deepest desires. You may be willing to risk rejection now if that's what it takes to be true to yourself. Unfortunately, you could offend someone with your disclosure, which might require you to rebuild trust in the relationship. But in the long run it could prove more damaging to hide your feelings from yourself than to honestly express them to others. Do what is right, not what is easy.

Quick thinking is stimulated by an energetic square between cerebral Mercury and red-hot Mars. Unfortunately, you lack patience with someone who can't keep up with your pace. You're capable of coming up with brilliant answers right away, but how you communicate them will either encourage productive discussion or unnecessary conflict. Although you can't control every variable, choosing your words carefully helps to prevent the interpersonal dynamics from getting out of hand. No matter what, remember the Dalai Lama words: "Don't let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace."

Although you're often tentative in your expression, today you're ready to take an emotional risk. An argumentative Mercury-Mars square inspires you to be uncharacteristically impulsive, yet it may be difficult to manage the collateral damage if you jump right in before knowing all the facts. Since Mercury is retrograde in your 3rd House of Communication, it makes sense to back away from petty disagreements. Verbal combat will not bring you closer to your goals, but offering an olive branch demonstrates your willingness to work toward creating an atmosphere of harmony.

You may struggle with an individual at work who is unwilling to give an inch today. Unfortunately, you could be fighting a losing battle if challenged by someone in power. It's better to recognize the existence of external authority and make whatever internal adjustments you need. Even negotiating with good intentions might not improve your position now that mischievous Mercury is at cross purposes with warrior Mars. Instead of looking for a fight, fix the situation by changing your focus. Conflict cannot escalate without your participation.

Passive-aggressive messages may be accompanied with a smile today, but you still know if someone is being unkind to you. A hard square between snappy Mercury and pushy Mars prompts spontaneous replies that produce hurt feelings. Old arguments resurface now that retrograde Mercury hooks up with the Sun in your sign. Thankfully, a major drama can be avoided by your willingness to meet others halfway rather than angrily holding your ground. Offering a compromise is easier when mutual respect is the top priority.

It might feel as if everyone knows exactly which emotional buttons to push to hook you into their melodramas. Quicksilver Mercury's square to bossy Mars tempts you to replace logic with impatience. Unfortunately, unpremeditated rants will only instigate further discord. Remember, it's not what you say that's contentious; it's how you say it. Find the calm in the center of the storm before you open your mouth.

You're eager to defend your position today because you think you have all your facts in order. However, it might come as a shock to encounter someone who can be just as stubborn as you. Nevertheless, a combative Mercury-Mars square could bait you into a frustrating disagreement that brings your core beliefs into question. Instead of being swept up in the rising emotions now, use your mental agility to make a plan to put into motion later in the month. In the meantime, tap into your heightened intuition to circumvent any roadblocks in your path.

You're quite convincing when you speak from the heart, but an intellectual argument may not be as effective today. Someone's hidden agenda can stir complex emotional crosscurrents and you'll only make matters worse if you try to force a resolution to the tension. Mouthy Mercury squares cantankerous Mars in an explosive yet short-lived aspect. Nevertheless, the discord will settle quicker than you think if you adopt a diplomatic approach. Let there be peace on Earth and let it begin with you.

Your recent lack of progress might have led you to question if you're on the right path. Although the uncertainty is already beginning to fade, an urgent square between trickster Mercury and militant Mars can reignite a flammable situation. Fortunately, patience is an asset you know how to use to your advantage. Self-control in word and deed minimizes unnecessary drama and earns you the respect you seek. As Ben Franklin wrote, "Energy and persistence conquer all things."

Your rapid-fire thinking allows you to spout off-the-cuff answers today that just might work. However, it's all too easy to slip into verbal sparring when every comment elicits a snappy comeback. It's great to be witty, but cutting remarks could damage a relationship if you're not careful where you aim them. Combine compassion with thoughtfulness to prevent your words from inadvertently turning into weapons. With a little self-awareness now, you can put the power of your mind toward creating messages that motivate people instead of tearing them down.

Think twice before you react emotionally because other people's opinions about your goals are not as important as they seem in the moment. Nevertheless, someone's casual criticism of your career ambitions could trigger a temper tantrum today. In fact, a simple miscommunication is capable of generating a war of words over a petty issue while retrograde Mercury heightens the energy of a quarrelsome Sun-Mars square. Instead of fighting back, channel your anger into climbing the ladder of success. The best revenge is to accomplish what others say cannot be done.

Your nerves are on edge and you may be caught off guard by surprising events. However, it's best not to overreact when tensions return from the past, perhaps stronger in intensity than before. You're not interested in accommodating the needs of others today but this conflict only reawakens deeper issues and makes matters worse. Express your feelings carefully in a controlled manner without giving anyone a reason to plot against you. Channeling this turbulent energy toward positive transformation isn't easy; but if anyone can do it, it's you.

You are swept up in a whirlwind of activity today, which may not leave you much time for yourself. As a result, you could strike out angrily in judgment against a friend, colleague or classmate -- even if the person doesn't deserve it. Nevertheless, if you refrain from keeping score, you can step lightly through the emotional minefield without setting off any explosions or wearing yourself out with unnecessary concern. Taking the high road is the only solution that makes sense.

Deep bonds from the past can cloud a current relationship, so be mindful when clarifying the differences between your memories and current events. A Mercury-Sun conjunction squares pugnacious Mars in your 7th House of Relationships, creating discord with others that could result from projections of your inner turmoil. Facing your own ghosts minimizes your tendency to fan the fires of a minor disagreement. Acting with kindness prevents misunderstandings and negativity from hijacking your day.

You are acutely aware of exactly what you must do to get your needs met now. An impetuous Sun-Mars square gives you the potential to surprise yourself and others by reacting before you consider the consequences. If you've been waiting for a chance to break out of your shell, this is your time to shine. Avoiding confrontation will only make you resentful of others and disappointed in yourself. After all, if you don't take a chance now, you will never know what might happen. Remember, everything is less scary when cast in the light of awareness.

Although these are intense times for nearly everyone, your current challenges are centered around sharing your truth and the acknowledgment you want from others. The radiant Sun and communicator Mercury cross swords with macho Mars in your 5th House of Self-Expression. You might be tempted to shove someone out of their comfort zone to get a reaction from them. However, the response you receive may not be the one you expect. Act with caution even if you're mad, or you could upset the apple cart and will have to start over from scratch.

You're passionate about realizing your dreams, but your current progress isn't going as smoothly as you wish. Unfortunately, you could be so annoyed that someone is working at cross-purposes to your goals that you're ready to confront the person directly. Although it's wise to take action, the issue is more complex than it seems. Instead of thinking that employing logic will help today, channel your frustration into creating a new challenge for yourself. Use your intuition to solve problems with original solutions and transform a hopeless situation into a productive one.

Although you don't want to hurt or embarrass anyone, it's still wiser to speak up than to clam up today. An irrepressible square between the Sun and insistent Mars drives you to say something you would normally keep to yourself. Unfortunately, you lack the patience now to wrap your message up in a pretty package. You're not interested in covering up the truth, but you can still present it in a form in which it's most likely to be understood. A spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down.

Feelings run strong as the passion of attraction and the potential for conflict battle with one another. Words spoken with insensitivity quickly turn simple comments into personal attacks. Remember, retrograde Mercury and the Sun are dynamically squaring combative Mars, possibly tricking you into thinking this is a fight to the finish when the only actual casualty might be your ego. Reconsider your options before firing off your rockets; make love, not war.

It doesn't take much to get your motor running now, whether you're heading off for a rendezvous with someone new, initiating changes at home or reshuffling your priorities. The emotional temperature is rising, making it more crucial than ever to channel your powerful energy productively -- or at least playfully. Just be cautious when engaging in physical activities because you could push yourself past your limits today. As motivational speaker Jim Rohn said, "Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live."

Your wishes may be denied today and you're ready to undertake a valiant struggle for your cause. Unfortunately, acts of aggression are totally counterproductive and will only bring unhappiness and stress. Instead of dueling with your opponents now, it's smarter to focus on the long-term victory. Meanwhile, reduce the pressure in the moment by finding ways to express your energy physically so it doesn't bottle up inside. Creating a healthy outlet for your emotions is the best tactic to eliminate the potential for any unnecessary ego skirmishes.

A clash of strategies between you and your coworkers might end up in a deadlock today. Nevertheless, you could perform miracles if you redirect your energy and focus the intensity of your feelings on manifesting your dreams instead of living up to other people's expectations. In fact, your current nemesis is likely an internal saboteur that you must tame by finding the creative key that unlocks your full potential. But don't wait for divine inspiration or a better time. As Sufi poet Rumi wrote, "If all you can do is crawl, start crawling."

You could run into a rough patch today if everyone takes extreme positions in a disagreement. Even if you know what you want, you might be sorry if your ambitions drive you too hard now that the Sun squares aggressive Mars in your 10th House of Social Status. Ultimately, traversing the current unstable emotional terrain requires you to discuss all the various points of view with everyone involved. Defuse the tense situation any way you can and apply your resolve to harmoniously moving forward rather than battling over the past.

You act as if you are a free-spirited being today, but once you swing into motion you are confronted with unexpected resistance. At first, you're certain that your allies will applaud whatever you choose to do. Nevertheless, you see signs that your support system isn't as strong as you expected. Although you might be annoyed that your friends aren't standing by you now, consider the possibility that you are simply pushing the limits too far. Sometimes, when others can't keep up with you it's best to slow down.

You may have recently adopted a whole new set of professional goals that set you off in a different direction. Unfortunately, you might not see the difficulties associated with your chosen path until you're already well on your way. Ironically, the better an opportunity looks now, the more problems you could encounter. For the biggest decisions, wait until after the Solar Eclipse on Friday. In the meantime, reevaluate your priorities and modify them as needed, even if it means a departure from your previous agenda.

Try as you might, you can't get rid of a crazy idea about embarking on a journey of a lifetime. It could begin with something you learn about another culture or a philosophy from a different civilization. In any case, a passing curiosity can turn into a full-blown obsession. Don't try to overpower it with logic; instead, surrender to the excitement. Whether or not your adventure ever materializes is not important at this time. Continue your explorations by mentally pursuing every possible avenue until Mercury turns direct later this month.

Big ideas and high hopes capture your imagination at work today. Although emotions may fully envelop you like water, you can approach your feelings from a detached intellectual perspective now. You might seem as if you're not fully engaged in the moment, but a more cerebral mindset gives you the ability to analyze all the nuances of interpersonal dynamics before committing to a specific plan. Don't be in such a hurry to set your agenda in stone. Giving yourself some leeway in how you react improves your chances for success.

Don't be concerned if your friends and associates appear to be a bit aloof today. It's a mistake to take their coolness personally, since chances are it's really not about you. Instead of counterbalancing the awkward tension by trying to close the emotional gap, allow it to widen without resistance. There is a normal process occurring that's like the inhalation and exhalation of your breath. The Aquarius Moon encourages independence and allowing it to flourish ensures that interdependence will follow.

You have ingenious new ideas that you want to bring to the workplace today, but you're not sure how others will react to your out-of-the-box concepts. Luckily, you might be quite surprised with the positive reactions you receive. It's as if everyone is rooting for you because they know that your success will ultimately benefit them, too. But don't worry about their motives now; just free up some time and space to begin working on the realization of your dreams while you are lucky enough to have the support of the universe on your side.

You're attracted to the concept of going deeper in a current relationship or starting up a new romance. However, stern Saturn can be a bit of a spoiler now, demanding that you manage your life in the three-dimensional world before taking your search for meaning into more irrational realms. It's not wise to ignore Saturn's cool-but-effective approach to life by trying to do an end run around your responsibilities. As Gandhi said, "Action expresses priorities."

You might choose to stay at home today on the assumption that you can still accomplish your fair share of work. Nevertheless, it's quite difficult to get motivated now, especially if you like the quiet comfort of your own familiar surroundings. And although this sweet serenity may sound enticing, you'll likely grow bored once you settle into a contemplative state of mind. Don't get trapped by your expectations of a perfect life. Martin Luther King said, "We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope."

The road ahead appears unobstructed today, but you instinctively already know that this heightened clarity won't last. However, you can learn an important lesson as you realize the milestones you use to measure your progress are created within your mind. Although you're given a reprieve now, budget your time wisely. Instead of scattering your energy, pick a goal and make it happen. Focus on whatever you want to do and don't let the bright lights distract you from your true destiny.

You might think that distinguishing yourself at work will be easy, but it seems as if others are angling to be major players, too. Luckily, you have an uncanny ability to combine original thinking with a cautious conservative approach. Your current uncharacteristic eclectic style is right on point now, even if you are overly concerned that someone will judge you by your appearance. But don't let your worries about the approval of anyone else stop you. Liberian President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf wrote, "If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough."

Your easygoing nature is your greatest strength now while the receptive Moon is camped out in your social sign. But you're not interested in wasting time; there are too many responsibilities weighing on your shoulders and you want to get to work before you lose your chance. Don't slow down to make apologies when you could be using your talents to actually finish up an incomplete job. There will be plenty of opportunities for fun in the days to come if you stay on track and fulfill your promises. Work now, play later.

You may be caught in a web of complicated emotional dynamics that make your interactions with others a bit awkward today. You might even pull off a disappearing act that would make Houdini look twice while others wonder where you went. But your work is not about satisfying anyone else's curiosity now; your job is to take care of your own well-being by setting limits on your accessibility. A lack of boundaries invites a lack of respect.

Relationships at work may feel quite unstable today, making it tough to know where to place your allegiance. The Sun in your 6th House of Employment forms an uneasy aspect to disruptive Uranus, triggering a reshuffling of political alliances. Nevertheless, remaining reasonable when you deal with someone's inconsistent behavior can make the difference between war and peace now. Concentrating your efforts on your own long-term goals helps to reduce the pressure as long as you're not simply trying to escape from your current reality.

You may feel as if a relationship has reached a turning point and you must take action to reestablish a healthy balance between intimacy and independence. Although you might be ready for nearly anything, the Sun's misalignment with surprising Uranus can still catch you off guard when you realize there isn't a quick fix for this current stress. If you are eager to head off on your own, remember you'll be even more successful if you're functioning as part of a group. Teamwork makes the dream work.

Relationship dynamics that seem to be out of your control push you one way and then suddenly pull you another. You may be surprised by events at home, especially if you get swept up in someone else's drama. You're particularly sensitive to the feelings of those close to you today, motivating you to do whatever you can to help calm the storm. Ultimately, your smartest strategy is to seek a sweet spot between holding onto the way things are now and being open to positive change. Time heals what reason cannot.

Making a tough decision today is all the more challenging because the facts keep changing. Obviously, you still don't have all the information you need now that Mercury is retrograding through your 3rd House of Learning. Give yourself enough time to assimilate the incoming data and work out the contradictions internally, instead of striking out or reacting too hastily. Sometimes you learn the most by just sitting back and observing the behavior of others. Lao Tzu wrote, "Silence is a source of great strength."

Problems with a business partner may become disruptive today, sending you back to the drawing board to sort out your finances. You really want to establish stability in your cash flow, but it's nearly impossible while the Sun in your 2nd House of Money forms an anxious aspect with chaotic Uranus. Remember, an extreme position won't likely lead to a resolution now, so use your diplomatic skills to find a middle ground. Greek philosopher Epicurus wrote, "Be moderate in order to taste the joys of life in abundance."

Relationship issues are front and center in your life now. If there is someone special in your world, the Sun's opposition to wounded Chiron in your 7th House of Partners encourages you to refresh the connection and mend any troublesome dynamics. If you're single, you may be ready to get back into the game. Either way, taking the initiative works wonders, instead of trying to turn back the clock. As John Mayer sings, "Love is a verb."

Proving your value to your coworkers is an uphill battle now, especially if you're content to withdraw from social activities and work behind the scenes. Unfortunately, the Sun and retrograde Mercury are hiding out in your 12th House of Privacy, making it more difficult to be noticed. Thankfully, you can instantaneously change the game by suddenly bringing everything out into the open. Your straightforward approach to resolving conflict now enables you to handle the current pressures with grace.

Your faith in your friends and associates may be tainted by mistrust or manipulation as you trudge your way through choppy emotional waters. The Sun and retrograde Mercury are visiting your 11th House of Groups now, but unpredictable Uranus can be counted on to complicate almost any gathering at this time. Calmly adjusting to the shifting tides reduces risks while also possibly creating unexpected opportunities. Simplifying your life amplifies your future.

Your drive to succeed professionally is in high gear while the radiant Sun is shining in your 10th House of Career. However, unrestrained Uranus increases your restlessness and tempts you to walk away from an unexpected disagreement with a family member. Don't play the victim to circumstances you created; take responsibility for your part in the drama. Some people fan the flames and then get mad when the fire spreads.

Your ambitious nature normally gives you a clear picture about your destination. However, sudden changes in someone else's agenda might require you to let go of your old plans today. You could receive a flood of useful insights now if you can adapt to other people's ideas. Nevertheless, you may be asking questions for which there are no simple answers. Your chances of making brilliant discoveries and avoiding chaos improve when you and those around you are willing to set the past aside and move toward the future.

You are right in the middle of an ongoing struggle between independence and obligation today. On one hand, you crave excitement and on the other hand, you need safety. You may overreact to restrictions with fierce resistance now, but the real conflict is within yourself. Instead of blowing up at someone else, consider this a cosmic reminder to apply your genius toward creating more freedom in your life. William Shakespeare wrote, "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves."

Conflicting messages today will have you heading first one way and then another as you try to figure out how to rebel against the status quo. You could get lost looking at the world through rose-colored glasses. But you are shaken awake from your fantasies, and brought back down to Earth just in time to save the day. Changes are in the wind and it's much easier if you choose to make them now, rather than trying to resist them later on.

You're stifled by the familiar pace of your life and want to shake it up a bit. However, you must be careful what you wish because the Pisces Full Moon Eclipse falls in your 12th House of Destiny and could bring more upheaval than you bargained for now. It's in your best interest to maintain your daily routine without abandoning your regular schedule. React carefully to boredom, especially if you've been thinking about quitting your job. Instead of running away, find ways to integrate the sudden metaphysical insights you receive to create the excitement you crave.

Friends and colleagues may show disregard for your needs today and alter the rules of the game. Just as you think everyone is on the same page, you suddenly realize that you're not even reading the same book as the Pisces Lunar Eclipse stirs up trouble in your 11th House of Groups. Cooperation with others is difficult now; nevertheless, you could be in for a pleasant surprise if someone new enters your life, bringing fun back to the workplace. Keep an open mind around people who operate very differently than you; if your basic goals are aligned, there is room for compromise.

You're itching for a more challenging job now and eager to move into new territory. Sudden shifts in management or even a company reorganization can alter the direction of your professional life when the Pisces Full Moon Eclipse sends subtle yet powerful shockwaves through your 10th House of Career. Ironically, you don't mind the uncertainty because you're confident you'll be able to capitalize on any potential opportunity. Your mental agility empowers you to dance circles around everyone else while they're wondering what to do. A moment of hesitation may cost a lifetime of regrets.

You might be packing your bags to go on an unexpected trip as the Pisces Lunar Eclipse rattles your 9th House of Long Journeys. However, watching a travelogue or reading a great book might be enough to catalyze a major change in your life. Thankfully, you can experience faraway lands without leaving the comfort of home -- an important consideration for you security-conscience Crabs. Mental attractions are just as important as physical ones when it comes to expanding your horizons. Dreaming the improbable dream is a crucial step to achieving happiness.

Intense emotions are agitated as the evocative Pisces Full Moon Eclipse ratchets up the energy in your 8th House of Deep Feelings. Your desires may be ready to boil over as you obsess about a power struggle in a relationship. The fact is you're running out of patience and you're probably willing to rock the boat in order to gain some financial independence. However, you could have second thoughts, prompting you to become more careful about executing your plans. Ben Franklin wrote, "Distrust and caution are the parents of security."

Freedom is a theme for you now, although it may feel more like uncertainty. The Pisces Full Moon Eclipse polarizes your 7th House of Partnerships, bringing major shifts in the near future. A current relationship might be destabilized by someone who doesn't want to play by your rules or by your own search for something new. Relax and soak in this new world of possibilities, so you can enjoy the ride without worrying too much about your destination.

Being awakened by the light of awareness isn't always an easy path, and sometimes staying unconscious is less complicated. However, the Pisces Lunar Eclipse rattles your 6th House of Routine, releasing suppressed tensions with sudden force. You may be emotionally distraught if you have been hiding your true feelings. But instead of impulsively running off to follow your own dream, turn this into a time of quiet introspection and spiritual contemplation. What you learn now might be a temporary transition, rather than a permanent solution.

Moments of extreme confidence could have you strutting about on stage today, dazzling others with your wild imagination and playful wit. The Pisces Full Moon Eclipse in your 5th House of Romance can ignite your heart in a flash as someone you barely know becomes your obsession, or the fire for a current flame is rekindled. However, you might also overreact to all the sudden attention by pulling back and shutting people out in your need for privacy. In the words of Thoreau, "It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things."

If a cloud of self-doubt based on past failures obscures the Sun, just let it drift on by. The Pisces Lunar Eclipse uncovers buried secrets hiding in your 4th House of Foundations. Although you might experience an emotional earthquake on the inside, you're able to appear coolly confident on the outside. Your capacity to respond to crises is excellent now, since you instinctively understand where your attention is needed, rather than on being distracted by demanding but less important issues. You always have time for the things you put first.

You may feel somewhat overwhelmed by how much information is streaming into your awareness now, both from conventional learning and directly from the wisdom of your intuition. The escapist Pisces Full Moon Eclipse intensifies your 3rd House of Distractions, bringing an unpredictable quality to your world. However, this cosmic turbulence can attract a lucky coincidence, even as you continue to worry about your lack of stability. Your best strategy is to relinquish control -- not an easy thing for you to do -- and just let yourself be happy.

The inherent instability of the otherworldly Pisces Full Moon Eclipse lands in your 2nd House of Values today, dropping you into a world of cloudy dreams and fuzzy reality. However, you like to keep it real, even if trust doesn't come easily now. And although you are quite resourceful by nature, you might act impetuously and thereby jeopardize the invincibility of your self-esteem or even your bank account. Faith can move mountains but too much doubt creates them.

Your relationship life is on shaky ground while the Pisces Lunar Eclipse floods your 1st House of Self and your 7th House of Others. Whether this eclipse in your sign creates an immediate energetic shift or not, there will likely be rumblings below the surface that alter the way you connect with people. Boredom sets in quickly now, even if the situation was once cozy and comfortable. You can best handle any experience that rattles you by graciously adapting to the changing circumstances. You are intuitively heading in the right direction, even if you don't yet know your destination.

The winds of fate are blowing your way today, giving you permission to be your naturally spontaneous self. It's time to bend the rules creatively and try original solutions to personal and professional problems. Having conviction in your beliefs empowers you to take advantage of this cosmic opportunity. The Moon's return to reactive Aries, combined with an electric Mars-Uranus trine, can give you a shove in a new direction at exactly the right moment. Don't think about it; just act on the intuitive flash and know that something magical is about to happen. If you build it, they will come.

Reacting without thinking today can bring you thrills you don't usually seek. Electric Uranus is giving you an itch for excitement as it stimulates rowdy Mars in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Review the emotional costs before you reveal what's in your heart, because you might not see the possible pitfalls until it's too late. But don't hesitate too long if everything makes sense or you could miss your chance. As the great science fiction writer Frank Herbert wrote, "Truth suffers from too much analysis."

It's as if someone opened the floodgates to allow a surplus of original ideas to flow through your imagination and you can't wait to act on each and every one of them. Fortunately, a rebellious Mars-Uranus trine increases your ability to clearly express your unorthodox thinking. But just because something sounds good on paper doesn't mean it will work in reality. Aside from Mercury retrograde, there is not a lot to hold you back right now, so it's crucial to weigh the pros and cons before jumping into a project you will soon regret. Look before you leap.

Although you might encounter a surprise or two along your way today, you are likely to have a banner day if you possess the courage to express what's in your heart. You're more inclined to take a chance and try something new, even if you're simply doing your chores. Reach for the top of the mountain and don't fret if circumstances slow your progress. Simply refine your plans by making necessary adjustments and keep on going. Thankfully, a round of lightning strikes from Uranus the Awakener can clear the obstructions from your path, finally freeing you to move forward.

You may not be able to think your way through the sudden rush of feelings you experience today. However, you'll be left with a powerful sense of accomplishment if you can surrender control and trust your intuition. A fiery Mars-Uranus trine could shake up your personal life and strain your ability to remain logical. Allowing your heart to open without reservation is your key to thriving as your adrenaline rises. Rumi wrote, "Reason is powerless in the expression of love."

Staying focused on the present isn't easy when you see so many options shining in the distance. The harmonious hookup between self-directed Mars and futuristic Uranus can clear the cloudy thoughts from the air. However, Mars is activating your 4th House of Domestic Conditions, inspiring you to exercise your creative self-expression at home. But before you start a major renovation project, make sure to consider all the ramifications since Mercury is still retrograde. You can avoid a mess by recognizing a potential trap ahead of time.

Breaking out of your comfort zone may be necessary to add some extra pizzazz to a current relationship. In any event, you must be prepared to take a risk, even if it means approaching someone in order to establish a new friendship. If something triggers your emotions, be ready to leave the security of your cautious routines to entertain a wilder and crazier existence. Ben Franklin wrote, "The Constitution only guarantees you the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself."

Innovative thinking can open doors that lead to new sources of income while revolutionary Uranus forms a favorable link to action-hero Mars in your 2nd House of Personal Resources. Reevaluate alternatives that were previously set aside now that circumstances are no longer holding you back. Follow your own creative impulses today to broaden your financial horizons. Give your mind room to roam and remain receptive to solutions that may arrive in a flash of insight. Whether your plans concern money, fun or love, the warm winds of hope are about to carry you to success.

A sudden blast of energy motivates you to get physical today. It may even be impossible to kick back and relax while electric Uranus zaps energetic Mars in your fiery sign. You might opt to do something productive, like working on a project around the house. But Mars in adventurous Sagittarius likes open spaces, making this a fantastic time to explore the great outdoors where you can see the horizon. Whatever activity you choose, it's crucial to express yourself with boldness and originality in all that you do.

Your hopes of a relaxing day can be shattered as a series of unexpected events demand your full attention. A rambunctious Aries Moon might be enough to disturb your regular weekend routine, but it's the trine between feisty Mars and unpredictable Uranus that allows you to enjoy the surprising change of pace at home once you accept the inevitable. To paraphrase Joseph Campbell, you must be willing to relinquish the day you planned so you can have the one that is waiting for you.

Your genius for coming up with original solutions and unconventional methods when faced with a problem is evident today. Luckily, an activating trine between pioneering Mars and brilliant Uranus plants the seeds for breakthroughs to complications that have stumped you in the past. Others may be amazed with your technical wizardry or your unique style. In either case, move ahead with your ideas, even if they are counter to the prevailing currents. It's not always in your best interest to go with the flow.

You're exhilarated by surprising changes that free you from boring routines today. Even if you sense something in the air, the actual events probably turn out differently than anything you might imagine while spontaneous Mars forms a superconductive trine with electrifying Uranus. The thrill of being so involved in an unplanned activity can catch you off guard. Nevertheless, taking a chance brings positive results as long as you cover all your bases before swinging into action.

Your need for independence is heightened today when the trailblazing Aries Moon runs into rebellious Uranus. Nevertheless, your current dilemma is that you also want to take someone else's perspective into consideration now. In the final analysis, you possess the impetus to break through any restraints and freely express your desires. Fortunately, the outcome could be sweet as the cosmic lovers, Venus and Mars, are moving toward a cooperative sextile. Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.

You are elated with your sudden attraction to unusual people and things today. Opening your mind to fresh experiences can be fantastic as long as you don't leap without looking. However, the trouble with love stems from complications when romantic Venus opposes unreliable Uranus, bringing unexpected new information to light. If you really think you can't live without an irresistible individual or amazing new gadget, you'll figure out what you must do to obtain your object of affection. Wake up with an idea; go to bed with satisfaction.

You're eager to test the limits today, giving you the courage to take initiative when it comes to pursuing pleasure. Wild Uranus opposes delicious Venus in your 5th House of Play, prompting you to organize an unusual social activity, whether it's a major event or a private party for two. It doesn't matter if it's cooking in the kitchen or the bedroom; you can take the lead in so many surprisingly delightful ways that you're bound to find a willing partner.

Family relationships could be unstable or even emotionally explosive now, especially if a schedule adjustment at work interferes with domestic commitments. You may feel misunderstood or surprised by sudden changes that require rapid reactions while Venus opposes the volatile Moon-Uranus conjunction in your 10th House of Public Life. Nevertheless, an abrupt change of direction on the job can force you to take a deeper look at your needs which might lead to a  reshuffling of priorities. The only person you really need to please is yourself.

It's nearly impossible to suppress your desires today, so you might just choose to put them out in the open as a proactive measure. Charming Venus in your 3rd House of Communication opposes uncontainable Uranus, adding to your current impatience. Fortunately, someone may suddenly appear in your life who shows you new routes to experiencing joy. Although you may be resistant at first, remember the difference between being pleased and being pressured by the unexpected is all a matter of your attitude.

So many emotions flow through your awareness today that it's challenging to know which ones are the most important. It's simultaneously so exhilarating and unsettling that you will need all your wits just to manage your changing desires as electric Uranus shocks alluring Venus. Let the most outrageous ideas slip away while keeping only a few of the best ones for later. Unfortunately, an overly tense situation could escalate without warning if you remain inflexible. Staying open to the surprising twists and turns that seem to come out of nowhere sets the stage for a lovely experience.

Big ideas about your future create high hopes for finding peace of mind. However, a disruptive Venus-Uranus opposition can destabilize a restrictive relationship, infuse a healthy one with exciting new energy or suddenly attract you to someone new. Although you may be dealing with an emotionally intense person, gentle Venus in your accommodating sign blesses you with a calming touch now. Thankfully, you're able to actively pursue what you want without appearing overly eager or desperate. Putting your heart on the line is the only way to find out what is real.

You may have to decide between the goodies offered by a particular relationship today and the privilege of self-determination. Thankfully, you're capable of making up your mind quickly now, so you are less likely to be willing to negotiate a compromise over your needs. An ultimatum might be presented unexpectedly and your impulsive response could trigger unwanted consequences. Slow down the discussion to increase stability and give yourself time to reevaluate the alternatives. Only you can decide the price you are willing to pay for freedom.

You might be party to a bit of excitement today as flirtatious Venus opposes a wild Moon-Uranus conjunction in your 5th House of Love and Creativity. Fortunately, your vitality is high, yet your patience is low while macho Mars is in your extroverted sign. But it's difficult to say what you mean without being misunderstood now that mischievous Mercury is retrograde. Although all signals are flashing green and you see yourself as the overconfident hare, you'll be more successful if you act like the slow-moving but obstinate tortoise.

You could easily reveal more than you should today, especially if you are trying to bury your anger. Luckily, assertive Mars is working on your behalf now so you can relax and express your emotions without starting a war. Nevertheless, you are tempted to abandon your responsibilities and kick up your heels, which may not be such a bad idea unless you do something you will regret tomorrow. After all, there's more to life than just chasing material success.

An instantaneous attraction or an unexpected emotional meltdown can rock your personal life now. In fact, your tastes may change suddenly while tantalizing Venus opposes reactionary Uranus. However, it might not be apparent whether this tempest is a passing storm or the opening volley of a more significant change. Nevertheless, once you step outside of the box and see your world in an entirely new perspective, it's difficult if not impossible to fit yourself back inside your previously cozy little world.

A heart-to-heart conversation may be exactly what you need to clear the air today. An expressive Moon Uranus conjunction opposes Venus in your 8th House of Intimacy, encouraging you to get something off your chest. But back off quickly if this conversation turns into a debate because anger can come from anywhere, and is not conducive to a peaceful resolution. It takes very little energy now to turn a minor disagreement into a communication breakdown. However, if you're lucky, an unexpected challenge in a significant relationship improves it in ways you can't imagine.

You may breathe a sigh of relief as you return to your regular routine today. It's not that there was anything wrong with your weekend shenanigans; it's just that enough is enough. Luckily, the fun and games don't have to be over yet, even if you're heading back to work or school. In fact, the calmer emotional weather might be just what you need to assimilate the experiences of the past few days. Sometimes taking a step back enables you to see that you're actually moving forward in the right direction.

You realize your job offers you more than financial benefits as you consider other practicalities today. Whether you're employed or not, you derive emotional security from your weekday schedule. Although you might long for a better situation, a supportive Venus-Mars connection empowers you to work for what you want, giving you an excellent chance to achieve your goal. Keep your eyes on your destination; your unflappable concentration is your current ticket to success.

No matter how much you packed into your weekend, it probably wasn't long enough to meet your expectations. Although Monday morning calls to you with its unfinished business and new challenges, you wish you could hide away while the Moon is hanging out in your 12th House of Escapism. Nevertheless, your negativity fades as you catch glimpses of the possible satisfaction just ahead. You are more of a materialist today and, fortunately, can see the practical rewards that could be yours for a job well done.

You derive a great deal of pleasure from your friends and your coworkers today. Fortunately, your good mood tends to bring out the best in others, enabling you to rely on your social network for the support you need. It's fantastic when you feel loved by those around you, especially when they deliver in substantial ways. However, don't be shy if you're not receiving the backing you expect. State your case clearly; you may be happily surprised with the response to your request for emotional connection or practical cooperation. You'll never know what might happen until you try.

You want your associates to acknowledge your sizable contribution today, especially if you're putting your heart and soul into your work. You're quite serious about your career now that the determined Taurus Moon is traveling through your 10th House of Public Responsibility. However, everything you do is part of your personal self-expression, making it difficult to clearly see your role in a project. Emotional detachment doesn't come naturally, but a dash of objectivity enables you to put your job into a healthier perspective.

You may be facing a familiar dilemma today as you attempt to balance your high ideals with the inescapable production deadlines of the day. You Virgos tend to be perfectionists because of your attention to details, but the truth is you don't like to do shabby work because it's ultimately inefficient. Although you're not interested in doing a job over again because it falls short of expectations, there are scheduling considerations beyond your control. Just do the best you can in the allotted time and things will ultimately turn out better than you think.

Your artistic expression is highly favored today, but even if you're not the dramatic type, there's still great potential to make something special of an opportunity. Passionate Mars forms a supportive sextile to your key planet Venus, clearing a path to finding pleasure and increasing your personal satisfaction when you do. Don't be afraid to dream big as long as you're willing to work hard to create your future as you imagine it. Just like Jiminy Cricket says, "The most fantastic magical things can happen, and it all starts with a wish."

You can lean on a close friend or partner today because he or she is likely to come through for you as needed. The reliable Taurus Moon is moving through your 7th House of Significant Partners, putting the focus on personal relationships. The universe is offering you a chance to see yourself in others and their positive responses to you are mirrors of your own behavior. However, any confrontations now might reveal a part of yourself that you don't wish to see. Taking offense where none is intended should be a trigger for self-reflection. Vulnerability is key to healing your heart.

You aren't shy about your agenda today, whether or not anyone else supports your plan. The Taurus Moon's presence in your 6th House of Routine is as solid as a rock and you won't be swayed from your lofty goals, especially with pushy Mars in your visionary sign. Nevertheless, your imagination will run away with your best ideas unless you keep reminding yourself that a pragmatic approach is your best shot. When your vision is grounded in reality, dreams can take flight.

You may appear cheerier and more social than you actually feel today, but you're willing to put on a happy face as part of your overall strategy. It's not that you're faking it; it's just that your ambitions drive your behavior. Just be certain that your motives are not based upon self-centered needs. It's good business and good karma to include your coworkers in your success. If you reach your destination, be sure to pull others along. Over one hundred years ago, orator Robert Ingersoll said, "We rise by lifting others."

Although you're being drawn out into the world, the back-to-basics Taurus Moon is camping out in your 4th House of Home and Family. You would rather set aside the noise of the day and retreat to the peace and quiet of your own private sanctuary now. Nevertheless, you're also willing to make the most of your situation and you're quick to acknowledge those things you cannot change. Thankfully, you don't need to be distracted by everyone's personal drama. You can set lofty goals and unassumingly work toward them even amidst the chaos around you.

You have an urgent message to deliver today and won't be easily deterred from speaking your piece. The dogged Taurus Moon blesses you with strength of purpose as she steadies your 3rd House of Communication. Although your words carry emotional subjectivity, your mission is less personal than corporate. You're operating with a vision based upon high ideals and you want your coworkers to validate your goals. Fortunately, you'll likely receive the necessary support as long as you can demonstrate the benefits of your plan. Thankfully, teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.

You might find yourself in an unavoidable confrontation with someone who is standing in the way of your dreams today. But don't take no for an answer since a potent Mercury-Pluto trine gives you the power of persuasion that can overcome the most rigid of resistance. You may have a surefire idea about making money, but you must fight for what you believe in with persistence. Fortunately, your perspective is likely to prevail if your argument is based on facts rather than fancy.

You need all the patience you can muster today if someone purposefully places an annoying obstacle in your path. Thankfully, you have a second chance to explain your intentions when retrograde Mercury backs into a smooth trine with unwavering Pluto. Don't be afraid to say exactly what you mean because your words carry extra weight now. Ultimately, you may be unstoppable as long as you're willing to speak truth to power.

You can surprise everyone with your practical methodology to solving a problem today. It's as if you are tied to reality as a Grand Earth Trine lets the excess air out of your creative balloon. Thankfully, using your common sense doesn't detract from your inspiration since a regenerative Mercury-Pluto trine enables you to recall vital information and tap into the magic that lurks just beneath the surface. Fantasy loses to pragmatism when it comes to getting things done.

Confrontation doesn't come naturally to you, especially when you encounter dissension. However, you possess the willpower necessary to overcome formidable odds and defend your position now. Fierce Pluto is your ally while it harmonizes with Mercury in your 3rd House of Communication, strengthening your logic and infusing your message with unshakable conviction. There's no reason to consider withdrawing in defeat; simply hold your ground until the resistance begins to dissipate. Gandhi said, "Truth alone will endure; all the rest will be swept away before the tide of time."

You might be overwhelmed by the amount of work on your plate today. Fortunately, a resourceful Mercury-Pluto trine empowers you to concentrate your efforts and manage a difficult task with saintly patience and wise maturity. Meanwhile, the Moon's presence in earthy Taurus signals the need to seek simple solutions to finish your current tasks instead of piling on additional obligations. Inch by inch it's a cinch; yard by yard it's hard.

Encountering setbacks to your plans is frustrating, but you can rebound quickly and establish new goals based on a deeper understanding of your purpose in life. Your ability to make long-term commitments is sound while logical Mercury harmoniously trines incisive Pluto in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Fortunately, you possess the stamina to overcome the resistance you face. As long as your data is in order, you can act on your conclusions with unflappable determination. Be persistent but not stubborn.

Circumstances test your commitment to others now, but you are resolved to handle any crisis you face. The stabilizing Taurus Moon's presence in your 8th House of Deep Sharing feeds into a grounded Grand Earth Trine with Mercury and Pluto, blessing you with the endurance you need to follow through with your intentions. Your ability to clearly communicate your points with power and precision safely sees you through this tricky territory. Leonardo da Vinci wrote, "Fix your course on a star and you'll navigate any storm."

You're not happy when others are overly insistent, especially if they're trying to coerce you to change your mind. You might need to dig in your heels today and make a stand against someone else's wishes. Thankfully, your key planet Pluto is part of an immovable Grand Earth Trine that strengthens your resolve and empowers you to defend your point of view no matter what happens. Don't admit defeat; you have cosmic support to overcome the current circumstances even if the outcome isn't looking good. Failure only occurs when you give up.

Your future is looking prosperous and you want to tell everyone your good news while messenger Mercury harmonizes with powerful Pluto. You are inspired to set new goals and create an ambitious action plan now that the practical Grand Earth Trine is activated by the Moon's presence in your 6th House of Self-Improvement. Exercise self-control and stick to your agenda, even if reaching your destination takes longer than you expect. Run faster if the finish line doesn't appear to be getting closer.

If your progress is impeded by dogged resistance or even unexpected setbacks, it's a signal from the cosmos telling you to hurry up and get busy. If your creativity feels blocked, step back so you can solidify your thoughts and strengthen your plan of attack. Thankfully, the Moon and Mercury form trines to unrelenting Pluto in your industrious sign, empowering you to conquer any opposition you might face today. Although you may feel invincible, it's not wise to assume you are. Patience is a more effective tool than cleverness now; working smarter accomplishes more than working harder.

Everything seems to be falling back into place today after briefly spinning out of control. Thankfully, communicator Mercury's trine to intense Pluto enables you to address a difficult issue without being overwhelmed by your emotions. Hopefully, fundamental change is grounded in necessity and will prove to have lasting value because it's supported by a practical Grand Earth Trine. Nevertheless, finding satisfaction in the present moment can be a real challenge if you're always focused on the possibilities of what you can do tomorrow. Be here now.

You're likely to push forward in your pursuit of knowledge and make your points with an unwavering determination today. You are impatient with someone else's inability to keep up with your logic. You can cut to the core of a complex issue, analyze it effectively and quickly move toward a solution as clever Mercury forms a productive Grand Earth Trine with the stubborn Taurus Moon and perceptive Pluto. Author Napoleon Hill wrote, "Ultimately action is the real measure of intelligence."

Sometimes you leave too many things for the last minute yet there are only so many hours in the day to be productive. Nevertheless, you might actually believe you can breeze through your chores in the flash of a moment. Unfortunately, if you buy into this premise today, you will end up annoyed with your bad judgment call while others will be disappointed with your performance. Instead of playing a losing game of "Beat the Clock," create a more realistic delivery schedule and inform everyone of your plans before you bump up against the deadlines. Be proactive, not reactive.

The baton is being passed to you and you're eager to run your leg of the race. If you are involved in a group project at work, it might be your turn to step up and do your part.
