Using your fantasies to stretch your horizons enables you to step beyond old self-imposed limits now. Lateral thinking is easier when your ideas don't have to be tied to reality. Astronomer Carl Sagan wrote, "Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere."

You Rams often run full speed into walls thinking that your brute force irresistible charm will allow you to bust through to the other side. However, respecting the rules and acting with a little conscious self-restraint enables you to build a foundation that's likely to last. Nevertheless, taskmaster Saturn's unforgiving presence leaves little room for error. Although you may feel inspired by a higher calling, be cautious unless you're absolutely certain that your bold actions will succeed.

Smooth sailing is a clear sign that you're heading in the right direction today. However, any problems that arise now are indicators of where your life still requires work. You may have all the proper tools you need to reach your destination, but an unexpected plot twist can tilt your world out of balance without warning. Remember that keeping the peace is not as important as keeping your sanity.

Your current tendency to play it safe will be rewarded, even if you're temporarily upset about missing out on some major fun today. The fact of the matter is you have more critical things to do and can let down your hair later. The Sun's harmonious sextile to stable Saturn can help settle your edgy emotions, ground you in reality and pave the way for real progress. You attract success when you set your priorities right.

You're not a stranger to emotional intensity, but you often keep your most extreme feelings to yourself. However, you may feel comfortable enough today to express your complex feelings in a straightforward manner. Nevertheless, you must get out and circulate with others or you could waste the great potential inherent in this moment. Stress can be a powerful motivational force rather than something to eliminate if you channel it in a healthy manner.

You may appear to be in your element, but strong feelings are brewing internally that could boil over into a confrontation. Thankfully, a constructive sextile between the willful Sun and ambitious Saturn helps you direct your energy into generating positive change. You have a strong sense of purpose now, as well as the experience to manage people and resources with creativity and wisdom. Galileo wrote, "Passion is the genesis of genius."

You can cash in on your recent originality thanks to your current ambitious nature and unwavering diligence. Furthermore, you're able to capitalize on a powerfully stabilizing Sun-Saturn sextile that strengthens your endurance, motivating you to follow through on any project you start. Nevertheless, a wonderful opportunity could slip by without even making a ripple unless you take the bull by the horns and make something happen. You are always responsible for how you act, no matter how you feel.

No matter how familiar a situation may seem today, there are subtle nuances that make this moment unlike any before. Unfortunately, you can't wrap your mind around the information that doesn't quite fit into the bigger picture today. However, your patience enables you to untangle complex messages and demystify the confusion, even if you must explain yourself repeatedly. Nevertheless, the most complicated issues can be communicated while the Sun in your sign illuminates dependable Saturn, bringing determination and discipline that strengthens alliances and earns you respect.

Although the inner workings of your mind are quite complex and not easily understood, you're under no obligation to share these private thoughts now. Instead of getting lost in a complicated head trip, demonstrating your ability to organize your ideas and complete tasks on schedule is your most sensible objective today. The support of an efficient Sun-Saturn sextile motivates you to get all your ducks in a row before jumping into a project without a plan. Thankfully, you possess a quiet self-confidence and a feeling of pride in all that you do.

Although you're surfing great waves of optimism, the currents can get tricky today. This is no time to be complacent, so remain vigilant to the subtle messages from the cosmos that are reminding you how your thoughts influence reality. Thankfully, you are being supported by the Sun in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals as it collaborates with pragmatic Saturn in your sign. By applying your newfound strength and wisdom to your everyday life, you'll quickly see the positive impact that metaphysical ideas can have on your world.

A rising tide of enthusiasm inspires you to make another round of plans for your future, yet you have the common sense to know it's not quite time to leap into action. Nevertheless, there's plenty for you to do as a stable Sun-Saturn sextile requires you to build trust in your professional relationships. Instead of making a mad dash to the finish line today, put your efforts toward establishing a solid base of operations that will be able to sustain the many changes ahead.

A shift in the prevailing winds steers you into more practical territory today. Although you may be receiving signals from other dimensions that hold the key to a current dilemma, the voices are speaking in an unintelligible alien tongue. As intriguing as the messages might sound, you quickly lose interest when you realize their meaning is lost. Instead, ask what you can do right now to consolidate recent gains and increase your effectiveness at work. President Theodore Roosevelt said, "Believe you can and you're halfway there."

You may be swept up in feelings of political or religious fervor today as powerful emotions provoke you to broadcast your opinions. But instead of spouting ideas based upon your personal preferences, use authoritative Saturn's presence in your 10th House of Public Responsibility to help you gather the information you need to back up your words. Mark Twain quipped, "Get your facts first, and then you can distort them as much as you please." However, denying the truth doesn't change reality.

Major conflict can grow out of a minor issue today, making it necessary to tame the flames of aggression if you want to avoid a fight. A high-energy square between macho Mars and bombastic Jupiter gets your temperature rising, delivering the courage to knock on doors and ask for what you want -- even if you were previously refused. Your fierce capacity for selling your ideas may be overwhelming to others, so avoid being overly insistent if you encounter opposition. Knowing when to stop is an admirable skill that greatly improves your chances for success.

No matter how cool, calm and collected you remain, the pace at work may get a little crazy today. Red-hot Mars forms a stressful square to expansive Jupiter, magnifying a powerful release of energy that shakes your world. But avoid getting dragged into someone else's dispute since taking sides can be a dangerous business now. Your key to applying this potent force constructively is to change your own behavior, rather than trying to alter anyone else's. Sudden surprises are nearly inevitable; it's how you handle them that counts.

Your enthusiasm about a potential relationship requires expression today, but strong convictions can trigger fights or competition that could get out of hand. A dynamic square between impetuous Mars and adventurous Jupiter may push you to share more than you intended, but you're intrigued to see how far you need to go to elicit a response. Although there might not be a reason to keep your feelings to yourself, reining in your emotions just a little allows you to maintain control. The view is much better when you take the high road.

You could be overwhelmed with a seemingly endless list of chores today. In fact, you may take on so much that your schedule does indeed fall apart -- but you can turn this sense of chaos to your advantage. Of course, it's crucial that you extinguish any brush fires, but don't get distracted from your long-term goals. Although you might be chasing lofty ambitions, you needn't resolve every issue that arises now. Journalist Sydney Harris wrote, "The time to relax is when you don't have time for it."

Your judgment may be clouded by a wave of restlessness at work today. Although you already have your agenda in place, you might be eager to express your latest and greatest ideas. Go ahead and speak your piece, but do it in a thoughtful manner that doesn't negatively impact your positive frame of mind. Your broad perspective sharpens your sense of strategy, allowing you to clearly assess opportunities and chart a course to fame and fortune. Begin this next phase of your journey with purpose and determination; it will take a valiant effort to make your dreams come true.

You possess an I-can-do-anything attitude today, but there are still formidable hurdles to overcome. Consciously resisting the temptation to set your sites too high increases your odds of finding satisfaction. Overspending, over-indulging and over-committing are traps that could result in negative consequences later on. Instead of stressing about how to fix everything all at once, reevaluate your situation and develop a strategy to preserve what's already working. A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.

You are on a mission to expand your mind and deepen your understanding of the complexities of the universe. But an irrepressible square from super-hero Mars to extravagant Jupiter in your sign can skew your judgment, making everything sparkle with awesome potential. You are all over the emotional map today but, ironically, still might try to keep your intentions secret. Don't waste too much energy in your attempt to hold back the tide. Maintaining a sense of humor while keeping your head above water enables you to enjoy the wild ride.

Working to establish equilibrium between your personal needs and your commitments to others isn't always easy. Putting your life in balance is even more complicated while rowdy Mars squares lavish Jupiter. Nevertheless, the cosmos blesses you with enough common sense now to moderate any overindulgence. However, you might need some time alone today to process your feelings and choose the best course of action. Daniel Webster penned, "Liberty exists in proportion to wholesome restraint."

Impulsive or reckless acts are inviting today, but aren't likely to turn out well. The Moon's return to your sign, coupled with the overreactive Mars-Jupiter square, inspires inflationary thinking that could lead to blind optimism. Nevertheless, your key planet Jupiter is the king of bigger, better and more -- and is so convincing in his exuberance now that it's difficult to know when to stop. If you don't exercise enough self-control, unexpected consequences might make your extravagance quite costly.

Loading up on luxuries is a luxury you can't afford now. Nevertheless, taking an emotional risk can be a spontaneous and pleasantly surprising event. However, you must be careful about acting on every whim because the inflationary Mars-Jupiter square encourages you to believe you can get away with just about anything these days. Heightened anxiety may propel you to do something foolish, but don't move too quickly just to impress someone else. Believe it or not, less is more.

Choices made now are likely to create long-term ripples in your life, especially regarding education plans and travel. The enthusiastic Mars-Jupiter square can be a cosmic catalyst that reminds you to act with patience not with haste. In fact, the bigger the commitment, the more cautious your approach should be now. Nevertheless, paying attention to all the details prevents you from facing discouragement when the outcome doesn't meet your expectations. Containing your excitement enables you to direct it with clear purpose and maximum control.

Although you may be distracted from your current objective, a highly energized square between insistent Mars and opportunistic Jupiter blasts you forward, even if you're not heading in the right direction. You're passionately driven by strong opinions that could provoke unnecessary clashes now. However, playing the role of an observer changes everything today. Quiet your mind and keep a light hand on the wheel; the road will tell you which way you need to turn to safely reach your destination.

You are distracted with unrealizable fantasies that divert energy from your main purpose. However, a crisis may arise as you belatedly realize you've gone too far or too fast. But an obstacle or a setback is simply the universe's way of letting you know that there is more work to be done. Avoiding your responsibilities is not a wise option today, so tie up any loose ends before moving on. Zig Ziglar said, "Where you start is not nearly as important as where you finish."

You could wake up today with a nagging feeling  that you are spending your time chasing rainbows. Unfortunately, pursuing an elusive dream or stretching yourself too far can undermine your credibility; stop over-committing your resources, especially at work. You can't satisfy everyone simultaneously, so make your priorities clear right from the start. Keep in mind that letting go of old ambitions that don't correspond with your current needs enables you to increase your productivity in the long run.

Although you can visualize your goals within your mind's eye today, you still might not know exactly how to attain them. Fortunately, your self-confidence goes a long way to compensate for your lack of a good plan. You're eager to swing into action, even if you're uncertain about your direction; nevertheless, a coworker's criticism could dampen your enthusiasm in a moment. Luckily, slowing down may be the best thing you can do to develop a workable strategy for success. Time has a wonderful way of showing you what really matters.

You have temporarily misplaced your regular sense of caution, enabling you to ardently pursue your dreams without restraint today. However, you may feel underappreciated at work, leading you to overcompensate with reckless behavior. Stretch your limits, but stay within the bounds of reason. A bold move is a smart idea now as long as it's accompanied by sufficient planning. Preparation is the secret to your success.

Unbridled enthusiasm can carry your attitude over the top today, but an unplanned reality check from a friend might send you down the rabbit hole of pessimism. Fortunately, you're quite capable of making rapid midcourse corrections as needed. Nevertheless, you could be flooded with so much information that you skip sorting out data that may be faulty. A little research goes a long way now; verify your facts twice before jumping to any conclusions. The truth will set you free.

You might actually believe the sky is the limit now. Unfortunately, you have so many good ideas you can't decide which ones to pursue and which ones to cast aside. Making a list of the pros and cons for each opportunity allows you to quickly narrow your choices. Go ahead and run with one thought as far as you can. Just remember that serious planning and consistent hard work are necessary ingredients to achieving any goal that is worthy of your attention.

A serious case of self-doubt could catch you off guard if you set your hopes too high today. Confusion comes and goes as you swing between a heightened sense of enthusiasm and increased uncertainty. You may be swept up by the fear of making a bad decision, which prevents you from arriving at any conclusion. Paradoxically, you might be happily surprised when a minor setback brings sudden resolution. Confidence is like a muscle; the more you use it, the stronger it gets.

You are motivated by a high level of enthusiasm today, but your excitement may be misdirected. You could even set yourself up for exhaustion if you over-commit your time. There's no reason to struggle for approval now, especially if your self-esteem falters. Avoid letting guilt talk you into giving more than you can. Fortunately, you're quite adept at shifting gears once you come up with a clever solution that removes you from an awkward situation. Motivational speaker Les Brown says, "Change is difficult but often essential to survival."

You could make a poor choice today, especially if you react too quickly. Nevertheless, everything should turn out fine if you can keep your energy within reasonable bounds. Your key planet Jupiter is still quite active, making everything appear better than it actually is in reality. Unfortunately, you can't look to your coworkers for advice now because they'll only encourage you even further. Take what everyone else says with a big grain of salt. The current cure for nearly everything that ails you is to keep it simple.

Your new lighthearted attitude won't be enough to calm your nerves for very long today. It might feel as if there's a lot at stake professionally and you're struggling to maintain a positive perspective. You don't like being lost in confusion, even if it's for a short period of time. Nevertheless, taking a disciplined approach at work makes it possible to reset your compass and put yourself back on track. When all else fails, climbing the mountain is what you Goats do best.

Wasting your time with misplaced efforts can hijack your day today. Nevertheless, stretching your boundaries by exploring new activities is helpful as long as you don't lose touch with your basic goals. If you're on the edge of frustration or anger, take a break until you regain emotional equilibrium. Walking around your neighborhood is a better idea now than going on a flight of fantasy. Keep your feet on the ground when your head is in the clouds.

You may grow impatient with yourself or with anyone else who doesn't follow through on a promise. Unfortunately, more isn't necessarily better today. If you manage your energy poorly, it might lead to exhaustion or bad judgment. Little differences blow up into major disputes unless you practice self-control. Direct the current waves of change with careful attention so you can adjust your course before landing somewhere you don't want to go.

An exchange of heartfelt words can escalate into an unexpected drama today. Mercury's presence in reflective Libra encourages you to see yourself in the mirror of relationships rather than simply viewing other people as an extension of yourself. However, the Sun squares off with powerful Pluto, instigating conflicts within a personal or business partnership. Since it's difficult to back down once words have been spoken or actions taken, it makes sense to approach a delicate topic with the care it deserves. Emily Dickinson wrote, "Saying nothing sometimes says the most."

You're likely to fight back today if someone at work demands more than you can deliver. Unfortunately, the Sun's dynamic square with domineering Pluto can maneuver you into an uncomfortable corner. Although you might be in a tenuous position, the real threat to your security is if you lose your temper, raising the stakes all the way around. Remember, burying your anger isn't the answer if you want to develop a stronger support network. However, persistent diplomacy allows everyone to express their feelings so you can navigate through a tough situation together.

You've been patiently waiting for the right moment to say something important to a close friend or partner. You might unintentionally release a flood of emotions when talkative Mercury enters your 5th House of Self-Expression, triggering the Sun's dynamic square to transformational Pluto. Suppressing your frustration is not an option now; your irrational feelings will not take no for an answer. Share what's on your mind as kindly as you can and remember that the situation is probably not as dire as it seems. Honest hearts produce honest actions.

What appears obvious may be far from the truth today when it comes to dealing with authority figures and meeting your obligations. A sneaky Sun-Pluto square hides answers that take unwavering determination to find. If you're struggling with a person who is preventing your progress, step back and look at the whole situation from a completely different angle. Changing your perspective can reveal the key that helps unlock this complex puzzle.

You might encounter a new kind of resistance today that isn't just a simple roadblock. In fact, you may be facing a formidable opponent at work while the Sun squares vengeful Pluto in your 6th House of Employment. Rather than engaging the issue directly now, make a plan that allows you to diffuse the conflict while also demonstrating your ability to handle complexity. Use your creativity and courage to turn a fight to the finish into a win-win situation.

You could lose face in an emotional exchange where your integrity is questioned. Nevertheless, this crisis turns into a transformational opportunity as the Sun in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem squares Pluto in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Don't struggle to hold onto what you have when you can free up creative resources by letting go. A dramatic metamorphosis leads you to something or someone better if you let it. A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.

You must brace yourself today because it's time to face your deepest desires and hidden fears. Shadowy Pluto creates an intense square with the radiant Sun, possibly provoking ego skirmishes, sowing seeds of mistrust and undermining your sense of self-worth. Thankfully, you can tap into a rich vein of resources that transform losses into gains if you honestly recognize what you need over what you want. Since you can't control the irrational behavior of others, focus on managing your own life the best you can.

You can easily be drawn into a protracted battle with someone who is just as stubborn as you, even if you think you're being more than fair now. You might want to consider searching for an escape route today, because the Sun's tense square to ruthless Pluto makes compromise elusive. The simplest solution to circumventing conflict is to minimize your contact with individuals who cost you more than they're ultimately worth.

An interesting turn of events sheds light on the continuing conflict between your current situation and your long-term goals. However, a shift of focus from the present moment to future possibilities becomes problematic when unrelenting Pluto squares the willful Sun in your 11th House of Dreams and Wishes. You may be able to envision what's around the next bend, but you must push through someone's resistance before you can run off to pursue your dreams. Your willingness to be brutally honest is the key to your success.

You may stretch your limits and see how far you can push yourself or someone else as you strive to reach your goals. You face a challenging choice when the Sun crosses paths with obstinate Pluto. It may not be obvious whether you are trying to end something or just testing the resilience of a relationship. It's risky to force negative feelings to the surface now, yet working through your emotions with honesty and kindness is a great way to clear the air. Taking extreme measures activates your creative channels and opens your heart.

You might realize you're being drawn into powerful emotional currents that can precipitate a showdown. Although turbulent waters are likely when the Sun squares obstinate Pluto in your 12th House of Destiny, forcing the issue won't bring you any closer to happiness. Even if your sense of well-being seems threatened, the chances of real danger are minimal. Nevertheless, memories of a situation gone sour can evoke an intense response. Let go of old patterns and find the strength to keep on loving, no matter what.

Your relationship world is in flux and you must determine who is on your side and who is not. It's tempting to deny the issue or delay any action but the Sun's terse square with unrelenting Pluto pushes your buttons to elicit your reaction now. Although Mercury shifts into peace-seeking Libra today, even your sweetest phrases may not avert a battle for control. Profound dissatisfaction bubbles beneath the surface, eroding trust and confidence. Nevertheless, as Carl Jung wrote, "Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves."

Intense feelings are triggered as you encounter someone who attempts to thwart your intentions today. You might not want to be confrontational at work or at home, but realize you must take direct action anyway. Expressing your truth is healthy; just don't overreact or you'll be busy unraveling a drama over the days ahead. Remember, there's no reason to share your position with everyone. Talking to the right person at the right time is essential to get your message across.

You think you know what someone else is saying until you notice that you're receiving multiple streams of information simultaneously. You can't discern one signal from another today, making it nearly impossible to hear any of them clearly. Nevertheless, you may be embroiled in a conflict that makes it impossible to just walk away. Although relationship dynamics might be more complicated now than you prefer, skirting around the intensity creates more problems than it solves. Dance with the uncertainty until your clarity returns.

You might be compelled to defend your feelings today or apologize for inadvertently overstepping your limits. In either case, you're swimming in deep waters that put you in touch with existential fears. You may feel a bit out of your element now, yet you still respond immediately if your efforts are being criticized. Taking a stand is a sensible strategy as long as you don't invest too much energy in seeking a final resolution. Be a warrior, not a worrier.

You are driven to connect with your deepest desires today, even if you're not sure what to do about them. You may be required to process repressed family-related issues to further understand your feelings. Nevertheless, an air of suspense can be disconcerting because you don't have the complete picture now. Confronting old failures is your ticket to successfully navigating the current emotional obstacle course. Voltaire wrote, "Judge a person by his questions rather than his answers."

You want more joy from your relationships now, but something seems to be holding you back. Unsettling alignments with the heavyweight outer planets prompt you to seek stability and excitement at the same time. In particular, uncomfortable aspects to suspicious Pluto provoke feelings of jealousy or resentment, making it difficult to relax. Nevertheless, tackling the present challenges can transform you into a better person if you remember to treat those around you with compassion. Author Ziad Abdelnour wrote, "Seek respect, not attention; it lasts longer."

The cosmos pushes some powerful emotional buttons today that bring buried fears and desires to the surface. Your newfound awareness threatens to rock your world unless you're willing to accept your past and make a detailed plan to move toward the future. However, there is little allowance for error now, making it very important to be precise as you inform others of your intentions. As Albert Einstein said, "If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough."

You might be engaged in a no-win situation today, unless you're willing to back away from the heat of conflict. Although retreat may be more complicated than you wish, you can effectively play the mystery card now by keeping a secret -- even if it seems as if you are telling the whole story. Dreaming about a lovely outcome is one thing, but planting your feet firmly on the ground is still required. Surprisingly, your desired destination isn't somewhere over the rainbow; it's right in front of you if you open your eyes.

Although your creative energies are running strong today, you become uncomfortable if someone challenges your integrity or doubts the veracity of your facts. Nevertheless, you may try to prevail in an argument, but you could get caught up in an intense drama as you clash over values. Do not become attached to temporary emotions; just flow with them until they dissipate. Instead of weaving a web of intrigue, work toward manifesting deep transformations that convert negativity into love.

New and unusual desires could place you in a strange set of circumstances today. However, rather than pursuing these radical feelings, you're more likely to let go of a delightful distraction now that stern Saturn in your sign is squaring the karmic Lunar Nodes. You might even find yourself embroiled in a passionate battle with someone who disagrees with your priorities. But you could overreact if anyone tries to change your viewpoint by questioning your core beliefs.  Don't make a permanent decision based on a temporary feeling.

You could remember events now that you wish to forget. Attend to a gnawing concern related to unfinished business with friends and relatives; don't let it linger in silence and undermine trust within your family tree. Believe it or not, facing skeletons in the closet can bring enormous relief, freeing up your mental and emotional resources to create a better future. But don't move too quickly; temper your strong sense of urgency with a more restrained approach to change. In the end, you'll only regret the chances you didn't take.

A complex mix of cosmic energies can unleash power struggles in relationships today, but they also set the stage for positive change. Disagreements over matters of principle could become so important that everything else is temporarily set aside. You may feel like a volcano that's ready to erupt as pressures intensify, and you might not consider the consequences of your actions now. Unfortunately, your current lack of patience makes it challenging to be nice to those around you unless you can find a healthy outlet for your stress. Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.

Your sixth sense is on fire today, especially when it comes to reading the hidden motives of others. Reality and imagination weave a magical fabric that reveals patterns to you that no one else can see. However, you must share your insights discreetly or you could annoy someone needlessly. Naturally, you have the right to speak your truth, but it's more productive if you do it carefully to avoid instigating unnecessary conflict. Listen to the little voice in your head when it tells you to call it quits.

You might feel as if you're caught between a rock and a hard place today when you want to do one thing and your friends want to do something else. Maintaining a cheerful attitude is difficult when people change their mind at the last minute, leaving you stuck with nowhere to go. Nevertheless, there's no reason to blame others for your position. Instead, honestly sharing your frustrations strengthens communication and eases the stress. Freedom is yours when you learn to take nothing personally.

On one hand, you want to stick to your regular routine no matter who pressures you to do something different. On the other hand, you can't suppress your urge to break free from the status quo when the Moon squares volatile Uranus. Simple statements trigger strong reactions today, especially when you're unsure of what you really need. Nevertheless, taking a risk by inventing new ways to express yourself is more rewarding than trying to fit into someone else's box. An original is worth more than a copy.

Change seems to come out of the blue today, initiating a process that brings you greater freedom of expression. But first you must find your way through the complicated emotional maze or you may reach a breaking point that can alter the course of a relationship. If your need for independence is greater than your hunger for closeness, it may be healthier to take time to reinvigorate a partnership with conscious intent than to let your emotions explode. Instead of allowing negative feelings to spiral out of control, focus on the facts to assure the best possible outcome.

Your agenda might not match everyone else's expectations today. You could overreact to what others say if you don't like the advice you receive. Conflict is possible now, especially if you're unwilling to compromise. However, choosing flexibility over stubbornness allows you to maneuver around emotional landmines while tactfully suggesting solutions. Cultivate constructive discussions in search of common ground, rather than insisting there is only one right answer. Japanese author Satoro wrote, "Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean."

You could work yourself into a corner today by clinging to your fixed views. However, relief may come quickly if you're willing to roll with the changes instigated by the Moon's square to unstable Uranus. Nevertheless, you might feel overloaded with too many challenges as you attempt to eliminate the old in order to make way for the new. Paradoxically, jumping into a fire by choice is actually safer than holding yourself back to avoid complications.

It's unnecessary to settle for less today just because things don't seem to go as you planned. In fact, disruptive Uranus can open your mind to a radically different notion about your true life's purpose. However, you may have to step outside of the logical box that usually works in your favor. Thinking about the alternatives beyond the limits of your current situation empowers you with a surge of creativity. Sometimes it's imperative to go to the extremes of self-expression in order to succeed.

Your diplomatic approach to conflict is put to the test today when people act in unexpected ways. Although your day may be turned upside down by someone's shocking behavior, you're exhilarated once you take off your kid gloves. However, you don't need anyone's permission to make radical positive changes. Fortunately, you can stand up for your beliefs even against great odds without letting your emotions get the best of you now. As Leonard Nimoy said, "Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end."

Although your heightened sense of urgency makes it nearly impossible to hide your frustration, risky behavior won't necessarily make you feel any better. Unfortunately, your mouth can move faster than your ability to moderate outrageous comments today. What you think is an acceptable statement may trigger an unfriendly response from someone close to you. If you find yourself in the midst of a conflict with a friend or relative, retreat in the name of love. Practicing the art of compromise is better than winning the battle and losing your happiness.

A casual remark could alter the course of your day in ways you can't predict. Conversations may suddenly veer off in odd directions today, leaving you perplexed about your next move. Therefore, it might be smarter to wait until your emotions settle down before saying what's on your mind while the moody Moon squares erratic Uranus in your 5th House of Spontaneity. Nevertheless,  articulating your position clearly and calmly alleviates the current tension without upsetting the status quo.

Domestic tranquility may be elusive today if your impatience motivates you to say and do anything to make your case. It's useless to pretend that you're willing to submit to someone else's point of view now that the Capricorn Moon squares radical Uranus in your 4th House of Home and Family. However, it's unnecessary to recklessly take a chance to find the freedom you seek. For now, the most peaceful way to handle the potential volatility is to just smile and walk away. Greek philosopher Euripides wrote, "Silence is true wisdom's best reply."

You're not interested in following someone else's arbitrary rules and are quite willing to rattle your saber today in order to let them know you're the boss. A rebellious Moon-Uranus square provokes you to tell others what you want, even if you must break with tradition to get your message across. Taking an entirely different approach allows you to let go of the past to create a more harmonious yet stimulating future. American suffragist Susan B. Anthony said, "Independence is happiness."

Speaking your truth is not always appreciated in family politics, but being honest with yourself about your priorities helps to keep your spirits  alive. Although you might decide to bury your feelings today, unexpressed emotions still find their way to escape and create conflict. Thankfully, the Moon's current visit to your 11th House of Community emphasizes the value of building support among your family and friends. Henry Ford said, "Working together is success."

Don't be surprised if every little thing seems to fall into place today without much effort on your part. Luckily, you encounter very little resistance in your interactions with others. In fact, it seems as if your coworkers show up in a variety of ways to support you as you strive to achieve your goals. However, there's no reason to fall into the trap of demanding too much or the positive vibes around you could disappear as fast as they materialized. Sometimes we create our own heartbreaks through expectation.

You have plenty of leeway at work today, prompting you to think about how you can improve your efficiency. You Bulls usually take the familiar route because you like the reliability of knowing exactly where you are and when you will reach your destination. However, you're more inclined to meander off the beaten path new, creating opportunities to discover new ways to approach the same old tasks. Necessity is the mother of invention.

You're like a kid in the sandbox today and, happily, everything you do seems like recreation. However, being in a playful mood doesn't necessarily mean you are shirking your responsibilities. In fact, your childlike approach to even the most boring task has others wondering how you make everything look like fun. Unfortunately, you don't possess a secret formula that can be taught to anyone else. You just know that you have a choice and you choose to be happy now. Whistle while you work and see who sings along.

Obviously, personal and business relationships are quite important to you, but you need some room to explore your own interests these days. Fortunately, you can talk about your feelings now without being controlled by them. Your current philosophical approach allows others to express themselves while still maintaining autonomy. If you've been waiting for a better time to broach a delicate discussion, don't let this moment pass you by.

Everyone seems to be attracted to your upbeat manner today while simultaneously remaining oddly aloof. They appear to be happy, chattering away with small talk about trivial matters. Ironically, people also discuss big picture topics about global issues and cosmic themes. However, for some unknown reason, no one is willing to participate in a heartfelt interaction. It's as if a memo was distributed that put personal emotions on a do-not-discuss list. Fortunately, you can buck the trend and tell someone how you feel as long as you don't expect the same in return.

You see the potential to increase your income everywhere you look today. However, like a child sitting in front of a bowl of ice cream, your eyes may be bigger than your stomach. This means that cashing in on an opportunity may require more time and energy than you have at your disposal. It's all too easy now to underestimate what it will take to bring an idea to fruition. Small opportunities are often the beginning of great achievements.

You're not ready for the weekend to be over yet as you head back to your job or school. You might spend more time at the water cooler or on your cell phone today than attending to the tasks at hand. Although you may successfully get away with being unproductive for a while, your irresponsibility will catch up with you as the day progresses. Don't set yourself up for a headache by leaving everything until the last minute. Instead of avoiding work to have fun, find ways to enjoy yourself while meeting your obligations. Procrastination is not your friend.

Establishing clear boundaries with friends and coworkers is a high priority today. It's crucial for everyone to know that you are quite happy doing your own thing and you don't want anyone else's expectations to affect your current decisions. Unfortunately, someone might misread your signals, interpreting your behavior as a personal rejection. Although nothing could be further from the truth, you're not interested in justifying your motives to anyone else at this time. If people characterize you by your actions, they'll never be fooled by your words.

People may wonder where you get your abundant energy from as you incessantly talk away the day. Granted, you have a lot to share but you seem to require lots of extra words to say the simplest things. Nevertheless, your big ideas light the fire of inspiration in the hearts of your friends and colleagues. Surrounding yourself with those who believe in your dreams creates a network in which you can thrive.

You have great expectations about what you can accomplish today and are eager to share your plans with anyone who will listen. Paradoxically, your quest for emotional security leads you to climb the ladder of success, as if achieving social status will make your heart happy. Obviously, there's nothing wrong with distinguishing yourself professionally; in fact, it can bring deep satisfaction. But don't assume mastery of the outer world will automatically improve your feelings of self-worth. Fame and fortune can't buy you love.

You possess a light and easy touch in your interactions with others today while on your personal quest for truth. Many people who embark on this kind of journey become so wrapped up in their path that they judge others negatively if they choose a different route to enlightenment. Nevertheless, the trap is always present and you are caught as soon you think your way is the only way. Continue on your search and be open to those you encounter. As spiritual teacher Matthew Fox wrote, "It doesn't matter where you dig the well; you will still reach the same water."

It might seem as if you have fairies and elves coming to your aid today, but your good luck is probably well deserved and hard earned. Nevertheless, everything seems like a Rubik's cube and you want to know all the facts so you can solve the puzzle. Unfortunately, some information is so well hidden that you won't likely uncover it right away. Don't give up; the secrets of the universe are yours for the asking once you learn the magic word.

Let someone who enters your life now show you what you've been missing. Talkative Mercury joins broad-minded Jupiter in your 7th House of Others, widening your horizons of thought and opening vistas of infinite possibilities. There's no reason to be resistant to new ideas, even if you think you know better. Ultimately, what you learn today will be beneficial in ways you cannot yet realize as long as you rein in your current tendency to exaggerate. The best teachers are students for life.

Your mind expands with big ideas today, but too much information coming at you too fast leaves you dizzy. Multiple streams of incoming data can be overwhelming, so don't expect to understand everything right away. Your inclination to over-explain adds confusion when brevity would help you make your point. In fact, you can create the strongest impact now by tempering your enthusiasm enough to maintain a practical approach to everything you do.

A noticeable change in the cosmic weather widens your perceptions, allowing you to see opportunities you previously missed. Your confidence grows as waves of excitement invite you to explore new methods of self-expression. Logical Mercury's collision with buoyant Jupiter inspires you to be optimistic about your future. You have no problem imagining how your life can improve now, so share your story with people who can help you achieve your dreams. Mahatma Gandhi said, "The future depends on what you do today."

Recent disappointments quickly fade into the past as clever Mercury joins lucky Jupiter to tell a happy tale. Thankfully, you can make your case with an imaginative flare as long as it rings true with your feelings. This joyful conjunction activates your 4th House of Roots, attracting you to memories of your past. However, you may feel uncertain until you integrate your history with the potential of the present moment. Remember, it's not about where you begin, but where you are going. Rather than replaying old tapes, create a new playlist for your next big adventure.

Your generosity of spirit creates enough space to discuss conflicting beliefs in an open-minded way today. Nevertheless, a chatty Mercury-Jupiter conjunction in your 3rd House of Communication prompts you to justify your intentions, although you may add more confusion than clarity. Even if you have all the facts at your disposal to prove your theory, you could inundate others with too much information. If you realize you're not making headway today, back off until you settle down emotionally. Being selective in your presentation is more effective than saying everything at once.

Optimism overrules common sense today, but it's not enough to simply believe you are right. A bombastic Mercury-Jupiter conjunction insists that you tell others everything you know but you may grow less confident of your conclusions as the day unfolds. Share what's on your mind while visionary Jupiter is still brushing away any doubts, enabling you to clearly communicate your highest ideals. In order to succeed, you must first believe you can.

You can readily break down complex subjects into simple concepts today, making you an exceptional student and a highly effective teacher. The communication planet Mercury joins outspoken Jupiter in your sign to kick your thinking up another notch. Routine tasks may become especially boring as you seek intellectual stimulation from innovative ideas. People will listen when you speak as long as you tailor your comments to their level of interest and ability. Every performer knows how important it is to connect with the audience to create a memorable experience.

Grandiose ideas flow quickly, making it difficult to miss the positive inspiration that you bring to others now. However, analytical Mercury's conjunction with philosophical Jupiter can make you more opinionated than ever. If you're looking for a good debate, then speak up today. However, Jupiter tends to inflate your feelings, so small slights can feel like major insults. Nevertheless, your generosity and idealism shine through your words if you concentrate on spreading love and kindness.

Changing your attitude now is the simplest way to improve your future. You are blessed with an irrepressible desire to manifest your dreams as intellectual Mercury joins jolly Jupiter in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. Even if you don't have a specific plan, you believe that everything will work out for the best. Just remember that overconfidence can easily lead to arrogance today, possibly stirring up opposition from those who would be better allies than enemies. A grateful mind keeps your ego in check.

Your mental landscape is brilliant but erratic now as wonderful insights combine with totally outrageous ideas. You're swamped with wild speculations about your career potential, even if the details of your plans are still sketchy. Pushing the limits of your potential can feel awkward today at first, but that doesn't mean it's the wrong thing to do. Remember that you're not out to prove your point, but to effect change as best you can. Your power of persuasion is strong as long as you're able to temper your optimism with realism.

The last vestiges of discouragement dissipate today, and once again you can clearly see where you are going. Nevertheless, intelligent planning is key to your current success. Although you want others to play a role in your agenda, you're not prepared to share too many details. Too much information makes it harder for anyone to know where to jump in; rambling on only dilutes your important message. William Shakespeare wrote, "Brevity is the soul of wit."

Sometimes it's better to let go and start all over than to stick with a plan whose time has passed. Thankfully, fresh ideas enable you to leave old ones behind when mental Mercury joins positive Jupiter. Your capacity to understand new concepts about intimacy may be enhanced by a skillful teacher since this conjunction occurs in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Ultimately, your enthusiasm convinces others to surpass their own limits, infusing more passion into any partnership.

Although you're excited about all the possibilities ahead, your desires overcome your reason today, leaving you dazed and confused. A disillusioning Venus-Neptune square can even throw you into a temporary state of despair as you try to narrow down your choices. But you could be easily fooled in your current idealistic frame of mind. If you choose to make yourself vulnerable to another person, first ensure that he or she is worthy of your trust.

The path to happiness is an elusive one today, even if you're convinced that your honorable intentions are enough to make everything turn out okay. However, charming Venus squares fuzzy Neptune from your 8th House of Intimacy, leading you to confuse an unrealistic fantasy with true love. Trust your recent decisions and just keep heading in the same direction, even if you grow discouraged. Don't worry if you feel like you're losing your way; a temporary mist can obscure even the clearest mind. Opportunity is often delivered in a fog of uncertainty.

Your compassion and imagination are stronger than your common sense today while attractive Venus dynamically squares fantasy-prone Neptune. Opening your heart to others is fine as long as your expectations aren't set so high that you end up disappointed. You're more likely to pursue a dream and overlook reality, seeing people as you wish them to be rather than as they truly are. Nevertheless, surfing an emotional wave adds excitement to your day, and adding a little bit of caution can prevent you from losing your balance and wiping out.

If something seems too good to be true today, it probably is. Thankfully, you're able to retreat from the unrelenting pressure of needing to make choices while persuasive Venus in your 6th House of Daily Routine creates a stressful square with intoxicating Neptune. Although you are so optimistic that you could overlook the facts, your fascination is so convincing that it's difficult to maintain a healthy perspective. Even if you're ready to give a project the go ahead, delay major decisions for a few days until you have a more realistic outlook.

You could convince yourself that nearly anything is real today as long as it's something you want badly enough. However, you're treading on dangerous ground as a romantic Venus-Neptune square paints reality with your imagination, weakens your will and distorts your judgment about a person or a purchase. Although you may be able to justify your actions, sacrificing yourself for love or money could end up being much more expensive than you think if you let your desires exceed the limits of logic.

It's all too easy to misread others today, especially if your fantasies distort your perceptions. An imaginative Venus-Neptune square makes it tough to know what's real, even if the exacting Virgo Moon enables us to discern individual bits of data. Instead of trusting your intuition in vague generalities, zoom into the smallest details and build the truth from there. Using your astute powers of concentration can prevent you from believing that all is well when in fact it is not.

You long to escape the routine of everyday life and will ignore practical considerations today to enable your dreamy voyage. A magical moment of delight may inspire creative endeavors and romantic pursuits by stimulating your imagination. However, your reasoning could be skewed while a magnetic Venus-Neptune square pulls you off course now and leads you down a garden path. Don't make any promises you can't keep; a sober assessment will convince you to lower your expectations and prepare you for the inevitable return of reality by the end of the month.

It's as if you've fallen into a hypnotic trance and are compelled to chase an unrealistic dream. A misleading Venus-Neptune square prompts you to give in to escapist behavior. Unfortunately, your plan could backfire when you realize you've fallen down a surreal rabbit hole and you don't know the shortest route back to the surface. Nevertheless, recognizing your limits before you exceed them prevents you from losing your center of gravity and stops trouble before it even starts.

Untangling the threads of illusion from the colorful tapestry of life is a monumental project today because fact and fiction have tied themselves into a lover's knot. A romantic Venus-Neptune square inspires your dreams while clouding the truth, especially when you project your desires onto someone else. Your infatuation may not be grounded in reality, so enjoy the experience without making any serious commitments. Thankfully, fantasy help us survive in the mundane world.

Your ideas invest people and objects with more value than they may possess, making it wise to spend your love and money with caution now. Illusory Neptune forms a stressful square to romantic Venus in your 12th House of Fantasy, prompting you to confuse your dreams with reality. You may be overcome with desire, risking what you've gained simply for the exhilaration of a passing pleasure. If your expectations are too high you will need to rein in your dreams before you believe them to be real. Thankfully, your willingness to forgive yourself and others empowers you to heal even the harshest of wounds.

It's not easy to balance your dreams with the concrete needs of others today. Romantic fantasies can be particularly alluring yet disorienting as sweet Venus in your 11th House of Friends forms a confusing square to nebulous Neptune. Nevertheless, your ultra-sensitive to others now and one offhand comment might be enough to trigger your insecurities. Fortunately, a softer side of you is revealed in a tender moment when all is forgiven.

Concentrating on mundane work tasks can be quite a challenge when you're so inspired by romantic dreams, beautiful objects and fascinating ideas. Desirous Venus squares glamorous Neptune, stimulating your imagination while weakening your sense of practicality. Your current attractions may be ill advised because you could be vulnerable to deception now. Allowing yourself to imagine the possibilities of love in your life is healthy unless you make the false assumption that all your dreams will come true.

Your psychic radar is hypersensitive, making it easy to quickly jump to a wrong conclusion today. Allowing more time between your gut reaction and your actual response is wise because a dynamic Mercury-Mars square can instigate conflict. A simple misunderstanding might provoke angry words if you're unable to hold your tongue. Avoid arguments over insignificant differences while staying alert to deeper power struggles that could develop over the days ahead. Nevertheless, protecting your territory may not be as constructive as cultivating peace.

Sticking to the specific issues at hand today enables you to overcome nearly any obstacle. Your key question is whether to hold onto someone or something that no longer satisfies your needs. Unfortunately, mischievous Mercury brings problems rather than solutions when it squares Mars in your 9th House of Future Vision. Keep in mind that this energetic aspect is better used to provide much-needed perspective than to discuss delicate matters with intelligence and grace. Author Charles Buxton wrote, "In life, as in chess, forethought wins."

You can be quite the persuasive diplomat these days when defending an emotional position. Your social charm serves you well while witty Mercury flies through gracious Libra and your 5th House of Self-Expression. However, your current vulnerability complicates things now, and managing your anger is crucial to your happiness. For the best results, consciously work to alleviate hostilities before they escalate into a crisis. A stitch in time saves nine.

Dramatic words have an enduring influence now, so watch the tone of your voice when responding to someone's manipulative behavior. Talkative Mercury is spinning an emotional web with warrior Mars, making it even more critical to contain your negativity. Push yourself to a higher level of creativity rather than expecting others to speak your language. Your attitude is everything today, so use the strength of your emotions to attract what you desire and repel what you no longer want. Seeking serenity on the inside helps to create calmness on the outside.

Balancing your own needs with those of someone at work can be especially tricky today. It may be difficult to get any traction in a serious discussion when communicator Mercury in ambivalent Libra is so determined to avoid conflict. Unfortunately, your charm alone is not sufficient to minimize the potential drama. Much to your chagrin, even the best-laid plans can fall apart now. Nevertheless, perseverance is the antidote to compensate for your current tendency to break through the resistance and happily move on. You can't change what you refuse to confront.

A mild disagreement today might grow into a serious conflict in the near future as your current impatience is ignited by a pushy Mercury-Mars square. However, the depths of your thinking and precision of your words establish a path to awareness and compromise if you can stay calm. Nevertheless, facing your own fear of failure may be an uphill battle now, tempted as you are to force an issue. Instead of overplaying your hand, employing patience is your safest bet. If you create your own storm, don't get upset when it rains.

The noise of everyday communication takes center stage today while chatty Mercury tensely squares contentious Mars. But life gets complicated when you are required to take care of others now that Mars is heating up your 4th House of Family. Even if you're disappointed by the current circumstances that are restricting your freedom, don't waste time wallowing in self-pity. Show up with a positive attitude, continue working on your plans and prepare to shift your focus to your own agenda as soon as the opportunity arises.

It's absolutely necessary to carefully handle any conflict that surfaces today, because even your kindest comments may sound harsh to the wrong ears. An argumentative Mercury-Mars square exacerbates the stressful conditions, turning conversations into verbal combat before you know it. Raising deep issues can be highly productive, but only if done with a conscious intent to heal. Don't let your annoyance get the best of you; making your point passionately is admirable as long as you keep your emotions under control.

Barbed words can fly out of your mouth without thought today, wounding others while unintentionally revealing your hidden frustration. However, addressing repressed feelings is healthy if you can accompany it with good-natured humor and a generous spirit. Instead of expressing your anger without regard for the consequences, apply your emotional intensity to an intellectually challenging task now. A busy mind is a happy mind.

Your emotions might lead you into turbulent waters today. Vivid dreams overflow into your waking life to reactivate a struggle between your personal fantasies and your professional commitments. Mental Mercury and physical Mars engage in a cosmic skirmish that can unravel a relationship as anxious fears overwhelm your cool logic. Although words spoken in the heat of the moment could meet a hostile response, conscious kindness prevents a meltdown from turning nasty. Thankfully, things smooth out quickly if you don't insist on having your own way. Cooperation beats competition every time.

You can't wait to tell everyone about your escape plan but your spirit of adventure may clash with your more responsible ambitions today. Some things are better left unsaid, especially while loquacious Mercury in your 9th House of Big Ideas forms a combative square with warrior Mars in your 12th House of Secrets. Although you might find it tough to suppress your urge to speak up, patience works better than pushing now. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

You're not interested in subduing your feelings today for the sake of making peace in a relationship. The moody Moon's presence in your sign adds to your emotional sensitivity and vulnerability, but a challenging square between trickster Mercury and militant Mars packs an extra punch into every word you speak. Nevertheless, if you're unable to resolve a difference of opinion quickly, it may be smarter to retreat for a few days in order to let your emotions cool off. If you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all. A moment of compassion prevents a lifetime of regret.

You want everyone to get along today, but all is not well in the land of cooperation. You can't relax while the ever-changing Moon and freedom-loving Uranus are wreaking havoc in your sign. Meanwhile, several planets create more tension from your 7th House of Partnerships by confronting you with someone else's needs. No matter how much you wish for relationship stability, you're unsure if you're able to pay the required emotional price now. Be mindful with your words; once spoken they can only be forgiven, not forgotten.

You are exceptionally effective in organizing all the pieces that need to fit into your master plan today. Nevertheless, the Sun's looming opposition to ingenious Uranus in your 12th House of Privacy is already sparking unconventional thoughts that provoke you to reveal hidden feelings. Nevertheless, telling your secrets could ignite a couple of days of emotional turmoil, making it crucial to think before you spill the beans. Don't rock the boat unless you're willing to get wet.

Breaking free from a close friend or associate can change the dynamics of a relationship now. Finding yourself attracted to a person who is not your usual type feels dangerous but exciting as unorthodox Uranus opposes the radiant Sun in your 5th House of Romance. However, if you need to pull back, go ahead and do it without a second thought even if this seems to contradict your intentions. Marcel Proust wrote, "The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new lands but seeing with new eyes."

Taking steps to ease tensions doesn't accomplish as much as you wish today, possibly leaving you feeling as if your efforts are in vain. You might have thought you found safe harbor, only to belatedly realize you are in the midst of another storm. Unexpected events at work demand your attention while you grow frustrated because you prefer to be putting out fires at home. Trust your instincts when it comes to juggling your priorities; life will return to normal once the cosmic weather settles down.

Your relationships may feel tenuous today as circumstances release stored-up resentments and unexpressed emotions. An unpredictable confrontation is triggered by electric Uranus as it opposes the Sun in your 3rd House of Communication. However, the real danger comes from your fear of change rather than change itself. Trying to suppress the brewing discomfort only feeds its intensity. Even if you're tempted to cling to the status quo, keep in mind that opportunities for growth will follow once the air is cleared of lingering negativity.

Someone may speak to you in a way that provokes an explosive reaction from you today. Whether people's comments are critical or humorous, you're not likely to be in the mood for laughing when you hear what they think of you. Fortunately, revolutionary Uranus opposes the Sun in your 2nd House of Possessions, setting the stage for a breakthrough in your understanding about a personal or financial partnership. If another person isn't bringing out the best in you, find someone who will.

The glaring light of awareness is suddenly shining on a touchy relationship issue. You must be willing to confront anything that keeps you from your highest purpose now. Whatever makes you feel awkward needs to be dragged out into the open where you can deal with it in plain view. But don't get trapped by the restrictions of logic; do anything that might activate your imagination today. Stepping outside of your comfort zone could make you a bit nervous, but the future will be brighter if you trust the truth that exists beyond words.

Although you're not likely to waste too much energy trying to revitalize your social life today, you're still ready for substantial growth in your relationship world. The truth is the wild Sun-Uranus opposition suggests this is no time to stick with the status quo. In fact, if you're forced to play nicely in a boring situation you might just get up and leave. If the current circumstances don't challenge you now, they won't change you tomorrow.

There is more happening now than meets the eye, making it nearly impossible to just go along for the ride. Although you might be dealing with a minor annoyance at work, your inflexibility could contribute to complicating matters even more. The solar opposition to irrepressible Uranus enhances your physical energy and increases stress in personal relationships as you obsess about your lack of independence or what you have sacrificed for love. Ronald Reagan said, "The price of freedom may be high, but never so costly as the loss of freedom."

Your mind is solidly grounded today yet ambiguity could cloud your thinking when encountering rapidly changing circumstances. Your moods shift as quickly as a spring breeze while the Sun's opposition to electric Uranus shocks your 4th House of Security. On the positive side, this cosmic lightning is excellent for clearing out the cobwebs in your brain and awakening you to new experiences. If you have grown bored recently, receiving unexpected news is bound to grab your attention. Your time as a caterpillar is over; stretch your wings and fly.

It's wonderful to be blessed with an abundance of optimism now, but your positivity could prompt you to overlook something very important. You may be disappointed with yourself when you first realize that your goals are not as near as you thought. Revising your plans as soon as you gather all the facts prevents you from wasting time trying to reach the wrong destination. Scaling back your expectations just a bit enables you to feel proud when you exceed them.

You might believe there's been enough unexpected twists and turns already, but it appears that reality still has a few tricks up its sleeve. The tension is palpable and resolution is not likely because you're unable to find the source for your discomfort. Fulfilling your wish to escape the drama by taking a day or two of rest seems further away than ever. But even if you think the script is already written, the Sun-Uranus opposition sets the stage for surprise endings. Make changes now or they will be made for you.

A failure to address an existing relationship issue can suddenly turn into a major kerfuffle today. A menacing Mercury-Pluto square could undermine trust, while an extreme Sun-Uranus opposition inspires you to ignore all warning signs and blast ahead anyhow. Although you may want to flee if you don't find any obvious answers, letting go of your fixed expectations leads to the breakthrough you seek. Whatever the problem, choose to be part of the solution.

Chasing a fascinating idea might take you on a scenic route today, but this detour can turn into a wild ride if you try to fight the inevitable. Unfortunately, you set yourself up for a day of unpleasant surprises unless you possess a little faith and a good deal of flexibility. However, staying open to the possibilities may be all it takes to unlock a stagnant relationship issue. Set your fears aside now and delve into the unknown since you could encounter answers that ordinary logic would never find.

It's as if the cosmos is inviting you to play a game of Truth or Dare, requiring you to be honest to a fault. But the rules state that you can't distort the facts, even if your disclosure upsets the proverbial apple cart. In fact, tiptoeing around the edges of a touchy subject won't be enough to prevent an unstable house of cards from tumbling down. You might experience a few uncomfortable exchanges today in your quest for transparency. Thankfully, this cathartic process could bring much-needed closure, freeing you to head into the future joyfully unencumbered of any emotional baggage.

You might not be able to skirt around conflict today as unresolved fears lead to a verbal showdown. Nevertheless, open confrontation isn't the best response to your current concerns. Of course, denying your feelings isn't helpful either; avoidance only increases the dissension in the long run. Think carefully before you speak and use your innate emotional sensitivity to build bridges rather than to tear them down.

Someone close to you may have an agenda that's at odds with yours today, creating an impasse in finalizing your plans. Unfortunately, this isn't a light and easy disagreement that you can just disregard. You have abruptly come to the end of a road and can't determine where to turn next. Thankfully, the Sun's opposition to Uranus in your 9th House of Future Vision is a harbinger of evolution. Take advantage of this opportunity to resolve large issues that pit sensible caution against reckless abandon. The rules of the game have changed; anything is possible if you believe in yourself.

You can feel the pressure to hold your ground today even if a part of you wants to run away from everyone and everything. Your innate tendency to do what's right is challenged by the Sun's revolutionary opposition to Uranus in your 8th House of Transformation. Saying less is better than trying to convince others that your way makes more sense at this volatile time. It's best to acknowledge your core values and use them as a moral compass to guide you through circumstances you cannot control.

You take pride in your even-handed approach to disagreements but your gut feeling makes you suspicious of what others are selling you today. You're eager to put this matter behind you, but it's nearly impossible now to tell whose facts are the correct ones. The tension is palpable, motivating you to untangle the variables in this crazy situation, respond accordingly and move on. Rather than focusing on making a decision, concentrate on discerning what's real. Your sincerity is the key to restoring the balance you so desperately need.

Unresolved issues could escalate in an unexpected moment of emotional drama or, preferably, in a sudden urge for total honesty. Communicator Mercury's dynamic square to your key planet Pluto is a great opportunity to initiate an open dialogue about a sensitive subject. However, your volatile feelings might cause a scene you later regret. Choosing compassion over vengeance allows you to sleep at night. Aesop wrote, "No act of kindness, however small, is ever wasted."

Finding common ground between those who resist change and those who insist upon it requires someone with extraordinary vision -- and today the job might be yours. The stormy skies are electric with tension as the Sun opposes reactionary Uranus in your 11th House of Community. Unfortunately, people seem to be easily offended by your radical honesty, suggesting that a little discretion works in your favor. Choose your words carefully for minimum damage and maximum impact.

You may be overwhelmed with professional or personal pressures, tempting you to escape from your responsibilities today. Nevertheless, don't let fatigue or frustration dictate your actions because they can keep you from achieving your goals. Unfortunately, you might be swept up in someone else's battle or find yourself torn between sticking to your plan and running off to join the circus. Don't succumb to unnecessary distractions; taking a well-considered path to freedom could be enough to provide you with the excitement promised by wild Uranus.

Unexpected events require you to refocus your energy today and take the reins, even if everything seems out of control. This paradoxical mix of energy stems from the Sun's opposition to unstable Uranus in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, tempting you to cut loose and follow your every whim. Resist turning your world upside down in an impulsive attempt to alleviate boredom. The quicker you can learn from your mistakes now, the easier it will be to move on.

A sudden change in your financial condition might originate from an unplanned expenditure today. Whether you're required to repair something that is no longer working or considering a major purchase, the need to make a decision could come out of the blue. In either case, avoid overreacting while the Sun opposes uncontainable Uranus in your 2nd House of Self-Worth. Your perceptions are sharp and your analysis of the situation is accurate. Nevertheless, waiting a day or two before taking action will better your position in the long run.

Relationship insecurity could sap your vitality today as you exert your need for independence. The feelings of a significant other can be a major source of concern as the Full Moon in your impulsive sign opposes the Sun in your 7th House of Partnerships. Hopefully, you've already made significant decisions that are positively affecting your personal life. Now it's time to take things to the next level. If you're bogged down in an emotional funk, shift your thinking. If you can't change the situation, change your attitude.

You may be more tempted to flee than to fight when the spontaneous Aries Full Moon lights up your 12th House of Escapism. However, it's far healthier to lead than to follow when it comes to conflict resolution. Ultimately, the message is simple: stay conscious of the impact of your actions before making your move.  Maintaining your cool in the midst of a struggle that threatens your long-term plans is the best way to stay on track. Keep in mind the quickest route is not necessarily a straight line.

You're inclined to take a risk before considering all the ramifications of your current actions, leading to an unscheduled lesson in instant karma if you extend too far. You're eager to take charge of your life as the incorrigible Aries Full Moon highlights your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, pushing you forward whether you're fully prepared or not. However, you could lose your sense of direction if you move too quickly. You know you're on the right path when you become uninterested in looking back.

Unexpected changes in your daily routine are best met with short-term solutions now. Try not to overreact if your status at home or in the community feels threatened. Take whatever time you need to fully assess a situation that's still in flux. Although the Aries Full Moon brings instability to your 10th House of Career, making your home a more peaceful place creates a firm foundation on which you can build the next phase of your life. When you are unable to find tranquility within, it's useless to seek it elsewhere.

Complications at work and at home won't likely be simplified until you reveal your new personal vision for the future. Nevertheless, you must handle any misunderstandings that arise before you can take complete advantage of the fearless energy of the Aries Full Moon that shines in your 9th House of Big Ideas. As hard as it is to be aware of the potential in every difficult situation, your positive thinking carries more influence than you realize. What consumes your mind, controls your life.

Intense discussions with a business or personal partner tend to gravitate toward financial topics today. A heated debate may reopen old wounds and, hopefully, release their toxic effects once and for all. A reassessment of jointly held property may be required as the Aries Full Moon rattles your 8th House of Shared Resources. An unstable relationship might be pushed right to the edge, yet you can seal the deal at the very last minute if you consciously express your willingness to take things in a new direction. Open your mind before your mouth.

Although it might seem as if you're standing still, the powerful tides are actually changing directions. The enterprising Aries Full Moon energizes your 7th House of Partners, revealing an entirely new path that you can take into your future. Unfortunately, it's not yet clear where the current circumstances are leading. Nevertheless, your negotiating skills are being called into action as you attempt to settle an old score. It's time to bring relationship issues to the front burner while you are motivated by a commitment to your own agenda. Self-sacrifice is often much easier than self-realization.

You may be highly sensitive to invisible forces as conversations deepen, sending your thoughts inward to unravel the mystery of relationships. A clear sense of your identity is your foundation for learning what you need from others. However, a crisis in awareness is in the making when the pioneering Aries Full Moon occurs in your 6th House of Health and Habits, revealing lifestyle choices that need to be adjusted. Retreating from the world for a while can provide you with the objectivity necessary to recognize your strengths and weaknesses. Self-reflection is the school of wisdom.

Participating in new forms of merriment and self-expression is exhilarating as long as you don't upset your friends and colleagues by ignoring their immediate concerns. The spontaneous Aries Full Moon brightens your 5th House of Love and Play, tempting you to leap before you look. If your restlessness makes you too impatient to get along with others, work independently until the dust settles. The more you love your decisions, the less you need others to love them too.

Wild ideas and chaotic communication continue to spike your nervous system, leaving you so wired that it's impossible to relax. A squabble with a relative is possible as the combative Aries Full Moon lands in your 4th House of Home and Family. Thankfully, a quantum leap in awareness can clear the decks of outmoded dreams, making way for exciting new ones. The potential shakeup of long-term plans casts your career path in a different light. Nevertheless, don't make a choice just yet; there are still a few surprises ahead that could redirect your trajectory.

It may be wise to stick to your position today, but you can inadvertently put everything at risk if you attempt to take advantage of someone else's weakness. Holding your ground requires diligence now that the Aries Full Moon destabilizes your 3rd House of Communication. But don't raise the stakes on the game by turning an inconsequential skirmish into an unpleasant confrontation. Wayne Dyer wrote, "How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours."

Trouble surfaces when a stark contrast between your priorities and those of someone you trust is brought to light. Money matters could come to a head when the reactive Aries Full Moon illuminates your 2nd House of Income. If you recently rushed into a financial commitment, it may be cheaper to back out now than to push your luck further.
