Economic independence is an admirable goal yet this lunation's opposition to the Sun in your 8th House of Shared Resources suggests you shouldn't try to go it alone. Competition makes you faster; collaboration makes you better.

Although you seek stability today, you may discover that you're standing on shifting sands. You might believe what you hear until you realize something is amiss. It seems as if reality is slipping out of your grasp and you'll try anything to get to the truth. Even if you're enjoying the perspective of having your head in the clouds, it's still a smart strategy to balance your dreams with a healthy dose of pragmatism.

Relationships are not simply about getting your needs met now; they are about the profound impact that you have on others and how you are, in turn, affected by their stories. However, you must be careful about making incorrect assumptions based upon your interpretation of what they tell you today. The Moon's current visit to your no-nonsense sign is a blessing that enables you to untangle your achievable goals from the distractions of your fantasies. The distance between your dreams and reality is called action.

Maintaining consistency in your actions isn't easy today as you vacillate between your need for privacy and your desire for attention. The Moon's visit to your 12th House of Privacy reveals the value of escaping from people and responsibilities so you can recharge your batteries. Nevertheless, you are also motivated to creatively reveal what's in your heart and you naturally want others to acknowledge what you express. Fortunately, you are quite skilled in shifting mental gears between these two approaches.

You are in tune with your network of associates today and are blessed to receive their ongoing support. Fortunately, your sensitivity to your colleagues' talents makes you a respected teammate. However, your lack of boundaries could drain your energy if you don't pay attention to your limits. Believing in others who don't live up to their promises can cost you precious resources, so don't make any commitments without further research. If you remain realistic, success could be within easy reach.

Solid information is coming your way today, requiring you to assimilate what you learn into your current beliefs. Although you try to discern the most important facts, a foggy Sun-Neptune connection can lead you to overlook significant details or ignore sound advice. No matter how far you wander off track, remember to adjust your course on a regular basis so you don't go too far out of bounds. Nevertheless, remember that dreams become reality when you put your heart and soul to it.

You are safe to go ahead with your plans today because even your most outrageous ideas are likely grounded in reality. However, your friends may confuse you with their perspectives because they take your good ideas and blow them out of proportion. If you listen to others now, you may become so confused that you lose track of your own priorities. Trying to force an answer to an unclear question will only make matters worse, so let the energy settle back down on its own before you make any commitments you can't take back.

You may be confused by coworkers who complicate your life today when the Libra Sun misaligns with irrational Neptune in your 6th House of Employment. Inspiring connections are wonderful as long as you realize that what you're hearing may be pipe dreams. Nevertheless, you aren't likely to be deceived because your reality filter is strong enough now to compensate for any mixed messages you receive. Be ruthless when eliminating bad ideas, but hold onto those that have even a hint of potential; maybe one of them will make the difference that could change your life.

Your logically sound disclosure could be entirely misconstrued today as illusory Neptune distracts others from your true message. You may jump through hoops in order to get people to understand what you're saying, but your efforts may be for naught. However, the upside of your current journey is that it helps you organize information in ways that could make an impossible dream come true. Remember, your truth doesn't have to be describable to have personal meaning for you. The best answers lie within and can't always be put into words.

Your visions of a better tomorrow exacerbate your natural tendency to overlook the details. Your spirit soars when dreamy Neptune connects with the radiant Sun in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. However, you could lose sight of practical considerations in a fog of fantasies that leads to a costly decision, possibly even making you look foolish. Enjoying delicious moments of escape is delightful as long as you don't build your entire future on them. Luckily, the no-nonsense Taurus Moon enables you to cut through the veils of illusion, enabling you to see the simple facts.

You want to believe that you're the master of your own destiny and able to delay gratification in order to accomplish your goals. But you worry about deviating from the facts when a whimsical Sun-Neptune configuration warps your sense of proportion. It's true that making important decisions is tricky today because your sense of reality is bent out of shape by your creative dreams. Nevertheless, it's still wise to give your inner child permission to play without fear or guilt. The emotional territory you explore now could change your life for the better.

Your horizons grow wider today and your professional aspirations lead you further than before. Starry-eyed Neptune's awkward alignment with the Sun in your 9th House of Higher Truth could have you chasing unicorns, falling for someone's sob story or spreading yourself too thin. It's wiser to let go of those illusions that impede your progress than to hold on to an unreachable dream until you're exhausted. Recognizing the difference between a passing fancy and an enduring passion will help you step back from plans that have little likelihood of fulfillment.

Psychic connections and imaginary conversations can seem so real today that you mistake them for the truth. Although you could get lost in believing a daydream, you are blessed with the skill and the stamina to separate fantasy from reality. Don't try to overcompensate by putting on a false air of authority or making impractical promises. Although you're tempted to brush reason aside now, doubters won't respect your ideas unless you back them up with solid data. As Fran Tarkenton said, "Ignoring facts does not make them go away."

Your current wanderlust has an uplifting effect on your entire life, offering the possibility of new friendships and even romantic love. Your spirit is more adventurous now, both in emotional and financial matters, as Venus in happy-go-lucky Sagittarius sparks your ignition. However, there may be a darker side to all this lovely news if your enthusiasm encourages you to take on commitments that you can't fulfill. People with good intentions make promises, but people with good character keep them.

You can be quite conservative and determined when you're working to meet your basic needs, especially while the Moon is still in your obstinate sign. However, Luna's shift into adaptable Gemini changes your attitude and lifts your spirit. Your caution is further eroded when Venus sashays into extravagant Sagittarius, encouraging you to spend time, money or energy even when the returns are unclear. Although  you're willing to speculate now, remember that big goals require careful planning. Keep your eye on the details and build a foundation solid enough to support your dreams.

A weight has been lifted from your shoulders and you're eager to channel your newly discovered exuberance into a relationship as flirtatious Venus surfs into your 7th House of Others. Nevertheless, you know that hard choices still need to be made if you're to succeed in the Department of Love. Thankfully, the planet of pleasure becomes a major player in your world now, helping you attract people who open your heart as well as your mind. Life is short; do what makes you happy.

Emotional satisfaction is tangible now and your love light radiates even brighter as you gaze toward the future. Your energies shift and the clouds dissipate as the Sun leaves the dark waters of Scorpio and heads for the adventurous lands and blue skies of Sagittarius. Reconnecting with your inner child rekindles a sense of spontaneity and joy. Author Tom Robbins wrote, "It's never too late to have a happy childhood."

Although people may arrive bearing gifts today, their offerings are in the form of opportunities, not packages. However, you must pay close attention or you could miss a wonderful chance to improve the quality of your life. Nevertheless, it's your heartfelt experiences that put you in closer touch with your dreams now. Sweet Venus dances into your 5th House of Romance and Creativity, boosting your hope and raising your spirits. Do whatever you can to reestablish your connection with the playful and flirtatious side of your personality. Resistance is unnecessary; just say yes.

Settling into the comforts of family activities brings you great pleasure today, counterbalancing your current busyness at work. Sweet Venus takes up residence in farseeing Sagittarius and your 4th House of Domestic Conditions, sweetening your experiences at home by helping you look beyond the current limitations and visualize a more rewarding future. You're no longer constrained by the old list of rules. Believing is seeing.

Your psychic antenna is readjusting to the changing cosmic landscape as you tune into new interests today. Friendly Venus slips into your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, amplifying your curiosity in people, places and things. Your dreams can motivate you to reach too far, but don't be too hard on yourself if you fall short of your lofty expectations. Although you want more than reality is offering now, your lesson is about finding satisfaction right where you are. Author Mandy Hale writes, "The key to happiness is letting each situation be what it is instead of what you think it should be."

A fresh round of optimism helps you cast aside doubts, inspiring you to dream about bigger rewards ahead. It makes sense to pay more attention to your finances while enriching Venus visits your 2nd House of Resources. Luckily, you can garner recognition that pumps up your self-esteem and reinvigorates the flow of moneymaking ideas. Your earning potential is integrally connected to the faith you have in yourself and the passion you feel for your work. Pleasure and profit make an ideal mix now because cash will come more easily when you're having a good time.

Satisfaction might be within reach today but you must take the initiative before receiving the fruits of your labor. Happily, beautiful Venus waltzes into your sign, inviting you to open the curtains wide and let the world in on your secret. Exhilaration replaces fear when you're not withholding your true emotions. When you feel good, everyone around you will benefit from the joy you  exude. No doubt, laughter is the best medicine, no matter what ails you.

You might want to treat this workday as an occasion to play. Your mind is set on less professional goals now because vivacious Venus enters cavalier Sagittarius, lighting up your heart with sweet thoughts. Nevertheless, you appear quite serious on the surface, confusing others as they misread your intentions. Although you might not reveal your desire for affection, attending to your own needs is a high priority. As Maharishi Mahesh Yogi said, "Be happy, healthy, and let all that love flow through your heart."

Your professional ambitions are not as captivating now that magnetic Venus floats into adventurous Sagittarius and your 11th House of Networking. Instead of striving to climb the ladder of success, you want to participate in group-oriented activities. You could be the life of the party as you're drawn into social situations where you can have fun instead of just furthering your career. Be open to the appreciation you receive from your peers. It's perfectly acceptable to seek companionship among like-minded individuals, since you can enjoy yourself now without worrying about emotional complications.

The pleasure of pursuit takes center stage as your search for memorable experiences becomes as important as their discovery. But persuasive Venus moves into freedom-loving Sagittarius and your 10th House of Public Status, sending you on a wild goose chase if you set your sites too high. Your artistic abilities and people skills garner new respect that increases your sense of self-worth, making you even more popular. A grateful heart is a magnet for miracles.

Putting your words into action can't be delayed any longer. Talk is cheap, but it won't solve any problems now as you try to get ahead at work. You might even feel as if your survival is at stake when combative Mars joins ruthless Pluto in your 10th House of Career. Your coworkers may mistakenly believe your urgent need to win means they must lose, fueling a struggle for dominance. Fortunately, you can prevent conflict by building your success on shared power rather than force.

You could surprise yourself with the intensity of your feelings today if someone questions your goals or your motivation. An impassioned conjunction of contentious Mars and Pluto may provoke unexpectedly strong reactions. What is a game to you can seem like mortal combat to others, so choose your playmates carefully. Good judgment about the company you keep makes it safe to be sassy without inviting negative consequences.

Enthusiasm turns sour today if you give your emotions too much power. Your passion rises to a crescendo now that ardent Mars runs into powerful Pluto in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Nevertheless, hold your temper if someone steps out of line to oppose you. You can't win this battle by fighting fire with fire. Nevertheless, a well-thought-out strategy enables you to apply analytical thinking in a calm and constructive manner rather than acting as if you're maneuvered into a corner with no option but striking back.

Tough talking escalates into an open disagreement today, especially if an ambitious person challenges your progress. You may be particularly opinionated now, prompting you to take initiative in a relationship or attracting aggressive people if you say nothing at all. Either way, militant Mars and potent Pluto are stirring up a storm in your 7th House of Others, requiring you to stand your ground when dealing with someone who prefers control over quality. Eleanor Roosevelt said, "Courage is more exhilarating than fear, and in the long run, it is easier."

There is no need to panic today if your plans start to unravel. It's tempting to roar like a Lion but a show of power won't necessarily help to keep your life in order. You might be so convinced you're doing the right thing that you overcompensate, only to make matters worse. Whether you're trying to improve your lifestyle or make progress on a project at work, you're stepping into unfamiliar territory that could feel like quicksand. Don't struggle; graciously back down and remove yourself from the situation instead of fighting to the finish.

Your words are so sharp today that you could inadvertently hurt someone you meant to help. Nevertheless, your practical analysis of the situation enables you to see through most misunderstandings and deceptions as you cut to the chase. But apply a dash of diplomacy when making your case because some people may be more sensitive than you realize. If you encounter irrational resistance, postponing a discussion until common sense returns will work to your advantage. Don't push the river; it flows by itself.

Uneasy dynamics on the home front strengthen your convictions and intensify conflicts with family members. In fact, you may think you've been thrown into a transformational cauldron of alchemical change, which can rock the foundations of your emotional world. Unfortunately, some of your current discomfort is likely tied to nearly forgotten memories from your past. You might not enjoy being so embroiled in a melodrama, but you're able to recover buried treasures if you stick with the process. As Winston Churchill quipped, "If you are going through hell, keep going."

People appear to be on edge today and their extreme reactions seem out of proportion with the current circumstances. Paradoxically, someone's anger or resentment might be aimed in your direction if you attempt to bottle up your emotions. A volatile Mars-Pluto conjunction destabilizes your 3rd House of Communication, possibly generating a perfect storm of reactive passions. Nevertheless, channeling your fierce energy into a constructive outlet enables you to be incredibly productive without any collateral damage.

You are a person on a mission today, eager to do whatever is necessary to reach your goals. Your stamina is a godsend as assertive Mars joins unstoppable Pluto to push you forward. Unfortunately, you could overreact if you think your success is being threatened in any way. The crisis may be real but you can transform a stressful situation into a beneficial one as long as you don't try to take on the entire world. Music executive Allen Klein said, "A little perspective, like a little humor, goes a long way."

You might have to face your fears today if you encounter people who push your buttons. On the other hand, you could accidentally upset someone else if you let your feelings of discontent or mistrust slip out. Nevertheless, this is an opportunity to recognize what you need to do to find satisfaction. Letting go of an attitude that impedes your success may be necessary now; the bigger your goals, the more patient and persistent you must be in your pursuit. Simmer your best ideas on the back burner while you handle the most immediate tasks in front of you.

You try every possible option just to sidestep a difficult conversation, but your avoidance has already likely contributed to the current drama. You're probably not very happy about running into an emotionally intense person today as cranky Mars hooks up with passionate Pluto in your 12th House of Destiny. Nevertheless, taking responsibility for your role in the conflict minimizes the discomfort all the way around. If you're willing to confront the truth prior to letting go of your past, you'll end up making room for a more positive relationship in your future.

Intense conversations with colleagues and friends may delve into psychologically profound territory today. Memories of old emotional conflicts raise unnecessary fears that fuel a disagreement. Unfortunately, you might turn your feelings into anger in order to defend your position even if you're not being attacked. It's only worth the energy to argue if you are moving through new ground instead of picking at familiar old wounds. Demonstrate your strength of will now instead of downplaying your authority to placate someone else. Wisdom is knowing the right path to take; integrity is taking it.

Maintaining your composure is no easy feat today because someone is getting under your skin. Everything seems to be in a state of change and you don't want to miss your chance to make your two cents known when it comes to your needs. Something you previously overlooked can explode into awareness now, freeing you from previous illusions and thrusting you into a new relationship dynamic. Instead of succumbing to fear and striking out, use the diplomatic Libra Mercury to establish common ground where once there was none.

Your highly charged nervous system puts you on red alert today as work-related stress shakes your confidence. However, you might also become overly defensive to comments or criticism that could be more helpful than hurtful. Mental Mercury's opposition to weird Uranus inspires strange ideas and provokes disturbing conversations but you can create the stability you seek by turning your attention toward more spiritual thoughts. Ralph Waldo Emerson wrote, "Nothing can bring you peace but yourself."

The more you talk today, the more complicated everything becomes while verbose Mercury in your 5th House of Self-Expression opposes erratic Uranus. Your thoughts are spinning so fast that you might believe you can dance circles around everyone else. However, your brain is already working at its maximum and it feels as if one additional interruption could send you over the edge. Instead of trying to win a debate, stop arguing and start cooperating. It's amazing how much you will accomplish when you're not wasting time and energy participating in unnecessary drama.

Impatience may prompt you to overplay your hand today. Flying by the seat of your pants isn't your normal style, but your charm and diplomacy could overcome any resistance to your creative ideas and romantic desires now. Temporarily saying goodbye to logic enables you to charge conversations with your contagious excitement as the electric Mercury-Uranus opposition drives you to discover answers in unconventional ways and unexpected places. Russian author Boris Pasternak wrote, "Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us."

You're eager for change now that you are incorporating new ideas into your life as suddenly as they appear. Unfortunately, you're so quick to respond to everything that it's impossible to know exactly what to think while analytical Mercury opposes independent Uranus. Your mind is racing so fast today that you can't even keep up with yourself. You may be a tad defensive or jumpy in your reactions because of the electric tension in the air. Thankfully, you can use the cosmic instability to your advantage by taking a calculated risk. If you win, you'll be happy; if you lose, you'll be wise.

A moment of clarity reveals so many new options today that you need to take time to write down your thoughts before they fade. Your ingenious ideas are unconstrained by reason while quicksilver Mercury opposes electric Uranus. But you still may feel isolated or undeserving of love, dampening your excitement about the future. Nevertheless, it's crucial to look beyond the petty differences in a relationship and only focus on what matters the most now. Otherwise, unexpected conflicts might turn the smallest disagreements into major meltdowns. Embrace diversity or be left behind.

Nervous tensions may reach a crescendo today, requiring you to balance logic and intuition. Thankfully, one of your greatest attributes is your ability to be fair and you will need all the objectivity you can muster for what's ahead. Whether or not your diplomacy is successful, you believe you have the skills to navigate through anything life sets in your path. But this is no time to follow conventional patterns because the freedom to come and go as you wish is a high priority. Rajneesh said, "To live in relationship and yet remain independent, that is what courage is."

A private conversation can give you a fresh outlook on politics at work. If you're worried about taking the wrong side in a developing drama, you might seek the advice of someone you trust. However, you really don't appreciate it when others try to tell you right from wrong. Listening to your heart while also tending to your responsibilities gives you a better handle on the current situation. A change in your perspective can turn an ordeal into an adventure.

Distractions seem to keep you from important obligations today, yet your openness to new experiences strengthens your spirit and improves your chances for success. However, you may be confronted with a friend's shocking revelation. You could end up in hot water by speaking too quickly since witty Mercury opposes unruly Uranus. Clever repartee can help you smoothly sidestep an overdue discussion for now, but evasive tactics will not work for long. Demonstrate your courage by starting a conversation that truly matters.

Although there may be clear sailing at work, friends or relatives still could question your tactics while destabilizing Uranus opposes curious Mercury in your 10th House of Career. Luckily, three planets in fair-minded Libra allow you to see each situation from everyone's point of view. Nevertheless, the current lack of support dampens your spirits. Approach each task with a beginner's mind, even if you have plenty of experience and are confident about your skills. Your performance will continue to improve, enabling you to do your job better in less time and with less effort.

Your unconventional thinking can shake the foundations upon which you build solid relationships. Wild Uranus releases extraordinary amounts of energy rather suddenly, especially when emotions have been buried in order to maintain the peace. Critical Mercury's volatile opposition to Uranus sets the stage for a torrent of words to spill forth with pent-up intensity. Your ideas may be so far ahead of the times that you must clearly spell them out or keep them to yourself to avoid confusion. It's been said that simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication.

You may be sitting on the edge of your seat today, anxious to add your opinion to almost any discussion. Mercury's tense opposition to unpredictable Uranus can test your patience with a friend who seems to be stuck in his or her own position. But instead of taking the bait, several planets in diplomatic Libra encourage you to wage peace whenever possible. Even if an unexpected twist leads a conversation awry, staying cool, calm and collected while under pressure earns respect from those who mean the most to you.

Responsibilities weigh heavily on your shoulders today, but there's a part of you that doesn't really care. You want to do what you Rams do best: speed up and plow through the obstructions without looking back. You believe the way out of your current frustration is to break through the bonds of doubt with sheer force. But some blockages don't respond to a full frontal assault. Instead, slow down long enough to listen to those who have your best interests at heart. Following useful advice could prove to be more beneficial in the long run than you think.

It might feel as if someone is raining on your parade today as a burst of creativity runs into the wall of reality. Colorful ideas and images may fill your mind, whether or not they are practical. However, a tenacious Sun-Saturn struggle puts the halt to your fantasies, allowing only the most pragmatic concepts to survive. Make certain to give new ideas enough time to germinate before relegating them to the trash bin. Confucius warns that "everything has its beauty but not everyone can see it."

Negotiations about what you are willing to give for what you want in return are likely to be productive today. The Sun's aspect to serious Saturn in your 7th House of Relationships is a signal to be clear about what you expect to accomplish with others. It might not feel romantic or generous to be so definitive about your needs now, but building a solid foundation ensures the development of trust in the long run. Honesty is the highest form of intimacy.

You may be upset if an authority figure reads you the riot act today for no apparent reason. However, you might be missing a real opportunity if you take criticism personally now. Although you could be rather thin-skinned while the Moon is visiting your emotionally sensitive sign, don't force a showdown until you discuss the matter with people you can trust. There's no reason to let your tender feelings run away with your day. Words of wisdom that inspire a healthy sense of self-restraint are worth their weight in gold.

Braking for speed bumps isn't the easiest thing to do when you have your destination in sight and time is running out. However, you may have little choice today when the willful Sun crosses paths with karmic Saturn in your 5th House of Self-Expression, testing your patience. The obstacles that appear now are probably symptoms of sloppy work or shortcuts that didn't pan out as expected. Heed the warnings and overcome any self-perpetuated resistance to your success with discipline and diligence.

Stop to take a long hard look at your real motives for accomplishing a specific task today. A harsh Sun-Saturn connection might have you thinking that someone is furtively working against you. However, diffusive Neptune rattles rational Mercury, making you miss the mark when explaining your intentions. Quietly retreat, regain your footing and try again in a few days when clarity returns. Thomas Carlyle wrote, "The greatest of faults is to be conscious of none."

You may overreact to some adversity today that probably isn't as difficult as it seems. In any event, your strength is tested as the Sun shines its light in your sign only to be blocked by stern Saturn in your 3rd House of Communication. A minor setback at work might reinforce your fear of failure or, at least, challenge your self-confidence. Instead of focusing on this as a personal defeat, take it as a cosmic assignment. Without some stress now and then, there is little gain.

Your creative urges are stifled by someone's lack of support today, but it may be your own fears that prevent you from moving mountains. There is a deeper lesson to learn if you find yourself involved in a struggle with others. The real work now is internal because overcoming self-doubt is ultimately your greatest challenge. Fortunately, you can reaffirm your resolve to continue forward by remembering previous accomplishments. Poet Khalil Gibran wrote, "And God said, 'Love your enemy.' So I obeyed him and loved myself."

If your persistent efforts have led to pleasure, recent successes could be replaced with perplexity today. The Sun's stressful alignment with austere Saturn is a constrictive influence that can tangle you up in knots. If you are encountering difficulties when expressing yourself, your aggravation may force you to clarify your intentions and commit to a new set of goals. Although you might feel the need to alter your current direction, don't be in a hurry to make a critical decision. Give your thinking a chance to stabilize before finalizing your course of action.

You may believe invisible forces are conspiring against you today, but you can't find the source of the negativity. Nevertheless, someone is likely impeding your progress and making unreasonable demands upon you. You might want to give up, but quitting is not advisable now. The good news is that this frustrating Saturn transit is short-lived. Drastic changes are not required in this moment, only the passage of time. Saint Frances de Sales wrote, "Have patience with all things, but first of all with yourself."

It might seem as if someone is purposefully complicating your life now, but the truth is the trouble may originate within you. Don't be like Don Quixote and fight with windmills when the solution is more readily found by modifying your own behavior. Paradoxically, you could be unconsciously creating difficult predicaments so you can prove to yourself and others you're capable of putting in a solid performance when overcoming obstacles. A head full of fears has no space for dreams.

An odd mix of serious work and serious foolishness can make for a strange day. No matter how much you try to concentrate on your job, your thoughts keep drifting in and out of fantasy while mischievous Mercury crosses paths with dreamy Neptune. However, Saturn the Taskmaster still demands concrete results. Don't take the easy way out today; show the world your determination by valiantly handling your current responsibilities as best you can. No one questions the creativity of your imagination, but character counts now more than anything else.

It seems as if time is running out, prompting you to make a last-minute effort to reveal your thoughts now. Unfortunately, your message might expose your inner turmoil as you worry about how much to bring out into the open. Instead of wasting energy in logical analysis, just speak from your heart today. Even if your words create confusion, they catalyze a transformational process that will continue over the next few days. Don't worry about your destination yet; just take the first few steps and figure out the rest along the way.

Someone might drive you up the wall today because you want closure on a relationship issue and your friend or partner remains indecisive. You could try everything in your bag of tricks to elicit a real commitment, but gentle prodding, logical debate and even your emotional appeal seem to fail. It's as if others discovered that their evasive tactics actually weaken your authority now. Thankfully, your patience pays off later in the day when the Sun and the Moon both shift into fixed signs, solidifying everyone's positions. Good things come to those who wait.

Waking up on the wrong side of the bed today could be enough to start your day on the wrong foot. You want to tell others how you feel but you're not interested in stirring up any trouble. Nevertheless, you can only keep quiet for so long. Naturally, your message is important but so is your delivery. It will be easier to put all your cards on the table once the first one is played. But don't wait for someone else to speak up; the window of opportunity will close sooner than you expect.

You might feel like a Crab out of water today because your emotions don't seem to fit anywhere you try to put them. However, difficult aspects require you to downplay your needs until the Moon leaves your sign and blasts into lively Leo. Luckily, cosmic help is on the way this afternoon, once the Moon shifts into your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. A wave of confidence empowers you to reveal your feelings without worrying about the consequences. You can't control other people's actions, but you certainly can control your reactions.

The longer you hold onto your tension, the harder it is to let it go. Nevertheless, the Moon's move into your extroverted sign today creates a cosmic opportunity to get something off your chest. Keep in mind that your passionate revelation might be more than your friends and family can handle now. Naturally, you want to give your solo performance one hundred and ten percent, but you'll make more of an impact if you scale the drama back just a bit. President Harry S. Truman said, "Intense feeling too often obscures the truth."

You wish you could go into hiding today, even if your social calendar draws you out to mix and mingle. Thoughts of solitude lure you away from the maddening crowds and into the confines of your own mind. Ironically, going inward enables you to simultaneously travel outward, all the way to distant galaxies. You may be intrigued with the process of contemplation yet nervous about losing your footing. Joseph Campbell wrote, "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek."

You're reaching the end of one chapter and must tie up any loose ends that you don't want to carry into the next. Nevertheless, you may be torn between taking care of your own needs now and nurturing those you love. Resolving this conflict might seem impossible until you experience a critical moment today when everything suddenly becomes clear. Don't hesitate once you see the light; your uncertainty could return if you wait too long to make your move. Action has more value than intention.

You are standing at the edge of a precipice with your future opening before you. You intuitively know that yesterday's fantasies will become tomorrow's reality, amplifying your anticipation along with your fears of failure. But this is no time for your faith to waver because your current thoughts are the most powerful influence on whatever happens next. Author Miasha writes, "Don't dream your life, live your dreams."

Exceeding everyone's expectations can be exhausting at times, but you inadvertently play a significant part in creating your larger-than-life presence. Although you may be ready for some downtime now, it's difficult to convince others that you're serious about slipping out of the spotlight to rejuvenate your soul. You might be temporarily lured back into the fray today, but it's not your responsibility to assume the role of social director. Novelist May Sarton penned, "Solitude is the salt of personhood. It brings out the authentic flavor of every experience."

People seem overly clingy today, prompting you to distance yourself from them. It's not that you're insensitive to their needs; rather you're afraid of being pulled into someone's personal drama that's so deep you can't climb out. Establishing your boundaries feels like a necessary step in helping anyone else now but it can also create an unnecessary gulf between you and those you love. Nevertheless, you are not required to set yourself on fire to keep others warm.

Quietly go about your business on your own today, instead of spending too much time worrying about what others think. Participating in a group activity is often exhilarating because so much can be accomplished when people work together for a common cause. Nevertheless, you're more effective now running errands and crossing items off your to-do list without coordinating your efforts with anyone else. Sometimes, those who fly solo have the strongest wings.

You know what your happiness depends on, but believe you shouldn't have to tell anyone today. Those who love you should know what you need without you saying a word. Unfortunately, harboring romantic illusions based on self-imposed silence doesn't lead to satisfaction. There's no reason to set yourself up for failure by refusing to communicate. Take Oprah Winfrey's words to heart: "You get in life what you have the courage to ask for."

The extroverted side of your personality takes over today while the Moon is traveling through animated Leo. But the Sun's shift into secretive Scorpio and your 8th House of Intimacy reminds you to temper your spontaneity with empathy for others. Teaming up with the right people will add power and passion into your life. Acknowledging their gifts and respecting their limits create lasting and rewarding relationships. Enrich your life by expanding your community.

Although you strive for objectivity in communication, you can't deny your strong feelings about someone. You're able to see both sides of an issue, but the Sun's visit to possessive Scorpio and your 7th House of Others signals a deepening passion for partnerships that is anything but rational. Unfortunately, this inconsistency is not ideal for making decisions, especially since your intuition could be off target now. Will Rogers said, "Good judgment comes from experience and a lot of that comes from bad judgment."

The temptation to micromanage your affairs is compelling today because you want others to see you in the best light when it comes to fulfilling your promises. Fortunately, you are busy focusing on the details now that the Sun is moving through penetrating Scorpio and your 6th House of Self-Improvement. There isn't much room in your life for fun and games now, so take care of what's on your plate and stick to your daily routine. Your priorities are your character.

Barriers to obtaining what you desire start to crumble, encouraging you to be more direct when expressing your needs. Happily, the Sun's radiance enlivens your 5th House of Self-Expression while it's moving through magnetic Scorpio. Although you are more open to deeper emotional and physical interactions today, attempting to please everyone is a mistake. Direct your creative skills outward where they will have the greatest impact. Poet Maya Angelou wrote, "Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud."

Lending your emotional support to a friend or relative today can have a positive influence on a difficult situation. You are exceptionally empathic while the receptive Moon is traveling through your sign. Additionally, the Sun's shift into passionate Scorpio and your 4th House of Emotional Security shines the spotlight on personal responsibilities. Taking the time to strengthen your family relationships and fulfill your domestic obligations enables you to build an enduring foundation for the future. A person never stands so tall as when they lean down to help one in need.

Your imagination may be favored over common sense today as conversations wander aimlessly into Fantasyland. You're attuned to the slightest ripples of negativity while the Moon hangs out in your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. Your heightened sensitivity invites emotional intimacy while also encouraging you to overreact to casual comments. The extreme Scorpio Sun takes your thinking to another level as it plunges into your 3rd House of Communication. Everyone is deep, but most people are afraid to dive.

There is little room for self-doubt in your life now, so put your unwavering faith into making your dreams come true. Moneymaking opportunities are on the rise while the Sun is warming Scorpio's emotional waters and illuminating your 2nd House of Finances. Thankfully, a weight has been lifted from your shoulders, but rather than celebrating, employ your newfound sense of freedom to build the future you want. Although there is so much in flux, pick something to focus on and make a stand. Be who you want to be, not what others want to see.

The Force is with you now as the blindfold is removed from your eyes and your destination is in plain sight. Confusion fades, whether the news is good or not, allowing you to choose which path to take next. The brilliant radiance of the Sun is shining in your sign, motivating you to act with greater confidence. Thankfully, your optimism is tempered with a vulnerability that enables you to accept help when it is offered. Letting down your guard allows more love and light to flow into your life.

You want to establish your personal space today as you retreat from group activities to reconnect with your faith and idealism. You're highly inspired to continue working for positive change in your life and in the world. Although a community of friends and colleagues urge you to pursue your dreams, something has changed now that the Sun in mysterious Scorpio has begun its month-long stay in your 12th House of Secrets. Your grand sense of camaraderie is diminished by an immediate need for privacy and the time to sort through issues you prefer to keep confidential. Wisdom comes from reflection.

Collaborating with others today makes it feasible to transform entire organizations, resurrect a discarded project or produce events that strengthen your community. The Sun's entry into relentless Scorpio and your 11th House of Social Networking feeds your ambition as you tap into the resources all around you. Nevertheless, a competitive Mercury-Saturn alignment may create friction as you struggle for control. Even if you feel uncomfortable expressing your opinion, tensions will subside once everyone knows the score. In union there is strength.

Endless analysis gives way to clear decisions, prompting you to walk your talk without further concern about an overall strategy. In fact, it's your integrity and not your plan that is your primary strength now. The Sun's shift into powerful Scorpio and your 10th House of Career is a sign that it's time to think less about your personal needs and more about your professional life. A battle with internal demons may be necessary to maintain a healthy perspective today. Dig in your heels and concentrate on long-term change rather than immediate gratification.

You may be inflexible when it comes to matters of principle now, especially if others are pressuring you to change. The unyielding Scorpio Sun is plowing through your 9th House of Higher Truth, adding conviction to your beliefs and passion to your presentations. Fortunately, an obsessive need to know can motivate you to explore religion, philosophy or politics through study and travel. Educator Ken Robinson says, "Curiosity is the engine of achievement."

If you've been playing the waiting game in the emotional arena, it could be time to turn your anticipation into action. You're riding high on the energy of the playful Leo Moon in your 5th House of Romance. However, the urgency to free yourself from complicated entanglements standing between you and your happiness might prompt you to overreact. Instead of taking a risk, exercise a small dose of caution so you don't do something you regret. A new kind of love may be within reach, but you still have work to do before it's yours.

You may be excited and uneasy at the same time today, not quite knowing what to do with desires that don't fit your usual patterns. You might have the opportunity to participate in a social event involving eccentric people that stretch your mind. You're not even sure why you're tempted by exotic food, weird music or unconventional art. A sudden attraction to someone who isn't your type or boredom with your current situation can shake your world now. Nevertheless, staying open-minded could turn your day into one you'll never forget.

Your mental intensity takes your conversations to a place you rarely go. However, your unusually penetrating perception could also introduce distrust while Mercury swims in Scorpio's tumultuous waters, turning your mind's eye inward to uncover the root causes of your current dilemma. Unfortunately, a sudden wave of desire doesn't necessarily correspond to your intentions. Allow plenty of time to sort out the differences between what you feel in your gut and what your mind is telling you before making a major move.

On one hand, you yearn for the comfort of being with someone who accepts you as you are. On the other hand, you might sacrifice your true feelings to maintain stability so that those close to you may not even know the real you. Don't be afraid of changing your style and shocking someone with a personal disclosure today. If you are open and honest about your truth, your relationships will develop to reflect your integrity. Discomfort is often the source of growth.

Your adrenaline surges today as unfamiliar emotions whisk you into new relationship territory. However, interactive Mercury's presence in mysterious Scorpio and your 4th House of Foundations prompts you to delve deeper into your psychological, spiritual and emotional roots. While you may be fearful of what you don't understand and can't control, you're willing to explore the unknown because you believe stability is waiting on the other side of the fence. Sigmund Freud wrote, "Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength."

Volatile emotional dynamics can set your nerves on edge today. It's more than likely that you will pursue connecting with a free-spirited person or revitalizing the flagging energy in an existing relationship. But you may be more suspicious of others now that curious Mercury is taking up all the oxygen in your 3rd House of Data Collection. Your current hunger for answers could be annoying if you turn it into an interrogation, so ease up on your investigation before you alienate those around you. In the words of Plato, "You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation."

A sudden jolt of awareness can be upsetting, but only if you try to hold onto your previous agenda. Plans with a friend or partner may be disrupted today as the sparks fly, highlighting shocking Uranus in your 7th House of Others. Although you are known to step into the role of  peacemaker, you're no pushover now as communicator Mercury sinks into fixed Scorpio. Rather than waiting for something to happen, take control and turn the tables. Be the revolution, declare your independence and let freedom ring.

Your laser-like mental radar sees through people's charades and hones in on the facts. Your discernment powers are strong now that cerebral Mercury is camping out in your perceptive sign. However, you might erratically jump to an incorrect conclusion even if you have solid information at your disposal. Your desire for excitement is irrepressible today and could influence your behavior. Even if you believe you know the truth, let your emotions settle before you say something you can't take back. Thinking before acting is wisdom but acting before thinking is regret.

A sudden change in the emotional landscape can push you to the edge in a relationship now. Your urge to express what's in your heart is so persistent that you might open up to a complete stranger if you have nowhere else to share your secrets. Although impulsive actions could inadvertently create distance with an existing friend or lover, your real goal is to demonstrate your passion for life. Discussing your feelings instead of acting them out leads to solutions rather than problems.

Anything goes as unusually deep feelings bump up against external resistance today. Nevertheless, you're likely to express your desires no matter how odd they may sound. In fact, remaining open to new forms of pleasure can bring unexpected rewards. Just as easily, your love life could be turned upside down when sweet Venus runs into reactionary Uranus, upsetting your plans or radically altering the direction of a relationship. Honest communication leads to understanding, intimacy and mutual appreciation.

Very little escapes your incisive thinking now; your perceptions are on point and you are a force to be reckoned with in your interactions with others. Nevertheless, a simple flirtation can heat things up so quickly that you don't take time to logically consider the consequences of your actions. Making decisions in the spur of the moment might feel empowering but may lead your heart into an emotional briar patch. Let your desire for truth override your need for pleasure and your heart will be happier in the long run.

You may act impulsively one moment and freeze with fear the next. Or you might attract people whose behavior is as bewildering to you as yours is to them. Cerebral Mercury enters penetrating Scorpio and your 9th House of Higher Truth, empowering you to go the distance in your thinking. Unfortunately, your good sense could be short-lived as sudden attractions to new people, things or ideas turn into major distractions. Ben Franklin advises, "If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins."

There's an amazing array of possibilities right at your feet, but your desires overcome your reason today, leaving you dazed and confused. A disillusioning Venus-Neptune square can even throw you into a temporary state of despair as you try to narrow down your choices. But you could be easily fooled in your current idealistic frame of mind. If you choose to make yourself vulnerable to another person, first ensure that he or she is worthy of your trust. Nevertheless, giving others the benefit of the doubt offers you the chance for a true heart-to-heart connection.

The path to happiness is an elusive one today, even if you're convinced that your honorable intentions are enough to make everything turn out OK. However, charming Venus squares fuzzy Neptune from your 8th House of Intimacy, leading you to confuse an unrealistic fantasy with true love. Trust your recent decisions and just keep heading in the same direction, even if you grow discouraged. Don't worry if you feel like you're losing your way; a temporary mist can obscure even the clearest mind. Opportunity is often delivered in a fog of uncertainty.

Your compassion and imagination take the driver's seat today while vulnerable Venus dynamically squares fantasy-prone Neptune. Opening your heart to others is fine as long as your expectations aren't set so high that you end up disappointed. You're more likely to overlook reality now in your pursuit of a dream, seeing people as you wish them to be rather than as they truly are. Nevertheless, surfing an emotional wave adds excitement to your day while employing caution can prevent you from losing your balance and wiping out.

If something seems too good to be true today, it probably is. Thankfully, you're able to retreat from the unrelenting pressure of making choices while indulgent Venus in your 6th House of Daily Routine creates a stressful square with intoxicating Neptune. Although you are so optimistic that you could gloss over the facts now, your fascination with pleasure is so overwhelming that it's difficult to maintain a healthy perspective. Even if you're ready to give a project the green light, delay major decisions for a few days until you have a more realistic outlook.

You might convince yourself that nearly anything is real today as long as it's something you want badly enough. However, you're treading on dangerous ground as a romantic Venus-Neptune square paints reality with your imagination, weakens your willpower and distorts your judgment about a person or a purchase. Although you can justify your actions, sacrificing yourself for love or money could end up being much more expensive than you think if you let your desires exceed the limits of logic.

It's all too easy to misread others today, especially if your fantasies distort your perceptions. An imaginative Venus-Neptune square makes it tough to discern the truth, even if the exacting Virgo Moon enables you to isolate individual bits of data. Instead of trusting the vague generalities of your intuition, zoom into the smallest details and build the truth from there. Using your astute powers of concentration can prevent you from believing that all is well when in fact it is not.

You long to escape the mundane routine of everyday life and will ignore practical considerations today to justify your dreamy voyage. A magical moment of delight may inspire creative endeavors and romantic pursuits by stimulating your imagination. However, your reasoning could be skewed while a magnetic Venus-Neptune square pulls you off course and leads you down a garden path now. Don't make any promises you can't keep; a sober assessment will convince you to lower your lofty expectations and prepare you for the inevitable return of reality by the end of the month.

It's as if you've slipped into a hypnotic trance and are compelled to chase a phantasmagorical dream. A misleading Venus-Neptune square prompts you to give in to escapist behavior today. Unfortunately, your plan could backfire when you realize you've fallen down a surreal rabbit hole and you don't know the shortest route back to the surface. Nevertheless, recognizing your limits before you exceed them keeps you from losing your center of gravity, stopping trouble before it even starts.

Untangling the threads of illusion from the colorful tapestry of life is a monumental project today because fact and fiction have tied themselves into a lover's knot. A deceptive Venus-Neptune square fuels your dreams while clouding the truth, especially when you project your desires onto someone else. Your infatuation may not be grounded in reality, so enjoy the experience without making any serious commitments. Thankfully, fantasy can help you survive in the mundane world as long as you know when to be real.

You may overestimate the value of people and objects today, making it wise to spend your love and money with caution now. Illusory Neptune forms a stressful square to accountable Venus in your 12th House of Fantasy, prompting you to merge your dreams with reality. You might be overcome with desire, risking recent gains for the exhilaration of a passing pleasure. If your expectations are too high you will need to rein them in before you make a fool out of yourself. Alexander Pope wrote, "To err is human; to forgive divine."

Balancing your dreams with the tangible needs of others is a complicated puzzle today. Romantic fantasies can be particularly alluring yet disorienting while sweet Venus in your 11th House of Friends forms a confusing square to surreal Neptune. Nevertheless, you're ultra-sensitive to others now and one offhand comment might be enough to trigger your insecurities. Letting go of old fears empowers you to embrace the present moment with confidence.

Concentrating on monotonous work tasks can be quite a challenge when you're so inspired by vivid dreams, beautiful objects and fascinating ideas. Sensual Venus squares glamorous Neptune, activating your imagination while weakening your sense of practicality. Your current attractions may be ill-advised because you could be susceptible to deception now. Imagining all the possibilities of love in your life is healthy unless you make the false assumption that every dream will come true.

Although responsibilities continue to pile up at work today, you're still tempted to skip out for a long lunch or a walk in the park. You may dream and scheme about running away even if it's not a smart idea. Thankfully, the closer you get to your planned escape, the more you doubt the wisdom of your move. You don't need to do anything drastic to find pleasure now. Sometimes, just visualizing a serene setting is enough to reduce the pressure. Poet Wallace Stevens wrote, "Imagination is the power of the mind over the possibilities of things."

You find it easier to take a positive stance on nearly any question today. However, it would be a mistake for someone to judge you as being overly optimistic. Although you wish there was a silver lining to every cloud, you lean toward a more pragmatic perspective. You can't get away with pie-in-the-sky thinking now; everything must crystallize into reality or you're not interested in spending your time or money on it. Philosopher Albert Camus wrote, "Life is the sum of all your choices."

You might take a professional obligation seriously only after kicking and screaming in protest. But whether or not you put on a show to convey your displeasure, you're unlikely to be happy about having to narrowly focus your attention and make specific things happen. Unfortunately, being a grown adult comes with its responsibilities and sacrifices. Stop complaining and get to work. A bad attitude is like a flat tire, you can't go anywhere until you change it.

You don't have to venture very far to find satisfaction today. Although your home and family life rewards you with a strong source of connection to your soul, tentatively stepping out may be the best thing you can do. Nevertheless, it's crucial to stay within your comfort zone now, because it will be harder to relax if you're trying to manage many complicated variables. But going too far too fast can create a backlash that could send you to the nearest couch to take a nap. Mystic Thomas Merton wrote, "Happiness is not a matter of intensity, but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony."

You can effortlessly turn on the charm now and those around you will fall under your spell. Nevertheless, giving your plan some forethought today enables you to muster support from the very same people who were previously talking behind your back. It's fine to confront an issue directly as long as you don't slip into an interrogator or prosecutor role. Paradoxically, you gain strength by adopting a gentler approach. Sincerity is your secret weapon for success.

You may be more fastidious than anyone else you know, but your willingness to let go of your need for perfection can be the catalyst for a magical day. Instead of wasting hours on the tiniest details, use your judgment skills to decide what is possible today. Naturally, you don't want to sign off on sloppy workmanship, but there is a point-of-no-return when your eye for quality overwhelms common sense. Rein in your desire to be overly critical; everyone will thank you for it in the long run.

You can't miss today when it comes to setting your goals. In fact, your charismatic manner captivates the imagination of everyone you encounter and easily enrolls their assistance in your latest project. But you might leave out some of your story when soliciting other people's participation because you want the support of the community. However, one insignificant white lie will, inevitably, lead to others. You don't have to remember anything if you tell the truth from the start.

You possess the magic keys to the door of prosperity today; all you need to do is open the lock and step through the portal. Making money is simple when you first become involved, however, the work begins once you're on the other side and accept the new opportunity. What appeared to be Easy Street turns out to be No-Free-Lunch Boulevard. Grit your teeth, hunker down and keep your eyes on the prize. Your intention is the most powerful tool at your disposal, so use it with care and precision.

Your social life is a source of joy these days, especially if your friends go out of the way to express their love or affection. But something is brewing behind the good news and you feel its presence, whether or not you can discern its origin or form. Denial is not advised today, but neither is digging too deep. If you start lifting up rocks to see what's under them, you're going to find something unpleasant sooner or later. Curiosity is a double-edged sword.

Rewards at work arrive without any sort of warning today, catching you off guard. However, once people start to recognize your ongoing contributions, you begin to grow uncomfortable with the prospect of needing to deliver more of the same. Your optimism in the here and now might be soaring, but your ponderous concern about the next wave of events has you secretly worried. Instead of focusing on the unknown future, demonstrate your positivity in the present moment.

It's as if you're a wolf in sheep's clothing today. The words you speak reflect your current air of self-confidence but they don't paint the entire picture. You could talk about an unpleasant subject and others still might walk away smiling. They hear what you say in a context that puts a shiny surface on your analysis now. Nevertheless, your messages are like metaphysical time bombs that amplify power until they release the pent-up tension. As President Theodore Roosevelt said, "Speak softly and carry a big stick."

No matter how critical people are when judging your work performance today, you still might see things from a wider perspective. But your ability to sense the universal energy doesn't take away from the value of the feedback you receive now. Rather than assuming a defensive posture, open your heart and listen. If you can feel the love instead of focusing on your mistakes, the chances for personal growth improve. Maya Angelou wrote, "Do the best you can until you know better. Then, when you know better, do better."

You are tired of all the personal and political unrest and may finally decide to do something about it today. You might believe that the best place to start is to address a relationship issue directly. Unfortunately, your well-intended words could have a surprising impact, leaving you rattled and unsure of your next move. Go ahead and share your perspective, but avoid needless accusations and extreme solutions. Control what you can and confront what you can't.

Your efforts to make amends with your coworkers go a long way today toward settling any unpleasant dynamics. However, soothing words are not enough to fix the underlying issues that will still need to be sorted out in the days ahead. Nevertheless, anything you can do now to bring people on the opposite sides of a conflict closer together is certainly worth your time. As human rights activist Dorothy Thomas said, "Peace is not the absence of conflict but the ability to cope with it."

Separating your personal needs from the larger problems that are brewing is no easy task today. The Moon's shift into your 5th House of Self-Expression compels you to over-personalize your experiences. Your emotions are significant signals that demand your attention, but there are times when it's wise for the head to overrule the heart. John Churton Collins wrote, "Half our mistakes in life arise from feeling where we ought to think, and thinking where we ought to feel."

You're not sure who to believe now because you can see both sides of an emotional squabble. However, you want to support one person or another because you're not fully at ease with the ambiguity of sitting on the fence. You might even reach a point where you're ready to pick an ally even if you're not convinced that your choice is the right one. You just want resolution at any cost. Nevertheless, Emily Dickinson advised, "Dwell in possibility." Resist your urge to settle the tension before the time is right.

You are an ambassador of goodwill today as the friendly Libra Moon hangs out in your 3rd House of Communication. You are prepared to step into the middle of a verbal storm in order to negotiate an equitable outcome. Nevertheless, your own feelings could flip dramatically if someone inadvertently pushes your emotional buttons. Do whatever you can to cultivate peace, but observe your reactions in the process. Staying balanced in the midst of chaos requires self-awareness and a healthy sense of humor.

You can put your sharp analytical skills to work today by examining all the possible options for increasing your income in the weeks ahead. Your clarity is your ally because you can see things as they exist now rather than how you wish them to be. The Moon's visit to your 2nd House of Money gives you the disciplined perspective that's required to make intelligent choices. But don't put off a decision or the moment of truth will pass you by.

You might be worried that there are some difficult days looming in the immediate future and you can imagine the worst-case scenarios all too clearly. Fortunately, you could do something now that will minimize any struggles ahead. But don't waste time analyzing all your alternatives when you can still take proactive measures. As Jim Morrison sang, "The time to hesitate is through." Any positive actions today will go a long way to creating a better tomorrow.

You are a force to be reckoned with today, even if your confidence is flagging. The Moon's presence in your 12th House of Invisibility might prompt you to bury your head in the sand and hope everyone just leaves you alone. However, an incisive Sun-Mercury conjunction in your perceptive sign gives you the power to use your words like sharpened weapons. Fight for peace, not war; victory is yours if you put your mind to it.

You might not trust your intuition when it's giving you contradictory messages. On one hand, you're feeling the energy lighten today and can't quite wipe the smile off your face. On the other hand, there's a sinking sensation in the pit of your stomach that tells you not to be distracted by the good news. Both perspectives are likely true. Accept the current wave of optimism without taking your eyes off the main event. You'll come out of this with flying colors if you expect the best and prepare for the worst.

You want your coworkers to know how much you respect them and that you are willing to do whatever you can to support their endeavors. But there are specific tasks that must be completed and responsibilities won't disappear just because you're feeling emotionally vulnerable. Fortunately, you can work both ends of the spectrum now. There's no need to deny your feelings; you can demonstrate compassion while still being an effective leader or team player. Author Janine Benyus writes, "Cooperation is the most natural thing in the world."

You may harbor dreams of escaping your current obligations and heading out on a great adventure. However, you are so needed by others at home or work that you cannot possibly go anywhere at this time. Oddly enough, you might not feel as your family and associates appreciate your contributions. Don't fall victim to your own doubt or you might notice things to support your negativity. Just keep on task and you will see the results of your current determination soon enough. Remember, you can't live a positive life with a negative mind.

You want to get to the bottom of a mystery today, but something tells you it's better to leave a sleeping dog alone. Nevertheless, you may need to traverse some rough emotional water to reach the smooth seas ahead. There's no reason to talk yourself out of taking a journey into the depths of your subconscious, even if you're afraid of what you might discover. The devil you know is more easily tamed than the devil you don't.

The energetic imbalances of the day have your name written all over them. Everyone seems to be reminding you that it's your high-strung nervous system that's wacky, not the world. But you already know better than to push the blame back on others. Consciously channeling your energy toward a work project or a creative endeavor enables you to achieve impressive results. As author Eve Sawyer wrote, "Never underestimate the power of passion."

The temptation of embarking on an amazing adventure is particularly enticing now, but most of you Bulls might still prefer to stay home where your creature comforts are readily available. Nevertheless, the idea of doing something extraordinarily different lingers in the back of your mind, even if you choose not to share your thoughts with anyone. However, it isn't in your best interest to suppress actions that could bring you happiness. Rather than taking an all-or-nothing approach today, find a way to express your freedom without upsetting the applecart.

You are bursting at the seams with restlessness, making it a chore to concentrate on work today. But your jumpy nerves must be contained so you can follow through on your commitments. There are two possibilities; blow off your obligations and let the chips fall as they may or use your willpower and refocus on the task at hand. Thankfully, you possess a deep reserve of determination now if you're willing to make the effort.

You can't rely on others to follow your script today, even if they promised to play a supporting role in your movie. It's as if reality is testing you to see how you will respond when someone changes the plot without consulting you first. But this twist may be good news in a misleading package. Instead of worrying about what might be lost, think about what could be gained as you are freed from unnecessary restraints. Galileo wrote, "Passion is the genesis of genius."

You appear more committed than ever to accomplish your objectives today, but your strong intentions could backfire if you're not flexible in your methods. Changing circumstances prompt you to realize that finishing your work will be more challenging than you thought. Anxiety may lead to panic, tempting you to overreact or take an unnecessary risk. The truth is that it's better to be methodical and fall slightly short of your destination than to act impulsively and miss your target completely. Entrepreneur Jim Rohn wrote, "Success is steady progress toward one's goals."

You are willing to go the extra mile today in order to demonstrate your competence in everything you do. But unknown forces seem to be messing with your progress, requiring you to work even harder to get anything done at all. Don't get discouraged or you might lose precious ground. Keep a positive attitude no matter how many lemons life hands you now. Your unwavering focus on your goals will prove what you can do once you make a solid commitment. When the going gets tough, the tough get going.

Plans involving someone else might unravel today when a coworker or partner goes rogue without prior notice. Once you recover from your initial shock, you must decide what to do. Your goals may remain the same, but your route needs to change since the old path is gone. The sooner you let go of the idea of a creative collaboration, the sooner you can get down to business. You'll make more progress if you go it alone now; it's better to walk by yourself than with a crowd going in the wrong direction.

Surprisingly, hidden agendas are out in the open today. It's like you were happily working in a dark room and then suddenly a bright light is turned on without warning. Don't waste energy denying what everyone can see in plain sight. Instead, embrace your dreams with such gusto that others can't help but support your aspirations. You're more likely to reach your goals if you have a team on your side, even if the process is unexpected. Sometimes what you're looking for comes when you're not looking at all.

What you see is not what you get today. Your future appears promising while the Moon dances with propitious Jupiter in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. But erratic interference can temporarily waylay your dreams of Utopia. Nevertheless, it's not as bad as it seems at first if things fall apart. Don't squander your energy by trying to stop the inevitable. Instead, laugh when the house of cards tumbles down. It's better in the long run to rebuild from scratch now than to bolster a structure that was inferior from the beginning.

It's rather effortless to remain emotionally detached from a specific outcome at your job because you can see things from multiple points of view now. However, unpredictable Uranus squares warrior Mars in your methodical sign, indicating your professional trajectory could change in ways you can't imagine. Avoid the trap of playing it safe by holding onto the past. The alarm is sounding today; the future is calling. Answer the phone before the moment passes.

People may be annoyed with you today because your behavior is so unreliable. Unfortunately, their cautionary words or emotional manipulation can't alter your actions. You are being informed from a deep and resonant place within your subconscious. You're tired of feeling like there's something more beyond the comfortable rut of daily repetition. You're just waiting for someone to give you a good reason to make your move. However, you can't justify biding your time any longer. Strike while the iron is hot or live with a tinge of regret.

Working as part of a team can be a mixed blessing now. Others seem to have their minds made up and you don't necessarily agree with them. In fact, you might feel as if your core values prevent you from supporting the current direction of the group. Although speaking your truth will be inconvenient, it is necessary to clear the air so everyone knows exactly where you stand. Take the moral high ground by giving others the benefit of the doubt.

Although you're known for initiating action without a lot of fanfare, setting your plans into motion seems like an uphill battle now. Only yesterday you couldn't find a reason to say no; today you might not be able to say yes. Your current self-restraint is a blessing as long as you don't take it too far. Thoughtfully consider all the logical reasons to keep your big ideas to yourself. But continue to feed your dreams for they will still fuel your next great adventure when you're ready.

What seems like a simple financial decision grows more complicated if a partner or friend voices disapproval of your current priorities. But it's not just someone's negative judgment that bothers you now, because it feels as if their emotional support is being withheld, too. There's no reason to overreact by turning this minor disagreement into a major drama. In a few days you won't even be able to remember what happened if you don't stir the pot today.

A significant relationship might be going through an emotionally volatile phase now as adjustments are being made to accommodate a change in circumstances. It feels as if you can't count on the love and support from someone you believed to be a close ally. However, it's your reaction to their behavior that could have the greatest negative impact. Don't aggravate the situation by withdrawing out of fear. Psychologist Brene Brown writes, "Vulnerability is the most accurate measure of courage."

Making healthy improvements in your lifestyle doesn't have to be as overwhelming as you imagine. Don't toss the baby out with the bathwater and change so much at once that your daily routine is thrown into chaos. Instead, take advantage of restrictive Saturn's alignment with sweet Venus by eliminating one unhealthy indulgence of your choice. A single modification that endures is better than many that don't.

A day of recovery and integration follows a recent opening of your heart in a vulnerable situation. Needless to say, reestablishing boundaries may be necessary, but doesn't feel as warm and fuzzy as tearing them down. It's not easy to express your emotions while a constrictive Venus-Saturn conjunction subdues the energy in your 5th House of Romance. Nevertheless, you can learn an important lesson  if you're willing to listen to the universe now; sometimes waiting for long-term satisfaction is more fulfilling than short-lived gratification.

Feeling at home is challenging today, even if your domestic situation is a happy one. Little disagreements with a family member are distracting; unexpressed emotions create hidden vortexes of energy that can pull you down. Trying to overcome unspoken negativity is like fighting your way out of quicksand. Stop struggling and accept where you are. Slow and purposeful movements are more productive than madly kicking and flailing your arms around like a panic-struck victim. Everything improves as soon as you change your frame of reference.

It's one thing to create a grand life plan; it's something else to explain your ideas to another person today. Sobering Saturn squashes vulnerable Venus in your 3rd House of Communication, stopping you from saying anything about your dreams for the future. You might struggle to find the right words, only to realize they can't convey your vision the way you see it unfolding in your mind's eye. Believe it or not, the only limits you have are the limits inside of your head.

There's no question at all about where you stand on a particular matter today. When push comes to shove, you're willing to demonstrate your commitment to your core values without regard to the emotional price you might have to pay. Honoring a strong conviction is admirable as long as it doesn't create an insurmountable schism between you and those you love. Reassess your needs and compare them to your beliefs before making choices that are not easy to undo.

Your friends and relatives may wonder if you're okay today if you seem more somber than your regular free-spirited self. Stoic Saturn prevents romantic Venus from showing her playful side now; lighthearted flirtation is replaced by heavyweight philosophy. However, what others think of you is less important than how you feel about yourself. Don't fall into Saturn's steel trap by alienating your closest allies. Find ways to show your serious nature without making your loved ones feel responsible for your happiness.

You might feel the weight of the world on your shoulders today, but have no particular reason for taking on all this heaviness. It's as if you can't separate your personal feelings from global problems. Instead of just moping your way through the weekend, take some time to delve into your malaise to figure out what's wrong. Confronting the negativity may be enough to banish it from your current experience. There's no magical fix if your perceptions are accurate, but you'll be surprised at how quickly the sky clears once you change your attitude.

Unfortunately, you lose touch with your own sense of purpose when you feel cut off from your support network. Today's austere Venus-Saturn conjunction lands in your 11th House of Community, placing an artificial wall between you and your coworkers, friends and family. But retreating from the crowd only feeds into your lack of confidence. Acknowledge the current social limitations while realizing they are only temporary restraints.
