The moment you let go is the moment you will find freedom.

Although you might have the weekend off to relax, you could end up obsessing about a difficult change of dynamics on the job. Perhaps a recent shift in the political landscape has left you feeling insecure about your future. Or, maybe you're just realizing how much work it will take to accomplish your career objectives. Your assessment is probably accurate, but your reaction is likely based on an irrational fear of failure. Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.

You are hitting the restart button today to align an intimate partnership with your dreams. Although a new direction is favored, it's possible to begin with a clean slate while still in a familiar relationship. Unlike the leopard that can't change its spots, you can alter your position on an important subject or emotionally transform within an existing structure. The passionate Scorpio New Moon triggers your 8th House of Deep Sharing, prompting you to seek more spiritual channels of expression in all facets of your life. Picasso wrote, "The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away."

You might overreact to someone's emotional intensity today without even realizing that your feelings are so rigid. However, you can make progress toward reaching your dreams if you have the courage to entertain alternative possibilities. The fixed Scorpio New Moon occupies your 7th House of Others, making it look like someone else is the one who is so obstinate. Nevertheless, taking responsibility for your own role in any relationship improves the chances for a satisfactory outcome.

No matter what anyone tells you, imagining a healthier lifestyle isn't enough to manifest one. However, envisioning a daily schedule that includes proper diet, sufficient exercise and mental relaxation can set you off in the right direction as long as you're willing to take the next steps. Fortunately, the Scorpio New Moon falls in your 6th House of Routine, empowering you to stabilize the patterns you put into motion now. A Yiddish proverb warns, "Bad habits are easier to abandon today than tomorrow."

Your imagination can transport you to magical places that raise the stakes in the game of life. Your fantasies are the driving force behind all that you do today, yet they also set the tone for the days ahead. The Scorpio New Moon activates your 5th House of Self-Expression, but rather than telling it like it is, you're more apt to share what you see for the future. Paradoxically, looking into the shadows is not a dark experience because the light of your awareness empowers you to co-create your future according to your highest hopes.

It's tempting to look at your past through a warped lens today, remembering those interactions that left a lasting emotional imprint. But your memory is altering the events, glorifying the toughest times and or turning other moments into melodramas. Nevertheless, the Scorpio New Moon's presence in your 4th House of Roots is not about getting distracted by gazing in the rearview mirror. Taking one more glance back at your origins is most useful if you learn from your history and apply the lessons where they are relevant now.

Managing your daily schedule now creates stress because you prefer to fly by the seat of your pants than write everything down as you are usually known to do. But attending to details is not your modus operandi when surreal Neptune trines the Scorpio New Moon in your 3rd House of Communication. Rather than trying to keep up the appearance of accuracy, give yourself permission to drift off into your dreams, for they are creating the colorful threads that will be woven into your future.

Although you may be recovering from an emotionally difficult experience, you can bounce back with great resolve today. The transformational Scorpio New Moon converses with talkative Mercury in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, encouraging you to share your inner process with someone you trust. Involving others lifts your spirits by allowing you to spin an imaginative story around the actual facts. Reframing your recent developments helps you see them in a more positive light.

You are no stranger to the far reaches of your own subconscious. The evolutionary Scorpio New Moon energizes your 1st House of Self, touching you with emotional intensity that fuels profound change. But its connection with spiritual Neptune pulls you out of your personal story and sets you into a more universal framework where everything has cosmic significance. However, you are still the central character in your play, so bring the focus back to your heart. You are growing and morphing in ways you do not yet understand. Don't give up; significant shifts take time.

You have a suspicion that the current events in your life are more important than they seem. In fact, you might believe that your behavior could ensure your happiness or prevent it. However, it's tricky to know what's really happening while the mysterious Scorpio New Moon intensifies your 12th House of Destiny. You're only capable of seeing your dreams, whether you're awake or asleep, so don't confuse your vision with the truth. Nevertheless, as author Colin Wilson wrote, "Your imagination should be used not to escape reality but to create it."

Although there are numerous forks in the road, you have a one-track mind as you stare at the top of the mountain. The insistent Scorpio New Moon highlights your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, motivating you to cling to your vision without regard to the circumstances you encounter. Nevertheless, it turns out that your own imagination is more of a distraction than you realize. Dreaming your future is a viable plan as long as you know where the truth ends and your fantasies begin.

You're fiercely ambitious about achieving an important life objective over the coming weeks and you're not willing to settle for less. Your powerful intentions are you secret weapon as the magnetic Scorpio Moon energizes your 10th House of Public Recognition. Don't allow anyone else's negativity interfere with your dreams. Trust your psychic powers to steer you in the direction you need to go.

You can believe in something with such an unwavering intensity that your intention alters the fabric of reality. Clever Mercury aligns with the unwavering Scorpio New Moon in your 9th House of Big Ideas, inflating your plans until they are too grand to fit into your life. However, visionary Neptune is working behind the scene, setting the stage for real magic to occur. Belief in your own dreams is such a powerful force now that nothing can prevent them from coming true.

You can conjure up a fantastic future by using creative visualization today. In fact, your thoughts possess the power to positively influence current events as long as you stay acutely aware of the difference between fantasy and reality. Grounding your hopes in truth anchors them to the present moment. Planting practical seeds in the fertile soil of your imagination is an act of magic, but placing your faith in the unattainable will only lead to disappointment. Arthur Ashe said, "Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can."

Someone may deceive you today, but on closer analysis you realize it was your own desire for a happy outcome that led you astray. You hear what you want to believe, causing you to misunderstand a straightforward message. Thankfully, accepting the truth quickly minimizes the potential damage. Make whatever modifications are required before your assumptions pull you too far off track. Heed the proverb, "Listen to advice and accept correction; then, in the end you will be wise."

Balancing your playful approach to life with more serious concerns at work can be quite stressful today. Perhaps your desire to deepen a professional partnership creates an awkward situation if the other person is less committed than you. Or, maybe your fear of getting in over your head in an intimate relationship adds to your anxiety. In either case, acknowledge the undeniable facts by engaging in an honest dialogue. Your willingness to explore unknown territory now will advance your standing with those you love and respect.

Although you may take yourself pretty seriously, your role at work is multidimensional today. Naturally, demonstrating your responsible nature is beneficial for your reputation, but the interpersonal dynamics are in flux. Meeting your obligations is your first call of duty yet being a good employee or boss doesn't preclude having a little fun, too. New possibilities beckon on the horizon, but you still must meet your previous commitments. Nevertheless, instead of fretting about what you should or shouldn't do, just take care of business before expressing what's in your heart.

Your work schedule is overbooked with so many things to do that you don't have much time to pursue more creative endeavors. You might need to temporarily resign yourself to curtailing your activities, even if it means keeping to yourself today. Thankfully, your fantasies offer you a pleasant escape route even if they're not the same as reality. Slip away and enjoy your daydreams without making a big deal about it now. Just remember that the real world and all your responsibilities await your return.

You might encounter a situation that makes you doubt your own logic today. Since you favor an analytical approach when it comes to forming your conclusions, it may surprise you that you are placing so much emphasis on your intuition now. Unfortunately, validating a gut feeling can be tricky, causing you to question your own assumptions. Listen to your inner voice for guidance but weigh and balance the bottom line against the known facts for the best results.

Although you may believe your life trajectory is right on target, you're also aware that you're not as certain about your core values as you once thought. You might try to justify old beliefs that no longer serve you, but you could miss an unexpected opportunity today if you're stuck in the past. Don't look back; start writing the next chapter of your life by honoring your dreams and progressing toward them page by page.

You're inclined to keep silent today if someone complains about the volatile financial climate or political issues beyond their control. However, your reticence to engage in a discussion about social matters is not a reflection of your lack of interest. Rather, you're so deeply concerned that you attempt to avoid the subject because it gets your blood boiling. Thankfully, the news of the day doesn't restrain the magical wanderings of your imagination, so share your positive visions rather than whining about current problems. Your uplifting dreams of change inspire others more than you realize.

Juggling other people's expectations with your need for meaning can be an impossible feat today. It feels like a familiar old story when your friends assume something's wrong because you don't want to join in the fun. But you're not interested in arbitrarily shifting into party mode just to satisfy someone else's wishes. Nevertheless, if you believe a social engagement will provide an opportunity to establish a meaningful connection, say yes before the chance slips through your fingers. Eckhart Tolle wrote, "Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have."

The future is looking brighter day by day, yet you're still unable to jump into the next big thing until you've wrapped up old business. Your imagination is working overtime, but it could be more of a hindrance now than a source of inspiration. Contributing to a complex project behind the scenes may be your most strategic move because it sets the stage for your transition into something new. Envision the life you wish to experience, but be ready to follow through with the necessary sweat equity to make your dreams come true.

You are still drifting in and out of your fantasies today, but at least you can now discern the difference between your unrealistic wishes and concrete realities. Your current gift is your ability to paint in the specific details of your future in your favorite colors, without confusing your dreams with the mundane issues on your plate. Nevertheless, you're the artist and only you can decide what to create. If you choose carefully, your masterpiece will determine the texture of your life.

Your experiences are tinted by your desires today, substantially altering your perceptions. Unfortunately, you may be unable to see your world in a clear light. Instead, you can easily confuse your own thoughts and feelings with objective reality. Nevertheless, your daydreams are rich with signs and symbols about your future, so don't discount your psychic visions prematurely. Setting aside a specific block of time to lose yourself in your imagination can revitalize your spirit for the more serious work at hand.

You're back in your own element today, but your enthusiasm could take you for a wild ride before you know it. It's as if you've finally escaped from your cage and are so overjoyed that you're ready for anything. However, you are so quick to react that you might jump to erroneous conclusions based on your wishes rather than the actual circumstances. Optimism is healthy when warranted, but it makes more sense now to step back from the edge of the cliff so you're not tempted to try your hand at flying. Setting new goals solidifies your zest for life.

You might lose touch with your common sense today if you think you are invincible. Normally, you're more cautious in your assessment of the future, but your fantasies have taken on a life of their own and may be indistinguishable from reality now. Set aside a few minutes to reestablish your center of gravity by remembering your determined Bullish nature works best when you're focusing on your basic needs. Simplicity is beautiful.

You are torn between your ambitious plans and someone's more cautious approach today. You are aware of the potential in an opportunity, but it may be more a product of your imagination than the actual circumstances. Nevertheless, pessimism doesn't serve you well because you could miss a chance to grab the brass ring. Follow the middle path that makes the most of the current situation without building it up into the greatest thing since the invention of sliced bread. As author Gary Zukav wrote, "Practice moderation in all things except love."

You are emotionally secure in your inner world today yet you're eager to extend outward into new territory. Oddly, taking on a larger-than-life project isn't intimidating now. In fact, your confidence is soaring, possibly leading you to accept more responsibility than you can manage. There's no need to push yourself to extremes to prove your competence. Acknowledging your limitations is healthier than setting yourself up for failure.

You're not so driven to be in the spotlight today, which blesses you with some much-needed privacy. You're actually relieved if everyone's eyes are not following your every move. Flying beneath the radar can be exhilarating because it relieves you of the responsibility of needing to justify your actions. This invisibility cloak is a gift from the cosmos, so use it wisely. Plan a luxurious excursion into the realm of fantasy so you can gather sufficient inspiration to fuel another successful round in the mundane world.

There's a certain freedom associated with your inner journey now that the independent Sagittarius Moon is traveling through your 4th House of Home and Family. But your unwillingness to share your feelings can create an entirely new set of problems. Everyone has assumptions about what makes a perfect relationship, but someone else's projections don't necessarily support your needs. Take a calculated risk and initiate a discussion about your unexpressed emotions. Talking about your desires opens the door of opportunity that leads to heartfelt satisfaction.

It's apparent that you can't fit much more into your day, but that's not going to stop you from trying now. Unfortunately, you might encounter the straw that breaks the camel's back if you continue to stack activities one on top of another today. Recognizing your current penchant for fantasy helps you bring your life back into proper perspective as you consider the limitations of the clock. Time -- or the lack of it -- has a wonderful way of showing us what really matters.

Not only does your confidence return today, it soars on the wings of your thoughts. However, you want to remain connected with the more profound issues that touch your heart now. Thankfully, you can hold multiple views of reality simultaneously while balancing on the edge between reason and imagination. Leaning too far one way or the other warps your perspective and prevents you from establishing equilibrium. Living in two worlds keeps you whole.

The restraints that tethered you to an intense emotional issue have finally been cut. But your newfound independence comes with a hidden cost, especially now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign, reminding you of your past. You might feel as if you've already paid the price and should be totally free to pursue your new adventures. Unfortunately, you're still more attached to unfulfilled desires than you thought. As Paulo Coelho wrote, "It takes a huge effort to free yourself from memory."

Continuing your methodical climb to the pinnacle of success becomes more complicated today because you might lose interest in your worldly goals. Dreams of material prosperity are temporarily replaced by visions of enlightenment as the reflective Moon trips into your 12th House of Spirituality. You must make choices now about which path to follow, but don't succumb to the passionate drive of red-hot Mars since his certainty is not to be trusted now. Keep your priorities straight. It's not about how much you accumulate, but how much you enjoy life that creates happiness.

You are no longer living in the present moment since the adventurous Sagittarius Moon is humming in your 11th House of the Future. Your vivid fantasies encourage you to dream large about where your current job will eventually lead. Making plans is half the fun now, since you can attend to the mundane parts of your life while still thinking about all the amazing possibilities down the road. Visionary activist Caroline Casey says, "Imagination lays down the tracks for the reality train to follow."

You are as happy as a fish swimming in the safety of a school today, even if you are normally a solo act. Not only do you gain emotional security when surrounded by so many like-spirited members of your community, it truly feels ecstatic when you can joyfully lose yourself in a crowd. As long as you keep up appearances, you're free in your mind to go anywhere you want. Jean Jacques Rousseau wrote, "The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless."

Although the central plot of your story may be unfolding as expected, you still need to take the time to reassess your plans for the next few months. You can no longer avoid an inconvenient truth that keeps you from moving forward. There's a point at which whatever you were trying to escape finds you anyhow. Stop running and see what you can discover once the noise settles down. Too much looking often blinds the eye that seeks yet never finds.

You might think you can cleverly skip over the most intense parts of a conversation with your close friend or lover. However, reality has other plans for you today. The cosmos requires you to attend to the deeper issues that are simmering close to the surface before pursuing more pleasurable experiences. Eventually, you will realize that there's a lesson for you to learn, but you still need to dig for the truth now; it won't come to you on its own. Taking personal responsibility is the most reliable path to success.

It's no fun when someone you respect fails to support your actions. You might misread the signals and believe that he or she is on your side only to uncover a significant source of negativity. Although you may think that the best way to overcome this resistance is to dance around it, it's better to confront the problem directly. But rather than wasting energy defending yourself today, just reevaluate your plans, make the necessary corrections and try again. You can improve your game now if you listen to the valuable feedback you receive and act on it decisively.

Maintaining your daily rhythm is more critical now if something isn't going just right. It's not the time to experiment with alternative methods or turn your world upside with a radical solution to a lingering problem. Fall back on your regular routine whether you are chasing wild geese, running into obstacles or just feeling a bit under the weather. Not only will you gain comfort from familiar patterns, you'll emerge stronger and more determined to reach your goals.

You have an important message to deliver today and won't let anyone stand in your way. Your creativity may seem stifled as the reflective Moon conjuncts austere Saturn in your 5th House of Self-Expression. You might be short on presentation magic, but your performance can still be awesome if your information is in order. Don't let the lack of fiery energy derail your success now. Set your intentions by establishing specific milestones and concentrating on manifesting your destiny.

You might hold your feelings a little closer to your chest today. Your insecurities are peaking at a critical point; your anxiety can actually prevent you from being as effective as you imagine. But self-restraint also works in your favor because emotional expression pulls you away from your regular duties. As long as you're busy defending your passions, you're not working productively on the job. Proactively putting your softer side on display empowers you to take responsibility for your feelings. Vulnerability is the gateway to intimacy.

Your morning will likely be totally different than your afternoon. Expansive energy encourages you to initiate lots of activity early in the day, but the Moon's hookup with sobering Saturn restrains your 3rd House of Communication, closing down conversations and impeding your overall productivity. Don't wait for a better time to deliver your message; the sooner you clear the air, the better everyone will feel. The early bird gets the worm.

You can be your own harshest critic, especially if you fall short of your plans to finish a specific project this morning. You may have too many things you want to accomplish, only to see the list grow longer rather than shorter throughout the day. In either case, you're not happy with your own performance today. But your self-criticism reaches a point where it's not helpful. You can decide to cut yourself some slack for your human failings or continue to beat yourself up. Nevertheless, it is said that out of suffering comes the strongest souls.

Your current moodiness gets on everyone's nerves today as you swing from hot to cold and right to left. But you actually believe that nothing is different and others are making a big deal out of a minor issue. Sooner or later you realize it's in your best interest to change some variables on your trajectory. Revealing your vulnerability can help, but it also could backfire if you say too much now. Share your fears with an appropriate audience, but stop before you take it to the point of no return.

Your current malaise is not apparent to those closest to you. In fact, the heavy Saturn-Moon conjunction falls in your 12th House of Invisibility, masking your emotions from the world. But you still may not know how to keep the negative energy from bottling up beneath the surface. Sometimes direct action is required; however, taking things out is the simplest solution to this irritating dilemma. Save your dramatic behavior for later; honesty is almost always the best policy. A good relationship starts with good communication.

You may think that your friends aren't living up to their end of the deal now while they might believe everything is copacetic. Unfortunately, interrogating others won't help you learn anything useful; it's probably better to just back away from social interactions until tomorrow if you're not feeling welcome today. Most of the time, an honest discussion bridges an emotional gulf, but now it's better to announce a temporary retreat. Start fresh again after you're feeling on top of your game.

Showing your enthusiasm at work isn't easy if you're not feeling aligned with your daily grind. You've been ruminating on the purpose of life lately, and may be concerned that your current job isn't supporting your overall life goals. But don't make any changes impulsively. It's wiser to stick it out for now while you continue to consider all your options. The results won't be favorable if you initiate action too soon. Make sure you have your plan locked in place before turning your life into a chaotic mess. Timing is everything.

You are off and running again without much to impede your progress today. However, you could sugarcoat reality, thinking you can get away with nearly anything now. You're tempted to evade a discussion about a sensitive topic so as to keep the momentum on your side. If you maintain integrity, your plans might just flow without so much as a speed bump. But if you push your luck or try to take an unproven shortcut, everything could fall apart pretty quickly. Honesty plus hard work equals success.

Someone might be rather demanding today when requesting your participation in a conversation that doesn't concern you directly. Your first inclination is to stay far away from drama, but you're aware of the service you could provide simply by being emotionally present. Fortunately, you're clear enough about your role as a helper that you won't likely get dragged in any deeper into the fray. Show up as an observer and give everyone a chance to air their grievances without interruption. Bob Marley said, "The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his ability to affect those around him positively."

You're often the first one to say yes to someone's crazy idea, but today it's everyone else who seems to be too cavalier in their judgments. You think that you are exercising common sense, only to be confronted by the over-permissive attitude of people who have nothing to lose in the situation. You're unsure if others are seeing the entire picture and worry they might make bad choices based upon their wildly optimistic outlook. You would prefer to stick with the safe bet and keep a low profile as you progress on your path. There isn't an easy answer to this dilemma; in reality, the truth is likely somewhere in between.

It's all too easy to rearrange the facts at work today and make a decision that leads you into trouble. You want to take advantage of every possibility because changes are necessary and you believe this moment of opportunity will not last. Your perceptions might be true, but you still have more time than you think. Instead of rushing into a new project or radically redirecting your career path, step back and take a few deep breaths first. Allow a full week to contemplate your next move. The additional time will give you an advantage that will make a big difference later on.

It's your day to shine by expressing exactly where you stand on a controversial issue. You might not stir up as much excitement as intended, but your words will carry enough power to change people's minds. However, don't tell others what to do; just state the facts as you know them and let everyone decide on his or her own terms. Moderate your eagerness to incite your audience to action. Planting thought bombs that explode old ways of thinking is more useful than pushing anyone to do anything drastic in the spur of the moment.

You might resist the urge to believe what you're told today even if the news is positive. You know that there is more to the story than meets the eye and want to gather more data before jumping to conclusions -- especially if everyone else already agrees upon the truth. Don't just hop onto the bandwagon because it's fun to be part of a joyful parade. Utilizing your skills of discernment helps you find the right answer, even if it's not the popular one. Pretty words are not always true, and true words are not always pretty.

Someone may share a totally off-the-wall idea and normally you would just acknowledge it and move on. However, this scheme could actually sound enticing enough today that you want to join in the fun. Nevertheless, what begins as a joyful journey could run into difficulties sooner than you think. It still might be the right decision but only time will tell. Just be prepared to work harder to make your collaboration a valuable experience for everyone involved. Hall of Famer Babe Ruth said, "It's hard to beat a person who never gives up."

Money may not grow on trees, yet you could plant seeds today that bear financial fruit. Whether a bold thought strikes with the suddenness of lightning or your inspiration comes from developing old ideas, you can turn a stroke of genius into profit if you are determined enough to take a calculated risk. However, rest assured you are not being offered a free lunch; you will need to work for what you now stand to gain.

If you can quiet your mind enough to hear someone else's voice today, your chances for success improve dramatically. However, you have a lot of creative notions and may attempt to pursue nearly all of them within the confines of your imagination. Nevertheless, there's a price to pay now if your own thoughts are loud enough to drown out those of your coworkers and friends. Listen with care and you might just learn what you need to know. Everyone you meet has something to teach you.

You can rely on your friends to tell you the truth today, even if you don't like what you hear. Nevertheless, knowing exactly what's happening empowers you to make better decisions throughout the day. Even if you are tempted to withdraw into your shell so you can work without distraction, don't create unnecessary distance between you and your staunchest supporters. The help you receive from those who really want the best for you can make all the difference in the world. It's not happiness that brings us gratitude; it's gratitude that brings us happiness.

Your motives aren't apparent to others now, but you're sure of your intentions, nonetheless. Instead of understanding your true nature, your coworkers are distracted by the breadth of your vision. They're excited by your unwavering optimism, but might not look hard enough to see past the surface. Meanwhile, you're on a mission with your heart set on accomplishing your goals, no matter what the cost. Your dedication is even more useful if it inspires your peers to strive for success. But ultimately, who you are is best revealed by what you do.

Your current career objectives are highly ambitious, yet some of them might not be grounded in reality. Paradoxically, it may not matter that your dreams are larger than life now, because there's a bit of magic blowing in the air that could give you a lift if you spread your wings. Don't be afraid of failure; you will never know what is possible unless you try. Life doesn't have a rewind button. Author Lewis Carroll wrote, "In the end, we only regret the chance we didn't take."

The pressure is turned up several notches because you want to show others what you can do today. You are usually ready to fight against anyone who questions your intentions, but you might not know what to do when you discover your biggest enemy now is you. Thankfully, you can change your attitude to reflect the fact that a past failure is not indicative of a current one. Most dreams don't happen overnight; if you believe in yourself anything is possible.

A slight loss of confidence isn't enough to deter your progress today because your unflappable determination enables you to hold onto your dreams through thick and thin. Nevertheless, someone's harsh criticism of your work might reawaken the residual pain from an early childhood rejection. Seeking approval from others is a waste of your precious time and energy. Your success is the sweetest revenge.

You're not the easiest person to get along with today, even if you decide that cooperation is a smart business strategy. Nevertheless, this no-nonsense approach sums up your current plan for success; you calculate every detail in your mind and then you act according to your best interests. Although a rational analysis of the facts is useful, it doesn't reveal all you need to know. Author Stephen Covey wrote, "The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities."

You need to choose your own direction today, rather than letting everyone else tell you what to do. The problem is that it would be easier to fit into someone else's plans than to reinvent the wheel and make up your own. However, conforming to another person's agenda isn't as satisfying as acting on creative impulses from within. Dr. Martha Friedman wrote, "Success based on anything but internal fulfillment is bound to be empty."

You're sure that you can achieve your goals now by sticking to your amazing new plan. You put a lot of effort into developing this sound strategy, but the real work is still in front of you as you attempt to turn an idea into reality. Don't panic if something slips out of your sphere of influence. Nevertheless, quitting is not a viable option, even if you run into a wall. Moderation on all fronts works to your advantage now. Rumi wrote, "The middle path is the way to wisdom."

You're quite hopeful about the possibility of working with someone you admire today. But their bright light may shine in a different dark corner than yours, leaving you to continue on your mission by yourself. Don't worry about what might have been; it's a moot point. Bring yourself back to the current reality for a check up on the viability of your aspirations. Put your ideas into motion without thinking about them forever. Author H. Jackson Brown, Jr. wrote, "Opportunity dances with those who are already on the dance floor."

You are standing on a solid foundation today and are capable of building the tallest tower without danger of it falling down. Nevertheless, negative self-judgments can steal your opportunity for success before you have the chance to make something big happen. Start slowly and methodically; continue to strengthen your base while you add on to your original idea. Bob Marley said, "You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice available."

You could do something at work today that others think is crazy. Nevertheless, the last laugh is yours because your unorthodox solution to a problem might just be the one that saves the day. Unfortunately, you will have to go against the grain to demonstrate the efficacy of your resolution to the current dilemma. Don't be afraid to stand up for your beliefs. No matter how it turns out, you will derive lasting satisfaction from doing what's right.

You're content to fall back and rely on your charm now that friendly Venus is in your sign. Unfortunately, her square to vulnerable Chiron in your 4th House of Family indicates a lack of support from those closest to you. Nevertheless, you can still turn this tricky situation around and even make some money in the process. But don't wait for others to rush to your assistance. They might eventually answer your request for help, but you'll already be done with your work if you play your cards right. Being your own hero is gratifying to your soul.

You're a bit hesitant to take a risk today, even if your calculations show that you have a great chance of beating the odds. Instead, you might hang back and wait until your possibilities improve. Don't just make a plan and execute it exactly as conceived. Listen carefully to your intuition while the Moon is in your sign. Your emotions are a bellwether for the future. If something feels right in your gut now, then act on your instinct before the moment passes.

Your identity is wrapped up in your career now, which has grown in ways you never imagined just a few short years ago. You may have a significant decision to make about your main source of income. Unfortunately, you might have to disagree with the thinking of your socially astute friends, which is a real dilemma since you don't want to alienate them. Nevertheless, as Gandhi said, "It's easy to stand with the crowd. It takes courage to stand alone."

You might not believe you deserve the current success you're experiencing at work these days. But this kind of self-effacing thinking isn't useful; in fact, it's probably not even true. Try to find the origin of your negativity and then make the connection with the present moment. However, you must also acknowledge what's different now. Once you see how the past doesn't control the present, you'll be free from it.

Exploring new territory with a friend or lover can be invigorating and could even pump new life into your relationship if it's lost some of its spice. You are in the mood to experiment while innovative Uranus in your pioneering sign stimulates pleasurable Venus in your 9th House of Adventure. Although your day won't likely go as planned, delightful events could arise unexpectedly if you're willing to stretch your limits. In the words of Peter Pan, "To infinity and beyond!"

It might not be such a simple task to keep your feelings in check today. In fact, you may be on the lookout for new forms of emotional connection when progressive Uranus trines sexy Venus. Fortunately, the practical Capricorn Moon can bring you back down to earth, but it may not be enough to convince you to accept the status quo. Author Arthur C. Clarke wrote, "The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible."

Freethinking friends make perfect allies in activities that can ultimately energize your spirit. Luckily, a harmonious trine between delicious Venus and maverick Uranus allows you to establish valuable connections without losing your sense of independence. Regrets are easily left behind today as you are released from previous agreements, giving you a chance to exercise your right to work and play in ways that are meaningful to you. Step outside the box; being different means you're courageous enough to be your authentic self, regardless of what others think.

Your friends may be extremely surprised by your unconventional behavior if you don't suppress some of your passions today. Nevertheless, you're being challenged by your unfulfilled needs to step out into the open in full view of others. Although you might take your own sweet time to reveal your feelings, you can't resist the desires of your heart for long, even if you wish you could remain anonymous. Thankfully, expressing yourself confidently wins you the respect of others.

You can make your radical ideas seem more compelling today by putting your heart into your presentation. People will praise you for your originality as you explore new forms of self-expression, fueled by a smooth trine from unorthodox Uranus to playful Venus in your 5th House of Creativity. Sketching a rough outline of your major goals gives you a strong foundation upon which to build your future. Nevertheless, trying to fill in too many details too soon slows you down. There's no reason to hold back when being innovative now; taking a chance enables you to spread your wings and soar.

You are very clear about what you want today. Although you wish everyone would intuitively know what you need while the Moon is moving through your 5th House of Love, you must come up with the words to explain your position. Nevertheless, the presence of vulnerable Venus in your 4th House of Home and Family encourages discretion rather than communication. But life is too short to hide your feelings; don't let logic stand in the way of your heart.

You're open to unusual forms of play today and your uninhibited approach attracts new people who find your fun-loving personality alluring. The cosmos is giving you permission to experience pleasure without commitment now. You can live comfortably in the moment and share your newfound sources of joy with equally open-minded individuals. C.S. Lewis wrote, "For the present is the point at which time touches eternity."

You're eager to explore new ways to break up the routine of your daily life and free yourself from old patterns. However, the earthy Capricorn Moon helps to settle your energy in spite of your current rebellious attitude. Nevertheless, the unfulfilled potential for positive change fills the air and encourages you to take a chance and reinvent yourself. The only real risk today is doing nothing at all.

You are all set to break a few social rules today because you believe you can have a blast without getting into too much trouble. A smooth trine from sensual Venus in your sign to wild Uranus encourages you to experiment with your sense of identity. Radically changing your appearance might attract extra attention and make your day more fun. Although you may think anything goes, instant karma could strike without warning if you aren't considerate of the feelings of others. Oscar Wilde wrote, "The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention."

You're excited to sink into your fantasies today, but tend to keep your mental explorations to yourself. Seductive Venus in your 12th House of Secrets harmonizes with wild and crazy Uranus, activating desires that are normally suppressed. A long-standing romantic possibility can spark the air with excitement even without saying a word. Although you might be attracted to something or someone that exists only within your mind, don't relinquish your dreams until you check out their viability in the real world.

You are quick to respond to unconventional sources of fun and are willing to try an irreverent approach to overcome someone's resistance. A brilliant Venus-Uranus trine inspires you to seek the enthusiastic support of your peers. Experimenting with alternative ways of interacting with others could produce surprising results today. Humanitarian Albert Schweitzer wrote, "Do something wonderful; people may imitate it."

Unexpected twists and turns can lure you off the beaten path today as unusual desires inspire your spontaneity. You might enjoy defying the rules now, but a momentary pleasure might cost more than you want to pay. Nevertheless, you're likely to enjoy yourself while the fun lasts as vivacious Venus forms a sweet trine with rebellious Uranus. Although irrepressible cravings embolden your behavior, you could astonish yourself and others with your current appetite for pleasure unless you set reasonable limits and stick to them.

You have a choice to make every time you open your mouth today. People take your words to heart so readily that your logic hits home more than you realize. Fortunately, a calm and measured approach soothes others while a more emotional message can be agitating or even upsetting. But don't try to convince anyone your plan will work for anyone else. Let each person decide their course of action without your outside interference. There are many paths up the mountain, but the view of the Moon from the top is the same.

You're wondering about your place in the world today and whether or not your life has a purpose beyond your little local sphere. You might attempt to demonstrate your wisdom to your friends by telling them what you would do in a similar situation. But don't be surprised if no one seems interested in hearing your suggestions now. The old proverb, "Never give advice unless asked" makes plenty of sense if you want to cultivate peace instead of conflict.

Trying to keep your mouth shut may be a losing battle today because every time someone says something, you have more details to add to the story. Unfortunately, your facts might not be relevant, even if you think it's necessary for everyone to know the truth. Oftentimes, he who has the most valuable information wins. Albert Einstein wisely said, "ninety-nine percent of genius is knowing what's important." All data is not created equal.

Your anger is stirred when someone tries to elicit your help today. Your reaction can be confusing to others because they don't understand the source of your annoyance. They expect you to jump right in with a practical perspective that sheds light on their dilemma. But you're upset that people think you should drop everything and bail them out with your expert advice. Nevertheless, it's wise to assist others in their time of need the best you can. You never know when you might need that shoulder to lean on.

It's as if you are using x-ray vision today to see right through someone's carefully constructed smokescreen and into their heart. Unfortunately, you may need to keep the truth to yourself if there's no one trustworthy you can lean on. Sometimes, it gets very lonely when you have no choice but to share a secret with a casual acquaintance. Nevertheless, you possess the determination to breakthrough barriers and reestablish solid connections with those closest to you. The power of love creates miracles.

The less deviation from your routine today, the easier it is for you to stay on track. You might even spend your time cleaning up a mess you made yesterday now that the storm has passed. It seems as if everyone wants you to tell them your plans for the future. Your tendency is to oversimplify a complex array of known facts, but today's interpersonal dynamics remain complicated. Luckily, your persistence solves the puzzle and leads to the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.

No matter how many unfinished chores linger on your plate today, you can't explore the exciting lands of relationship karma until you untangle the busyness of the day. Unfortunately, communication dynamics are blocked, increasing the level of difficulty you encounter when trying to explain your intentions to others. But don't just repeat your story if you're not understood. Let the ambiguity stand for now and try again once clarity returns tomorrow.

People are drawn in by your magnetic charm without realizing the intensity of your message. Mysterious cosmic currents empower your words with magical healing properties. But some of the power is derived from your lack of specificity today, forcing others to fill in your descriptions with details of their own. Ben Franklin wrote, "Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I may remember. Involve me and I learn."

It's tempting to spend your entire day on one soapbox or another because your words just seem to flow eloquently today. As much as you can sway the opinions of others, you might stir up more of a commotion than you intend. You want everyone to support your positions now, but you expect them to fall in line behind you. You're quite surprised when you see that so many people want to start their own parade instead of joining you in yours. Nevertheless, keep marching to the music inside your head; that's what counts the most.

It's as if your finger is on the zeitgeist of your network of friends and family today. You're not doing anything special, but your heightened sensitivity enables you to perceive the thoughts and feelings of others. You have a responsibility to use your psychic powers for the good of all, rather than for personal gain. As Lao Tsu wrote, "A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving."

You can feel the stress in your stomach beginning to churn and there doesn't seem to be anything you can do that will stop this process. You're stepping up to the mic and speaking publicly today on issues that concern you, your community and the environment. But you can be so dedicated to your cause that your extremist position could alienate the very same people you want as allies. Paradoxically, you will receive even more support when you speak from your heart and not from your head. Rumi wrote, "With life as short as a half-taken breath, don't plant anything but love."

You're aiming toward the future and are determined to mold it to your liking. Your main weapon is your ability to communicate and you're not afraid to rock the boat while delivering your message. Nevertheless, motivating others to think just like you is an exercise in futility. Everyone needs to bring their own perspective to the party and your job is to remind people to be true to themselves. Set an example by saying what's on your mind without diluting the truth.

You may be grinning from ear to ear today, even if you don't know why. Jolly Jupiter encourages your optimism by making everything appear better than it is in reality. However, you ultimately remain a pragmatist. You have the gift of heightened charm now, along with the ability to follow through with deliberate action. You are a force to be reckoned with in business or in love. Unfortunately, you could lack motivation, so don't let your present complacency lull you into laziness. You could miss an amazing opportunity because it looks like work.

Your social skills are on point now and your responsible approach to relationships enhances your personal life. Your desire to create art, establish a new enterprise or organize a special event can fill you with irrepressible passion. Whatever attracts you now becomes a significant inspiration that brings you lasting pleasure while also earning you well-deserved respect. Ralph Waldo Emerson wrote, "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm."

You might feel more accepted and appreciated now than you think you deserve. But don't allow a little snag of insecurity to ruin a wonderful experience today. Although a magical connection between resourceful Venus and joyous Jupiter blesses you with an abundance of what you love, you can't escape from the deeper issues that lurk behind everyone's smile. Nevertheless, the spirit of generosity is strong, so try to overlook your worries that cast a cloud on this otherwise magical day. As Monty Python sings, "Always look on the bright side of life."

Luck is on your side today and you don't even need to wave a magic wand to make your wishes come true. Charming Venus stimulates auspicious Jupiter now, bestowing your life with harmony and grace. Fortunately, relying on common sense works effectively as you establish the authority needed to further your cause. People respond to you in a friendly manner, encouraging you to share more of yourself than usual. Helen Keller wrote, "Be happy with what you have while working for what you want."

You can't help but whistle a happy tune today whether you experience the loveliness of life through beautiful music or art, magical romance or the feeling of sweet satisfaction that comes from a job well done. Although sensual Venus combines with joyful Jupiter to create many memorable moments, an intense Sun-Pluto sextile adds gravity to an otherwise lightweight event. You are not content to indulge in pleasure without also delving into the shadows. Francis Bacon wrote, "In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present."

The temptation of excess might distract you from your real work today, so it's crucial to find a balance between enjoying yourself and fulfilling your obligations on the job or at home. Even if your feelings are still developing, go ahead and express them anyhow. Sensual Venus holds the key to your current happiness; trust your instincts and move sensibly towards that which attracts you. Thankfully, you're safely swimming in protected emotional waters, so it's likely that a lovely encounter will manifest as financially profitable or romantically delicious. No risk, no reward.

You seem to possess the Midas touch today and can turn perfectly normal situations into lucrative ones. A creative connection between valuable Venus and propitious Jupiter also arouses your desires and is likely to bring you the sweet rewards of love or other sensual delights. But issues of money or love are more complex while passionate Pluto is also in the picture. Revealing your innermost fears and longings can create a strong foundation for a new relationship or repair damage in an existing one. Intimacy begins with conversation.

A desert of emotional dryness can magically transform into a fertile meadow of comfort and fulfillment today. Fortunate Jupiter in your 12th House of Destiny feels the sweet vibes from flirtatious Venus, favoring a romantic or financial situation. However, excessive force is ill advised because you could overestimate your ability to make something happen in the moment. You needn't hurry now if you keep everything moving along in anticipation of what is ahead. Motivational coach Michael Altshuler wrote, "The bad news is time flies; the good news is you're the pilot."

The cosmos encourages you to take a chance on love or in business today and, fortunately, a gambling heart might just win as long as your intentions are honorable. A lucky Venus-Jupiter alignment sets the stage for a pleasurable gathering of friends or an intimate encounter with the object of your affection. Although pushing your luck appears to be a safe bet, pay attention to others for cues that tell you if you're overstepping your bounds. In the absence of warning signs, you're probably not going far enough.

Asking for what you want today is the first step toward reaching your goals. Positive conditions for successful business dealings are likely while enriching Venus magically connects with bountiful Jupiter in your 10th House of Profession. Meanwhile, powerful Pluto in your sign favors risk-taking while preventing you from going overboard. Just be aware that others may need to be more cautious and might not be able to keep up with you now. Sometimes you must disconnect to express your true nature; eagles fly alone.

The world is your oyster today, and the windows of opportunity are open wide. However, you may feel lazy with the moody Moon hanging out in your sign. Friendly aspects to generous Jupiter prompt you to expect rewards with little effort on your part. Nevertheless, it's crucial to start now even if it feels like there's no reason to rush. The Dalai Lama says, "Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions."

You may be the lucky recipient of someone's appreciation today as an indulgent fantasy of yours teeters on the edge of becoming real. You're ready to celebrate the spiritual connection between loving Venus and buoyant Jupiter with a beautiful gift, a delectable feast or even a romantic tryst. Although you're apt to feel adored in your personal life or admired at work, it's crucial to be aware of the possibility of exaggeration or conceit. Thomas Merton wrote, "Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real."

Wrapping your mind around another strange twist of fate seems nearly impossible today, but you simply don't have a choice. You are being blown around on the fickle winds of change, preventing you from sinking into your feelings in any one spot. Take each surprise as it comes now, instead of resisting the entire string of them. As soon as you block your true destiny, you cut off your connection to your creativity. Hindu Guru Yogananda said, "Life should be a continuous source of inspiration."

Relationship issues are on the table today but you aren't willing to say the correct words just to placate your partner. Dreams of perfect love are meant to inspire you rather than bring you down. Falling short of your ideals is natural when you set your expectations so high. Be gentle with your heart and try not to let someone else's insensitivity influence your self-worth. Nevertheless, treating everyone with compassion -- including yourself -- adds a touch of the divine to all that you do.

You aspire to reach high for your dreams today, but it's hard to make a rational decision with illusions about your professional ambitions floating around your head. You must stay alert to keep up with all the surprises. Your normal agility serves you well now because you may have to change your tune in a moment's notice. Forget about long-term plans. How well you respond to current challenges sets the stage for the days ahead. You can do anything but you can't do everything.

You're called to push the limits of relationships today as previous assumptions about personal and professional connections are stripped away. A collaboration may reach the end of its road and recognizing that it's no longer serving a purpose could mark a turning point in a significant alliance. However, this is not an emotional issue, but a practical one; calmly consider your long-term goals before deciding whether to cut ties or develop them more deeply. If a partnership doesn't make you want to be a better person, you're in the wrong one.

A blend of sweet and weird describes the events of the day as old dreams fade, projects are completed and a new cycle of social activity begins. Uncharacteristically, hiding under the covers is a more likely response to a misunderstanding today than working hard to make yourself heard. Unfortunately, self-pity isn't healthy for the soul and blaming someone else is just as futile. An environment where the truth can be expressed safely is ideal. Share your feelings with a supportive individual and you'll soon be on the fast track to healing whatever ails you.

You can see right through people's stories as you work your way toward the truth today. Although secrets may be revealed in intimate conversations, it's still difficult to tell what's most important. You tend toward indecisiveness now, so don't let someone else's negative opinion overrule your best instincts. Once you take the next step, support is likely to come from unexpected sources. Either you wake up now and start working for what you want or you let your dreams stay as dreams.

Your emotions continue to pick up additional intensity today, but you could let your mind wander off without even realizing what happened. It's impossible to gauge the relative significance of any one idea with so many subtle cosmic influences coming at you from different directions. Thankfully, focusing on your feelings rather than your thoughts can help you successfully navigate through this confusing day. When the storms of change swirl around you, it's your challenge to find your way back to the center where you can restore your balance.

Knowing where you stand in a relationship can be tricky now. Conversations may take on an edge of anxiety if you're afraid that time is running out. Even your smoothest moves might be interrupted by unexpected events today, so be prepared to make quick adjustments to remain on course. However, the more you try to keep things the same, the more stress you will encounter. Exercising flexibility instead of fearfully resisting the future is your best bet. Embracing change is an essential component of personal growth.

You're standing between two worlds today with one foot comfortably planted on familiar ground and the other ready to step into the unknown. You long for emotional connection, but you must proceed with caution because moving too quickly is just as bad as doing nothing at all. Even if others think they know all your tricks, you have more going on now than they realize. Fortunately, there's nothing wrong with keeping some of your plans to yourself. Work hard in silence; let your success be your noise.

Following a plan could lead you to waste valuable time on activities that leave you in a state of frustration. Maintaining an adaptable attitude and adopting flexible expectations lower your levels of stress and give everyone room to breathe. Even if your day looks like it's careening out of control, find the presence of mind to keep things from flying off the rails. Buddha said, "Stay centered; do not overstretch. Extend from your center; return to your center."

You might see a murky financial picture now, but your lack of clarity is likely more about self-doubt than money. Although your 2nd House of Income is a bit stressed today, your imagination can open a door where there was once only a wall. Nevertheless, envy and jealousy may bubble to the surface, making it difficult to escape the consequences of your actions. Instead of pushing for final resolution now, stay on your toes while allowing events to unfold naturally. President Theodore Roosevelt said, "Comparison is the thief of joy."

Your head and heart are wide open today, putting you in touch with multiple dimensions beyond this one. Keep in mind that the current cosmic pattern isn't great for self-restraint and common sense. In fact, you're able to justify irrational actions now and may prefer to leave reality in the dust. However, it's your job to find inspiration and encourage others to recognize the metaphysical magic behind the facade of the material world.

You are boarding a fast train to the future only to discover that it stops at every station along the way. Emails and voicemails flood your inboxes today as energetic Mars rushes into intelligent Aquarius and your 11th House of Social Networking. However, just as you find your groove, stern Saturn appears to take your ticket and demands that your papers are in order. Instead of giving up out of frustration, confront the weakest link in your chain and fix it before it becomes a major problem. Buddha said, "The trouble is, you think you have time."

You are driven to excel in your career now, but might find making progress is more complicated than you prefer. You may visualize what success looks like but each step you take toward your destination seems to be blocked by circumstances beyond your control. Fortunately, you possess the ability to quickly change the dynamics by changing the rules of the game. Others are surprised by your radical tactics but they will likely pitch in to help once they see your new approach. Although a leopard can't change its spots, you can.

Doors are opening, showing you all the places you would like to go. Although distant horizons appear closer now that action-hero Mars charges into your 9th House of Faraway Places, obstacles pop up in your mind as fast as you can imagine your next adventure. Fortunately, you have time to make your dreams come true if your willpower is operating at full strength. Begin small, make sensible plans and then work toward manifesting your vision. The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

The dynamics of interpersonal relationships are harder to untangle now because your need for emotional connection conflicts with a growing desire for independence. Modifying your behavior prevents you from finding yourself back in a similar position down the road. Assertive Mars enters intellectual Aquarius today, allowing you to see your personal drama more objectively. At first, it may feel as if your stability unravels, but if you continue working on your inner resolve, you could see positive results sooner than you expect. If you want to be taken seriously, be relentless in your pursuit of the truth.

Your attention is drawn away from your center and toward others now. However, a powerful undercurrent places a firm grip on your enthusiasm, preventing you from being washed away by the excitement of so many options. People seem more determined than ever to support your dreams while stabilizing Saturn grounds warrior Mars in your 7th House of Partners. Nevertheless, you must first confront your limitations in order to realize your future potential. Your past need not limit the possibilities ahead.

A new assignment may require a period of adjustment, so don't expect smooth sailing now. You are longing for a taste of freedom which inevitably increases the overall tension on your job. Although you might overreact by doing something extreme, there are brilliant solutions available that can produce positive change without needless disruption. Buried resentment could surface and undermine trust. However, you will discover the necessary resources to repair any damage if you simply focus on one issue at a time. No one can fault you when you take full responsibility for your behavior.

It's rather annoying when prior commitments stop you from following your heart's desire. Passionate Mars blasts your 5th House of Spontaneity, motivating you to take charge of your day by making it more fun. However, your inner child is restrained by stern Saturn in the form of a parent, your boss or some other authority figure who demands that you meet your obligations before you do anything else. Abraham Lincoln said, "You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today."

You're driven to share the truth today without concern for the consequences. You are cleansed from your past experiences while impulsive Mars moves through your 4th House of Foundations, empowering you to tackle what's next as long as you start with the basics. Nevertheless, repressive Saturn steps into the picture, cautioning you to keep your intentions to yourself. You want to embrace the future, yet feel damned if you do and damned if you don't. Novelist Simon Van Booy writes, "Every moment is the paradox of now or never."

You're running around faster than ever today yet you struggle to accomplish even the simplest of tasks. You are incredibly busy thanks to powerhouse Mars's shift into high-frequency Aquarius and your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. But things are not what you expect, especially if you jump to conclusions before having all the facts. Unfortunately, you may find your trust shaken as authoritative Saturn intensifies the conflict between spontaneous self-expression and cautious suppression. Life is a balancing act; keep calm and carry on.

Your focus is redirected to personal gains today. You might be thinking how you can increase your income, improve a relationship or gain new freedom at work. However, obstacles block your path to emotional satisfaction now. You may believe you need to attend a boring social function for the sake of appearances. Thankfully, you have a choice; you're not required to fake a happy face while ignoring your own needs. Your position will be strengthened in the long run as long as you are clear about what you're getting and what you wish to receive in return.

It's nearly impossible to contain your excitement today. However, you quickly figure out how to keep cool so you don't shock people with your unorthodox behavior. You can feel the conflict internally as aggressive Mars enters your sign, prodding you into action. However, an unavoidable connection from strict Saturn threatens radical behavior with unwanted consequences. Welcome to the Karma Cafe where there is no menu; you will get served what you deserve.

You are longing to wrap yourself up in a cocoon because you have important self-improvement work to do that requires total privacy. Combative Mars morphs into a spiritual warrior as it slips into your 12th House of Invisibility. Unfortunately, you can't fully escape your worldly responsibilities while taskmaster Saturn is on your case. But this is no time to wallow in indecision, caught between conflicting cosmic messages. Push through your resistance and fulfill your obligations. Retreat to a secluded place later; in the meantime, growth and transformation can still happen in the light of day.

You might not be happy about the intensity of your current feelings today, yet embracing them can bring you face to face with an important truth. It's often easier for you action-oriented Rams to be in motion rather than sitting still with your emotions. Instead of distracting yourself with busy work, focus your attention inward, follow the spiral of your thoughts and see where it leads. Sometimes, we don't learn by doing; we learn by reflecting on what we've done.

Someone you know may have an ax to grind today and you could be swept up in a melodrama that isn't even yours. For example, a business associate who shares a grievance with you might expect your support when negotiating with other people. Although this request puts you in an awkward position, there is no easy way to avoid it now. Thankfully, your even-tempered presence is a positive influence on all involved. Be the rock in the midst of the storm.

Navigating your way through an uncertain political climate at work is easier if you rely on intuition today rather than logic. However, your feelings may continue to develop and change throughout the day. Although you normally like to have an abundance of information at your disposal before making a decision, the data doesn't tell the whole story now. Nietzsche wrote, "There are no facts, only interpretation."

You have something important to get off your chest today, and you won't let an uncomfortable situation prevent you from speaking your truth. Although it's wise to consider the consequences before you say anything, it's just as important to be detached from the outcome. Although you may be cool, calm and collected when delivering your message, it's likely more radical than anyone might expect. Don't ramble on about nothing; step back and give others space to react. Your words are a powerful catalyst and can change the course of events.

You are unusually sensitive today and may need to retreat from social activities to protect your heart. Normally you roaring Lions project more energy than you receive, but your compassion is so compelling now that it's difficult to maintain healthy boundaries as you pick up signals from others. It might even be impossible to tell if a feeling is yours or if it's coming from someone else. Nevertheless, it's not wise to dwell on your current confusion. Alan Watts wrote, "Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone."

You don't have the whole picture and, thankfully, you're acutely aware that there is more going on than meets the eye. People are hard to read because it seems like they're saying one thing while actually feeling something else. Instead of struggling to rectify the apparent inconsistency, just accept the ambiguity for now. What you're missing today will likely become apparent tomorrow.

You are so certain about your own beliefs today that you can be an anchor for someone else. There is little doubt in your mind that you're able to see through other people's games; their clever stories and distracting shenanigans won't likely throw you off course. Nevertheless, it's still tricky to put your perceptions into words because the more you say now, the more confused everyone becomes. An Apache proverb advises, "It is better to have less thunder in the mouth and more lightning in the hand."

Although you know exactly what you need to do today, it's not clear how best to initiate action. You can explain your ingenious ideas to your coworkers and they will likely encourage you to follow your dreams. But your comrades are of little help now when it comes to converting your thoughts into operation. Fortunately, your path will clear and your next step will be obvious tomorrow. In the meantime, put all the pieces of your plan in place in preparation for the launch of your big adventure.

Your internal process seems more important than external circumstances now, prompting you to slip in and out of daydreams instead of fully applying yourself at work. Although you can put on a good enough show that no one suspects anything is amiss, you could judge yourself rather harshly if you're not living up to your own expectations. Nevertheless, you will have a greater impact than you realize today if you just continue to dance with one foot in each world.

Your long-term goals currently extend beyond your immediate career objectives. Although your individual success is usually a strong motivating factor, you are now more inclined to consider the needs of those around you. Fortunately, your altruism pays off because your personal satisfaction is tied to the fulfillment of those in your immediate environment. Dr. Mark Hyman writes, "The power of community to create health is far greater than any physician, clinic or hospital."

You might begin your journey today with low visibility and without direction, as if you are lost in a storm cloud. Unfortunately, it's frustrating when you're unable to get your bearings or decide on a destination. However, the sky clears enough for you to see your way and set a path, even if it's slow-going at first. Your physical energy is on the rise, adding to your momentum throughout the day. Take your time to plot your course; things that start fast end fast.

You are like a psychic sponge, soaking up the vibrations from those around you. While many people are sympathetic and understanding, you are empathetic and can feel what others are experiencing. Your antennae are so sensitive now that you pick up every little ripple of emotion in the atmosphere, challenging you to stay focused on what's most important. Inspirational speaker Iyanla Vanzant says, "Trust yourself enough to know who you can trust."

Adrenaline surges throughout your body today as you receive an extra boost of vitality. The Moon's presence in your sign encourages you to take a risk in a relationship by sharing your feelings, even if you're unsure where the conversation will lead. Divergent goals may produce heated conversation but the situation can resolve itself quickly when the Sun forms a creative connection with result-oriented Mars. Transforming the anger into constructive action smooths out the rough edges.

It's tempting to push your point home today, but your persistence can turn an interaction personal, which is something you don't necessarily want to do. Your audience won't be bullied into making a decision; back off once you make your case and allow time for your message to sink in. Resistance will fade quickly if you stay cool. Your boss, partner or potential investor will come around as long as he or she doesn't feel pressured by you. Silence speaks when words can't.

Unfiltered honesty can get you into hot water today. To speak the truth is almost always a good idea, but tempering it with diplomacy means the difference between provoking a laugh and starting a fight. You might try to light a fire under a sluggish friend or you could attempt to get a rise out of your partner just for the fun of it. Tread cautiously now; you may be ready to jump but it's hard to tell where you will land.

Although communication problems may create numerous headaches today, you are blessed with the tools to handle any misunderstandings that arise. Whether you are gathering with friends or spending the day at home, rest assured that most situations will unfold according to your plan -- even if you must step in and nudge things along. Go ahead and dream the impossible dream, but keep in mind that magic doesn't happen without plenty of hard work.

You might be feeling so good-natured and effervescent today that a quiet evening at home is too laid-back for your liking. An exciting connection between the sparkling Sun and ardent Mars reintroduces you to your inner child. Invite a few buddies over for a last-minute party or go out dancing on the town; whatever stirs the pulse of the crowd will surely make your heart beat faster, too. Your bubbly personality and warm generosity leave a lovely lasting impression.

You have a lot of new facts at your disposal today, but your current tendency is to fall back on old familiar patterns. You could even start an argument just to prove that you're right, but it's healthier to simply acknowledge there are multiple points of view and move on. Too many commitments can get you into trouble if circumstances beyond your control delay your progress. Charles Darwin wrote, "It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is the most adaptable to change."

You may wonder if your ideas are worthy of pursuit today as your brain buzzes with innovation and inspiration. However, someone could act as a catalyst to accelerate the pace of change, bringing both excitement and instability into your life. Thankfully, you are fully motivated with more-than-enough energy to rise to the occasion when the radiant Sun shines on macho Mars. Norman Vincent Peale wrote, "Shoot for the Moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars."

Impatient thinking combines with sloppy logic today, adding extra tension to complex interpersonal relationship dynamics. Before a passionate discussion turns into an outright battle, make sure that everyone is talking about the same issue. Although the cosmos gives you plenty of juice to defend your point of view, there's no sense in wasting it now by going around in circles with someone. Desmond Tutu instructs, "Don't raise your voice. Improve your argument."

You may struggle to assimilate new information and integrate it into a single picture today. You're so eager to show off what you know that you could make outrageous statements now, which can't be verified when push comes to shove. Balancing your high hopes with the basic facts can be tricky if you say more than you should. Overstating your position leaves you out on a limb; making your case in a low-key manner earns you the trust and respect you seek.

It feels as if you've been playing the waiting game for a long time and now you're finally ready to make your move. Unfortunately, your judgment isn't very clear while Mercury forms an anxious aspect with inflationary Jupiter in your 10th House of Authority. However, you're advised by your friends to throw your usual caution to the wind. Allow yourself the luxury of unrestrained optimism since you possess the strength to go after what you want, and the innate common sense to know when to quit.

Your nerves are on edge today as you're pulled back and forth between high anxiety and low stress. An uncomfortable Mercury-Jupiter connection clouds your thinking and tempts you to exaggerate the facts, especially if you're trying to sound practical. But a responsible Moon-Saturn trine enables you to apply your skills steadily while building a strong foundation. Thankfully, your persistent efforts will be rewarded, irritations will fade and your clever ability to influence others with the truth will return.

You are susceptible to emotional hyperbole, unrealistic promises or information overload today. Messenger Mercury's stressful alignment with gregarious Jupiter can make you very chatty or possibly even indiscreet. Be careful talking about friends or colleagues, since even an innocent remark may be perceived as gossip. Nevertheless, your enthusiasm bubbles over, empowering you to be a strong motivator and an effective champion for your ideas. Promote what you love instead of bashing what you hate.

Expressing your feelings is unavoidable now as your version of reality is communicated in both refreshing and potentially embarrassing ways. You are quite busy projecting your thoughts into the future once interactive Mercury enters your 9th House of Higher Truth. Honesty only hurts when intentions are less than honorable, so speak from the heart. Integrity is choosing your actions based on values rather than personal gain.

It might be wise to ignore the incoming information if you find yourself totally overwhelmed. Turn off your mind and just let your body take over for a while when Mercury kicks off its visit to your 8th House of Deep Sharing. People's ideas are likely to keep you buzzing but instead of conversing, find a quiet place to sit alone and meditate.
