Talking can be enjoyable, but it's more superficial than substantial today; it's a means to get you moving rather than your destination. Ultimately, what you do matters more than what you say.

Expect plenty of conversation with lots of laughs today, and maybe even an argument or two thrown in the mix. You can't avoid intense interactions when mischievous Mercury enters your 7th House of Others, where it quickly runs into an anxious aspect with suspicious Pluto. However, maintaining your sense of humor allows for disagreements without unpleasantness. Not only is there a great opportunity to network, but also to move forward with a pet project. If a door was closed to you before, this is your chance to knock it down, present your case anew and get your point across. Fortune favors the bold.

There are too many things happening today and not enough hours to keep up with all of them. Your intentions are clear from the beginning and the outcome looks favorable, but you can grow weary of  trying to manage your conflicting emotions. Your vision broadens and you're willing to go wherever your mind takes you now. Even if you're a stay-at-home kind of person, the urge to get out and explore becomes irrepressible. J.R.R. Tolkien wrote, "The greatest adventure is what lies ahead."

A flood of information rushes through your brain, deluging you with new ideas today. Conversations move along so quickly that it's difficult to keep up with the flow. Cerebral Mercury shifts into your 5th House of Self-Expression, drawing the spotlight in your direction. A simple nod or smile can seem threatening to someone who doesn't know your flirtatious style, so rein in your usually friendly nature in unfriendly territory. Learn self-control and you can master anything.

Ideas pop up in random conversations today and reveal a totally different way to look at your situation. Trickster Mercury's three-week visit to optimistic Sagittarius encourages you to cast aside your customary discretion and freely express your opinions. Keep an open mind even when solutions seem off-the-wall. However, accepting or rejecting them right away can be a trap. Watering your thoughts with patience will help to reveal which ones can take root and merit your attention.

Nostalgia draws you back into the past, but the call of the future is loud once conceptual Mercury enters visionary Sagittarius. Even if emotions linger behind your thoughts today, your mind can lead you ahead as people show up with radical plans and unusual perspectives. Although your feelings may not fade away yet, you don't have to repeat history. An attitude adjustment consciously turns your life in a new direction. Mindfulness professor Jon Kabat-Zinn writes, "You cannot stop the waves, but you can learn to surf."

Decisions you make now concerning your long-term goals impact your future in ways you can't yet imagine. Logical Mercury's shift into your 2nd House of Values emphasizes your desire for financial security. Meanwhile, the Moon's conjunction with independent Uranus in your 6th House of Work urges you to escape from the restraints of a job that's not aligned with your inner purpose. Of course, you need enough money to cover your expenses, but there's more to life than material success. Balance your professional ambitions with spiritual practices that resonate with your soul.

Breaking free of old habits enables you to discover new expressions of creativity. Innovative ideas enter your awareness with great regularity today, making it difficult to choose which ones are the most valuable. You are likely to become even more outspoken and try to share every thought that crosses your mind while chatty Mercury travels through your extroverted sign. Although you might be delighted with this mental boost, sensitive people may respond better to a less frenetic approach. You are like spicy food; for some people your brand of enthusiasm is an acquired taste.

Your sensible calculations often lead you to wait for the perfect moment before starting something new. You might finally feel ready for the next phase of your journey as messenger Mercury enters adventurous Sagittarius, accentuating your 12th House of Endings. You can see the path ahead if you don't worry excessively about the roadblocks ahead. Author Nishan Panwar writes, "If you live in fear of the future because of something that happened in the past, you will end up losing what you have in the present."

You are less concerned with receiving recognition today and more excited about participating in a group. Your interests are merging with those of a larger community now that adaptable Mercury is visiting your 11th House of Social Networking. It's as if you are leaving personal worries behind in order to become a part of the human collective. Fortunately, your optimism about where this new road leads inspires others to join you on your journey. Paradoxically, it's possible to maintain your individuality while going along with the crowd. In the long run, others will respect you for your authenticity and your unique outlook on life.

Too much pressure creates anxiety today, eventually prompting you to let off some steam. You might believe that being brutally honest will get things moving in the right direction. But it's also possible to make a positive impact on an influential person by passionately selling yourself or your favorite idea. Mercury's shift into buoyant Sagittarius can carry you away with impractical beliefs. Inspirational author William Arthur Ward wrote, "The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails."

Letting down your guard without thinking about the possible consequences is asking for trouble today. Depending upon your willingness to respond to change, the Sun's awkward aspect to surprising Uranus in your sign will either show you a viable escape route or unexpectedly turn your world upside down. Nevertheless, knowing when to reveal your vulnerability can be a magical key that enables you to successfully navigate through a difficult transition in a relationship. Dr. Joyce Brothers wrote, "The best proof of love is trust."

You're in no mood to negotiate with anyone today because you know exactly what you need now to be happy. However, you may be so fixed in your assumptions that you're willing to cut off your nose to spite your face. Unfortunately, your stubbornness can be costly if you refuse to move beyond your old conclusions. Stating your position is easy while the reflective Moon is hanging out in your earthy sign, but try not to back yourself into a corner. Listen carefully to the feedback you receive so you know where you can soften your stance. You gain more strength by bending than by breaking.

You are ready to face the music and do whatever is required to resolve a conflict on the job, but your behavior could elicit unexpected reactions. Although the Sun's presence in your 6th House of Work keeps you busy, you can't put off the inevitable. Just remember that your judgment may be slightly off today, so hedge your bets and, if necessary, change your mind later. Don't let frustration get the best of you. Even if you can't see your progress yet, a metamorphosis has already begun. Wayne Dyer wrote, "Transformation literally means going beyond your form."

Managing your energy is tricky business because you might have to make several abrupt about-faces throughout the day. Unfortunately, the mellow Taurus Moon urges you to resist sudden change today. You don't mind modifying your agenda now as long as it's done on your terms. Controlling your creative force empowers you to tackle the big issues with a good balance of hope and logic. President Theodore Roosevelt said, "With self-discipline most anything is possible."

Unnecessary extravagance stirs up a hornet's nest of trouble today. Let caution be your guide since it might be challenging to negotiate for what you want. Being generous is one thing, but going overboard with lavish gifts or outrageous promises isn't helpful right now. Your magnanimity may prompt a misunderstanding. Although your mind might be racing with bright ideas, one careless word can provoke an irrational reaction that only escalates the tension. If you want to be appreciated, give something money can't buy.

You can transform your ideas into action now without running into resistance, especially if you receive support from encouraging friends and generous allies. However, conditions begin to shift unexpectedly as a messy alignment from the Sun to erratic Uranus turns your day wonky. Stay light on your feet so you're able to move quickly under these rapidly changing conditions. Psychologist Timothy Leary wrote, "If you want to change the way people respond to you, change the way you respond to people."

You receive mixed signals from the cosmos today and may need to switch gears to match the various rhythms of colleagues and friends throughout the day. Concentration is required in all that you do, leaving little margin for error. You might believe you're on target now, but an edgy Sun-Uranus aspect might prompt you to blow up at someone or run for the hills without warning. Demonstrate your strength of character by using this high-frequency energy to invent new ways to increase your productivity at home or at work.

There's plenty of time to recover from the destabilizing cosmic forces that recently rocked your world. Awkward relationship dynamics are not fully resolved, but there's time to regroup before you need to jump into the fray again. Although explosive Uranus is on the scene trying to shake things up, the reliable Taurus Moon graces you with enough common sense that you won't risk too much. French novelist Gustave Flaubert wrote, "Be steady and well-ordered in your life so that you can be fierce and original in your work."

You possess the stamina to overcome almost any obstacle but directing your efforts today takes a heavy dose of discipline. Nevertheless, you can't slow down now or you'll attract Uranus the Awakener to shock you back to reality. The urge to do things in your own way may overpower your willingness to compromise. Wounded feelings can provoke angry responses, so do your best to sidestep conflict whenever possible. Plant seeds of peace and watch them grow.

Seeing a situation in a fresh light makes a world of difference today. Once your perspective begins to change, go out of your way to talk about your new point of view with anyone who will listen. Fascinating ideas are stimulated by wild Uranus now, but adapting your solutions to the slower pace around you is more productive in the long run. Author Joyce Meyer wrote, "Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting."

Although you may experience bouts of self-doubt today, you still have all the necessary resources to reach your goals. However, an electrifying Sun-Uranus misalignment can throw you for a loop, demanding your full and immediate attention. But your thinking might be too progressive now, revealing that being ahead of the curve isn't always the place to be. As noted in the Irish proverb, "A good retreat is better than a bad stand."

Minor differences of opinions can grow larger today, making cooperation difficult even in the friendliest of circumstances. But sticking to your methods brings results; changing horses midstream is not advised now because you could end up heading in the wrong direction. Methodically handling one specific problem at a time is far more likely to be successful than turning an emotional crisis into an endless debate. Sherlock Holmes said, "Never theorize before you have data. Invariably, you end up twisting facts to suit theories instead of theories to suit facts."

Although you might long for peace and quiet, you probably can't relax with so much going on in your life. The Taurus Full Moon shines in your 2nd House of Personal Resources, offering a stabilizing antidote for the complexities that arise now. However, if the tension of your daily routine becomes overwhelming, take some time to remember the higher truths and divine delights that bring you solace in the midst of a storm. A healthy dose of self-reflection enables you to affirm recent choices and empowers you to be more optimistic about reaching your goals.

You can be so single-minded that others can't get past your bullheadedness. Nevertheless, the Taurus Full Moon lands in your 1st House of Personality, reminding you to remain practical in a world that seems to have lost touch with reality. Unfortunately, expecting too much from others can lead to grave disappointment. Words are meaningless without intent and follow-through, so avoid wasting time and energy on people who are all talk and no action. There's no need to be a leader or a follower if you're blazing your own path.

Commitments recently made at work may be challenging to fulfill unless you carefully reassess your resources and allocate the time required to finish the job. Unfortunately, your heart may be somewhere else as the pastoral Taurus Full Moon lights up your 12th House of Spirituality. Your current metaphysical orientation leaves you more interested in otherworldly pursuits than meeting your mundane obligations. Finding time to recharge your batteries is good for the soul, but does not relieve you of your responsibilities. As in most things in life, balance is the key to happiness.

Relationships may be so complicated now that you long to get back to your roots. Fortunately, the Taurus Full Moon brightens your 11th House of Networking, reminding you to reestablish your priorities and reconnect with your friends, instead of concentrating on only one person or project. You may even feel like a social butterfly as you explore your need for connections within your community. Nevertheless, the difference between success and failure seems to depend on the amount of support you receive from others. More than ever, it takes a village to create the world you want.

Your current determination reflects your unwavering desire to bring recent changes at home to fruition. But the Taurus Full Moon illuminates your 10th House of Public Life, shifting your focus back to your career. Your mind is brimming with practical solutions to meet your obligations at work so you can return to your personal life. Tackling the toughest tasks first will ultimately give you the widest range of freedom to take advantage of all the opportunities that lie ahead. To paraphrase Napoleon Hill, shine your own light and don't worry about the darkness, for that is when the stars shine brightest.

You desperately need a break from the pressures of your regular routine now. The practical Taurus Full Moon spotlights your 9th House of Higher Education, suggesting you could improve your work prospects by taking a class or attending a job-related seminar. No matter how you choose to widen your horizons, expanding the scope of your activities can be constructive, as long as you're realistic about your schedule. Visualizing your future exactly as you desire is a great start, but you must follow through with determination and diligence if you want to manifest your destiny.

Moderating your enthusiasm is part of an overall strategy to keep things simple now. The pragmatic Taurus Full Moon highlights your 8th House of Shared Resources, inspiring you to team up with responsible people who can help you achieve your vision of success. Relying on someone you can trust provides a reassuring sense of solidarity, but if your companion doesn't deliver on his promises, be prepared to reevaluate the arrangement. Martin Luther King said, "We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope."

You might be required to work extra hard to meet the expectations of others now. The dependable Taurus Full Moon energizes your 7th House of Partnerships, leaving very little room for ambiguity in personal and professional relationships. Nevertheless, don't be fooled by a manipulative person because you are swimming in strong emotional currents now. Even if you think you know what you want, your feelings are still in flux. What appears as someone else's instability may in fact be a reflection of your own.

Maintaining your satisfaction on the job can be more work than it seems at first glance. Although the Taurus Full Moon accentuates your 6th House of Employment, its opposition to the Sun in your 12th House of Fantasy is quite confusing. In fact, there may be a great chasm between your dreams and the tasks at hand. Consider all your options before making a final decision about your new direction. Franklin Roosevelt said, "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."

Your desires are straightforward now, prompting you to ask for exactly what you want. Nevertheless, the Taurus Full Moon activates your 5th House of Romance, triggering powerful feelings and foolish actions. Although your emotions aren't necessarily convenient, try not to suppress them or pressure may build until it suddenly erupts. Intimacy in a relationship can lead to jealousy while the evocative Moon forms difficult aspects with sensual Venus and possessive Pluto. Rather than turning molehills into mountains, focus on the simple pleasures that create enduring memories. Love is best given without expectation.

You are being buffeted around by complex cosmic currents now, so your best course of action is to simplify your life as much as possible. In fact, the earthy Taurus Full Moon emphasizes your 4th House of Domestic Conditions, encouraging you to seek comfort in sweet pleasures. Your tendency to lean on your friends and family now may be effective in the short-term, but it's hard to deny the excitement you feel as the path to your future opens before your eyes. Keep in mind, the loftier the building, the deeper the foundation must be laid.

Oddly enough, you find great satisfaction now in creating your schedule and adhering to it as closely as possible. The sensible Taurus Full Moon settles in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, requiring you to establish a healthy balance between pursuing your dreams and managing the logistics of everyday life. Although you might feel torn by these contrasting paths, the Moon's opposition to the enigmatic Scorpio Sun helps you realize that taking care of routine tasks gives you a solid base from which you can seek a higher purpose.

It's all too easy to drift off course today, favoring fantasy over reason. Although the antsy Gemini Moon intrigues you with a variety of options as you create your schedule for the day, your best ideas may be blocked by circumstances out of your control. However, if you encounter resistance, don't continue to force the issue. Navigating around problems is the most efficient way to get what you want now. Just remember that avoidance is not the same thing as resolution.

Your thoughts are smoothly transformed into deeds today, making this a great time to initiate action. Don't wait for a better moment to start a new project, since warrior Mars is ready to fight on your behalf. All forms of communication are emphasized now, but be extra careful when discussing finances. Although the flighty Gemini Moon can distract you from your real work, a little extra vigilance goes a long way to keep you on track. Inventor Alexander Graham Bell wrote, "Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The Sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus."

You are inspired to put your best ideas into motion now, especially if your current goals are motivating you to do something you've never done before. It's one thing to have a creative vision about your future, yet it's particularly exciting when you can execute a plan so easily. But even if you have no specific destination in mind, it may be time to playfully explore new avenues of adventure in the most spontaneous ways possible. Aldous Huxley wrote, "The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age."

There may be a flurry of activity in your life today, even if it's hidden from view. The chatty Gemini Moon is visiting your 12th House of Secrets, tempting you to share your innermost fantasies with someone you admire. But you make everything appear less complicated than it is now if you're playing a shell game with reality. A feeling arises, you say something about it and then you pretend it never happened. However, there are some things better left unsaid. Even if you choose to withhold your intentions from others, at least don't hide them from yourself.

You're able to take command with such style and grace today that you make work seem like child's play. In fact, your life can feel like a celebration, filled with playful conversations and social invitations. But you may be secretly suffering in silence now if you're struggling to meet your deadlines. The good news is that asking for help isn't a sign of weakness. It requires more courage to admit you can't do something on your own than to fake competence. Teamwork makes the dream work.

Although you might be quite impatient today, your perseverance will pay off as long as you don't lose sight of your ultimate destination. The Gemini Moon typically diffuses your energy, but a supportive Mercury-Mars sextile gives you enough endurance to complete whatever you start. Nevertheless, you may be confounded by too many choices. Concentrate your efforts on the most vital tasks even if you must temporarily ignore other obligations. Remember, you don't have to be perfect at everything to be successful.

Expressing your fantasies through artistic creations or romantic love can take up a significant chunk of your time now. You may even wonder how to make your dreams come true while the curious Gemini Moon floats through your 9th House of Adventure. Nevertheless, your capacity to imagine is currently greater than your ability to integrate fantasy with reality. Be selective when deciding which goals to pursue or you could end up chasing your tail instead of your destiny.

Connections with new people are only alluring if they are interesting enough to hold your attention after the first round of casual communication. You're not interested in superficial conversations that demonstrate someone's cleverness while the Moon hangs out in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You yearn to explore the mysteries of the dark shadows and the unknown recesses of the mind with someone who is willing to go as far as you. An intellectually provocative and emotionally mature person can be just what the doctor ordered to spice up your life.

Your emotional flexibility and nonjudgmental attitude attract intriguing people who motivate you personally and professionally. There's no denying the fact that relationships take center stage while the Moon camps out in your 7th House of Partnerships. Fortunately, harmonious aspects to the lighthearted Gemini Moon ensure meaningful communication if you're willing to engage your heart fully. Balance your interpersonal activities by taking time for self-reflection, since the most important work you do now may be  behind the scenes.

You're lost in the contradiction between work and play, uncharacteristically unable to tell one from the other now. Your tendency is to contract and act responsibly when required, but the flirtatious Gemini Moon in your 6th House of Employment encourages more frivolous activities. Indulging in your fantasies is not a wasteful pastime, especially if it motivates you to try something you've never experienced. A Japanese proverb states, "Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare."

Although you're able to accomplish more than you expect today, you may have more opportunities for pleasure than time to enjoy them. The carefree Gemini Moon's presence in your 5th House of Romance arouses playful feelings. The innocence of your heart could even bring moments of foolishness, but it's better to be naive and awkward now than to protect yourself by closing down to avoid mistakes. In the end, you only regret the chances you didn't take.

Exploring previously suppressed emotions can help you rediscover your true purpose and give you the strength you need to reach your goals. The inquisitive Gemini Moon's presence in your 4th House of Roots entices you to dig even deeper into the origins of your current thoughts and feelings. Although you may become a data scavenger as you gather information now, at some point you must make a crucial decision before the overload of facts strains your nervous system. Sufi poet Rumi wrote, "The inspiration you seek is already within you. Be silent and listen."

It's one thing to dream about jumping on an airplane for a quick weekend getaway, but it's something quite different to actually do it. Although plotting this type of escape might be a fun pastime, you'll likely think about it in a more practical manner later in the day. Nevertheless, impulsively buying tickets -- or doing anything irresponsible -- is probably not a great idea at this time. Enjoy getting lost in the fantasy but see how you feel about it in a few days to avoid the consequences of buyer's remorse.

You have mixed emotions about revealing your innermost secrets today -- even to people you trust. But you're not as worried about someone else's reactions to your disclosure as you are about your next move. You don't know if you're ready to follow through on your intentions now, but you realize that you won't be able to take back what you say. Tread carefully while continuing to consider your options. However, in the end, you're less likely to regret the things you've done than the things you didn't do when you had the chance. Tony Robbins says, "It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped."

Your cerebral antennae are fully extended today as you scan your environment for something new and exciting to fill your day. Unfortunately, your calendar might already be so overloaded that there's no time for extracurricular pursuits. Nevertheless, your restlessness may be so acute that you're willing to deal with an awkward situation later in order to satisfy your boredom now. Thoreau wrote, "Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it."

Maintaining a consistent outlook on life is tricky today because one moment you think you can do anything you set your mind to and a few minutes later you believe you'll fail at even the simplest task. Obviously, neither of these two extremes are true. Instead of allowing your confidence to ebb and flow with arbitrary emotional tides, take control of your day by establishing realistic goals and striving to achieve them. However, the fastest way to build self-esteem is to do exactly what you're afraid of doing. Fear looks, faith jumps.

You're the go-to person that everyone likes now because they think you have all the answers. However, you're less interested in finding the solution to someone else's problems than you are in escaping your own. Although you know that you can't avoid your obligations forever, you're still eager to test the limits if you can find others to join you in your little adventure. Keep in mind the words of Winston Churchill, "The price of greatness is responsibility."

An unresolved family issue lurking in the shadows of your consciousness might suddenly explode into a full-blown melodrama today. Although it shouldn't be a surprise, it's still shocking when you realize the complexity of the situation. You can see many possible scenarios as you contemplate the various ways in which the current events could unfold. Naturally, you want to take everyone under your wing and save them from drowning in bad choices. Nevertheless, adopting a more detached approach enables you to be the calm in the center of the storm while empowering others to make their own decisions.

Blaming someone else for your current anxiety isn't the healthiest way to deal with your fears. Granted, irresponsible behavior can be quite upsetting if you assume that everyone will do exactly as promised. Unfortunately, you are likely to be let down today when reality doesn't match your expectations. However, other people are just triggers, reminding you of painful memories from long ago. There is no reason to give your power away needlessly. Stop cheating on your future with your past.

Concentrating on your work is challenging when there are so many other things that seem more interesting in the moment. Although exploring the complexity of human emotions in a relationship is fuel for your soul, there are pressing mundane issues that are currently fighting for your attention. Thankfully, you possess the power to aim your thoughts in any direction you choose. J.P. Morgan wrote, "The first step toward getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are."

You are excited about the potential you see in nearly everything that happens today. People around you are extremely talkative and you're intrigued by what you hear. Nevertheless, you have more ideas than you know what to do with now; however, your inspiration could easily be drowned out by the intellectual noise of your interactions. Consciously limiting your social interactions is the best thing you can do to increase your current productivity. Stephen Covey reminds us that we're not the product of our circumstances; we're the products of our decisions.

You prefer to start on one task and stick with it until every last detail is complete. However, you won't likely have that luxury today with so many different activities vying for your time. Although you might try to simplify your schedule, there isn't very much wiggle room on your calendar. Instead of wasting resources attempting the improbable, surrender to the complexity of the day with a smile. After all, the difference between success and failure is your attitude.

You are eager to hang out with your colleagues in a social setting today, even if it means that you're a little less productive than you planned. It's not that you're avoiding work; you're simply reevaluating your life in a context larger than your job. Relying on friends to give you honest feedback is an important part of your current thinking process as you explore a variety of possible plans that can take you in very different directions. Remain neutral for now; Thomas Jefferson said, "Delay is preferable to error."

You might expend quite a bit of energy defending your professional goals today because you actually believe them to be achievable. However, even your most sensible idea becomes unrealistic once it's over-inflated. It's tempting to take a simple plan and make it so complicated that you could not possibly execute it. Unfortunately, figuring it out as you go along isn't a wise strategy, either. Take a step back, clear your mind, and refresh your perspective before moving forward.

Putting your life into perspective is a formidable challenge now. However, opening your heart makes more sense than allowing discouragement to turn into anger. The sensitive Cancer Moon's harmonious trine to compassionate Neptune softens your antagonistic approach and increases your patience with others. Don't be disappointed by a lack of progress if you end up having more time to solidify your plans. Motivational Guru Ralph Marston writes, "What you do today can improve all your tomorrows."

Imaginative friends and coworkers cook up ideas that inspire your dreams or confuse you with inaccurate information. Your sense of compassion deepens as spiritual Neptune encourages greater participation in altruistic activities. You can take charge and be a charismatic leader now or, perhaps, fall under the spell of the charming charlatan. Applying some good old-fashioned Taurus common sense tempers fantasy with reality. Keeping your head in the game allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds.

You may be disillusioned with your chosen life path today, dreaming about switching your occupation to a more meaningful pursuit. Talking about your dissatisfaction can elicit constructive feedback while your fantasies inspire you to reach beyond the ordinary now. But don't waste your energy or anyone else's time by endlessly whining about things you have no intention of changing. Louse Hay writes, "I do not fix problems. I fix my thinking. Then problems fix themselves."

Making your dreams come true feels impossible today while you're flooded with feelings that can't be put into language. It's as if you want to float balloons of hope, yet your words fall short of communicating what you wish to say. It's difficult to stay grounded when your head is in the clouds, yet maintaining contact with reality enables your unwavering faith to lead you to create a more fulfilling vision of the future. Finding answers to personal questions through spiritual insights is possible if you're willing to do the work.

It takes quite a bit of effort to keep reality and fantasy separate, but taking time to tell the difference can be used to your advantage. Your relationship expectations continue to grow more idealistic today, yet the profound effects of nebulous Neptune are quite subtle. A pattern of disillusionment followed by re-enchantment seems to be a recurring theme these days. Although you might feel unsteady when emotions overtake logic, it's safe to trust your intuition now. Your heart knows things your mind can't explain.

You are both the source and recipient of compassion that flows all around you today if doubt and fear are not standing in the way. Your uncharacteristic comfort with vulnerability allows the walls of protection to come tumbling down. Softness becomes your strength when you take the lead and open up to individuals you can trust. The current planetary emphasis on your 7th House of Relationships indicates that meaningful collaboration is more rewarding now than success on your own. Bertrand Russell wrote, "The only thing that will redeem mankind is cooperation."

You might notice a shift from inspiration to perspiration now that you're required to work harder to achieve your goals. You may be torn between artistic pursuits and more mundane obligations, but you know that methodically working on routine tasks is your most practical path to success. Nevertheless, daydreams and fantasies stimulate your best ideas. Ultimately, your current challenge is to use your creativity to increase your efficiency. Vincent van Gogh wrote, "Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow on it."

Honoring your dreams is essential now because they are the outlines of your future that you can color in with your actions. Luckily, there is real magic in the air while the evocative Moon dances with ethereal Neptune in your 5th House of Creativity. Nevertheless, concentrate on the distant horizon, where the petty problems of daily life fade into the clouds of hope and expectation. Finding time away from your regular grind motivates you with fantasies that reveal the unrealized potential ahead.

You wish you could slip away and escape from the world to spend more time closer to home tending to matters involving family and friends. Lunar aspects to mystical Neptune in your 4th House of Roots invite you to embark on an inner journey. However, don't confuse the dream realms with the three-dimensional world; your pragmatic attitude minimizes the chances for disappointment later on. Meister Eckhart wrote, "What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action."

Facts get lost in the clouds of illusion today as your rational mind is tickled into submission by fuzzy Neptune in your 3rd House of Communication. Although your thinking is confused by faulty logic, a compassionate conversation could heal old wounds and awaken a more spiritual outlook on life. Pay attention when the cosmos reminds you that magic can occur even in the most ordinary setting. Confucius wrote, "Everything has its beauty but not everyone can see it."

Although you may experience financial uncertainty now, your due diligence regarding money matters should help to clear things up. Unfortunately, your experience with the material world might not live up to your expectations, so remember that the purpose of your dreams is to open your mind to something greater. There's no reason to feel sorry for yourself if reaching your goals takes longer than you wish. German author Goethe wrote, "In all things it is better to hope than to despair."

The difference between inspiration and illusion is elusive now. A series of aspects to surreal Neptune in your sign feeds the fire of fantasies with goals that aren't necessarily rooted in reality. Nevertheless, dreams are being seeded, so nourish them with compassion and faith. The thoughts you nurture now can grow into enduring expressions of your highest ideals. Keep calm and plant something wonderful.

Deeply rooted passions fuel your desire to connect with someone you love today. However, it may be tricky to articulate exactly what you want; you could miss your opportunity if you can't put your thoughts into words right now. But be wary of fabricating an emotional pipe dream because you might end up fooling yourself more than anyone else. Flights of fancy can be fun, but they're not a substitute for the truth. Keep it real when it comes to matters of the heart.

Contradictions abound today, making it exceptionally difficult to find your way as you drift through uncharted waters. Logical Mercury's square to indefinite Neptune widens the gulf between your ideals and the practical world in which you must exist. No matter what happens now, open your mind to imagine new goals, even if your actions are currently restrained. Aerosmith sang, "Dream on. Dream until your dreams come true."

Explaining your thought process can be particularly problematic today, especially if you're talking with a pragmatic person who wants you to deal strictly in numbers and facts. However, imagination is at the forefront of your world as psychic images and fleeting impressions flood your mind. If your creative ideas aren't given an enthusiastic reception now, hold onto them until someone arrives who is capable of understanding your bold vision. French author La Rochefoucauld wrote, "Narrow-minded people generally condemn what is beyond their comprehension."

It's easy to misread a situation today and accept responsibility for more than you can handle. Mental Mercury on its journey through farseeing Sagittarius squares illusory Neptune, inspiring you to make grandiose promises that you struggle to keep. You are itching to speak, even if you're unsure of your intentions. Beginning a heartfelt conversation could be a blessing if you're motivated by a deep desire for the truth. But if you are expressing dissatisfaction, you might push someone away. You don't need a pile of instructions when your intuition will work better than the facts.

Your optimism about a creative project may be off the charts today, but you could be overstating your position simply to make your point. You might confuse your coworkers if you sound more certain than you actually are now. But it's not your responsibility to manage everyone else's expectations. Be true to your heart and give others enough room to do the same. Respect people's feelings; even if it doesn't mean much to you, it could mean everything to them.

A small difference of opinion can balloon into a major disagreement today. Unfortunately, the communication planet's square to fantasy-prone Neptune promotes exaggeration when feelings are presented as facts. Nevertheless, you're able to keep your head in the clouds if your feet are solidly planted back on earth. Warren Buffett said, "I don't look to jump over seven-foot bars; I look around for one-foot bars that I can step over."

Make sure you stick to the facts today because cerebral Mercury's confident square with confusing Neptune lures you into the least certain realms of your imagination. Unfortunately, your unbridled enthusiasm can trick you as well as others. Your sense of perception might be warped and you won't even know it until you check out your conclusions with someone you trust. Futurist Elon Musk wrote, "I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better."

Your stories might have very little in common with reality today, yet you could go on denying that something is amiss. However, your outlook on life is distorted by fantasy while Mercury the Winged Messenger flies through adventurous Sagittarius and squares blurry Neptune. What you say and what you hear now is likely disconnected from the truth. Nevertheless, you know what you want and imagine that your satisfaction will be found just around the next corner. Don't worry if people misjudge you; you'll be fine as long as you hold onto your integrity.

You could lose your temper today if you believe that someone recently undermined your efforts. However, it's nearly impossible to prove that others don't have your best interests at heart. Thankfully, the pieces begin to fall into place when a close friend steps forward to help you see the current situation in a more positive light. Finally, you gain the motivation to transform lingering fear of the unknown into trust in the cosmos. Author Victor Hugo writes, "There is nothing like a dream to create the future."

Someone may awaken you to the inspiration potential of your imagination when communicator Mercury in your 12th House of Soul Consciousness squares illusory Neptune. You're more curious now about all aspects of metaphysics, even if you're not usually focused on spiritual matters. Give your mind permission to roam through unfamiliar territory. Author Gary Zukav wrote, "What is behind your eyes holds more power than what is in front of them."

No matter what kind of action you take now, it either feels like you aren't doing enough or like you're doing too much. It's nearly impossible to know the amount of pressure to apply to influence reality in your favor. Oddly, you might have trouble getting your bearings but there's no reason to be overly concerned. The outcome of even the simplest conversation is unpredictable today, because everything twists and turns in unexpected ways. Author Roald Dahl wrote, "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it."

Discriminating between wishful thinking and realistic possibilities is the most important task before you now. Your judgment is blurred by your own dreams as a magical mystical weekend starts off with an enchanted evening. Don't make any major commitments or take what you hear today too seriously. Promises made in the heat of the moment may not stick long enough to matter in the long run. Indulge your imagination without doing anything you might later regret.

You might think you have your facts in order today, only to discover you've landed on Fantasy Island without anyone who understands your plight. Perhaps your comprehension is so extensive that your perspective doesn't fit into a normal conversation now, leading people to misinterpret your intentions. Nevertheless, your world is tinted with rose-colored hues. Don't give up trying to get your point across just because the escape route seems so inviting. Author Virginia Woolf wrote, "You cannot find peace by avoiding life."

Hearing innocent comments as if they were critical remarks can complicate conversations with friends today. Fragile feelings make you extra sensitive to the opinions of others, so doublecheck your impressions before jumping to conclusions that undermine trust. Thankfully, it's easy to forgive and forget when loving Venus and spiritual Neptune positively influence your day. Esther Hicks said, "In optimism there is magic. In pessimism there is nothing."

You're more intrigued with what you can't see in the shadows today than what you can see in the direct sunlight. Magnetic Venus is collaborating with misty Neptune in your 10th House of Authority, casting a soft focus over what you think you know. Snapping out of this reverie might take a couple of days, no matter how hard you try. In the meantime, remember the words of author Joe Meno, "Imagination is the place where all the important answers live."

You may be quite willing to cut someone some extra slack today, allowing them to escape from the consequences of their actions. It's not that anyone is pulling the wool over your eyes; in fact, you know exactly what's going on now that the illusions are fading to reveal the unadorned truth. Nevertheless, your current spiritual inclinations inspire you to see the silver linings, even in the darkest of storm clouds. A compassionate heart is a powerful heart.

Old grievances fade away as forgiveness replaces blame. Nevertheless, you can't rely on your words to convey what's in your heart now because your logic is overpowered by your compassion. You might seek safety by trying to stick with the facts, but this evasive tactic will not keep you out of trouble today. When in doubt, take the high road; the view is better and the karma is sweeter.

You come across more forcefully to others today than you realize. Your measured enthusiasm may be perceived as outright aggression by those who don't understand your need for perfection. Thankfully, there is sweet magic in the air when beautiful Venus and metaphysical Neptune inspire creativity and romance. Nevertheless, if impatient Mars takes over and gives rise to competitive feelings, insecurity and jealousy can rear their ugly heads. Kahlil Gibran wrote, "Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart."

Romantic moments and inspirational experiences add up to make your day a memorable one. Given the choice, you don't want to work or play alone now. A loving Venus-Neptune connection turns the humdrum of everyday reality into potential storylines for fairytales with happy endings. Once in a while, your dreams really do come true. Nevertheless, as Margaret Bonanno wrote, "It is only possible to live happily ever after on a daily basis."

It requires almost no effort to radiate confidence today, which increases your likelihood of success. Nevertheless, a surefooted approach is more reliable than leaping into the unknown. Practicing creative visualization enables you to modify the flow of events as psychic Neptune happily supports pleasure-seeking Venus in practical Capricorn. Thankfully, joy is within reach with little effort on your part. Life can be sweet now as magic unfolds for you naturally.

You are free to travel across dimensions in your mind today, exploring uncharted realms of love. Diffusive Neptune softens the resistance as it forms a cooperative sextile with graceful Venus in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Facts and fantasy swirl together to create a beautiful palette of feelings which can be spiritually enlightening, romantically blissful or emotionally confusing. Make sure you know when you are dreaming and when you should wake up. Reality is in the eye of the beholder.

The stage is being set for sweet romance or, at least, more pleasurable times ahead. Sexy Venus sextiles enchanting Neptune, casting a magical spell over you, empowering you to mesmerize others with your charms. Although you're not one to gamble with your future, taking a calculated risk for love just might bring you the happiness you deserve. Mahatma Gandhi said, "Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment. Full effort is full victory."

Your intellect is as sharp as a razor today, blessing you with the power to choose your words with care. Nevertheless, there may be internal discord between what you want and what you actually put out in the universe. Thankfully, imaginative Neptune is cooperating with resourceful Venus in your 12th House of Mystical Mystery, enabling you to dream your way into the future. The resolution to your current split between your head and your heart comes easily once you elevate your personal desires into spiritual pursuits.

If a lingering disagreement about long-term goals returns to the main stage today, you might be happily surprised with the outcome. A supportive connection between gracious Venus in your 11th House of Friends and visionary Neptune offers you the magic of faith and forgiveness, inspiring you to rekindle your hopes and dreams. Most conflicts now could be avoided if you simply try to look at the current events from a different point of view. Plato wrote, "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle."

Your confidence is your best weapon for calming any resistance you might face in relationships now. The proud Leo Moon forms mutual trines with both cautious Saturn and rebellious Uranus, giving you the perfect balance between conservative and radical behavior. Invest your energy wisely today so you can use it effectively over the weeks ahead. Metaphysician Manly P. Hall wrote, "Moderation is the secret of survival."

You have the luxury of knowing that swiftly changing circumstances won't throw your life into chaos now, thanks to the stabilizing influence of Saturn. You trust yourself -- and others are more likely to trust you -- as a result of an emotionally supportive Moon-Saturn trine. A quiet sense of self-assurance allows you to compromise if that's what it takes to get the job done. Thankfully, there's no need to give up any of your authority or power in the process. Henry Ford said, "You don't have to hold a position in order to be a leader."

Vulnerable feelings linger from unresolved interpersonal tensions today. You want to glide through the weekend without delving too deeply into your emotions, but this short-term strategy might not work as well as you wish. A relationship may hang in the balance of what you say now. However, your hesitation won't last long since irrepressible Uranus enters the picture to spur you on. Setting your goals too high invites disappointment if you're unable to reach them. Nevertheless, you can't change what you refuse to confront.

You exude a graceful balance when interacting with people today, combining a fierce independence with a large dose of respect for cooperation. Practical behavior works wonders as the lively Leo Moon harmonizes with hardworking Saturn and ingenious Uranus. Temper your flights of enthusiasm with smart thinking. Even if you want to focus on the good news, don't be afraid of exploring the dark shadows for the treasures they offer. Greek philosopher Heraclitus wrote, "A hidden connection is stronger than an obvious one."

Your desires originate from a deeper place within you today, encouraging you to play for keeps in all you do. However, you may be so excited that you misjudge the amount of effort and commitment required to achieve satisfaction. Thankfully, the radiant Leo Moon harmonizes with deliberate Saturn and brilliant Uranus, blessing you with the ability to consider all your options prior to making the best possible choice. Vincent van Gogh wrote, "Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together."

Demonstrating your maturity is a simple matter today as long as you overlook petty issues so you can focus on your priorities. A friendly trine between the responsive Moon and responsible Saturn brings an abundance of common sense into your life. However, the lunar connection to irrepressible Uranus suddenly reveals too many choices to pursue. You won't have any problems if you watch your boundaries. Nevertheless, you'll never know your capabilities unless you push past your fears. If the sky is the limit, there wouldn't be human footprints on the Moon.

Accidentally spilling the beans may prove to be socially embarrassing, so monitor what you say and keep a playful conversation from turning too serious. Nevertheless, even the most innocent flirting could stir fearful emotions and provoke a jealous response today. Conflicting planetary signals make it tricky to decide which course of action is the most sensible one. Although you're free to make whatever choice you want, you're not free from the consequences of your choice. Tennessee Ernie Ford said, "Know yourself -- and know your audience."

A strange mixture of positive and negative energy morphs into steady progress today. The performance-driven Leo Moon is moving through your 10th House of Status, urging you to reflect on your current place in the outer world along with your goals. The Moon harmonizes with sobering Saturn and independent Uranus, giving you a clear and self-directed view of reality. Your feelings are based on practical issues now, so don't let anyone talk you out of your perceptions when you know what's best. Tune into your heart and follow your intuition.

Your unwavering enthusiasm empowers you to drive a hard bargain because others are no match for your courage and follow-through today. In fact, you become unbeatable once you dig in your heels. Unfortunately, your uncharacteristic rigidity can also anchor you to an incorrect assumption or a bad decision if you're not open to the possibility of being wrong. Thankfully, an ingenious Moon-Uranus trine enables you to change your mind and raise the level of your game. Take care of business with more brains and less bravado.

Your practical nature inspires you to skillfully untangle a complicated situation today, while still allowing your intuition to guide your overall strategy. Friends or colleagues who have been at odds with one another just might find a solution now with your sensible advice. A smooth Moon-Saturn trine empowers you to accomplish a lot without working too hard or turning into an arrogant authoritarian. Self-discipline is the key to managing even the fastest-moving situations with calm confidence.

A well-considered evaluation of your goals offers real possibilities for success ahead. The expressive Leo Moon creates easy trines with methodical Saturn and spontaneous Uranus, inspiring you to balance these opposite planetary principles to maximize your chances for satisfaction. Work toward building structures that will endure, for Saturn rewards extra effort. But don't wait around forever or you'll lose the singular power of now.

A brilliant move on your part might inflate your self-esteem, encouraging you to take on more than you can handle. Thankfully, the demonstrative Leo Moon trines inventive Uranus, enabling you to rush to the rescue at the very last moment with unconventional solutions. Fortunately, an emotionally constructive Moon-Saturn trine provides additional strength as long as you maintain integrity in all that you do. Do what is right and not what is easy.

You are ready and able to commit to expanding your life in new directions today. Your vision for the future has meaning and there's nothing holding you back. Thankfully, the strength of your convictions makes your message inspiring to others and your persuasive skills help you explain your mission clearly. Your mind is made up and you're not interested in compromising now. However, an overactive Sun-Jupiter combination entices you to expend your energy foolishly. Instead of overwhelming your allies with your unchecked exuberance, control your passion to advance your cause.

Your view of the world seems so certain now that you don't hesitate in your pursuit of your goals. However, the Sun's shift into expansive Sagittarius motivates you to widen your vision and move beyond pragmatic objectives. But don't rest on your past actions when there's still so much more to do. Creating a simple plan without a lot of bells and whistles can vastly improve your professional and personal relationships while moving you closer to your destination. Proper preparation prevents poor performance.

Your appetite for food, fun or fame may be extreme today as you head down the path of excess. However, the Sun's shift into uplifting Sagittarius brightens your 7th House of Relationships, bringing adventurous people into your life that open doors to new avenues of growth. Although you might be overwhelmed as high-spirited friends kick up a bit of excitement now, it could fall on you to set your own limits. Motivational speaker Dave Ramsey says, "Sometimes you have to tell yourself no so later you can tell yourself yes."

Signals are mixed today as the cosmos tells you to narrow your focus while simultaneously expanding your horizons to take in the entire picture. The Moon's shift into fastidious Virgo reminds you to doublecheck details and cautiously curb your expectations while concentrating on completing one task at a time. Meanwhile, the Sun shoots into optimistic Sagittarius, encouraging you to stretch your boundaries and demonstrate your enthusiasm at work. Paradoxically, once you accept things just as they are, then you are free to choose what you do next.

Exercising the right amount of self-restraint needs to be top priority today. The growing influence of planets in fiery Sagittarius traveling through your 5th House of Self-Expression lifts your spirits and provokes acts of spontaneity. However, an indulgent Sun-Jupiter connection tempts you to overstate your case or overstep your limits. Although your future is looking bright now, stern Saturn's presence is a strict reminder that you must walk before you run. It doesn't matter how much progress you make at first as long as you do not stop.

You want nothing more than to bring your life back into balance as the Moon returns to your earthy sign. However, you can't help but set your sites far into the distance when the Sun shifts into inspirational Sagittarius, drawing out your inner visionary. On one hand, you're only interested in the practical applications of your analytical thinking. But on the other hand, you're not overly concerned with the machinations of the real world now. Let your thoughts roam, partake in philosophical discussions, and delay initiating action while you further develop your plans.

You are bound to be distracted by one thing after another today, even if you do your best to focus on your assigned tasks. The Sun's shift into energetic Sagittarius and your 3rd House of Communication encourages you to speak the truth as you see it, even if it ruffles someone's feathers. It might be easier to remain silent and do your job, but you're probably willing to pay the price in order to claim your power. Doing the right thing brings true satisfaction.

You're eager to make a bold move to improve your finances today. Unfortunately, an exuberant Sun-Jupiter alignment can trick you into seeing opportunity where there is none. Exercise caution when starting anything new because you may attract exaggerating partners who don't live up to their promises. Verifying credentials before you invest your faith or money could make the difference between failure and success. Forewarned is forearmed.

You are fully aware of how much work there is to do yet you may encounter internal resistance before you even start. The efficient Virgo Moon's presence in your 10th House of Career improves your chances for professional success by encouraging sound methods over rash actions. However, your popularity skyrockets when the radiant Sun enters your extroverted sign, giving you extra energy and a sunny disposition. Everyone sees what you appear to be, but only a special few experience who you truly are.

Although you are as interested as ever in getting ahead in your career, personal growth becomes as important as external achievements now. The Sun's move into adventurous Sagittarius and your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery invites you to go on a metaphysical quest. A new wave of curiosity opens windows of awareness and increases your sense of connection with the cosmos. However, your expanded interests can be too much of a good thing. Although it seems like limiting your options will make your life less complicated, narrowing your focus actually facilitates going deeper into your exploration of sacred spaces.

Your attention is shifting away from concrete career objectives and toward more community involvement. A newfound sense of idealism is entering your life just in time for the holiday season. If you recently placed all your eggs in the basket of work-related success, you can now count your chickens and see where there is need for improvement. It's time to move on; your future is calling in ways that you cannot refuse.

Aim high professionally and push the envelope by promoting yourself more aggressively now. The Sun's entry into your 10th House of Career brings opportunities for advancement and recognition. Don't let modesty constrain your ambition. If you're not reaching further than you think you should, you're probably not trying hard enough. Anything is possible when your faith is bigger than your fears.

Although you are generally upbeat about your future today, danger still lurks in the dark corners of your mind. You believe that you're ready for nearly anything, but could find yourself in over your head if you underestimate the amount of work it will entail to complete a job. Sloppy thinking leads to misjudgment, so be careful what you take on now. Although someone may ride to your rescue with a wonderful plan, their intentions might also be better than what they can deliver. Start small; finish big.

You are in luck today if you're looking for positive recognition at work. Within reason, nearly anything you want now is yours while quick-witted Mercury titillates auspicious Jupiter in your 6th House of Employment. You are capable of presenting information in a way that others won't find offensive at all -- even if you're saying something they don't want to hear. Use your charisma wisely. A single truth can shine through a million lies.

You are blessed with the ability to persuade people to your point of view today without making them feel pressured in any way. You don't even need to itemize the pros and cons to convince others to follow your lead. Your ideas about improving efficiency are so innovative that everyone immediately knows you're right. Although you're at the top of your game now, don't let self-confidence turn into hubris. Arrogance is a sign of weakness; humility is a sign of greatness.

Your optimistic thoughts overpower your pessimistic doubts, triggering dreams of a better life ahead. Recent struggles fade into the past as you look forward to a productive week at work, even if you're approaching a major deadline. Positive thinking brings measurable results quicker than you expect. Nevertheless, be ready for some good old-fashioned family fun when the opportunity permits. Author William Feather wrote, "Plenty of people miss their share of happiness, not because they never found it, but because they didn't stop to enjoy it."

Although an unexpected surge of good feelings encourages you to start new projects now, you might also experience a secondary wave of emotions that waters the seeds of doubt. This wild ride is sponsored by a buoyant Mercury-Jupiter alignment and a suppressive Sun-Pluto connection. Thankfully, your fixed sense of purpose enables you to transform negativity into positive action. Today's determination leads to tomorrow's success.

You are enthusiastic about developing an ambitious strategy to make money today, but you could run into trouble turning your ideas into reality when you get hung up on minute details. Naturally, you prefer to put blinders on so you're not distracted by unrelated noise and irrelevant facts. However, an exuberant Mercury-Jupiter sextile boosts your ability to inspire others with your far-reaching plan now. Your intellectual prowess overcomes your instinct to stay safely within the box. Life is too short not to try something new.

You might have a specific agenda now but it's possible to get carried away with your own excitement. In fact, loquacious Mercury forms a cooperative sextile with excessive Jupiter in your sign, compelling you to say more than you intended. Unfortunately, you can't rewind time and take your words back. Thankfully, you may be able to do sufficient damage control if you are willing to apologize. Nevertheless, it's still more efficient to think twice before you utter another sound. Instead of talking your way into trouble, channel your enthusiasm into your work.

You are usually able to keep your feelings hidden from others by putting up a stoic front. Nevertheless, you're now tempted to throw caution to the wind and let everyone know what you need while talkative Mercury harmonizes with boundless Jupiter. Your thoughts are carried far beyond their usual orbits, prompting you to be less practical and more philosophical. Nevertheless, it might be quite embarrassing when you must publicly acknowledge what you said in anticipation of a warm reception. The smarter you get, the less you speak.

Smart and caring friends seem to know the right words to untangle your emotional knots today. Jovial Jupiter supports communicator Mercury in your 1st House of Personality, enabling you to engage in an intense discussion in a calm manner. Positive energy stimulates your intuition, pulling information and ideas from your subconscious. Fortunately, you can present an idealistic plan with confidence and clarity now. Remember, you will make a greater impact with a whisper than a shout because your message touches people's hearts as well their minds.

Although you inspire people with your ambitious ideas, you could also be the brunt of their criticism because they think you're so disorganized now. However, you are working harder than anyone realizes to put the pieces of your plan in order. Mental Mercury harmonizes with expansive Jupiter in your 10th House of Career, encouraging you to extol the virtues of positive thinking. Nevertheless, the more you try to exert control, the more your opponents will struggle against you. Claim your power, but not at the expense of anyone else.

You see good news on the horizon as you project your current job prospects onto your vision of future prosperity. However, your view is biased and it's tempting to overlook potential problems. But you're not concerned about such things now if you are doing well. Paradoxically, broadening your thinking will allow you to change directions, even if you believe your professional trajectory is aimed at success. Nevertheless, do your homework before you speak your mind. Your advanced planning will be appreciated more than you know.

You possess ample wisdom to express your ideas intelligently, no matter how shaky you might feel today. If you are faced with an intense situation, your all-encompassing perspective gives you the vision to handle the emotional turmoil. While you might not resolve all your concerns right away, at least you can begin to think about the issues in a constructive manner. You'll have more to give others if you take care of your own needs first. Author Paulo Coelho writes, "The world is changed by examples, not by opinions."

A clear purpose and a tight focus inspire you to use your intellect for a higher purpose. Thankfully, you're unlikely to be overwhelmed by the drama today because everyone seems to be doing their best to maintain a sense of civility and rationality. Messenger Mercury delivers a much-needed reality check as it runs into authoritative Saturn, but you might try to ignore it if you are convinced your beliefs are correct. Thomas Dewar wrote, "Minds are like parachutes -- they only function when they are open."

Confusing optimism with denial will likely lead you down a path that takes you to the wrong destination. Rational Mercury joins up with confining Saturn today, demanding that you pay close attention to the details, especially with respect to your core values and how they conflict with someone else's. It's tempting to work yourself into a corner by fearfully clinging to an old habit or belief. Nevertheless, assuming a non-confrontational position allows for multiple points of view. Acknowledging another person's truth is not the same as embracing it.

Maintaining your confidence is nearly impossible today if people are being overly critical of everything you do. Just as you strike up the marching band to play your happy song, someone comes along and rains on your parade. Your happiness suffers when glib Mercury encounters austere Saturn, forcing you to ponder the more serious side of life. You might even consider solitude as a viable alternative to the never-ending uncertainty of relationships. Nevertheless, you know what to do; start squeezing those lemons to make the best batch of lemonade anyone's ever tasted.

Shaking off your lingering negativity is an uphill battle today. You may be discouraged while quick-witted Mercury opposes pessimistic Saturn, but focusing on the issue at hand enables you to turn a bleak situation into a successful endeavor. Although there are heavy responsibilities resting on your shoulders now, you must reconsider your priorities so you can stand up and deal with a potentially frustrating set of circumstances. Examining your resistance is the first step to putting your life back on track.

Although a wave of discouragement is washing through your life, you can seize this opportunity to assess which commitments are worth keeping, and which ones need to end. This is an excellent time to manifest your heart's desire into reality by talking about your personal goals. However, concentrating on one specific field of interest may require you to say no to others. The good news is you truly understand the consequences of your current decisions. Clarity is power; the clearer you are about what you want, the more your brain knows how to get there.

You're tempted to shut down and withdraw from communication now, but avoidance will cause much greater problems later on. The gravitas of these times is confirmed when contemplative Mercury joins authoritative Saturn, giving you the impression that your mental meanderings will lead you to the truth. Unfortunately, relying on the logic of your brain diminishes the message of your heart. Honoring your feelings empowers your decisions if you're also willing to remain open-minded to the needs of others.

Your fantasies come to an abrupt ending today as someone in your immediate environment reads you the riot act. It may seem as if their criticism lacks understanding and empathy. You might retreat emotionally as your fear of rejection rears its ugly head. Breaking into new ground is not easy to accomplish now, but pushing forward is your smartest strategy. The cosmos is instructing you to be as specific as you can about your desires before striving to fulfill them. There are forces at play that are greater than you, waiting to help you reach your dreams.

Focusing on solutions instead of problems puts you in a positive place where people can respond to you more favorably. Although the course of least resistance is alluring now, don't let your one-dimensional thinking turn into self-doubt when philosophical Mercury conspires with critical Saturn. Thankfully, your natural curiosity drives you to get to the bottom of a mystery today. You are at the edge of a significant breakthrough if you are ready to move on from outmoded ideas and discover new ones that will better serve your interests. Nelson Mandela said, "It always seem impossible until it's done."

Your mind can shut down the vagaries of your heart so fast today that it leaves your head spinning. Nevertheless, your best ideas are still challenged by nearly everyone that you bring into your inner circle as contentious Mercury strategizes with obstinate Saturn in your very social sign. Thoughtfully consider your next move or you will find yourself backpedaling sooner than you think. Listen to those around you; applying self-restraint now is more effective than doing damage control later on.

Although you're looking for solid answers, people probably give you weak excuses if you try to pin them down. If you're not receiving the approval you desire today, or if others disappoint you in some other manner, don't take it so personally. It's all too easy now to see everything in a negative light as perceptive Mercury hooks up with cold Saturn. This sobering conjunction lands in your 12th House of Inner Peace, rattling your confidence while you yearn for something greater than material satisfaction. Moshe Dayan said, "Freedom is the oxygen of the soul."

You may feel restrained by the necessity to work as part of a group today. However, your position is different than everyone else's and you're compelled to share it regardless of the consequences. The stakes of the current conflict are raised and then raised again; power struggles are symptomatic of repressed anger that needs to find constructive expression. Nevertheless, consider the cost of doing battle before you start a fight that escalates tension instead of resolving it.

It doesn't seem right if your best ideas are shot down today before they are even heard. However, messenger Mercury's conjunction with strict Saturn is likely to reveal the weakest links in your chain of logic. It's a mistake to hunker down and resist the opposition now; there will be time for fighting soon enough. Instead, listen to the feedback, even if it's excessive in its negativity. Don't fall into the trap of self-doubt. Figure out what you can do to upgrade your game, and then fearlessly put your plan into motion.

Deep tremors of change begin to shake in a manner that may eventually alter your direction in life. A profound reexamination of your beliefs could leave you doubting what you knew to be true in the past. Thankfully, close friends or relatives offer constructive advice, and you can rely on them for helpful guidance now. Although you might feel as if your reality is being jolted, whatever is left standing will be more powerful than ever. Paulo Coelho wrote, "Knowledge without transformation is not wisdom."

Amidst the fun and frivolity, you may experience a sense of urgency with respect to your goals. You could even become a bit fanatic and fight for something you strongly believe in, whether or not it's a justifiable conviction. You have powerful work to do now and, fortunately, the fortitude to do it. Resist your tendency to be silent about important issues. Although some people might prefer you to be less persistent in your pursuit of answers now, it's more productive to face your questions head on than to postpone the confrontation for another day.

The intensity of interpersonal dynamics could interfere with your holiday celebrations today. You may be overly ambitious as you strive to resolve a lingering disagreement, or open the door to a deeper level of sharing with others. Old rules still apply, but you're in a new arena that's likely to bring up issues lurking beneath the surface. Do your best to sidestep unwinnable debates that provoke religious or political extremism. Absolute certainty is often a sign of insecurity, so if you feel yourself puffing up with self-righteousness at the dinner table, have a laugh at your own expense. Taking the high road aids everyone's digestion.

Your relationship world is enlivened with new people and experiences today, but too many intense interactions can leave you feeling overwhelmed rather than invigorated. Optimistic Jupiter squares mysterious Pluto in your 7th House of Partners, casting shadows of doubt over your high hopes. Encouragement from someone may be matched by discouragement from others, but this is no reason to give up on your dreams. Let go of your old assumptions that block progress. What was true in the past might not be true in the future.

You have your heart set on a very specific flow of events today, and any deviation from your preferences can send you into a tailspin. Everything seems magnified, making it difficult to maintain a healthy perspective on what's important and what is not. Your high expectations motivate you to undertake more than you can manage. Undoubtedly, you will be busier than usual, but you could also receive extra attention for the inspiration you are to others. No matter how the day unfolds, be the kind of leader that you would want to follow.

Powerful opinions can stress a friendship or lead to a personal breakthrough in self-expression. Fasten your seatbelts and get ready for a rocket ship ride as potent Pluto squares exaggerating Jupiter in your 2nd House of Values. Pluto intensifies the pressure to know what you want, and where you want to go. If you're on track, a deep well of material and psychological resources propel you along. But if you're still stuck with an old model, you may have to tear it down and start all over. The good news is that every end is a new beginning.

Although you might be celebrating with friends and family today, tumultuous waves of evolutionary change are still washing into your life. You are very resourceful now that powerful Pluto squares beneficial Jupiter in your sign, so be courageous and commit to lofty goals. Although your greatest dreams for success may be magnified, fears of the unknown can make finding your way tricky. Nevertheless, as Olympic champion Gail Devers says, "Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try."

You may discover that you and someone else are not on the same page regarding your outlook on life. It's time to recommit, compromise, or just move on. Your ideas about what it means to be part of a relationship could drastically change now. Allow yourself to disagree without becoming disagreeable. Remember, differing views can spice up a personal interaction as long as emotions and egos don't get out of hand.

You are driven to demonstrate your worth today, yet making a critical decision is difficult because there is potential everywhere and you don't know which path to take. You could elevate your spirits and improve your self-esteem by seeking adventure now. But rather than doing anything dramatic, you might just spend your energy dreaming about future possibilities. It doesn't matter if the looming changes are psychological or material; you are being asked to widen your perspective.

There is no room in your life for small-minded thinking; the sky is truly the limit, and the time for your metamorphosis is now. It's as if you are a fuzzy caterpillar that's transforming into a beautiful butterfly. Nevertheless, your dreams won't materialize without hard work, since you must struggle and fight your way out of the cocoon. There's no need to be discouraged if your progress seems slow or even stuck since Mother Nature operates on her own schedule.

Opportunities for personal and professional growth are more apparent when you're willing to sell yourself with greater enthusiasm. Reach further instead of playing it safe as powerful planetary forces gather in your 12th House of Spirituality, raising hidden emotions from the depths of your unconscious. Great waves of desire are accompanied by alternating ripples of fear, sweeping reason out of the way. Passion provokes philosophical debates in which there are major differences of opinion. Beliefs are being tested so prepare to have yours challenged and changed.

You are stepping into an exciting new world, and it could feel as if your dreams are coming to life. Go ahead and acknowledge your deep yearnings for success while your goals are within close proximity. Nevertheless, you must apply all of your wisdom and maturity to the present moment to manifest your vision. Although you are inclined to push yourself too hard now, staying in touch with your emotions keeps you on your spiritual path.
