Take a deep look at the most important relationships in your life to find ways to improve them or discern which, if any, no longer meet your needs. If all is going well, your success might arouse jealousy in others or leave you feeling strangely unfulfilled as sweet Venus joins suspicious Pluto in your 10th House of Status. Nevertheless, stretching your limits leads to desiring someone or something that costs more than it's worth. Hippocrates wrote, "Everything in excess is opposed by nature."

Suppressed passions push their way into awareness today, deepening the bonds of a significant partnership. However, you could spread yourself too thin when your key planet Venus squares excessive Jupiter in your 6th House of Routine. But the stakes are higher than you realize, and your actions can stir up unexpectedly powerful emotions now. The outcome is uncertain; even if you think truth is on your side, the rules of the game may be changing all too quickly. Stay light on your feet, and remember that maintaining your objectivity allows you to successfully navigate the twists and turns of life.

You're unlikely to change your mind today once your heart is set on something or someone. Vulnerable Venus joins unfathomable Pluto in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, scaring you with the intensity of your unexpressed feelings. You are driven to push them out into the open, even if your normal response is to bury your emotions. Unfulfilled needs can stand in the way of your happiness now. Although the risks are substantial, your determination is strong. Focusing on the big issues and looking beyond your transient personal desires produce the most positive results.

Expressing your desires sounds like a wise move today until someone unexpectedly tries to silence you. Apparently, the intense passions that you're bringing out into the open can be upsetting at first, yet they could also build intimacy if you're willing to go deep. Although you might not have planned things this way, you need to give relationships top priority when sultry Venus bumps into shadowy Pluto. But the road to emotional equilibrium is not a smooth one. Nevertheless, as Buddhist teacher Thich Nhat Hanh says, "Awareness is like the Sun. When it shines on things, they are transformed."

Acknowledgment of your efforts may not come readily as evaluating Venus joins insatiable Pluto in your 6th House of Service. Unfortunately, relationships are undermined by mistrust or manipulation today, especially when secrecy is involved. Expressing your discontent doesn't help now unless you recognize what's wrong and attempt to deliver fast answers. Maximize the use of your resources by networking with others. As psychologist Brene Brown writes, "Imperfections are not inadequacies; they are reminders that we're all in this together."

Your emotional intensity re-energizes a partnership or strengthens your resolve in a significant negotiation. Nevertheless, in the midst of all your obligations today, find some playtime to kick back and enjoy yourself. Searching for meaning in interpersonal relationships can take you out of the casual realms, and into more intimate spaces. An indulgent Venus-Jupiter square amplifies your cravings, and tempts you to ask for more than you need. Ritu Ghatourey writes, "Satisfaction is not always the fulfillment of what you want; it is the realization of how blessed you are for what you have."

Harmony at home and the approval of your friends are less important than connecting with your deepest desires today. Nevertheless, you can't just ignore the mundane promises you made to others. But neither can you deny the feelings that are bubbling up from your subconscious as magnetic Venus dances with provocative Pluto in your 4th House of Roots. You must integrate your needs with the practical side of your life. The 14th Dalai Lama said, "The way to overcome negative thoughts and destructive emotions is to develop opposing positive emotions that are stronger and more powerful."

Sometimes your feelings are so powerful that you don't know what to do with them. Normally, a sexy Venus-Pluto hookup creates an emotional tidal wave that's beyond your control. Romance heats up to the boiling point. However, this time around, the conjunction occurs in your 3rd House of Information, allowing you to talk about your desires in a responsible manner rather than simply acting on them. Author James Humes wrote, "The art of communication is the language of leadership."

You can't help but see the best in others, making you eager to gamble on their potential now. While it's healthy to push the edge of the envelope and broaden your horizons, make sure to maintain your bearings by using your moral compass. Acting with integrity may lack the excitement you crave today, but the tangible results of your ambitious plans are certainly worth the sacrifice. Author Anthony Williams wrote, "If we seek a positive outcome, we must begin with a positive attitude."

You exude an irresistible magnetism that makes your relationship world more exciting today. But your newfound lust for life also leads to control issues or problems stemming from possessiveness. Nevertheless, jealousy and envy are traps created by a lack of self-confidence. Thankfully, your sense of social responsibility could save you from the consequences of intense personal desires. Never overestimate your weakness or underestimate your strength.

Hidden feelings may pop out unexpectedly today. But your odd sense of liberation might not last long because loving Venus hooks up with mysterious Pluto to reveal deeper layers of meaning. You could unwittingly step onto a relationship roller coaster ride as you discover new sources of pleasure while breaking free of unrewarding alliances and responsibilities. Remember, the hardest prison to escape from is your own mind.

Mistrust may arise among your friends due to someone's secrecy, or a severe difference in values. But even your coworkers can create drama when gracious Venus runs into cynical Pluto in your 11th House of Groups. Although it's uncomfortable to deal with an unpleasant subject, bringing difficult issues to the surface is more productive today than ignoring them. Denial won't make anything go away; it just ensures that the problem doesn't get resolved. Transparency is your friend.

You're more likely projecting your fantasies onto others than perceiving them as they are when you peer into the magical metaphysical mirror of life. Everything could happen so fast that you're not prepared for the final outcome as trickster Mercury harmonizes with shocking Uranus. A single stroke of genius reveals the truth, breaks the looking glass, and shatters your illusions. Success arrives when your persistence overcomes the resistance.

Lingering emotional issues appear to be resolved in a momentary flash of awareness today. An electrifying Mercury-Uranus trine breaks the spell with a sudden epiphany that can free you from any negativity. Although there is light at the end of the tunnel, this welcome illumination does not resolve everything. Expect buried emotions to continue to bubble up into consciousness over the days ahead. Remember, the best dreams happen when you're fully awake.

You may be recovering from a situation where your excessive enthusiasm and unrestrained honesty recently got the best of you. Although you're not one to think twice before sharing information, at least make sure it's ready for prime time. Every cloud has a silver lining; today's brilliant Mercury-Uranus trine hands you the keys of innovation that enable you to escape from your self-created situation. Author Jim Rohn writes, "Your life does not get better by chance; it gets better by change."

An excessive amount of self-confidence encourages you to overstep your bounds when talking about your feelings today. Chatty Mercury's flowing trine with innovative Uranus activates your 6th House of Health, giving you the right words to state your intentions about improving your lifestyle. But don't take the easy way out by creating a plan based upon shallow thinking. Put the transformational Scorpio Moon to work by taking the first steps toward creating the future of your dreams.

Your intellectual pursuits could hijack your day, and there are no limits to how far your mind can travel. Cerebral Mercury's creative trine to revolutionary Uranus in your 9th House of Faraway Places inspires original concepts that can help you overcome an impasse with someone stuck in the past. But don't push too hard or too fast; be patient with conservative thinkers that may require more time to catch up to your progressive ideas. Demonstrate your leadership skills but don't get so far ahead of the pack that you're on your own.

You are quite the smooth operator today, and may have a magic touch for inspiring incompatible people to work well together. If you take on unreliable partners or stretch your credibility by promising too much, a surprising Mercury-Uranus trine reveals unconventional ways to get you out of a jam. But don't trust your intellect alone; demonstrating your emotional IQ now enables you to smooth over someone's fear by appealing to the heart and not just the head.

Silence may be golden, but you probably won't find any quiet time today as your brain lights up with unorthodox ideas. Verbal self-restraint disappears when a fiery trine from uncontainable Uranus to chatty Mercury in your 3rd House of Communication frees you to speak your mind. Some thoughts come and go, but you will know which ones are critical because they won't leave you alone. Elvis Presley wrote, "Truth is like the Sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't going away."

You have plenty of chores to do today and, thankfully, the intellectual resources to accomplish your goals. It may be frustrating to realize that your recent judgment was not your best, but the crafty Mercury-Uranus trine offers you radical alternatives to your current trajectory. Although your reactions might be magnified with the moody Moon in your sign, you possess the brainpower to turn your best ideas into reality.

Although it really does "take a village," sometimes there are differences of opinion among the residents that make progress difficult today. Although dissent may create a temporary roadblock, everyone seems to be working for the same cause now that communicator Mercury harmonizes with revolutionary Uranus. Free-flowing conversations break down all barriers and open doors to more productive alliances.

If you feel lost in unfamiliar physical or psychological territory, the brilliance of a Mercury-Uranus trine will supply the smarts you need to find your way back home. Nevertheless, the emotionally intense Scorpio Moon may challenge your assumptions about your friends. Reassess your social relationships with an objective eye, even if you must reduce someone's role in your life. Kindness is a wonderful quality but it can be costly if a supposed ally takes more than he or she gives.

Your radical ideas are often far ahead of their time, yet occasionally you experience an epiphany that has immediate relevance. Today's electric Mercury-Uranus trine sparks unique questions, exciting conversations, and surprising answers. The rules that limit what you often think may be suspended as you experiment with new perspectives, allowing you to leap over conventional methods in your pursuit of success. Neale Donald Walsch writes, "Life begins at the end of your comfort zone."

Your heightened sensitivity enables you to use your psychic powers to better understand what others are thinking today. A conductive Mercury-Uranus trine extends your intellectual antennae into the 10th House of Public Status, enhancing your intuition and emboldening you to contribute original ideas that will impact your place in the world. Thankfully, you're working with a full arsenal of intelligence and ingenuity that puts you in the zone where you can be smart and socially skillful at the same time. Trust your gut and speak from your heart.

You are not listening to those people who tell you to chill out today because you have already set your agenda and plan on sticking to it. Nevertheless, you still want to get to the bottom of a mystery that comes to light when someone's actions don't match their words. You might be falling down the rabbit hole because nothing is as it seems. You may be shocked at what you learn when you discover the truth. Don't bother trying to hide your surprise. Be like Robert Frost who said, "I am not a teacher, but an awakener."

Your uncharacteristic willingness to change your opinion in an instant could save the day. Normally, you Bulls prefer to not alter your course mid-stream. However, you don't even need valid information before you are already speaking your truth today. Ensure that your plan doesn't run into an insurmountable hurdle by evaluating everything you hear with an objective ear. The eyes are useless when the mind is blind.

Everyone else seems to have plenty of time for some personal rest and relaxation, while you're too busy to take a short break. Unfortunately, there aren't enough hours in the day to complete all the projects that are still on your plate. Thankfully, the unyielding Scorpio Moon energizes your 6th House of Logistics, enabling you to manage the growing complexity. You're a champ at juggling several balls at once while making it all look easy. Your only enemy now is yourself because you can be so easily distracted. There's a lot at stake, so concentrate on the things that matter the most.

You can think of countless ways to express what's in your heart, but when it comes down to initiating a discussion today, you wonder if it's actually worth the effort. There are many forces shouting for your attention now, and the loudest ones are also the most uncomfortable. If you think you're just going to yell at someone and magically resolve all your interpersonal differences, you have another thing coming. Margaret Wheatley instructs, "Be brave enough to start a conversation that matters."

Your loyalty to your relatives runs deep today, leading you to participate in activities with them instead of heading off to be with your friends. Nevertheless, rebellious Uranus shocks the radiant Sun in your 5th House of Spontaneity, tempting you with exciting social possibilities. You possess the strength to turn down a fun invitation, but you may have momentary flashes of regret unless you do something to make your day extraordinary. Find a path that will lead you to adventure without creating questions about your devotion to your family.

Your restlessness is nearly unmanageable today, but staying aware of your feelings prevents serious problems down the road. There are many wonderful ideas moving so fast in your mind now that the inspirations come and go before you even have a chance to pick one and work with it. Nevertheless, trying to stop the mental flow will only drive your frustration higher. Instead, sit back and watch the show as if it were entertainment. Eckhart Tolle writes, "Observe your thoughts, don't believe them."

For someone who is supposed to be indecisive, there is nothing wishy-washy about your current beliefs. You know exactly which values motivate you and are ready to defend them now, no matter the cost. However, fighting over differences is just a distraction today. Instead, think about those people who inspire you to greater heights. Be innovative and apply their creativity to your process. Author Jack Dixon wrote, "If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results."

Processing bottled-up anger is a crucial component of finding happiness today. Something that shouldn't be important might stick in your mind and won't quit bothering you. Keeping your annoyance quiet is tempting but not advisable when the controlling Scorpio Moon squares contentious Mars. Let your feelings flow into the open gradually instead of waiting until they run the show. Rather than allowing resentment to create a mess, talk about minor irritations as they surface so everyone can move on. Live life to express, not impress.

Although you might appear to be in a good mood today, there are feelings you're choosing not to share. Thankfully, your upbeat manner can deflect some of the negativity you could otherwise attract. Don't waste energy worrying about what's unsaid; it will come out naturally when the time is right. Your emotions will continue to evolve until you're ready to talk about them in a couple of days. For now, put your best foot forward. Socrates wrote, "The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing."

You can't settle your nerves today because you're expecting something bad to happen, even if you don't know what it is. Unfortunately, believing is seeing and you'll likely manifest an event to satisfy your expectations. Thankfully, you can alter the course of your day by instead imagining something wonderful occurring. A sudden strike of lightning doesn't necessarily start a fire; it might just light up the sky for a brief moment to reveal the truth. Ken Keyes wrote, "You should always be aware that your head creates your world."

Holding onto an unresolved emotional issue could turn your day into an obstacle course. Fortunately, your entire metaphysical world can shift in a single instant as you see others in a new light. Although your friends may come to your rescue with their passion for life, it's up to you to open the door and let them in. You are standing at a fork in the road today, and you must either pick a route into the future, or turn back and hide in the past. When stated in those simple terms, the choice is easier than you think.

It's nearly impossible to see yourself as someone separate from your family or community; you are a fish that is part of a school. However, differences of opinions about issues that matter are now cause for great concern. You're not entirely sure you want to be a member of your group, but you have nowhere else to go. You wonder if you should modify your beliefs or try to sway the opinions of everyone else. There is no immediate answer to this dilemma; resolution can wait as long as you are asking the right questions and seeking a sensible path into the future.

Trusting your rational judgments is quite a challenge today, unless they are supported by an intuitive hunch. Although you might doubt your ability to guide anyone into the future, you are sitting on a gold mine of valid information that you can use to make the best decision. Don't worry if your current choices aren't making sense yet; if your course of action feels right, there's really no reason to justify your behavior to anyone else. Author Sonia Choquette wrote, "Your sixth sense should be your first sense."

It might feel as if fate is messing with you now as events impact your life in unexpected ways. Nevertheless, people's actions alter the trajectory of your day before you realize what is going on. Your uncertainty builds as the transformational Scorpio Moon creates mysterious aspects with three planets, flooding your 7th House of Others with powerful energy. Maintain your composure and take enough time to connect with your heart. Your emotional brilliance will shine through as long as you don't react too quickly. Today's mighty oak is just yesterday's nut that held its ground.

Paradoxically, the methodical routine of your job increases your creativity today. You are more likely to succeed if you're motivated by the desire to do something positive than if you're simply escaping something negative. You have untapped resources and underused talents that can help you improve your current situation, or fuel your search for a new opportunity. But there's no reason to isolate yourself if you're feeling less than confident. People will support you when you share your doubts, but remember, the highest form of self-expression is kindness.

There is a special kind of electricity in the air today that revitalizes you with the potential of pleasure. You are preparing to step into new territory, but must decide what to leave behind now so you can pursue the opportunities ahead. When your spirit is awakened, your resolve is strengthened and you want to put your life back on the fast track to happiness. Never let success go to your head; never let failure break your heart.

Light is shining into the shadows of your family history today, but you think that some memories might be better off left in the past. Avoid unnecessary conflict and limit your attention to the most fundamental issues where your concentrated effort allows you to overcome intractable obstacles. Once you clear your heart of what's no longer needed, you can utilize your precious resources to focus on manifesting your dreams for the future. Frank Sinatra said, "The best revenge is massive success."

You must learn more about your subject today and communicate with greater force if you are to be successful. But you might just need a break from the pressures of your regular routine. In fact, you're probably more preoccupied with the inner workings of your mind now than you are about succeeding at work. Nevertheless, the Moon's shift into extroverted Sagittarius reawakens your desire to impress others with your skills. Your newfound enthusiasm gives you the determination to strive for what you want, so be fearless in the pursuit of your dreams.

Ideas flow freely but you still want more openness and honesty in all your interactions today. However, the secretive Scorpio Moon puts money matters front and center now. Some subjects are more personal than others and you're not required to tell anyone about your fiscal concerns. Although refining your budget can produce positive changes that will make you proud, it's up to you to draw the line when deciding which details to share. As Gregory Peck said, "I have tales to tell, but I don't tell them."

It might seem as if you are running out of time to make some basic decisions about where to focus your intentions. Thankfully, you're so eager to get over your past that shifting into the next phase of your personal growth will be a piece of cake. Nevertheless, you may uncover some unresolved jealousy and anger that needs to be processed before you move on. Sometimes you don't realize the weight of the world you are carrying until you feel the lightness after its release.

The boundaries between your internal and external worlds are blurred now, preventing you from knowing the truth. Nevertheless, you must confront issues you don't want to face as the inscrutable Scorpio Moon moves through your 12th House of Endings. Thankfully, you can build an inner strength that carries you far into the future if you're willing to address your doubts and fulfill your obligations. Bryant McGill writes, "When you take care of business today, tomorrow takes care of itself."

Inexplicable events require you to process unresolved psychological issues that prevent you from reaching your full potential. The evolutionary Scorpio Moon continues to shift the energy in your personal life, encouraging you to break your ties to people who no longer support your goals. Nevertheless, you might feel as if you're on your own while the Moon stresses your 11th House of Teamwork. It doesn't matter if someone gives up on you now, as long as you don't give up on yourself.

Concerns in your professional life need to be resolved, and the sooner you start, the better. In fact, the dynamics in play are being reshuffled, motivating you to bring a sense of spirituality or community to your work. Unless you can meet your other obligations with greater efficiency today, you may be promising more than you can deliver. Although it might be necessary to make bigger changes, it's wise to take the simplest and most direct action available on all practical matters now.

Your vision for the future and the dedication to your beliefs reach a new level of commitment as subtle waves threaten to carry you off course. The Moon's current visit to your 9th House of Adventure might entice you to overextend on a project, yet the hope you feel may propel you further than you expect. The secret sauce is created by mixing in the right blend of practical thinking and intuitive inspiration. When you're sure of your priorities, you can be open to the ideas of others without worrying that you'll be overly influenced by them.

A conscious connection between purpose and possibility makes it easier for you to find and follow your star. The philosophical Sagittarius New Moon falls in your 9th House of Higher Education, presenting you with a learning opportunity or a chance to discover the world. The spiritual meaning of your life comes into clear focus, increasing your confidence and solidifying your commitment to achieve your goals. Choice, not circumstances, determines your success.

It's only natural to set your goals higher when you are sure you can reach them. However, you can't get away with false bravado when the cavalier Sagittarius New Moon occurs in your 8th House of Regeneration, sending you on a journey of self-discovery. Your emotional antennae are scanning the cosmos for more action, which can distract you from your personal work. Nevertheless, psychological and spiritual transformation is your key to happiness. Instead of trying to control the external flow of events, focus on improving your inner game.

Your perspective is changing, requiring you to take a fresh look at relationships when new partnerships and old alliances are put to the test. The Sagittarius New Moon energizes your 7th House of Others now, planting seeds of opportunity for making new connections or taking a current union to the next level. Nevertheless, settling down is unlikely with erratic Uranus in the picture. Don't expect to find a single right answer to so many complicated questions. Keep an open mind and try different approaches according to each situation. One size does not fit all.

Unexpected events at work can be shocking at first, yet ultimately broaden your horizons. The exuberant Sagittarius New Moon accentuates your 6th House of Self-Improvement, revealing unconventional alternatives to dull routines. So many things seem possible where there was previously no path at all. Your current challenge is to overcome ambivalence about your tedious chores when your desire for adventure is stirred. Writer Elbert Hubbard penned, "Responsibility is the price of freedom."

Although your intentions may be honorable, you could still mislead yourself, your partner, or a love interest without even knowing it. The extroverted Sagittarius New Moon activates your 5th House of Romance, emboldening you to soar high on the wings of inspiration. An abundance of social activities is invigorating to your soul, but tempts you to spread your energy too thin. Sometimes maturity means delaying the pursuit of pleasure. Author Adam Hochschild wrote, "Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short."

You don't have to travel to an exotic place to bring the thrill of adventure into your life now. The Sagittarius New Moon lands in your 4th House of Home and Family, emphasizing domestic activities and reaffirming the love you receive from those closest to you. Nevertheless, a bit of unexpected turbulence is likely today, so hold on tight while the winds are blowing. Author Louise May Alcott wrote, "I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship."

The atmosphere is electrically charged with anticipation, yet the fun you expect won't likely occur according to your plan. The Sagittarius New Moon sparks brush fires in your 3rd House of Distractions, bringing more excitement than you might want. Circumstances can change in the blink of an eye, but stay cool if chaos is rocking your world. Ben Franklin wrote, "If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins."

Rays of sunshine and hope can filter through the clouds to guide you in times of uncertainty while reinforcing your life's purpose. The philosophical Sagittarius New Moon galvanizes your 2nd House of Resources, expanding your sense of self-worth and inspiring a bold new approach to financial matters. Although eccentric Uranus brings surprises, your radical ideas are still best served by making careful plans. Confucius said, "Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure."

There is an extra bounce in your step, and your charisma can charm everyone you meet. You are genuinely enthusiastic about the prospects for the days ahead as the thrill-seeking Sagittarius New Moon invigorates your 1st House of Self. Nevertheless, an edgy Venus-Uranus square amplifies your attractions to weird people, places and ideas. Your wired energy has you moving at speeds that others can't match. Roman philosopher Seneca wrote, "Everything that exceeds the bounds of moderation has an unstable foundation."

Although you Goats can be extremely goal-oriented, joy is patiently waiting in the present moment. The visionary Sagittarius New Moon plants its inspirational seed in your 12th House of Spirituality, taking your mind off work and shifting your attention to metaphysical dimensions. This planetary ticket to ride can pull you off your schedule, and maybe entirely off the grid. Rather than fighting against these cosmic forces, give yourself permission to retreat from the serious business at hand and enjoy the magic of your imagination.

Like everyone else, you probably have a lot on your plate now. Nevertheless, set aside some time to revel in the camaraderie of your family and friends while the high-spirited Sagittarius New Moon empowers your 11th House of Community, reminding you of how much you enjoy this time of year. Although this exhilarating lunar influence sounds great, the noise may be a bit too much. You can still kick up your heels, but the fun and frivolity will last longer if you know when to stop.

Your ambitions open the doors to new opportunities at your current job, or drive you toward a different career path. You are wildly optimistic about the outcome while the far-seeing Sagittarius New Moon bolsters your 10th House of Public Life. Meanwhile, shocking Uranus shatters the status quo and brings originality to your desires, possibly upsetting your more traditional associates. Your longing for sudden change stirs restlessness, yet it's best to act with caution. Dr. James Dobson writes, "Make no important, life-shaping decisions quickly or impulsively, and when in doubt, stall for time."

Aiming beyond the visible horizon infuses you with hope, but it also may cause you to detach from your current obligations without telling anyone about your shift in priorities. The Sun's creative square with mystical Neptune carries you past the limitations of reason and into the metaphysical realms. Nevertheless, balancing your uplifting visions with practical applications helps to keep you grounded. There's nothing wrong with pursuing a higher cause as long as you remember to take care of business along the way. Work hard, dream big.

It's disconcerting when you can't rely on the same signs that normally keep you on track. But nothing is as it appears now, and just when you're certain that all is well, you realize that you're standing on unfamiliar ground in an entirely different world. Rather than relying on external signals or on the good advice of those you trust, accept the fact that your thoughts are actually altering the world around you. You can't afford to get lost today in a downward tumble of uncertainty or fear. Instead, upgrade your game by creating your own opportunities as you go.

Interesting people pop up today to offer exciting opportunities to pursue in business and in pleasure. Naturally, you don't want to miss your chance to make the most of a current situation, especially if new partnerships open doors previously not available. However, your hypercreative mind can perceive things that don't yet exist. Manifesting your dreams through hard work is possible, but don't fall into the trap of assuming there is a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow. It makes sense to exercise a little caution while the trickster energy is at work.

Your current idealism is admirable and acts as a powerful motivating force in your life now. However, holding on to unrealistic hopes can be a study in futility that leads to discouragement and doubt. Setting your goals too high might be disillusioning, yet a lack of ambition encourages laziness. The best remedy to the possibility of fantasies overtaking the real world is to increase your awareness through a regular spiritual practice of your choice. Whether you rely on yoga, meditation, prayer, or some other daily ritual, the key is to do it every day. Quiet the mind and the soul will speak.

Exercising your creativity in everything you do raises the quality of your work and increases your overall happiness. If there are no existing avenues for self-expression in your life now, make time to explore your inner artist and embrace your inner child. Avoid getting hooked on emotional confusion today, whether it originates from a business or personal relationship. People may be playing on your fears to elicit a desired response. If you choose to devote yourself to a dream, do it for your own and not for someone else's.

You are quite optimistic about recent events on the home front, even if they are the source of high anxiety. Discussions with a concerned friend may be enough to open your mind to see the current situation in an entirely different light. Thankfully, your new approach can take the pressure off stressful family dynamics today as long as you don't assume your new point of view is the only one. Robert Dilts wrote, "Flexibility comes from having multiple choices; wisdom comes from having multiple perspectives."

There seems to be no end to the amount of communication that is required to keep your current relationships in order. Although there's potential for achieving a new level of understanding with those closest to you today, there's also the possibility of losing steam before you reach any sort of agreement. You are treading on tricky ground; if you push too hard, your gains will disappear in a puff of smoke. However, if you give up too soon, all your previous accomplishments will be for naught. Running away from your problems is a race you'll never win.

Although you Scorpions are generally known for your intense realism, you may have temporarily joined the New Age Club whose slogan is "All is Good." Four planets are currently camping out in your 2nd House of Self-Worth, pumping up your confidence to new heights. Of course, you're likely to return to your more pragmatic position soon enough; in the meantime, make the most of your uplifting vision. Do it with passion or not at all.

Your senses are so wide open today that you might perceive things that are normally invisible. Your theme song is, "On a Clear Day, You Can See Forever." However, without any boundaries to slow you down, you could easily overextend your vision, believing that what you see is what you get. Nevertheless, transcendent Neptune's stressful square to the Sun in your freedom-seeking sign weaves a web of fantasy around your world, bringing both enlightenment and confusion. Don't lose a diamond while chasing glitter.

There are days when you're the first one at the office and the last to leave. However, today is not one of them. You're more likely to excuse yourself from the humdrum of the outer world so you can retreat into the spiritual inner realms. This exploration into the nebulous dimensions of oceanic consciousness has recently blossomed into an important theme of your life. Motivational speaker Chris Gardner says, "The most inspiring leaders are not those who do their job, but those who pursue a calling."

Memos continue to arrive from the Department of Destiny, but each one contains a different message about the future. You like the idea of being in touch with otherworldly dimensions, but it's disconcerting when you can't easily integrate your intuition into your everyday world. Nevertheless, there is gold in the hills of your imagination and you are willing to juggle conflicting realities in order to receive the rewards.

The contrast between your current duties at work and your hopes for the future couldn't be greater. The good news is you now understand the difference between what you need to do on a day-to-day basis, and what you want to do on a long-term trajectory. The bad news is that you might grow dejected when you realize how far you are from your dreams. Thankfully, as long as you don't confuse reality and fantasy, you can forge a path between the mundane and the magnificent, striving to reach the stars while you're still here on Earth.

Every time you turn around today, someone else wants to make plans with you. Each offer sounds more exciting than the last, and you wish there were more hours in the day to fit everyone in. In fact, you can't wait to bounce your latest and greatest ideas off your friends. However, you have a nagging suspicion that if you're ever going to make your vision practical, the time is now. You may be disappointed that your obligations are distracting you from fully enjoying the social scene. Nevertheless, to change your life you need to change your priorities.

There is a wonderful get-it-done attitude in the air today. You could find yourself extra busy on the job with go-getter Mars and confident Jupiter collaborating in the career houses of your chart. Underlying the charged atmosphere is a melancholy sense of duty, and it may feel like all you do now is work. But remember, keeping on task and pacing yourself are the exact elements needed to build something that lasts.

It's rare for you chatty Twins to be at a loss for words or ideas, and today some particularly exciting ones appear to illuminate the drudgery of a normal routine. A partner in crime may have your mind buzzing with possibilities. Visions of exotic locations and adventurous dreams could lead anywhere. But sometimes even the most vivid fantasies can be deflated when responsibility calls. The pragmatic Capricorn Moon reminds you that spontaneity isn't always practical for your schedule or your wallet.

Sometimes the call for a personal time-out is too strong to resist. Previous commitments seem to weigh on you when all you want to do is go home to your comfort zone and recuperate. Something may surface from those still-but-deep waters today, which makes you want to concentrate on healing your mind, body and spirit. It's easy to worry about what someone might think if you focus on your needs, but the real issue is that you are your own biggest critic. Remember that you can't help others if you don't first take care of yourself.

The world looks vibrant today, and you're inspired to collaborate with like-minded individuals and bring your creative ideas to the table. With clever Mercury whispering in optimistic Jupiter's ear, you're confident that you're really onto something -- and others are likely to jump on the bandwagon after you fill them in on your plans. Much can be accomplished with a powerful will and a genius idea, but don't forget that those aren't the only ingredients in the recipe for success. Stop long enough to write a list of all the tasks that need to be completed so nothing is overlooked. Delegation and determination produce winning results.

You're no stranger to putting in the work, but what are you willing to work for? Your mercurial mind may have you questioning what it is you really value. Pay attention to the insights that come from deep within, and allow them to inform your professional choices. Consider which priorities matters most and examine the motives which drive you to complete whatever you start. It's time for a creative shift that inspires a more harmonious routine, so you can fulfill your duties in a way that makes the most sense to your heart.

You can't help but express your creativity in nearly everything you do today. Jovial Jupiter and passionate Mars are giving you the green light, stimulating your desire to go out and kick up your heels. It's great to play like a kid again, but you may feel anchored by responsibilities at home. Don't let nagging doubts keep you tied in knots; instead, acknowledge the facts as they are. It's possible to have the best of both worlds if you're willing to live fully in the present moment.

Something mysterious is brewing in your subconscious mind today, but you might not want to talk about it just yet. You may feel compelled to dive deep and sniff out what's making you tick right now. Take time to look within and see if any deep-seated issues are calling for closure or healing. You don't have to shout your findings from the rooftops; in fact, the internal dialogue is typically the most important. Mercury the Messenger could deliver an inkling of insight regarding what really matters to you, so listen to that quiet inner voice to learn the key to your heart.

No one is a stranger today as friendly vibes permeate the atmosphere. Stimulating discourse follows you as you find yourself engaging in big-picture conversations even in the most mundane of places. The truth is you're excited to share your thoughts and you may book your schedule so tightly that not even one more person can be penciled in. All the action is thrilling, but the sobering fact that your bank account won't appreciate your picking up all the tabs lingers in the back of your mind. Find ways to demonstrate your spirit of generosity without doing major damage to your wallet.

Your nose is old friends with the grindstone, and today is far from an exception to that reality. Ambitious Mars collaborates with auspicious Jupiter to make your work day extra productive now. It's almost like someone has plugged you into the universal electrical outlet, and you're fully charged and seriously ready to make all the progress you can. The Moon in your sign reinforces your naturally goal-oriented rhythm while quietly reminding you that persistence leads to success.

The call of the wild has you itching to be out the door and on to your next adventure. Your progressive ideals around social matters may be at the forefront of your mind now. You're happiest when marching to the beat of your own drum and today is certainly no exception. However, the Moon in your 12th House of Rest reminds you to take the alone time you need now so you don't crash and burn later. Napoleon Hill wrote, "Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success."

Sometimes the most passionate dreams are best kept close to the chest, or at least that's how it seems today. Your inner world may be more colorful than the outer landscape while dynamic Mars harmonizes with noble Jupiter. However, there's a palpable heaviness coming from a subject that's being avoided, and you may be hesitant to reveal your position for fear of being judged or misunderstood. It's okay to keep things from your coworkers, but it helps to confide in a close friend with whom you can speak intimately. Sigmund Freud wrote, "Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength."

You know what you want, and you're willing to  work for it. You may be inclined to power through issues as quickly as possible, no matter how many corners are cut in the process. However, the tenacious Capricorn Moon gifts you with the perseverance and sure footing of the Mountain Goat. Keep climbing step by step and you're likely to reach the top. Be sure not to get lost along the way when dreamy Neptune tempts lovely Venus with alluring offers to escape from responsibilities. Keep in mind that sagacious Mercury expects you to walk your talk.

Something within you stirs visions of an ideal future, and your aspirations may seem so real and close that they sparkle. As nice as it is to imagine the life you want the most, what it takes to get there requires a lot more than a dream. Thankfully, your natural practical streak can help get your head out from the clouds and back down to earth. Later in the day, your clarity will return, enabling you to determine exactly which steps you need to take to move closer to your long-term goals. Good intentions are wasted without hard work.

Imagine your perfect job -- the one that inspires you to reach your full potential, and provides more than enough compensation for how quickly money seems to pass through your hands. Grounding this dream in reality may feel like trying to pin a wave to the sand, but with some help from your rational ruling planet, Mercury, you are capable of realistically evaluating what resources you have at your disposal now. Better to face the facts and figures today than let your funds recede like the tide as you fantasize about living on Easy Street. Prosperity is a state of mind, but you still have to pay the bills.

It's not always easy to find the words you're looking for when you need them. You sensitive Crabs are often uncomfortable engaging in conflict; sometimes you would rather run away and imagine that everyone else is behaving just as they should. But no one can run forever, and after the Sun sets you may be ready to return to reality and face the music. After all, the silver Moon guides you through the dark, and her presence in earthy Capricorn will lend you the strength and fortitude to talk things out. Jimi Hendrix said, "Knowledge speaks, wisdom listens."

You're a smart cookie, but even the smartest folks need help staying on track now and then. Try not to ignore your health today; instead, reexamine your daily routine to see where you could make improvements to bolster your well-being. You might believe that if you just had more time or money, you could pay for a personal trainer or hire a nutritionist to help manifest your lifestyle goals. Slow your roll and let logical Mercury help you make a realistic plan. Get adequate sleep, stick to a clean diet, and -- although everyone knows you're a superhero -- don't push yourself to keep going when you're running on empty.

As you reassess your goals and reshuffle your priorities, you may find yourself longing for like-minded company that can relate to your aspirations. What would it be like to have a special sidekick who fits into your life just like a puzzle piece? It will be easy to see your fantasy companion in crystal clear detail today, but don't let this lack of objectivity distract you from what's happening in the here and now. Winged Mercury flies into your 5th House of Self-Expression tonight, encouraging honest communication about your desires and thoughtfulness in your creative acts.

You're a natural-born dreamer and today you might find yourself recalling your childhood and the good old days with fondness. Nebulous Neptune may lure you into the drowse of Memory Lane as you go through the motions, but keep putting one foot in front of the other until you return to the present. By tonight, you'll feel solid ground underneath your feet again as discerning Mercury helps you redefine your goals and establish a winning strategy. As Tom Petty sings, "You can look back babe, but it's best not to stare."

It may seem like business as usual as you move through your prosaic day with no more fanfare than absolutely necessary. But sometimes you secretly wish that someone would come along who could see through your walls and understand that mind of yours in a way which transcends words. Such romances can exist, but you still have to get your priorities straight and make a decision about whom and what you want. Thankfully, meticulous Mercury encourages you to organize your thoughts and speak your mind with clarity and conviction.

Details aren't really your thing, but sometimes it's necessary to hunker down and get the facts right. Your budget demands your attention while the responsible Capricorn Moon sets the tone in your 2nd House of Money. Obviously, it would be so much sweeter to stumble upon buried treasure or inherit a large sum of money from a distant relative. Whimsical Neptune may have you daydreaming of a simpler childhood existence when parents paid for everything. Thankfully, this nostalgic fog should lift later in the evening, enabling you to finally crunch the numbers and face the facts. Maturity starts when the drama ends.

You almost always have a plan for what you wish to accomplish next. However, you may find yourself wanting to escape the constant weight of self-inflicted responsibility today and go for a long walk in the park where your mind can wander and relax for a while. This temporary retreat might not be a bad idea, since methodical Mercury joins the goal-oriented Moon in your sign, prompting you to vocalize your goals and intentions. Use this time in nature to ruminate on the dreams you hope to make come true one day soon.

You're typically not shy about saying what you think, but today your thoughts turn within as you envision a world where a lack of resources is never an issue. There are a million dreams floating around in your head, and all it takes is money to get the ball rolling. Fanciful Neptune floods your mind with possibilities as you reflect on your current fiscal situation, but don't get lost in the clouds of disillusionment or doubt. Luckily, cerebral Mercury joins your inner counsel and helps guide the proceedings in a more productive direction.

Your vision of yourself has been polished until it's sparkling like a brilliant diamond today. Thankfully, your friends are feeding you confidence-boosting compliments left and right. Although the sweetness of camaraderie can be like an anesthetic for a sore heart, the reality of the current social climate could be weighing heavily on you. You might feel like you're only safe within the small group of friends you trust. Nevertheless, it's essential that you speak your truth and even more so, that your message is heard.

Your social interactions are infused with a strong sense of ethics today. A supportive sextile between your ruling planet, Mars, and unyielding Saturn gives you the courage to uphold your code of honor or help a friend in need. After your work is done, you may feel like shifting gears and engaging in stimulating discourse with friends as the Moon meanders into conceptual Aquarius. C.S. Lewis wrote, "Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching."

Any incomplete business left over from the workweek should be fairly easy to conclude in a timely manner this morning. Serious Saturn lends a hand to ambitious Mars in your 10th House of Career, allowing you to execute your tasks efficiently. Fortunately, you're not in this alone as a friend will be there to support you if you need a little help. As the day unfolds, you may find yourself going from action mode to idea mode when the Moon moves into intelligent Aquarius. The finish line is the beginning of a whole new race.

Nothing gets your adrenaline pumping quite like a spirited discussion where each facet of a topic is explored. You have a propensity for getting your message across in a compelling way, and you might find yourself receiving an endorsement from a friend or partner that helps you drive the point home even more. Chances are that later in the day you'll be more interested in bouncing ideas around than building a flawless argument to test against someone else. Maintaining an open mind enables you to learn from others.

More often than not, what it really takes to resolve a conflict or bring something to completion is an act of service or sacrifice. That's exactly how it feels early in the day, when your willingness to do the work no matter the cost allows you to finally wrap up an issue whose time has come. Luckily, you're ready to put it all behind you and look to the future when Luna moves from committed Capricorn to thought-provoking Aquarius. The lighter your baggage, the higher you can soar.

If you have any qualms about your relationship with your significant other, perhaps it's a good idea to simply do something fun together. You may be pleasantly surprised by how helpful it is to spend some stress-free time outdoors, or to share in an activity you both enjoy but haven't made the time for lately. Sometimes the best type of intimacy is when you laugh uninhibitedly together and just enjoy each other's company.

It's gratifying to see a list with all the boxes checked, and that's precisely what yours will look like at the end of the day. You're eager to knock out those household chores and in fact, with the strategic Capricorn Moon's presence in your 5th House of Playfulness, the tasks will feel more like a game than work. Once you've crossed everything off your to-do list, it's right on to making the next one. Victory is the result of preparation and determination.

It's prudent to manage any domestic affairs that need settling while you have the support of the committed Capricorn Moon. A sense of accomplishment in your creative life leads to satisfaction and puts you in the mood to enjoy the rest of your weekend. If all goes according to plan, you and your friends will be on the same page when it comes to having fun after the Moon shifts into your 5th House of Spontaneity later in the day. Coloring outside of the lines with those you love does your heart good.

Duty calls as you check your wallet today. Sorting out financial affairs isn't anyone's favorite cup of tea, but luckily, you have the support of pragmatic Saturn in your 2nd House of Finances. Don't procrastinate; organize your accounts and pay your bills before you phase completely into weekend mode. Fortunately, everything falls into place as the day progresses if you mind your business. Seize the day and enjoy the evening.

If there's something you want to vocalize, there's a good chance you can step up and deliver your message with the trademark maturity of seasoned Saturn today. You're quite invested in whatever is near and dear to your heart, and it's unlikely that you'll waste any energy beating around the bush. However, the mood changes when Luna moves into your 3rd House of Travel, inspiring you to get out for a brisk walk or bike ride in the fresh air to make the most of the weekend. John Keats wrote, "The poetry of the earth is never dead."

Receiving usually feels better than losing something but, paradoxically, that's not always the case. Sometimes the greatest gift is to let go of an item on your crowded plate. Evaluate how much space you're giving yourself to breathe between all the things you care about, and eliminate anything that's cramping your style. Do what feels good today, even if your reasons aren't clear to others. Less self-judgment allows you to envision your future with a fresher perspective.

Your friends have your back today as you present your point of view with integrity. This energetic shift comes just in time if the world recently seemed to be marching on without you due to your low energy. Resolute Saturn strengthens action-hero Mars in your sign, accentuating your organizational skills and blessing you with much-needed stamina to complete whatever you start. Fortunately, your personal ambitions won't isolate you from your support network because the Moon's shift into friendly Aquarius widens your social horizons. Work hard; play harder.

Although your friends are already bustling around with their weekend activities, you're not quite ready to join the party. Your mind is set on achieving your career goals or improving your social status as dynamic Mars supports steely Saturn in your 10th House of Public Persona. Whatever stirs you deep inside may provide just the fuel you need to drive you toward successful completion of a project. Where genuine effort goes, recognition is sure to follow.

Thankfully, any leftover contention between you and your colleagues is easy to smooth over today. In fact, it's best to simply leave behind whatever happened during the workweek and just enjoy the spiritual vibe. There's lots of bustle and buzz in your social circle, and it's a great day to get involved with a vibrant group of people and lend some of your passion to the process. Be that as it may, it's unlike you to get lost in a crowd, so you might want to bail at the last minute if you feel like your independence is compromised by your participation.

Your long-term goals or plans for the future may have been a recent source of concern, but in this moment you find yourself reflecting on all of your accomplishments. It's rewarding to realize that your efforts are paying off, and your thoughts are likely to turn to how much you owe to your extended family for their unwavering support. Show your appreciation by volunteering your talents for a community event or a group project. Sacrificing your individuality isn't necessary to be part of the whole.

The community spirit is strong now and you may be excited about being a part of the energy. The free-thinking Aquarius Moon shines in your 9th House of Spirituality, inspiring you to volunteer at a local church or shelter. Fortunately, you may find that you're capable of taking a step back from any conflict now and come to an unconventional solution as you let go of worrying about what others think. Only fools let compliments inflate their heads and criticism hurt their hearts.

Attending to your own needs naturally flows into taking care of others today. Thankfully, a stressful relationship dynamic is settling down now that the friendly Aquarius Moon calms the waters, allowing some much-needed bonding and reparation to occur. This graceful energy reminds you of all of the values you share with those around you, so bask in the light of mutual support. A person who feels appreciated will always do more than what is expected.

You tend to lead the way more than fall in line, but you do love being surrounded by your pack. The social Aquarius Moon illuminates your 7th House of Relationships, prompting your heart to swell with love for the special people in your life. Inclusive behavior elevates your position in the minds of others, so volunteer your services and invite a buddy to accompany you on your mission. Introduce a new companion to your existing group of friends and make sure he or she feels comfortable. Thankfully, the cosmic weather is perfect for reconnecting with your social network and talking about the issues that are closest to your heart.

Recuperating with your friends before the workweek begins anew makes perfect sense now. The collective spirit of the day, combined with Luna's stroll through your 6th House of Health is a cosmic invitation to take a fitness class at your neighborhood gym or hike your favorite trail with a nature-loving companion. Oftentimes, strenuous exercise relaxes the body and mind better than anything else; work up a sweat and luxuriate in the sweet reward of rest afterwards.

You've cut loose the anchors keeping you tied to family obligations, freeing you to head out and enjoy pleasurable pursuits with your favorite people. The humanitarian Aquarius Moon's presence in your 5th House of Play awakens an irrepressible urge to surround yourself with creative folks who inspire you to color outside of the lines. You will start to feel better if you engage in activities that encourage personal expression like singing, dancing or performance art. Thankfully, you have a cosmic permission slip to act silly today as the leisurely vibe in the atmosphere irons out potential wrinkles before they can ruin your day.

Enjoy the unexpected break from your hectic schedule and kick back today. This easygoing energy is wonderful for spending time with your soul family, while the social Aquarius Moon leaves you feeling involved and included. However, if you sense your autonomy slipping away, perhaps it's best to temporarily withdraw to lose yourself in a novel or favorite movie at home instead. Sometimes the healthiest strategy is to retreat and get reacquainted with yourself.

You may be soaring so high above the stresses and strains of the mundane world today that you want to give back to others in appreciation. Communal spirit beckons as you are grateful for your brothers and sisters in arms. Thankfully, you can contribute in many ways, such as organizing a block party or potluck dinner, where everyone can share something they enjoy. Your local community is filled with like-minded people who value every person's individuality, which allows you to be yourself without having to stand alone. Make sure to tell your closest friends just how much they mean to you while you have the chance.

The mood of the day reminds you of the simple joy of finding a lucky penny heads up on the ground when you least expect it. It's not about monetary gain, it's about feeling like the universe is looking out for you. The philanthropic Aquarius Moon is activating your 2nd House of Self-Worth, so leave a proverbial penny for someone else today by giving back to your community in ways that align with your core values. Put your money where your mouth is and others will admire your integrity.

Everything seems right with the world as the lethargy and inner disquiet of yesterday fades into the past. Rally your friends around you today while your social sphere vibrates with the spirit of togetherness. Connection and community are the focus of the moment, and you certainly feel right at home with these concepts. But you are known for preferring the road less traveled, so if you think you're merging a little too much for your liking, have an exit plan in mind to suit your free-flying spirit.

There is a gentle resonance of peaceful tranquility as your relaxing weekend winds down. You need your alone time to recharge your batteries today, but the needs of your tribe are just as important to you. Combine both approaches by attending a restorative yoga class with friends or gathering together a small group to share a meal. As you reflect on social issues with those you trust, take time to pause and note what you're most appreciative of in this moment. Counting your blessings cultivates grace and gratitude.

On your mark, get set, go; it's time to hit the ground running. Progressive ideas are fueled by your characteristic vigor today, but there's a chance you might come on too strong if you don't choose your words wisely. Fortunately, the intellectual Aquarius Moon works in tandem with your opinionated ruler, Mars, giving you the opportunity to express yourself coolly as well as confidently. Use this cosmic boost to your advantage now, because by the time night falls you'll be more interested in relaxing and recharging than pushing a project forward.

Tensions are running high at work today, as everyone has their own ideas about how to move the group's agenda forward. The brilliant Aquarius Moon connects with ambitious Mars, setting a rather brisk pace for the day. Use this energy to be as productive as possible, and constructively throw in your two cents before you clock out. Rushing isn't your style, but it's prudent to fulfill your obligations before the Moon shifts into dreamy Pisces tonight. Taking pride in a job well done is its own reward.

Contrary to popular belief, you can't talk your way out of everything. Be careful that your words don't turn into weapons today as your conversations may gravitate toward touchy subjects like religion and politics. It can be difficult to let something go if your principles are on the line, but tempers blow over just as quickly as they flare if you don't throw fuel on the fire. Happily, the Moon drifts into whimsical Pisces later tonight, diffusing difficult dialogues and transforming your mundane thoughts into dreams of recognition and validation.

If you're wondering whether now is the right time to bring up the subject of money with a loved one, it probably is. Although it can be awkward to address financial problems, especially those involving debts or loans, it is important to confront the issues if you don't want your generosity to be taken for granted. Fortunately, you can summon the courage you need to sort out any concerns that surface today. You feel strong when you stand up for yourself and your growing confidence earns you the respect you deserve.

Friction is likely between you and your beloved right now, but keep in mind that it's not always about you. Instead of reacting defensively, make sure you listen as much as you speak. Conflict isn't required today, but sometimes expressing your emotions allows the energy to move forward to a more productive place. The Moon's shift into peaceful Pisces and your 8th House of Intimacy inspires a reunion of hearts. Taking things too personally delays emotional satisfaction.

Whether you like it or not, the weekend is over and it's back to work. There's a strong chance you'll encounter some dissension over the course of the day, and it's best to acknowledge it as soon as you can. It might be upsetting when someone rocks the boat, especially when you're used to your normal routine. However, this challenge could be just the push that's needed to make an improvement to your daily grind. Dealing with a conflict immediately, while logic is on your side, enables you to think with your head rather than your heart.

If you peacemakers of the zodiac had it your way, everyone would do their very best to compromise and collaborate so conflict is kept to a minimum. Unfortunately, this isn't the way the world works, and you must contend with discord now and again. You might be confronted with an issue that could cause some uncomfortable tension today, but if you say what you mean and mean what you say, you may discover that clearing the air opens up your creative channels, too. Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.

You may feel some internal conflict brewing deep beneath the surface, and it's wise to unpack it now rather than ignore or suppress it. The detached Aquarius Moon wanders through your psychological landscape today, encountering warrior Mars along the way. This combustible cosmic combination causes some rumbling in your emotional foundation, but you can make the most of the turmoil by using your passion to drive your advancement toward achieving your wildest dreams.

There's a need for speed as you race through your day, solving problems as you go. Issues might unexpectedly arrive this afternoon when impatient Mars runs into the eccentric Aquarius Moon, but this could serve as just the lightning bolt needed to take a brilliant idea to the next level. Resistance doesn't always slow you down; sometimes conflict resolution acts as a propelling force. Rather than ignoring the reality of the situation, save the day by finding an innovative solution as soon as you can.

It's not like you to get upset over every little thing, but expending some emotion on a peaceful resolution is more than worth it today. Warrior Mars becomes entangled with the objective Aquarius Moon in your 2nd House of Values, prompting you to wonder why everything means so much to you now. Call it how you see it in this moment, because being honest in your reasoning moves you in the right direction. Take these steps without delay so you don't miss the opportunity to transform your life.

You're likely to feel energetic and ready to roll at the beginning of the day, so get the show on the road early and ride the momentum. Strategic Mars teams up with the Moon in your innovative sign, propelling you forward at a breakneck pace. There may be challenges ahead, but there are also opportunities to speak up about an unorthodox solution that will get the job done. Enjoy the excitement while it lasts, because Luna's shift into intuitive Pisces will put you in a more introspective mood. Work now, dream later.

It may feel as though time is rushing on like a river today, so dive in and don't fight the currents. It is wise, however, to be wary of rocks in the rapids. You could be in for somewhat of a bumpy ride this afternoon as something surfaces from your subconscious that you didn't realize was bothering you so much. But don't be discouraged; inner turmoil can often lead you to the breakthrough you need to create positive change.

The world appears foggy as you look through your subjective lens today, and it's hard to separate what is real and what is not. You may find yourself completely lost in thought, encountering hopes and fears that arise from your blind spot. Do what you can to keep your feet on the ground as the ambiguous Pisces Moon provokes unrealistic concerns, possibly leading you to self-sabotage. Fortunately, your ruling planet Mars connects with ingenious Uranus at the end of the day, providing a flash of insight to zap you back to reality.

Your heart tells you to aim for the stars since anything is possible if you put your mind to it. Faith sustains you on your way to reaching your goals while the shimmering Moon dances with fanciful Neptune in your 11th House of Dreams. However, no vehicle can run on hope alone. Fortunately, an energetic Mars-Uranus connection provides the electricity you need to wake up from your daydream and plug into the source of your passion. Stop wishing and start doing.

Your illustrious reputation precedes you everywhere you go in your imagination today. Fantasies of fame and fortune swirl through your mind as the reflective Moon conspires with Neptune the Dreamer in your 10th House of Status. Try not to get too lost in an illusion, as your feelings could hijack your logic when it's time to make decisions. Stay alert; a fresh and original insight may come out of nowhere, slicing through the haziness that colors the day.

There is a spiritual vibe lingering in the air today. The mystical mood resonates with your sensitive disposition, allowing you to move through the day feeling connected to your intuitive power. You may experience a renewed sense of faith in the universe at large while the Moon joins magical Neptune in your 9th House of Higher Truth. However, you could just as easily drift toward fear and paranoia instead of divine inspiration, so maintain conscious awareness in all your interactions. Rumi wrote, "You are not a drop in the ocean; you are the entire ocean in a drop."

Your generous heart is in the driver's seat today as you see those you love through rose-colored glasses. It's difficult for the rational mind to steer when ceaseless visions of transcendent intimacy occupy your head space. There's nothing wrong with being enchanted by your fantasies now and again, but make sure you don't confuse them with reality. Try not to expect others to live up to your visionary ideals. Nevertheless, thanks to a lively Mars-Uranus contact, you might you may find yourself amazed by a realization of what was in front of you all along.

You may be preoccupied with wondering what others think of you today; in fact, you might be concerned that they don't even know you exist. It's hard to relax your mind at the best of times, and when the spacey Pisces Moon bumps into illusory Neptune, you could waste precious energy running in circles with worry. Neptune is known to confuse and even deceive, so try not to take these daydreams or nightmares too seriously. Thankfully, an unexpected epiphany could suddenly jostle you out of your reverie and set you back on earth.

Shaking off the blahs is tricky today if you are feeling a little under the weather. You could even feel sorry for yourself while delusional Neptune mingles with the emotional Moon, especially if you're working too hard and not being appreciated for your contribution. Try not to fall into an unwarranted victim mindset where everything seems unfair; instead, take balance into your own hands, and remain grounded in your thoughts. What you think about, you bring about.

You could drift on autopilot today, paying so little attention to your surroundings that hours fly by before you realize it. The haze seeps down from your head to your heart, and you might daydream about a perfect romance. On the outside, you may seem absent-minded, but inside your heart flutters with visions of being swept off your feet (or being the one to do the sweeping). Unfortunately, impractical decisions could land you in a sticky situation, but a flash of inspiration arrives like lightning from revolutionary Uranus, snapping you out of your trance.

It's prudent to get in touch with your emotions now, because they're going to flood your psychological basement anyway. You start the day with a plan, but it's soon washed away by Neptune's mystical waves. The introspective Moon beckons you to dive deep today and uncover a spiritual truth rather than let irrational fears psych you out. A brilliant Mars-Uranus sextile lightens the mood, making it healthier to address emotional issues rather than leaving them there to simmer. Joseph Campbell wrote, "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure that you seek."

It's best to just go with the flow rather than trying to control every little thing today. A nebulous Moon-Neptune conjunction fuzzes your neural pathways and trips up your tongue. Don't beat yourself up for any unintentional little blunders; it happens to everyone, and the cerebral mist will lift soon enough. There's nothing quite as powerful as the moment of clarity when you suddenly see the truth. Compassion starts with yourself.

Beautiful fantasies dominate your mind today, and all you seem to be able to think about is your dreams of Utopia. Wishing and hoping will only get you so far before you must take concrete steps to make something consequential happen. Radical Uranus shakes things up with the help of energetic Mars, and before you know it your vision could manifest in ways you never imagined.

Your heart and imagination are united today, activating your visionary potential and strengthening your connection with something greater than yourself. However inspirational it feels to have the Moon join forces with Neptune the Mystic in your sign, be aware that this amorphous energy could be deceiving. Your grandiose notions sparkle with originality, but may lack a solid foundation to stand the test of reality. The good news is practical inspirations strike when you least expect it if you continue to push the creative edge.

You may be wondering if you're heading in the right direction now, or if you should just scrap it all and try something new. The sensitive waxing Moon wants to make something grow, but the Sun is high and mighty in philosophical Sagittarius and won't concede to just anything. On top of this inner conflict, you're one quip away from provoking an argument with anyone who rubs you the wrong way. Fortunately, elegant Venus moves into intellectual Aquarius today, cooling the atmosphere and encouraging a more objective approach to social interactions. Bark less, listen more.

Your sense of purpose is at odds with your delicate emotions today, and you may find yourself just wishing this inner dilemma could be over. Aggressive Mars crosses paths with mental Mercury, straining your thinking and shortening your fuse. You simply can't deal with people getting on your case now, and you prefer to adopt a more detached perspective as your ruling planet, Venus, moves into rational Aquarius. Embracing congeniality and compromise offers you the chance to cultivate peace.

There's a fork in the road, but which way should you go? You've taken a mental stroll down both paths to explore all your options, but you're having trouble coming to a solid conclusion on which direction is best. To make matters worse, hot-headed Mars is busy picking fights and your brainy ruler, Mercury, is all too willing to take the bait. You may find yourself sharp-tongued and edgy today, but chic Venus' switch to aloof Aquarius soothes the emotionally charged tension. Ironically, taking the high road turns out to be the course of least resistance.

You're not sure if a fledgling idea can stand on its own yet, or if it needs more incubation time before it's ready to be released into the world. The last thing you want is to see something you've carefully cultivated be shot down, yet you're not certain of your next move. Better safe than sorry is your motto, but is that always true? You may consider asking a friend for some objective advice on your situation once graceful Venus moves into open-minded Aquarius. Although you might feel out of sorts, staying open to all the possibilities ahead gives you the best chances for success.

Wise cracks from a partner might provoke your ire today, yet you may find yourself too exasperated to even retort. Honestly, your mind is elsewhere as the boisterous Sagittarius Sun intimidates the fragile Pisces Moon. You act confident on the outside, but you might feel doubtful and a little scared about your position. Thankfully, charming Venus sashays into your 7th House of Relationships, encouraging you to notice the beauty and originality of others. Expect nothing and appreciate everything.

You're treading cautiously today as you doubt the stability of the ground beneath you. It seems like one wrong move could be a big mistake, so you may agonize over this uncertainty for much of the day. This uncomfortable state of mind tempts you to latch onto the smallest of details, clinging to fruitless arguments. It's a tense situation on all fronts, but there is a bright side just around the corner. Luckily, your attention to the logistics and your skill at executing your plan combine to create a reliable recipe for success.

Something is out of whack today, and everyone acts as if they're ready to defend their opinions at the slightest provocation. The tender Pisces Moon puts you in touch with your emotions, but your optimistic bubble might be easily burst now. However, your artful ruler, Venus, is here to deliver some much-needed diplomacy and help you maintain the peace, both within yourself and with those you love. Focusing on expressing your creative side rather than engaging in meaningless squabbles inspires others to do the same.

Verbalizing what you want is a significant challenge today. The haughty Sun clashes with the moody Moon, causing uneasiness and a lack of clarity in which direction to take. Irritation sets in as passive-aggressive remarks fly in all directions, and you might just want to give the cold shoulder to anyone who tries to start an argument. Thankfully, caring Venus enters forward-thinking Aquarius, shifting the focus from inconsequential disagreements to more universal topics. Let your light shine so brightly that others can see their way out of the dark.

You don't expect your emotions to get in the way of progress today, but sorting out all your options is tricky when you're hoping for a particular outcome. Arguing with yourself and others isn't going to help, but it seems unavoidable as wordsmith Mercury is challenged by contentious Mars. Emerging from the turbulent atmosphere, affable Venus steps into unflappable Aquarius. Use this favorable planetary placement to zoom out, rise above the negativity and set a positive example.

Decisions must be made, but clarity is lacking as even the steadfast are contending with doubt today. You just want some time alone to think, but you may find yourself defending your position against the most minor oppositions, cluttering your mind with irrelevant ideas. Thankfully, amiable Venus moves into progressive Aquarius, making it easier to take a step back and disengage from avoidable issues. The right perspective makes the impossible possible.
