Although this shadow work falls at one of the busiest times of the year, your soul calls you to ponder what parts of you need to be pruned so you can begin to grow anew. Self-analysis takes courage, but the rewards are potentially great if you're willing to embark on this inner quest. Ask the heavy questions and quietly wait for the answers to emerge.

Beyond the frenzied noise of the holiday season, there is a small stillness that invites you to listen. The Sun's shift into cautious Capricorn shines a spotlight on your 7th House of Relationships, enabling you to see a delicate issue from another person's perspective. Answer the call and take time to mull over what kind of energy you're attracting through other people. It's best not to make any hasty changes or impulsive decisions, but rather trust that insight will arrive when you need it most.

You are inexplicably intrigued today by the very same issues you've been doing your best to avoid. The Sun's entrance into responsible Capricorn brightens your 6th House of Health, so ask yourself what you must do to support your body as the container for your spirit. Although the answers you receive may extend beyond your mundane routine, give yourself plenty of time to reach tangible conclusions and make a sustainable plan. The critical part of the equation is to compose the right questions and remain open to the lessons you learn from your exploration.

It might seem as if there isn't even time to take a breath, but it's crucial now to create moments of peace in order to contemplate the meaningful questions of life. The Sun slips into ambitious Capricorn, lighting a candle in your 5th House of Self-Expression and stirring your creative juices. Although you may grow obsessed with being fully authentic in all avenues of your life, it's not necessary to change every behavior today. Nevertheless, reassessing your priorities catalyzes a transformational process that will continue to unfold over the weeks to come.

All your life experiences thus far combine to make up an essential part of your inner world. The Sun's entry into solid Capricorn today sheds light on your 4th House of Foundations, asking you to reevaluate the stability of the ground you stand on. Unfortunately, you might encounter fear as you realize that your emotional infrastructure isn't as supportive as you wish. But it's pointless to worry about what you would do if your house of cards collapses. Instead of stressing over a worst-case scenario, visualize the best possible outcome. Changing your mind changes your future.

The time has come when the longest night of the year compels you to go inside and stare into the deep reflecting pool that is your mind. The Sun's move into strategic Capricorn lights up your 3rd House of Communication, asking you to explore how you process thoughts and ideas with a critical eye. What you learn during this mental examination may surprise you, so be gentle with your self-judgment now. There is deep healing in the works, so take it slow and don't expect to find an easy fix overnight.

Amidst all the holiday hoopla, you might be more pensive today -- questioning what truly matters. Instead of searching for an answer, you are curious as to how you assign value to physical things and metaphysical concepts. The Sun marches into conservative Capricorn and your 2nd House of Possessions, setting a more somber tone to your thoughts. Fortunately, you're likely to uncover some profound truths hidden in the corners of your awareness, so hold off on initiating anything until you get a chance to sink deeper into your discovery process.

The busiest time of the year also happens to be the most internally active for you Mountain Goats. The Sun's shift into your sign is like the beginning of your personal new year. While this is traditionally a period of celebration for many, you sense that a deeper transformation is accompanying the outer noise now. You might have to pull some strings to change your plans to accommodate your introspective frame of mind. Nevertheless, the cosmos calls for quiet reflection before launching in a new direction.

Although the light of winter is dim in the northern latitudes, it still has the power to slowly melt through the walls of fear. The Sun enters solemn Capricorn today, illuminating the darkness of your 12th House of Secrets. It's time to get serious about taking inventory of the myriad of thoughts within the privacy of your mind. If you are keeping old objects that you no longer value in your mental vault, now would be an appropriate time to make peace with them and let them go. Freedom comes from releasing your attachment to things you no longer need.

The recent shift in energy encourages you to run a full self-evaluation review, both inside and out. The mighty Sun's rays shine in your 11th House of Hope, highlighting your aspirations and dreams for the weeks ahead. Who you are and where you're going are intricately entangled, so take time before you start your journey to separate the threads that are weaving your current visions. Reflecting on the tapestry of your life reaps a rich and rewarding future.

The social dynamics could rapidly fluctuate today, leaving you wondering exactly where you stand. Fortunately, you are capable of maintaining your composure if you just hold your tongue and count to ten when you encounter any unexpected drama. You can always tactfully remove yourself from the situation if a squabble suddenly erupts. Thanks to a creative Mars-Saturn connection, respectfully asserting yourself with candor and consideration turns enemies into allies.

There's plenty of work to get done today, and the state of affairs could continue to change from moment to moment. An airy Libra Moon allows you to work smarter instead of harder by making the most of favorable aspects from generous Jupiter and strategic Saturn. Although things may not go according to plan, you will find help where you need it -- and maybe when you least expect it. Lead with a positive attitude and see who follows.

You are everyone's favorite friend to be around now because it's impossible to listen to your charming banter without smiling. You may be as stressed as the next person, but it lifts your spirits when you make people laugh. Although it's not all smooth sailing today, you can dexterously navigate the waves with some cosmic assistance from a stabilizing Mars-Saturn connection. A Yiddish proverb states, "What soap is to the body, laughter is to the soul."

It's a good idea to stick to a strict schedule now to keep the flurry of activities from overtaking your agenda. Although things may seem hectic or unstable today, the limber Libra Moon will help you bend in the wind rather than snap. Assistance is likely to appear in the form of a friend with a fresh solution for a sticky situation. Show your appreciation by offering to lend a hand when they need it next. A shared burden is lighter to carry and easier to unload.

A little bit of diplomacy makes all the difference today. Keep the lines of communication open as others are likely to get caught up in the whirlwind of pre-holiday jitters. You can't really blame anyone for trying to pull it together any way they can. It may be somewhat of a bumpy ride at times, but fortunately, an imaginative connection between energetic Mars and studious Saturn blesses you with a creative edge to help others throughout the day. Assuming authority at the appropriate moment provides a path to peace and harmony.

Life may seem like a moving sidewalk today as you sweep along at a brisk pace but feel like you're only just maintaining your balance. The graceful Libra Moon creates precarious aspects to several planets, but her objective vantage point enables you to keep a clear head even amidst the holiday noise and chaotic cheer. Attitude is the difference between an ordeal and an adventure.

You may not believe that you possess surfing skills, but the way you're riding the waves today would convince anyone of your expertise. The evocative Moon is visiting your diplomatic sign and although she makes a variety of connections, both disruptive and constructive, the positive ones tip the balance in your court. As you navigate the ever-changing landscape, remember that choosing kindness will always work to your advantage.

Keep it light and friendly today -- try not to inflate one little upset into a major crisis. Intensity is the name of your game and you're never afraid to go there, but do yourself a favor and skate over the conflicts now. Chances are they will blow over as quickly as they blew in. A creative connection between Mars and Saturn offers you a unique point of view that inspires you to express yourself in a dramatic manner that entertains rather than offends.

People might be high-strung today as the demands of the busy season begin to take their toll. However, there is also a sense of merriment in the air and the sound of laughter rings out -- which is exactly how you like it. Although there is a possibility for some turbulence on this flight, the lithe Libra Moon will help you maintain a level head amid the commotion and fly through the day like a seasoned pilot. Spreading cheer is one of the things you Archers do best.

Your ability to stay calm even in the direst situations is an asset today as friends and family flock to you for sound advice and sensible input. The social Libra Moon joins expansive Jupiter in your 10th House of Public Speaking, drawing people to your grounding guidance. Although it may seem like things are going south at several points, you can maintain your clarity and resolve tough circumstances, thanks to stable Saturn's magical connection with assertive Mars. A river cuts through a rock not by its strength, but by its persistence.

Unexpected feedback flies in from several different directions today, creating a chaotic environment where it's difficult to relax. Fortunately, the tactful Libra Moon is here to help you process this new information easily and keep interactions congenial and conversational. Call up a friend and share a few stories about the day's crazy antics and funny adventures. In times of stress, laughter truly is the best medicine.

The holidays are fast approaching and with so many tasks left to finish, it's easy to forget that the real purpose of a holiday is to spend time with the ones you love. The best thing to do now is gracefully glide around any unforeseen mishaps as they arise. Luckily, the elegant Libra Moon keeps you just far enough away from the drama tornadoes to prevent you from being sucked in. Feeling the strong winds just at the edge of your consciousness empowers you to create positive change.

With one foot in a world of righteous rules and one foot leading you to a radical new concept of self, there is a delicate balance between what you used to think and who you are becoming. The nearly inaudible rumble of change in the atmosphere may drive you to reflect on issues of power and control lurking beneath the surface. There's no need to isolate yourself; today's events are lively and enjoyable when spent with the people closest to you. However, it's helpful to remember the words of Maya Angelou who wrote, "If you're always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be."

Often change is good for stirring up the energy, but it still can be uncomfortable while it is occurring. The deep cosmic shift you sense drives you to seek emotional intimacy while the Moon travels through your 7th House of Partners, activating intense interactions and heart-tugging connections. Despite the deep undercurrent today, the holiday cheer is like a bright light in the dimness of winter. Holding a space for your old ways of thinking while accepting brilliant new realizations paves the way for relationship growth in the days ahead.

Happily, the tension between a new group of friends and your long-established social network is temporarily alleviated. Your optimism seems to twinkle through the rush of the day at just the right times. However, the Moon moves into melancholy Scorpio and your 6th House of Daily Routine, so don't ignore any sniffles or headaches today. Put your body first even though there are many more exciting attractions calling out for your attention. Gandhi said, "It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver."

Emotions run high as you do your best to adapt to changing demands in a blink of an eye. The Moon slips into fellow water sign Scorpio today, heightening the intensity with which you express your feelings. Fortunately, the tenuous balance between your previous priorities and your current goals triggers unlikely inspiration and the determination to take your ideas to the next level. Old ways won't open new doors. Overcome your resistance to change if you want real transformation to take root.

You possess the surprising ability to incorporate tried-and-true methods of expressing yourself with a blast of unconventional thinking today. Your tendency to talk big may work in your favor as you frame your message with a creative twist. However, the Moon swims into secretive Scorpio and your 4th House of Home and Hearth, drawing your energies back to the safety of your own space. Once you call it quits for the day, you're likely to want nothing more than to sit in silence and travel to your happy place. Recharging your batteries is essential, and quieting your mind is one of the best paths to rejuvenation.

There are times to tear down your old psychological foundations and times to build something new, but today there is space for both. You are passionate about an innovative approach to saving or earning money while a fortunate Sun-Jupiter connection inspires you to grow your wealth. However, you may be single-minded now, so make sure you don't come across as overly fanatical in your communications with others. As Dorothy Sarnoff advises, "Make sure you finish speaking before your audience finishes listening."

Ironically, your possessions may begin to possess you today when the obsessive Scorpio Moon casts her light into your 2nd House of Material Things. It could be easier to get what you want now, but you still must choose your words and actions with integrity. The cosmos gives the gift of balance between your typical ways of communicating and a fresh new slant on how you interact with others. Use this moment of grace as a catalyst for personal growth while you temporarily can juggle both the old and the new.

A creative insight may come seemingly out of nowhere today, prompting you to see yourself in a whole new fashion. As you stop to reconsider where you stand, you're able to acknowledge your old value systems while seeking an innovative new method of working for what you want. In the meantime, the Moon enters your introspective sign, inspiring you to keep your burgeoning insights close to the chest as they grow and mature. Author Aldous Huxley wrote, "There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self."

Although you move through the day with your characteristic exuberance, on the inside you may be longing to retreat into the sanctuary of your own mind. The Moon's shift into brooding Scorpio activates your 12th House of Secrets, which could provoke dark thoughts and feelings. Thankfully, you can count on your friends to lift you up and out of your own shadows with the cosmic assistance of a cheery Sun-Jupiter connection. The most memorable people in life are those who love you when you have trouble loving yourself.

You may feel possessive of your friends today, and even a little jealous if they are busy with plans that don't include you. However, people are just trying to uphold their social obligations now and it's unwise to take their preoccupation personally. When you stop to think about it, you recognize the transitory nature of the world at large and are prepared to overhaul your psyche to match the external changes. Nevertheless, there's no need to sink too far into your depths when you could be enjoying the precious time you have with the ones you love.

There is a subtle but persistent hum in the background that's a harbinger of imminent social change. However, more immediate circumstances draw your attention to managing personal issues in the here and now. The Moon enters ruthless Scorpio and your 10th House of Status, magnifying your desire to be on top. Although your ambitions drive you to reach great heights, there are still jovial moments which break through the intensity. Take the opportunities to lighten the mood as they come but don't let down your guard. Author Paulo Coelho writes, "Love everybody, but never sell your sword."

Although you are busy attending social events and spreading holiday cheer, there's a sneaking suspicion in the back of your mind that something isn't quite right. The Moon's shift into leery Scorpio might raise fears of deception or betrayal. In fact, paranoia could hijack your fun festivities if you give it your permission. Luckily, a trusted friend holds the key to helping you view things in a totally different manner. Author Dan Brown writes, "Sometimes a change of perspective is all it takes to see the light."

You secretly worry that a crowd of loud relatives or friends might be too much noise for you today, but you won't let that stop the festivities from going on around you. You may need to hide your preferences during the holiday season, but thankfully, you can stick to your principles without compromising your individuality. In fact, you seem to have a strange stroke of luck when an offhand comment is recognized as a brilliant idea. Stand up and accept the applause; the acknowledgement from your peers warms your heart and inspires you to greater heights.

You want to hold tight the people who are dearest to you and enjoy the comfort of their presence today. The emotional atmosphere may be complex, but happily, family and friends are able to put aside differences and successfully avoid contentious conversations. Congenial discussions grow even more exciting throughout the day, creating opportunities for a meeting of the minds, even when there is a wide diversity of opinions. Magically, the holiday spirit enables you to see things from a bigger perspective. Building a bridge is the only way to reach the other side.

You may feel slightly resentful about committing to someone else's schedule when you wish you could do things your way. Despite a moody undercurrent today, your trademark wit is in high gear and you can turn a sticky situation into a thought-provoking conversation before it escalates into an argument. A little bit of diplomacy goes a long way toward making everyone feel welcome, no matter their beliefs or customs. Practicing the spiritual message of inclusivity is the key to making happy memories.

You are in touch with your need to express just how deeply you care for all your loved ones and friends today. Nevertheless, complicated emotional eddies push and pull you through strange waters. Fortunately, no harm is done as a cosmic moratorium is in place between traditional Saturn and revolutionary Uranus. Enjoy connecting with the special people in your life while focusing on the most positive aspects of each interaction. As Louise Hay writes, "Every thought we think is creating our future."

Your colorful personality is toned down considerably today as feelings that might usually be fleeting stick to you like glue. It may seem like this cosmic restraint will never end; luckily, the provocative Scorpio Moon makes a multitude of favorable contacts, preventing your emotions from stagnating for too long. You may be lifted from your introspection at some point when a spirited conversation piques your interest. Thankfully, you can passionately express your opinion while still demonstrating enough respect so you don't rock the boat or offend anyone.

It's easier than ever to get hung up on small details and overreact to slips of the tongue or other minor communication mishaps. Do whatever you can to release your attachment to the words said today, as they probably aren't as loaded as they sound. You may be quietly shocked if discourse with relatives is friendly, and free from skepticism or righteousness. You could even surprise yourself with a fresh new take on a topic that seems almost divinely inspired. Counting your blessings includes being thankful that the people you love can openly share their thoughts and respectfully listen to yours.

The notion of family values is a common theme around this time of year as you reassess those things you cherish the most. You may notice that you are a tad overcontrolling when it comes to your resources and your relationship with finances might be slightly convoluted today. Try to let go of your fear and enjoy the holiday spirit without attaching monetary worth to the experience. Happily, the usual battle for attention at the dinner table is suspended by a temporary armistice between karmic Saturn and eclectic Uranus, allowing you to embrace a different approach to the holidays while still honoring important traditions.

You are more enigmatic than ever today as the moody Moon stalks through your mysterious sign. However, you are not the only mystery unfolding now that sexy Mars forms a fated connection with cerebral Mercury. This interplay may turn dinner conversation into something that's completely out of the ordinary, but in a welcome manner rather than a disruptive one. Paradoxically, you can revel in the revolutionary nature of the moment without forcing your radical ideas on anyone else.

You might want to momentarily pull the covers back up over your head today because you're missing your regular dose of sunshine and optimism. Luckily, the pace quickly picks up once you are on the move and you find yourself increasingly excited to participate in the festivities. There seems to be a temporary ceasefire between your desire to shake things up and your wish to stabilize interpersonal interactions. Your current pragmatism helps you engage in a stimulating conversation without becoming adversarial or unkind. Poet Rumi wrote, "Life is a balance of holding on and letting go."

There's a strange vibe that follows you around today, prompting you to remain slightly withdrawn and introspective. You don't want to say anything because everyone else seems to be a little more reactionary and emotionally invested in the day's events than you are for some reason. Luckily, the intuitive Scorpio Moon's favorable aspects assist you in maneuvering through the turbulent landscape. In spite of the moody atmosphere, communication eases tensions while harmonious energy flows between conventional Saturn and radical Uranus. Expecting the unexpected soothes nerves now rather than putting anyone on edge.

You made up your mind and you plan on sticking to it now, with no thought of backing down. Although a headstrong approach often works when you're trying to accomplish career goals, a special event with family or friends presents a different kind of challenge. Fortunately, any lingering holiday tension is mitigated by a cosmic calm and discussions are unlikely to stray far into tempestuous territory. In fact, you may find that the topics being bounced around over dinner are far more eccentric and interesting than in years past.

Regardless of religious beliefs, the very act of gathering with loved ones with purpose and intention can be a spiritual endeavor. You may feel things very deeply today, and the regenerative Scorpio Moon's presence in your 9th House of Higher Truth inspires you to explore the larger meaning of the season. Sometimes dissension and contention embitter the holidays, but everyone seems to be on their best behavior this year. Respectable Saturn and rebellious Uranus have agreed to play nice, enabling you to fully experience the joy of the day and the peace of the night.

The mood is just right for a day of celebration  whether or not you have special plans in place. The spirit of togetherness and joviality is in the air as lovely Venus graces your 11th House of Networking, making this the perfect time to gather a large group of friends and share everything so no one feels left out. However, there's a risk of overindulgence, so avoid having too much fun by setting a healthy limit on your consumption today. You will thank yourself tomorrow if you exercise a modicum of self-restraint now.

If ever there was a time to eat, drink and be merry, it's today. Charming Venus is your lovely cosmic assistant, helping you roll out the red carpet for family and friends. Your warm hospitality allows others to completely relax and enjoy themselves. You are likely to execute your plans without a hitch, and there's a distinct possibility that people will talk about your wonderful party for a long time to come. Apparently, your methodical preparation and your desire to create a special memory combine to make a magic all of your own.

It almost feels like being a kid again when you wake up this morning; the potential of the day buzzes with the innocent joy of the holidays. Today's cosmic harmony promotes lighthearted interactions and fun adventures while delightful Venus hooks up with exhilarating Uranus. You're enjoying the spotlight now that several planets align to showcase your well-known wit and clever sense of humor. Comedian Yakov Smirnoff said, "If love is the treasure, laughter is the key."

A remarkable cosmic confluence turns the stormiest of circumstances into a smooth flow of events. You seem to quickly check one thing after another off your to-do list, while still engaging in plenty of merriment along the way. Everyone appears to be getting along famously, keeping conversations cheerful and light. Childhood stories are recounted with special fondness. The only danger that lurks about today is the potential for getting lost in sensory pleasures. Set sensible limits so you can enjoy the celebration without going so far as to negatively affect tomorrow's performance.

Everyone you encounter today seems to be in a festive mood, lifting your spirits and restoring your faith in humankind. Surprisingly, the conversations that unfold contain a rare balance of enthusiasm and respect, exploring the wildest possibilities while somehow staying grounded. It's a storybook day; your heart swells with gratitude and you can't figure out what you did to deserve such generous friends. Bask in the warmth of mutual admiration and soak up all the love while you can.

Your complicated schedule holds together better than you expect. You might have over-stressed about the little things, but your excessive planning results in an effortless launch today, and everyone pitches in to facilitate maximum merriment. Your confidence surges as you realize everything is going according to plan. Although you may deceive yourself into believing you can add a few extra items to your agenda, stick to what you have on your already full plate. Quit while you're ahead and leave them wanting more.

Everything seems to sparkle, letting you know the day will be one for the books. Auspicious Jupiter creates a beautiful trine to romantic Venus in your 5th House of Pleasure, setting the tone for making marvelous memories. There's nothing to stop you from having the time of your life as you make all the right connections and somehow squeeze in every bit of frivolity humanly possible. Nevertheless, it's easy to go to extremes when things are so heavenly; keeping the needs of others in mind puts you back on the track of moderation.

It's a wonderful feeling to be home today, where you feel adored and accepted for exactly who you are. You may have prepared to defend yourself against the awkward conversations that often occur at holiday gatherings, but it seems that everyone is pretty much on the same page now. The priority for the moment is creating an inclusive atmosphere where everyone is comfortable and content. All is right in your world when the cosmos is smiling at you, and you are surrounded by those you love.

Kind remarks are flowing every which way, setting the stage for a day that's suitable for merrymaking and mending fences. It sounds impossible, but things are only going to get better as vivacious Venus forms favorable contacts with several other planets. Meanwhile, the Moon parties her way into your sign, and you're likely to catch a second wind after the festivities begin to wind down. Round up some friends and head to a local dive bar or convene at someone's home; just don't get so carried away that you can't find your way back home.

You may be pleasantly surprised when you realize how amazing your day is turning out. Everything just falls into place; it's as if you have been blessed with a guardian angel who is looking out for your happiness. You are prepared for nearly any contingency today, but it appears as if everything is going swimmingly. Enjoy all the abundance the cosmos has to offer before the Moon slips into your 12th House of Invisibility this evening. Play your cards right and you will fall asleep with a smile on your face.

You're no stranger to feeling like an outsider but the energy is different today. Your personality is extra charismatic and you can't help but exude confidence in all that you do. You are a gift to everyone you encounter as jolly Jupiter trines sweet Venus in your 1st House of Personality. The Love Planet is receiving support from her celestial family, creating a harmoniously balanced atmosphere which makes for enlightening conversation and emotional bonding here on Earth.

The unrelenting spirit of camaraderie is palpable as you mix and mingle with friends and family today. Affectionate Venus makes cosmic music with magnanimous Jupiter, filling every gathering with the ambiance of spiritual connection. Kick back and enjoy the loving vibrations while you get the chance. Relish the vivid dreams that arrive in your sleep. You wish you may, you wish you might, to have your wish come true tonight.

Although you're already fired-up about your next amazing adventure, positive thinking can only take you so far today. For better or for worse, you are often known for charging ahead prematurely. Unfortunately, temporary satisfaction isn't worth future regret. Rather than making impulsive decisions that will require correcting your course as you go, contemplate your alternatives now without initiating direct action. There's no need to rush fate; let your destiny unfold organically for the most gratifying results.

You might have overindulged yesterday, which is understandable considering how much fun you had. Although you wish you could extend the high spirits of the holidays, all good things must come to an end. There's nothing wrong with continuing to enjoy the positive vibes as long as you take time to recharge your energy and regroup your thoughts. Instead of running on empty, stop to refuel and catch your breath. New horizons are beckoning, but you need to remember that life's a marathon and not a sprint.

Levity still lingers in the air and although you're probably exhausted, you don't want the good times to end. Brand new hopes and dreams are tugging at your awareness, like children's toys waiting to be opened and enjoyed. You may feel like there's nothing stopping you from pursuing your ambitious goals, but you're uncertain of which move to make next. Regardless of whether you know the steps or not, you don't want to miss this dance with the cosmos. A leap of faith demonstrates your willingness to evolve.

Yesterday's heartwarming gatherings are still so fresh in your mind that they don't even seem like memories yet. An ingenious new slant on your goals renews your faith in the universe. However, your solid assumptions may be more illusory now than you realize. Although you want to get started on your plans right away, it's best to take time to rest before you try to incorporate a fresh set of ideals. Practicing patience gives the big pieces of reality time to fall into place.

You are still basking in the afterglow of yesterday's festivities as you look to the future with renewed enthusiasm. You're excited to share your ambitious ideas with everyone, but be careful not to talk so dramatically that it's impossible to live up to your own expectations. The good news is you feel ready to go; the bad news is your eagerness can get the best of you. Another round of creative exploration is wise before taking action. Timing is everything.

Recent interactions with friends or family reactivate old dreams which are now taking new flight. Shocking revelations inspire you to swing into action. However, others may not be ready to  give your unorthodox plans the green light. People are quick to put their faith in your abilities, but they need tangible evidence before they will be comfortable supporting your venture. Do your research prior to starting a new quest. Most Virgos would agree with Author Alan Lakein when he said, "Failing to plan is planning to fail."

You're likely to wake up smiling just thinking about recent events. Inspiring conversations replay in your mind, galvanizing you to put your ideas into motion. However, don't take on too much work right away. Although you think you can move forward immediately, you may encounter stop signs at every corner. Don't waste energy attempting to outsmart the cosmos. Spend more time talking about your creative vision with a trusted friend before you launch into the future.

Although you might be recovering from a little too much holiday merriment today, you could discover that the recesses of your mind contain unexamined treasures. You feel like you're on the brink of something huge and the adventurous Sagittarius Moon impels you to fully invest yourself into this new enterprise. Nevertheless, it's best to keep your ideas incubating for a while longer before pushing them out of the nest. William Blake wrote, "No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings."

Your imagination is flowing with creative ideas that you are longing to express. The Moon in your inspirational sign encourages you to reach for the stars, but it's wise to make sure you are standing on solid ground first. Assess the stability and integrity of your foundation before you proceed one step further toward your goal. Aim high but pack some common sense for the journey. You can do anything, but you can't do everything.

Optimistic daydreams of achieving success keep you busy today. You're anxious to jump into the tasks at hand as long as they lead to manifesting your goals. Nevertheless, you may find that it's more challenging than you thought to wrap your head around what needs to happen next. Prior to making a definitive move, take extra time to explore your dreams and see where they lead. As Author Beth Mende Conny writes, "If the future seems overwhelming, remember that it comes one moment at a time."

Visions of distant lands inspire you to set off on a new expedition as soon as you can pull on your coat. Although the travel bug may bite you, make sure you don't overextend your resources. You might not be as ready for a new adventure as you think; recent celebrations extracted a toll on your body, whether you realize it yet or not. Consider taking a mental journey to satisfy your craving instead, especially if a tight budget prevents you from putting your money where your mouth is. As the Moody Blues sang, "Speeding through the universe, thinking is the best way to travel."

It's all too easy to be swept up in the holiday revelry and feel exhilarated about your future prospects. Although these past few days may have been  hectic, it's emotionally healing to connect with the people you love. A new cycle of regeneration is beginning, but all things need nurturing to grow. Let your mind pave the way now so your physical self can follow later. Robert Louis Stevenson wrote, "Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant."

A spike of initiative has you on the go today as you envision a grand journey that will carry you to new heights. Although you're sure nothing can stop you, your lofty ambitions receive an unexpected reality check when the exorbitant Sagittarius Moon slams into frugal Saturn. Of course, it's a sobering task to confront the flaws in your reasoning, but addressing them now is in your best interest while you still can readjust your plans. It's never too soon to face the facts if you truly want to make your dreams come true.

Your energy reserves begin to heat up as your ideas take shape today. You prefer establishing your own pace on your own timetable, but you might be stopped by unforeseen circumstances before you even start. You may assume you know what you want but an awkward connection between your key planet Venus and retrograde Mercury warns that you could be jumping to erroneous conclusions. French writer Victor Hugo penned, "Opportunity is often delivered in a fog of uncertainty."

Your ideas seem better and better the more you think about them, and you're anxious to prove their brilliance in the real world. Unfortunately, even the greatest inspiration alone does not make an idea hold water. Be prepared to encounter several speed bumps as you cruise through your day. But don't slam on the brakes at the last minute to avoid the inevitable. Instead, use the rough spots in reality to clarify your thought process that is currently a bit muddled by Mercury's disorienting retrograde. Author Michael Gelb wrote, "Confusion is the welcome mat at the door of creativity."

You may feel so energetic today that you consider starting your new year resolutions early. The grandiose Sagittarius Moon is likely to widen your mind's eye until it's bigger than your stomach. Unfortunately, you can't assimilate everything you see because of your human limitations. Sobering Saturn steps into the picture to deal you a cold dose of reality and remind you that planning is half the battle. As Ani DiFranco sings, "Some of life's best lessons are learned at the worst times." Nevertheless, advanced preparation prevents avoidable problems.

You're having fun with your daydreams as they become more and more elaborate in your mind. Although your self-confidence grows along with your inflated plans, a strict evaluation from serious Saturn can reveal trouble in the details. Your logic might not be as bulletproof as you think today. But don't lose faith; accept where you are now so you can more realistically align with your ultimate destination. The road to success is paved with humility.

You're all set to get busy with an exciting new project, but you quickly discover that your intricate plans are impractical. Your ruling planet Mercury often shows up to help you discern which ideas are critical to your success. However, the Trickster's current retrograde journey could lead you to waste time on insignificant minutiae. Rather than launching new ventures, use this time to reassess and rethink your options. Don't trust everything you see today; even salt looks like sugar.

You believe in yourself more than ever and you can't wait to share your excitement with your friends. But just as the words leave your mouth you realize how unbelievable your plan might sound. Although austere Saturn steps in like a cosmic astringent to tone down your enthusiasm, you may be glad the detour happened once you get further down the road. Facing a temporary setback seems like a bummer but it's more fortuitous now to be stopped in your tracks than to leap before you look.

You are unwilling to negotiate once you set your mind to something. Your passion is fired up today and you're inspired to do the hard work necessary to turn your brilliant idea into reality. Unfortunately, you may run into financial issues that halt your progress. But this is less of a showstopper than a cosmic prompt for further preparation. Success isn't about sticking to an ideal plan; it's about making the best use of available resources. President Thomas Jefferson wrote, "Delay is preferable to error."

You are completely convinced that greener pastures are around the next bend. However, the electrically charged atmosphere takes an earthbound shift when the ostentatious Sagittarius Moon is restrained by weighty Saturn. Although it may not feel so good to lose momentum today, this postponement is an opportunity to reconfigure parts of your strategy. Fine-tuning your plan now improves the vehicle which will carry you to your dreams.

There's a fine line between initiating action and taking a foolish risk, but you're willing to gamble today. Unexpressed ambitions are ready to come out for the world to see. However, you may realize there are holes in your logic before you can even share your ideas with an audience. Mercury's current backtracking through your sign impedes your progress, but the extra time allows you to rethink your plans before you make mistakes you can't undo.

The lightning bolt of inspiration strikes today, charging you with the energy to make a dream come true. However, your gleaming aspirations must pass stern Saturn's rigorous test to make it in the real world. Although you have a sense of how to reach your goals, you find it difficult to untangle your thoughts long enough to draw a mental map to your destination. A situation that forces you to reconsider your actions may be exactly what the doctor ordered. Remember, the current circumstances are your best teacher.

You have an expansive vision of your future today, as if your dreams are yours for the taking. The enthusiastic Sagittarius Moon is spurred on by generous Jupiter and ingenious Uranus, filling your mind with images of a more accomplished version of your current self. But despite the high energy of this cosmic combination, no-nonsense Saturn steps in to remind you of the speed limit. Although your progress is postponed, this short delay is really a blessing in disguise. Don't give up what you want most for what you must do now.

Your thoughts turn to your career accomplishments as the year comes to a close. You feel the fire of ambition growing hotter -- whether your hard work has paid off or you're searching for something new to chase. Rational Mercury joins the illuminating Sun in your 10th House of Profession, throwing the focus on your relationship to the community or public at large. Readjust your aim so you can hit the bulls-eye the first time around without wasting precious time and energy. Napoleon Hill wrote, "Your big opportunity may be right where you are now."

It might be incredibly hard to believe that a whole year has gone by and whether you are ready or not, a new one is about to begin. Although you can't control the future, you can control how you react and what you choose to learn. As logical Mercury retrogrades through your 9th House of Higher Education, you may be wondering how you could better expand your knowledge in pursuit of greater success. Leave no stone unturned now when doing your research. Author Joe Poyer wrote, "Thorough preparation makes its own luck."

Committing to your goals is one thing, but you get an eerie sense that there's a deeper parallel at play now. Your key planet Mercury is taking a backward trek through calculating Capricorn, prompting you to reconsider how to make your objectives more attainable. Take the time to triple-check your plans to give you the best chance of realizing your dreams. Follow the old school of hard work; there's no shortcut to success.

Your thoughts grow heavy as you replay the past year in your mind. Relationships are bound to be on the brain while there are so many planets occupying your 7th House of Others. Rethink what it is you want from a romantic partner since you may discover you're not as certain as you thought when it comes to matters of the heart. Are you willing to settle for the sake of security and comfort? Identify your fears and decide where you're capable of compromise. Liberian President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf warns, "If your dreams don't scare you, they are not big enough."

You begin to feel very positive about improving your health as the year comes to its conclusion. Although you're determined to overhaul your entire diet and fitness routine, take the time to reevaluate what is realistic versus what is unattainable. Analytical Mercury implores you to reconstruct your plan as he retraces his steps through your 6th House of Habits. It is better to implement a sustainable strategy later than a temporary one now.

While others might already be stressing about their personal resolutions, you secretly love this time of year because you're naturally adept at making lists. Sorting through the details and creating a comprehensive plan for the immediate future is right up your alley. However, this year is a little different due to mischievous Mercury's retrograde, which means that developing a practical plan may take longer than you wish. As Maya Angelou wrote, "Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better."

The rush of the holidays may be dissipating, allowing you to turn your attention to more personal issues. Whether you plan to change residence, do some remodeling or just improve family dynamics, you're anxious to get the show on the road. However, retrograde Mercury might be telling you to think again before you make your move. Prior to committing to a new path, do some real soul searching first. Your home is not only where your heart is, it's also a reflection of your soul.

Although it's been a long year full of ups and downs, you may still be wondering where the days went. You're ready to get a firmer grip on your schedule so you don't lose more time due to idle distractions or poor planning. Ironically, Mercury's retrograde could be scrambling your thoughts and messing with the very strategy you created in order to prevent delays. Take it easy today and stay in the tactical phase. Impatience won't do you any good, but reassessing your goals and polishing your skills will.

The holiday season may have already taken a toll on your wallet, prompting you to budget your resources, or if necessary, work yourself out of debt. But Mercury's retrograde through your 2nd House of Money delays the information you need to create an effective plan. Instead of making any radical changes today, continue to reevaluate your situation with a cool head. While contemplating your fiscal condition, remember your personal attitude toward money reflects a deeper issue. When you doubt yourself, you give power to your doubt.

Now that the holiday hullabaloo is settling down, you can get back on track with your lofty dreams of success. The Moon's return to your ambitious sign almost feels like you're being given a new and improved outlook on life. Although you hope to get started right away, it's better to be a tortoise than a hare today. Cerebral Mercury joins the regal Sun, encouraging you to shine a bright light on your plan and illuminate any flaws before forging ahead. Some people succeed because they are destined; others succeed because they are determined.

You likely haven't had much time alone recently, but you are getting a chance now to reacquaint yourself with your own thoughts. The Moon moves into your 12th House of Spirituality to merge with messenger Mercury, putting extra emphasis on what's going on beyond the physical dimension. You are driven to do something big, but you can't put your finger on how to proceed. Planning for the future will be less confusing as soon as agile Mercury turns direct. In the meantime, exploring your mental landscape is the key to self-discovery.

The year is almost over and you are more resolute than ever to make your dreams come true. The industrious Capricorn Moon joins three other planets in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, reminding you that hard work and perseverance will carry you all the way to the top. However, it's unwise to hurry the process along; in fact, you may find that you must go back to the drawing board later if you start too soon. Do it right or not at all.

Something is different this morning, like someone sneaked an extra shot or two of caffeine into your morning coffee. The goal-oriented Capricorn New Moon falls in your 10th House of Career, motivating you to create success no matter what the cost. The downside is that you may believe you must be ruthless with yourself and sacrifice personal comforts to get ahead; the truth is, the more authentically you live in all ways, the higher you will climb.

Somehow you know that the time has come to focus on the many things you want to accomplish. The conservative Capricorn New Moon brings your 9th House of Big Ideas down to earth, encouraging you to find concrete ways to move toward your distant goals. It could feel like the journey to achievement requires that you pay a steep price, but don't be deceived by your own negativity. Joan Baez said, "Action is the antidote to despair."

It feels like you are turning the page to start a more serious chapter in life today. The accountable Capricorn New Moon highlights your 8th House of Regeneration, signaling the beginning of a new period of growth. Although hope usually accompanies the start of something new, you may think you must relinquish your imaginative and playful self to grow up. Luckily, this isn't the case since unconventional Uranus begins its march forward once again, giving you access to a treasure trove of inspiration. Mencius wrote, "The great person never loses a childlike spirit."

The heaviness of responsibility weighs on your mind today as you anticipate the daunting road ahead. The Capricorn New Moon emphasizes your 7th House of Relationships, requiring you to reassess your commitments. Of course, you long for safety and security but sometimes the search for those qualities might seem more like a business transaction than a loving connection. Thankfully, you can benefit from the best of both worlds if you call on your inner rebel when you need to remember who you are and what you want.

It's time to turn over a new leaf and be accountable for your decisions. The dutiful Capricorn New Moon calls attention to your 6th House of Well-Being, urging you to implement healthier and more responsible habits. It can feel like a buzzkill thinking about all the fun you must give up to change your ways, but your new regimen doesn't have to be a prison. Reframe your idea of what it means to live a good life and you might just discover pursuing self-care brings you a deeper sense of joy.

Sometimes nothing is more gratifying than putting in hard work and seeing the fruits of your labor. Not everyone understands how you can enjoy combing through the details and setting everything just right, but you truly have a gift for making chores seem like a game. The pragmatic Capricorn New Moon stabilizes your 5th House of Play, prescribing a fun new project that you can be involved with for the long haul. However, don't romanticize suffering or toiling; what seems like a good idea now may prove to be a burden later, so temper your admirable ambition with a dash of common sense.

An idea is being planted today and it's up to you to create an environment that will encourage it to grow to its fullest potential. The stabilizing  Capricorn New Moon settles in your 4th House of Foundations -- the ground in which the seed is planted. The earthy nature of this lunation may feel heavy as it roots you where you stand, but there's no need to be discouraged. Stop watering the weeds in your life and start watering the flowers.

Language is more powerful than any tool, whether you're building a structure or tearing one down. The stern Capricorn New Moon stabilizes your 3rd House of Communication, drawing attention to your words and how you use them. You must decide whether you want to fearfully build walls around your mind or to openly explore new ways of learning. You may believe the only solution is strict censorship, but this is not the case. The deeper you look, the more you realize your own potential to frame your message wisely.

The outlook for the future appears overcast for some reason, even if the skies are clear of clouds. The frugal Capricorn New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, highlighting your resources and how they influence your belief system. You feel the push to put your budget in order and it might seem as if you must limit your spending more than you expected. Tightening your belt is always prudent, but don't panic needlessly. Remember, money can't buy happiness; true worth comes from within.

A new emotional cycle begins today and a surprising feeling of significance hangs in the air. The New Moon is in your solemn sign, renewing your sense of purpose and direction. Keep in mind that self-denial and delayed gratification are not the same things. While discipline is required to accomplish anything worthwhile, a balance must be struck between ambition and self-care. You have the power to get where you want to go, but don't run yourself into the ground to get there.

It may be a normal day on the outside, but there is quite a contrasting experience going on in the deepest reaches of your mind. The Capricorn New Moon lands in your 12th House of Spiritual Insights, calling you to put greater emphasis on your inner world. The austere energy of this lunation brings forth an image of a holy person living alone in isolation, but metaphysical knowledge doesn't always require asceticism. Simply introduce consistency to your meditative practice and you will notice a subtle but powerful change. Poet Ella Wheeler Wilcox wrote, "The spark Divine dwells in thee; let it grow."

You feel that the time has come to commit yourself to a cause that is near and dear to your heart. The dutiful Capricorn New Moon occurs in your 11th House of Social Networking, inspiring you to give back to your community. On one hand, you're ready to dedicate as much as possible to an organization or movement but on the other hand, you're wondering if you possess the stamina to maintain the efforts for any sustained period. Try not to dedicate yourself to a cause in the spirit of sacrifice; approach your altruistic acts with a healthy balance, so passionate service does not turn into a martyr complex.

Bizarre insights float in and out of your consciousness today and you're unsure what to make of it all. But there's no time to spend wondering what's going on while the practical Capricorn Moon is encouraging you to get to work, no questions asked. Although you might be eagerly looking forward to a more social weekend, you don't have the mental broadband yet to think about frivolous activities. Even if the winds of fate are blowing you off course now, keep returning to the mundane world so you can meet your current obligations as promised.

There is a whimsical energy in the air today, and you might find yourself noticing quirky and unusual beauty in unlikely places. In the background of your imagination, you wonder if these happenings are divinely orchestrated or just the results of coincidence. Nevertheless, in your present reality, it's another day with unfinished tasks to complete. Thankfully, the mood lightens throughout the day as your dreams continue to leak into the real world. Your current lesson is you don't always have to be the most practical one in your group.

The universe is displaying its ironic sense of humor as it sprinkles strange incidents throughout the daily grind. Unexpected events seem too unlikely to be real and send you into fits of giggles. Enjoy these little nods from another dimension, but make sure you get your work done before you clock out for the weekend. Taking time to do nothing often brings everything into perspective. Victor Hugo wrote, "Laughter is the Sun that drives winter from the human face."

The impending New Year excitement is starkly contrasted by your obligatory daily tasks today. The dedicated Capricorn Moon anchors you to earth while ethereal influences waft through like scents on a breeze, tempting you to abandon your work to chase unicorns wherever they may lead. In fact, you might need to put on blinders so you can concentrate on your responsibilities. Thankfully, the heavy energy lifts throughout the day, empowering you to shift your line of sight from the rearview mirror to the shining horizon in front of you.

There's plenty to keep you busy today as your to-do list is fully populated with chores to complete. However, surreal Neptune enchants the noble Sun in your 6th House of Work, distracting you with fantastical daydreams. Luckily, the lingering monotony is no match for the mental meanderings that inspire your reveries as the day unfolds. Ultimately, imagination is more powerful than the facts when it comes to creating your future.

It's business as usual today, although your brain may be a little jumbled. However, something in that tangle of thoughts flashes like a shiny coin on a dirty sidewalk. Whether it's the sudden glimmer of insight, a bright idea or just a particularly witty quip, moments like this seem to dot the landscape now. Make sure you finish your chores in a timely fashion so you're ready to move on to manifesting the next inspiration. Your productivity is a priceless gift.

You're longing to get out of the house and have a fun weekend, but there are affairs that must be tended to at home before you can escape with a clear conscience. Luckily, you may be in for a magical time but you can't be certain about where the current energy will take you when the Moon shifts into rebellious Aquarius, lighting up your 5th House of Romance like a disco ball. Don't assume you know what's in the last chapter of a book until you read it in its entirety.

All you want is to get your work done today, but your thoughts seem difficult to articulate. There's also some brain fog to contend with as the willful Sun is watered down by misty Neptune. Fortunately, the weighty responsibilities of recent days are alleviated as the weekend's social events grow near. Nevertheless, you're likely to play the role of the recluse after the reflective Moon shifts into your 4th House of Home. It's better to be alone than to be in bad company.

Your phone may buzz with invites from friends, but uncharacteristically you're not interested in anything beyond fulfilling your commitments now. Your brand of productivity and ambition is admirable, but there's also an exciting sense that something is different. The Moon's shift into your 3rd House of Distractions takes your mind off of work, freeing you to pursue more pleasurable activities. Don't rule out any options when it comes to celebrating your blessings.

You are basking in your element today; there are so many things to do and you are methodically powering through them one at a time. Your spirits are high while the Moon is traveling in your sign, and even though distractions vie for your attention, you're single-mindedly focused on achieving your goals. Fortunately, you get a little break from work once the Moon shifts into Aquarius, inspiring you to trade in your industrious attitude to experience the spontaneity of the moment.

Envisioning the wonderful outcome from your ongoing commitment to your job is what consistently renews your drive to keep doing your very best. Unfortunately, some off-the-wall distractions may cause your thoughts to stray. Avoid making any financial decisions because the numbers don't seem as important as your desires now. Nevertheless, if you delay the need for exacting analysis, you can learn a lot about your future. Albert Einstein said, "Your imagination is your preview of life's coming attractions."

You've been pushing hard and you're ready for a break today. You might find your mind wandering through strange dreamscapes sporadically during the day, thanks to an otherworldly interaction between trickster Mercury and artful Venus. Don't give up the pursuit of your goals because you're likely much closer to satisfaction than you realize. Keep your eye on the prize and your heart in the game. Author John Maxwell, "Dreams don't work unless you do."

You've probably worked hard enough over the past few days to deserve an amazing night of celebration. Nevertheless, you might have a twinge of doubt about whether or not to go out on the town. You could slip into a bit of a funk, wondering if joining in the party mood tonight will do more harm than good to your emotional state of mind. Although this may seem like an important choice in the moment, it won't really matter much in the long run. Being with the ones you love is the only memory you need.

Although establishing a list of goals for the future is your top priority now, you're eager to take a break and let loose. However, at the last minute you might decide that you would prefer to stay home and host an intimate gathering of friends instead of being pushed around in a loud and unruly crowd. All the analysis in the world won't help you make up your mind. Instead, you're likely to receive your answer in an unusual manner. Trust your intuition; the party follows you wherever you go.

You're usually not one to turn down a party invitation, but the New Year's Eve chaos and commotion might be too much for you tonight. There is so much drama around you these days that you could get carried away and spill your life story to a well-meaning stranger who can't help you in any way that matters. Perhaps it's best to hedge your bets and make it a low-key evening. Nevertheless, unpredictable Uranus is at work and anything can happen when spontaneity arrives to save the day.

Relationship issues may take precedence over holiday celebrations today. It's not that you are avoiding crowds; it's just that you want to kick the new year off right by honoring your resolutions. The aloof Aquarius Moon is roaming through your 8th House of Transformation, which doesn't necessarily lend itself for a night of frivolity. Keep in mind that you won't miss anything significant if you choose to focus on your home and family. In order to say yes to your priorities, you need to say no to something else.

You could use a fun distraction tonight, but you'll need to overcome a strange lingering resistance. Fortunately, the friendly Aquarius Moon's presence in your 7th House of Others widens your perspective and strengthens your desire to connect with those you love. Celebrate any way you choose, but make sure you schedule some quiet time for yourself, too. It's easy to lose yourself in a crowd even when you secretly want to go home. Listen to your inner voice to tell you if you should stay or if you should go.

You may be feeling pretty indifferent about the whole season of celebration, even if you agree to spend the evening with a few friends to ring in the new year. You're somewhat doubtful whether any social endeavors will be worth the extra effort now, but don't cancel your plans on a sudden whim of negativity. Thankfully, your energy level improves throughout the day and you'll be happy to be in the flow of events once the festivities start and the music begins to play.

You may be itching to head out on the town and kick up your heels to celebrate the new year. Fortunately, the futuristic Aquarius Moon is busy in your 5th House of Fun and Games, encouraging you to play with wild abandon. Although you might worry that your priorities are out of whack, it's healthier to take a night off than to hide away due to the uncertain state of the world. Surprisingly, an enthusiastic friend could arrive with an exciting last-minute change in plans. Don't resist; just yell, "Plot twist!" and go with the flow. Make memories today, live without regret tomorrow.

You're not interested in the bright lights and loud music tonight, unless the evening includes a chance to communicate with interesting people who could teach you something new. But your current curiosity about psychology, metaphysics and spirituality aren't necessarily the topics of conversation at your typical New Year's Eve event. It might be more beneficial to spend the evening with a close friend or just kick back with a favorite movie. Remember, the decision is yours and yours alone. No one can blame you for following your heart.

You're usually the first one to coordinate a boisterous New Year's Eve event, but your energy is more contained this year and you're leaning toward keeping the noise to a minimum. A small dinner party and some lively discussion might fit the bill as the intelligent Aquarius Moon strolls through your 3rd House of Communication. Whether you decide to go big or small, be prepared for anything to go down when the clock strikes midnight. Wild and crazy Uranus is in the neighborhood and your plans could change in a heartbeat. Your happiness depends on being open to whatever the universe offers next.

You may evade the question if you're asked about your plans for tonight. The rational Aquarius Moon is transiting your 2nd House of Finances, making you acutely aware of the amount of cash you might spend on entertainment. But even if there is money burning a hole in your pocket, you're still not sure if you want to make such a big deal out of the evening just to be trapped in a wild crowd of rowdy people. Honor your indecisiveness and just let the chips fall where they may. You can always change your mind later if inspiration suddenly strikes or an intriguing invitation knocks on your door.

You're perfectly content to let your friends, spouse or partner make your holiday plans for you today. You're in an anything-goes mood and could be happy wherever you end up for the evening. The reflective Moon is humming a tune in your eccentric sign, and you're willing to dance to whatever cosmic music she plays. However, you're not in the mood for obnoxious people and would prefer to leave a party than be subjected to any drama. Time flies whether you're having fun or not. The choice is yours.

This might be one of those New Year's Eves where you watch the ball drop on TV and then just quietly slip into bed afterwards. The independent Aquarius Moon inhabits your 12th House of Inner Peace, inspiring a more introspective slant on the day. But don't work yourself into a corner with a fixed attitude; sometimes the universe has a better idea in store. You might change your mind later when trickster Mercury dances with joyous Jupiter. Author Denis Waitley wrote, "Life is a collection of happy moments."
